item.text: rgya gar skad du/ bin ya klu dra ka bstu/ bod skad du/ 'dul
ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/// bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la/
phyag 'tshal lo// phran tshegs kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/ so phag chan pa
gru@#// chos gos dang// shing tsha dang ni gnas brtan lus// rgyus pa
'gyod pa dbyung ba nyid// phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad//
pa'i sdom ni/ so pha ga san mo bcos pa dang// lhung bzed yan lag me long skyes//
lam phrin chu tshags mon sran sde'u// rkang pa bkru dang gos mdud do////sdom ni
so phag dang zhes gar dang// nyaphyage dri sa lag ris dang// ka ba dang na skud pa gnyis// lag brgyan dang
sir gdub rgya// sangs rgyas bcom ldan badas yangs pa canan s+dzob lnga ngag 'gramu khang pa brtsegs
ba'i gnas na bzhugs so/ drug sde de rnams snga drongasham thabs dang/ chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te//
yangs pa can du bsidasoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ yangs pa can gyi par dang/ khang bo bar gas ba'i par gyi
bar skabs de na/ yangs pa can gyi ljid tshabA rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun
sum tshogs ba/ byasna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi bar la ba dang/ gar
dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'asgro'i cha byad sna tshogs dag dang/ khrus du o khyad sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis smras
paDa dga' bo khyodaga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi ladi tshadA 'di dag dang/ skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni/ bcos ldan 'das kyis/ sum cu
rtsa gsum pa'i lharnags dpar mdzad na/ re zhig de dag gi skyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o nas/ de rnams blud nas de dag gi skyed mos tshal
du zhugs so// dadag gas de na bdul ba yo byad mda' bo tshadang/ drang ba dang/ 'phang rdos tshogs dang/ gar dang/ glu dang/
rol mo' sgro'i chabyad sna tshogs dang/ ba wang dang/ glang bu dang/ rdza dradang/ 'khar rnga dang/ skad snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang/
khrus kyi yo byad so bag dang/ bkru ba'i phyis dang/ kago ba kru bskya ru ra sna tshogs mtheng ba dang/ de rnams kyis phan tshun smras pa/ dga' bo nyidaga' ba yo byad phunasum tshogs pa rnam pa
dum 'di dag yodan/ ra zhig brtsal ba bya 'am/ 'on te gar bya 'o// glu blang dag/ rol mo' sgri bya 'am/ khrus bya/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag bkrus nas ring zhig len gyis/
red khrus bya'ozhes de dag klod nas so phag dag gis drud cing drud nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang/ bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dag la mkhas pas/ khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid du
'ong ba 'di lta ste/ sil snyanayan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i lta bu byung ngo// skye bo'i tshogs phal po chalam de nas 'gro bas/ sgra de thos pa dang/ de rnams rna ba
o te yud tsam bsdad nas skus pa/ shes ldan dag yangs pa can gyi yid tshabI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal na/ gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa ltar 'dong ngam/ de ltar bya'o zhes ltad mo la de 'dun pa de dag
myur bar chas te/ skyed mos tshal du dong nas/ de dag nang du zhugs pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo// de dag sa de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dgaphyogs gang na/ gar mkhan
rnams gar bgyid/ do rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis bye brag ma phyed de/ gar mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'delta bu 'byung ngas/ 'phags pa dag 'on 'di su'i sgra lags/ shes ldan dag
kho bo cag lus drud nas khrus byas pa yin no// 'phags pa dag su drag sbyong byed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir ga/ bkren pa khyed kyi mgrin ba rdog pas mnan la/
dag sbyor kho bo cag 'dod pa'i yon tan byig gzir to// khyod kho bo cag la rjes su ston pa yin nam ci/ ma skya bar dang/ khyed la gnod pa byas sa lezhes de rnams kyis de dag bsdigs ba dang/ sa gong
nas dngosta/ yangs pa can du zhugs nas/ lam po che dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dag tu'aphya bar brtsams so// dge slong rnams kyis skabs de thos nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gong cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams so phag dag gzigs lus phud de/ khrus byedapa las gyur gyis/
dalta bas na dge slong gis so phag gis lus dud da khrus ma bya'o// 'dud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus dud de khrus mi bya'o zhes
bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag rkang pa sangag byung 'dris dang bcas bzhini bsod snyoms la 'jug ba de dag bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ smras ba/ 'phags pa dgu
byed zhabs sarag byung zhing dril dang bcas na/ tsis drim sbyang b.ram bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag khacom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // ci'aphags pa khyed dri ma'i
'dam bcangs pas dag bar 'gyur ram/ de nas cang mi sna b.ra'adug sta/ bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ gtsug lag khang dudod pa dang/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la rgyas bar gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lag pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga la ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ dalta bas na dge slong gis rkang pa
so phag gis drud par gnang ngo // lus gzhanani ma yin// 'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyulo// bcom ldan 'das yangs ba can na sbral rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsigs pa
na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ de rnams kyis bram bu zhag sa dkar
gyis so rjes gsum byugs nas slong mo la'ang de'i bslangs pa yang mang du bar mthong ngo// drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig sta/ bdag
cag kyang de ltar bya'ozhes/ de rnams phyi de nyin sa dkar gyis so ras gsum byugs nas/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa mo dad pa rnam kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par stsa'o// gus par
stsalozhes smras pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par sla bar bya ba gang dag lani pa dang/ phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang ma shes sam/ de dag gis smras
pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams na gus par skya par bya ba yin la// dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ ci'i phyir khyed dge///
slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi phyag ma yani/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags khar 'tshal gyi dge slong dunas legs so// de lta lags bas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis
bgrod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ sa
dmagis gang cung zad su byung ba ni/ ga slong rnams so rasi gsum 'drib las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis so ris gsum gyi bar mi bya'o// dge slong so ris gsum 'drin 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so ris gsum ma byug go zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ ge slong dag snyan pas bsgo yang sa sas mi sku dpa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar nasnga ma ni bcas ba'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ dalta bas na sman pas bsgo ba na ma gtogs
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug pa rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/

lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs ba na/ pa rnams kyis bram ze 'ga'u lnga nga ga thogi le byas pa zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing stonamo'i bsngags pa brjod/
pa mthong ba dang/ da rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nyidaga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar bya'o lags kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin 'ga'i chang gi thog la
dag gas bdag nyid brgyan pa byas nas/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthongonas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o// gus par sla'o zhes smras pa dang/ drug ste rnams
kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus bar smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang/ phyag bya ba gang dag yinupa 'di yang shes sam/ de dag gso snas la/ 'di la su zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/
bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams na gus par sna bar bye ba munil/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus bar sna bo da kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags ba
dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du nam lags so// de'i slad du bdag cag gis ma 'tshol gyis/ bzod pa gsol lo zhes khyis pa dang/ de dag cung mi
smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad cu byung ba na dge slong dag 'ga'u
khong gi thig le ga gas bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ lta bas na dge slong gso 'ga'u wang ga thig le dag gis brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyananagal tshabs can du/
ka 'gyulo// khacom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis 'ga'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong zhig dbral bar ma byung ba de sman pa'i drung du songan
bzhin ba zangs bdag la sman stonacig/ 'phags pa'i then ker 'gawang gis skus shig dang/ khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'dras kyis ma gnang ngo/ 'phags
ba khyod kyi ston pa rnathugs can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa ngo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ka' stsal pa// de lta bas
na dge slong dag sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus dud par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis 'dud par byed do//
we bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nya phyis kyis da bar mkhya'o// 'dud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu// sa das rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams dris byugs te/ gzhon nu rnams kyi nad du dong nas smras kha/ gzhan du dug yod kyi dri ji lta snyomasashige/ de dag gis smras
kha/ gnas brtan ci khyed dris byugs sam/ byugs so// gnas brtan khyed dris byug turung dmA/ rang yang rung/ ma rung yang rung ste/ nged kyis de byugs so// de dag 'phya skyod kha zer ba'i
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dris khug pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas
na dge slong rnams kyis dri byug bar mi bya'o/ zhug na wal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams kyis dra phyug par mi bya'o zhes bka' sul pa dang/ dge slong nad
pa zhig smanapa'i drung du sod sta/ bzhen babrangs bdag la sman ston cig/ dos smras pa/ 'phags pa dris byugs na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bzhinab zangs su kho bo 'dod pa spyod dag/ 'phags
ba khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin// gzhan gyis ni 'tsho bar ma nus so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ delta bas na
gnang gis/ smanaba'i lung gis dri bcang bar bya'o/ dag slob dag dris byugs nas dag 'dun gyi nang na 'dug cing/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags ba rnams la/ chos ston bar byed/ bram ze
dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa dge slong
dri'achang ba'i kun tu u0fa9dpa'i chos bca' bar bya sta/ dge slong 'chang bas dris khyugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug bar mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs ngazhing lhag
pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ bram za dang khyim bdag gi khyams rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'/ nam sos par gyur ba de'i tshokhrus byas nas dri ma med par gyur pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug
par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la ches bstan bar bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/ dge slong dri 'chang bas kun tu spyad pa chos ji ltar
tshe bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ ma 'i dug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la dri 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams 'gyod nas malen
pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'bags pa dag gang ga tshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur ba de'i tshon/ mu stags can rnams yon gnas lags/ da ni bcom ldan 'das
'jig rten du byung bas/ daltar khyed yon gnas lags na/ gal takhyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rtan 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dag pa'i lam brgyags ma mchis mtshi'am/ bag
cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shagi/ de dgags sa ba/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor bar dang/ de dag gis skas ba/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rang thang bzhin du khyoton khyed
kyis blangs dor ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas dor bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dri'i leg ris phyug par bya'o zhes bka' sul ba dang/ drag slong rnams kyis blus nas/ dbu sku dung san mo'i mchod rten dag la dri'i lag ris zhug go/ de dag gas
smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gas mchod rten ma mthong ngam/ bdag cag gis ni khyed kho na la phul te/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag pa nasdor phul lags so// skabs de dag
slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas la gsol pa dung/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 3 blangs nas gnas khang la byug par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la byugs ba dang/
de dag dri gtsang khang yin no snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du phyug bar
bya'o dge slong rnams kyis drang thad du khyugs pa dang/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stas dang nyab 'am rkang pa la bar byug par bya zhing/ dri/
gzhim po thams cad mgo la phan bas dus dus su bsnam bar bya sta/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chusun byis pa bsod kyiri la
'bags 'jigs lta'i tshalar rigs kyinags na bzhugs so// riman rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs byed kyis khang bzangs par ras byed du bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thes kyi dag bdun dang bcas/
bkagadugs tshod la spyan drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das khang bathangs pa'i ris su dge slong ga dag 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// te dga' bo branazu ba'i tshalag pas ka ba la bstun
ba dang/ khang bgrangs pa sa g.yos par gyur te// 'drim mkhan rnams kyis sbas pa/ 'phags brgyal bu rtogs byed kyis khang bakhrungs pad+maris tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bkrab r byas pa khyodo/
kyis gzhag gamacu/ na dga' bos snyas pa/ bkren pa rtogs byed 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas gang skya gtol med do// khyed kyang 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas rtags
lnga ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyulo de dag kha zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dmigs gang
cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bstan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gas lag bas ka ba la bsnun par mi bya'o// bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ khacom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong gas ka kha la lag pas bstan par mi bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde rnams khu tshur dang/ gru mo dang/ phrag pa dang/ mgo dang/ tshig logs dang/ rkyab dang/
skad pa dang/ brludang/ bus mo dang/ byin pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ dbyug pa dang/ bong ba dang/ gzhan gyis snyan par byed pa nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka'
stsal pa/ gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o// drug sde rnams ge pa dang/ sa dang/ gzhan la snyan par byed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan la yang gang dag gis
bsnun par mi bya'o// snun na 'gal tshabs canadu 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rakhanabazhugs

so dag sde nas snga dromanyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ de rnams kyis bram ze zhig tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te/ slong mo la rgyu zhing/ a baba' pa dang bca'ab yang mang du rnyed pa mthong na/
drug sde rnams kyis smras ba/ dga' bo'aga' bo thabs 'di nibazang bo zhig sta/ bdag cag kyang de lta bu bya'o zhes de dag phyid nyin tshangs pa'i skud ba thogs te/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par stsalegs par sla'o zhes smras pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkrin pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang//
phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis sbas pa/ de la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams rigs par smra bar bya ba yin la/
ga slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yinan/ deci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par sna bar byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed drum bu lags bar zhal gyi/ dge slong du ni
ma lagaso// de lta lags pas/ bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis// bzod par gsol lo zhes byas ba dang/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i skad la thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis
tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par ma bya'o// 'dogs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos ba'agos/ lhung bsred thogs to/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de dag gis bram ze dri dang me tog
gis brgyan pa/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings ba zhig dus ston khros nas dang ngo de tshim sta/ khyim nas byung ba mthong ba dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ dga' ba nyidaga' ba thabs
'di ni bzang bo zhig sta/ bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o zhes/ de dag phyi de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
kyis mthong nas/ 'phya nang gus par sgrub gus bas skya'o nis smras pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkran pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang/ phyag bya ba gang dag yin
pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis skyes pa/ 'dil tsazhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ a brganA ba rgano pa rnams ni gus par sgra bar bya ba yinal/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yanin/ de ci'i phyir/
khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi/ phyag ma yin 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lugs par 'tshel gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas/ bdag
cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/ bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang/ de dag cad mi sna bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ rtsom ldan du

kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshon sna lngalasku bas lag ba 'ching ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshonas lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba mi
bya'o[)]'ching na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyurago/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna lnga ba'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i drung du song
ste bzhin babrangs kho ba la nad 'di lta bu byung na smanaston cig ces byas pa dang/ das smras pa/ 'phags pa skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bzlas brjod byas te/ 'ag//
ba la bcings na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin babangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rjecan yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de
dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ dalta bas na gnang gis/ snyan ba'i lung gis skudapa bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis sman ba'i lung gis skudab bcang bar bya'ozhes bka' sul pa dang/ dge slong rnams lab pa g.yas pa'i sa mo la 'ching sta/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slongodag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la btung bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag ba g.yas pa'i dpung pa la 'ching sdu/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// lag pa gsus pa'i dpung ba la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rgya mo la 'ching sta/ rtas dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa mo la bcing bar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung ba la bcing bar bya'o// dge slong rnams nad sos par gyur nas/ skud pa ba ba bab tu 'dor ba ma ma yin pa
rnams 'bya sta/ 'phags pa dag nged kyis sos par byas na/ dam gus bar byed pa lta/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ bab bab tu dor bar mi bya ste/ gal tan la bya nga na chos gos kyi mtha' 'am/ rgya capa la bcing bar bya'o// 'on tu thams cad kyi thugasacud du sos par gyur nas/ ka kha'i
bur ga 'am/ rtsag pa'i gsob tu gzhug par bya'o// sdus rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med phras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so/ drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyomasakyi phyir zhugs pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi rgyan slo ma'i nang du
gzhag pa/ drug sde rnams kyis rkang rgyan dang lag rgyun dag thogs nas smras pa/ gal bo che dga' lo/ ji ltar mdzes sam/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed mge ni bya
mchan khung nas nAbadi la lus mdzes pa cazhig yod/ gdon mi za bar dge sbyong byed 'dodapa yon tan dag gis gzir bar gyur tozhes byas pa dang/ de rnams cang mi skya par 'gago/ skabs de
dge slong rnams kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ni byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams lag rgyan dang skung rgyan dag
gas bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lag rgyan dang kong rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par m khyego khargyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyulo
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonAmadwa zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs de/ gtsug lag khang du ma byin par len pa rnams kyis/ dge 'dun
gyi mdzod dang/ gang zag gis gnas khang dag nas brkus so// dge slong gzhan dag cig gi yang stor na/ bdag cag gi stong nas khri tsam lon pa ma tsho ro/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na gnang gis/ rgyabacang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ drug
sdoms kyis gsar dang/ dngu dang/ ba zur dang/ shel las byas pa dang/ sor gdubya rgyargyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag bcangs so// de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag mthong nas/ lag
pa brkyang sta smras pa ! bzhin bzungs nad med cig/ nad med cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'dicilags/ bzhin bzangs patshem ldan 'das kyis rgyu gnang ngo// de dag 'phya smod kha zer zhing/

dag sbyong kAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyamasangashing tshangs pa'i tshulanyams te/ 'din da ltar skyal tha snyad 'degasangashing/ rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byed de// skabs de dge
slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gsar dang dngul dang/ bi nu dang/ shel las byas pa'i rgya bcang
bar mi bya/ sor gdub rgya yang bcang bar mi bya'o/ 'on kyang rgya phra bar gan dang/ zangs las byas pa dang/ 'khar ba las byas ba dang/ ba so las byas pa dang/ ra las byas pa bcud
bar bya'o/ drug sde rnams kyis rgyal skyes pa dang bud med nyal ba byed pa bris pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis sbas pa/ 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod ba'i yon tan dag ga
gzir ram/ gnas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab sul pa/ rgyu ni gnyis te/ dge 'dun gyi dang/ gang zag gi'o//
de la dag 'dun gyi na dbus su 'khor lo bris na/ glogatis su ri dgas/ ga tugatsug lag khang ba bdag bo'i ming bri bar bya'o// gang zag gi ni sa pa'i keng rus sam/ mgo'i thod pa bri bar
bya'o[; ]tasdom ni [ ]sen mo 'dreg dang byi dor dang// a grwa dang na skyu ru// lhung bzed brgyad khe bkag pa dang// rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshakhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dunal/ rgyal bu rgyal
khyed kyi tshal la ba de'i tsho/ das 'dreg mkhan gyi la smras pa/ kye skyes bu rgyal bu rgyal khyed kyi la du songal/ 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs shig/de rgya la bu

a rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang/ drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde gang yang rung ba nas gas rgyal bu rgya 'byed kyi tshal gyi sgo ma stongs pa yin te/ tshodang ldan pa de dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed/
kyi tshal na'achags cing 'dug pa des/ dargyang bde po nas mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// khyod zla ba lta bu r gnas na ring mo zhig lon te/ gang
nas 'das/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu breg pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo// des smras pa/ sen golegs bar 'di ga shes sam// 'phags
pa 'di nyid bdag gi bze 'gas so// bltas tshur/ nyid nye bar 'ongs pa dang/ nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo// 'dreg mkhan gyis smras pa/ 'bags pa 'dra ba'i sbreg/ bzhin bzangs
'bru'i rtsa me ltar bregs shige des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang/ des smras pa/ dmir ba'i rtog lta bu dang/ spu gri'i so dang/ star ka dang/ zla ba tshes pa ltar gyis shig/ des de
ji lta ji ltar bsgo ba de lta de lta bu ng byas pa dang/ 'ad tusmras pa/ bkranapo khyod kecung zad kyang rishes pa zhig 'di khe na ltar mnyam par gyis la song zhig ches/ des de 'am nub kyi bar du
ma btang ngo/ de nyi ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon med bras sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang/ mgon med zas spyin gyis smras[+ ]skyes bu khyod kyis 'phags pa mang bo ji snyad cig ga mgo dang kha
bregs/ bdag gis 'phags ba rnams kyi skra dang kha spu ga la bregs/ dge slong gzu lums can nya dga' bas bdag bskor nas/ sen mo 'bru'i rtse mo dang/ ra ba'i cog dang/ spu gri'i so dang

snya'u kadang/ zla ba tshes pa lta bu r gyisangashigaces ba'i rnam pa thams cadra bdag gis bgyis pa dang/ de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa khyod kecung zad kyang ma shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam bar
gyis la song zhig ces mtshanas/ da gzod khon shongan cizhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nyabar zhi ba mdapa lta zhes 'phya ba/
la zhugs so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nus/ bcom ldan 'dras la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs ga cung zadasubyung ba na/ dge slong rnams san
mo dreg pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sonamo breg bar mi bya'o// 'dreg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dus kyis dge slong chen mo breg par mi bya'o zhes bka'
stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams san ma ring po ring po 'dug pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa// 'phags pa dag cicu sen mo ring po ring bor 'gro/ bzhin bzas bcom/
ldan 'das kyis ma gnang go/ 'bags ba ci byed sonAmo bcas bas dag par 'gyur sa/ skabs dug slong rnams kyis shes nas/ com ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma ningecas pa'o// 'di nig nang pa yinatu/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ san mo rnam pa gnyis pos gri'i so dang/ star ka lta bu r brog par
bya'o// bcom ldan ' sa mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshokhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sas rgyas
la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la nas bya ba thams cad de kho na bzhin no/ khyodasanalo 'chos shas sam/ 'bags pa ji lta bu bgyi/ ser bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar bo dang/
gsar gyi kha dog lta bu r gyis ngashag ces pa'i skyes pa thams cad bdag gas bgyis pa dang/ de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par
gyis la song 'gacas mchinas/ dugakhrodakho nashor nAci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba mad pa lta
zhes 'phyi ba la zhugs so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'adus la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa// nyos dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni
dge slong rnams san mo dag byi dor byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na ga slong gis san mo dag byi dor mi bya'o/ byed na lag la tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis/
san mo dag phyi dor ba bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ ga slong tshonatsA'i las dang/ lhung bzed kyi las byed ba rnams kyi sen mo dri ma chags la/ mdog ni sdug par gyur cing/ de rnams san/
mo de badra ba kho nar bsod snyoms la 'jug go/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas snyas ba/ 'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir sen mo 'di lta bu r drim chags shing mdog mi sdug/ da
dag gis bsnyad pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa// 'phags pa ci'i phyir dri ma ma phyi/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa khyed rtsi dri ma 'dam bcangs pas 'dag por 'gyur/
ram skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka lastsal pa/ drim dbye ba'i phyir sen mo bzhar bar bya'o// sangs
rgyas bcom ldanu'adas rgyal po'i khab na 'dama'ichol khya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun tupyod pa ni/ dus kyi gsar thog 'bru sar pa 'am/ 'bras/
bu sar pa gang ci yang rung/ de dag dang por dag 'dun la 'bul lo// de'i 'og tu bdag nyid za'o// de'i blon po rnams kyis sa lnga'ishing thog dag phul ba dang/ des smras ba/ song la
khaphags pa rnams la phul cig/ de dag gis bgad pa dang/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sel dgod/ de dag gis smras pa/ lhasu khyed nga ni'aphags pa
la rnams la dang bor 'bul snyam dgongs kyi/ bdag cag gis ches sngab 'phags pa rnams la bul b.ranam lags sam/ des smras ba/ gal tedi lta na ngas 'bags ba rnams la stong gi
kun dga' ra ba nyid phul lo// lha legs te/ rjes su yi rang ngo// des phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong ga kun dga' ra ba phul nas/ dgadus ston kyang btsugs so// de ji
ltar yul ma ga d+ha na gnas ba'i skye bo'i tshogs dus ston la lta bar 'ongs pa a ma'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim par gyur ba de ltar shing thog rgyas par gyur to// de dag 'dun la phul nas/
dge slong rnams kyis sa mu'i 'bras bu ga la smin ba nyid du bros so// dzitsam na mtshams kyi rgyal nage la A grwa dag dgos par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la lo nyabatrang ste/ grogs
pe bdag la a grwa dag dgos kyis/ bskur ba'i 'gigs so zhes byas ba dang/ sa po nyid la snas pa/ kye skyes bu ngas stong gi kun dga' rab de/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul gyis/ songal
'bags pa'i dge 'duna rnams la slos shig/ de 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang/ drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ rtag tu kun dga' ra ba'i sgo ma stongs par byed pa yin te/ tshod ldan pa nye
gal bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi sgo na'achag cing 'dug go/ de de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal to/ des smras pa/ rgyal bo tsheg mo zhig gis a mra'i char du khyed kyi thad du btang na/ de'i slad du a ma
dag sul ba'i rigs so// des sas pa/ kyi skyes bu song la sa smra jitsam dgos pa datsan long zhig/ de song nas a ma'i shing rnams kyi drung du bltas na snang ste/ daslar log nas smras pa/
'phags pa ma mchis so// tadage 'a bos de khrid nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs te/ kun gA'i ra ba thams cad bskor nas smras pa/ kye skyes bu ngashing 'dila'ardzogs shig/ des 'dzugs nam
mthong pa dang/ tadaga' bos smras pa/ kya skyes bu shar gyi yal gar gong/ lho dang nub kyi yal garasong/ de thams cad du song nas skyo bar gyur tababs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sikun
dga' ra ba 'di le 'di lo 'bras bum chags sam/ bzhin bzangs ji ltar lo ril re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags so// 'phags pa cing dang charebs blugs sam/ bzhin
bzangs rlung dang char pas ma blugs kyi/ 'on kyang khe bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyidadu 'chos so// de slar log nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa// lha 'phags
pa rnams kyi zhal nas/ kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma snyanabanyid du 'chos so zhes gsung ngo/ des smras pa/ lags ti/ nga la longs spyad pa nyid dgos so zhes byas pa dang/
ma de slar song ngo// jitsam nadus stonal bab pa'itsho/ yul ma ga d+hu na gnas pa'i skye bo'atshogs 'dus nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci sbyong gi
kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu mchags sam/ bzhin babrangs dag ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras

ba dag la sman pa nyid du 'chos so// 'phags dag gang nayul ma ga d+ha naganas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad a gra smin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba de khyed kyis 'bras du ma smin pa kho nar 'chos te/
gang kho bo cag laganod pa byas pa ni ma lags pa zhig byas so// des smras pa/ 'dirgyal bos yul ma ga d+ha naganas pa'i skya be'atshogs la byin pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la late/
de lta bas na kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bros so// khyed ci gtogs zhes byas pa dang/ de dag 'phya smodakha zer bar byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'adas la
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad cu byung ban/ dge slong rnams a zla dag za ba las gyur gyis/ dalta bas na dge slong gis a ma dag bza' bar mi bya'o/
ge slong a kra dag za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis a ma dag bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag/ dge slong
rnams la shing sa da ka pa'i shing thog dag 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams kyis sbas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// de dag gis snyas pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tsho/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rte na du byung bar ma gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro 'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis gros
nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gas/ mtshananyid grub pa yin no zhes byas nas bza' ba bya sta/ 'di la 'gyodang mi
bya'o/ yod pas de la mtshan nyid grub pa ni 'di dag yani// tshig gu chags pa rnams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig/ dge slong rnams la a mra'i shing thog sman pa
dag 'bul ba na zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha la tumatshiTam/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i khor thams cad snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ com ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ mtshan nyid bye brag phyed do zhes byas tu bza' bar bya'o// de la mchin de bye brag
phyed pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sha zhugs pa rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhi'i sman pa'i drung du song// bzhin pa zangs bdag 'di badra ba'i nad kyis thebs na/ sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa rje
mang 'thung la snum par gyis shig dang/ bkru sman sbyin no// sa mar 'thungs pa dang/ skom pas gnod par gyur to// sman pa 'ongs tadris pa/ 'phags pa bde bar 'dug gam/
des smras pa/ banan ba zangs bdag skom pas gnododo/ skya pa'achongs gshis ces byas pa dang/ des lag tu blangs te 'dug go/ yang sman pas dris pa/ 'phas/sa ba sgom pa dang
khral len/ dus sbas pa/ bzhin bzasam pralal// smanapas sbas pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshoskyu ra ma bcangs sam/ bzhinabazangs yod de 'di yin no/ 'phags pa khar chongs
shig/ bzhi ba zangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo/ 'phags po khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rjetsan yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de zhes bya ba sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
a[@ ]bka' sul ba/ kha bcang ba'i bar du zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ dus khar bcug nas 'ag go/ yang san ba de bos nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des snas kha/ bzhin
bzangs da dung ma bral lo// nabs smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshoskyu ru khar ma bcas sam/ bzhin ba zangs bcangs te 'dug pa 'di yin no// des smras pa/ 'phagasab nur cig/
gzhan du na skom pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// des snas ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa khyod kyi stonab na thugs can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de
dge slong nags kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das lagisol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nur bar bya'o// mur mur nas bor gyis/ ma mid pa dang/ skom bas gnod/
bar gyur to// yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzas ni gnod do// 'phags pa de'i tshesgyur ram mur ram/ bzhin bzangs
mur nas ber ro// 'phags pa ci'i phyir ma mde/ bzhin bcas bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go/ 'phags pa khyed nind pa yinal khyod kyi ston pa na thugs rjecan
yin pas gnang bar 'gyuralo/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldanu'adas la gsol pa dang/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gnang gis/ 'bras
bu lnga dus su yang rung/ dus ma yin par yang lung/ nad pa yang dang/ mi skabs kyang rung/ bza' bar bya sta/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang
rung dus ma yin par yang ngung/ nad pa yang rung/ mi na bas kyang rung sta/ bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa ma shes pa dang/
bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ skya dur dang/ a ru ra dang/ b.ru ra dang/ pa pi ling dang/ nal zham mo sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'as
ga rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ rgyal bo'i khab kyi grong khyen khyim bdag kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod chen po zhig gnas
pa de gcer bu ba rnams la rab tudad do// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar khyod/ dga' dgur spyodabarakhyid do// de rtsa bar
byed ga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byedapa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thobs dang chos gos mnabs/
lhung bzed bsnams te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/ rgyal bo'i khab na bsod snyoms la zhing/ khyim bdag kun tub zang po'i khyim ga la ba de logs su gshegs
pa dang/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ma nas mthong go/ mthong nas kyang chung ma khridis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'ongs phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchis phrang 'disams can zhugs par gyuran/ zhib tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu pher btsa'
bar ba gyur nang/ rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar ma gyur/ pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sngangs/ dgra bcom pa nyid

ma nasan byed par 'gyur ro/ des bcom 'das la babra' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing pa lung ba bsod snyoms bzhes dgshegs so// de dang hacang ma ring ba zhig na gcer bu pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams po/ gang bdag cag la bslang ba'i khyim gcig pu zhig yod pa de yang/ dge sbyong gol
su da dag/ baa ldan 'das la bza' ba dang bca'ab gcong zhu bsod pa lhung bzod bkang ste phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces gsungs nas/
tams kha drangs kyis/ song la dge sbyong go tams ci'ang bstan pa lta'o snyam mo// de der song ste smras pa// khyim bdag dag sbyong go tam 'ongs par gyur tam/ byon to// des ci zhig lung
bstan/ 'phags pa bdag gis de la chung ma bstan// cizhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang/ de bu phorab saM bar 'gyur zhinge/ gis gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang ma'i
dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tubyung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo// gcer bu pa de phyis/
mkhas pa zhig ste/ rdorgyus kha dog dkar pe blangs nas brtsis pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gal
darjes su bsngags na ni khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong go'u tun la dad pa 'ong bas/ de bas na 'di cung zad cig ni bsngags par bya/ cung zad mi na smad par bya'o
snyam du bsams nas/ lag pa khyogs/ bzhin bsgyur ba dang/ khyim bdag kun tu bzang bes sas pa/ 'phags kha rtsis lag pa kyog/ bzhin bsgyur/ des spus pa/ khyim bdag
'a cung zad cig ni bden/ cung zad cig ni brdzun// 'phags pa gang ni bden/ gang na ban/ khyim bdag bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni bden no// gas
gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin de nobadanan/ gsal ba nama'i ming yin pas/ sams canaskal ba chung du de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mas tshig par 'gyur ro// sgyu
dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun// khyim bdag khyod kyis mi'i gyur ba lha dang mi'i dpa' nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta mthong ngam/ 'i
bstan pa la rab tu 'byung zhes zer ba bden te/ gang gi tsho'adi bza' po yang mad/ bgo pa yang med pa de'i tshog/don ni dra bar dug sbyong go'u tama'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs
ba thams cad sangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzunute/ ra zhig dge sbyogo'u ta la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs pa'i
0 dgra bcom pa nyid med na pa'i nyan thos la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyim la dag shan shubazang bo ma deb 'a bar gyur nas rgyus pa/ 'phags pa 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi
gcer bu pas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag na rab tu byung ba sta/ bsrub pa blangs pa yini bas/ khyod nyid shes so zhes smras nas song ngo// shin tubazang bos bas/mos pa/
'di yod dor ro snyam nas/ snyanam yinab sbyin par brtsams pa dang/ sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig bas/ sman ma yin pa de yang de la sman du gyur/ des deb dku g.yon pa ma1
bar brtsams pa dang/ mngal na 'dug pa de dku g.yas par song ngo// shin tu bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnyabar brtsams pa dang/ de dku g.yon par song ste/ srid pa tha ma ba'i sams can/
zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du/ bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa ni/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// khyim bdug pa shin tu brad po'i chung ma de dku mnyes
las du bar bsdus pa drang/ khyim tshes dag gis thos nas/ rings pa rangs bar song su dris pa/ shes ldan khyim bdag ga chung ma 'di cis nga/ shinatubazang pos sbas ba//
gdon mi za ba'i bar 'dade bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab bo zhes byas ba dang/ de dag dong ngo// shin tu bzang bos bsams pa/ bo dag gis 'da'arigs)mi nus kyis/ dgon par
bkra'o snyam nas/ des de dgon par khrid nas/ sunas bcibs 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtsal nas/ des de spus te khyim du khyer nas mdza' bo dang/ nyid dang
ga phu nu dang/ khyim chos rnams la snyas ba/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma ngashig/ de dag gsung bar brtsams nas/ de dag nga zhing/ dgos sngon po dang/ sar pa dang/ dmar po
dang/ dkar po rnams kyis khyegs ba nanas bsil brgal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro// gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas/ de dag dga' mgu rangs nas/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/
hU~M ba dan dag bsgrong ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam pachadang/ srung dang/ ban de dang/ sum mdo dag rgyu zhing snyas la/ rashes lda dganyon cig/ dge sbyong golutams khyim
ba dag ngashin tu bzang po'i chung ma bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing/ rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpalanyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byunganas/ nyon mongs

pa thams cad spangs ste dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhes lung bstan pa de ni shi nas bsil bachil gyi dur khrod du khyeraro/ re zhig 'ange gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang med pa de la/ lag
dang/ 'dab ma dang/ lo ma 'byung bar lta ba la 'gyur/ skabs 'di lta bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gakhrigs pa ma/ ma rig pa 'am/ rnam par mi
mkhyen pa cung zad kyang ma mnga' sto/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rtenal phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig tu/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su ma gsung
ba zhigs dang lhag mthong gis gnas ba/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa// 'dul ba'i gzhi ba gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhalas bal kha/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i
zhabs kyi mthal legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms par mdzod pa/ ma 'jigs pa bzhis ma bsangs ba/ yan lag lnga rnam par sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba
lnga bas yang dag par 'das pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ drug la rtag tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/
la [“]yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/ grags pa phyogs bcur khyab pa/ stong la dbang sgyur bas
khyad par du 'phags pa rnams nasanyid kyis nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum dus ngas rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gakhrigs shang/ su litams/ su ni der/ su ni nyes nga bar gyur//
sun skabs su chudapar gyur/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su minyam ngab dang/ stobs su chud pa dang/ gnod par gyur/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ningan song la 'bab/ su ni ngan song la bab/
gang ni ngan song las drangs nas/ mtho ris dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu la dgod/ gang zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod par bya/ gang zhig gi bskyed pa ni yongs su smin
ba bar bya/ gang zhig snyan pa ni grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzags pa 'jug go/ yang snas pa/ chusrin gnas kyi mtshon/ dus rlabs 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//
sangs rgyas dus las ma 'da' 'o// ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i gcig la// lta zhing de la srog kyang srung pa ltar/ gdabazhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skyo gol// deng shanagazigs shing de yi rgyudakyang
srung thams cad mkhyenapa'i rgyud la gnas pa yi// thugs rje'i ba sa ba gshin be'u stor bzhin// sridapa bgrod dka' 'khyams par gyur pa yi// gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mi mkhyen
b.ratshol/ bam po gnyis ba gdanas brkyes ldan 'das kyis phyogs shig tumadzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshesangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ zhal nas 'od gazer sngon po dang/ sang pa dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dag phyung nas/ kha cig ni thog tu'agro/ kha cig ni stong du 'gro phyogs/
! gang dag 'og tu 'gro de dag ni myal ba yang sos dang/ thige nag dang/ bsdus gzhon dang/ pu'abod dang/ ngu 'bod chen po dar/ tshob dang/ rab tutshab dang/ mnar med pa dang/ chu bur
tsacan dang/ chu bur rdol dang/ so thams thams dang/ kyi hud zer ba dang/ a chu zer pa dang/ ul ltarags pa dang/ bar ltar gas pa dang/ bltar gas pa chen por song ste/ tshapa'i
dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag duni bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/ grung ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tshun dro bar gyur nas 'bab bo// des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad brgyun bcad/
pa dang/ de dag 'disAm dusems te/ shes ldan bdag cag 'di nas shi 'thos sam/ na rtogazhanang skyes zhes brol ro// de dag dad pa brgyad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul ba gtong ste/ de
dag gis sprul pa du mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems shing/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin/ gzhanangu skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong

ba zhes sta/ 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad dazhes zer ro// de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dwang bas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de rbad par byas nas/ gang du sems/

can rnams stod du 'gyur ba lta dang mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor pa la ni to// gang dag sku ngo du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang/
'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dar/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'donadang/ tshangs chen dang/ 'od chud dang/ tshad mda'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dag chung dang/ chod
med dag dang/ dag rgyas dang/ sngan med dang/ bsod nams 'phel dang/ 'bras bu chadang/ mi tsha ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ gya nom snang dang/ shin tumathong dang/
shinatumathong dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa zhes bya ba yang sgrugs so// tshigs bcad gnyis kyang sgrogs te/
la brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chibadag rda na gzhom par bya// chos 'dul 'di la gang zhig ni// bag dang bcas
bar spyod byed pa/ skya ba'i 'khor ba rab sangs nag/ sdug bsngal gyi na mthar byed 'gyur// de nas 'od gzer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chanape'i 'a ga Nan gyi khams bskor nas/ tshem ldan 'das
nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ste/ dgal tabcom ldan 'das las/ 'das pa lung bstan par bzhadanani/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi snyamalegs su nub par 'gyur ro// ma 'os pa lung ston
bar bzhed na ni/ mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// ngamyal bar skyo b.lung ston par bzhedanani/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror spyi ba lung ston par bzhad nani/ long mor nub par 'gyur//
'degs su skye ba lung ston par bzhed nani/ nabs kyi mthe bor nub bar 'gyur ro// mare skya ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung

bat+tha ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas kyi mal du nub par 'gyuraro// lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed
nani lta bar nub par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na no/ zhal du nub par 'gyur ro/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spyir nub par 'gyur
ro bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzor de dag gis stong ba sum gyi stong chen po' 'dzagi tsa na gyi khams
bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub bo// de nas tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
rnam pa sna tshogs tshonan gong dag gis// bkra ba'i tshogs dag zhal gyi nang nas byung// ma shar bar gyur ba ji lta bar// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// tshigs su bcad deyang
gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs// rgyal ba dgra thur 'gro mchog rgyur gyur pa// rgyu ma mchis par b.ra'i rtsa lag dang// dung ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum pa ston mi mdzad// de ltas
nyid kyi brtan blos dus mkhyen nas/ rgyal dbang nyanapo par 'tshal rnams kyi// the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyos mchog gis// gsung mchog bsrang zhing bstan pas bsal du gsol// rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rir ba ltar bstan pa// chung thu ba rnams ni glo bur 'dzug mi ston// mgon po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad ba de// skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal//
com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhinano// ded bzhin te// dbazhanegashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mad rkyen med par 'dzum pa
ma mdzad do// kun dga' bo song la/ ga slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhinagashegs pa du khrod du rgyun gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhunegashogs pa dang lhan cig dur

b+ho khrod du rgyun 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long zhig ces sgo zhagi/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga'i bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshAl lo nyis/ bcom ldan 'adus kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong dag
gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrodad rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod/

sh+tsa du myu'ang 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas srongashagaces bsgo ba dang/ dge slong thams cadi'adus nas com ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ zhi bo/ 3khor
ni bogrol ba/ 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang
bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa/ 'khoram rdzis pa/ khyu mchog ba glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ glang po glang po che'i phrug gu tshogs kyis bskor ba
lta khu sang ga mchab can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / ngang pa'i rgyal bo dad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / nam mkha' ldi de bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / bram ze bram ze'i khye'u'i
tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / sa mkhana'agron pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / dad
dpe tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / tshong dpon tshong pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba lta bu / khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bsod
lta bu / zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / nyi ma 'od gzer stong gis bskor ba lta bu / yul 'khor srung dra za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / 'bags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs
kyis bskor ba lta bu / mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta khu/ nor sbyin gnod spyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / bcu
byan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu / tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i tshogs kyis bskorab lta du/ rgyamatshom g.yo ba lta bu / sprin chudang bcas bltakhu/ glang po che'i rgyal/
po dregs bcad pa lta bu / dbang po shani[]dul bas spyod lam ni nyams par gshegs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu tsu gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dbo
ka khyad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas ba/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan ba/ 'od kyi ma stong pa sa lhag pa/ rin po che'i ro 'gro ba lta bu r kun nas bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs
pa bzhi dang/ ma 'dres pa gsum dang/ dran pa bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nyan thos chen po kun shes ko'u da myudang/ rta thul dang rlangs pa dang/ ming chen/
ts+tshA dang/ bzang po dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ 'od srungs dang/ grags pa dang/ gang po la sogs pa dang/ dge slong ga de 'dun mang po gzhan dang/ srog chags
tastong phal mo ches bskor nas bas tshul gyi dur khrod du gshegs so// sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod de/ bcongargyud gang zhe na/ mi'i 'jigs pa med/ chu'i
b+hU 'jigs pa med/ sang ge'i 'jigs pa med/ lcag ga 'gas pa med/ gzig gi 'jigs la mad/ phakhrol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'gas ba med/ rkun por 'jigs pa lud/
la gtsanapa'i 'jigs pa med/ gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med/ sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med/ bsal rngan gyi 'jigs pa med/ mi 'jigs pa med/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs/
dab med/ dus dus su gzugs bzang bo dag mthong bar 'gyur sgra snyan ba dag thos par 'gyur/ da nabo dag mthong bar 'gyur/ kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi
khongs spyodadang/ zang zing gi longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas gshegs pa rnakhe ned pa chung ba la ni bas/ lha dang ma brgya stong dum/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bring du phyi
bzhin 'brang ngo// bsil ba'i tshal 'gas nas rlung dag kyang 'dus so/ rgyal gris kyi khye'u zhig dang/ bram ze'i khye'u byas pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu byung ste rtsa zhing 'khod/
de dganyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ bram ze'i khye'u ni de lta ma yin no// bram ze khye'u dus/ rgyal rigs kyi khye'u la rgyas pa/ grogs po bcom ldan 'das
kyis khyim bdag shin tubazang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi'i dpal mang myong bar gyur nas/ 'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon
mongs pa thams cad sangs bas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ do ni'achiba'i dus byas nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer na/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa brdzun du ma gyur grang/ rgyal rigs kyi khye'u dus tshigs su bcad pa snus pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la ltung yang srid// sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la
gro yang srid// rgya mtsho chen pa'achunabaskam par 'gyurasrid kyi// drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa mni// bram ze'i khye'u des grogs po de lta na bsil tshal
ba gyi dur khrod lta zhing 'dong ngo zhes smras nas/ de gnyis dang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab nas gshegaso ba mthong// rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho nas mthong
nas ang chags su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa the tshom bral zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba// ri dwags rgyal bo lta bu'i sgra skadamchog sgrogs shing// the tshom med par pha rol sna ngas ma brje ba//
'di ltar skya bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing gshegs// bsil tshal phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lu khagi/ gsal ba'i dad can rlung ni langs par gyur pa na// bkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul
brtag pa'i den gyi phyir// lha tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye 'ur skya bor
klu 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi'i dpal gang myong bar gyur nas/ 'a bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
du byed par 'gyur rozhig lung bstan na/ de ni chiba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrodadu byung zhing/ bcom ldan 'adas kyanyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tubasil tshal gyi dung
tsakhrod dugashegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sams te/ bcom ldan das nadinam da bar bal tshalagyi dur khrod du mgashegs bas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis khyim/
bdag shin tubazang po'i chung ma las brten te/ gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur gor ma chag gis/ bltar 'gro'o snyam nas/ de btsunamo dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang
pho brang 'khor dang/ ljongs kyi mas longs su bskor nas/ rgyal bo'i khab tusong ba dang/ rgyal rigs kyi khye'u das/ rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong
nas lang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ma ga d+ha ya mnga' bdag rgyal bo'i gtsobo 'di// 'di ltama' kher bcasargyal po'i khab nas byung ba las// skye bo'i tshogs kyi 'byor pa phun sum
tshogs par n// bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes par gyur// skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ gshegs shul phye ba dang/ bcos ldan 'dus zhal 'dzum pa mdzad
cing/ rgyu bo rnams kyi gung la bzhugs so/ bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu pa dag gis mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di ltar rig sbyong go tam bzhin 'dzum pa byedacing/ skya bo
mang po'i gung la 'dug pa las na/ sams can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas/ des khyi bdag shin tu bzang po la sas ba/ khyim bdag sams can skal ba chung du 'di ni ma shi//
des smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar gyur na/ skabs 'di la da dziltar bsgrub par bya/ sa stsas pa/ khyim bdag kho bo ni bislab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa
ka yin gyis/ khyod nyid shes par gyis shig/ des dudangashing bcar tachung na'i ro de ma'i phung bo'i nang dubacug ste bsregs pa dang/ de'i lus thams cad tshig na lto' 'khor de bzhin du 'dug
go/ de nas lhor nya 'khor de rdel nas pad+ma byung rgyu/ pad+ma de'i snying po las gzhazhug khrugs ba brang ba/ lta na sdug ba/ mdzes pa zhig byung ngo// de srog chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas/
mchog tungo mtshar chen po skyes bar gyur pa dang/ gcer bu pa dag gi rgyags pa dang/ da rgyal dang/ khengs pa dag nyams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag shinatubazang
pa la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu long zhig/ des ga cer bu pa'i gdong du bltas pa dang/ des smras pa khyim bdag ma phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na thams cad kyi thams
cad du tshig par mi 'gyur ram/ de skad smras ba dang/ des ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal ba/ 'tshobyed gzhon nu pang zhig/ des
bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin par bdag ma bsgos kyis/ byang ngosnyam nas/ das the tshom mdapar ma phung gi nang du zhugs blangs so// rgyal
ba'i bka' yis ma ya phung por zhugs gyur te// de yis gzhon nu ma yi nang nas blangs pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis ma na ba nyid gyur cing// kha ba'i tshogs ltar bsal ba'ang skad cig de la
byung/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'tshobyed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa// 'tshobyedu khyod nyams pa 'dri gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag rgyal
po'i pho brang du btsas shing/ rgyal bo'i pho brang du skyes pa gyur kyang/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsan danas mchog pa lta bu r bsal bar gyur pa 'di khyu
bu ni sngon chad ma myong lags so// de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag ngashin tubazung bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di long zhig/ de log par lta ba la phyogs pas re zhig
lenaparam byedatsang/ gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong dulu bar byed do// des smras pa/ khyim bdag mang du 7dgos/ mas ni thams cad 'tshig pa yin na/ gzhon nu shin du skal ba chung ba
'di ma tshig pa las na/ 'di khyod kyi khyim du khyer na khyod kyi khyim yang chog cing/ khyod kyi srog gi bar chad du yang 'gyur bar nges so// des bdag lus gces pa mad do snyam nas/ de ma blangs pa/
dang de'i tshobcom ldan 'das kyis/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long zhig/ dus gus bar sgrim pa dang bcas pas lag pa
brkyang sku/ de blangs nas kun tu brtags te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di'i ming carigadags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen
gokhye'u'adi la da ltar ma' nang nas skyes pas/ de'i phyi khye'u 'di'i ming la skyes zhes bya bar btags so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag
la ta la dang/ khams dang/ rong bzhin thugs su chud nas/ ci nas kyang semasacan bcu phrag mang po de dgags thes nas/ khyad par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu r chos bstan pa mdzad
[% ]pas/ kha cig gis ni rgyunang zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras khu/ kha cig gas ni phyir ma 'ing ba'a'abras bu/ cig gis ni rab tu
byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba dang/ kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang/ kha
cag gas bzod pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring bskyed par gyur to// kha cig gis ni tran thos kyi byang chub dang/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang/ kha cig gis nan mad pa
ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// kha cig gas na skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag par blangs te/ 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs
rgyus la gzhol ba dang/ chos la 'bab pa dang/ dge 'dun la bab par gyur to// de rgyal bo gzugs can snying bas khye'u ma skyes ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba' ma la gnyis dang/ sku na
bstan pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ drim 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ nagrogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do// de ma ma brgyadapa dag gis 'o ma dang/ nodang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang//

mar gyi snying kha dang/ gzhan yang mo khyad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gso srang bar byed/ spyod par byed cing/ dzad na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du spyad par byed do// de'i nang po zang thegs
tayul gzhan du song ba des/ ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te// rigs dbar bar 'gyur zhinge/ lha dang mi'i se
dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyidamangon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos nas/ des
ze bsgyur ta/ riniblangs nas/ rgyal bo'i khab tusong ba dang/ des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chiba'i dus la bab po zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i bu khyo' skye bar 'gyur te// ragis 'bar bar 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs pas/ dgra
bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba de brdzun du ma gyur tam snyam nas/ des khyim chos dag la dris ba
bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs pa gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khye 'ur 'gyur te/ gas 'bar bar 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi'i dang la lung myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung
sta/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbas paso/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dubyed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par thos so// thos nas bdag kun tudaga' bo las/ de yang 'chi ba'i dus la
bab bo sa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de brdzun du ma gyur tam/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la ltung yang srid// sa 'dir
ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro 'ang srid// rgya mtshoren po'i chun skam par 'gyur srid kyi// drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa man// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
brdzun du ma gyur te/ 'di ltar khyim thab des de ji lta ji ltar 'chibar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas/ 'ba'i dus la bab nas/ da khyi'u dbang thang chen po can mar bsregs kyang ma
tshig pa mthu bo chezhig/ da ltar rgyal bo'i pho brang nagaso nge 'dug go zhes smras ba dang/ da khyim bdag shin tu bzang po' gen du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mi rigs pa nagi
[/]khyag so/ tsazhig byas/ gcer bu pas bslus nas/ khyod kyis nga'i sri nge mo la sems can zhugs pa/ ji lta ji ltar 'chibar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas/ 'chiba'i dus la bab par byas so// de'i

khye'u dbang thang can mar bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig/ da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso nang 'dug pa de la ning zhig ci byung yang med de/ bdiltar du yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta
nalegs/ 'on tami lenan ngas khyod gnyen du yang ma brtsi/ rabs mig kyang der nang/ lam po che dang/ srang dang/ lam gyi sum mdo dang/ bzhi mdo dag tuyang khyim bdag shin tubazang/
bos bdag gi sring mo bsadadi/ chung ma gsod ba 'di la sus kyang gtam 'drab r mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa khasgrug cing/ rgyal bo'agi nod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes smras pa drang/ des de thos nas
skrag sta/ da skad smra ba dang sbyar na/ bdag la de ltar byed par nges so snyam nas/ da rgyal po'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi nyadu bo'i mchid nas/
dayang gal ta gzhonanu da blangason de ltan legs/'on tam len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing/ lam bo tshadang/ srang dang/ lam gyi sum mdo dang/ bzhi mdo dag
tu yang khyim bdag shin tu babrang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chungam gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o// zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing/ rgyal bo'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug
go nas mchibs/ de'i slad du lhas gzhon nus skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so rgyal bos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu ma skyes pas khyod las blangs pa ma yin gyi/
bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la gtad pa mun pas/ khyod la gal ta gzhon nu dgos na/ gzhon nu'achad du bcom ldan 'das la sngar zhusangashagi/ da bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdur song nas/ zhabs
gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// com ldan 'das bdag gi ltadu bo'i mchidanas/ da yang gal gzhen nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on togalen na ngas khyod gnyan
du yang ma brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dar zhing/ lam po tshadang/ srung dang/ lam gyi sum mdo dang/ bzhi mdo dag tuyang khyim bdag shin tubazang bos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chungam
gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes snyan pa bsgrag cing/ rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchibs de'i slad du gzhon nu ma skyas bdag la sul ba'i rigs so//
com ldan 'das kyis/ gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyas ma thob na/ khrag tshab skyags nas 'chiba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs nas/
tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgyal bo gzugs canasA bal/ nga' bkas a rogagya zhes byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyod bdag
shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu ma skyes khyon cig/ gal takhyim bdag shAn tu bzang bo gzhon nu ma skyes ma thob na/ khrag tshag skyugs nas 'chiba'i dug byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta
bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang sgo zhig/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bos// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyan nas/ rgyal po gzugs canasIre go ga la ba der song
su phyin nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod la rgyal bo chen po sa rog gya zhes bka' stsal to/ rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang
po la gzhon num rgyas byin cig/ gal takhyim bdag shinatubazang bo gzhon nu ma skyas ma thob na/ khrag tshab skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yodapar
'gyur ro zhes kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'adras la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo//
tshadang ldanupa kun dga' bos rgyal bo chenango arogo rgya zhes smras song ngo// rgyal bos smras pa// khyim bdag gzhon nu 'dings bskyar de/ yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa yin pas/ dam tshig
bcas la sbyin par bya sta/ nyimare re la yang dus gsum gsum du nga blta ba'i phyir gtong na sbyin par bya'o// des smras pa// lha khyod kyi spyanasngar ma gtang na gzhan su'i thad du gtang bar
bgyi gtang bar 'tshal la/ rgyal bos de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ glang po chol bskyon nas btang ngo// 'di ltar 'ag rten pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/

ka/ ji srid du pa gson pa de srid du ba'i nang mi sgrogs go// dzatsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag ngashani tUbazang bo'achiba'i dus byas nas/ b gzhonanus skyas pa'i khyis na gnas par gyur ta dasangs rgyas
la mngon par dad/ chos dang dag 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo/ dus khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos phyogs gang du
bdag ga ma bsad pa'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang brtsig tubatsuganas/ yo byed thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te/ phyogs bzhi'i dag bdun la phul nas/ 'di lta gnas brtan dag
gas kyi mdo ste dag la bcom ldan 'dras rgyul bo'i khab nadaku mnyid pa'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes nye bar sbyar ro// khyim bdag shin tubazang bo'i mo zho shas 'tshob yul gzhan du dong ba dag
gis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po na'o chiba'i dus la bab bo/ gzhon nu ma skyes na rang gi khyim na gnas te/ des ngas rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngonapar dad/ sangs rgyas
la skyabs su song/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngozhes thos so// thos nas kyang dodag gis tsanadanas mchog pa'i lhung bzadagacig/ rin po chadag gis bkang ste khyim bdag ma skyesal
skyes su bskur ro/ des kyang dengashing ri bo'i rtsa go la btags bzhags nas/ 'di skad ces 'di sus kyang skas dang/ ya gad dang/ kyo btang dag gas blang bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar dge sbyong ngam/
bram bre gang dag rdzu 'phrul chab 'am/ mthu chab de dag las 'ga' zhig gis lanan/ des na 'di ci bder khyer rag go zhes dril bsgrags pa yang byas so/ gzhan mu stags can rnams nang par sngar
langs nas/ tshungogs dag nye reg byed du 'dong ba de dag gis de mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang khyim bdag ma skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di mi yin/ das de dag la rgyas bar bsad pa dang/
de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod gshAkya'i bu'i dag sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas/ de dag nyid len par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas dong ngo// jitsam nadge slong gnas brtan gnas brtanadag rgyal
bo'i khab tubasod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong nas/ de dag gis kyang/ khyim bdag ma rgyas la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyug par bsnyad pa dang
de dag gis smras pa// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gi yon tanan bcab pa bya/ skyonan bsgrag par bya'o zhes bka' su lan/ ji lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du bdag nyid bstan par bya
'an zhes smras nas dong ngo// jitsaman tshadang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bsu ba de phyogs der 'ongs te/ khyim bdag la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des ji lta ba yin pa smras pa dang/ tshadang
0/ ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pas bsams ba/ bdag gis theg ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs ba'i tshogs rnams sngangs shing bor la/ bsal nang
la sbyang ba byas na/ khyim bdag gas bdag mu stags can dang rdzu 'phrul bsgyun bar chad kyis// de'i phyir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o snyam nas/ des lag pa blang bo che'i sna lta bu brkyang sku/ lhung
bozad de blangs nas/ des de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song go/ de la dge slong gis skyas ba/ gnas brtan khyod kyi tsan dan sa mchog ba'i lhung bzed 'a di ga las mchis/ des ji ltar gyur
pa brjod pa dang/ dge slong dag gis smras ba/ gnas brtan khyod lhung bzed tsam gyi chod dukhyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung ngam/ de tshodang ldan pa dag rang la bla/ mi rung yang
bla sta byas zin pas da ci bya yang madado zhes zer skabs da ga slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adus kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun
du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstanabar ma bya'o// rnam par ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po/ gsar las byas pa dang/ dal las byas pa dang/ ba cha mA
las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa dang/ gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam ba bzhi bo/ ra gan dang/ thangs dang/ 'khar ba dang/ shing las byas pa dag las/ 'di ltag lhung bzed
snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ma blangs pa yang blang bar ma bya la/ blangs pa yang gtang bar bya'o// lhung bzed phyi na kha de gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ na bladas pa ni byung bar ma
bya zhing/ blangs pa na sman bod du longs spyod pas spyad par bya ba yinen// 'di lta lcags dang/ sa'i lhung bzed gnyis ni byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dag yin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na sa
bag ma skyes lha dang mi'i dpal spung myong bar gyur nas/ rgyal po'i khab dang/ tsan pa dag gi bar nang sho gam gyi gnas shig yod pa derishogam pa 'chiba'i dus la bab nas/ dra gnod sbyin gdug pa
zhig tu skyes pa dang/ des bu'i rmi lam du 'di skad ces bu khyod kyi gnas 'dir gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su chug la/ deng dril yang gyis la thogs shig dang/ gang gi tsharengs dag thong las
shogam ma 'dzul bar 'gro bar byed pa de tsho/ dril de sgra 'byin bar byed cing/ de dag phyir ldog pa las sho gam chod bar 'gyur ro nyis bstan to// des gnyen bshes dang/ nye du dang/ rtsa lag
ngag la rmi lam de bzlas nas/ nyim dang/ tshes grangs dang/ udatsam dang/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ dus shis pa las bab pa'i tshoganas der gnod spyin gyi rte na'adzugs su cug nas
der dral yang byas tabatags so// grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gas/ rages mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang/ bram ze mo des bsags pa/ bdag bram khril thabs de dang de dag gis
bsgrubs pa'i nor dag spyod cing/ las ciyang ma byed par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin nos nas// de tshong dus su song sta/ ras bal nyos nas sal gyis
zhag par byas shing bkal to/ thab pa mkhas pa la kar sha pa Na stong ri de'i ras zung gcig 'thag tubacug go/ danas des/ bram ze la snus pa/ ras zung 'di kar sha pa Nastong rib/
lags kyis/ tshong dus su bzhudal gang dag kar sha pa Na stong gis 'jal ba la ni gyol cig gal mi 'jalan/ tshong dus ma yin nozhes bsgrags nas/ gzhan du bzhud par mdzod cig/
dag de khyer tatshong dus su song ba dkar sha pa Na stong gis nyob su yang med na// dus tshong dus ma yin zhes bsgrags ta/ sa zung de gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste/ bgron pa dag dang lhan
cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo// dzicom natsam pa'i bar gyi sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang/ sho gam pas 'gron pa de dag la she gam bcad pan/ de dag gis she gam phul nas dong ngo//
das nas dril sgra 'byin par byed nas/ sho gam ba dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dril 'di ltar sgra 'byin ba las na/ 'gronang dag gas ngasho gan legs par ma phul gor ma chag gas/
yang gam gcad do zhes/ dadag gas 'gronang dag yang phyir bkug ste/ btsal nasogs gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do// de dag dong ba dang/ yang drig sgra 'byin pa nyidadu byed/
nas: de dag gses 'gron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste/ btsal na'ogam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas/ 'gronab dag nged la khyed cag chog po byed par sems sam/ na= yong
dang yang du phyir 'gugs par byed du sa smod par byed do// de dag gis 'gron pa de dag choms gnyis su byas bskye ba dang/ tshoms gang gi nang na bram ze de med pa dag ni de bzhin dong ngo// tshogs
cig shes 'drong ba na la de de bzhin du sgra 'byin par byed nas/ de dag gis de dag kyang de bzhin du tshoms gnyis su byas ngashing byas shang bkye ba dang/ tha mar bram ze de gcig pu zhi tsholus par
gyur nas/ ded dag gas bzung/ des bdag la cung zad kyang med kyis tshol cig ces smras pa dang/ de dag gis btsal na ci yang da nas btad ba na/ yang dril de sgra 'byin pa nyid du
bya6do// de dag gis bram ze de yang phyir bkug nas smras pa/ kya bram bre lha'i byin gyi brlabs ni de ltar gyuran/ khyod bden par smos shag dang/ kho bo cag khyod lag gam ma lenato//
des smras pa/ bden par mi len nam/ de dag gas skyes ba/ ma len te// des gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang nas ras zung de byung sa bstan to// de dag kya ma lha'i byin gyi brlabs ni'i de 'dra'o zhes
ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur nas/ de dag gis de'i sa ya gcig bya ste lha la bstan to// bram zes smras pa// rgyakhyed cag na re shegam lenatozhes drer nad thams cad 'phrog gam/
de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze nged cag lenapar mi byed de/ lha'i khyi degyi babs de lta bu mdzad pas red kyis lha la bstan par zad kyis/ lol song zhig/ des de blangs
gnas yang gagus kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste song nas/ khad kyis rgyal po'i khab tuphyin to// dus tshong dus su ras zung de bkram ba na/ der yang de kar sha pa bya stong gis nyob su yang mad nas/

des rgyal po'i khab kyi tshodadus kyang/ tshong dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags so// de na gzhon ma spyas glang po tshel zhon targyal bo'i pho brang nas phyir byung// tshod dus kyi nang nas rang gi khyim du
'gro bas de thos pa dang/ ngos shes ldan dag bram ze de ci'i phyi tshong dus ma yin nozhes sgrogs par byed pa dri bar byas bos shig/ de dag gis de bas nas/ ma skyes kyis snus pa/ bram ze khyod
ci'i phyi'i tshong dus 'di tshong dus ma yin no zhes sgrogs par byed/ des smras M pa/ khyim bdag ras zung 'dit+ta bu kar sha pa Na stong gis ba su yang med pa'i phyir ro// des smyos pa bltas
wA khyer te shog/ des de nyabar bstan to/ ma rgyus kyis smrasu ba/ bram ze de tsam ni ri mod kyi/ 'on kyang ras gcig ni spyad zin ba zhig/ gcig nim spyad pa zhig bas/ ma spyad ba gang yin/
ba 'di ni kar sha ba tsalnga ba ri/ gang spyad pa 'di ni nyes brgyalnga bcu'i ri'i// bram zes smras pa/ ci'adi de lta bu r 'gyur ram/ ma skyes kyis sbas pa/ bram ze khyod kyis mngon
sum du bstan gyis ltos shig nyes/ des ma sprad pa de stong gi nam mkha' la khyer ba dang/ de brgyang zhing 'dug go/ spyad pa borab nad la thug tuphyir lhung// bram ze ngo mtshar skyes te
lcas pa/ khyim bdag khyod ni rdzu 'phrul chab/ mthu che ba zhig go/ ma skyes kyis yang ltos shig ces smras nas/ des ma sud pa gang yin pa de tshor mo'i stong du bor nam thogs par
song ngo// cig shos dper na cholo ma la thogs nas/ bram ze dngo mtshar chen po des mngon par dad par gyur nas sbas pa/ khyim bdag khyod ni spu 'phrul tsheg/ mthu cheb zhig pas/
khyod rin ji tsam gyis bzhed pa de tsam gyis snyoms shagi/ des smras pa// bram ze khyod mgron yin gyis/ khyod nyid la mchod ba bya ba'i phyir/ kar ngosha pa Na stong nyid sbyin par bya'o zhes/
des de lA kar sha pa Na stong byinab dang/ bram zes de blangs nas song ngo// ma skyes kyis de dag las gang sbyad pa de na khye'u zhig la byin/ ma spyad pa ni khrus ras su byas so// de nas dus
gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying bo stong gi khang bzangs kyi thog na/ blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing 'dug pa'i tsho ma skyes kyi khrus las khang pa'i stod du skam du bcug/
ba rlung gsi nam mkha' la khyer nas/ rgyal bo gzugs canasnying po'i stong du lhung ba dang/ rgyal bos smras ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos 'di lta bu ga sa 'ongs/ ]
de dag gis sbas pa// lha rgyal bo nga las nu byung ba'i tshan dgung bdun du rin po che'i char bab bo zhes thos na/ lha la yang na bza'acher bab pa las na/ 'di bon
thogs par rani po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal pos smras po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag ma skyes lha dang ma'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur goms lung bstan la/ 'du yang lha'i
gis nam mkha'i las 'das pa zhig na/ de'os dang sbyin par byas zheg cig ces bsgo'o// de dag de skad smra ba'i ngonyid nam skyes 'ongs pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod bcom ldan
'dus kyis lha dang ma'i debal yang myong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan la/ nga la yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las lhung ba 'di lta bu yod kyis/ de khyod khyer cikaM/ des lag pa brkyang ste smras pa/
lha galar snga brami gyis tshur stsol zhes brtagasan/ jitsam na bdag gi khrus ras yin par mthong nas/ cung zad bgad desnus pa/ lha 'di bdag gi khrus ras bsar ma 'tshal nas 'dir mchis
pa lags so// rgyal pos smras ba/ gzhon nu da khyod kyis lha dang ma'i dpal yang gyong bar gyur tam/ lha myong bar gyur to// gzhon nu gal te de lta natse'i phying spyana'adren par mi byed/ lha spyan
'drenano// song la zho la nga gi zhal 'dag ngashoms shagi/ lha gang gis lha dang mi'i dpal yong myong bar gyur pa la zhal ta brgyad pa 'tshal mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag zhal 'bagyid du mchi'o// rgyal po
ma skyes kyis khyim du song nas/ bud med kyi 'khor phyi po dag mthong ba dang/ dbang po dag phyir gon pa byed 'o// ma rgyas kyis smras pa/ lha 'i slod du dbang bo dag slar glen par mdzad/ des
smras pa/ gzhon nu mna' ma yin pas de ltar byas so// lha snam bua ma lags te// 'di ltar bud med kyi 'khor phyi pa dge lags so// de ngo mtshar chan bo skyes nas/ yang bud med kyi
'khor ba ma dag mthong ba drang/ dbang po dag phyir gyon par byed de/ ma skyes kyis de bzhin du dris pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang de bzhin smras so// ma skyesakyis snas ba/ lha 'di dag kyang rnam
khrus ni ma lags te/ 'di ltar bud mad kyi'akhor bar ma dag lags so// de ngo mtshar chen po lhag par skyes so// rgyal bos de bar sgo'i phyogs rin po chu'i rang bzhin las gyur pa/
rlung chus gang ba lta bu de na nyi dag rgyu ba 'dra ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba byas ba dag mthong sta/ nang du 'gro bar 'dod nas lham dag 'bud bar brtsams pa dang/ ma skyes kyis smras pa/ lha
tsa'i slad du chags dag bsal bar mdzod/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu chul 'bog par bya ba'i phyir ro// ma skyes kyis snyas ba/ lha 'di chab ma lags te/ chab lta bu r gda' ba nirin po che'i
sa gzhi lags so// des smras pa// gzhon nu nye rgyu ba dag 'di ltar snang ngo// lha 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba las de dag rgyu bar gda' 'o// rgyal po yid ma ches pa dang/ das sor gdub kyi
'bas pa na/ sgrakA la la zer tari bo che'i sa gzhi'i steng du 'al bar gyur nas/ de ngo mtshar skyes te/ nad du song nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/ mna' ma dag rkang ba
