sha la phyag 'tshal du lhags pa de dag mtshim byung nas/ rgyal bos smras pa/ gzhon nu ci'i phyir mna' ma 'di dag du/ des snas ba/ lha 'di dag nga ba ma lags te/ 'di ltar lha'i na bza' la
razhing gi dad pa'i dri gda' bas/ des 'di dag mtshig byung bar gyur to// rgyal bo lha dang ma'i dpal de dag la nye bar spyod cing/ phyir mi ldog pa na/ rgyal bo'i khye ba dang/ rgyal po'i byid pa
dag yongs su nyams par gyur nas/ gzhon nu ma skyes dogra la/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa// gzhon nu lhu ni ma skyes kyi khyim du gshegs nas/ bag ma mchis par gyur gyis bzhud la
spronacig/ de song nas sbas pa/ lha khyod 'dir gshegs teyazhugs par mdzad dam ci/ blon po rnams kyi mchade nas rgyal po'i khu ba dang/ byed pa dag yongs su nyams par gyur to zhes
mchi'o// des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci khyod kyis zhag gcig tsam rgyal srid byed du 'jug kyang nus sam/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis na lhas dgung bdun lags par 'tshal na/ lhas ni
dgung gcig lags par mkhyen pa lta/ rgyal pos ma skyes kyi gdong du brtags tasgras pa/ gzhon nu bdenanamo/ lha mad de dgung bdunakho na lags so// 'o na nyin mtshan ji ltar shes/
lha me tog dag kha 'bye zhing 'dzoms pa dang/ nor bu dag gi 'od 'bar ram me 'bar ba dang/ bya dag skad 'byinanam ma 'byin pa'i tshul las gda' 'o// ma ga gang dag dgung la kha 'bye zhing
gdugs la zum par 'gyur ba yang mchis/ gang drag gdugs la kha 'bye zhing dgung la zlum par 'gyur ba yang mchis/ nor bu gang dag dgung la 'bar zhingo gdugs la mi 'bar ba yang
mchis/ gang dag gdugs la 'bur zhing dgung la ma 'bar ba yang mchis/ bya gang dag dgung la skad 'byinacing gdugasal ma 'byin pa yang mchis/ gang dag gdugs la skad 'byin
cing dgung la skad 'byin pa yang mchis so// rgyal bo ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa/ gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das ni phyin ci ma log bar gsung ba sto/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ji ltar lung
bstan pa kho na las gzhan du ma gyur to// de skad smras nas/ rgyal po de ma skyes kyi khyimanas phyir byung sta song ngo// gzhon nu ma skyes dgras ma skyes kyi nor bu gcig brkus te/ khye'u zhig
ga lag zhugatad pa dang/ des gang nas blangs pa de nyidadu phyir songes 'dug go/ ma skyes dgras smras pa/ khye'u nor bu de bltas khyer shog/ des chung ba phye ste smras pa/ gzhon nu gang mchis/
ma 'tshal lo// des de brdeg par brtsams pa dang/ ma skyes kyis sbas pa/ gzhon nu'adi la ci'i phyir rdeg par byed/ khyim bdag kho bo yang rkun ma yin na/ 'di ni rkun chenazhig sta/ bdag
gse khyod kyi dbu brkus ba de/ mang 'dus brkus so// des smras ba/ gzhonanu khyod kyis kyang m brkus/ 'dis kyang la brkus te/ 'di ltar khyod kyis gang nas
! blangs pa de nyid du phyir songargyu 'dug go/ de lta tshod kyi gzhonanu khyod kyi khyim la gyas/ nor bu ji snyad dgos pa dang/ gzhanang nor rdzas ci dgos ba de dag ci bder long zhig/ de skyangs
nas bsams pa/ nam zhig na bdag gi pha 'chiba'i dus la bab nas bdag rgyal po byed bde'i tsho blung rosum mo// ji tsam na ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis bslus nas/ pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang
pa ldan ba srog dang phral nas/ rang gas cod pan bcings rgyal po zhugs nas/ de'i tshe des ma skyas bos te/ khyim bdag khyod dang nga spun yin bas khyim dag bgo bar bya'o// des
bsams pa/ 'di na pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan ba de lta bu bsad de/ bdag nyid kyis cod pan bcinges nas rgyal bor zhugs pa yin pas/ 'dis gal te na bdag kyang gsad par
'gyuraro// 'di bdag gi khyim 'brog par sams yang thag gis spyin bar bya'o snyam dubasams nas smras pa/ lha 'di khyod mngo' na bgo pa 'tshal/ khyod kyi khab tu ni bdag mchi'o// bdag
gi sdum pa ni khyod gshegs su gsol/ ma skyes dgras smras pa legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes/ de de'i khyim du 'phos shing/ laskyas ni ma skyes dgra'i khyim du 'phos pa dang//
dpal dang ldan pa'i khyom de mi snang bar gyur cing ma skyes ga la ba de nyid du byung ngo// de ltar lan bdun gyi bar du ma snang bar gyur cing byung ba dang/ ma skyes dgras bsams pa/ 'di ltar
skyes kyi nor bu dag bdag gis 'brog par ma nus kyis/ thabs gzhan zhig bya'o snyam nas/ des chos rkunub dag bsos te/ deng la ma rgyas kyi khyim nas nor bu dag zhus shig ces
bsgo nas/ de dag gis skas dang/ ya gad dang/ kyo btang dag gis 'phrog par brtsams pa dang/ stong gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir gtogs pa na chung ma'i 'khor 'khod pas de dag mthong
nas: de dag gis rkun po byung ngo rkun po byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ngo// ma skyes kyis de thos nas/ chom rkun pa dag 'dug par gyur cig ces/ yid la yang bsams/ tshig tu
brjod pa dang/ de dag gang nog ji ltar 'tshogs pa de nyid nade bzhin 'khod par gyur to// jitsam na mtshan mo 'das te/ namanangs ba dang/ skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag gis mthong
nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po sdig can 'dus/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan b srog dang phral nas/ da yang khyim 'dzems par byed pa de ci'i phyir bdag
cag gis dang du blang bar bya/ ma skyes dgras ma skyes kyi gan du bo btang ste/ nga la skyon du'agyur bas de dag thong zhig ces byas pa dang/ ma skyes kyis chom rkun pa 'di dag 'dong bar
gyur cig ces bde la gad bsams/ tshig tu yang brjod nas/ dadag dong ngo// ma skyes kyis bsams pa// gang gis 'di ltar pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan b/
sha srog dang bral ba des bdag gsad bar 'gyur gor ma chag gis/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i bstan pa la rab tubyungasgyu nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs bas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin sa/ rnam pa thams cad ng der song la rab tu'abyung ngo snyam nas/ des nor gyi rnam pa thums cad phongs pa dag dang/ mgon med ba dag dang/ dbul
sa khyim bdag ma skyes mdza' bshes dang/ rtsa lag dang/ 'du dang/ phu nu drug gi ngobaltas
nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song su phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu'adug go/ mtha' gcig tu'adug nus/ khyim bdag mo
[Q ]s+yas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunub bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu'abyungashuge bsnyanabar rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod bar 'tshal lo// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal
[z]sa thag kho nar/ skra byi zhing snam sbyar bgos nas/ lag pa lhung bzed dang/ bya ma bum dang ldan pa dang/ sgra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dugyur cing/ dge slong bstan par rdzogs
nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyob lam lta bu r gnas bar gyur to// do bzhin gshegs pas tshungashog bka' stsal pas// skra byi snam sbyar gyonapa'ilus ldan zhing// mod la dbang po rab zhu gnas gyur/
sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas/ des brtsal ba dang/ 'bod pa dang/ bsgrig pa byas bas/ 'khor ba'akhor lo cha lnga pa/
g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid 'ge ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis bcom nas/ nyon mongs pa
thams cad sngangs bas/ gra bcom pa nyid mngonasum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gsar du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil
ltar sanas mnyam la/ snya' dang tsan dan du mnyam pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob ba/ srid pa dang/
'ded pa'i ridapa dang/ ba kung si la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nyadabang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang/ rjod par bya ba dang/ gus par stsa bar bya bar gyur
dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tsho dang ldan pa ma rgyas
'dis lus mi zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sman pas ma dang lhan cig zhugs kyi dang por bsregs shing/ lha dang mi'i do la myong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yang dag
tubyung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad stangs bas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag rigs kyi lam sgyusanyid kyis
las tshogs red ba/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du zhabar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas// la rgyas nyid kyis las byas shinged sa
ba dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par m 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/
ma'i de khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'daltar las dag pa dang/ mi dag ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni thanipa'i phung bo dang/ 'gas dang/ skyes mched dag la
rnam par smin par 'gyur taM kA+o las rnams bskal ba brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// red na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag 'gyur ba nyid/ khag slong dag[H .]
sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa nA/ stonapa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
ba 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gziges zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
g+ha dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi 'khor dung thabs cig tu ljongs rgyur gshegs pa na/ rgyal po'i pho brang rtsa lag can du byon nas/ rtsa lag can gyi tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshorgyal
bo'i o brang lu log canan/ rgyal pogatanaldan zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyayo po/ chos dang ldan ngs/ rgyal srid 'byor pa/ rgyas pa: bde ba/ kholegs pa/ skya bo dang pa mang pos gang//
'thab mo dang/ 'thub pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ phyi dgra dung/ nang 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ mu ge dang/ nad rab tuzhib/ 'bru dang/ bu'am ngashang dang/ ba lang
dang ma da phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug go/ de na khyim bdag sa med ces bya ba/ byug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyodAtshab/ yongs su gzung ba yangs dgang rgya tshab/ rnam thos
kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs bo'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs lan du ma zhage khyim du spyan drangs
te gdugs tshod gsol yod kyis/ zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa nas yang nas bas/ da bad tsa yang dag par rdzogs pa
sangs rgyas rnam par gatrigs la/ zla ba gsum du go byad thams cad kyis khastabs so snyam nas/ gang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs galab der song ste phyin nas/
ra yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sos rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ khyim bdag nyes med la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par ston b.ramadzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdaM/ yang dag par gzengs bstod
par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tudagar bar mdzad do// rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam mang dag par bstan/ gang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/
la dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag nyes med stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig byas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btus nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pagazags 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom
0ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ bdag dgung blagasum du na babran dang/ zhal zas dang/ gnas mal dang/ snyanagyirkyen dang/ sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul bar gnang/
mang dag par rdzogs pa'i so sargyas rnam pa bgazigs kyi/ khyim bdaganyis mar la cung mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag nyes med kyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar gi nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhebs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// stan las langs
nas song ngo// rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi 'khor dang thabs cig tuljongs rgyur gshegs ba na/ rgyal bod
pho brang rtsa lag can du byon nas/ rtsa lag can gyi tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang des bsams pa/ bdag gis yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam bar gzigs
lan du ma zhig pho brang du spyan drangs te/ gdugs tshod gsol med kyi/ zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa ni nam yang ma byas bas/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la/ zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so snyam nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der songs phyin
@#/ nasaad dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gatrigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu'adug go mtha' gcig tu/
'dug nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ rgyal bo gnyan ldan la chos dang ldan pa'itan yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag b.ra'adzinadu 'jug par/
mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod bar mdzod/ gang dag bar rab tudaga' bar mdzad do// rnam grangs du marachos dang ljanaba'agatam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du
! bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tudaga' bar mdzad nas/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// ba ma po gsum pa// de
nasargyal bo gnyanA ldan stan las langs to/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzugs la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dag 'dun dang bcas pa la/ bdag dgung zla gsum du na bza'i dang/ zhal zas dang/
gnas mal dang/ stun gyi rkyen dang/ sman gyi khyad rnams 'bul bar ci gnang/ rgyal po chen po khyim bdag nyas med kyis dang po kho nar spyan drangs zin to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
gzhan/ ji ltar gnang ba de ltar bdag gis khyim bdag nyes med 'drang bar bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po gal takhyim bdag nyes med 'drangasan sa de bzhin gnang bar bya'o// rgyal ]
boganyan ldan / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te/ rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ rgyal po
gnyenuldan gyis/ khyim bdag nyes med pho nyas bkug nas/ khyim bdag shes par byos shig/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam gzigs dang bo nas ngas gdugs tshod gsol la/
de'i 'og tu khyod kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gdugs tshod gsos na khyod la gnod pa med dam/ des smras pa/ lha yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
gzigs dang po kho nar bdag gis spyan drangs lags pas/ bdag gis gdugs tshod gsol bar 'tshal lo// rgyal bos smras pa/ khyim bdag gal tede lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nga'i
mul na gnas pas dang po kho nar ngas gdugs tshod gsol par 'os so// lha ba ltar bdagu khyod kyi yul na mchis mod kyi/ 'onakyang gang gis sngar spyan drangs pa de nyid kyis gdugs tshod la sopa
ba 'di la lhas gnod par bgyi ba'i mi rigs so// khyim bdag khyod 'dod rgyal dumakho tang gis/ gdugs tshod gang bzang bas spyan drang bar bya sta/ gang gi gdugs tshod bzang bas sngar gsol
bar bya zhing/ gags ma thub pa des byis gags tshod gsol bar bya'o// khyim bdag nyes med kyis de bzhin bgyi'o zhes mnyananas/ de nyid kyi nub mo khyim bdag nyes
mdakyis/ btsa' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod ba dag sbyar te/ nang par sngar las nas/ gang thabs mang po bshams shing/ tshur ngag nye bar bzhag nas/ gang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la/ gdugs tshod kyi dus su spyan 'dren gyis/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tsholalags te/ btsun pas da de'i dus la bab par dgongs
su gsol zhes gsol pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sda drosham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong ga ge 'dunagyi tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/ khyim bdag nyes med kyi bkadas ga la ba der gshegs gyon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// denas
khyim bdag nyes med kyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag klong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs bar rig nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag rang gi lag nas bstabasangashing tshim bar
byas te/ lan grangs du mar bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhangebasod pa dag rang ga lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bcol nas/ phyol bcabs te/ lhung
ba byed bzhag bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba 'a blangs te/ yang dag par rdzol sa pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i 'dug go/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ khyim bdag nyes med la chos dang ldan pa'i gter yang dag par ston b.ramadzad/ yang dag par 'dzinang 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag bar gzengs bstod par
mar/ yang dag par rab tudaga' bar mdzad do// rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag bar bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par
rab tu dga' bar mdzadanas/ slar gshegs so// rgyal po gnyan ldan gyis kyang gzhung gong ma dzilta ba de bzhind gdugs tshod gsol ba rgya cher rig bar bya'o// rgyal bo dang khyim bdag gi gdags
tshod bzang ba 'dra ste/ gang yang pham rgyal mad nas/ rgyal bo gnyen ldan skom tshugs bcas te/ sams khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang/ blon po dag gis smras pa/ lha khyod ci'i slad du sgom
tshugs bcas te/ sams khongs su chudaing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i grong mi gang yin pa de yang gdugs tshod lhag par bazang bos pham parom
nusan/ nga ji ltar sgom tshugs bcas to/ sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug rung/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha zhugs shing 'ong ba rnams dgag dang/ khyim bdag de'i zhugs shing
za/ ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ rgyal bos smras pa/ zhes ldan dag gong dag pa'i yul naganas pa de dag gis shing btsong bar byago/ gang dag shinge 'tshong ba de dag ni nga'i
ga mul nam 'dug cig ces dril sgrogs shig/ de ltar byas ba dang/ khyim bdag nyes med kyis spos kyi reshing dag gis gdugs tshod g.yos shing/ 'brumar dra zhim pos brgyan ba'i ngos kyis
bag chos dag btsobar brtsams pa dang/ gnyan ldan gyi grong khyer thams cad dri zhim po dag gis khyab par gyur to// rgyal boganyan ldan gyis smras ba/ shes ldan dag 'di lta bu'i dri zhim po gang
rgyu nas byung/ de dag gis rgya cher brjod pa dang/ des smras pa/ singal yo byad dag yod dam/ ngas kyang de lta bu bya'o// blon po dag gisi sa ba/ lha de ltar mdzadadus bste/ khyim
bdag 'di ni bu ma mchis pas/ ring bo mi thogs par 'gum pa'i dus la bab nas/ nor thams cad khyod nyid ma' bar 'gyur gyis/ lha zhugs shing 'tsho dus gnang bar mdzod cig/ de nas
sa shing dag 'tshong du gnang ngo// khyim bdag nyes med kyis rgyal pos shing dag 'atsong du gnang ngo zhes thos nas/ sems 'khrugs te/ kho la shang dag gis rgyal po gnyan ldan dem dang
lhan cig ma'i phung bor bsregs kyang chog pa tsam yod do zhes tshig brlang bo dag brjod do// rgyal po skom tshugs bcas te/ sams khongs su chud cing 'dus nas/ blon po dag gis snyas ba/
lhaci'i slad du sgom tshugs bcas te/ sogs khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ dus rgyus bar brjod ba dang/ dag gas snyas ba/ lha mi dgyes bar ma mdzadacig dang dag cig gis ji
ltar lhas khyim bdaganyis med thub bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi zhes byas nas/ de dag gis phyi nyin bar rgyal bo gnyanaldan gyi grong khyer gyi rdzob dang/ gsag ma dang/ rgya mo dag bsal ba byas
sa tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab ste/ drirag tunas bos gang ba'i bog dngag bzhag cing/ dar gyi rgyun bo dag sbyangs/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag kyang bsgreng/ me tog sna tshogs dag
kyang bkram ste/ dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra bar/ 'khor gyi khyams legs par brgyanab dadang bskrun du mang ba byas nas/ darinapo ches tshogs kyis brgyanaba'i gdan thabs rani po tshadang/ gding
ba dang/ gos phunasum tshogs pas mdzes bar byas ba bshams nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bgod pa mang bo rgya tshal/ drirab tuzhin pa phun sumatshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs skya rums
dngabacas ba lha'i zhal zas dang 'dra bar yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rtenagasum gyi bla ma dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhal zas dag bshams nas/ rgyal bo gnyenaldan la smras pa/ lha grong khyer 'di 'dra
ba dang/ zhal zas dang/ go lang 'di 'dra ba dag bshams kyis/ dgyes pa bskyod du gsol// rgyal bo gnyen ldan gyis bstas nas/ ngo mtshar chen po skyes te/ ngo mtshar dang ldan
ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la/ gdugs tshod kyi dus su spyan 'drenagyis/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs
tshod kyi g.yar dgongs 'tshal lags te/ btsun pas da de'i dus la bab bar dgos su gsol zhes gsol pa dang/ donas yang dag ba rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyus rnam par gabrigos/ sngaro
sham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ ga grong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdarate/ rgyal bo gtanasdon gyi gdanag la ba der gshegs ta
byonanas/ dge slong gi dag 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu'i stang du/ rgyal bo gnyen ldand dbang
bskur ba'i bkra shis la gtogs pa'i glang bo che'i gtsob tshubs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs 'dzin du bcug go dge slong rnams kyi stong du yang glang po chagazhand gdugs gzhan dag 'dzin du bcug
ny+nyA sgo chung dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la/ rgyal po gnyan ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa/ bsul Ab gsur dang nor bu las byas pa'i u ba can gyis ga'og bcug go/ dge
slong rnams la lang btsun mo'i tshogs gzhan dag bsil yab dag gis g.yob tubacug go/ khyim bdag nyes med kyis rtog chenal gyi mi zhig bskos te/ kA la nang rjesong la/ com
ma ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ rgyal bo gzin ldan gyis gdugs tshod ji lta bu zhig gsol ba rtogs shig ces bsgo'o// de song shu brtags na 'byor ba de lta bu dag mthong nas/

ngomatshar chen bo skyes te/ ngomatshar dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de nyid du 'dug go/ dbazhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag btangan/ de dag kyang song zhade de nyid du 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag nyes med/
rang nyid der song ste brtags na 'byor pa de dag mthong nas/ ngomatsho chenapo skyes 1/ des bsams pa/ gzhan ni bdag gis kyang 'byor par nus na/ glang bo chadang btsun mo'i tshogs bdag gis ga la

'byongasam du ga nas/ khyim du song sta tshwasgo ba thos nas smras pa/ kA ya sgo ba mi slong mo ba gang dag lhags na/ de dag ci 'dod pa dag byin la/ nang du ma gtang zhig ces bsgo nas/ dmya ngan gyi khang
bar zhugs taskom tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas lha'i dbang bo bskyabyan gyi shes pa dang mthong ba ni'ig gi phyogs su 'gro ba yin pas/ des bsams pa//
'jig rte nan mchod gnas gang dag yin pa de dag ginang nani/ mang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs mchog yin// sbyin bdag gang dag yin ba de dag ga nang nani/ khyim bdag nyes
med mchog yin bas/ de'i grogs bya'osnyam nas/ bdag nyid kogi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig tu sprul nas/ khyim bdag nyes med kyi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ mi so ba
bos nasmras pa/ kyi sgo ba so nga la/ khyim bdag nyes medal/ ko'u shi ka'i rigs kyi bram khre zhig sgor 'ongs te/ khyod mthong bar 'dod de zhes gyis gi/ des smras pa//
'a bram ze khyim bdag gis bdag la mi slong mo ba gang dag lhags na/ de dag ci'adod ba dag byinal/ nang du ma gtang zhig ces bsgos/ khyim bdag gis khyod la ci bya/ khyod ci dgos ba de dag khyer
la song zhig/ des smras pa/ kyi sgo ba kho bo la dgos ba gzhanatsalang med de/ kho bo ni khyim bdag nyid mthong bar 'dod kyis songazhag/ de khyim bdag nyes mdakyi gnadu song ste smras kha/ ba
ko'u ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig chab sgor mchis te/ rdzobon thong bar 'tshal zhes mchi'o// dag sbas pa/ kwa yi sgo ba ngas khyod la sngar ma slong mo ba gang dag lhags na/ de dag ci 'dod
pa byin la/ nadum gtang zhig ces ma bsgo 'am/ danang du 'os pas cizhig bya/ ci 'dod pa dag byin la thong zhig/ rje bo bdag gis de skad bgyis na/ de'i mchid nas kho bo la dgos pa gzhan/
ci yang mad de/ kho bo ni khyim bdag nyid mthong bar 'dod do zhes mchi'o// des smras pa/ kA yi sgo ba songal/ dond du thong zhig/ des de btang ba dang/ des sbas pa/ khyim bdag khyod
ci'i phyir mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs skom tshugs bcas nas/ sams khongs su chud cing 'dug/ khyim bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang gas mya nganasal bar ma nus ba/ de
0 la mya ngan brjod par mi bya ste// gang gis mya nganasel bar byed nus pa// de la mya ngan brjod par bya ba ni// brgya byin gyis snus pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi mya ngan gang yin pa smos dang/ kho bos
khyod kyi mya ngan bsal bar bya'o// des rgya ra brjodapa dang/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ ko'u shi ka'i ragis kyi bram bro'i gzugs mi snang bar byas te/ rang bzhin du 'dug nas sas pa/

khyim bdag kho bos lha'i bu las thams cad pa khyod kyi grogs byed du gzhug go zhes byas nas song ngo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ste/ lha'i ba las
thams cad ba ngos nas sa pa/ lha'i bu las thams cad ba song la/ khyim bdag nyes med kyi grogs gyis shig/ des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka rab tu lags so zhes/ lha'abulas thams
cad pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig mnyan nas/ des de bas ches mdzes shing khyad par du 'phags pa'i grong khyer dag mngonapar sprul zhing lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang/ lha'i gdan dug
kyang bshums/ lha'i zhal zas dag kyang gsos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu'i stang dun/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyi g.yul ngo spyad ba'i glang bo che'i
rgyal ba sa srungs kyi bu rtsibs bar dang ldan pa gdugs 'dzin du bcug go/ dge slong rnams kyi stong du yang lha'i glang bo tshogazhan dag gdugs gzhan dag 'dzin du bcug go/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyi btsun mo dam pa/ lha mo bde sogs lha'i bsal yab gsang dang nor bu las byas pa'i yu ba can gyis g.yog
'a du bcug go/ dge slong rnams la yang lha'i btsun mo'i tshogs gzhan dag bsal yub gzhanadag gis g.yob tubacug go/ rgyal bo gnyen ldan gyis rtog chen gyi mi zhig bskos te/ kA ya nang rje srong la/
bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dag bdun la/ khyim bdag nyes med kyis gdugs tshod ji lta bu zhig gsol ba rtogs shig ces bsgo'o// des brtags na 'byor pa de lta bu dag
mthong nas/ ngomatshar chen po skyes 1/ ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de nyid du 'dug go/ des blon po dag btang ba dang/ de dag kyang song zhing de nyid du 'dug go/ gzhon nu btang na de yang
song zhing de nyid du 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po gnyan ldan rang nyid der song ste sgor bsdad pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyim bdag khyod kyis
ny+nyo rgyal bo gnyanaldan bden pa mthong ba rgyurapa la tshig brlang po sbas pa de/ sgo 'di 'dug gis/ song la bzod pa gsol cig/ des pa'i gon du song ste bzod pa gsol nas smras pa/ rgyal po
chen po nang du gshags la nyid kyi phyag nas bris pa dag mdzadedugasol/ de nang du song ste bltasan lha'i'abyor pa dag mthong ba dang/ ngo mtshamachonapo skye nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
gi dge 'dunan khyim bdag khyed gcig bus gdugs tshod gsol ba'i rigs kyi/ kho bos ni ma yin nozhes smras so// khyim bdag nyes med kyis/ yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam bar
gzigs la/ de lta bu'i 'byor pas zhal zas dag gis tshim par byas nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal tasmon lam 'di skadaces/ jiltar bdag gis yonaganas 'dilta bu l bsnyanabakur byas pa'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod tshaba'i rigs su skye zhing/ lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ chos kyi tshul 'di lta bu thob pa dang/ 'di lta bu'i
ston pa mnyas bar byed ci ngami mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces btab bo// dge slong dag de'i tshode'i dus na khyim bdag nyes med gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag ma skyes 'di yin te/ rigs

kyi bu des rgyal bo gnyen ldan bden pa mthong ba la tshig bslong bo smras pa de'i las kyi rnam par sminapas ni/ tshorabs lnga ba ra ma dang lhan cig ma'i phung pa bsregs shing/ da ltar 'dir yang ma'i phung
par bsrugs bar gyur to// dbazhin gshegs pa rnam par gazigs gang yin pa la bsnyen bkur byas shing smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod
ba'i rigs su skyes te/ lha dang mi'i dpal mang myong bar gyur cing/ nga'i bstan pa la yang rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang shugs mnyam pa dang/ stobs mnyam kha dang/ brtson 'grus mnyam pas kun tumanyam par gyur ba'i
ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing/ ma mnyis bar ma byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tuganag pa yin la/ las gcig
tudakar ba rnams kyi rnam pa snyanupa yang dkar ba yin/ las 'drenam rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dunam yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tuganag pa rnams dang/
'drenam rnams sbyangs te/ las gcig tud kar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag grong rnams bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsus ba la mngon par bstod do////sdom la Ta lhung bzed glan dang spyad rnams dang// gra'i dang khab dang kha ba ral dang// gtan ba dang na mang po dag drang srong chen
pos rjes su gnang gle nga gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod nadage slong zhig gi lhung bzedardol nas/ des mgar ba'i gonadu khyer tasong nas snyas pa/ bzhin bzangs khog
lhung bzed rdol ba 'diklon la byinacig/ des bsams pa// 'di deg ni khas las byed du 'jug pa yin gyi/ gla rngan nami star bas/ tsinas kyang kun rang dubaskyangs te bzhag na/ 'dirang
ga blos phyir len par 'gyur snyam nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud la sang ngam/ gnangs sngonag/ snga dro bam/ gung tshigs sum/ phyi dri spyon cig ces bskyang bar brtsams so// dag
glongad nyin g gi bzhin dor 'gro ba na/ skyo ba skyes pa dang de'i mdza' bo zhig gis 'thong nas/ tshadang ldan pa khyod nyin gcig bzhin der 'gro na/ srid khyod kyi nye du'i khyim mam/ spyanabadag
gi khyim yin/ des snas pa/ tshadang ldan pa 'di kho bo'i nyingu'i khyim yang ma yin/ sbyin bdag gi khyim angs yin te/ 'di ltar kho bor lhung bzed rdol nas de gyon du bcug pa na/ 'di sbyong
bar byed pas/ de'i phyir 'dir 'gro'o/ des sas ba/ tshadang ldan pa khyod kyi lag bzo bdenapar s+yA ba dkon no zhes bya ba ma thos samA/ kho bo yang bzongashes mo kyi/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong snyims kyis shes nas/ bcos ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong bzo bo
dag yod na/ des dben pa'i phyogs su lhung bsred glan par rjes su gnang ngo// dudge slong de'i gan du song sta smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa bcom ldanu'adus kyis gnang gas/ lhung bzed 'di gyon
cig ces/ des smras pa// tshadang ldanopa 'di lag pa 'ba' zhig gis glan dus rung gi/ mgar sbyang dgakyang dgos so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dag grong rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ched du mgar sbyang nye bar bzhag par rjes su gnang ngo// gleng gzhani mnyan yod na'o//
ga slong dag gi chos gos dra dgos pa gyur pa na/ de dag lag pa dag gis 'dral nas/ ma legs par gyur nas/ bcomaldan 'das kyis bkalasul pa/ lag pas la bar mi bya bar gri'us/
dra bar bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gri'us dra bar bya'ozhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong zhig gis chos gos dra dgos nas/ des khyim bdag las gri bas tadras nas/ des de khyi
bdag de la slar gyen pa dang/ des gas pa/ 'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags so// bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis mu gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ com ldan
'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu s na dge slong gis gri'u bcang bar rjes su gnang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gri'u bcang bar bya'onos bka' stsal pa dang/
drug sde dag gsar drang/ dngul dang/ ba skrun dang/ shalalas byas pa'i gri/ u pa bsrub bas sbyangs pa dag 'chang nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gis gas ba/ 'bags pa dag 'di
lags/ de dag gis sAs ba/ bcom ldano'adas kyis gro rdzis su gnang bgo/ 'phags pa dag dag sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gas gzir tozhig byas pa dang/ de dag spobs ba
mad par gyur naA cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag grong gis gsar dang/
dngul dang/ bzhu dang/ shel las byas pa'i gri u ba khra bo dang/ bkra ba bcang bar ma bya bar/ lcags kyi gri'u bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi gri'u bcang bar
bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ de dag gi ha cang chen po dag 'chang nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis snas ba/ 'phags ba ga 'di cilags/ bzhin bzangs dag gri'u yin no//
'phags pa dag gralags kyi/ gri'ani ma lags so zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa//
gri tacang chen po dag bcang bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag gri gtsang chu dang 'chang bar byed ba na/ des bya ba ci yang mi nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gri chen bo dab/
'grang dang/ chung ngu rnam pa gsum bcang bar bya ste/ de la chen [”]po nisor drug go/ chung ngu ni sor bzhi'o// de dag gi bar ma ni 'bring ngo// gleng gzhi namanyan yod na'o//dag
slong rnams kyi chos gos dag drub dgos par gyur pa na/ dge slong dag gis snyug ma'i chol pa dang/ bya gag gi gshog shing gis 'drub pa na/ de dag mal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ khab bcang bar bya'o// dge slong zhig gis chos gos drub dgos nas/ des khyim bdag las khub bsdus te drubs nas/ des de khyim bdag de la phyir byinab
dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags so// bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngozhes zer ba'i skabs do/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'dres kyis bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na dge slong gis khab bcu bar rjes su gnang ngo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
[@ ]drug sde dag gsar dang/ dngul dang/ ba zhurmadang/ shel las byas pa'i khab dge 'chang nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di lags/ de dag gzhi/
stsas ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khab sa su gnang ba'o// 'phags pa dag dag sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir ba'o zhig byas pa dang/ de dag stobs pa mad par gyur nas cang
mi sne bar 'khod pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong gis gsar dang/ dngul dong/ ba
dang shel las byas pa'i khab bca bar mi bya bar/ khab rnam ba bzhi bo 'di lta ste/ ra gan dang/ thangs dang/ 'khar ba dang/ lcags las byas pa dag bca da bar bya'o// bcom
0 ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khab rnam pa bzhi ba dag bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gis bab bab bzhag ste/ de dag btsal zhugs par gyur nas/ bcos ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khab ral bcang bar bya'o// ngag slong dag gis khab ralasu 'du bar bya ba mingeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ khab ral ni rnam pa gnyis
spu bu can dang/ chang pa lta bu 'o// dge slong dag gis chung pa lta bu'i khab ral du gri bcug nas/ de ral bar gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gri'un rnam pa
gnyis su bya ste/ bya rog ga mtshulta bu dang/ phya gag ga gshog pa lta bu r bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis chos gos snam
sbyar dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ ga slong rnams sa la brkyang sta 'drab r byed pa na/ rtsal dag gis dri ma cund gyur cing/ sra la dag gis kyang ma rub bar byas nas// bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka'astsal pa/ sa la btang sa dra bar ma bya bar/ gtan pa dag bya'o// dge slong dag gis gtan pa jiltar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtan
ba niganyis te// shing dang smyug ma las gru bzhi'i phyos pa dag go/ dge slong dag gas phur bus brgyangs pa dang/ rol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu ga byas la sgrog khrus
kyis brkyang bar byag/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos rnam pa gsum bo/ chen bo dang/ 'bring dang/ chung du'o/
nas bka' stsal pas/ chos gos chen po brgyang bu'i gtan gang yin pa de la/ 'bri de po dang/ chung du brgyad du mi rung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtanab lad po
dag bya// sngon la/ malong dang ni chudag dang// de bzhin so mangs smyug shad gnyis// gtsug phud dang na sku rangs dang// bsro khang lad tshachen po'o// gled/
'a gzhi nAmanyan yod nu'o// drug sde dag snga drosham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ de dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag
bdag ga byi dor gyi yo byad gos kyi sprog ma'i stong du banag ba mthong nas/ drug sde dag gis de dag gi ma long blangs te/ bzhinabaltas nas smras pa/ dga' bo nyidaga' bo ji lta bdag cag bzung
ngam/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed mgo na khrigs la/ mchan khunganiral ba can du 'dugan/ khyed kyi gdong mdzes par ga la 'gyur/ dge sbyong 'di dag
ni 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar ngos so zhes byas pa dang/ dadag cang mi smra ba'akhod pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gagol ba dang/ bcom
0 ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis ma leng la bzhin brtag par mi bya'o// rtog par byedan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis me long la bzhin
brtag par ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de dag gis chu dag la bzhin brtag bar brtsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul mang bzhin brtag par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong gis tshul yang bzhin brtag par ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag chu rtog par byed pa nabazhin mthong nas/ de dag 'gyod par gyur nas/ bcom ldanubadas kyis bka'
sul ba/ tshub ga ba dang/ rmadang/ gnyer ma dang/ rgyas pa dang/ lus kyi gnas skabs snga phyi brtag pa'i phyir bltas pa la ltung ba med do// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ de dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag gi phyi do gyi yo byad gos kyi go ga
ma'i steng du bzhag pa mthong nas/ drug sde dag gis de dag gi so mangs blangs te sgra bshad nas sbas pa/ dga' bo nyidaga' bo ji lta bdag cag bzang ngam bras ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smos
pa 'phags pa dag khyed mgo nubrigs la/ mchan khung ni ra' ba can du 'dug na/ khyed kyi skra mdzes par ga la 'gyur/ dge sbyong 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i dan dpag gis gzir bar des so
zhes byas pa dang/ de dgacang mi snyakha'akhodapa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
ba bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na dge slong gis somangs kyis skra bshadabar mi bya'o// bshad bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong gis so mangs kyis sgra bshad par ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ drug sde dag gis smyugashad kyis bshad par brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
smyug shad kyis kyang bshad par mi bya// bshad par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis skyag shad kyis sku
ba6shad par ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de dag gis phyogs gcig ni so mangs su byas la/ phyogs gcig ni smyugashad du byas pas sgra bshad par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ so mangs dang skyag shad gnyis kas kyang skra bshad par mi bya'o/ gleng gzhini'aton yodana'o// gang gi tshakhyim bdag mgon mdabras spyin gyis sangs rgyas
bo la sogs pa dge slong gi dag 'dunol/ rgyal khyedakyi tshal phul ba de tsho/ des 'dreg mkhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma ji lta ba bzhin no// nyidags smras pa// bzhin bzang gtsug pa da
'jog shes sam/ 'phags pa de ni bdag gi sug las lags so// bltas chog sug/ 'phags pa dziltar gzhag par bgyi/ chen por ro// des gtsug bud chen por bzhag pa dang/ nye dgas
smras pa// phyogs gcig bregs shagi/ des phyogs gcig bregs pa dang/ des snyas pa// gnyis pa dang gsum pa zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs bdun pa'i bar brags shig ces bganas/
des phyogs bdun ba'i bar du bregs pa dang/ todags sbas ba/ bkren pa khyod ke su yang mo shes pa zhag gas snga mkho bzhin du byos tasong zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa snga ma ji lta ba bzhin no// bcom
ldan 'o das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na dge slong gos gtsug phud gzhag par mi bya'o/ 'drog par byed na 'gal tshabs hun du 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
tshadang ldan pa ba lang gnas ko'u sham ba nar chus bskor la bdasa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi skyed mos tshul gyi phag mo 'dug na 'dug go/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ gang gi tshadapyid kyi dus la bab
pa de'i tshe/ shing ljon pa dag me tog rgyas shing/ ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rmabya dang/ natso dang/ paskogs dang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang ta'adug tshal gyi nang na sgra 'byin par
byed pa na/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis skyed mos tshal srung ba'i ma bos tasnus pa/ kA pa mi khyed tshur shog/ nga skyed mos tshal du 'gros/ ri chus bskor gyi rdzob dang/ gsag ma dpa/
gyo mo thams cad sol la// myur dag kyang zhag ste/ chol rtogs la la gcan pa dag kyang skos shig skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis lha bka' bas 'tshal zhes bad sa'i
rgyal lo 'char byed kyi tshig mnyananas/ ri sabasko gyi a'akhor gyi rdo ba dang/ gsag pa dang/ gyolo thags cad bsal nas/ myur dag kyang bzhag ste/ tshal brtags shing la gcanab dag kyang bskos
nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bad sa'i rgyal bo 'char byed la 'di skadaces smras so// lha 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ ri chus bskor gyi nye 'khor gyi gor
ma dang/ gsag ma dang/ rgya mo thams cad bsal zhing/ chur dag kyang bzhag ste/ tshal kyang bags/ la la/canab dag kyang bskos lags na/ lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad
the du gsol// de nas bad sa'i rgyal bo 'char byed btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ skyed mos tshal du song ste/ des der dga' ba dang/ rtsa ba dang/ dga' dgur spyad ba nyams su myong

k+Sha bar byas nas/ de gnyid log par gyur to// bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin nAm tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/ de'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams skyed mos tshal del ci dag rgyu nang 'khyam du dong ba
dang de'i tshadang ldan pa ba lang gnas skra dang kha spu ring nang/ chos gos ring ba dang/ sham thabs sbrul bo bgos nas/ shing nab zhig gi drungan rten cing 'dug go/ tshodang ldan ba ba lang
00 gnas skra dang kha spu ring zhing/ chos gos rnying pa dang/ sham thabs jul po bgos nas 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor de dag gis mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang sngangs te/ a tsi lha cig 'di na 'dra

zhig gda' 'o// a tsilha cig 'di na 'dre zhig gda' go/ zhes byed skad phyung ba dang/ tshodang ldan pa ba lang gnas de nas las te/ rings ba rangs bar bag mo'i phug tu song ngo/ sgra desargyal bo sad nas//
las gri shubs nas phyung ste rgyugs nas bud med dag 'dre ga la 'dug ces smras pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ lhacig ga mo' thug tu mchig go// de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed mtshor thogs te//
phag mo'i phug sgor bsdad nas smras ba/ kwa ye 'byung po khyod su zhig/ des smras pa/ rgyu dag sbyong lags so// khyod gang gi dag sbyong in/ shAkya'i sras kyi dag sbyong lags so// ci khyod dag
bcom pa ma/ lha ma lags so// 'on khyod phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa zhig yin// lha ma lags so// 'on cikhyod bsam gtanab pa thob ba yani
nas ma lags so/ 'o na khyod bsam gtanagasum pa 'am ) gnyis pa na// dang po thob pa zhig yin ma/ lha ma lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal bo btsunamo' 'i khor la phrag dog za bas/
phyi'i b+hag par khros te/ blon po rnams la sa ba/ kA ye shes ldan dag dag sbyong so so'i skye bo 'dis/ nga' btsun mo'i 'i khor rnams ma rung bar byas kyis/ o'i grog ma chen po dag 'di'i myur du
gsang ge dang/ de dag gis dug 'di khyab par bkang ste/ dge sbyong 'di gsad par bya'o/ de nas phag mo'i phug na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/
ka rgyal po gtum po 'dis bdag la skyabs su 'ongs pa'i dag sbyong nyes pa med kha/ skyon med pa bsad par gyur nam rub gas/ bdag gis 'di thar par bya ba'i thabs shig la brtsonapar bya'o snyam
sa de bdag nyid phag tshochen mo'i gzugs su mngon par grol te/ ga nas sgor byung ngo// rgyal bo do 'dis la dga' bas/ mi zhig la smras pa/ kA la mi 'ad songal pa'i chu dang mda'i
gzhu dag khyer tashog cig/ das rgyal po'i nyi dang mda' gzhu dag dgul lo// de nas phag mo de skyed mos tshal gyi nang nas phyir byung ste/ 'bros par brtsams pa dang/ rgyal po de de'i phyi bzhin snyog
su 'gro ba na/ des thag ring du khrid de song ngo// denas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis/ tshadang ldan pa ba la gnas la sos pa/ 'phags pa rgyal bo 'di na gtum pa lags pas/
khyod bkrongs par gyur nam lags kyis/ khyod da myur du bzhud cago/ tshadang ldan ba ba lang gnas kyis myur ba myur bar lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ skyed mos tshal de nas phyir byung nas
mnyan yod du song ngo// de khad kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ dge slong dag gis mthong nas lcaso ba/ tshodang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// khyod kun ring kho
[n/]ring po nas klu ba bzhind rgyuzhi ga las 'os/ ko'u sham ba nas so// jiltar tshadang ldan pas bde bar brgyus sam/ tshodang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus/ ga bdasa'irgyal po 'char byed kyis
had por de'u bsad do/ ci'i phyir/ des rgyas par smras pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis du bcom ldan 'adas la gsol to// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong zhig la bka' stsal pa/
dge slong tshur shog/ khyod dge slong ba lang gnas ga la ba der song la/ ba lang gnas la 'di ska ces/ ston pas bka' stsal ba/ khyod spyan sngar mtshizhig ces byung ngo'os sgo zhig/ dge slong des/
tshunab bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mnyananas/ tshodang ldan pa ba lang gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnag la 'di skad ces smras so// snyon bas
bka' stsal pa/ khyod spyan sngar mchi zhig ces byung ngo
tshodang ldan ba ba lang nas kyis/ tshodang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal nyes dge slong de'i tshig mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song/
phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mthub gcig 'dug go/ mtha' gcig tu'adug nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ tshadang ldan pa ba lang gnas la 'di
'di ltar mgo ti mugacanakhyod phug de la lhag bar chags bas/ sa nu khyod shinatu sdug bsngal bar gnas par gyur to/ de cung ma smra bar 'dug nas/ com ldan 'das kyis/
dge slong dag la nyes dmagis cung zad gang 'byung ba de ni/ skra ring bor 'jog pa las gyur bar mkhyen nas/ bka' stsal ba/ delta bas na dge slong gis skra ring bor gzhag par bya'o 'gan
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis skra ring por gzhag par mi bya'ozhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dgon pa ba dag gis 'ag mkhanam danas/ de dag gis dgon
ba'i gonas mal spangs nas/ grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu 'khod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du ched bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun
dga' ba la rmas ba/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong dgon pa pa dag gis/ dgon pa'i gnas mal spangs nas/ grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu 'khod par gyur/ des bcom ldan 'das la skabs de dus
par gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dalta bas na ga slong dgon pa pas ni/ sgra sor gnyis kyi tshad du gzhag par rjes su gnang ngo// grong mtha' bas ni de bas thung dur bya'o/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhig 'dug pa de/ sman ba'i gan du song nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bdag la sman sten cig/ des smras pa/ 'bags pa bgro
khang stan cig dang/ khyod sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bawangs sukho bos 'dod dag spyad par bya sa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi smanAn da lags kyi/ gzhan gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes
brang ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal tasmanabs dge slong khyod kyi smand yon gyi/ gzhan gyis 'tsho bar mi
'gyur ro zhes bsgo na/ dge slong gis bsro khangabastan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis bsro khang bstan bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag gas/ sman ba de la dris pa/
bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bsro khang ji lta bu yin ba sbos shig/ des skyas nga/ 'phags pa bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i gso ba bklags pa las bsro khang bsro khang zhes
'byung bar byas kyi/ bsro khang ji lta bu lags pa da dung ma 'tshal te 'di ltar khyed nyid kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyenab lags pas/ de nyid mkhyen tozhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bgro khang gi khang pa zlum pa bya'o// de dag skar khung ma 'dod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ skar khung
gdod par bya'o// de dag skar khung bu yongs la/ nang dog pa byed du 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rub la/ nang yangs pa rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bu r bya'o// de dag gis
mthon por btodapan/ mun gzhag par gyur nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kha/ hacang mgron b.ragadod par mi bya'o// de dag gso dma' bar btod pa na/ dub
ba 'tshad du ma ba ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sus pa/ hacang dma'abaragadod par mi bya'o// de dag gis gar gdod ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dkyil du
gdod pa bya'o/ bye'u dang phug ron dga' jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ skar khung dra ba nan du bya'o// rlung dang char chu'i zeram dag nang du 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
N+NaM bka' stsal pa/ skar khung la sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/ rlung gso bskyod de 'dug tu btub nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal ba/ 'khoragatan dang/ gnas zer dang/ phrad gzhan dag
gzhug par bya'o/ dbye ba dang gcad pas/ dge slong dag nyon mongs bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu skam kha bar gzhag par bya'o/ sgo la sgo glags ma 'jug
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya zhing/ sgo gtan lang gzhug bar bya ste/ de la lang mgi dang/ lag gzungs kyang gzhug par bya'o// tshudag dma' ba'i phyogs
su bzhag pa de grungs par gyur nas/ bco ldan 'das kyis bkab sul ba/ nang gi phyogs su gzhag snyigs bya zhing der bus pa dag gzhag par bya'o/ sa gzhi'i ma bus bas des zhal zhal ma
0 rung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so phag gi gcal dgram bar bya'o// de dag gis ma bdal ba dang/ ngag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bdel nas da
bzhin mi dor bar bcer tagazhag par bya'o// de dag gas kyis bcar ba rigs na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ lcags kyi thal phyags byas la des nyer bar bya'o// de dag
ma 'bar ba na bgro khang gi nang du'ajug cing sgrub gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ cha 'bar ba na 'jug par ma bya'o// dge slong dag der zhugs pa na/ ma'i dugs kyis beg
ba gyur nas/ de dag myos tas la 'gyel nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bkalastsal pa/ phye dang yungs mar du bsres pa dag mar blugs par bya'o// dris shAm par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal ba/ bdug sos blugs par bya'o// dud pas dge slong dag mtshig 'dzug nas/ bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nas kyi bag zan gyi chang khus glan par bya'o/ 'on kyang
'dzaganas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyu ru ra'i chadabus gla bar bya'o// snyanamadanas dge slong dag gis stan khyer tasong ba dang/ de dag 'bru mar gyis snums par gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtswa bas dag gzhag par bya'o/ rkang ba dag sa la bzhag bas/ rdul gyis gos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa gzhir rtsa dag dgAm/
par bya'o// skal bo dag bting ba na/ ma stag gas tshig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sngon bo dag dgram par bya'o/ sngon bo dag ma rnyed nas/
'a bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ chus sbangs la dgram bar bya'o// dge slong dag 'bru mar gyis lcams pa na/ 'jag ma dang gsog ma dag gis lus la phrugs pas skabyung nas/ bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi phrug spyad bya'o// de bab bab tubazhag pas/ dam rung bar gyuranos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lung mgo byas la the gus btags te/ drag

[:]kyi blas dben par gzhag par bya'o// da snyams par gyur nas/ dge slong dag de yang dang yang du sbyong bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ma rung bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis der khrus
byas pas/ 'dam rdzab tugyur nas/ bam ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ der khrus ma bya bar khrus khang byas la der khrus bya'o// gang dag khrus byed pa de dag la chus gnod par gyur nas/ bcom
[W ]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ khrus dong brkos la so phag gis bsgron te/ gang khrus byed pa de khrus dong du zhugs la/ gang khrus tshulcags pa de ni khar 'dug rgyu/ khrus chu blugs bar bya'o//
ra chus gang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ stor khung gdodo bar bya'o// dge slong dag khrus byas nas 'dag rdzas dang/ ba lang gi lci ba dang/ so shing lin du gtsug lag khang du 'dor
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de nyid du 'dag rdzas dang/ ba lang gi spyi ba dang/ so shing gis bkang ba'i khyi mo dag gzhag par bya'o// dag glong dag ma'i dugs kyis nyam dmas
bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u sus bza' bar bya'o// de dag lag pa sul bas thegs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha gcar ngacang
par byago/ dge slong zhig gis khye'u sus thug ba ha cang tshab zhig renas/ com ldan 'das kyis khakalalal/ kha gzar gyis btung bar bya'o/ de la lan dgos pa dang/ lom dag
ma rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshwa khug bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bsro khang du bya dor gyi las bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ go slong dag gis byi dor
gyi las sus bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhan cig gnas pa dang/ nyaganas dag gis byugo/ de dag gi gcig gis gcig la bya'o// de ltar bsro
khang o byadadang bcas pa rjes su gnang ngo// glong gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshogs pa canan/ latsirA chen po zhes bya ba/ g.yo sgyu med pa/ drang po/ drang pa'i
rang bzhin can zhig 'dug ba de nyin gcig bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du'agro ba yin pas/ dbcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i tsho/ dag grongamadza' bo dang/
sa las skyes kyang ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ gangs ba can du phyin nas/ de gnyis kyis de las kar 'gro nas/ de gnyis kyis lhag pa/ chon kho gal 'gro/ des
sa pa/ 'phags pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchi'o de gnyis tshadang ldan pa spyad du nor dang/ tshor bas tsharabs su khon tshodings/ dganyis kyis spus ba/
chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas la ni gtam gyi skyes dbul bar bya ba yin na/ khyod la gtam gyi skyes cung zad yod dam/ 'bags pa gnyis ma mchis go na po tshur ngashog khyod bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba derasong ste phyin nas/ com ldan 'das la 'di skadabyas/ btsunab 'di ltar 'phags brgyad bu nor gyis/ bdag gi mchis brang dang lcanatsig mi tshangs par spyad de/ pham pa
gyur pa de ma mdzes shing/ tshul dang mthun ba lags so zhes gsol cig dang/ bcom ldan 'das khyod la dgyes bar 'gyur ro// des 'phags ba gnyis de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes smras te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces/ btsunab 'di ltar 'phags pa spyad
bu nor gyis/ bdag gi mchis brang dang lhan tsag mi tshangs par spyad de/ pham par gyur ba danami mdzes shing/ tshul dang mthun ba ma lags so zhes gsol nas song ngo// danas bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag latsA dIchen po dang/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin ba la/ lhung bzed khas dbub par bya'o/ khas dbab pa na 'di ltar bya
ste/ gnas mal bsham ba byas nas/ gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris ba'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dag 'a dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gas
gsol ba 'ba' zhig ga las bya sku/ dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ lats+tshab chen pos chodang ldan pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur na/ gal tadage 'dun gyi dus la
bab cing bzedan/ dag 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ dge 'dun gyis la ba chen po la lhung bzed khas dbub par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dag 'dun gyis gang la ltung bzod
khas phub pa de'i khyami du/ dge slong dag gas 'gro bar mi bya/ stan la langs spyad pa ma bya/ bsod snyoms blang bar mi bya/ chos bstanabar mi bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo songal/ yits+tsaM bA chen bo la 'di skad ces khyod la dag 'dun gyis lhung bzed khas dbab pa mdzad do zhes sgo zhug/ tshodang ldan ba kun dga' bos/
btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mnyananas/ latseb chen po'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo// de'i tsholatsAdA chen po bya ba zhig gi ched du phyi rol tusong ngo// das
de'i chung ma la smras pa/ na mo latsub chen bo gar song/ des smras ba/ 'bags pa slad rol tu mchis so// sring mo 'di lta ste/ khyed la dag 'dun gyi se lhung/
khazed khas dbub pa mdzad pa shes par byos shig/ des sbas paM/ btsun pa kun daga' bo lhung ba srid las dbub pa zhes bgyi partsalags/ sring mo gang la lhung bzed khas phub pa de'i khyim du/
dge slong dag 'dod bar ma byed/ snyan la longs spyod pa ma byed/ bsod snyoms lan pa ma byed/ chos ston par ma byed de// 'phags pa kun dga' bo dag 'don gyis thabs kyis bdag cag gi tshul
zhing bor 1/ dag 'dun la bdag cag gis nongs pa de lta bu zhig bgyis na/ de'i slad du lhung bzed khag dbub pa mdzad/ sring mo 'di ltar khyod kyi khyim thab bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/ btsun pa 'di ltar 'phags pa spyad du nor gyis/ bdag gi mchis rbad dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de/ pham par gyur pa de ni mi mdzes shing/ tshul dang
mthun pa ma lags so zhes gsol to// de ngo tshabar gyur nas khyim du zhugs pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyir song ngo/ jitsam na la:bAchon po khyim du 'ongs nas/ chung mas ga pa/ rje'i sras
'oskol la dag 'dun gyis lhung bzed khas dbab ba mdzad de// bzang mo legs par lhung bzed khas ba bo// shin yulhung bzed khas khub bo// rje'i sras legs bar lhung bawid pa las thub bo// shin
tulhung bzed khas ba bo zhes gsung ngam/ khas phub bzhes bgyi ba ci mkhyenanag/ ming shes so// rje'i sras gang la lhung bzed khas bub ba de'i khyim du/ dge slong dag 'ong bar mi bgyid/ stan la
longs spyod par mi bgyid/ bsod snyoms len bar mi bgyid/ chos ston par mi bgyid do// rje'i sras ci khyod kyis 'phags pa spyad bu nor dang bdag lhan cig mchis pa gzigs sam/ bzang mo ma
mthong ngo// 'o na ci ste 'phags ba la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur/ gal ted yang 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol na/ de lta na legs/ mi gsol
na khyod kho mo'i khyim du gzhug go zhes byas ba dang/ dasems khongs su chud cing 'dug ste/ bsams pa/ 'dis skad smras pa de bzhin 'gyur bas/ bzod pa gsol du 'gro'o snyam nas/
de bcom lda'adas kyi spyan sngar song sta/ ni nas nabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kun tu spyod pa ni/ gdugs gtsagi bzhin
nang par sngar langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mtshib kha gas bas/ bdag la dge slong mdza' bo dang/ sa las skyes gnyis kyi mchod nas/ chen bo tshur shog/ khyod
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ bdag gi mas brang dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de pham par gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// des btsun pa
khag gsanongs pa bzod par gsol/ zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'adas sa/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ ga slong dag lits+tsha bA chen bo dang/ gzhan
yang de lta bu gang yinob la lhung bzed phyir bzlog par bya'o/ phyir bzlog ba ni 'di ltar bya sta/ gnas mal bsham ba byas nas/ gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris ba'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par
bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ latsAb chenanges phyag 'tshal nas/ rgan ba'i mtha' logs su cogo pur 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'daskad ces brjod bar
khya'o dga' dunabatsunapa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag la lits+tsa na po mi dag ba'i grogs bor bslus bas/ 'phags pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur bas//
dge 'dun gyis bdag la lhung bzed khas dbab ba mdzad de/ bdag lhung bzed khas phub pa/ dag 'dun las lhung bzed slar bzlog bar gsol na/ thugs bad ba can dag 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis/
'dachen po bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ lhung bzedaslar bzlog zhugasol/ dbazhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dezhas tsi tA chen po gros pa'i 'khor nas bkar te/
mthong ba'i yi 'khor dubazhag la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig galas bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ lits+tsa chonabo mi dge ba'i grogs bos
bslus pa 'dis/ tshadang ldan pa gyadabu nol yang dag ba ma lags bas skyur te/ dge 'dun gyis de la lhung bzed las dbab pa mdzad pa las/ tsA bAnyan bo lhung bzed khas bub pa de/ dag 'dun
las lhung bzed slar bazlog pa gsolan/ gal tadage 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzodan/ dge 'dunagyis gnang bar mdzodacig dang/ dag 'dunagyis lats+tsha bA napo la lhung bzed slar bzlog pa mdzad
de 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun gyis gang la lhung bzed phyir bzlog ba de'i khyim du/ dge slong dag gis 'gro bar khya/ stan la longs spyadapar bya/ bsod snyoms blang bar bya/ chos bstan pa
bya'o// stom la: yan lag rnam pa ma long dang// gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra// skad kyi gtang rag gnang ba dang// lhung bzed bzhi dang lhan cig pa'o// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dgo slong song ba zhig gnas ba de gang ga/ skyil mo krung bcas
ta'adug go cog na de'i tshade yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung b.ragyur to// de dus gzhan zhig na/ bsod snyoms brgyus nas/ zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyima'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir
log pas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos ma'os su phab ste/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas/ shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te/ yid la byed pa la zhugs shing 'dug pa na/ mang po'i
za tha/ @#/ ]yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar gyur nas/ des de ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar byas so// sems nimyur du 'gyur ba yin bas/ des las khungs ba na/ yang dang yang/
du las su bar gyur nas/ da'adod chags kyis kun nas dkris ba na/ nasdang chen po yang skyes nas/ des de ldob stangadu bzhag nas/ rdzob gzhan gyis brdungs so// de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas
gdungs nas/ bsams pa bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis midagongs pa lta zhig snyam ba dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis der
gshegs nas/ dkar sal pa/ dge slong 'di nyas/ des dzil gyur pa gsol ba dang/ rtsom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong pas 'dod chags kyi gten bo ni sdug pa
bsgom ba'ozhes la gsungs sam/ ma gtim can brdung bar bya ba ni gzhan yinan/ khyod kyis ni gzhun brdungs so/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang/ com ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyed kyis chos gcig bsgoms na phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur bar nga khas 'chaste/ de ni 'di lta sta/ luse la dmigs ba'i dran ba'o// dge slong dag khyed kyis lus la
dmigs pa dran pa grogs shig dang/ phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba khas 'che'o// de lta bas na dge slong gis brdung bar bya ba gzhan yin la/ gzhan brdung bar mi bya'o/ brdungs na 'gal tshabs can/
du'agyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nabazhugs so/ mnyan yod nakhyim bdag cig 'dug bdug/ gis
mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// des rtsa ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ dga' dgur spyadabs/ dachung ma la/
sems can zhugs par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das dbacos ba las/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug kha/ mdzos ba zhig byung ngo// de dus gzhan zhig na legs par gsungs
pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ dadus cung nag ljongs su 'dug nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyunang song ngo// de ljongs rgyuzhing 'gro ba nagadong la la mig byung nas/
des sman pa gtar ka byed dubacug pa dang/ gdong masdug bar gyur nas/ da su gzhan zhig na mnyanakhod du song ba dang/ dge slongazhig gis 'jog tum cur ro// dge slong gzhananag
gi gan du song nas smras pa/ btsun pas bdag mi mkhyenanas/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ma shes na khyod gang zhig yin/ des smras ba/ bdag gi ming ni 'di nas bya/ khyim bdag
chog mo zhig ga ni bu'o// rab tuni der byung ngo// khul de nas 'dir 'ongs so// des snas ba/ tshodang ldan pa khyod bzhin bzang zhing mdog sdug pa mnan/ ci'i phyirakhyod kyi bzhin ma
sdug bar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa kun smras pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ rtsom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slongag gdong ni mi long dang 'dra ba yin pas/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gdong la sman pa gtaraka byed du gzhug bar mi bya'o// byed du bcug na'agal tshabs can du
'gyura'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gdong la sman pa gtar ka byed du gzhug par ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag khrag rgyas nas/ gtar ka gdab dgos par
gyur ba na/ dge slong dag ma 'debs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtaraka gad par bya so/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byedakyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshomAtanu0f00danadag 'dunaganyis shig yod de/ tshong pa'i dag 'dunadang/ ruba'i
ga [”]'dunano// dganyis las tshong pa'i dag 'dunagyis ni nga ba'i dgo 'dunagar dang/ glu dang/ la mo'isgro dag gis pham par byed do// ngu ba'i dgo 'dun gyis ni tshong pa dag 'dun dag
thabs kyis pham par byed do/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na ru ba'i dge 'dun dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di dag gis bdag cag gang dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dog gis pham par
byas ngashing/ bdag cag gis kyang de dag dgu thabs kyis pham par byas na/ bdag cag gis kyang thabs ji lta bu zhig gis de dag gar dang/ glu dang/ la mo'i sgra dag gis pham par bya dag
las kha cig gis smras pa/ de bzhin te/ bdag cag gis kyang gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'isgra dag bslab par bya'o// kha cig gis skyes pa legs so// su las bslab bar bya/ de
rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa drug sde dag gar nga/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag la mkhas pas/ dadag las bslang bar byan/ de dag ni 'dod ba'i bdag nyid canayin pas/ gal/
tecung zadatsig slong na yang sbyin par bya'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs so// de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/ da rnams drug sde dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
ta smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag bslab tugasolo/ de dag gis smras pa/ zhes ldan jag gal te bca' ba'i ron dag ngad la sbyin na bslab
btsogo/ 'bags ba dag bdag cag la phan yonabatags kyis dbul go/ de dag gis de rnams gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'isgro ga bsubs go// gang ga tshobyang bar gyur pa'i cho
da rnams kyis tshong ba'i dag 'dunadag dgra thabs kyis kyang pham par byas shang/ gar dang/ glu dang/ lo mo'i sgra dag gis kyang ma bar byas ba dang/ de dag gis smras pa/
bzhin bzangs dag sngonan khyadacag gas byed dgra thabs kyis pham par byas shing/da kyis kyang gar dang/ glu dang/ la mo'isgro dag gis khyed bas par byas na/
dmikhyed kyis kho bo cag gnyis kas pham par byas pa'i sbyor ba gang yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drakho nas bslabs so// su los bslabs/ 'phags ba drug sde dag las so//

de rnams shAkya'i sras kyi dag sbyong dag gi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ 'di ltar gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag kyang slob par byed do zhes stod bar byed/ phyar
kha gtong bar byed/ kha zerab r byed ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gar la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la nyes dmagis cung zad gang byung
ba ni/ gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag slob ba las gyur par mkhyen nas/ bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag bsub bar mi bya'o// slob
na'agal tshabs canangu 'gyur 'o/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis dge slong gis gsar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag bslab par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge 'dun de rnams kyis brjod nas/
da rnams yang drug sde dag gi gan du dong sa smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis de bskyud par gyuran/ yang bslab gsol/ de dag gis sgras ba/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong gis gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag bslab bar mi bya'ozhes bslab ba zhig khaca' ba mdzad pas ma bslab go 'phags pa dag gal te ma bslab nasgyur ba tsam mdzad de gshegs
su gsol/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhani bzangs dag 'dongango// dadag der dong nas de rnams sbyangs te/ de rnams kyis de dag pham bar byas ba dang/ mang dag sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ khrag
ba'i tshulan tshig go zhes bye ba nas/ rtsod bar byed/ byar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar spyod ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bco ldan 'das la
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la nyes dmigs cung zadagang byung ba ni gar dang/ glu dang pol mo'i sgra dag sbyong bar byedapa las gyur par mkhyenanas/ bka'
stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag sbyang b.ram bya'o// sbyong bar byed na 'gal tshabs canadu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dasakyis dge slong gis ga ra
dang glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag sbyong bar ma bya'o zhes bka' sul pa dang/ dge 'dun rnamasakyas yong brjod nas/ de rnams yang drug sde dag gi gan du dong ste/ dbazhin du smras pa dang/
de dag gsi sgras ba/ bzhin bzadas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag pas mi sbyang// de rnams kyis smras pa// 'phags pa dag khyedagashegs togazigs pa tsam kho nas kyang/ bdag cag
gsede dag pham par 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na'adong zhes/ dag der dong ba dang/ dge 'dun de rnams mthong ba tsam nyid kyis bag 'khums par gyur nas// ngo mas ]

ba bshAkya'i sras kyi dag sbyong dag kha dag sbyong gi tshul natshig go/ bram ze'i tshul ni tshig sta/ 'diltar gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro'i zhis skyod par byed/ phyu kha gtong
bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ rtsou0f00 ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la nyes dmigs gang cung zad gang byung ba de na/ gang dang/

glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag ltar 'gro ba las gyur par mkhyenanas/ bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na dge slong gis gar ma bya/ klu grung pa ni bya/ rol mo'i sgre mi bya'o// gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra
ga sbyang ba ma bya'o// de dag la ltar yang 'gro bar mi bya'o// ga slong gar slob bam )glu slob kham/ rol mo'i sgra slob bas/ gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra sbyong ngam/ de dag la ltar 'gron/
gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/// bam kho ba ba// ku sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
na bzhugs so// detshoko'u sham ban khyim bdag bzang ldan zhes bya ba/ dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la/ dge ba'i bsam pa nyanazhig 'dug pa des/ gis mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/
de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// des rtse ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ dga' dgur spyod pas/ dusu ba/nadazhige nA de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs
bar gyur to// tshodang ldan pa shAra'ibu sams can de gdul ba la ltos pas de'i khyim du song ste/ khyim bdag rang bzhin bzang po de skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas/ dus dus
su de'i gan du 'gro'o// dritsam dus gzhanazhagin tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dag sbyong med pa gcig du song ba dang/ khyim bdag gus skya pa// 'bags pa ci khyod la phyi nganani
'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma mchis sam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tsA ka sha'i khrodadad/ ku sha'i khrod nas 'od dam/ khyod lta bu las thob par 'gyur
ba gang dag yin pa de dag kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brong pa'i dag sbyong lo nar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ 'phag/sa pa gal tade lta na/ ba dag ga mchis brang la sams can zhugs bar gyur ba de/ gal
khye'u btsas nas/ de 'bags ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du dbul lo// bzhin bzangs dand la dpal gyur cig/ kho bos bkra'ozhis cus nas song ngo// ji tsam na khyim bdag gi
chung ma ni zla ba dgu tshang ste btsas ba las/ khye'amadog nganazhing lus chung la skad snyan pa zhig byung ngo// de'i nad dag 'dus shang lhags nas/ zhim bdun gsumanyi shugacig chub tsas pa'i
btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u'i ming ciragadwags zhes ming 'dogs bar byed pa na/ nye du dag gis smras pa/ gang gi phyir khye'u 'di mdog ngan zhing lus chu yung/

khyim bdag khabrang ldan gyi bu yin zhing/ skad snyan pa de'i phyir/ khye'u 'di'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya'o zhes/ de'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya bar btags so// dbasrings shing bskyod nas
cha bor gyur to// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snga dro ma thubs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs tu/ ko'u sham bar bsod snyoms la zhugs so// ko'u sham ba na bsod snyoms
largyu ba'i tsho/ khyim bdag bzang ldan gyi khyim du song pa dang/ khyim bdag bzang ldan gyis/ 'bags ba byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig kun tugyod pas kun tu spyad nas// rkang pa gnyis la

phyag byas so// de'i chung mas kyang bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung badrad bkangs bul lo// khye'u de tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du rtogs nas/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyis
bdag bzang ldan la brda byas ba dang/ des khye'u de la sa pa/ bu khyod ma btsasaM pa nyid nas/ ngas 'phags pa kAri'i bu'i zhabs 'bring du phul gyis/ khyod 'phags pa dang lhan cig song zhig/
srid pa tha ma pa sams can de/ de'i gyon 'dug patsho/ des de rab tuphyung/ bsnyen par rdzogs bar byas te/ de la lung phog nas/ des brtsol ba dang/ 'bad pa dang/ bsgrim par byas
[4) ]bas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo tshalnga pa gso ba dang mi ga kha 'anyid rig ste/ 'dubyed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam pa 'jig pa'i tshes
nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba// bongab dang
gsar du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil dumatshungs ba'i sangs dang ldan pa/ tsan dan zhuganapar bzhag pa lta bu / rig pas sgo pa'i spubs dral bar gyur cing/ rig ba dang/ mnob shes
ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid ba dang/ 'dod pa'i dad pa dang/ bskur sku la rgyab kyis phyogs ba/ dbang bo dang nye dbang dang dad pa'i shu rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang/ rjod
par bya dang/ gus pa sa bar bya bar gyur to// gang ga tshodas skad kyi gtabarag gis chos smras pa de'i tshon/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad khyab par gyur cing/ sems canamang bo dag gi rgyud la
yang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyadabar byed de/ mdo na dud 'gro skyo gnas su gtogs pa'i sams can dag kyang/ sgra snyan pa de la rna blags tan to/ de na bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dab pa'i nyan thos kyi dge slong skad kyi gtang rag gAnab rnams kyi nang na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong snyan ba bzang ldan 'adimchog yin no// de'i
skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sbyor bas dge slob 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams rang gi bya ba btang nas/ nyin gcig bzhin de'i gan du 'gro bar byed do/
jitsam dus gzhan zhig na/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ glang pachi'i gtso bo pad+madakar po gcig pa la zhen nas/ kha lo sgyur ba dbal 'phel dang/ nam gyi khongs ri brags ngag tu song ba'i tsho/

tshadang ldan pa sman pa bzang ldan gyis nang par skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smra bar brtsams pa/ glang po che'i gtsobo pad+ma dkar po gaucig pas thos so// des tshadang ldan pa snyan pa ba zung ldan gyi skad
kyi gtang rag thos nas kyang/ yang nanab blags tem g.yo bar sdodade// kha lo sgyur ba dpal 'phel gyis/ phan tshun nas lag pa dang rkang pa dag g.yabs tabaskyod par brtsams kyang/ de bzhin mi g.yo
ba dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ dpal 'phel glang po che thob cig/ lha btab kyi ma ni min/ 'di rgyu gang la gas ma 'tshal lo// rgyal pos stsas ba/ zhog cig dang lam gang du 'gro ba blta'o// des ci

bder bzhag pa dang/ de rgyal byedakyi tsha la legs su song nas/ khad kyis la khyed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na rna blags tastod do// tshadang ldan pa snyanab bzung ldan gyis skad kyi
gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa'i mjug tu/ 'byung po gang dag 'di ni lhags gyur te// sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa dag/ sems can rnams la rtag tubyams byedacing// nyin dang mtshan du chos
kyang spyod par shog/ ces yongs su bsngo ba byas pa dang/ de nas glang po che'i gtso bo ba dkar po gcig bas 3 tshodang ldan pa sman pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa mthar

byin par shes nas/ yid dang mthun par gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der song ngo// rgyal bos smras pa/ dpal 'phargyu gang gis 'dagang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der 'gro/ des smras pa/ lha sku
'tshal te/ 'phags pa zhig gis skad kyi gtang rag gis ches smras pa'i sgra gang lags pa de dag thog nas/ glang bo che 'di'i yid phrogs te/ dbang ma mchis par gyur to// rgyal bos smras pa//

dpal 'phel glang bo chaphyir zlog cig dang/ 'phags pa de btsal la na bza' zhig dbul zhing/ sang nang par ri brags su 'dong ngo// lha de pazhani'atshal lo/ de phyir log ste khyim du song ba dang/ btsun
mo 'phreng ldan ms dris pa/ lhaci'i slad du slar gshegs/ des jiltar gyur pa btsong nas/ 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phung ldan m nga la gos byinacig/ song la 'phags pa de la dbul lo// des
bsams pa/ 'phags pa snyanapa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras par gyur pa lta zhig na/ don mdog ngan zhing lus chung la/ rgyal po 'di ni rgya chen po la mos ba yin pas/ 'das de
mthong nagal te ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srad kyis/ thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas smras pa/ lhanor bregs su gshegs shig/ bdag gis ni 'phags pa de la na bza'
dbul lo// des sbas pa/ 'phreng ldan ma khyod kyis kyang gos gzhan bul cig/ cigs gnyis kyis ko sa la'i pho brang dbul bor 'gyur ram/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug kha dang/

rgyal bos chen po la 'os pa'i gos khyer nas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo// de'i tshon tshodang ldan ba kun dga' bo rgyal byed kyi tshul gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug nas/ rgyal po grang bo las babs nas
rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal tasmras pa/ 'phags pa da nang skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smra ba'i 'phags pa de gang lags/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ci 'tshal/ 'phags pa de la na bza'
'bul lo// des bsams pa/ tshadang ldan pa snyanapa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag ni snus na/ de ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung la/ rgyal po 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas//
'dis de mthong na gal tem dadapar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srid kyis/ thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas spus pa/ rgyal po rman po bdag la stsol cig dang/ bdag gis de la dbul bar
bgyi'o// rgyal bos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas dbul ba bsngags pas/ rang gi lags da nas dbul gyis de stonacig/ de'i tshatshodang ldan pa snyan pa bzung lhan nyin mo spyod

pa'i phyir shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar rten cing 'dug go/ dazhas tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ni shing ljon pa zhig ga dung mnyabar rten cing mchis kyis bzhud cig/ de
'i gan du song skye bltas pa dang/ re zhig na de shin tum sdug pa mthong ba dang/ dam dad pa skyes nas mi dga' sto/ bzhin phyir phyogs nas gos 'dzas te phyi song ngo// tshadang ldan pa snyan
ba bzang ldan gyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/ gang dag nga yi gzugs la rtog/ sgra la'ang rjes su 'brang byed pa// 'dod ba'i dbang du gyur paA// skya bo de dag nga mi mthong//
gal tanang na shes gyur cing// phyi rol dag la mi lta ba// nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba gang// de nyid sgra yis khrid brgya 'gyur// gal tanang ni mi nas shing// khyi lo rnam par mthong gyur ba/
phyi lo 'bras bu mthong ba gang// de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur// gal tanang yang ma shes shing// phyi rol dag ma mthong ba// kun tu rmongs pa'i byis pa dag/ de yang sgra yis khrid par
'gyur/ gal tanang yang rab shes shing// phyi rol dag kyang mthong ba ya/brtanapo shes rab phyogs ba de// sgra yis khrid par mi 'gyur ro// de'atshog slong rnams the tshom skyes
nas the tshom thams cad gacodapa sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunang tshadang ldan b snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sman pas/ mdog ngan zhing
khus chul skad snyan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go slong dag rigs kyi ba snyan pa 'brang ldan nyid kyis las tshogs red// rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du
nyi bar gnas pa/ gdon mi khra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags ba/ snyanapa bzang ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gi ga so sor myong ba
sha 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi lol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par sminabar ma 'gyur/ chu khams la ma 'gyur/ ma'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung ga khams la ma 'gyur gyi//
'di ltar las dag pa dang mi dge ba byas shingabasagosags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skya mdud dag la rnam bar smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal ba brgyar yang ni// chud mi
za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// danalus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu'agyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngonabyung ba 'dus pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang bo 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshol ba'i khri thub
ba na/ stonab de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
[@ ]ba: bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ bud shing zad pa'i ma bzhin
bung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ rgyal po mdzes ldan gyis de'i sku la mchod pa dag byas nas/ mchodartenakhor yug tu dpag tshad re re
da yod pa/ gnam thang du dbug tshad phyed dang gnyis pa zhig byedadu gzhug par brtsams nas/ de'i lag gi glu mu dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ las byed pa brtson pa zhig
bskos so// de nayang gla mi gzhanazhig yod pa des mchod rten ha cang chen po rtsom pa de mthongonas/ lta zhingashes ldan dag rgyal po 'dis 'di lta bu'i mchod rten chen po byed du gzhug par btsugs pa
