nam tsam zin par 'gyur ma shes so zhes 'phya bar brtsams pa dang/ de la lag gi gras smras pa/ kA yo nang rje tsi'i phyir 'phya bar byed/ gal tos zhus na las bya ba thongazhigo 3de cang mi smra bar
'dug pa dang/ lag gi gru des de phyir dbyung ba'i brtsams so// des de la bzod pa gsolo nas/ yang las bya bar brtsams pa na/ mchod rten de ma zinanas/ des yang 'phya bar brtsams pa dang/
lag ga ba des de phyir phyung ngo// yang shin tu 'bad de bzod pa gsol nas/ las bya bar btsums pa dang/ jitsam na mchod rten blta bas mi ngoms ba/ srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi mig
dang la de 'phrog par byed ba zhig zin par gyur to// de nas gla mi des de mthong nas/ 'di ltar las byed ba nabadag gnyis 'di la dbyas pa rnam kyi gsab zhig byas so zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas/ 'di la/
pa thams cad du mchod pa bya'o zhes/ des po'i gla rngan pasu thob ba de las gsar gyi dril du byed du bcug nas/ sems mngon par dad pas mchod nad la btags so// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i
dus na gla mi gang na ba de ni/ dge slong snyanapa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/ des gang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi mchod rten gyi las byed pa na/ dbyas
sha pagadaman ba de'i las kyi rnam par sminabs ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung bar skyes so// yang dad pa skyed nas gser gyi la bu byed du bcug nas/ mchod rten la btags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa
gang azhi pa des naskadasAn bar gyur to// de nas mang dge slong rnams la tshom skyes nas/ sa thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshor
ldan b snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las cazhig bkyisan/ ngos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drag slong dag rigs kyi bu sAn pa bzang
ldan nyid kyis las tshogs red pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu'agyur pa nyid// ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di dal/
skye dgu'i tshalo wi thub pa na/ ston ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldanupa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ rgyas

bu 'bul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ bla na mdab/ lha dang mi rnams kyi stonapa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas 'od srungs 'jig rten du byung ste/ de wA rA NA sa na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nyi bar
rten cing bzhugs so// wA rANasI dang/ drang srong skya ba'i bar na/ a mra'i ljonab zhig yod pa de la/ bya ka ka la pho zhig gnas ba des/ gangag tshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs
wA rA NA sir bsod snyoms la gshegs ba de'i tsho/ de la shin tu rtog cing sgra snyan pa khyed par can byung nas/ de bzhin yang dang yang du bltas bas sams tshim par gyur nas dad pa skyes so// des dus
gzhan zhig na/ skad 'byin cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ dgarab dang bde ba skyes te/ a ma'i shing ljon pa de nyid la 'dug go/ 'dug ma
thug tu bya khu zhig gis srog dang bral te/ 'chiba'i dus byas nas/ las drug la mkhas ba'i bram ze zhig tuskyes skyes so// dge slong dag de'i tshode'i dus na/ bya ko ki la gang yin pa de ni/
dag srong snyanapa bzang ldan 'di nyidaanate/ des ung dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sgra snyan pa phyung sta/ bskor ba byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig
tshanaman chad sgras khyab par gyur to// de nas yang dag skyo rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshodang ldan
ba snyan ba bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan ba la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs pas/ dgra bcom pa
nyidi mngonasumadu bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag sman pa rnams kyi mchog tubastan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ de na smon lam gyi
ga dbang gis te/ gang du smon lam btab can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas 'od srungs de nyid kyi gsung rab la dge slong zhig rab tu byung bar gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srus kyis skad
kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tubastan to// de na 'dis kyang tshajisridapar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ yon tanagyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas/ de'i 'og tu'achiba'i/ 'di skad ces
bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar/ tsho ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' lang ma thob ste/ bdag gi/

ge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'adas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khyi'i khrod 'os pa'i dus na/ skye dgu'i tsha brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstanapa de bstanab la bdag rab ngubyung/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs pas/

dgra bcom pa nyid mngon su du byed cing/ ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das yang dag bar tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog bsta ba de bzhin du/ [II]
bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das des skad kyi gdang lag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig/ces bta ba pas/ smon lam de'i dbang gis// da ltar da'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs
pa thams cad slangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas to/ ngas dge slong skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog t+tabastan to// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu
gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gnag ba zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nabazhugs so// jitsam nadage slong dag chos 'don pa nyid na/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don la//
mu stagags can rnams laskad kyi btang rag gis gzhung 'don to// khyim bdag mgon med bus sbyin gyi kun tu spyod pa na/ nang par sngar las nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du
'gro'o// des mu stags snyana rnams skad kyi gtang rag gas gzhung 'don pa thos nas/ des bsams pa// mu stags can rnams kyi chos 'dul ba nas par smras pa yinayang/ 'di dag skad
kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don la/ bdag gi 'phags ba rnams ni gzhung 'don pa nyidan/ rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'donapas/ 'di nyid bdag gi bya ba yin no snyam nas/de
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ mtha' gcig tu'adug
nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis nyes gsol to// btsunapa 'di ltar re zhig mu stegs can rnams kyi chos 'dul ba ni nyes bar sbas pa lags kyang/ de
drag skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par bgyid la/ 'phags pa rnams ni gzhung 'don pa nyid nargya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don bas/ de la gal te bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'phags pa rnams kyang skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par gnang na 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cangam gsung bas gnad do// khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
ny+nyo snga nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'angs kyis/ ge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis skad kyi gtang rag gas chos 'don bar gnang ngo

bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos gdon bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams skad kyi gtang rag gis lung 'bog pa byed/ 'don pa byed/ kha ton byed/ longs su 'dri bar byed do//
[4 ]tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin rgyal byed kyi tshal du song pa na/ des thos nas sa ba/ 'phags pa dag ci khyed kyi gtsug lag khang 'di'i rol mo mkhan gyi brang btab bamA/ skabs de
dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong gis skad kyi gtang rag gage lu9 dbrog par ma bya/ gdon par ma bya/ kha ton
bya/ yongs su dri bar ma bya'o// bdaltar ston pa'i yon tan yang dag ba bsgrag ba dang/ rgyud chags gsum pa gdon ba dag niskad kyi gtang rag gis gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'adus
kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis de dag gdon bar bya'o zhes bkalas la pa dang/ gzhon nu zhig skong kyi gtang rag ma shes nas/ des khagazhung dag bton pa nyid na/ rgyu shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs
gtor ba bzhin bton par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis sas ba/ tshadang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gnang gas/ skad kyi gtang rag gis then cig/ des snas pa/
tshadang ldan pa dag bdag gis skad kyi gtang rag mi shes so// skabs dedage slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skad kyi gtar
dag bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams khyams dang/ gnas khang dang/ sgo khang dag kun skad kyi gtar
lag slob par byed pa na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang du 'ongs ba dang/ des thos nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di rol mo mkhan
gyi brang nAm lags na/ khyed kyis da dung yang rol mo mkhan dag ma btangs/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dben pa'i phyogs su skad kyi gtang rag dag bslab pa bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong
zhig 'greng ste lhung bzed kyi snod nas lhung bzed 'byin pa dang/ ga slong dag gis su dal smras pa/ tshad ldan pa 'agleng ste lhung bzed ma 'byin cig/ des sbas pa/ nyis/ de dag gis snus pa/ lhung
sa chag par 'gyur mod/ gzhan ci nyes par 'gyur/ decang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/
dge slong gis 'gro sta lhung bzed dbyung bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du gzhug pa dang/ bkrub dang/ bsham ba dag la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o// sdom la lame phran dang ni snod gsum dang// phying
ba dra bar mi bya dang// gding ba dang ni mi 'bral ba// drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan song gi bu dag na musrin byis pa gsod kyi ri 'jigs rung
ga nags ri dgas kyi gnas na bzhugs go// gang gi tshargyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis khas bzas pa canatshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris ba byed du bcug cing/ sa sar ba kha tshar ring bo can dag
gis chal por bting ste/ bcos ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas ba/ gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa'i tsho/ bcom ldan 'adas ka bang bzangos bany+tsan du gshegs bzhed pa na/ma gshags//
pa dang/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis smras ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs pa dang/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gas ldan gyis ras rnams bsdus/
ba chu stags can rnams kyis thos nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dag sbyong go'u ta ma ni bkur sti de lta bu'i gnas ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ ga slong rnams kyis// bcos ldani/
'das pa ba so pa ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis lam phran dag tu'ang ngas sa ra ba kha tshar ring ba can dag bting zhing/
'phags pa dag bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs su gsol zhes ze na/ mu stags can rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya bas zil gyis mnan cing 'dong bar bya ste/
'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nganaslong gi bu dag na chusrin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi nags ri dgas kyi gnas na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig
lhung bzed lag na thogs yong ba dang/ dbyogs gzhan zhig tu'agyel nas// lhung bzed de sa la lhung ste chag nas/ de'i bar chad du gyur ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur bar mi bya bar/ lhung bzed kyi rtsod du bcug ste bkur bar/
bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur bar ma bya bar/ lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug su bkur bar bya'ozhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams lhung bzed kyi snod du
bcug ste/ lag pa nyid na khyer ta'adong ba na/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa'i skabs do/ dge slongan gus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcos ldanu'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/
lhung bzed kyi stod lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lung thag bar gas te/ mchanakhung gis bkur bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mal gnamed zas spyi

k+Sha gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams don mthun dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu 'ang 'dong ngo// jitsam na bram ze zhig na nas de snyan pa'i gan du songs zlas pa kyi bdag nyid chen bo kho po'i nad kyi nag
pa 'di lta bu'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ rdzob a ru ra gsol dang snyan gdangaso bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ lam kha 'di na a ru ra ga la yod/ des smras pa/ bram ze bkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di
dag ni mkhas pa 'gas bas/ 'di dag la khyod kyis bslangs na 'di dag la mchis par 'gyur gdab bo// de dge slong rnams kyi drung du song ste dris pa/ 'bags pa dag la a ru ralta mchis sam/
da dag gis snus pa/ bras bu yod na de car dgos/ bdag la sman pa'i mchidanas a par tshol cig ces mchin/ gal tamangob nabadag la stsal du gsol/ dge slong des de'i mdunangulhung bzed

kyi snod bya ba dang/ de nyid sbyang bu yang lug cing/ de nyid na grib dang/ de nyidana'abreng ba dang/ de nyid na snyan dag 'dug ba bram zes mthong nas skyas pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ni kun spyod ba mi
gtsang pa yin te/ 'di 'dra bo khra pa ba sa ni/ bdag nga'i yang ches bla'i/ mi gtsang ba za ba ni de lta ma yin nozhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das 'a gsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kha/ snod gsum btang bar bya ste// lhung bzed kyi snod dang/ sman stod dang/ bar bur skyod rnams so// dge slong dag gis de dag gi lung thag mnyis
bar btags pas/ de dag gis mchan khung dro ba'agyur ba dang/ ma dad pa dag 'bags pa dag ni khyed dra dzAthogs 'gro 'am nas co'adri bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'adas la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyan par gdags ba'i mi bya bar/ ci rigs par gdags par bya'o// dge slong dag gis ras ma phra mo dag
thubya/ btags pas/ de dag la bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa ma zhing chen bo dgag gdags par bya'o/ de dag gis zhing chen po btags pa/
dang de dag nyid zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba dkyil phying bu dang sbyar te/ skabs skabs su srubs bya rog rkang dag drug par bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong shagi gis phyi pa zhig red nas des bsams pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum
rgyu dras te bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' skul gyis/ dra'o snyam nas/ desu gri'u dang khab dag khyer nas shari ljon pa zhig gi drung du song ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs tag brags nas
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ci yin/ des gsol ba/ btsun pa bcos ldan 'dus kyis dge slong gas chos gos gsum dras tabacang bar bya'ozhes bka' stsal pa/ bag gis phying pa 'di rnyed nas
chas gos su 'brab lags so// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsub ba la gus pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ lnga po 'di dag ni dra bar mi
bya ste de'i ras thams cad dang/ la ba thams cad dang/ phying pa thams cad dang/ klam thams cad dang 3 song ba thams cad do sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed
kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig bya ba zhig gi ched du gtsug lag khang gzhan du song ba dang/ de dag nam sros par gyur nas/ gnas mal gyi zhal tabyed pas
snus pa/ tshadang ldan pa gnas mal dag nos shig/ des smras ba/ bdag gis gdab khyer tam 'ongs so// gnas mal gyi nal ta byed pas smras pa/ gal tid lta nakhri gling ba nos shig des
khri gling pa mnos nas tal ba dang/ dgrang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyin bazhin dug tshan cho 'das nas/ na bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ com
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kha/ de lta bas na dgo slong gis gding ba mad bar 'gro bar mi bya'o// 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba med par 'gro bar mi
bya'o zhes bka' sprul ba dang/ dge slong rnams dong nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam bas de'i nya' khor gyi gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro ba dang/ 'chag tu 'gro ba dang/ grong gzhan du 'gro ba de dag tu'ang
gding ba khyer ba na/ gnas brtanargan khogs pa nyam chung ba rnams dang/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa rnams a phag pa gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsams pas 'gro
de yang gding ba mod bar 'gror ma gnang ngo zhes ma gnang pa 'iskabs de/ ga slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na dag
slong gis khyed 'khor dang/ nyin mo spyod du 'gro ba la gding ba bkur bar mi bya'o// grong gzhan du 'gro ba na deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro na der yang bkur bar mi bya'o// dmag

slong gzhan dag gding ba med par grong gzhan du deng nyid phyir ldog po'i bsam bas 'gro ba na/ de rnams la bya nam pa de lta bu dag byung nas/ de nam sos par gyur ba dang/ de dag bslab pa la gus pas nub
mo phyi'i dong ba na/ sang le dang/ stag dang/ chom rkun b dang/ g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal ba/ gal te de ltar bsams te dong ba dag der nas sos par gyur na/ de nyid du gnas bar bya sta/ 'di ltaratshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag las gding ba bas nyal bar bya'o// gal te

rnyed na de lta na legs/ gal ma rnyed na bla gos ba lta pa tu byas te bting la yun thung ngu nital// lun ring dun nyal bar mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o// dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slobazhag las gding ba

b.rAs pa dang/ de la rilam gyi gnod pa byung nas/ des mi gtsang bas ma rung bar gyur pa/ de bzhin du dge slong de la phyir dbul bar pa du mas ba dang/ des ma 'dod pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga
ma bgano/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bkrus te sbyin par bya'o// dge slong des bkrus te byon na'on kyang de len par mi byed pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// bcom ldan
'tha'/ 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ riba'i rin sbyin bar bya ba'am/ mi sems mgu bar bya'o// dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan dang/ grong gzhan dag tu deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas chos

gos gsum po dag med par dong ba dang/ de nas de dong ba dag la citsas na bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung ste/ de nas sos par gyur to// de dag bslab pa la gus pas mtshan mo phyir dong ba na// song
gdang/ sdug da/ chom rkun pa dang/ g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te
de lta bu'i bsam pa sa dong ba rnams der nam sos bar gyur na/ de nyid du 'dug par bya zhing tshangs pa mtshungs par bod ba dag las chos gos dag b.ras te/ byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de rnams
chos gos dag b.ras nas ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba mngashes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol ba/ snga ma rang gi sams kyis byung la byin gyis brlab par bya'o// lnga po 'di dag ni
sems bskyed bas 'grub ste/ gso sbyong dang/ dgag dbye dang/ chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang/ chos gos dbyung ba dang/ gang zag mgronAdu bos ba'o// dge slong de dag gis chos gos dras
shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rId nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rod na/ dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
maM @#// ji snye kha dog ma bsgyur zhing ma dras pa dag dan lhan thabs kyis glan la byan gyis brlab bar bya'o// gal ted ched na de lta na legs/ gal tam rnyed na de bzhin byin gyis brlab par
bya'o tha na khyim pa'i gos la lad byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
na bzhugs so// ga slong dag cig gding ba med par yul gzhan du dong ba dang/ der dong ba de rnams 'gyod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag ngas chos gos gsum dang 'bral bar ni gsungs kyi/ gding ba dang ni ma yin te/ de lta bas na bsams bzhin du bzhag ste 'gro bar mi bya'o/ brjed
ba la ni ltung ba med do/ [j]sdom la chutshags la nA rnam bzhi dang// snod rnams dang ni gcig tu za// gos gcig gis ni za ba dang
sgron mo khrus ni byed pa'o// sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs go/ lho lam nas dge slong bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'atsal gnyis shig gnyan yod du dong ngo// de
wa/des brtag par brtsams pa dang/ phyis ni chum dag par gyur nas/ dus tshigs su bcad pa snyas ba/ bskal pa 'bum phrag stong dag tu// gang zhig mthong bur rab dka' bas// bdag gis chu
dag 'thungs nas ni// de nas 'dren pa blta bar bya/ cig shos kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang zhig sems can rnams la thugs nas thugs rje zhing// srid pa kun la chags pa gtan nas
spras gyur pa// de yi bstan mchog 'di la bslab pa bslangs ba yis// srog nyid spang gi srog chags gsad par bya ba min// de nas gang gis chu 'thungs pa de ni 'ong ngo// gang gis chu ma 'thungs pa des

ni brtson 'grus bdu mas te/ shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du 'dug nas/ des ji srid du lus kyi mthu yod pa de srid dag ba'i phyogs dag byas shing/ gang gi tshalus kyi mthu dang bral pa de'i tsho'achi ba'i dus la
bapa sa/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// lta bu 'as lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid na skyes nas rid po ma lon pa la/ sems gsum skya sto/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang/ gang du
rgyas pa dang/ las gang gis skyes 'o/ des mi rnams kyi nang nas ga 'phos pa dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nad duskyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sogs mngon par dad par byas pas
skyes pa mthong ngo// de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bag yongs su gnas pa bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro/
@#// ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/ bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bstan ba khonar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ bsnyan bkur bya ba'i phyir bar 'gro'o sAl mo/
'donas sngon dge slong lha'i bu rnachagadub kar g.yo zhing dris med pa thogs te/ doshal dang sa mo des brgyan pa'ilus kyis lha ma tog ut+pal dang/ par dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+madakar bo dang/ mnar
ba dag gas bu ba bkang ste/ kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das la lo tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mtha' gcig tu'adug pa dad/ 'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang rgya chen
gos khyab bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ gang thos nas sngon dge slong
lha' khus snyan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba shes kyi rdorjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa/ de lta bu r 'phags pa'i
bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs bar byed pa'i chos bstan ba mdzad do// des bden pa mthong nas/ btsun ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang
la gyis/ mas kyang ma ba gyis/ rgyal bos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma ba gyis/ ston gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dag sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang/
mdza' bshes dang/ rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang m bgyis te/ khrag dang mchima'i rgya mtshoni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dug las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar ba'i
sgo dag ni khyi/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ la dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ khang
sa ba/ khyod mthusu rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa// ngan songashul bkag bsod nams rab ldan ba'i/ mtho ris 'gro ba phyi zhing bdag gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/
shani rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/ derang skyon bral dag pa'i mgi thog cung// go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob sta/ sdug bsngal brgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyuraM/ 'gro ba pa lhawani
mi dang lhas mchod ba/ skya dang rgya dang na 'chi bral ba go/ srid pa stong dumathong pa rab dkon// thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis// de nas gdud byas dongashal rab 'byung bas//
zhabs la phyag 'tshal 'das ba skyes gyur nas// dgu thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te// lha la 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song// de nas sngon dge slong lha'ajib tshong ba khe sogs
re da pa lta bu dang ni de las lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rnam b.rargyal ba lta bu dang/ nad ba nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bu r gyur te/ cha
lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i tshalugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo// dge slong cig shos de lang khad kyis mnyan yod du phyin to// de nas lhung bzed dang
chos gos mkhos su phab sta/ rkang pa dag bkrus nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa la/ dge slongakhyod da gzod gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ dbyar gang duganus zhes yang dag bar dga'
bas yang dag par dga' bar mdzadab yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/ dbyar gang du gnas zhes yang dag par dga' bar mdzadapa dang/ des gsol ba/
btsunapa bdag lho phyogs nas da gzod 'dir mchis te/ lho phyogs su dbyar gnas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong khyod la grogs dge slong lta yod dam/ bcom ldan
'das mchis so// de gar song/ des ji ltar gyur ba gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'itshatshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yi bstan la ma gus gang// des ni nga mthong
ci zhib ban/ des ni nga la bltas na yang/ mthong ba ma yin mchod pa chen/ nga yi bslab la ga nga slob pa'i dge slong des ni nga mthong ste/ shes rab dman pa khyod kyis kyang// gu ras rgyas
mngon sum ma mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis nyid kyi sku las bla gos bya nas/ yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal ba/ ltos shig dag klong lus 'di lag/ gtsang zhing gsar/
gyi mdog 'dra ba// sngon gyi las kyi rnam sminadang// ga dang ma las byung ba'o// gang gis chos nyid ma mthong ba/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mi mthong// gang gis chos nyid mthong gyur ba//
de yis thub ba chen bo mthong// gzhan yang/ brtanazhing dag ba'i blo gros can// bslab pa rjes su srung byed pa// de yis dang bor nga la ni// gzugs kyi sku dang chos skur mthong// bdag nyid
chenapo'i 'od srungs kyi// bslab mtshams 'das pas da dung du/ ala'i 'du ba de klu yin// skya gnas ba las ma tharalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung
ni dge slong rnams tshutshags ma 'chang ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas nadage slong gis tshutshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chutshogs nyabar gnag bar bya'o zhes bkod
stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag chu tshags du yod mingashos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu tshogs ni lnga sta/ tshutshags gru gsum dang 3 bum tshags gca[]canadang/ ril ba
dazhabs tshogs can dang/ spyangs tshags dang/ bsal tshogs rnams go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal byed kyi tshal mgon med byas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong ba tshunazhi 'grus ba gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo// de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/ cig shos la ni ma dad// gang la
yod pa des chu btsags te 'thungs pa dang/ gang la med pa des smras pa/ tshod ldan pa tshutshags galor cig/ des ma stong nas/ de'akhongs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis// bcom

ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lo/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dag srung gis zhe 'gras pa dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o// gal te de lta bu'i rkyenazhig byung
na gcig la gcig bzod pa gsol tadong bar bya'o/ bam bo lnga pa// ga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong gnyis log ljongs rgyu zhing deng ba dang/ de dag las gcig la ni tshutshags yod/ cig shos la namad nas/ de la des dris pa//
khyod la tshutshogs yod dam/ des smras pa/ yod do// sbyin nam mi sbyin shes ni ma smras so// de dag las gangal tshuchags yod pa des na chu 'thus pa dang/ gang la med pa des smras pa/ tshong

ldan ba chu tshags g.yoracig des smras ba/ tshadang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chutshags ni dris kyi/ sbyin nas sa sbyin ma dris pas/ ma gus ba khyod la kho bos tshutshags ci'i phyir sbyin/ ma sbyin gyis
song zhig/ des de la ma byin pas de 'phongs par gyurapa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'gro bar 'dod pa dag
slong gso gal tatshutshags mad na/ ga slong grogs po la khyod la chutshogs yod dam med dri bar bya'o// gal tayod do zhes zer na bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya zhing/ gal tasbyin no
zhes zeran 'gro bar bya'i/ gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon medabrus sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so/ mnyan yod na dge slong gnyis shagi ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo// de dag las gcig la nitshutshogs yod/ cig shos la ni yod pa dang/ gang la med pa des do la dris pa/ khyod la chu tshags
yod dam med/ des smras pa/ kod do// bdag la gAl ma mi g.yar/ g.yara'o// de dag dong ba dang/ jitsam na lam kar 'gro pa dag cig 'ongs nas/ gangal tshutshags yod pa de'i
bya ba gang yin pa de 'gron pa de nyid las grub ste/ daphyir ldog par brtsams pa dang/ cig shos des snas pa/ tshodang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chutshags khas blangs pa g.yor cig/
des smras pa/ de lta na de ni bden na bdag gis tshubasaMg pa'i slad du byin gyi/ thams cad kyi thams cad du byin pa ni ma yin no zhes ma byin pas de 'phongs par gyur ba'i skabs te/
bdge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang la tshugs med pa des/ dge slong grogs po la khyol tshutshogs yod dam med
ces dri bar bya'o// gal te yod do zhes zer na/ des bdag la sbyin nam mi spyin zhes brjod par bya'o/ gal tasbyin no zhes zeran/ gal takhyod slar ldog par gyur tam/ gzhanadu 'gro bar gyur na
sna/ sbyin nas mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o// gal tasbyin no zhes zer na'agro ba bya'i/ gzhan du na 'gro bar ma bya'o/[– ]/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshatshadang ldan pa nye b.ra'akhor rgyas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lhutshags ma mchis par gtsug lag khang
gzhan nam/ grong gzhan du mchir gnang ma/ nyib 'khor ma gnang ngo// gal tader song nas 'bongs par mi 'gyur gnang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
zhib rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshatshodang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa chu tshags gcig gis
gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor gal tader song nas 'bongs bar mi 'gyur na gnang ngo// btsunapa chu tsha gas gcig gis mang bo rnams sam/ dag 'dun dag ljongs rgyu zhing
mchir gnang zhi/ 'a bar 'khor gal te der song nas 'bos par mi 'gyur naganang ngo// btsun pa tshulaMgs ma mchis par muklung gi 'gram nas mchir gnang ngam/ []bar 'khor gnang ste//

mgyogs pa la gal tatshugazhan dang 'dris par ma gyur na/ rgyang grags re'i zhing brtag par bya'o// cha gzhan dang 'dres par gyur na/ gang dang gang du len pa de dang der brtag par bya'o// mi mgyogs pa
lana'agram dang 'gram du brtag par bya'o// de la mgyogs pa ni rgyun sgyur bko ma 'gyogs pa ni rgyun bul ba'o// btsunab 'gram gyi nya' khor gang la gas/ nyabar 'kho 'dom gang kho ra khor
yug go/ btsun pa chab ma btsugs shing ma brtags pa 'amaMl du bo/nang la/ nye bar 'khor mi gnang ngo// btsun ba chab ma bags shing btags pa 'tshal duganang ngam/ nyabara'akhor mgi/
gis dag go zhes bya sta gnang ngo// btsun pa chab btsags shing brtags ba 'tshal duganang bas/ nyabar 'khor gnang ngo// 'on kyang chung ba ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba dwang/ gang khrag/
gis rung ba dang/ chutshags kyis rung ba dang/ chumag gis rung ba dang/ khron pas rung ba'o// de la dge 'dun gyis rung pa ni/ gang dge 'dun mthun pas bsgos ba'i dge slong gis chub tsags bar
gyur pa lta/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad bar bya'o// gang zag gis rung ba ni/ dge slong gang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang/ lta ba ma nyams pa dang/ spyod
ka ba ma nyams ba dang/ 'tshob ma nyams pas yongs su dag par gyur pa ste/ gang khrag gis rubab dol/ dge slong gis 'khongs spyad par bya'o// chutshags kyis rung ba ni/ tshogs gang nam yang ma dag
ba ma yin pa des btsugs pa sku/ btung bar bya'o/ chumag gis rung ba ni/ 'bab pa'o// khronabs rung ba ni/ khron ba gang gi chudag pa de las nyi ma nub kar blangs nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi
bar du sgo/ khron pas rung ba'i chu btung bar bya'o/ dge slong rnams ha ca ngayun ring dumurtog bas 'khrul pa mthong bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang drug gi shing rtasmug
mas bkang ba 'khor ba tsam gyis yod chos pa de tsam du brtag par bya'o// sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
na bzhugs so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong rnams la ster spyad dag 'bul bar byed pa na/ dge slong rnams mi len to// de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dgagang gi tshe
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshon/ ma stogs can dag yon gnas lags/ da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas khyed yon gnas lags
ta/ gal te khyed kyis mi bzhes na/ ni bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tudage ba'i lam brgyags ma mchis bar mtshim/ bzhes shig/ skabs de dag srong rnams kyig//
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ dag 'dun gyi phyir sdus spyad dag blang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dag blang bar bya'o nas
bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis de dag blangs nas/ mdzod du bcug sta bzhag nas/ de bzhin du lhung bzed dag tu sba ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mthong ste
snus pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis sder spyad phul ba de dag mi gda' na/ dge slong rnams kyis sbas pa/ bzhin bzangs dag mdzod na 'dug go/ dedag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci
bdag cag gi khyim naganas ma mchis ta/ bdag cag gis khyed la bal lam/ yongs su le ngas spyod na/ bdag cag la yongs su longs spyod pa'i sgyu las byung ba'i bsod nams su 'gyur ba
zhig na/ khyed kyis kyang mdzod du bcug pa lta/ skabs de dge slong rnamAs kyis/ bcom ldan ' dus la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder
spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sngar spyad yongs su longs spyod bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis yongs su longs/
spyadabar brtsams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhanargya chen bo la nos pa de dag gis/ sdor spyad tshad chen po dag phul pa dang/ dag grong gnas brtan gnas brtan
nas de dag 'khru bas ngal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdar spyad kyi zhal tapa bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis sder spyadakyi zhal tapa bsko bar bya'o zhes bka'
stsal ba dang/ bye brag med pa'i bgo nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i sdor spyad kyi zhal ta pa ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar ma bya/ bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya
lta sta/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun bas 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimug dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang/ sdar spyadabrims pa dang/ ma brims pa dag mi shes pa// chos 'a dang ldan pa'i
par spyad kyi zhal ta pa ma bskos ba ni bskor bar bya/ bsko ba par mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis ma yin pa dang/ gtimug gis ma yin pa dang !
'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang/ ltar du brims pa dang/ ma brims pa dag shes bko/ bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams nas/ gats+tsha brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis
dag 'dunags la bsgo nas/ ga 'dun thams cad 'dus ta'adug pa dang/ bzhag dang por sgo bar byagate/ ming 'dizhis bya ba khyod dag 'dun gyi sdor sbyadasko bar spro 'am/ gal tesgo
na des sgo'o zhes su bar bya// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gagrwa gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsunab rnams gsan du gsol// dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
'di dag 'dugyi sdor spyad 'dril bar spro// gal te dag 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ ga 'dun gyis mang 'dizhes bgyi ba 'di sder spyad
zhal tapar bskos te/ sder spyad kyi zhal tapa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dag 'dun gyi sder spyad 'dIm par 'gyur ro// 'di'i gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya gyu/ dag 'dzin btsunab/
rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dag 'dun la sder spyad 'drim par ste/ de'i slad du dag 'dun gyis ming 'dizhis bgyi ba sdar spyad kyi zhal tapar bsko zhing/ sdar

spyad kyi zhal tapa mang 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad 'dram par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal tapar bsgo bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung
zhig gang dag ma bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas par spyad kyi zhal ta pa ma nga 'di zhes bgyi bo/ dge 'dun la sdong spyad dag 'dris par 'gyur te/ 'di
ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge slong rnams kyis zas zos nas/ lhag mas 'bags bzhin du de nyid la byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa lhag mas 'bags pa dog lhan cig gnas pa dang/ nyaganas rnams kyis bkru par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag mas 'bags pa dag lhan cig gnas pa dang/
'a chu gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan dag cig la 'khor mod nas/ de dag bdag nyid 'khru bar byed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
ded ga ni ster spyad kyi zhalo tapa dag kho nas bkru bar bya zhing/ de dag gis kyang de dag la sbyin bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/
glu mgon med zas sbyo gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs go/ drug sde rnams lhung bzed nag po gcig tu cig car bza' bar bsams nas/ de drug char gyis mnyam du lag pa bcug pa dang/ lhung
bzedalag pa la thogs ti/ de 'phyang ba'agyur ba dang/ de dag gis tshodang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag pe tsho'aphrul byed pa la ltos/ de dag gis lag pa drangs telhung nas chag pa dang/ de dag
we gis gad kyis btab pa dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshod ldan ba dag 'di lta bu mi mdzes pa byas nas gnong ste 'dug pa bya ba yinanaM/ khyedad god pa lta/ da
dag gis smras pa/ ci byas chang 'thus sam/ kun dong thos/ ge slong rnams kyis sbrus pa/ ci de yang byed dam/ gzhanaci byas/ lhung bzed nag po ma bcag gam/ 'di la
0 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ ni rdza mkhan ga 'cha/ 'dzib med dag/ gzhan byar zud mod/ de dag cung mi sla bar 'dug pa dang/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ com ldan 'das la gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs ga cung khyad byung ba na/ dge slong rnams gcig tuphra ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o/ zan
'gal tshabs can du 'gyulo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis gcig tubaza' bar ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag cige'agron ba dang thabs gcig chas pa/
'gron pa phyogs gcig tu bran bza' bar brtsams na/ dge slongadi dag thams cad l sder spyad dag mi bdog ste/ dadag re nas zanasra ba la ring zhig thogs nas/ 'gron ba thal ba dang/
chom bo dag gis bcom mo// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkral stsal ba/ lam du zhugs pa na gal te sder spyad dag ma
da nagacig tubaza' bar bya ste/ lag pa nor ra nas gzhug par bya zhing dubyung bar bya'i/ hrag car du ma yaneno// bcom ldan 'adus kyis lam du zhugs pa na/ gal tastar sgyu dag ma rnyed na gcig
tubaza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de na dag tshul gang dag 'khod pa de dag dang lhan cig gcig tu za bar byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/
lhung bzer bzung ba de dag dang yang snyanatsas btsal bar bya'o// chung ba byed pa gzhan dag cig yod pa de dag naza bana'agronab rnams dang bral nas/ nyes dmigs de nyid//
du gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gong buragongs la byin gi/ dge slong gzhan gcig gnyen gyi khyim du song ba dang/ gnyen dag gis smras ba/ bdag cag lhan cig ma
zos nas ring zhig lon bas/ zanalhan cig bsdus tshur/ de dag gis smras pa// khyed ni khyim ba/ bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba yin pas bzangam ring ngo/ de dag ma dga' nas mtshags
brnangs shing 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol ba/ gal te yang dang yang du don du gnyer nagadon ma ba bar dus
kyis 'tshubar zhes nas/ gdadugazhan dag gis mthong nas/ mi mdzes par mi 'gyur ba der sder spyad bzung la bza' bar byas/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ sa ngas rgyas
N+NaM bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams gos gcig pu dang bsod snyoms za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
kyis mthong nas dris pa/ zhesaldan dag zan za ba 'di dag su zhig/ gzhan dag gis sbas pa/ dge slong shAkya bu yanin// de dag 'phya zhingeshes ldan dag/ ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang
ldan pa de lta bu la ngotshashes pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di de lta bu ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyi// bcom ldanu'adas la gsol pa dang/ rtsom
ldan 'adas kyis dgongs pa/ nyidamagis gangacung zad byungab na/ dge slong rnams gos gcig gyon pa las gyur gyis/ de bas na dge slong gis gos gcig pa dang bran bza' bar ma bya'o//
za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyulo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos gcig pa dang zan bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ rganabo rgas tenyam chung ba dang/ nadapa sbyor
brjod la dag chos gos rnams gyon/ zanabaza' bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis rdul can 'jam po dang zan bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi
bya'o 'on kyang gzhan dag cig gis ma nus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis phyogs dben par bza' bar bya sta/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nabazhugs so// drug sde rnams chu bo dregs ldanul gcer bur khrus byed pa bram ze
dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag gcer bu pa khrus byed ba 'di dag su zhig/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ dgi sbyong shAkya'i bu dang// de dag 'phya zhingashes
ldan dag/ ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa de lta bu la/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di lta bu dug ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong
rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan sagos pa [） ]nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sgron mor khrus byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas
nadage slong gis sgron mor khrus mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang khrus ras bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus sa bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
dge slong rnams gnyis sbyar 'chang nas/ bcom ldan 'a sa kyis bka' shul ba/chib rkyang brkyang bar bya ste/ gang la gnyis sbyar yod pa des ni chub rtags la bkru bar bya'o// chos gos gsum/
pa rnams ma rung ngo snyam nos pa'achang pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adus kyis bka' stsal pa// de rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs dbacang bar bya'o// gzhan dag cig gis khrus pas ma rnyed pa
dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag gis khrus sa ma rnyed nas/ lo ma dag gis mdun dang rgyab nas g.yogs te/ phyogs dben pa gang na gzhan dag gis mthong nas
la dad bar la 'gyur bar khrus bya'o// dge slong mas khrus ras gcus te de dag 'gyodabar gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la kha/ ras chig rkyang la ni srog chags dag med mod kyi/
05 'on kyang sa bshal nas gcu bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyed par bya'o/// sdoman/ mon sranagre'u dang ma rung pa'i sa dang skyugs pa'i bra ba dang// gdams ngashing zas ni bra ba dang//
khyod dang 'khar ba'i lhung bzed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byedakyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshod ldan pa nam
gru gang cal Ang khus 'phrige za ba zhig bas/ gong nas grulus 'bri can nam gru khum 'phrog can zhes bya bar chags so// de dus gzhan zhig na chab khung sar zhugs pa dang/ das de na
mon sran gre'u'i zhal luzhig mthong nas/ del yang dag pa ma yin pa rirtog pa skyes pa/ bdag gis sa bon gyi chos 'arung bar byas so snyam sgo/ jitsam dus gzhan zhig na dgo 'dun la son sranagre'u'i
btsa' ba dag cig grub pa de mi tra bar lhung bzed bkab ste 'dug pa dang/ lhan cig gnas pa dang/ chuganas dag gis snas ba/ mkhan po dge 'dun la tshon sran gro'u'i bza' ba dag khyung ba tsa'i
slad du ma gsol// des smras pa/ bu dag kho bos sa bon rgyatshos ma da bar byas so// dedag gis snus ba/ mkhonapo lta bu zhig bgyis des ji ltar gyur ba bsnyad pa dang/ de dag
gas kyang m za bar brtsams so// de dag la 'grogs bshes rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyi'i mi za/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyadab dang/ de 'khor ma becan zhig pas/ de la
brten nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis chu bros so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dge slong dag sa bon gyi rigs chos dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de yang rlangs pa khyung na/ tshos so zhes byas bza' bar bya ste/ 'dil 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/ btsun pa ma'ang
ny+nyo kha sa nas shing 'khrungs la/ rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na/ longs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyadapar mi bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nye bar
'khor yongs su longs spyadapar mi bya'o// btsunapa re zhig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la/ ma rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhagaso na/ yongs su longs spyad par bgyi nam/ yongs su longs spyad
par mi bgyi/ nyabar 'kho gal dazhag tsam lenan/ yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// btsunapa rezhig rung brtsis nas shang 'khrungs la/ rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na/ longs su 'dongs srid
par bgyi'am/ longs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ nyabar 'khor yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal du rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med

00zas spyinagyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa des slong mo btab pas grung zhig skyed do// de'i 'og tub zhig red do// de'i 'og tu yang glang zhig rnyed do// de'i 'og tu
yang ba zhig rnyed de/ de'i ba lang khyu langs par gyur to// bram ze des thog mar rnyed pa'i gling la bkra shis kyi blo byung nas/ glang de ang yan du btang ngo// dus gzhanazhig na de rgas/ 'khogs/
nyam chung bar gyur to de tshu'adod nas/ chu bo dregs ldan gyi 'gram du song ba las 'dam du song ngo// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mngalam der song ba las/ des de mthong nas bsams pa/ gla 'di
la dge ba'i rtsa ba lta cung zad yod dam snyam pa dang/ yod par mthong ngo// su la rag las snyam pa dang/ bdag kho nal sto/ nges 'dus nas phyung nas/ lag pas phyis so// de nas bzhin bzas
'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// nga nganalas 'das ba nizhi ba'o/ zhes chos tshig gsum bshad de/ nga la dang bar yang gyis shig dang/ dalta
na byol song gi skye gnas las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyurozhes sbas nas song ngo// de yang bdag gis thos pa dang/ de wa dag gis bya ba'i tshabasams pa/ gal der 'apags pa de 'dir ma phyinan/
bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su mi 'gyur rosnyam nas/ de tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sams mngon pa dang bar byas nas/ dus las 'das te/ mnyan yod nyidan bram ze las drug la brtson pa
gis shig tubyas so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gling de'i gnas skabs de ji lta bu zhig yin pa bsams pa dang/ ji tsatsan dus las 'das pa ra mthong ngo/ ma gar skyes

bsams pa dang/ mnyan yod tid du khrum khri las drug la brtson pa'i rigs su skyes par mthong nas/ de khyim der yang dang yang du song zhing/ des bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro ba'i bslab
pa'i gzhi dag la bkodado// de dus gzhan zhig na phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dag tshul med par song ba dang/ bram ze des smras pa/ 'phags pa sa phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul mi mnga' 'am/ des stsas pa/

tsha1 bzhinubazungs ni kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul dag tshu kusha la bzung ba na/ rtswa ku sha la bzung bas 'byung ngam/ khyod lta bu las rnyed pa gang yin pa de/ kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba u0f7a dag tshul du
'gyur mod/ 'apags pa bdag gi mchis brang 'disams can zhugs te/ gal takhyo'am btsas na/ de khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dag tshul bgyi'o// bzhin bzangs nad modacig/ blangs so zhes smras
nag song ngo// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas/ du ba lang gi sha tshugs lta bu zhig bsaM sa pa dang/ de'i nye du rnams lhags te 'dus nas/ zhag bdun gsum gcig tubatsa sa pa'i bcos
ston rgya cher byas nas/ ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags/ na rnams kyis smras pa/ gang ba phyir khye'u 'dirIsha tshug sa ba lang dang 'dra ba de'i phyir/ khye'u'i mnge ba dang bdag tu
gdags so zhes ming ba lang bdag ces bya bar btags so// de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur pa dang/ de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sna drongasham thabs dang/ chos gos lhung bzed thogs
te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ dus bram ze de'i khyim du phyin pa dang/ bram ze des byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i zla ba kun tu spyad nas

rkang pa la phyag byas so// chung mas kyang de la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod las ltung bsredu bkang sti phul lo// khye'u de tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta nas/ des bram zla la brda byas
pa dang/ des khye'u de la smras pa/ bu khyod ngas ma btsus ba nas/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu phyi bzhin 'brang ba dag tshul dubul gyis/ 'phags pa dang lhan cig song zhig/ sems can de
srid pa tha ma ba zhig ste/ de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang/ des de rab tu byung/ bsnyan par rdzogs nga ra byas te/ gdams ngag byin no// des 'bad/ brtsal/ bsgrims pas/ 'khorab 'i/
'khor lo gso ba dang mi g.yo ba rtsalta ba 'di nyid rtogs nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig ba/ ltung ba/ 'gyes ba/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du bsgoms te/
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sams ga sar dang bong bar mtshungs pa// tsan dan dang
ste'ur 'dra ba/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo pa'i sbyobs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig
pa thob pa/ srid pa dang/ rnyed pa la chags pa dang/ bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ gus par smra bar bya ba'i
dgra bcom par gyur to// de la las las skyes pa'am ba gcig yod/ gcig nas ni skyugs pa 'byin to// cig shes nas ni mid do// gang gi tshabcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma un pa'i gras kyis
bslab ba ma bcas pa de'i tshon skyugs shing med do// gang gi tshabacas pa de'i tshoni smugs shing 'dor bas de lus ke/ nyam chung/ shag shig po/ rod nyams par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhinadu rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo ba yang bdag ci'i phyir lus/ nyam chung/ 'ashig shig
po/ rod nyams par gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo gangal las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i med pa gnyis grub pa/ des shugs
b.lan gnyis sam gsum bor te/ kha bkrus nas lhag ma med par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyodapar mi bya'o// dge slong rnams bras khros nas skyugs pa/ de dag 'gyedapar gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gzhazhig na zos te skyags na/ des kha bkru bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gang gi tshatshadang ldan pa ba lang bdag rab tu byung ba de'i tshe/ bram ze/
dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya smod ba zer zhing/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dag sbyong gi tshul nyams dang/ tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ da ni ba lang bdag la sogs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta rnams kyang
rab tu 'byin to zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyan thos chen po rab dang 'dab la skye bo'i tshogs la
po chem dad par byed kyis/ de lta bas na ba lang bdag yul dbus su gnas su mi gzhug go snyam nas/ tshadang ldan pa ba lang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ ba lang bdag khyod ded phyin chad yul dbus
nam gnas par/ many+dza' 'khob kyi gnas mal dag snyanacig/ btsun ba de ltar 'tshal lo zhes/ tshadang ldan kha ba lang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas/ mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur
te sharingashi shaka'i gzhal med khang bar 'dug go/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag pa'i nyan thos kyi dge slong bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams
kyi nang mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ba lang bdag 'di yin no/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
tshodang ldan ba ba lang bdag gis las zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sha tshugs ba lang lta bu r gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
'a dag ba lang ba dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags ba/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ chu bo bzhi 'bar gnas ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba yin te/ ba lang bdag nyid kyis
byas pa'i las rnams gzhanasu zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shang bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la snyan bar mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams pa ma yin/ mo'i khams la la Ani/
rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang/ ma dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zinapa'i phung po dang/ skye mched dang/ khams dag kho na la rnam pa sman par 'gyur ro//
bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang// las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid
la skye dgu'i tshol te khri thub ba na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ sa bu 'dul ba'i kha
sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig stond byung sta/ de'i bstan pa la 'di ras byung bar gyur to// dge slong ba/nga gis rab tuphyung ba de rgas//
[ra]'khogs/ nyam chung ba zhig ste/ de de'i lhung bzed 'bru ba na/ dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig kha ton zer ba la ring zhig thogs nas/ de'i mkhan po des rang dgar zan zos pa dang/ de kha/
ton la chags bas mkhan po de la 'phyas so// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na zan bros nas bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed bkrus te/ mkhanapo'i drung du song ba dang/ da dung zan za ba mthong nas de kun nas dkris
pas sa ba/ mkhan bo ci khyod glang rgan bzhin du ltad cing bzhugs sam/ des bsams pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pas gal tacung zad cig smras na/ re bar 'khrug pa skyed bar 'gyur gyis/

gang gi tshe 'di kun nas dkris ba dang bral ba de'i tshadra bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba dang snus pa/ tshodrang ldan b ci zer/ des smras pa/ khyod glang rgan bzhin ldad dam zhes de
skadamatshamod/ des smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa khyod kyis nga su yin shes sam/ 'chal te/ khyod kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la rab tubyung ba lags la/ bdag
kyang de khona'igasung rab rab tu byung ba lags go/ des smas pa/ de ni da lta yin te/ bdonana'on kyang rab tubyung bas bya pa 'am/ byed pa gang yin pa de ngas byas te/ de lta bas nang ni 'ching ba
thams cad las grol ba yin/ khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin na/ khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsa ba mo snas kyis/ khyod kyis las de si nas kyang bsrabs pa nyid dang/ yongs su
zad pa nyid dang/ yongs su gtugs par 'gyur bar nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig/ des nyes pa la nyes par bshags so// gang 'dis dge slong dgra btsem ba la

ba glob rganazhes bya ba'i zla ba kun tu spyod pa kun du spyadab las do'i rnam par snyani bas porabs lnga ba rab lang gi skye gnas su skyes so// las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar sha tshugs ba lang lta bu r
skyes so/ ba/ yang dge slong rnams kyisi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshodang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'arnam par smin pas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gtubastan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// gang du smon lam btab
lags/ 'di yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ der 'dape tshogacig tutshadas pa spyod pa spyad na/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par
ma gyur to// gang gi thad du rab tu byung ba dani/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bas mtha'i gnas mAl la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tulung bstan to// de na 'dis smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar
bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srungs kyi thad du tshegacig tu tshangs bar sbyod pa spyad kyang/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur
gyis ga ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa risangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis// bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i cho lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhi/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs palisangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya b.ra'agyur rozhes lung bstan ba gang yin pa de'i gsung rab la bdag rab tubyung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
smadas te/ dgra bcom ba nyid mngon sum du byedabar 'gyur zhing/ ji ltar bdag ga mkhanabo/ bcom ldan 'das ma dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ bas mthu'i gnas mal la

dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tubastan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang shAkya'i rgyal po chen po shAkya thub pa des bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tustonapar gyur cig/ ces btab ba'i/
smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nangan mchog tu bstan to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tuganag pa rnams kyi rnam par smani
kha na gcig tuganag la/ gcig tudakar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tudakar/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang/ 'dren ma rnams sngangs nas/
las gcig tudakar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ dus sde rnams 'di byin cig/ 'di las byin cig ces 'das zhing 'dam zhing zas bra ba dang 'drim pa 'khrugs par gyur nas/ skabs de
dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong gis 'dams shing bras btsadabar mi bya ste/ za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slonganams bsaza ba na lhung bzed bzed pa las/ de lhung bzed
kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung/ lhung bzed kyi ba/zhi bzed ba las lhung bzed dulhung nas/ de rnams 'gyod de mi za ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das/

kyis bka' stsal paM/ dge slong dag lhung ba zed bzed ba las/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na byin len byas ba zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzad ba las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa

zhes bya/ lhung bzed bzod pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzedapa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na byin len byas ba zhes bya ste/ 'onakyad byinalenagyi
sems ninyo bar gzhag par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa nyadaga' bo
mkhar ba'i mgar ba'i drung du song nas/ des smras pa/ bzhin bawas 'khar ba'i lhung bzed cig byan nus sam/ des smras ba/ 'bags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags kyis/ tshad jitsam zhig bgyi//
chana'i byago/ 'phags pa khyod la 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen bo 'tshal/ bkren pa khyod phyir med par byed du 'jug snyam nas/ rin thang bzhin spyin gyis byos shige/ des bsams pa/ 'di la bag
gi 'khar ba zhig 'god bya'o snyam nas/ des de'i 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so// des snas kha gang 'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyagyis shig/ des gzhan la byas go/ dbazhin
du nanagang yin pa bdun pa'i bar du byas nas/ de rnams tshodang ldan pa nye dga' bos/ dag tshul 'khrur bcug ste/ tshon sna lnga ba'i sku dpa las dra ba byed du bcug nus/ da rnams der bcug ste/ ko
rims kha shams nas dge tshul gyi mgo la bkur to/ gdadamagron du bos pa de 'gro'o/sonanas de dag bkram 'dug pa dang/ khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis smras ba/ 'bags paci khyod
kyi 'khar ba'i gar ba'i zung bkrag mtsho/ des smras pa/ bkren pa khyed tsishes/ 'dir ni re zhig phyi dag blang ngo// 'di ni snum khub dag go/ 'dir ni'abras chan dag go/ gzhan rnams
sun tshod ma dag glang go/ de nams kyis snus ba/ phogs ba gal te de lta na go/ res 'ga' tshod ma mang bo dag 'byung bas/ gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang nyapar gzhag dgos so zhes bya sa kha dang/
decang mas b.ra'adug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ com ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ rtsom ldan 'adas kyis dgongs pa/ nyis dmagis gang cung zad
sha byung ba ni/ ge slong rnams 'khar ba'i lhung bzed 'chang ba las gyur gyis dalta bas na dge slong gis 'khar ba'i lhung bzedabacang bar mi bya'o// 'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// kha gzar
dang tshwakhug dang/ bul ba'i btung phor nim gtogs so// 4 sdomani rkang pa bkru ba bkag pa dang// chol zangs dag ni gnang ba dang// de bzhin bsal yapa nyid dang ni// sbrang
wA ma rnams la g.yab ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams bab bab tu da nga pa

'khru ba der sbrang bu dag gis gang bar 'dug go/ jitsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang ltar 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sbrang bu zi khri mchibs gang ba'i phyogs 'di/
zhage/ da slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis 'di'i rkang pa bkrus so// de dag 'phya ste/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang sbra ma de/ bab bab turkang pa 'khru'o zhes pa'i skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang ba bab bab tu bkru bar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang gnas khang gi stang shar lho'i mtshams
u rkang ba bkru ba'i gnas bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang pa bkru ba gnas bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis ji lta bu bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba/ a phral lta bu r 'o// rab tu'ajam par byed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub po bya// dge slong rgas pa/ 'khogs kha/ nyam chung ba de dag phyogs der 'gro mi nus ba
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis gyolo nyabar gzhag par bya'o// dge slong rnams gyo mo 'khru ba na de chag nas/ jamarung bar gyur ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
tsho ba zangs nye bar gzhug par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chol zangs na bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis gsar dang/ dbus dang/ ba zhusnyadang/ shel las byas
pa'i chol zangs dag zhabar gzhag go/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phags pa 'daci zhig/ de rnamasakyis sbas pa/ bzhan bzangs dag bcom ldan 'adas kyis chol zangs gnang
ngo 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod ba'i yon tan dag gis gnod dam/ de dag gis snyas pa/ khyed kyi mgrin par rdog bas gnonato// dedag 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan nas so bar numakha/ gsar dang/ dpu'u dang/ shel dang/ bi num las byas pa'i chol zangs dag bar gzhag par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang 'ji
[ra/ ]@#// ba las byas ba'i chol zangs nye bar gzhug par bya'o// rje mo lta bu habar gzhag ba dang/ de ldog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la ba/ glang po che'i rkang pa lta bu r bya/
nang pa'i dbus su 'bu ka dag ba'i mi tog lta bu bya'o// shin tu'adzam bor byas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adus kyis bka' stsal pa/ cu ba bor bya'o// dge slong rnams chol zangs bab bab tu'ajog
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang thog tu khas bub la zhog ga/ gang zag dag gi ni gnas khang gi sgo lkog tunog cig sangs u0fb1sa bcom ldan 'das yul
ko'u sham bi na sgra len gyi kun dga' ra ba nabazhugs so// dpyid kyi yul la bab nas/ dge slong rnams tshobs lcaste/ de dag lus skya bo bsang bas bor gyur cing/ rka9 nyam chung/ shig shig
rdzu bo red nyams par gyur pa khyim bdag dang bras tha rnams kyis mazlong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed ci'i slad du lus skya bo bsang khasong bor gyur cing/ ko nyam chung shag shage po/ rnyed nyams
ba'agyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur ba bsnyadapa dang/ de rnams kyis snas pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed bsil yab ma'acha nga dam/ bzhinubazangs dag bcom ldan 'adas kyis ma gnang ngo// 'thags/
ba dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje kun yin pa ga gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na gnang/
0 gis pasal ya la bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsal yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ drag rdo rnams kyis yu ba gsar dang/ dngul dang/ shel dang/ bsnyun
las byas pa/ bsrubs pa/ bkru ba dang/ nyib bkra ba'i yu ba canagyi bsal yab dag bcangs pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas/ khyed kyi mgrin pa ldog pas
gnato/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldanu'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u kha gsar dang/
dngul dang/ bzhurU dang/ shel las byas pa/ bsrubs ba/ bkra ba dang/ rtabar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi khas la a ba dag nyer bar gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bsal yab gnyis
bo rtsa bal ba dzalas byas pa dang/ shing ta la'i 'dab ma bcang bar bya'o// bram grwa dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la bsil la rnam ba sna tshogs 'bul ba nazhes bya ba'i bar snga ma
bzhin no// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na gnangags/ dag 'dun gyi phyir bcu nga bar bya'o// sangau rgyas bcom ldan 'das mas pa cananasde'atshung
gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams la sbrang ma dag sra sta/ de dag gi lus sbrang mas thos pas/ 'brum bus gang ste/ de dag gis yang dang yang du phrugs pa dang
d+ha@#// khram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dgu khyed ci'i phyir lus 'di ltar 'bras bus gang/ de dag gis rje ltar gyur ba bsnyad pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
'a 'phags pa dag khyed sbrangagab ma 'chang ngam/ bzhan bzas dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong
rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ sbrang ab bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrang yab bcu nga bar bya'o zhes
kha kan stsal ba dang/ drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gsar dung/ dngul dang/ bon dang/ shel las byas ba dang/ rngam las byas pa bsil ba dag zhabar gzhag pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
rnams zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// sbrang yab ni lnga ste/ b.lalas byas pa dang/ sha na las byas pa dang/ ras bal las byas pa dang/ ras sna dang/ lo ma sbams pa'o// 3
sdom ni gos mdud pa dang lus dpan// 'khar ba dra ba 'chang ba dang
sgog skya dag ni bkag pa dang// nad ba la naganang ba 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
zhig 'dug ba sa/ de mdoms thang ba mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pas bdag gis pho lags par gdod =la le/ de gnong nas cang mi sla bar 'dug pa'i
skabs do/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gos mdud pa ma bor bskyed
du skad la 'jog pa las gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dge slong mkhar lan byed pa gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan byed du gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong
dag de lta bas nadage slong stongs mo byed pas gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
dge slong rnams gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan byed ba na/ ma dad pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa ci stobs 'byed dag/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhun bzangs dag ma khar ldan byed do//
de dag cad ma smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ ga slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol ba/ gang dag skasal 'jog ba de dag gis
mdud pa dor bar bya'i/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byedakyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nabazhugs so//
drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa bdag cag ni zhig ba ma dang/ bu dang/ chung ma'i slad du khur thogs/
ka na khyedasu'i smad du lus kyis khur bsnams/ de dag gis smras ba/ bzhin bzangs dag bdag cag la yang ston pa mchod pa dang/ dga' dunabashes gsol ba dang/ nadab rnams kyi ris
sgrol ma la bcas pa' dang/ bya ba mang po yod de// de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
skul kha/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bskur bar ma bya'o// khyer na 'gal tshabs nun du 'gyura'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung bo rol
bzhugs so// dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung bo'i ri la 'phrog cing 'bab ba na/ de dag 'gred cing brtag 'chos khe snyad par gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba cang bar bya'o zhes bka'
sul ba dang/ drug sde rnams kyis gsar dang/ dngul dang/ ba zur dang/ shel las byas pa'i 'khorab/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba 3 nye bar bkra ba dag bcangs pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
kyis mthong nas/ 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag de lta bas na gnyis kyis 'khar kha
bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas tanyamachung ba dang/ nad pa sbyor mi nus pas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan pa rna tanyam chung ba dang/ nad pa sbyor
mi bzod pas so zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ rgan por gtogs pa dang/ nad par gtogs pa rnams kyang 'khar ba 'chang ba la zhugs pa dang/ panyo lnga'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgan po
dang nad pas/ dge 'dun la 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing/ gang la dag 'dun gyis 'kha ba'i sdom pa phyin pa des 'khar ba cang bar rla'o// sa/sel ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas
mal bshamAs la/ gat+tA brdungs dri sa pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas/ dge 'dunathams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/
nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas/ rgan pa'i mthar cog tsog pur 'dug la thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skadaces smra bar bya// ngag 'dun btsunapa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dag
slong rgan po rgas tanyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun thugs brtsa ba canabatsunapa rnams kyis thugs
brtse bas nye bar bzung sta/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas nyam chung ba ma/ nad pa sbyor mi bzodapa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/
de bzhin du lan gnyis lanagasum gyi bar du'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya sta/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas tanyam
chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor ma babrodapa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dunalas 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol ti/ gal te dag 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
tshu mdzod cig dang/ dag 'dun gyis dge slong nas panyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor ma bzodapa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la/ 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di
ltar bya ste// dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgyas pa der nyam chung ba 'am nadapa sbyor ma bzod pa chung 'di dang bdag zhes bgyi ba/
[” ]dga' dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom
ba stsol na/ tshadang ldan pa gang dag/ dge slong rgan po rgas nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la/ 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag mecang
ma gsung zhig/ gang dag ma bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzodapa ming 'di
zhes bgyi ba la/ 'daparab 'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ de ltar cang mi gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang la dag 'dunagyis 'khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des 'khar ba bsung
bar bya ste/ 'dil 'gyod par mi bya'o// kabam bo drug pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po 'di la bzhugs so//
dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang/ rlung nad can rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa dang 'bab pa na/ 'gred cing brdeg 'chos nas sna da bar yang gyur/ bya ma bum dang ral ba spyi
blugs dag kyang chag go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar
bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud b.las byas pa'i dri ba bcangs pa dang/ bram tre
dngakhyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya khar byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka sul pa/ tshon sna lnga ba'i
skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang tshon sna gcig pa las byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna gcig las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka'
sha stsal pa dang/ sgos pas nyom chung bar gtogs pa rnams dang/ rlung nad can du gtogs pa rnams kyang dra ba 'chang ba la zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang rlung
nad can gyis kyang/ dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing/ gang la dag 'dun gyis drab 'i sdom pa byin pa des dra ba bcang bar bya'o// gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshas
lag[]brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus pa'adug pa dang/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/rlung nad can gyis rgan pa'i
mthar tsog tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba
a rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can rnams kyis thugs brtsa brtse bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas
taham chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can minga'adizhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas/ las bya sta/
dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan kho rgas nyam chung ba ma/ rlung nad canamang 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun
gyi dus la bab 'di bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can mang 'dazhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sgrom pa
gsol to/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni'adiltar bya ste/ dag 'dun btsun rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgyas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can mung 'dizhes bgyi ba/ dag

'dun las dra ba'i sdom ba gsol to/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'tsha/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshodang ldan pa gang dag dag/

slong rgan po rgas de nyam chung ba la/ rlung nad canamang 'dazhis bse ba la dra ba'i sdom ba stsal bar bgrod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ ga nga dag ma babrod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dunagyis
brjod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dunagyis dge slong rgan po rgas tanyam chung ba ga/ rlung nad can ming 'dizhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang ma gsung bas de de bzhin du
gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin bar gyur ba des dra ba bcang bar bya sta/ 'di la 'gyodabar mi bya'o// dge slong gzhan dag cig la 'khar ba yong dgos/ drab
mang dgos nas/ dadag la dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba dang dra ba ba'i sdom pa so sor byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la kha/ 'khar ba dang dra ba'i sdom pa
cig cazhusnga ma bzhin sbyin par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyanayodan rgyal bu rgyal khyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dag
slong zhig 'dug pa des sgog skya zos nas/ dekhacom ldan 'das ga la ba derasong ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo dos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong/ dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis rnagatod la 'dugacig/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
phyogs gcid yu'adug go/ com ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan par brtsams te/ ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan de lta de ltar dge slong de/ bcom ldan 'das la dris
gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas kha gas shig tu lta'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la'adi skad cos/ dge slong/ dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis/
rnagatod cig ces bka' stsalan/ dge slong de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang kha gzhan du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalate/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
sbyan snga nas song to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni khyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' ba la chas pa// kun dga'
po ci'i phyir ngas ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de kha gzhan du lha/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa dge slong des sgog skya 'tshal to// kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang gis na bden pa
rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur ba sgog skya khra ba lta/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so// kun dga' bo gal de dge slong 'dis de ring sgog skya zos par ma gyuran/ dang nyid du 'das 'jig tshogs

la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba yongashes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na dge slong gis da phyin chad sgog skya dang/
sku 'dod dang/ ka'u yongs su longs spyod par mi bya ste/ yongs su longs spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang de'i/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/
'dug pa des bsams ba/ dge slong 'dis de ring bden pa dag ma mthonganaro zhig sangamathong bar 'gyur ram blta'o snyam nas/ sams ba la zhugs pa dang ma mthong ngo// des rab kyi mtha'i
pa'i bsam gtan bzhi ba la rnam bar bltas nas/ dus jisaMm namathong bar 'gyur ba sems pa la zhugs na 'onakyang ma mthong ste/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/
tshigs su bcad de snus ba/ dal ba'i mchog 'di'adis bor nas// 'di yis 'di na bde ba dag/ nam mad shin tu mthong ba ni// ma 'gyur ba yi gnas de yod//
ka nganas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ris mas mkhyen nas/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi tshul la lag 'jug par ma byed
cig 'din 'di nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul las 'das pa'i dus na/ da bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
nob bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyenab/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bril gyis gnon ba
zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyurago/ de skad ces gsungs nas/
zla bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang byung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag sgog skya rtsa ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar mi bya// za na 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi sa sgog skya bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong zhig bde sman pa'i drung du song stand mdacig ces byas nas smras pa/
bzhin 'brangs ba la nad 'di lta bu zhig byung na/ sAn ston cig/ snyanabs smras pa/ 'bags pa sgog skya gsol cigarang khyed sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom/
ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so// skabs de dge slong rnams la stsas so// dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
lab/sol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ gal te sman pa dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod
par ma bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pas sman pa'i lung gis sgog skya baba' ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong nad pas sgog skya thos nas/ gtsug lag khang la yang longs
