spyod pa byed/ gnas mal dang/ snum phyi sa dang/ chab khung du yang 'jug/ dge 'dun gyi nang du yang 'gro/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongasangashing lhags pa rnams la lung chos ston//
mchod rten la yang phyag byed/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'ang dbar 'gro/ spyod mos tshal dang/ 'dun sa dang/ lha khang dang/ skye bos gang ba'i phyogs gzhan dag tu yang
'dug pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dri tshoranas/ 'phya smod kha zer zhing/ dag sbyongashAkya'i bu'i rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshulanyams/ tshangs ba'i tshul nyams te/ da/
ni rang 'byung ba rnams sgrog skya za 'ozhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skul ba/
nga dge slong sgog skya za ba kun tu sbyang ba'i chos bca' bar bya sta/ dge slong sgog skya khra bas sgog skya za bzhin du gtsug lag khang la longs su longs spyod par mi bya/ gnas mal la ma yani/
snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya/ chab khung sar ma yin/ dag 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar ma bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mkhya/ mchod rtenal phyag mi
bya bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du skye bar 'gro bar mi bya/ skyad mol tshal dang/ 'dun sa dang/ lha khang dang/ skye bos gang ba gzhan dag tu gnas bar mi bya'i/ phyogs dbe ba gang du

gzhan dag gis mthong na/ tshadad pa skye bar ma 'gyur bar bza' bar bya'o// gang gi tsho bya ba zin bar gyur ba de'i tsho phyogs de nyid du zhag bdun 'dug par bya'o// sku 'dong na ni zhag gsum/ ka'u nan
k+Sha zhag gcig go/ de nas khrus byas la/ chos gos dag kyang bkru bar bya zhing/ bdug pa dag gis bdug bar bya'o// de nas dri nga ba med pa dang/ gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya zhing/ ji ltar
bgag pa yang bya'o// sgog skya za ba'i dge slong gis kun tuphyud pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs tem gnas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// phran tshogs la sgo dang po
kabasdus pa'i sdom ni/ chan pas 'dreg dang gdugs dang ni// be'u ras dang ni rgyan sprul ma// len drung sogs dang khrus dang ni// gcin dang sgo 'bar u0f38
ba'o// sdom ni chan pas 'dreg dang mAdoms dang ni /de bzhinabyin pa nyid dang ni// khro dang rtswa stan gcig dang ni// khyim na gnas dang bge ba min// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ gang gi tsho khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de tsho/ des 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu brags shig ces 'dreg mkhan gyi ma btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// nye dga' bos
sbyas pa/ bzhin bzang khyod sku chan pas 'dreg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so// bzhin bzangs gal te de lta na tshur shog bregs shig/
dos sku chan pas bregs pa dang/ nyidaga' bos sa pa/ da dung bregs shig/ des yang bregs pa dang/ des smras pa/ da dung yang bregs shig/ des yang bregs so// de bzhin du
jim nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/ de'i 'og tu'adi skad ces smras te/ bkronab khyod ci yang mi rishes pa zhig 'di kho na bzhin mnyam par byos tasong zhagaces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin
nong bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mi bya'o// dge slong skra chanapas 'dreg na'agal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mkhye'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gamago la rma byung nas spu gris reg pa na/ de dag snad pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom
ldan 'das la bag sol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rna'i than kor gyi sku chan bas breg bar bya zhing/ lhag ma rnams spu gris breg par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// denus mang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyigyis 'dreg mkhan gyi mi btang ste zhes bya ba'i bar
snga ma bzhin no// bzhin bzangs mdoms kyi phyogs kyi sku 'dreg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so// bzhAnabazangs gal te de lta na tshur shog bregasangashagi/
'bags pa ji 'dra bar brag/ khazhin bzangs mdzes par bregasazhag/ des breg par borams pa dang/ gdags smras pa/ bzhani bzangs 'di ltar byos shig/ des de bzhin byas pa dang/
! mang smras pa/ gzhan 'di lta bu r yang byos shig ces des de tsamanyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/ dag sbyong shAkya'i sras rnams kyi dag sbyong gi tshul ninyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul nitams te/
da ni gsang ba'i phyogs kyi sprul ba 'dreg par byed do/ zhes smod par byed/ gzhig 'phyas khyed/ kha zer bar byed ba'i skabs de// dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o// dge slong mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spyi 'dreg par byed 'gal tshabs ca na du 'gyur ro//
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyis brag par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gi mdoms kyi phyogs su ma byung ba dang/ dge slong dag 'gyod nas spu u0fa9'dug
param byed do// dge slong gzhan dag la yang srin bu byung ste/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba mi nus pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la bstan nas/ rma'am srin bu'i phyir ni mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
'dreg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// bzhin bzangs khyod byan spu 'dreg shes sam/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag ga bzo lags so// bzhin bzangs gal te
de lta na tshur shog khrigs shage/ 'phags pa ci 'dra bar brag par bgyi/ bzhan bzangs mdzes par bregs shig/ des theg par brtsams pa dang/ 'daga' bos
snus pa/ bzhin bkras 'di ltarabyosangashig/ des de bzhin byas pa dang/ yang smras pa/ gzhan 'di ltar yang byos shig/ des de jisaMm nam sros kyi bar du ma btang bas/ khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la zhes bya ba nas/ dras bzhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ de smed par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ com ldan
'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasalapa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis byin sa brog pa de ma bya'o// dge slong byin pa 'dreg par byed na'agal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs banyanAnan+de'u dzing gi 'gram khang pa btsugs pa na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag sbyong gis khyen sa breg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/
dge slong rnams kyi bar la rnabyung zhing/ dge slong gzhan dag la srin bu byung nas/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs bya bar mi nus par gyur pa'i skabs do/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmabyung ba'i phyir ram/ srinakhu'i phyir na byinasku blug par bya ste/ 'di lo'agyod par mi bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drag rdo rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed cing/ de dag der nyal nas ku re byed/ rtsi bar byed/
tsatso smra bar byed/ rgod ba dang/ 'phyar g.yang dang/ lus la rdog bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dgo slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/
nyes dmigs gang cung zadabyung ba ni/ dge slong rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byedapa las gyur bas/ de'i phyir dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig khri be cig la nyal du ma gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/
dge slong rnams la bka' sulo pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phyin chad/ dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ jitsam na dge slong mang bo rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong// ljongs rgyu ba na ri brags shag tu phyin nas/ de dag gis der khri brnyas
pa dang/ de dag gis khri dgu byin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di dag tungs kyis/ gzhan yang snyoms te spyon cig/ de dag gis sbas pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag ni khri re la
skya bo mang po dag nyal bar bgyi na/ khyed gzhan yang g.yor ram/ re re la gnyis sam gsum gzims par mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la
gnyis sam gsum nyal du ma gnangan/ ji ltaranyal khar bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khri gzhan na ma mchis so// de skad smras pas cang mi smra bar 'khod
ba'i sgobs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong gang dag ngotshashes shing 'gyod pa daldan l bslab pa 'dod pa de
dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag sta/ gding ba btang la bar du chos gos kyigatur bu ma/ lhung bzed kyi snod dag bcug lanyal bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// khri la ji lto bar/
cu stan dang gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// da/
slong mang bo rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang/ ri brags shag tu phyinanas/ de rnams kyis khyim bdag cig las bste gnas b.ras so/ grang ba'i dus la bab bas de rnams kyis gos bsnyas
pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di dag ni rab byung ba yin no snyam sta/ snying rje nyibar bzhag ste gos dag khyin pa dang/ gang gis gang thob pa des de gyon te nyal nas/ dge slong
gzhan dag grang bas sprobs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang gas gang thob pa de dag nyid kyis
bgo ba'am bya'i/ thams cad kyis go khar bya ste/ gcig da par gyur pa gang yin pa des thams cad kyi snying du rgan rims bzhin tsam yog pa dga' bar bya'o/ jitsam na yang ri brags
gzhan zhig tu song ba dang/ gos gcig cag rod nas/ de dag gi snyad du g.yogs pa na/ nyi dgas de gyon te 'chag tu song ba dang/ ga slong rnams grang bas sdug bsngal ba gyur nas smras pa/
btsunab nyadaga' bo bdag cag ni grang bas sdug bsngalan/ byed 'ba' zhig gyon nas 'chag gam/ des smras pa/ kho bos bkag gam ci/ khyed kyang ci phyir ma 'og/ donams grang ba'i
sdug bsngal gyis mtshan 'das par gyur pa'i skabs de ]dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'chag pa gang yin pa des
gangag ga gis bgos te bcag par bya'o// gzhan gyis 'chag na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ grang ba'i dus la bab pas/ dge slong rnams grang ba'i gnod pas gros bab ste 'gu go/ dzitsam na khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin gtsug lug
khang du 'ongs pa dang/ des de dag mthonganas sbas pa/ 'phags pa dag ci'i slad du gcig tu brtson pa'i gsung rab la gros bab sto bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs dag mi mdzado/ de dag gas
brgya gcig
smras pa/ khyim bdag bde ba dang ldan pa dag ni chos dranabar 'gyur gyi/ kho bo cag shin tu grang bas sdug bsngal ba gyur to// des khyim du song nas khe'u las lnga ba
bskur ba dang/ dge slong rnams kyis byis pa'i gos de dag khagos// bya rol tu dong ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas co 'dri zhing snus pa// 'phags pa dgaci khyed babs sam/
de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis gang bar gyur nas bgyis kyis/ tshodang ldan pa dag de skad ma zer cig/ de rnams snod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dwa/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi bya'o// de lta bu'i rkyenazhog khyung na/ stong du gos ngur smug gis g.yogs nas bgo bar bya'o//
dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhinadu gyon par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni 'og zhugs bcug nas stong nas g.yogs bgo bar bya'/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro// stol ni gdugs dang 'jig rtenargyung 'phan dang// bsdu bas sbyar de bzhin nags mad dang// gnas yod par ni lam dag dang// lab bgos pas ma bcag pa'o/
byas shi byas shing 'tshong bar byed do// dus gzhan zhig na des gas mang po med par gyur nas/ des bsams pa/ thabs ji lta bu zhig byas na/ dus bsod nams kyang 'thob cing dpa
yang 'grub par 'gyur snyam pa dang/ dadad ba can zhig bas/ de'i blo skyes te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyanadrangs la/ gos kyi gdan bshams te/ bdugs tshod
gsol go/ de ltar byas na gos kyang longs su spyadapar 'gyural/ gos yongs su longs spyad pa dang/ zhal zas longs su longs spyad pas bsod nams chen po lang 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du
gnas sa rgyus las gsal bas na rgyal dag pa ge nas/ sa gsargyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod lan drangs nas/
zhal zas gtsang zhing bsod pa bshams te/ gdan dag gi steng du gos bting ngo// sa/ rtsa 'gag ga 'dra ba'agan 'dzibasod goms pa
dras so/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na/ rgyunom pa lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms 'dren te/ lngagangazhin/ nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed par gyur pa dang/ lha rnams
la chos ston bzhed par gyur pa dang/ nad pa gzigs bzhid par gyur pa dang/ gnas mal gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang/ nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o//
don 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms dwangs
ka so dge slong rnams lam kar char pa bab nas/ de dag gi gos char pas gshor bzhin du 'khod pas/ gang gi gos kyi 'dra bas 'khodapa/ de'i da lo lta bu'i sbra sbre byung bar gyur ba/ bram ze des
mthong ba dang/ 'khrugs nas smras pa// bdag gi zopa 'di lta bu dgazong du mi rung bar bgyis gyis/ gos 'di dag khyed thal byung snoms shig ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis// bco
ldan 'adus la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze des ma dad pa skyes nas byin pas blang bar mi bya'o// de 'khrugs pa de dang bral nas/ yang des dad pa'i
sems kyis phul ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag da ni bram ze des dad pa'i sems kyis phul bas
ny+tsa blang bar bya ste/ blangs nas kyang rung ba byas la bgo bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis blangs pa dang/ bram ze des smras pa/ oM ma'o'aphags ba dag gdugs bcang ba'i rigs so// skabs de dge slong
dag gis// bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalastsal pa/ gal tade lta na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba gsar dang/ dngul dang/ be zhumyudang/ shel las byas shing/ gzhan yang bkra zhing
chab r bkrakha dang/ bsrubs pa las byus la/ gdugs nidakar po dang/ rma bya'i mdongs dag las byas pa dang/ bram khri dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa
dag 'di ci lags/ com ldan 'das kyis gdugs gnang ngo// 'phags ba dag dag sbyongakhyed ci 'dod ba'i yon tan gyis ga zi ram/ gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i gdugs dag 'tshang/ de dag gis smras
pa dgra bo rnams kyi mgrin pa rtog pas mnan nas 'dodapa'i yon tan gyis gzir to// de dag stod pa byed ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu'i gdugs dag bcang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang tshu ba ru tadang lo ma las byas pa gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs rnam

gnyis bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring bo rang per byas nas/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba bskyong sa grong khyer enang du song ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag
gas mthong nas/ 'di lta bu nor can nam/ tshong dponanam/ bod dbon nam/ su zhig 'ong zhes langs nas rtog par byed do// kha cig sur dong ba dang/ gang gi tshomathong bar gyur pa de'i tshom dad
bar gyur ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// gdugs kyi rtsa ba red bo ring bor mi
bya'i/ 'on kyang gdugs kyi tshad tsam gyi rtsa ba gdags par bya zhing/ grong ga nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar ma bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ga nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o
zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ jitsam na dge slong mang bo dag don mthunadang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing deng ba dang/ bzhig na grong du lam byung bar gyur nas/ de dag gas bsams ba/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te'agro bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/ grong do bar bya'o snyam nas de dag bas grong spangs pa dang/ don mthuna rnams dang bral bas chom pos bcom pa'i skabs de
dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gal tagrog dbus su lam byung bar gyur na gdugs klor bsal nas 'deng bar bya ste/ 'di
la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bsod snyoms kha rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ char pa bab nas char chus gas gsher bar gyur pa'i skabs do/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bsod snyoms pas gdugs kyi rtsa ba rung bar byas nas 'jug bar bya ste/ zhugs nas gal tachar ba chad na/ gdugs khyim dang bor bzhag
la 'jug par bya zhing/ de nas phyir glas te 'gro bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal ba rgya khyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// lho

phyogs kyi yul nas kun tu rgyu 'gi rten rgyang 'phenapa 'char ba zhes bya ba zhig ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du 'ongos so// de ngal bso nas tshadang ldan pa kun shes ko'u da drug la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa//

kyi dge slong kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i a ga cung zad yod de/ de'i phyi rikhyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do// des de la lcas pa/ bram ze kho bo smra ba don duganyer ba ma in gyis song zhig/
de dang ldan pa lta thul dang/ bzang bo dang/ rlangs pa dang/ mang chen dang/ grags pa dang/ gang bo dang/ srimad dang/ ba la bdag dang/ lag bzas ga la ba der song ba dang/ de

rnams kyis kyang de kho na skad smras so// de nas tshadang ldan pa shA ra'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas snas pa/ kyi dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ga cung zad blangs pa dag yod// de'i phying khyod dang lhan
cig gtas bya bar 'dod do// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsags pa/ phyi kun tu rgyu 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te mad sum na/ yod bar mthong ngo// su lu ga las brtags na/ bdag nyid
la'o ci bas 'dul bgazhan cung zad yodadam snyam na/ mod par mthong ngo// dzitsam na tshogs pa brtags na/ zhag bdun tshun cha da kyis tshogs par shes nas smras pa/ legs pa de
bzhin bya na rag pa'i gnas ga ngadu bya/ chag mo zhig tu'o/ zla ba'i zhal chab bzhag ste/ phyogs sdom dang phyi ma rnam par bzhag nas/ sus phyogs snga ma/ sus gzugs/

ga zhes glengs pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa kA ri'i bus smras pa/ kun tugyu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin pas 'di nyid kyis phyogs snga ma tshugs shig/ kun turgyus phyogs snga ma smras pa dang/ tshadang ldan b ri'i
bus bkrus nas/ khyod kyi 'di ni mi rigs so// 'di ni mi 'dra'o// 'di ni ma 'thad de zhes skyon btags so// des yang smras pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mjug tum phyin par bzhag
go lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun tu rgyu 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa 'charapa zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du'ongs twA/ datshudang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang lhan cig brtsadanas/ deng du zhag bdun lon no zhes
kun tusgra grags ba dang/ srogs chagos brgya phrag mang po dag kha cig ni ya mtshan rgyas/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul nas 'dus pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
bsams pa/ bdag gi slakhas 'dul ba 'dus sam snyam na/ 'dus par mthong ngo// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma lus par stsas pa dang/ kun rgyu de tshar bcad do// de nas mngon
par dad par gyur ta smras pa/ btsunab ri'i bu bdag bas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la ra ba tubyung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos ko thob na/ bdag
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// detshadang ldan pa'ashAra'i bus rab tu byung/ bsan par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin no// des brtsol ba dang/ 'bad pa dang
bsgril ba byas pas/ 'khor ba'i'akhor lor lta pa ga lo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste zhes bya ba nas gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas 'khor da
dag 'phags pa shAri'i bus 'di lta bu'i skya ba chen po pham par byas so zhes shin tuya mtshan skyes so/ lu tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/
khams dang/ rang bzhin rtogs nas/ dag dang ma thunapar chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gas da thos nas// lhag pa'i khyadapar chen po thob pa 'di lta ste/ khacig
gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum dubyas/ kha cig gis nilanacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas/ dag 'dunal gzhol
zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhinano// skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag thams cad du dge slongangashAri'i
ba 'am/ shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar ma 'gyur bas/ de lta bas naganang gis/ dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'gi rtenargyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rol ba'i bstan bcos bslab bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong byis pa 'am/ rmongs ba 'am/
ga ma gsal ba dang/ mi mkhas ba dag gis kyang thams cad kyis khyad par yod par bslabs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ bas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod nus pa gang yin pa de dag gis
'ag rten rgyang 'ban pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'i/ byis pa dang/ rmos pa dang/ mi gsal ba dang/ mkhas pa dag gis nam yin no// de rnams de la brtson pa
nyid du gyur nas// bcom ldan badas kyis bka' stsal ba/ dus gsum du byas la/ dus gnyis nis ngas rgyas kyi gsung rab klog par bya zhing/ gsum pa la ni bya ril ba'i bstan bcos
dag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du byas zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong rnams lo dang zla ba'i dus dag tu slob bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag tshe skad cig ma minabs/ sa lo dang zla ba'i dus las dgongs te gsungs kyi/ 'on kyang nyin gcig la chagasum dubya'o// dge slong rnams gsal ba dus su ni phyi rol ba'i
bstanabacos 'don la/ gzhan dag tu ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab 'donanas/ bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsal ba'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab gdon par bya ste/
phyi rol ba'i bstan bcos ni ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal brgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med khras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bus bran phra'i khye'u lha sbyin dang/ ba lang 'byor gnyis rab tu byung nas/ de dag tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bus mdo sde 'don du bcug go/ jitsam dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing dong
nas ri brags shag tu phyin pa dang/ der de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chenapo byung nas/ dre gnyis der 'khod do// de gnyis sngon gsos pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsdab
sbyor dang/ tshig dang rim par sbyar nas/ kha ton du 'don no// de dag las gcig ni shi'i cig shes kyis gzhung brjed par gyur nas/ de la kha ton las byung ba'i rnyed pa mad nas/
dodar de dag tu'akhyam 'khyam nus phyir mnyan yod du 'ongs so// de nas ngal bsos te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u do rgyag la ba der song ste/ phyag byas nas snas ba/ gnas brtan/
g.yar ton dbog tugasol/ des smras pa/ bu legs so// de bzhani kha ton ga sgrub po[4]su des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang/ kha tonathung dur 'don nas smras pa//
gnas brtan khyod kyis ring por ma bton pas gdon nongs so// des smras pa/ bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so// des de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshodang ldan pa
rtal dang/ bzang bo dang/ rmongs pa dang/ mang chen dang/ grags pa dang/ gang po dang/ dram dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ lag bzongs ga la ba der song
su phyin nas// rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ gnas brtan g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/ des smras pa// bu legs so// de bzhin kha ton bslab par bya'o zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton gdon
bar brtsams pa dang/ de nas kha ton byung dur bton nas smras pa/ gnas brtanAkhyod kyis gdom nongs so// des smras pa/ bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so// des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas//

tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i kung ba la phyag byas nas/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ mkhan po gsar rten dbog tu/
gsol/ des smras ba/ bu legs so// de bzhin du kha ton bslab bo// des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang/ ji tsam na ba ton ring po bton nas/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i
bus kyang rang bo bton pa dang/ dog snus pa/ mkhan po dge slong de dag kun gyis na gdon nongs kyi/ khyod nyag gcig gas ma nyams par bton to// des smras pa/ mi blun po khyod nyid kyis
gdon nyas kyi/ dge slong dag gsi namahaMms bar bton to zhes des smyos nas/ cang mazla bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sangs rgyas kyi gsung bsdab sbyar dang/ tshig dwang ris pa sbyar nas 'don pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong
gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsdab sbyar dang/ tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas gdon par ma bya'o// dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsdab sbyar dang/ tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas 'donon
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang/ skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang/ ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig yin na ltung ba med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sta rnams rgyas pa'i gnas skabs na yong rgod bu byed pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ tshodang/
ldan pa dag khyedamago skyas kyang da dung rgodabag ma gtong ma/ dadag cad ma skye bar 'khod nas/ mtha' gcig tu dong sa snus pa/ dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can kos thag pa 'di deg
la mi dga' ba zhig bya'o zhis/ de dag de ltar glags tshol ba la brtsonapar 'bod pa na/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag dgon pa'i gnas su dongs/ bsam gtan dang klog par bya ba
dag brtsams so// de nas ga sde rnams kyis gnas gsum nas a nags mas btang ste/ ngos cig tu'adus nas bsdad ba dang/ dge slong rnams nags mas tshig ba'i gnod pa byung bas
rangs pa rings par 'bros par brtsams so// drug sde rnams kyis sbrus pa/ gnas brtan dag ci'i slad du rang rings ltar bzhud/ tshodang ldan pa dag nags kyis ma
mthong ngam/ gnas brtan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims gsungs sam calags zhes cung zad bgad pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshodang ldan po dag
khyed kyis kho bo cag la bsams bzhin du ma gsos grang/ bkren pa dag khyed de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasu la ba/ dag slogs nags mas gtang bar ma bya'o// gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
brgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong rgan po zhig dang/ gsar bu zhig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang/ rgan po la ni stod mang gi/
mo byad mngal/ gsar bu nim grangs shang chos gos gsum las lhag pa med pa zhig pas/ rgan pos smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa kho bo ngal gyis/ re zhig chos gos kyi gtur bu khyer
shog cig/ gsar bu des snas pa/ gnas brtan dkar bab par mi 'gyuran/ re zhig cung zad cig gsol ba mchis so// tshe dang ldan pa 'di la su zhig gshe smyos shig/ gnas
khartan sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun ma gzugs sam ci/ rmongs pa'i yo byad 'dis cizhig bgyi/ bzhin bzang gal te bkur ba ni re zhig rung nA/ 'di dper bya lta//
khyod kho bo'i mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon yinanam/ ca ga ngag phyir rjes su ston par byed/ decang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang/ rgan pos bsams pa// bkran pa 'di mi dga' bar bya'o snyam
mo dzitsam na de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang/ de nanub gcig kyang mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya ba'i khrims su bya ba yod de/ deganyis la gnas mal gyi zhal ta byedapas
gnas mal dag snyoms shig ces smras ba dang/ rgan bos ni blangs so// gsar bu des snas pa/ tshodang ldan pa kho bos gnas ma bcas kyis// nga gnas gsol lo zhes de dag/
nagyi gnas brtan gyi gan dusong ste/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas stsas pa/ gnas brtan bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ des sas nga/ bzhin bzangs khyod su dang lhan cig
'os gnas brtanadage slong chog mo zhig dang ngo// bzhin bzangs de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bdag 'khor dang phye'o zhes zer du 'ong gis/ song la de nyid la gnas gsol zhug da gzhan
dag ga gan du song ba dang/ thams cad kyis la de bzhin spangs nas/ nam sros rgan pa de nyid kyi gan du song nas sgo la brdabs tasmras pa/ gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo// khyod/
zhig bdag ming 'dizhes bgyi ba de lags so// khyodand med bar gyuracig/ gnas brtan gtsug lag khang 'di na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par mchis par mi bgyi ba'i
ka khrims su mdzad pa mchisan/ bdag ga gnas mdzad du gsol/ bzhin babrangs dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa lags te/ gal te ma mdzad na kho bos 'char gzhug pa
zhig/ de'i tshon kho bo stod mang zhing/ o byadamangab yinal/ da ni gnas btsun yin nam/ khyod ma gus pa byas kyang gnas stor ba gang yin pa de la gnas chos shig/ de spobs pa mo ba
gyur nas/ cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ de'i gnas bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas
la med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar ma bya/ dge slong gis seng ge bzhinu gtum por ma bya/ dge 'dun gyis kyang/ dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i khrims bca' bar mi bya ste/ dge slong ba/
ma bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'am/ seng ge bzhin gtum por byed dam/ dge 'dunagyis khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na/ thams cad 'gal tshabs canangu 'gyur ro// sungs/
rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhab 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong dang tshul ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ grong khyer sa dkar can du gshegs nas/ sa dkar can na gnod sbyan ba ku la'i gnas
na bzhugs so// denas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo nam sros te/ mun ganag cing khad kyis cung zad al cung zang char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba na/ bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa
sadzad do// chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nam 'agling ba dge slong rnams ni/ rjesrid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nang du'ang dag 'jog la ma bzhugs pa de srid
du yang dag 'jog la mi 'jug go/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i Tishes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des bsams pa sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer sa dkar can na//
sa dkar can gyi ri gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing/ de mtshan mo nam sros te mu gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung smad char 'bam la klog 'byung ba nA/ bla gab med pa'i 'chags
na 'chag ste/ ma la bdag der nye bar 'gro'o snyam du rag nas/ bzhur las byas pa dri gtsang khang mngon par sprul tu/ bcom ldan nag ga ler song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
'chag ba mdzad pa'i zham 'bring na 'chag nying 'dug go/ de'i yul ma ga d+hu pa'i mi rnams khye'u dur bu mo nga ba gang yin pa de dag la/ sde ba ku la'i ming gis bsdigs bar
byed do// de nas tshodang lta ba klu skyong 'disnyan du bsams te/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na adzad pas/ ma la bdag gis de la
gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs so snyam du rig nas/ la kha bzlog ste bgos nas 'chag pa'i slad du 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
ba ba ku la ba ku la/ dge sbyong nga ni gnod sbyanib ku la yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa klu skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi blun po khyod kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs par sems sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ba snyangs po dang/ bag tshab dang
bral ba ste/ de bzhin gongashegs pa la bsangs pa 'am/ zhum pa dam/ sprubrang zhes byed ba ma mnga' 'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyanem dad par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
la 'di skad kyis gsol to// btsun pa chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam/ ko'u shAka khyod sdodacig/ go pAma'i ragis ni rgya che ba yinabs/ 'di yang phyis//
rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag la ba bzlog pas gyon pa las gyur par mkhyen nas/ dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma blun po klu skyong gas la kha bzlog ste bgos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ba ku la ba ku la/ dge sbyong nga ni gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no zhes
zer te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis la ba bzlog ste bgo bar ma bya'o/ gyonan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/com ldan 'das kyis dge slo gis pa ba bzlog ste bge bar mi bya'o// gyon na
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong pa lang ga gnas na 'khod pa de dag gis der la ba'i bgo ba dag chud pa dang/ de dag langashig zhugs te/ dge slong/
rnams shig gis khros pas bad ba ma thob ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ rtsom ldan 'dus kyis bka' 'ab/ la ba bzlog sta gyer
pas 'dug par bya'o// nyal bar bya'i/ bcag par ni mi bya'o// la/ sdom ni/ be'u ras dang na ba dang// de bzhin la ba'i mchog tang na// sgrog lag sgrog rten mdud pa dang
ska rags dag ni gsum yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te dag 'dun la be'u ras grub na yang gnang la/ gang brag la yang gnang ngo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing/ snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dunal la ba grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang
ngo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 'tshe/ snga mu bzhin te/ dge
'dunal la ba mchog grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs taM/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir
zhugs so// de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ chos gos nar nas/ des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag nas/ du tshags byas pa dang/ dbram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis
mthong nas 'phya zhing/ dag sbyong 'gyo'i bu rnams ni gtsang sbra mad de/ lhung bzed bab kha ba tu'ajog go zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ com ldan 'das la gsol ba
dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis lhung bzed bab bab tshugazhag par mi bya'o// dge slong lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
'on kyang chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir chos gos kyi sgro ga mig gdags par bya'o/ dge slong rnams kyis btags pa dang/ des chos gos la nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
0 zlog zus kyis glon la thogs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis sgrog khrus kyis glan nas btags pa dang/ desgrog mdud med bas/ ma chags panyes dmIgs de nyid du gyur pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdud pa khya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na ba zhugs so//
mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te// mnyan yod du bsod snyoms ngo zhugs so// de bsod snyoms kyi
phyi rgyub na/ smad g.yogs sIl ba dang/ des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag ste/ de tshags bcos so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir/ ska rags rnam pa gsum pa/ shur bu dang/ bshur bu phra'u dang/ lcag bod bcang bar bya'o//
bam po bdun ba/// sdom ni/ stonapa sa skya gnas bzhugs bag/ rgyan spel ma dang phyang phrul can// zla gam dang na gsar sudacan// khra bo thams cad bkag pa/
yin sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das sar skyo'i gnas nan+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshogAkya mang chen gyi khyim gyi zhal ta pa dus las 'das pa dang/ ri brags
naganas pa'i spyi bo'i tshogs/ shAkya mang chen ga la ba der song sta smas pa/ khyod kyi khab kyi zhal ta pa gum na/ zhal tapa gzhan zhig bsko bar gsol// des de'i

sha drung na bram ze'i khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re zhig khyod song zhig/ ji tsaman zhal ta pa gzhan zhig btang ngo// de song nas des chos bzhin du rigs par spyad pas// dpya nar ma
dang bla skyes rab sumang par phul ba dang/ shAkya mang chenagyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dpya nar ma dang/ bla skyas 'ad ltaramang ba/ khyod kyis skye bo' tshogs la gnod par ma byas grang/
des smras pa/ rjedapya nar bu dang/ bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ bdag gis skye bo' tshogs la gnod pa bgyis pa ma lags so// des ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo' tshogs de la rmas
ba/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u 'dis/ khyed 'ga' la gnod pa ma byas grang/ rjedapya nar ma dang/ bla skyas 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ 'dis 'ga' la yang gnod pa ma bgyis so zhes
smras pa dang/ des de ri brags kyi zhal ta par bcug go/ 'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod cing/ rgyud pa dang ma mthunapa yin pas/ de la bram ze gzhan zhig gis bu mo khyen pa dang/ des de nyi ma dang/ chos/
N+NaM grangs dang/ udatsam dang sbyar nas bag mar blangs so// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dge bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod
bar byed pa las bu khye'u zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa btsas stonany+tsacher byas nas/ 'gis dang mthun pa'i mang btags so// yang de lu bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dag ba dgur spyod par byed pa las du lo
zhig btsas/ de'i bcos ston ya nga rgya cher byas nas/ mang zla ba zhes bya bar btags so// de bskyed bsrings tachen mor gyur pa dang/ de mkhas 8shing spyod lam dang 'gro 'dug 'o bze bas/ ri

khrags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de nabar gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'i
smanagyis rim gro byas kyang/ nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas/ ri brags pa des dpya nar ma dang/ bla skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad spyad thang/ skyen po gzhan dag blangs nas/ 'on kyang sos
par ma gyur nas/ de de nyid du dus las 'das so// ri khrags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya mang chen ga la ba der 'ongs tasmras pa/ rdzazhal tapa de ni gum lags so// des smras pa/ shes

ldan dag de na dpya nar ma dang/ bla skyes su phul ba yod dam/ rje te por mang dbul mod kyi/ des bro 'tshal ba la yo khyad du spyad na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas/ sbyin kho gzhan dag kyang bgyis so//
dengal de nalhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu lonasobs shig/ rjed na cung zad kyang ma mchis te/ lus par btab na/ de'i mchis brang dang/ bu po dang/ bu mo mchis ta/ da'i bu mo de mkhas
shing spyod lam dang 'gro 'dug 'o ba ze ba lags pas/ ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo' tshogs thams cad kyi yid dusatshibar gyur to// mang chen gyis smras kha/ shes ldan dag pa'i

chung ma dang bu pho dag ci dag grongal/ bu mo de 'dir khug cig/ de rnams kyis da'i chung ma drang bu bo de dag su dag btang nas/ bu mo de ming chen gyi gan du khridi do// shAkya mang tshan gyi chung ma rgan mo zhig la
zas g.yo ba dang ma tog thu ba'i las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa/ rdzobo da ni bdag shin turgas pas sug las rnam gnyis bgyid rdzo ma thog na/ zla ba 'di bdag gi dan grogs su bskor gsol/ des
dadan grogs su bskos so// des de la sbas pa/ zla ba khyod ni kun dga' ra bar songal ma tog thus shig/ ngas nAkha zas g.yo'o// de kun dga'i ra bar song nas ma tog btus te// de nas 'phreng ba legs

rgyu/ bar brgyus nas/ ming chen gyi gan du song ba dang/ des mthong nas yongs su dga' sta smras pa/ legs so zhog cig ces smras nas/ chung ma rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir sngon ni ma
togazhung la/ de ring mang par gyur/ des sbyas pa/ sdon na khyod kyi gnyen dag mchis nas/ bdag la slong ba na/ bdag gis de dag la stsal la 3 'dis nisu la yang ma stsal ba dang/ bdag ni rgas
ba sa mig tshul la/ 'di ni mig rna bas thu mkhas pa las gyur to// des smras pa/ gal te de lta na de kun dga' ra bar thong la der zhagacig/ des de kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du bzhag pa dang/ de ma/

tog ga 'phrang ba bzang po rgyud bar byed pas// da' ba 'phreng ldan ma 'phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar grags so/ dus gzhan zhig na khyim nas rang gi zan blangs te/ kun dga' ra bar song ba dang ]bcom ldan 'das
kyang bsod snyoms la gshogs so// des bcom ldan 'das sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ shin tu bde zhing rapa tu dga' bas rtogs par byed cing bsams pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon gnas lang
dag pa la bdag gis bya ba ma byas pas/ des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur par gdon ma zos so// de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'adas kyis bdag las bsod snyoms bzhedan/ bdag gis bcom
ldan 3das la dbul lo snyam pa dang/ skabs de lha bu la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen ba dang/ ma gzigs pa dang/ ma rig pa dang/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur na/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhinano// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir lhung
khazed bzed de/ sring mo khyodakyis gal te yongs su btang na/ lhung bzed 'dir byinatsag ces bka' su la pa dang/ desangashin tudad pas bcom ldan 'das la bsod soms de phul nas zhabs gnyis la/
phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi dge ba'i luga'adis/ bran mo dang dbul bor ma 'gyur bar shog cig/ dzithon na de'i pha'i grogs po bram ze mtshanamakhan zhig yodab des/ de
mthong nas smras pa/ bumo khyodag las 'ongs/ ri brags de kho na nas so// su la gnas shing 'dug/ des smras pa/ gang na skal pa chung du gnas pa na sta/ bdag
ming chen gyis bran mor bgyis so// khyod kyi pha dgar song/ gum me// ma dang mAng bo de dag gar dang/ gar mchis ma 'tshal le// zla ba khyod bran mo'i 'os ma yan na lag pa skyong nag dang blta'o//
des lag pa brkyang ba dang/ des bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi lag pa'i mthil dag la// lcags kyi 'khor lo' mtshan yod pa// bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang// rgyal bo'i
btsun mor bzhes bar 'gyur// gang gi bzhin ni rgyas pa dang// ngang pa'i rgyal po'i gdangs 'dra ba// bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang// rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur// gang gi rkang pa'i mthil
dag la// grong khyer cog dang ra babs bcas// bran gyi rigs su spyas gyur kyang// rgyal bo'i btsunamor bzhes par 'gyur// khyod ma dga' ba ma byed par song zhig dang/ khyod bran mor mi 'gyur gyi/ khyod
rgyal po'i btsunamor 'gyur ro// deganas donas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal ri dgas shor du song ba rtas kha khyer te/ gcig bu ser skya'i gnas su phyin to// de
ban tshun 'khyam palas/ ma chen gyi kun dga' ra bar son nas/ des bu mo de la dris pa/ bu mo 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba yani/ des smras pa/ lha shAkya ming chen gyi lags so// des rta/
las babs te skyas ba/ bu mo rkang ba bkrus tshulong zhig/ des shan tu myur bar rdzing bur song gyu/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis bsros pa'i chu blangs pa dang/ des rkang pa bkrus nas/ yud tsam
zhig bsdad de smras pa/ bu khyo gdong bkrus tshulong zhig/ des chu'i snying riso lag pas bsal te// chuha cang dro ba yang ma yin/ hacang grang ba yang ma yin pa blangs nas/ des gdong bkrus
so// des yang snus pa/ bu mo btung dgos kyis tshulong zhig/ des chu rnam par glongs te/ chu bsal ba lo ma'i snod du blangs pa/ rgyal bos 'thungs nas smras pa/ bu mo kun dga' ra ba
'din po bu gsum yod dam cin/ khyed kyis tshurnam pa gsum khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha 'ad na rdzing bu gcig kho na mchis kyis/ gsum na ma mchis so// des smras pa/ 'o
na khyod kyis tshurnam pa gsum ga las khyer te 'ongs/ des ji ltar gyur pa kharjod pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ dan ge'o// 'di dri bar bya ste/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer
ta'ongos/ dos snus pa/ lha bdag gis dang por chab dron po 'chol tamachis pa ni/ lha mnyel bsos par bgyi ba'i slad du'o// sad kyis tacang dro ba yang ma lags/ hacang grang
ba yang ma lags pe tshal tamachis pa ni/ dro ba dang grang ba gang lags pa dag sbyanal gnodab yang ba'i slad du'o// rnam bar glongs nas ngashani tubasal ba 'tshol ba timachis pa ni/
lha stsams pa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o// des bsams pa/ bu mo 'di nimakhas pa yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs shing mkhas pa khyodarkang pa mnye
dgos kyi// re zhig ma la chos shig des de'i rkang pa mnyes pa dang/ de reg bya dang ldan pa yin bas/ mnyes ma thag nyid du de gnyid log go/ de gnyid log pa dang/ des bsams pa/ rgyal
bo 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas/ gal te 'di gnyid log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa byas na// nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma u0f00na par 'gyur bas/ sgo gcad par bya'ogam nas/ des
ny+nyo/ sgo bcad de 'dug pa dang/ ji tsam na ga cig nas gcig tu thos te// dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba dag skyed mos tshal der lhags nas/ de rnams sgo phyi zhes zer ro// des sgo ma phye ba dang//
rgyal po ku co'i sgras sad nas smras pa/ bu mo de ci zhig/ des smras pa// lha mi dag cig cha ba sgo phye zhes mchis [︽]shang/ lha' mtshan kyang sgos so// des snas ba/ bu mo sgo 'di sus btud/
zla lha bdag gis bkum go/ ci'i phyi'i bcad/ lha bdug gi go ba la rgyal bo 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas/ gal te 'dim rnal log ba la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa bgyis na/ nges par bdag gi rje bo
la grags ba ma lags par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i slad du bdag gis chab sgo bkum mo// des snas pa/ bu mo mdzangs ma mo khyod la nga'i the tshom 'di 'dri bar bya ste/ ri zhag khyod
ming chen gyi sar 'ong smos ngashige/ des sas la/ bdag de'i mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags go/ khyod de'i mag gzhug byed ba'i bran go ma yin gyi/ khyod nges pa de'i bu ma yin gyis
drung por smyos shig/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa/ bu mo khyod ming chen gyi gan du song la/ rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes byos shog/
de myur ba myur bas song sta/ rdzobo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes smras so// shAkya mang chen gyis thos nas/ bzung ba drang/ btung ba dang/
dri dong/ 'phreng ba dag banams nas skye bo phal po chos bskor te/ kun dga' ra bar song ngo// de nas gcig la gcig byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad pas/
so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas// rgyal bos khrus byas shing zan bros nas/ gtam dag byas te/ udasaMm zhig bsdad nas smras pa/ ming chen bu mo 'di khyod kyi cor 'ong/
lha mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so// 'di khyod kyi mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ 'di khyod kyi bu mo yan gyis/ nga la byin cig/ des smras ba/ lha shAkya'i bu mo
gzhan 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na de dag bzhes su gsol/ 'dicir 'chol/ rgyal bos smras pa/ 'di nyid nga la dgos kyis/ 'ding la byin cig/ des
@#/// sdus pa/ lhagal te de lta na tshul bzhin bgyis te dbul lo// de bzhin khyos shig/ de nas shAkya ming chen gyis grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug ste/ bu mo de rgyun/
thams cad kyis klubs nas/ glang bo tshal bskyon te/ lam po che dang/ srang dang/ lam gyi sum mdo dang/ bzhi mdo dag tu grong khyer sar skya'i gnas na 'khod pa dang/ yul sna tshogs nas
lhags pa'i spyi bo'i tshogs la/ shes ldan dag nyon cug/ shAkya mang chen gyi bu mo 'phrang ldan m/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul lo zhes dral bsgrig pa byas so// de nas
de ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul bar skye bo phal po tsho rnams kyis kye shes so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ mnyan
yodadu khridapa dang/ de'ims bdag gi bus bran mo chung mar blangs so zhes thos te/ da kun nas dkris pa skyes nas bsams pa/ 'di ni nges par pha de'i bu ma yin pa 'am/ bdag gi
khod du don med pa zhig bsrel te/ 'di ltar bran mo'i khyor skyes bar gyur to snyam nas/ de yang sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang 'phrong ldan m la smras pa/ 'phrang
ldan ma songal sgyug mo' zhibs la phyag byos shig/ de song na de'i rkang pa gnyis la bsrung ba dang/ de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas/ des reg pa tsam gyis do gnyid log ste/ sad nas
khas mas pa/ bu thanama'i bu mo 'di'i reg pa 'di 'dra bas/ ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal// btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar
tshul ma dang/ 'phrong ldan ma gnyis yod de/ gang gi tsho rgyal po 'phreng ldan ma dang thabs cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ 'phreng ldan m/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ni 'di lta bu r yang gzugs bzang po/
'os dbyar tshul ma'i bsngags pa brjod ba dang/ des smras pa/ lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal bos smras ba/ marengs shig dang ring po ma thogs par mthong
bar 'gyur ro// de re ba dang bcas pas 'jug go/ gang gi rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang thabs cig 'dug pa de'i tshayang/ dbyar tshul na 3 'phrang ldan ma ni lta bu'i reg bya dang yang ldan
ba yin no zhes 'phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang/ des smras pa// lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal bos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang ring po ma thogs
par mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag rgyal pos ji lta ji ltar ya mtshonabaskyod ba de ltar phan tshun mthong bar spro bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig naso ga'i dus la bab sgyu/ nags tshal/
nashing rnams ma tog rgyas par gyur cing/ ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rlabya dang/ rnatsho dang/ ri sogs dang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal
[©]/ gyi gnas su/ rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhi gshegs so// bud med nu ma tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin bas/ skyed mos tshal de dang/
de dag tu'akhyam par brtsams pa dang/ rgyal rigs la dbyar tshul ma ngal bas/ skyo zhingasnyom par gyur nas/ shing mya ngan 'tshang la snyas pa 'dug pa dang/ jis na 'phreng ldan ms
mthong ngo// de de 'i gzugs bzang ba mthong bas/ shing gi lha mo yin no snyam du rig nas chod la rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang/ 'phrang ldan ma'i lag bas reg ma thag pa nyid du gnyid log par
gyur to// dzisaMm nargyal bos dbyar tshul ma la 'phrong ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang/ des smras pa// lha de bdag gis nam zhig na ma thong bar 'gyur lags// rgyal bos smras
ba de khyod kyis mthong ngo// lha bdag mi dranano// ngas khyed dran par bya'o// legs so// gang gis lag pa gnyis kyis khyed rkang pa la bzung ba de dran nam/ lha dalha mo 'brang ldan ma lags
ma de yin no// lta gang khyod rig bya dang ldan pa'i btsunamo de lta bu spangs te// bdag gi drung du gshegs pa de ni/ khyod bdag la nges par byams shing thugs gcugs pa lags so//
de bzhinadu'aphrong ldan m la dbyar tshul ma ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes bsngags pa brjodapar bams pa dang/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos
smras pa/ dakhyod kyis mthong ngo// lha bdag mi dran no// ngas khyod dran par bya// legs so// khyod kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang la sus te 'dug pa gang la phyag byas pa de dran nam/ lha ci
dodabyar tshul ma lags sam/ de yin no// lha gang khyod kyis btsun go gzugs bzang ba de lta bu sbangs te/ bdag gi drud du gshegs pa de ni/ khyod nges par bdag la byams shing
thugs gcugs pa lags so// skabs der ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ btsunamo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang/ 'phrang ldan ma gnyis yod de/ de dag las gcig ni
gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog yin la/ cig shos ni rig bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes phyogs su sgrar grags pa dang/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyas nas/ tha
tshom thams cad gcodapar mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun mo 'phreng ldan m dang/ dbyar tshul mas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sman pas/ gcig
nirig bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog phyagyur la/ cig shos ni gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis
las tshogs red pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du 'bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas ngashing bsags bas/ de dag nyid kyis las byas/
shAng bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor skyong bar 'gyur/ dge slongadag las byas shing bsags ba drug ni/ sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ ma'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gakhams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zani pa'i phung po dang/
khams dang/ sbyadamached dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgyuphrag rnams su yang // las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur ti// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// lus can
rnams la 'bras bur smin// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ra khrigs shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig lu
par byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtsa bar byed/ dwaga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod pas bu khye'u zhig btsas so// yang tshu bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig bcos to/ de dag bsudris shing bskyod nas chen por gyur to// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te shi nas/ bram ze'i khye'u de pha ma
dang bral bas dben pa la dga' bar gyur te/ des sring mo de khrid de dgon pa'i gnas su song nas 'khod de/ der de dag rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dag gis 'tsho bar
brtsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sprul nag po la ni nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhen/ khro ba drang/ khon du 'dzin pa dang/ 'khu ba dang/
byas ba ma gzo ba dang/ dug rno ba'o// de bzhin bud med kha cig la yang rkos dmigs rnam ba lnga yodra de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khro ba dang/ khon du 'dzin pa dang/ 'khu ba dang/ byas pa mi
gzo ba dang/ dug rno ba'o// dge slong dag de la bud med kyi dug rdzob ni 'di yin te/ 'di ltar bu med ni phal cher 'dod chags lhag par chab 'o/de'i sring mo de nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs
nus des smras pa/ ming po bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bus 'tsho ba'i rtsom thog ga grong mthar bzhud do// des de khrid de grong mthar song// de bram ze

zhig ga der slong mol zhugs so// des srung go dang lhan cig slong mo'i phyir cig car sgra phyung ba/ bram zes thus taphyir byung nas smras pa/ drang srong dag kyang chung ma dang bcas te rgyu 'am/ des
smras pa/ 'di bdag gi chung ma ma yin gyi/ sring mo'o// 'di su la byin/ su la yang ma byin no// gal te de lta na kho bo la ci'i phyiri ma sbyo/ 'di ni dam pa ma yin pa sdig pa'i chos de sngangs pa
yin no// de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas snus pa/ ming bo cibadag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bus 'tsho bar rom thog pa yod/
sum mam/ bdag gis ni ton mongs pa spang rdog thog pa'i slad du khyod la de skad brgyas kyis/ bdag bram ze 'dil stsol cig/ des smras pa/ de ni chos dang 'ag
sha bas ngas khyod sbyin par ma bya'i/ khyod nyid shes bar zad do// bram ze des de dang de'i bsam pa shes nas/ 'byor pa'i dpal chen pos de bag mar blangs tarang gi khyim du bcug go/ de nas des/
mang po de la snas pa/ ming bo tshur spyon khyod kyi khab dbub par mdzod cig dang/ thabs cig bzhugs so// des sas pa/ sring mo kho bo na'idod pa don du mi gnyer te/ khyod kyis gnang na/
rgyu rab 'byung ngo// des smras pa/ dam zhig bca' skye/ gal te khyod skabs skabs su bdag gzigs shing byon na gnang bar bgyi'o// des smras pa/ logs te de bzhin bya'o// de dus

gnang nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tubyung ngo// de dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa yin pas/ des slob dponamad por byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas te/ rang
byang chub mngon sum du byas nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag gis sring mo de la 'ong ngo zhes dam bcas pas/ de'i phyir do'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de de'i gan du song ngo// song nas
'bar ba dang/ gsal ba dang/ char 'bab pa dang/ glog 'byung ba'i tsho'aphrul dag bya bar brtsams pa dang/ so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad pa yin pa// de shing drungs pa
nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal tasnas pa/ ming bo khyod kyis chon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu thob bas/ thob go/ gal te de lta na khyod na bsod goms don du gnyer ba/
lags/ bdag kyang bsod nams don du gnyer ba lags pas/ de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs shag dang/ khyedal bdag gis bsod snyoms dbul ba bgyi'o/ des smras pa/ sring/
khyod gzhan la rag las pa yin gyi/ khyim thab la ji dris shig/ legs te de bzhin bgyi'o// des khyim thab la smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi snying po rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs grub
ba bdag nyid chen por gyur te/ gal takhyod kyis gnang na bdag gis zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drung ngo// des sbas pa/ bzang mo gal te 'di rab tu byung bar ma gyuran tu
bdag cag gis 'dod bzhin gso dgos par 'gyur na/ darab tubyung sta brtul zhugs grub pa bdag nyidi chen por gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ song la spyanadrongs shig/ des de klu
pa gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drangs so// bram ze de'i chung ma gnyis pa gzhan zhig yod pa des bsams pa/ bdag cag longs spyod thun mong las/ 'di ni bsod nams 'di lta bu
khyed na/ bdag gis ci'i phyir mi bya snyam du rig nas/ de la smras pa/ phu nu mo khyod kyi dral gang lags pa de bdag gi mong pa yang de kho na lags pas/ khyod kyis gdugs gcig
bshos gsol la/ bdag gis kyang gdugs gcig bshes gsol bar bgyi'o// des snas pa/ legs tade bzhin bgyi'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi su re mo de de'i
'a sems bsrung ba'i phyir/ zas bsod pa reg bya phun sum tshogs pa zas dman pas g.yogs te de la bstan nas/ phu nu mo khyod rjes su yi rang ba byas shig/ bdag gis ming bo la zhal
'ag+ha zas 'di lta bu gsol lo// des sas pa/ legs so// rjes su yi rang ngo// de yang de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir bras dman ba bsod pa dag gis g.yogs te de la bstan nas/
yaM bunu mo khyod kyang rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig/ bdag kyang dral la zhal zas bsod pa kha dog phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu gsol lo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
phun sum tshogs pa zas dman pas bkab ste 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni/ lha mo 'phrang ldan ma 'di nyid yin te/ dra'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis
gang rang sangs rgyas la reg bya phun sum tshogs pa zas dman pas bkang ste phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ tshorabs lnga brgyar reg khyu dang ldan par gyur te// da'i bar du yang rig bya dang
ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tugyur to// cig shes gang yin pa des rang sangs rgyus la bas dman pa kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul kha gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul/
ma kAn te/ de'i tshade'i dus na gang 'dis rang sangasargyus la zas dmanab kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ tshorabs lnga brgyar gzugs bzang bar
gyur te/ de'i bar du ang gzugs bgrang ba rnams kyi mchog gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig luganag pa yin la zhes bya ba na//

dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dus gzhan zhig na lha cho 'phreng ldan ma sems can zhugs bar gyur to// nyi ma gang la soms can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi
mal/ bram ze mdunan 'don gyi chung ma la yang sams canazhugs par gyur te/ nyi gang la soms tun zhugs por gyur pa de nyid kyi nyi ma nas sdug bsngal gyis nyenato// ji tsam na lha mo 'phreng/
ldan ma zla ba dgu lon nas/ khya'u gzugs bzung ba/ blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa zhig btsas so// de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dog
par byed pa na/ rgyal pos sas pa/ song la 'di phyi mol phul cig dang/ de nyid ming 'dogs par 'gyur ro// blon po rnams kyis de khyer te de'i gan du dong nas smras pa// lha mo lha'i zhal nas gzhon
nu'i lang ga dgas su gsol zhes byung ngo// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas dang po nyid nas bu bran mo'i bu mo 'dis/ ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes ma sbyangs sam/ blon po
dag gis smras pa/ de don 'tshal te/ lha mos 'dim bltam pa nyid nas 'phags skyes po zhes kun tu spyad pas/ 'i slad du gzhon nu'i mtshan 'phags skyes po
nas gdags so zhes/ de'i mnge 'ashags skyes bo zhes bya bar btags so// gang ga nyin par gzhon nu 'phags skyes po latsas ba de nyid kyi ma la mdun na 'don kyi bu ban+d+haMs nas/ de'i nye du dug
watho kyang khongs kha'ang 'dus nas/ zhag bdun gsumanyi shu gcig tu bcos pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs bar byed pa na/ de na kha cig gis smras
pa/ 'di gang gi nyi ma la ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyin mo nyid nas ma sdug bsngal gyis nyan cing/ skyes nas kyang sdug bsngal ba kho na yin pas/ de'i phyi khye'u'i ming ma la gnod kyis gdags so/
zhes de'i ming ma la gnod ces bya bar btags so// gzhon nu 'phags skyes po ma ma brgyad po/ nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma/
gnyis dang/ du grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad po da dag gis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar sdong/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snya lu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo
gtso bo dag gis/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma u0f97bzhin du bsrings shing bskyed do// gang gi tshad chen por gyur ba de'i tshom go bslabs te/ la gi mthar phyin nas/ brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste/
rin po che brtag pa dang/ shing brtag pa dang/ gzhi brtag pa dang/ gos brtag pa dang/ glangabo chobartag pa dang/ stabartag pa dang/ bud med brtag pa dang/ skyes pa brtag pa dag la
mkhas par gyur cing/ dbye ba dang krug pa la mkhas shing sbyod pa gsal ba/ rnam pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas te/ de rgyal bu rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ ul gyi dbang phyug
mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po cham du phab ste gnas ba rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang/
rta la bzhon pa dang/ shing rta'i thabs dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ gzhu bzung ba dang/ mdun du bsnur ba dang/ phyir bsnur ba dang/ lcags kyus bsgyur thabs dang/ zhags pa gdab
ba dang// mda' bo che'i 'phar thabs dang/ 'dzin stangs dang/ gom stangs dang/ thor tsugs dang/ rgyango nas bog pa dang/ sgra grag par phog pa dang/ gnad du thog pa dang/ mi 'tshor bar
phog pa dang/ tshabs chab dang/ dral ba dang/ dbug pa dang/ gcad pa'i gnas lnga po dag la mkhas par gyur to// khye'um la gnod kyang ma ma brgyad po dag la gtad de zhes bya ba nas/
rdzing na gnas pa'i pad bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshos bsubs te/ bram ze'i lta ba dang/ spyod lam dang/ tshul dang/ gtsang sbra dang/
spyod tshul dang/ la ba gzung ba dang/ sa thung ba dang/ thal ba blang ba dang/ o zhes bya ba dang/ b+hong zhes bya ba dwang/ nges brjod kyi rig byed dang 3 mchod sbyin gyi
rig byed dang/ snyan tshig gi rig byed dung/ srid srung gi rig byed dang/ drang srong 'ga' nas byas pa dang/ sa ShA ras byas pa dang/ sa g.yo ba'i dpyad dang/ bar snang gi dpyad dang/ bram ze'i
las kyi mtha' drug bo/ mchod sbyin byed pa dang/ mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang/ klog pa dang/ klog tu 'jug pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ len pa dag la mkhas par gyur to// jitsam dus
gzhan zhig na 'phags skyes bo dang/ ma la gnod lhan cig ri dgas bshor ba'i phyir dong ba dang/ de rtas kha khyer te sa skya'i gnas su phyin nas de dang de dag na 'khyam zhing/ ser skyu na gnas pa'i

shAkya rnams kyi skyed mos tshal du song ngo// skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis/ ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'phags skyes po rtas kha khyer te khyed kyi skyed mos tshal
du 'ongs so// de rnams mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na dus la bab pa 'di yin gyis/ 'dong de gsad do// de bzhin bya'o zhes de rnams go bgos te deng ba dang/
ts+tso kAkya rgan rabs rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ gzhon nu dag gar dong/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags skyes bo bdag cag gi skyed mos tshal du mchis te/ de
'gams su mchi'o// shAkya rgan rabs rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu dag de glo bur ba yin pa// de'anyes pa 'ga' brjod pa gyis la/ phyir log cig/ de rnams phyir logo ba dang/ ji tsam
na 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las gcig nas gcig tu bres nas/ chol zhing skyidamos tshal du 'ongs nas/ dpung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi pas skyed mos tshal kun nas
khyab par gyur ba dang/ skyedachos tshal srung ba'i mis/ sar skya na gnas ba'i shAkya rnams la snas pa/ shes ldan dag 'phags skyes po'i dbang gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnams skyed mos tshal
du lhags te/ glang po tshadang rta'i mi gtsang ba dag gis skyed mos tshal thams cad ma rung bar byas so// de rnams shin tu mi bzod pa skyes nas/ shAkya rgan po'i tshig bcag ste 'a pags skyes pa
gsad pa'i phyir dong ba dang/ 'phags skyes pos 'di ltar ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams bdag gsod du 'ong ngo zhes thos nas/ des ma zhig bzhag ste smras pa/ kye skyes bu nga gud du 'gros/
khyod kyis sar skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ci zer ba de nga la zlos shige/ sar skya na gnas ba'i shAkya rnams skyed mos tshal du 'ongs pa na/ 'phags skyes pa mi snang nas/ de rnams kyis mi de
la bran mo'i bu de gar song zhes dris pa dang/ des smras ba zos tamachis so// de dag las kha cig gis smras pa/ de gal te bdag cag gis mthong bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis de'i lag
ba bcad par 'gyur ro/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ gal te bris par ma gyur na/ de kho bo cag gas rkang pa bcad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gis smras pa/ kho bocag gas

ni thams cad kyi thams ca da du srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba zhig nA/ gal te bros na da diltar bya/ de dag gis glu ma rnams la khasgo ba/ spyod mos tshal phyag bdar byos la/ bran mo'i bus phyogs gang du
bcags pa'i phyogs de'i sa dag b.ral/ sa gzhan gyis khong zhig/ rtsig pa'i phyogs gang la brten pa de dag kyang zhal khogasal/ gzhan gyis khyugs shig/ 'o ma'i chus chag chag thob la/
gros chus thob sto/ sridang ma tog la sogs pas kyang shin tu thun sum tshogs bar byos shig/ das de bzhin du byas so// de nas ma nges ji ltar gyur pa dag mthong nas 'phags skyes po'i gan
du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ 'phags skyes pas smras ba/ kA la skyes bu ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ci zer/ lha ji skad mtshab lha la gsol/
ba'i rdzom thog sta/ de na de dag nyid la gyur cig/ kA ya skyes bu do yang shes pa tsam du lus sbyos shago/ des de dus kyis 'chub r rtogs nas rgyas par bsu ba dang/ des nang ma rnams
la snus ba/ shes ldan dag gang gi tshong lab 'das targyal por gyur pa de'i tsho/ ngas de dag srog dang bral ba gang yin pa de kho na thog mar bya dgos kyis/ khyed kyis ji ltar gyur pa 'di
thams cad skul cig dang/ sa ser skya na gnas pa'i rnams kha gdag go/ de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs so// mal gnod kyis smras pa// legs so legs so// lha khyod kyis
kyang de ni gdon ma 'tshal bar bgyi 'tshal te/ dag ba rnams ni dem bcas pa la brtan pa lags so// des smras pa/ da dus tsam zhig nargyal por 'gyur ba der nga zhes so// mtshal
gnod kyis sbas pa/ de ltar ma 3gongs shig/ rgyal po bgres pa ni ring bo ma thogs par lha nyid du gshegs khos/ khyod nyid rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'dod pa bstan bas na sdig pa'alas
mi bya bci yang mad pas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la blon po lnga brgyayodapa las/ 'phags skyes pos blon po rnams dang dbye bar brtsams pa dang/ spyod pa'i bu rade po ma gtogs
pa thams cad kha phyin to// blon po'i mchog de ni bo la yang da ba man bas kha ma phyin to// datsam dus gzhan zhig na sbyod pa'i bu radi bo bya ba zhig ga phyir/ 'phags skyes po'i gan du song ba/
dang 'phags skyes pos rgyal po gsal rgyal gsad pa'i sbyor bas/ spyod pa'i bu ring ba la ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la/ sa sha glan par bya na/ nga nam rgyal bor 'gyur ba smos
shige des smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du bsodonams ma lags pa skyed par mdzad/ rgyal bo bgres po naring ba ma thogs par lha nyid du gshegs te/ rgyal bo gzhan mi 'gyur gyi/
nyid 'gyur ro// spyod pa'i bu ring po de ni ngas bgam par khyod kho nal snas kyis/ khyod kyis u la yang smra bar mi byago/ lha bdag gis ma 'tshal tam ci/ su la yang/

dziltar brjod par bgyi zhes smras te song ngo/ deb tshobcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ shAkyi rnams kyi grong rdal ma tshutshud zhes bya ba na bzhugs to/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgya la

bzhen pa bzang bo la zhon te/ kha lo sgyur ba spyod pa'i bu ring po dang ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ grong khyer zhig tu phyin nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis dgon pa'i nags 'dab bas mtha'i gnas
mal dben pa skye bo sdig can dang bral po/ mi chig rkya thub bas so sor bstan pa// nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa mthongang// mthong nas/ yang spyod pa'i bu ring pol snyas ba/ spyod pa'i
bu rade po bcom ldan 'das de dgon ba nags 'dab bas mthaganas mal dbanapa skya bo sdag ba can rnams dang bral ba/ ma chig rkya thub pas so sor ba ston la/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun
pa 'di lta bu na bzhugs te/ der rdzas bcom ldan 'das de la res 'ga' bsnyen bkur byas na/ ringabo bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs jig khyodakyis thos sam/ lha bdag gis thos te/
bcom ldan 'das ni shAkya rnams kyi nan/ shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal ma tsungudazhis bgyi ba na bzhugs so// ring po shAkya rnams gyi grong rdal ma tsu ru dazhis bya ba thag ji srad yod/ lha rgyang
grags gsum lhag tsam mchis so// des 'di bo shAkya rnams kyi grong la ma tsumu dag la ba der nga drongs shig/ lha de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes spyod pa'i bu ring pos ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal
rgyal kyi ltaramanyananas/ shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal ma tsu ru da ga la ba der shing khrid de bzhon pas 'gro ba'i sa ji srid pa de srid du zhon te song nas/ bzhon pa 13sa babs te rkang bas kunu
dga' re bar zhugs so// de'i tshabcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang chen po sgo bcad pa zhig na nyin mo gnas pas bzhugs so// dge slong mang po rnams nagatsug lag khang gi phyi la bla gab med pa'i
'chag sa na 'chag par byeg ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis mthong ngo// dge slong mang po dag thag ring po nyid nas mthong nas kyang/ dge slong mang bo dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
dge slong mang bo dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ btsunab dag bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs/rgyal bo chen go bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang chen po cha ba sgo bkum pa 'di shin
tsho gnas pas bzhugs// rgyal po chen po khyed bzhed na gtsug lag khang chen be ko bkum pa ga la bar bzhud de/ der byon pa dang khad kyis dal bu dal bus sgo glegs la zungs shig
dang/ bcom ldan 'od s chab sgo 'byedapar 'gyur ro// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyi rgyal bo'i rtogs lnga bo/ gtsug tor dang/ gdugs dang/ ral gri dang/ rdzayab
nor bu'i yu ba can dang/ stan khu bo dag phud de/ grod pa'i bu rang bo la byin nas kha phyir lta'o// de nas spyod pa'i bu ring po 'di snyam du sams te/ lhas rgyal bo ni/
ga rtags lnga bo/ gtsug tor dang/ gdugs dang/ yo gri dang/ rdzaab nor bu'i yu ba can dang/ lham khra bo dag bdag la bzhag ste/ zhal phyir gzigs[”]ba las na/ lha ni 'phrin las/
gsang ba zhig mdzad par bzhed pas bdag 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o snyam mo// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gtsug lag khang chen po sgo bcad pa ga la ba der songs phyinanas//
khad kyis dal bu dul bus sgo glags la brdabs pa dang/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo phyi'o// denas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song skya byin
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gdong ba nga la phyis nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ring mo zhig lags nas mthong ngo//
bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis ring mo nagi lags nas mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen bo
khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la shani tudaman pa khas kyang chos dmanab byed/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa mchis te/ des na bdag 'di snyam
du bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs ba'o// nyan thos kyi dag 'dun ni/
legs par zhugs pa'o snyam mo// rgyal po chen po khyod nga la chos las byung ba'i dad pa ji lta bu zhig yod/ btsun pa padag gso 'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal
can rab tubya ba byas pa dang/ sa ba dang/ bas kyi rgol ba la goms bar bgyis pa/ skye bo phal po mal byis pa'i dang yas 'babs pa'i ngo bor bkur ba kha cig mthong sta/ de dag rang
ga shes rab dang spobs pas gzhan gyi lta ba rnam pa 'dren ma'i ngo bo dag 'jig cing/ de dag zhu ba rtsom bar bgyid de/ bdag cag shes ldan go'u tam de'i drung du dong la/ dri ba 'di dang
'di lta bu dag drin+ti/ gal te lung ston ra mi byed nune btsud par bya'o// gal te 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu yin nozhes lung ston par byed na/ de lta na de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya
sta kyi go'u tam khyod kyi 'di ni mi rigs so// 'di ni ma 'dra'o// 'di ni mi 'thad do zhes brjod par bya'os de rnams kyis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas/ bcomaldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar bab par mchis ba'i rtsomangam thog na/ sa bar lha gal jothog// btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa de lta bu mchis te/ de nas bdag 'di snyam du/
gabcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags/ khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsus pa lags
nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa lags so snyam bgyid do// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa 'di na bdag gso dge
sbyong bram ze mkhaMs pa mkhas pa'i ngargyal can zhes bya ba nas/ kacig mthong sta zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de rnams kyis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
mchis taphyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhu pa'i rjes thog gi/ gzhan du na bcom ldan 'das kho na'i zhol du lta ba dang/ zhal du rtog par bgyid cing bcom ldan 'adas go'u tam 'di kho
nas shes par bya ba mkhyen to// gzigs bar bya ba gzuges so snyam ste/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags tazhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no// btsun
pa bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsunab 'a ne bdag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i ngo rgyal can zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig mthong ste zhes bya ba'i
bar snga ma bzhin no// des zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par nus ba dang ! bcom ldan
'das kyis de dag la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par zhus bzhin/ yongs sul pa rdzogs par lung bstan pa dang/ de dag zhu ba lung bstan pa des ma 'das shing mgu nas/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang
dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'ang/ bslab pa'i gnas dag kyang len par bgyid de/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'angs la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes pa'i bar snga
ma bzhin// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ 'di na bdag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes bya ba
nas kha cig mthong zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de dag gis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba'i nas zhu ba rdzogs pa zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis de dag la ches longs su rdzogs par lung bstan nas/ de dag lung bstan pa des yi rangs shing mgu nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong ga
dngos po gsol zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung ba mdzad/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/ rab tubyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa// dgra bcom pa nyad thob pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dga'
ba dang bde ba tams su myong ba de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag de'u mang ngo// bdag cag rab tu dewum rung ngo// bdag cag sngon dge sbyong ma yin bzhin du/ bdag cag dge sbyong ngo snyam du
khas 'che/ bdag cag bram ze dang dgra bcom pa ma yin bzhin du/ bdag cag ga bcom pa'o snyam du khas 'che'i/ dani bdag cag dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/
dgra bcom ba yin no snyam sgyu/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags tezhes bya ba snga ma bzhi ni// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las
byung ba'i dpung pa gzhana'ang mchis ta/ btsun pa 'di na bdag gis dag sbyong dang bram ze skye ba bsadu bsang bo/ na bri srob pa/ nyam chung ba/ mdog ngan ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang
bo'i mig gis bltar ma chags pa dag cig mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan 'di dag la 'dod bzhin du tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa 'am/ na yun ring po 'gas
zhig gis thebs sam/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'ga' zhig lho khog tu byas nas btags par ma gyur grang/ 'di ltar shes ldan 'di dag skya bo bsang bsang po/ sha bri ngan pa/ nyam chung ba/
dbang po nyams pa/ rgya bo mang bo'i mig gis bltar mi chags so snyam mo// de dag gi drung du mchisoshing mchis nas 'di gdaces bgyis taM/ shes ldan dgaci'i phyir skya bo bsang bsong po/
shakhri ngonab/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skya bo mang bo'amig gis bltangam gas par gyur/ de dag gi mchidanus/ rgyal bo chen po 'dod chags kyis gnod do// btsunapa
de la bdag 'di snyam du sams te/ gal te 'dod pa rnams redapa dang/ bstan pa dang/ bsags pas gzugs bzang ba 'am/ blta na sdug pa 'am/ mdzes ba zhig tu 'gyur nani/ dalta
ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gzugs ches bzang ba dang/ chos blta na sdug pa dang/ ches mdzes par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal bdag ni 'dod
pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams 'dod dgur redapa dang/ tshogs mdapar rnyidapa lags so// gang gi phyir 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa dang/ bstanab dang/ brasags pas gzugs ches bzang
ba dang/ chos blta na sdug pa dang/ chas mdzes par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir/ bdag gas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gzugs shin tu bsrung ba/ dbang bo rgyas pa/
bzhin gyi mdangs gsal/ pags pa'i mdog yongs su dag ba/ sems khral chung ba/ 'tshob gzhan la rag ma lus pa mthong// des na ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du chos
bar spyod pa ma 'dres ba/ yongs su rdzogs ba/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba spyod ngar nus so snyam ste/ btsunab 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i
dad pa lags zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad ba gzhan mang mchis te/ btsun ba 'di na bdag gis nor gyi slad du gti/
pa rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang/ 'dod pa'i gzhi dang/ 'dod pa'i chad kyi slad du/ ma ni bu dang lhan cig rtsod/ bu nA ma dang/ pha na ba dang/ bu ni pha dang/

ming po nasring mo dang/ sringamo namang po drang/ grogs ni grogs dang rtsod pa dag mthongan/ skya bo dang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ dedag rtsod cing 'byed bar gyur pa na/ ma ni bu'i mi snyan
ba s+sa/ bu nama'i/ pha ni bu'i/ bu niba'i/ ming po na sring mo'i/ sring mo na ming po'i/ grogs na grogs kyi mi snyan pa sna na/ skye bo su lto gos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang 'di na
bdag gis mthong ba/ dge slong gnyis shig dge slong dag dang lhan cigagazhi 'ga' zhig gi slad du rtsod nas/ bslab pa phul dbabs par gyur na/ de dag rnamagrus gang gis kyang/
saargyas la ma u0f7asnyan pa tshodapa ma/ chos dang dag 'dunal mi snyan pa rjod par mi bgyid kyi/ gzhanadun bdaganyid khon la yongs su rtsodapas yongs su skyod par bgyid de/ bdag cag gnyis
ni'adi nadaman pa dang/ ma rabs dang/ dpal mod pa ste/ bdag cag gas bcom ldan 'das kyi sdu na sngar ji srid 'tshob bar du tshangs par sbyodapa/ ma 'dres pa// yongs su klogs pa/
longs su dag pa/ yongs su khyang ba spyad par ma nus so zhes mchisnyo/ btsunab 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba snga ma bzhinano// btsun
pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhanayang mchis te// btsun pa 'dIn ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal bdag dgum par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnams kya 'gums//
dgum par bgyi ba rnams ni gtong bar dbanganaM/ bdag don gyi chedadumachis pa las/ rgyal rigs rgya chen po shing bal chen po lta bu dag dang/ bram ze rgya chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu dag
dang/ khyim bdag rgya chen po shing sa la chenapo lta bu dag gtam mgu tuphyin pa la mi sdodapar/ bar skabs bar skabs su bka'amachidamatshizhingam gus pa dang/ zhe sa ma mchis
par sna bar bgyi bar soms lags so// btsun pa dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag duma'i gung pa bzhugs shadi chos ston par mdzod pa de na lud pa'i sgra yang mi gda'//
sbrid pa'i sgra ya ngam gda' 'o// de nas ma zhig gis lud pa'i sgra phyung ba dang/ yang m zhig gis mi de la 'di skad ces/ kye skyes bu khyod ba rog par 'dug/ bcom ldan 'das sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsis
tshim par mdzad pa lta bu'i chos sman pa ston par mdzad pa ma mthong ngam zhes smras lags so// de skad ces bgyis pa dang/ ma de cang ma mchibar mchis so// de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/
bcom ldan ' sa na de tsam du mthu chazhing rdzu 'phrul chab lags na/ 'di da ltar chad pa med pa dang mtshon mdzad pa'i chos mnyanapas 'khor btul ba ngo mtshar ro snyam ste/ btsun pa 'di
yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa ga zhan
'di yang mchis te// btsun pa 'di na bdag gis dag sbyong dang bram ze kha cig mthong na nor med par bgyis te// tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa las/ des zla ba dgu 'am zla ba brgyad 'das pa dang/
rnam pa de dag dang/ rtags de dag dang// mtshan ma dadag bor taM/ phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor nyid ldan par gyur cing/ rtsa bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyi
ngo btsunab 'di na bdag gis mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag ji srid 'cho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
'a byang ba spyod cing zhes bya ba nas/ srog gi mtha'i bar zhes bya ba dang/ tsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/
skabal bo rgyud pa/// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'dri yang mchis te/ btsun pa 'di na bdag drang srong sbyin pa dang/
