d+hi pa dang/ de dag la yid rton cing/ de dag la longs spyod rnams kyang stsol/ grags pa yang stsol ba sa/ de dag gi srog gi bar yang stsolan/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba de
ltar bgyi ba gyid par ma sems te/ btsun pa dus gcigacig nabadag drang srong yid brtanab sbyin pa dang med pa dag brtag par 'tshal nas/ 'khor gyi nang nas byung sta/ phyogs dog pa zhig tu
mchis nas/ 'di ltar 'di dag bcom ldan 'das dang/ bdag gang lags su rkang pa stonab lta'o snyam na/ de dag gas rnam grangs dumar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge
'dun gyi bsngags pa brjodranas/ com ldan 'das gang na ba der logs sunemago bstan/ bdag ga la ba der logs su ni nang pa bstan to// de la bdag 'ad sar bgyid da/ com ldan
'das 'di tsam du rdzu 'phrul chazhing mthu chaste/ 'di nad ltar bdag 'di dag la longs spyod rnams kyang sbyin/ grags pa yang sbyin pa nas/ srog gi bal yang stsol na/ 'di dag bcom ldan
'das dzilta ba de ltar bodag la bya ba byed par mi sems pa ni ngomatshar ro snyam ste zhes bya kha nas/ btsunab 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'adas la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar
ma bzhin no// btsun pa bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsunapa bdag kyang yul ko sa la pa lags/ bcom ldan dzes kyang kos la pa lags/ bdag gi
rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags/ bdag kyang rgas pa/ 'khegs ba/ gtugs pa/ na tshod la brgyad culen pa lags/ bcom ldan
'dis kyang bgres pa/ 'khogs pa/ gtugs pa/ sku na tshod le brgyad culonapa lags/ btsun pa bdam/ kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags pas/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung pa'i dad pa lags te/ des na bdag 'di snyam du/
bcom ldan 'das nid bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa'o// nyan thos kyi dge 'dunan legs/
! par zhugs pa'o snyam du sems lags so/ de nas ko sa la'i rgya pa po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos sna tshogs rgya char bshad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
'tshol du song ngo/ da nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' su la pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis
chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grus zung nag/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ deci'i phyir zhen/ dge slong dag chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ni don dang ldan ba/ chos dang ldan
ba/ tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa ste/ mngon par shes par byedapa dang/ rdzogs pa byang chub bar byed pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par byed pa yanano// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dad pas
rang 'byung bas/ chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam gras blangs te/ kun chub par byas nas/ de lta de ltar gzung bar bya/ bcang par bya/ bkrag par bya'o// ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal/
rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos nyan pa la ring zhig thogs pa dang/ spyod pa'i bu ring bo yang cung zhig bsdad nas shing rtar zhugs dmanyan yod du song nas/ des 'phags skyes
rgyal srid la bzhag go/ 'phruldan m dang/ dbyar tshul mas spyod pa'i bul dris pa/ spyod pa'i bu lha gsal bzhugs/ grong rdal ma tsu dradi na bzhugs so// de dag rkang gis grong rdal
mtshu ru dar chas so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyananas/ gtsug lag khang nas byung na/ spyod pa'i bu ring bo ma snang nas/ das dge slong rnams /
la dris ba/ 'phags pa dag spyod byed kyi bu ring po gang mchis/ de dag gis sbas pa/ dalha nang dugshegs ma thog tushing rtar zhugs nas mchis so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyalape
rkangags so nga go/ bcom ldan 'das kyang ches snga ba zhig turgyal bo'i khab tu goshegs so// dzitsam nargyal bas lam kar 'phreng ldan ma dang/ dbyar tshul ma mthong nas/ des de dag
la dris pa/ khyed ci'i phyir rkang gas 'di'i 'os/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha spyod pa'i bu rangabs 'gas skyes pa rgyal srid la bzhag sta/ de nas bdag cag lha'i gan du mchis mod/
bdag cag gzhan gar mchi/ rgyal bos smras pa/ 'phrang ldan ma khyod kyis khye'irgyal srid nyams su myong zin gyis/ song la dbu'i rgyal srid nyams su myong bar gyi sa
ga ngang yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o zhes byas ba dang/ 'phreng ldan m snying rje skad du smra sngags 'don cing/ ngu bzhin phyir log go/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po' khab tuchas// rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyinanas/ ban tshun 'khyam 'khyam pa las/ chu skyes dgraskyed mos tshal du 'dug ste/ das dbyar
tshub ma la smras pa// dbyar tshul ma song la/ rgyal bo ma skyes dgra la/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skyed mos tshalan 'dug go zhes gyis shig/ des rgyal bo ma rgyus dag la sbas ba/
lha kes la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi skyed mos tshal na bzhugs te/ lha gzigs par bzhed do// des thos nas sdas te smras pa ! 8shes ldan dag rgyal po de dmag mang po can yin te/ glo bur
kho nar 'ongs na khyed sus kyang ma tshor ram/ dbya byedams snas pa// lha de la dmag ga la mchis/ bus rgyal srid las phyung nas/ de g.yog dang gnyis su 'dir mchis so// des smras pa/ de
rgyal po byed pa legs ti/ bdag ni gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas so zhes smras nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang des rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bskur sti med
00par spyan drang ba ni/ nga la rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur bas/ de la grong khyer gas pa dang/ lam ma dzes par gyis shig/ de dag gis grong khyer de rje dang/ gsag ma dang/ rgya mo mod par byas/
shes bya ba nas/ lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dga' khatshol bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas lam mdzes pa dang/ grong khyer mdzes pa so sor khyad par du 'phags par byas nag
dril bsgrags pa/ shes ldan rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang/ pho bra'akhor ba dang/ yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye tshogs dag nyon cig/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skyod
mos tshal na 'dug gis/ de khyed lha dang lhan cig tug dugs dang/ rgyal mtshanadang/ ba danadag gis bsu bar 'o/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra shing rta stong phrag du ma phyi bzhin du khrid de/ dpung
gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal sur dong ngo// de mang ma skyes dgu ring du phyogs bas/ thu bas bskyod pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ skyedamos tshal dang ha cang
tshang marang ba zhig nal phug gi ra ba zhig yod pa der gong ba dang/ dal ldums pas la dug gar gang byin no// de nas des la phug gi rdog ma dang lo ma deg zos ba dang/ skom rab tu gyur nas
zla drung ngu song ste/ chungoms bar 'thungs nas langs pa dang/ lag pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thobs nas shing rta'i lam du'agyel ba dang/ de 'khor lo dral ba'i rdul gyis kha gang nas
dus las 'das so// rgyal bo ma skyes dag skyed mos tshal du song ste/ phan tshun btsal bar bsams nam skyed de/ des phyogs bzhi'i pho nya bkye ste/ tshol/
gi cos byas pa dang/ don po zhwa gcig la phug gi ra bar phyin nus/ nges ldum pa de la dris pa/ kyi skyes bu skyed mos tshal 'di 'os pa 'ga'u lha yod dam/ 'ongs so// de gar song
la bug par gang khyer nas lam 'di nas nga khur song ngo// do de'i rjes bzhin du songan/ bsha rta' lam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo// des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa/ lha nang
rta'i lam ga ge mo zhagi kha phyogs su dus las 'das so// rgyal pos kyi ma kyi hudabus smras nas/ skye bo brgya stong du mas bskor te phyogs der song ba dang/ jitsas na shi ba'i ro shin tu mi sdug
ba mthong nas/ yang blon po rnams la snus pa// shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di nga'i yul du dus las 'das pa/ nga la snyan pa ma yin par gyur gyis/ khyed kyis
'di bskur ste chen pos bsal tshal gyi du khrod dustsol cig/ nga yang 'di'i khog pa la mchod pa lhag par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// de dag gis kyang de bskur ste chen pos bsal
tshal gyi dur khrod chenakher bstsal to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// 'di skad ces/
cas gsol to// btsun pa kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gi yul du dus las 'dus na/ de'i khog pa la bdag gis mchod pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rgyal bo chen po ci nus bya phod kyis lus la mchod pa cher gyis shig/ de nas rgyal pos de khag pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/
bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/ btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las kyi zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas la dug gi gam dang la ma dag 'tshal nas sug pa rengs shing ma
zhubs thebs te dus las 'dus lags/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs red pa/ rkyen yongs su
sgyur ba/ dpa' rgyal bzhin du khyabar gnas pa gdon ma za bar 'byung ba dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i
sos la snyan par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams pa ma yin/ ma khams pa ma yin/ ngag khams la ma yin byas/ 'onakyang las dge ba dang ma dag bcos shang bsags pa rnams
ni/ zinapa'i phung pa dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dag kho na la rnam par sminapar 'gyur ro// bsal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang// las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te// tshogs shingadus
dang ldan pa na// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin// rgyal po chen sngon byung ba/ ri brags shig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung
ba'/ ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cagi rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu pho zhig btsas te/ dzatsos
na bskyed bsres nas chen par gyur to// des dus gzhan zhig na slong mo la song ba dang/ la bug par gang zhig red do/ des ma la 'dire zhig zhog cig/ khrus byas te 'ong ngo zhes gtams so
des ni de la gtams nas khrus byed du song ngo// sangs rgyas rnams ma byung ba'i tshe/ 'ag rten du rang sangs rgyas ngan pa dang dam pa la thugs bsdu ba can/ bas mtha' gnas mal la dad pa/
'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// jitsam na rang sangs rgyas shag ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ ri brags der phyin te/ de phyogs shig tu zhag lon nas/ snga dro sham
b+hU bas dang chos gos bgos/ lhung babrad blangs te/ ri brags su bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ rim gyis khyim der phyin to// bram ze mo des de lus mdzes pa dang/ sems mdzes pa la
sogs pa mthong// de soms dang bskyas pa des/ la phug par gang rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi/ tshig gis ma yin pas/
bdas dang ba'i rgyal po 'dab ma bskyang ba bzhin du nam mkha'i dbye la 'phags te/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs ngag bstan par brtsams so// so so'i skya bo na rje 'phrul la gyur du dad bar byedapa yin
sa A shang rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du skud pa la gtugs pa dang/ des de la snyade bdu ba byas nas song ngo// tsam na bram ze'i khye'u de 'ongs nas smras pa/ yum la dug sbrang gang
bde stsol cig des smras pa/ bu rjes su a ring bgyis shige/ ngas de rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba phyin nas/ de la bul lo zhes byas pa dang/ de
bkres bas sdug bsngal dang yid la bde ba skyes te smras pa/ rab tu byung ba des de thos nas/ tsis lag pa rengs shing gsung de dus byas bar ma gyur/ rgyal po chen po jisnyam du sems/ bram
ze'i bu gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di de yin taM/ 'i chada' dus na'adis rang sangs rgyas la tshig rtsu ba mo skyas pa'ilos de'i nim par sminapas le mang po/ le brgya phrag
mang po/ lo stong phrag mang po/ la ba stong phrag mang por dmyal ba mas su skyas so// las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis lan drag tulag pa rangs shing gsudapas dus las 'das// da lta'i
dus kyi bar 'dod pa lan bdun du lag ba rongs shing gsud pa kho nas dus las 'das go/ de lta bas na rgyal po las gcig tuganag ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ las gcig tudakarab
rnams kho na la 'bad par bya ste/ rgyal po chenapo khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhinano// denas rgyal bo ma skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dad nas rjes su yi rang sta/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi spyanas nas song ngo// dzitso na ma la/
gnod kyis/ 'phags skyes pa la 'di skad ces smras so// lha yabargyal po mdzad cing/ lha dbang ma bskur ba na/ gang gi tshong rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe/ a shAkya rnams kha gdag ste/ de
nings dang por bya ba yin no zhes de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi tshig rlabs po chagasungs nas 1 gcig tu chad par mdzad de/ 'khor gyid du seng ge'asgra ya nga dag par bsgrags pa gang lags pa de
gongs sam/ da ni de'i dus la bab lags so// des smras pa/ ma la gnodatsadzisnyad smras pa de thams cad bya'am/ don de 'dog pa yin pas theng/ rgyal bo'i bya ba dag dang/ rgyal
po'i byed pa dag yongs su nyams pa 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ lha dgu ba rnams ni dam bcu pa la bstan pa lags pas/ jaltar dam bcas pa bzhin bsgrub tu gsol/ mal gnod re
zhig zhog cig dang/ deyang ma dkar bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ lha 'di ni thog mar dam bcas pa lags pas/ gdon ma 'tshal bar bgyi 'tshal to/ dang kho na gdugs kyang/
[e ]bzang/ ud tsam mang bzang/ skar ma gang bzang/ bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas// lha de dag gis de len ma bshams khar/ dunganyid gshegs pa'i rigs so// de nas
'phags skyes pa ma la gnod kyis bslus pas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang bo che'i tshogs dang/ tapa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs
go bskon nas/ ser skya'i gzhi ni gnaso ba'i ngeshAkya rnams gsad pa'i phyir/ mnyan yodas sar skya'i gzhir chas so// skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi
mkhyen baA/ ma gzigs pa ma/ rnam par mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ de ser skya naganas bshAkya rnams kyi las chud mi za bar mkhyen nas/ chos sngar mnyan yod nas
sar skya'i gzhir gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'am karangashingashako ta ka shun pa rar 'chug shang ma sdug pa/ lo ma srab pa/ grib ma chud du zhig gi drung spyi la go krung bcas/
ta/ nyin mo gnas pas bzhugs so// rgyal po 'phags skyes pos/ bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der songs byinanas/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa shing lam stug cing grib ma chung du ma lags pa gzhan dag mchisan/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de dag spangs te/ shingasha ko Ta ka shunab 'chus/
kashang ma sdug pa/ lo ma srab pa/ grib ma chung ngu 'di'i drung na bzhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ rgyal po chen bo gnyen bshes rnams la ni
gnyen bshes kyi grib ma bsil la// 'phags skyes pos bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das niganyana rnams la gzigs shing thugs brtsi ba mnga' sta/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das niganyenanas
la thugs brtse ba mdzad do snyam du rig nas/ de nyid nas slar log go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal sar skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis bden pa ma mthong bar 'phags
rgyas po'i dmag gis thabs na/ bden pa dag mthong ba'i snod du ma 'gyur ro snyam du mkhyen nas/ shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las sar skya'i gzhir byon te sar skya'i
gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ngesAkya rnams kyi nang du rjes rgyu zhing gshegs pa las 'dir byonati/ n+ya gro d+ha kun
dga' ra ba 'di kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcos ldan 'dus kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i
chos de lta bu bstan pa mdu ba dang/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gas ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig/
gis ni' na cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun la 'bab pa la bkodado zhes bya ba'i bar snga ga bzhin no// ma la gnod kyis 'phags skyes po mthong nas/ des smras
ba lha ci ste slar lag/ des smras pa/ ma la gnod bcom ldan 'das ni nyangu rnams la gzigs shing thugs bsdu ba mang sta/ kye ma bcos ldan 'dus nye du rnams la thugs brtse ba mngo'
bas rgyal ba chen po du rnams la ni du'i grob ma bsal le zhes de lta bu'i gsung 'dape bka' stsal to// nga na nga'i snying la lhangs zhes byed kyis/ sar skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams gsad
ba thong zhis// des smras pa/ lha dag sbyong go'u tas ni'adod chags dang bral ba lags te/ 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams ni nye du la mi lta bas/ dang kho na lha'i nyi ma yang bzang/ yud tsam
yang bzang/ skar ma gang bzang/ bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas/ lha de nyid sar skya'i gzhir gshegs shig/ dem dge ba'i grogs pos logs par bzung bas/ dpung gi
chogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang bo che'i tshogs dang/ dpa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bachung gi tshogs go bskonanas/ sar skya'i gzhir song ste/ ha cang ma ring ba
zhig tuphru ma btab nas 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ bcos ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skadaces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis skyes bu gtiyug/
'bags skyes po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhipa/ glang pe tsho'i tshogs dang/ tshupa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ sar skya na gnas
ba'i shAkya rnams dgum pa'i slad du/ ser skya'i gzhir mchis zhes thos te/ de'i slad du bdag de dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du bkur ba'am/
khor yug ga slad rol tu'aphang ba 'am/ sor skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer lcags kyi ra bas bskor ba 'am/ lcags kyi drabs bskor bar sngo lags so// kho'u 'gal gyi bu de de bzhin no//
de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis snga ma bzhin du bskor ba zhes bya ba'i bar nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rnams nyadi kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rgyun yongs su bsgyur ba/
ba'argal bzhinanye bar gnas pa gdon ma bro bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsagos pa
rnams ni/ phyi'i sa'i khams la rnam pa smin bar 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ mal khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas
shang bsags pa rnams ni/ zinaba'i bud bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dag kho na la rnam par sman par 'gyur te/ bskal ba brgya phrug rnams su yang// las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur
da tshogs shing dus dang ldan pa ni// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rtenan las bdag gari bya ba/ las kyi skya gnas ba/ las kyi bgo skal spyod ba/ las
la rtenab yin pas/ gang gis las dge ba 'am sdig pa byas pa de ni las dag la ham 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de lta bas na las la gzhol bar bya'o// denus tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi la/
bcom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ngo/ bar skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis/ skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pa dpung gi tshogs yan lag ba pa/ glang bo
cho 'tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ bdag cag gsod du 'ongs so zhes thos so// thos nas de dag gi sa kyang dpung
gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rta pa'i chog sa dang/ shang rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'phags skyes pa legs/
su sprugs so// de dag bden po mthong ba yin pas/ gsod par ni cung zad kyang ma byed kyi/ gzhan du na de'i tshadabyug pa dang lcag dog gas bsnun ci ring/ gzhu rgyud dang/
rgyun dang/ 'brong pa rnams gcod pa dang/ rna rgyan drag la mda' 'phan par byed do// 'phags skyes po'i dpung go chazhagi par byas nas/ sar skya'i gnas su zhugs tasgo dgo bcad nas/ rab
la sbyangs te 'khod do// de dag gis pha rol gnon pa'i mthu hra par bcom pa dang/ ma la gnod la smras pa/ ma la gnod mthong ngam/ shAkya rnams kyis bdag cag brlag pa byas su 'ong gis
thod la 'dod/ des smras pa/ lha thugs la 'chad cige/ sar skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams nibadun pa mthong ba lags pas/ 'di rnams srog chags grog spur la nga srog dang 'brel ba'i thugs mi
thub sta/ da ni 'di dag gis bdag cag gi sams can gcig kyang ma bsad pa las mngon no// de des bslus nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ nAkya rnams kyis kyang khrims su bcas pa/ shes
ldan dag bdag cag las sus kyang 'phags skyes bo 'am/ 'phags skyes po'i dbu nga la bstun bar ma byasta/ gang zhig bskrun pa de ni bdag cag gi nye du yang ma yin/ shAkya yang ma yin no/
de'i tshode'i dus na shAkyasham pa ka zhes bya ba zhig ri brags shagi narang zhal ta byed cing las kyi mtha' byedapa des/ kye rnams kyis khromis sa bcas pa ma thos so// de yang so so'i
[za/ ]skyo ba zhig yin te/ des 'phags skyes bo bdag cag gsad ba'i phyir/ sar skya'i gnas su 'ongs nas/ phyogs che ga mo zhig na 'dug gozhes ji lta bu yin pa thos so// thos nas kyang
khro bas kun nas dkris pas brgyan pa'i yid mi bde bas/ mod la 'phags skyes pa'i dpung ga thog tudus nas/ dus der skye ba'i tshogs mang po zhig na kha btag/ kha cig ni bla ma ma sha
tsam du byas so// de nas 'phags skyes pa yade ma bde nas smras pa/ ku la gnod khyod kyis mthong zhi/ khyod cig na re 'di dag bden pa mthong ba yin pas srog chags grog sbur yang srog dwang
'phrul bar ma byed do zhes na/ razhig 'di gcig bas kyang bdag cag gi skya bo mang po 'dirti ba bsad na/ gal te thams cad lhags par gyur na/ bdag cag gis sems can 'ga' yang mi
'chor bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dus kyis gcus pas chog gas slar 'dong des smras pa/ lhungashAkya rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba bgyis te/ bdag cag las
gang gis kyang 'phags skyes po 'am/ 'bags skyes po'i dpung la bsnunapar ma bya ste/ gang zhig bsnun pa de na bdag cag gi nye du yang ma yin/ shAtshayul yin no zhes dam bcas na/de
'das ma thos pas/ da ni 'di nang du yang ma chud bganas gang lags pa de mchis so// de sar skya'aganas kyi sgor song ste 'dug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nang du 'ong gis sgo phye zhig
de dag gis smras pa// khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khrims su bca' ba la bas/ da phyin chad khyod kho bo cag gcig nye na a ngam in/ shAkya a dam yin na/ khyod nang du
lta ga la gtang/ song zhig// des smras pa/ bdag gis khyed kyi khrims su bca' ba ma thos te/ 'on kyang mang du smra ci dgos/ gal te bdag gis khyed kyi khrims su bca' ba dral na/ bdag gi
'khor phyi re khyu zhig dang/ gzhan du 'gro'o// de dag gis de'i khor phyu re byung ba dang/ des/ dongag gso po'i 'khor phyir byung ba dang/ des de dag zid nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der sa dpyashad

com ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs / dngas da/ de mgo bos phyag 'tshal nAs/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ shAkyasham pa kas 'di skad ces gsal to// btsun pa bdag gis bcom
ldan 'das la gang la bgyi ba bgyi'i mtshan ma cung zad cig bdag la stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang/ sen mo dang/ tshom sa dag cig gnang ba
dang das de dag khyer nas/ lul ba gu der chas so// de rnams kyis shAkya sham pa ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dngo/ stobs dang/ ba rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa/
mig bdag cag yul du rgyal srid 'dod de 'ong lanas thos so// thos nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams ba/ shes ldan dag shAkyasham pa ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang/ stobs dang/ pa
rol gnon pa chen po phunasum tshogs pa zhig/ bdag cag gi tshul du 'ong ngo zhes grag gis/ 'a bya'i zhig tshur shog 'dusang zhig cid dang phrad cadi 'dong ngam mi 'dong/ de dag thams
cad r zhig gi drung du 'dus te re zhig 'dug pa de'i bar du/ sham ba kas 'khor rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/ ba chenagyi tshalugs su byas te/ de dag gi drung du song ba dang/
dadag gas 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ban+d+ris ba kun tu spyad nas dris pa/ khyod ga las 'ongs/ des snas pa/ shAkyasham pa kazhes bya ba brtson pa dang/ stobs dang/ pha rol
gnon pa chenapo phun sum tshogs pa de rgyal sridi'adod cing 'dir 'ong bar 'dod de/ des sbyang yag 'di bskur gyis/ 'khod la lhogs shigo/ de dag gis smras pa/ stanayang mdan
gang du 'khod/ des ral gri shubs nas phyung nas/ pha bod dum bu dum bur gshags te// 'di la 'khodacag ces byas pa dang/ de dag gis mthong nas/ ngomatshar gyi mig gdangs ta
smras pa/ kya skyes bu de la khyod 'dra ba de lta bu mi ji tsam yod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo 'di'i bang chen ti/ kho bos lta ci zhig nus/ dal skyes bu dpa' bo gzhanamang
du yod do// de dag gis thos nas snga ngas da phan tshun smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi bang chen 'di'adra ba de'i mi gzhan si'adra ba zhig yod/ tshur de long bdag cag gi rgyal por gzhug go
bya// zhes de dag gis spring yig bklags nas/ del spring yig gi lan cinawa/ byon pa legs so// phanab gsab dbang du byas bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so// des
ba de yig gi lan khyer nas/ 'khor dang bcas ta'abyor pa mchog dang/ ul ba gu dar 'ongs pa dang/ de dag gis de bkur skyes chen pos bsu nas rgyal srid la bzhag go/ yul ba gu pa
rnams kyis/ shAkya sham pa kazhes bya ba rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro zhus kun tu sgra grags// rgyal po sham pa ka rgyal po sham pa ka zhes bya bar mnge chags so// des der bcom ldan
'das kyi dbu skra dang san mo'i mchod rten byed du bcug ste/ sham pa ka'i mchod rten sham pa ka'i mchod rten zhes bya bar ming chags so// de'i chung ma dad pa med pa zhig na/ da yang de'i btsun
mo dam pa yin pas/ des de'i ngo cung zad kyang mi chod pas// des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ dgon pa srung ba gyis gi/ de dag gis dgon pa bsrung ba byas pas/ dadung yang de nar gas
dag mA gsod do// 'phags skyes pas/ ma la gnod la smras pa/ mal gnod da ni nAkya rnams kyis sgo rnams bcad de/ ra ba rnams su sbrangs nas bag brkyang sta 'khod na/ nges pa'i
dus kyis 'tshubs cazhig bya 'dong/ des smras pa/ lha ci grong khyer thams cad pha rol ba gnon pa gcig bus choms sam/ bdag rgyal po'i pho brang na spyod pas thos pa ni/ mkhas
pa rnams ni bzham kha dang// rab tusbyin dang bslu ba dang/ kun tu spyad pa lnga pa ni// dpung gis don rnams sgrub par byed// ces bgyi sgyu/ de lta bas na de dag la dbyen bgyi pa dgongs
ge 'phags skyes pos de dag la gling ba/ shes ldan dag nga ni khyed la rjes su chags pa mang da khong khro ba lang tshad kyi/ 'on kyang da lo ni bya bcung zhig yod de/ de ngas byas shing/
thob nas myur ba myur bar 'gro sa sgo phye zhig/ shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'dus la tsi sgo dbye 'am 'on tam dbye ba dpyad par bya 'o zhis/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa dang/
dun pa cig gis sgos pa/ dbye bar bya'o// gzhan dag gas sbas pa/ gal tapo nam legs so// kha cig gis sbas pa/ shes ldan dag kha cig ni dbya'o zhes zer/ gzhan dag
naphyi nam legs so zhes zer bas/ de'i phyir gal takhyed 'dod na tshul shang brims shage dang/ skya bo mang bo'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de bya'o zhes/ de rnams kyis tshul shing khrimo par brtsams
so/ skabs der bdud sdig can 'di snyam dusams te/ bdag gso lan du ma zhig dag sbyong go'u ta ma la glags btsal zhing glan ka btsal te phyi bzhin pa re zhin du 'brangs kyang glags ma rnyed kyis/
ma la da bdag gis 'di'i nye du rnams kha btag go snyam du rig nas/ bdag nyid shAkya rgan po zhig tumangon par sprul to/ rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas/ des thog mar tshul shari blas pa dang
shAkya rgan bos tshul shang blos so zhes thams cad kyis bus go/ de nas blo gcig bas 'bags skyes kho la spring ba/ nang du zhugs shagi/ de dpung gi tshogs/
yan lag bzhi ba dang nang du zhugs te/ zhugs nas smras pa/ sangashAkya rnams kha ga ga go/ das shAkya rnams yongs su sdus so zhes smras pa'i tshig rjes chad ma thag tu/ skyes bu mchon
gzas pa rnams kyis/ shAkya rnams kun nas gsade bar brtsams pa dang/ ku chen po 'don to// shAkya tshade chen gyis sgra de thos nas/ nye du la byams pas bskyod pa'i yid mi bde bas//
'dris pa rings par 'phags skyes pa'i drung du song ste des smras pa// lha dam pa 'os pa bdag la dam pa stsol cig/ des smras pa/ khyod dam btsoslong smos shig/das lcas pa/ lha bdag
gi nye du rnams la mi 'gos pa stsol cig/ 'phags skyes bos smras pa/ngas khyod kyi nyi du rnams la ni mi 'jigs pa mi sbyin no// 'on kyang khyod 'khor dang bcas taphyir khyung zhig/ des smras
pa lha dzasridebadag chu'i nang du nub rgyu 'dug la de srid du/ gang dag phyiri 'byung ba de dag la mi 'jigs pa skyo lag/ das blon po rnams kyi gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang/ de dge
gis sbas pa/ lha mang chen 'dinikhyod kyi u las kyang lags/ yab kyi grogs po a lags pas/ 'di la nidam pa de stsal ba'i roges go/ des snas pa/ gal tade lta na de
[z]/skad cig byinato// shAkya mang ches nye du la chags pas bskyod pa'i yod mi bdeb/ snying rjes brgyan pa'i sems kyis chu'i rdzong du song ste/ 'a 'gram nangashang sa lazhig yod pa de'i yal ga rdzi
gi chu'i nang du nub pa de la/ des gtsug phudabatags nas nam srog dang bral ba de'i bar de nub kyi 'dug go/ de nasor skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya ga nga dag gis tshogs ba can gyi las
ma byas pa de dag las kha cig nisor skya'i gnas nas byung gyu/ rgyadargyu bar song ngo// kha cig ni bal yul du dong ngo// kha cig ni grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ rgyal po yul 'khor
dang bo brang de dang de dag tusong ngo// gang dag gis tshogs pa can gyi las byas pa de dag ni/ ser skya'i gzhi shar sgor byung nas lho nas 'jug/ lho nas byung nas nub nas 'jug/ nub
sa khyung nas byang nas 'jug/ byang nas byung nasangashar nas 'jug pa dang/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha kyi mang+gashAkya rnams nitshig go/ kyi maNashAkya rnams ni tshig ste/ 'di ni da ltar
shar sgo nas nang du zhugs nas lhor 'byung/ lho nas zhugs nas nub tu byung/ nub nas zhugs nus byang du byung/ byang nas zhugs nas lhor 'byung ngo// 'phags skyes pas smras pa/ shes
ldan dag mas po de chur nub nas ring zhig lon gyis ltosangashagi/ blon po rnams kyis rongs ba'i chu'i lding du song nas brtag par brtsams pa las/ datsam na dus las 'das so// de dag 'du
gte lha dus las 'das so zhes byas pa dang/ de cha thad du kun nas dkris bas smras ba/ bshes ldan dag stan sho shige/ dzas de du lam po cher khrag gi 'od kha ba bar ma
gyur ba de srid du phyogs 'dinas mi 'gro'o// skyes bu dpa' bo rnams bsad na khrag nyung du 'byung ba 'di ni chos nyid yin pas/ blon po rnams phanatshun bgro bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag
Ta sems can 'di ni sdig pa'i las byed pa dang/ dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na/ 'di'i 'di skad kyi khrag cig ga las 'byung/ rgya skyegs dag cig len du gzhug go zhes/ darnamus kyis rgya
rgyags blangs nas skyags kyi chubum pa brgya stong dum lam pa tshor par nga dang/ 'bags skyes pas bsams pa/ bdag ga rim bcas pa rdzogs pas 'gro'o snyam mo// denas rgyas
bu gti mug 'phags skyes pas/ shAkya bdun khri bdun stong bsad de/ phal cher na bden pa mthong ba sha stag go/ des sems cand snyad bsad nas gzhonanu lnga brgya dang/ sumo lnga brgya
khrid de/ gzhan chu stags canakun tuny+tsa rnams kyi gan dga' ra ba bag mo' gis zhes bya ba ga la ba pasong ba dang/ ma la gnod kyis snus ba/ lha khyod kyis dgra yongs su bskyangs so//
dgra 'di dag cis yal bar gnas sod tsogi/ 'bags skyes pas gshedama' mo rnams la btad de/ 'di rnams glang po che dag gis ji'i chug cig ces bsgo'o// de rnams kyis glang po
[d/ ]dag gis phyir gzhug bar bdu mas ba dang/ de dag gis glang po chodi dag gan kyal du mnan te/ lag ba nas lag bar sbrad par brtsams so// ma la gnod kyis snus ba/ lha khyod kyis 'di
dag gi la rol gnodapa gzigs sam/ mthong ngo// lha 'di dag yal bar gzhugan/ lhalha la gnod par bgyid bar mi 'gyur ram/ ma la gnod de de bzhin te/ 'di dag jiltar gsad par
byab dras smos shige/ des snas pa/ lha ded du stsol la stong nas lcags kyi shul bshal du stsol cig/ de bzhin byed du chug cig/ des de dag dong du bcug nas stong nas lcags kyi shal bas
mnan to// danas gnyis shig bros ta bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanusngar song ngo// song nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyis bkab pa dang/ de skyid du sha'i// shAkya rnams
bsadapa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu shin snyung bar gyur to// donas skyes bu gtimug 'phags skyes pos ma zhig la snus pa/ kye skyes bu khyod tshur/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sngar
song ste 'dug la/ bcom ldan 'das cigasung ba de khyod kyis nyonal/ ngal blosangashag ces smos nas song ngo
ma de bcom ldan 'adas kyis spyan sngar song sta 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
der chu'i thigs pa gnyis gsum tsam blugs pa dang/ de dag chu 'a ning de nas du ba 'thul zhing ci ri ri zer la sgra yang 'byin to// dge slong rnams tsho'aphrul de mthong nas/
ka yid dad cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las cazhig mdzadan/ 'phrin las de'i rnam bar sman pas/ bcom ldan 'das dbu snyung ba gyur/
ser skya naganas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis sug las ci zhig bgyis na/ des nongs ba yang ma mchis/ gnodapa bgyis pa yang ma mchis par/ byas bu ga tichug 'gas rgyas pos bam pa
ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ dge slong dag tshur gzhanamu stags canakun tuts+tsha rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba pag mo'aganas gang du skya sa bu gtimug 'phags skyes pas/ shAkya
rnams bsad pa ga la ba de kho nas da rnams dang bdag nyid kyis las kyi grub lung bstanabar bya'o// btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyanato// de nas bcom
ldan 'adas dge slongarab tumang bo dang thabs cig/ gzhan mu stags tsan kun tu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba pa ga mo'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs so// dre po dang rus mthun pa'i bram ze zhig gis/
bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi go'u ta ma gang gi slad du skyes bu gti mug 'bags skyos bas/ ser skya na
gnas pagalanos pa yang ma mchis/ gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis pa rnams srog dang bral ba nibasod nams ma lags pa mang po zhig bskyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa
bram ze de de bzhino// da de bzhin te ! gang gi phyir skyes bu gtumug 'a phags skyes bas/ sor spyi naganas pa'i rigang nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams srog dang sbrul ba
nibagodanams ma yin pa mang pozhagi bskyed do// des bcom ldan 'adas gzhanamu stags can kun tu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag lo'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs pa dang/ dan
sar skya na gnas pa'ashAkya lcags kyi shal bas bshal ba las/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan ' das mthong nas skad ngan bton to//
denas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu gshegs nas/ gdan bshams pahrid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag

slong dag ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya 'di rnams kyis 'di dang lan gsum gyi bar du sgra chen po phyung ste/ sngon da pa byed pa'i tsho/ nya 'dod pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang/ chom rkun pa byed pa'i tsho//
grong 'dzoms pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang/ dalta sa skya naganas pa'apikAkya byed pa'i tsho/ skyes bu gti mug 'bags skyas bos srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam lus par byas te/ 'chib la
mngon du phyogs pa'i tshogang yin pa'o/ 'di dag thams cad kyi brjol pa la nikhyad bar ram/ bsam ba las/ bod du byung ba cung zad kyang med de mtshungs so// dag
slong dag ji snyam du sems/ shan pa 'di las de dang/ bzo do dang/ 'tshob des klad pa tshal non te 'gro ba'ag/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba ma/ shang rtar zhugs te 'gro ba ma/ dbung bu chung
dang chas 'gro ba 'am/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen bo mang bo grub nas gnas pa ltacig mthongo ma/ thos sam/ btsun pa ma lags so// dge slong dag legs so legs so// sa kyang shan
pa 'di las de dang zhes bya ba nas/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin// ma mthong ma thos so// de'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shanapa
rnams ni sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de/ des na 'di glang po tshol zhon te 'gro ba 'am/ rta la zhon ta'agro ba 'am/ shing rtar zhugs pa 'gro ba 'am/ dbung bu chung dang chas te/
'gro bar yang ma 'gyur la/ nor gyi phung bo rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par yang ma 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dug slong dag ji snyam du sems/ khyed kyis bya gag gsod pa 'am/
phag gsod pa 'am/ chab 'ag/ ri dgas sher ba 'am/ khyo ba na/ bod du rgyas 'chor ba 'am/ ba lang gsod pa dag las da dang zhes bya ba nas/ nor gyi phung pe rgya chen po mang
04 po bsgrubs te gnas pa de mthong dam/ thos sam zhes bya ba'i khar snga ma bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ba lang gsod ba de sdog pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de/ des na de glang po che:
lanonor 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ nor gyi phung pany+tsa chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par ma 'gyurazhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dge slong dag re zhig byol song gi skye gnas
su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis kyang/ sduge ba'i bsam pas brtags na/ glang po tshol zhon ta'agro ba 'am/ rtal zhon tu'agro ba 'ag/ bshang ra zhugs ta'agro ba 'am/ dpung
bu chung dang chas 'gro bar yang ma 'gyur la/ nor gyi bung ba rgya chen po mang bo bsgrubs te gnas par yang ma 'gyuran/ skyes bu gtimug 'bags skyes po slob bas longs zhes
smras pa/ tshul khrims kyi gzi brjid kyis skyabar bcos pa lta zhig glang po tshal zhonIta'agro ba la// skyal zhen tu'agro ba 'am/ shing rtar zhugs 'gro 'am/ dbung bu chung
nga chas su 'gro ba 'am/ nor gyi phung pa rgya chan pa mang po bsgrubs gnas pa lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos te/ dan gnas med do// dge slong dag ko sa la'i rigs 'di nas zhag bdun
na sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs 'chad par 'gyur ro// skyes bu gtilug 'bags skyes pa tshang ma la gnod dang bcas dazhag bdun nams tshig nas chod 'don bzhinadamyal ba chen
po mnar med bar skyo bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ gang mgal dum la ya da ngan sams ni bya na/ rnam par shes pa
dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu r bsub bar bya// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad
pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya lnga ba bo 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sman bas nangs ba yang ma mchis/ gnod pa bgyis
pa yang ma mchis par/ skyes bu gti mug 'a phags skyes pos srog dang bral/ bcom ldan 'das kyang shAkya rnams bkum pa'i tsho/ dbu snyun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur lags// bcom
ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pA/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid dang/ ngas las byas shing bsags ba tshogs red// rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ dba' rgyal banane nyi bar gnas pa
gdon mi za bar 'byung ba dag yanataM/ 'di dag dang sa las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol
gyi sa' khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams la sa mni/ mi khoms la ma yin/ rlung ga khams la ma yin gyi/ 'onakya las dge ba dang ma deg ba byas shing/
bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang/ las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te//
tshogasashadi dus la bab pa na// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin// dge slong dag sdonabyung ba/ chubonag gi 'gram nan pa lnga brgya gnas so// de rnams kyis lhaganyis shig rgya
mtshon pa na pa tshunats+tshargyu b.las chubo der zhugs pa mthong ba dang/ da rnams rab tu dga' ba skyes nas de dag la rgya chen pos bcus so// de rnams kyis de gnyis kyis lus mthong
nas gros bya bar brtsams lo/ shes ldan dgo 'dil riltar bsgrub par bya/ 'di dag lus chachas pas/ gal tebasad nangan ldom bar ma'agyur te/ de 'drul bar 'gyur ro//
don kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/ gcig na bas dra la gcig na btugs tagazhag mod/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di yang chas/ 'di yang sdom par
mi 'gyur bas/sdong de la btags lagasono per sha bcad cing bcad cing btsong ngo// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lags te da lo khya'o// dudag gis da ltar bya bar brtsams
ba dang/ de dag de ltar gcod pa na rang gi skad du 'i dod 'bod par brtsams so// de dag ma khadab de nyaba'i khyi'u zhig gis thos nas rab tudaga' ba skyed par byed do// de nas nyade
gnyis de ltar bcad pa'atsho/ du rnams la 'di lta bu'i sems bskyad de/ gang bdagacag gis nyes ba yang tshud/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par 'di dug gas/
ba 'di ltar bsad de/ 'a phyir bdag cag kyang gang du 'di dag sa pa yang mad/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//
[E ]nyaganyis po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phags skyes po dang ma la gnod 'di dag kho na mnano/ lta ba lnga brgyagang dag yin pa de dag ni/ shAkya lnga brgya ba 'di dag kho na yin te/
pa gang 'du gnyis kyis nya de dag de ltar bsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ daltar 'phags skyes bo dang ma la gnod dag gis shAkyar gyur pa nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas
ba yang mad pa rnams lcags kyi shal bas mnan cing/ 'o dod 'bod bzhin bsadado// nya ba'i khyi'u gang yin pa de nang nyid de'i tshade dus na de yin te/ gang ngas na bsad pa na rab
tudaga' ba skyed pa'i las de'i rnam par sminapas/ da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang dbu sunatshabs chen pos thebs par gyur to// gal tangs yon tan gyi tshogs 'di
lta bu thob par ma gyur na/ dayang las 'di lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gzhan gang sar skyo naganas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis las gang byas pa de nyon cig/ bag slong
0 dag sngon byung ba/ chom rkun lnga brgya zhig gis lam du 'gro ba dag bcom nas/ thugs ba'i rjes dag khyer te/ ri bregs shag tu 'dzoms su song ngo// de dag gis ri brags na gnas
pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bcom nas phrogs so// khyim bdag gnyis shagi yang thog tu 'dzegs ta'adug pa dang/ rkun po rnams kyis sa ba/ shes ldan dag gang dag 'di
'dzegs pa de dag bobs shuge/ thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur tar/ de gnyis kyis sbas pa/ ji sridi 'tshob de srid du mi 'babs so// de rnams kyis rtswa dang shang phal mo che
bcosazhas/ gad thog de ma btang ba dang/ gnyis tshabs sdug bsngal bskya pas gdungs te/ 'di lta bu'i sams bskyed do// bdag cag nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa
yang med par 'di rnams kyis bsad pas/ bdag cag kyang 'di rnams nyes pa yang mad/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsodapar gyur cig/ dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ khyim
bdag gnyis pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phags skyes po dang ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no// g.yon can lnga brgya pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na
yin te/ gang 'dirams chom rkun par gyur pas de dag nyes pa yang med/ gnodapa byas pa yang mdabar srog dang phral ba las de rnam par sminabs/ da ltar 'phags skyes
khos ma la gnod dang bsdongs nas/ shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag shes pa yang mad/ gnod pa byas pa ya nga mad bar srog dang phral lag/ dge slong dag de
ba ltar na las gcig tuganag pa rnams kyi rnam par snyan pa yang gcig tu gnag la/ gcig tudakar ba rnams kyi ya nga gcig tshudakar/ 'drenam rnams kyi ang 'dren ma yin no//
cig/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gci'i// zhuganag pa dad/ 'drenam rnams grangs nas/ las gcig tu da kar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong rnams kyis de lta bu la bslab bar/
tsu'o 'phags skyes bos nAny+tsa rnams de ltar bsad nas mnyan yod du song ngo// dunang du zhugs pa dang/ rgyal po' gzhonanu rgyal bu rgyal byed steng gi khang bzangs su song nas
rgyas pa mad par rol mos rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa 'phags skyes pos thos nas/ des snas pa/ shes ldan dag rtsa ba 'o na su zhig/ blon po rnams
k+Sha kyis sbas pa/ gzhonanu rgyal bu rgyal byedalags so// des skyas ba/ shes ldan dag de bas shogi/ de rnams kyis de bos pa dang/ 'phags skyes pas sbas pa/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
nga ni dge bsad nas 'ongs na/ khyod rtsa zhing 'dug gam/ das smras pa/ lha'i dogra su dag cig lags/ shAkya rnams so// gal teshAkya rnams khyod kyi dgra lags na/ mdza' bo ji
lta bu dag cagi lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di yang de dag gi phyogs kho na yin pas// 'di gsad bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de bsad de/ dus las 'das nas/ lha gya nom pa
sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ 'a ma'i rol mo'i sgra ma ni bar lha'i sgra byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba del tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal kha/ bsod
nams byas pa 'di'i dga' phyi mar dga'// gnyis kar dga' skyo de ni bdag nyid kyi// las rnams smin mthong de dga' rab tu dga'o// 'gro ba bzang bor song ba phyir zhing dga'// bsod
nams byas pa 'diri mgu phyi mar mgu// gnyis kar mgu sta de ni bdag nyid kyi// las rnams sminamathongad mgu rab tumagu/ 'gro ba bzang bor song pa phyir zhing mgu// de nas bcom ldan
'das la/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// khatsun pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don ma 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed de nyas pa med cing gnod pa med bar skyes bu gtumug 'phags skyes pos srog dang phral to/ 'a mo'i rol mo'i sgro ma zhi bar lha sgra byung ngo// ngas de las
dgongs nas 'di skad du/ bsod nams byas pa 'di'i dga' phyi mar dga'// zhes bya banas/ 'gro ba bzad por song ba phyir zhing mgu// zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so zhes
gsus pa dang/ decang ma skye bar 'dug go jitsam dus gzhan zhige na 'phags skyes po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ngom zhing rnam par ngos su/ nga rgyal canam
dang lta pa dpa' khe/ brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnod pa can gang dag yin pa de dag ngas rnag mad bar byas taM/ nga dang 'dra ba su zhig yodacos zer ro// denas 'phags skyes bos//
shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgyakhrid pa de dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras so// khyod kyis gang dag ga mdabyas// dadag rgyal sras shAkya'i sras// bslab pa bstam bas bsdums pa
! yin khyod kyi 'di'i snas ci zhig rung // de skad ces smras pa dpe/ khros nas blon po rnams la tshigs su bcad pas bsgo ba/ klu rnams bsadan klu yi bu mo dag/ dug gis gang
ba sprin gyis khebs pa ltar/ 'di dag la gor tAng lag rnams chod la// nyid du de dag nyidarjes myur du tho// blonube rnams kyiso shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dmar bu can gyi rdzong 'gram/
du lag ba dang rkang pa dag bcudad/ da lag pa'i dong khag ba'i dong zhes bya bar ming chags nas/ gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du/ mdo sde'i mgo la bcom ldan 'adas mnyan
mon/ lag pa'i dong gzhib 'gram nabazhugs so zhes bris so// bam po dgu ba// denams sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub ba/
chob/ id du ma 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba nabasams ba/ bdag cag gi bzad pa dag pa nyam nga bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa phyu snyam mo/ skabs de lta bu la
sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am// thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cud zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
thugs chan bos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang/ ji tsam na bud med de dag thams cad sgronAmora'adug pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i
thugs bskyad do/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa pha'i tsho/ srog chags grog spur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
thugs sams kyis shes so/ gang gi tshe'ajig rtenalas 'das pa'i thugs bskyod pa de tshani/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs sems kyis mde las
na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kyi lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis gos dag dang/ chu khyer
'ongs kyang bla na sAm du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed ma thag tu/ lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis ras khrud lnga brgya dang/ mtshochan po ma dros pa nas chu blangs nas/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ com ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal bu'adiskadatses gsol to// btsun pa ras yug lnga brgya 'di dag dang
ka chab 'tshal tamachis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song la ngashAkya'i bu mo 'o ni rnams dbugs phyung sta/ dbugs phyung nas rkang ba dang lag pa dag khrus la gos rnams skon cig/
btsun pa de ltar 'tshal zhes smras nus/ sa de rnams kyi rkang pa dang lag pa dreg bkrus nas gos rnams bskon no// de nas com ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te//
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyi myu 'phrul gyis/ bu mo lnga brgya bo de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad do// rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal ba/
sring mo dag khyed nyid kyis las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa tshogs redapa/ rkyenayongs su bsgyur ba/ dba' rgyal bzhin lo bar gnas pa gdon ma za bar 'byung ba yin te/ khyed kyis las
T+ThA byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ sring mo dag las la gzhol bar gyis shig ces gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so// de dag kyang bcom ldan
'das la sams rab tu dang bar byas nas/ dus las 'das ta rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am lha'i bume skyas nas ring po ma len pa sems
gsum skya sta/ gang nas sha 'i bos pa dang/ gang du skyes pa dang/ las gang gis yin pa'o// de rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nang nas shaphos pa dang/ rgyal chen bzhi ba'i lha rnams
kyi nang du rgyas pa dang/ las gang gis she na/ bcom ldan 'das la sams rab tudang bar byas pas lan bar mthong ngo// de nas sngonashAkya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha lnga bdu bod/
rnams 'di snyam dusams te/ bdag cag zhig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'deng ba ni cham sprin gyis/ ma la bdag cag zhag ma len po nyid du bcom
ldan 'das blta ba'i phyi'i 'dong nge sum mo// de nas sngon shAkya'i bu mo khyed byed pa'i lha rnams na tsha gdub 'khor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shang/ lus do shal dang sa
mo des brgyananas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang/ bats+tsha dang/ ku mudang/ bar dkar po dang/ man+d+rar ba rnams kyis zla ba bkang nas/
rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad sbyang ba rgya chen pos snang ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la ma tog rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan
ba'i phyir 'dug go/ com ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang/ dems kyis de thos nas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i phyi mo ka mthob yashes kyi ro bcom nas/
'a rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// donams kyis bden pa mthong nas ched du brjod pa lan gsum brjod ba/ com ldan 'das kyis gang bdag cag la phan btags pa 'di
ka lta bu n bdag cag la mas ma bgyis/ phas ma lags rgyal bos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ rang gi skya bo dang gahran sdug pa'i tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi mas
ba rnam sa kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram khre rnams kyis ma lags te/ khrag dang mchima'i rgya mtsho na bskams/ rus pa'i re las nibasgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bcad/
mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phyi/ lha dang mi rnams la ni bkod do// yang smras pa/ khyod kyi mthu yis ngan song lam dag ni// shani tu mi bcud nyes mang ldan pa bcad// mtho si
sgo bye bdag gi bsod nams ni// shin tu bzang dang mya ngan 'das lam thog/ khyod brten de ring bdag gi skyon bral zhing// shin turnam bar dag mgi dag pa thob// 'phags ba dgyes
ba'i go 'phang zhi ba'ang thob// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol mchog tubargal// 'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod cing// skye rga 'chi ba'i skyonadang bral ba po// sring ba stong du mthong
rab red dka' ba// thub pa khyod dang mthong ba 'bras bu mchis// de nas se mo do'aphyang dga' skyes rnams // zhabs gnyis la ni gdud pa byas nas kyang// dgra thul ba la yongs su bskor
byas nas// slar yang lha ma 'jig rtenamangon phyogs dang// dge slong rnams the tshom spyas nas/ thatshos thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
btsun pa shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya bo dag ga sa las tsazhig bgyis na/ des lag pa dang rkang pa dag bkum/ las ci zhig bgyis na des lha rnams kyi nang du skyes/ las ci zhig bgyis na desaM
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasdar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags ba/ tshogs red
ba zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smani// ces bya ba'i khar snga ma bzhinano// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzung po nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshal hawi thub pa na/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan b/ bde ba gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
lasgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'dasrungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung sta/ de'i gsung rab la 'di rnams rab tu
byung bar gyur te/ den 'di rnams kyis slob ba dang mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams la lag rdum rkang rdum zhes bya ba'i tshig kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad de/ las
de'i rnam bar nabs lo mang por dmyal ba rnams kyinang du skyes so// las de nyid kyi lhag mas 'di nems tsharabs lnga lag ba dang rkang ba dag bcad de/ da lta'i bar du yang lag pa dam
'dzo rkang pa dag bcad pa yin no// grang nga la sams rab tu dang ba'i byas pa'i las de'i rnam par snyan pas ni/ lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// gang 'di rnams kyis de na lung mnos pa dang/ bklag
ba dang/ kha ton byas pa des nanga' spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas pa yin no// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ ga slong dag
khyed kyis de lta bu bslab par bya'o zhes bya pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dunas ma da 'phags skyes po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang/ 'phags skyes pos snus pa/ kyi skyes bu/
bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung/ des smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'di nas zhag bdunan/ ko sa la'i rogis sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin dur bas 'chad par 'gyur ro//
'phags skyes bo yad ma la gnod dang bcas tems tshig bzhin sams canadamyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro zheso gsung ngo// 'phags skyes pas thos nas lag pa 'gram/
pa la gtadanas sems khongs su chud de 'dug go/ ma la gnod kyis snus pa/ lha khyod ci'i phyir phyag 'gram pa la gtadranas sAms khos su chud cing bzhugs/ des snas pa/
la gnod/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces/ zhag bdun 'phags skyes pa la la gnod dang bcas te mas tshig bzhin ams can dmyal ba chen bo mnar med par ltung bar
'gyur ro zhes gsung na/ pa ji ltar sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug des smras pa/ lha ga zhig bram ze 'ongs pa la tshal ma ma skyel ba de yang bung ba brgya stong du pasamasAnaM/ lhas
dag sbyong go'u tama'i gnyen bshes de snyed cig bkum ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ dad skad gsung ma da rung/ gzhanagasung yang rung ste/ 'on kyang lha skyed mos tshal du chab kyi nang du khang
bzas ka ba gcig pa zhig bgyid du sul te/ lha dar gangashegs nas dgu nga bdun du bzhugs la/ dgung bduna'adus pa dang slar mnyan yod du gshegs bar mdzadacig des smras pa/
de ltar byas 'gro'o zhes pa btsun mo' 'khor dang bcas tader song nas 'dug go nyanizhag gcig thal ba dang/ mal gnod kyis sas ba/ lha dgung zhag bdun las gcig ni thol lags/
lhag ma dgung zhag drug mchis te/ dgung zhag drug 'das nas mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad dozhes bya ba nas/ nyin zhag gnyis dang gsum nas/ bdun pa la lha dang khan
la mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar de bzhin du byas so// de nayul ngan zhig kyang byung bar gyur to// bud mad na rgyan la dga' ba mni pas/
ba btsunamo 'khor mas kyis smras pa/ bu nu mo dag bdag cag deng mnyan yod du 'dong dgos pas/ rgyun phyogs bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rgyan thogs bar brtsams so/ de na btsun mo'i
'khor zhig gis sngas nang tshangs can gyi stod du nor bu chu shel bzhag nas/ rgyan thogs par brtsams so// ji tsam na u la ngan sas ba dang/ khrima'i 'od gzer gyis ma shel gyi thog tu bab
nas ma byung ba de sngas nang tshangs can la mchad do// de las kyang khang bzangs la mched nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor rnams na bros so// 'phags skyes pa dang ma la gnod tshig bzhina' bros
par bar mas pa dang/ tsom na ma ma yin pa dag gis sgo rnams bcu danas/ 'phags skyes pos tshig bzhin du smras ba/ ma la gnod tshig go/ das snyas ba/ lha chos go nas de dag
da skad du 'o dod 'bod cing nAmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal ba/ u0f8bsdig ba byas bas 'di'i tshig phyi
mar tshig/ gnyis kar tshig sta da na bdag nyid kyi// las rnams smani mthod de tshig rab tu tshig/ 'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing tshig/ sdig pa byas pa 'dir snaphyi mar sbya// gnyis
00 kar sna sa de ni bdag nyid kyi// las rnams smanemathong de spa rab tus// 'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing sa// zhes gsungs pa drang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa
kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunub tshigs su bcad po 'di dag gi rten bdag gis ma 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun daga' bo skyes bu gti
chug 'phags skyes po de mal gnod dang bcas timos tshig bzhin dmyal ba mnar med par song sta/ das de las dgongs nas/ sdig pa byas pa 'di'i tshig phyi mar tshig ces bya ba
nas/ 'gro ba ngan bar song ba phyir zhing// zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs pa yin no// gang gi tsho'abags skyes pos/ shAkya rnams bsad ba de'i tshe/ shAkya'i phyi mo rnams kyis de rnams
kyi rgyan dgu mthong nas ngu bar brtsams to/ de rnams kyis bsams pa// shAkya rnams nA'aphags pa rnams la mngon par dad pa yin pas/ rgyan 'di dag 'phags pa rnams la
dbul lo zhes/ da rnams kyis rgyan de dag dge slong rnams la bul lo// drug sde rnams kyis rgyan dadag thogs nas sar skya'i gnas su zhugs pa dang/ shAkya'i bu mo rnams kyis
dedag mthonganas/ de bzhin du rlabar gyuracing smras pa/ 'phags ba dag bdag cag gis de'i slad du 'di dag phul nas dmagis de nyid byung bar gyur to zhes byas pa dang/ de dgacang
tha0 @#/ ma sme bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'a das kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dag gis gang cung zad
byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams rgyan thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dag slob gso rgyan sngal ma dang/ byang phrul can dang/ blo gam can dang/ gsar skud dang/ rgyan sna tshogs gzhanaci
yang rung ma thogs par mi bya sta/ zags na'agal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// kasdom ni blas pa dang ni bslab pa dag/ duba'i 'dabu snyanagace'u bcas// lhung bzed/
rtsod dang zung nga dang// mar dkar 'bru mar byug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugos so//
ri brags shage na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig stsol bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dag ma spyod par byed do// dus gzhan
seg na de nye du rnams kyang zad par gyur/ nor yang zad/ longs spyod dag kyang zad nas/ des bsams pa/ dani bdag rgyas bas nor bsgrub par bya yang mi nus/ bdag la las
spyod dag kyang yod/ bdag gi nyidu rnams kyang dus las 'das bas/ song la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam du rig nas/ des chung ma la sa pa/ babrang mo da ni rgas pas nor bsgrub
par bya yang ma nus/ nga la longs spyod dag kyang med/ nga' 1du rnams kyang dus las 'das khyod la dras te song la rab tu 'byung ngo// khyim bdag de drang po zhig na/ da nagayo kun/
spyodacing rtag tu skyes pa gzhan la lta ba zhig pas/ des smras pa/ ba sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/ 'on kyang dus dus su ltar byon cig/ des de bzhin bya'o zhes dam bcas nas/ rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ dag srong zhig gi drung du phyin nas lcas pa/ 'phags pa rab tu'abyung bar 'tshal lo// des smras pa/ bzhin babrangs khyod 'jigs pa med par stobs
pa dag lta legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yi dag par mtho ba'i mkhas pas nareb tu 'byung bar mos por bya ba nyid du 'os te/ lnga gang zhin/ bdag gis rang gi
don ma 'dres ba thob par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos bar bya bar 'os ba nyid dang/ bdag gang dag gi bran dang/ mngag gzhug pa dang/ bkol
ba dang/ rang dbang med pa dang/ dga' dgur 'gror mang ba yin pa dedag gas mchod par bya bar 'gyur ba dang/ bstod par bya bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'amakhas pas rab
tu 'byung bar chos bar bya bar 'os pa nyid dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang/ bde ba bla namadapa 'thob par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos
par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang/ bdag mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa ma thob pa las yongs su nyams kyang/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyurab r
yang dag par na tho ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa de dang/ sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos skyes bu dam pa yang dag par song ba/ mchog rnams
[:]kyis rnam grangs du mar rab tu 'byung ba bsngags par yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os ba nyid do zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyi sams bskyed pa dag
klu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung zhig skyes des de rab tu byung/ bstan bar rdzogs bar byas so// danas zhag gnyis gsum zhig kun tuphyudapa'i chos bslabs
nas smras pa/ bzhin btsangs ri dgas kyis ri dgas mi sos kyis/ mnyan yodargya chen po rang gi spyod yul du pa'i yul du bsod snyoms la rgyu ning 'tsho bar gyis shig/ de phyi de nyin snga
N+Na dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// da bsod snyoms la rtsub na/ rang gi chung ma 'dra ba'i bud med cig mthong
nas des bsams pa/ bdag ga sngon gyi chung ma de la rab tu byung nas ltar 'ong ngo zhes dam bcas kyis/ de'i phyirebadag da gzod rab du byung ba yin pas dus cung zad cig
bsdadal/ de la dga' bar ma 'gyur bar de ltar 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas/ bsod snyoms la brgyus te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal dus nga ngo// des dus cung zhig bsdad nas/ mkhan
ba la smras pa/ mkhan po bdag la sngon gyi mchis brang zhage mchis te/ dal bdag gis rab tu byung nas ltar mchi'o zhes dam bcas pas/ de'i slad du gnang bar mdzod cig dang
mchi'o/ des smras pa/ bu song la khyod kyis sams srungs shig/ des snas pa/ bsrung bar bgyi'o zhes smras nas chas pa dang/ rim gyis ri bregs der phyin to// des de
rgyang bo khe na nas mthong ba dang/ de dga' ba dang bcas shing myur ba myur bas bsu nas sbas pa/ rje'i sras byonapa legs so byon pa legs te/ ring mo zhig lon nas mthong ngo zhes
sbas nas/ rig pa ra brtsams pa dang/ das snas pa ci byed/ chos gos dag blangs nas mnyal bsor gzhug mod/ des smras pa ma reg cig/ ci'i slad du/ mkhanapos
ngal khyod kyis sems srungs shig ces bsgo'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyod sums srung la rag mod/ bdag gis bkage gam tsazhis des de'i chos gos dag blangs nas snyan/
bting ste/ rkang pa bkrus nas bskus so// de nas khrus byas nas zan byin te/ de yang de nyid du zan ba' bar 'dug pa dang/ des smras pa ci byed/ des smras pa/ rdzo'i sras
@#/// khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas 'di mo zhig lonano// des smras pa/ mkhan bos nga la khyod kyis sams srungs sha ces bsgo/ des smras pa rje'i sras
'a khyod sams sa la rag mod/ bdag gis bkag gam tsi/ bdag khyod dang lhan cig zanazos nas ring mo zhig lenapas/ gdon mi za bar bza' rdo zhes des da dang lhan cig phranazos so/
na da nas mal bshams nas snas pa/ rje'i sras gzims mal 'dir shul gyis mnyel ba'i mnyel sos shige/ des rkang pa bkrus nas nyal ba dang/ de la nga de nyid du nyal bar brtsams so//
des smras pa cakhyed/ des smras pa/ 'i sres khyod dang lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas/ ma bkyonacige/ des smras pa/ mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems srungs shigecas bsko'o//
sa smras pa/ rje'i sras khyedasams srung la rag mod/ bdag gis bkag gam ci/ khyod dang bdag lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhage lugs pas/ gdon mi sra bar nyal bar bgyi'o// dem btub
[@ ]ba dang rdos bsam sa pa/ mgul nas 'jus na bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des de'i mgul nas 'jus pa dang/ bud mad rig pa'i dug yinas/ reg pa tsam gyis thog bag
spyad do// dus ring zhig 'dug nas smras pa/ bzang mo 'gro'o// des bsams pa/ 'di dang bdag lhan cig gsang ba byas pa gang yine pa de dge slong rnams kyis mi shes pas// skye bo mang bos
bshes par bya'o// des na de dag gse bskrad pas slar 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ des snas pa/ rje'i sras dbazhin du ji ltar bzhud/ lam brgyags kyi zing kar sha pa Na dag snyoms
shig des smras pa/ bzang mo dge slong rnams dbyig la ma rig na ji ltar blang/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gis ci nas kyang reg pa de ltar bgyis snoms shagi nyes/ des dbyige thul/
por bcug nas btunges te/ 'khar gsal gyi rtsa ba la btags so// drags pa ltos pa dang/ sradangs ldongs pa rnams nami byed pa cung zad med pas/ des da khyer yong ba dang/ mi

gyis mnyan yod du phyin to// drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo ma stongs pa yin bas/ tshadang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal khyed
kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug kha des de thag ring po nas mthong na sgra snga ba'i ma tog lta bu / snyanem rab tu 'phyang ba zhig nas/ des bsams kha/ 'di dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong gis
bsur 'gro'o zhes de bsur 'gro'o zhes de sur song ste/ gnas brtan byon palegs so byon pa legs so zhes byas pa dang/ de slob dpon phyag 'tshal la phyag 'tshal lo zhes zer nas/ tshadang
ldan pa nyadags bsams pa/ kye ma 'di ni rganazhugs shig ste/ slob dpon yang mngashes/ mkhan pa yang ma shes so// re zhig 'di ga las 'os ba dra'i snyam du bsams nas sbas ba/
rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'os/ des smras ba/ slob dpon bdag sngon[©] mchis zung zhig mchis pa ltar mchis te/ bdag de nas mchis so/ rgan zhugs legs
ta khyod ni byas pa ga zo ba zhig go byas ba gakhro ba nimakhas pa rnams kyis bsngags tra/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis kyang dge slong dag de lta bas na/ 'di ltar bslab bar bya ste/ 'di ltar
byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas pa chor bar bya zhing/ byas pa chung ngu yang chud gzan par mi bya na/ chen po lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bka' stsal to// ston gyi chung ma mthong ngam/ mthong lags
so de khams bde 'ag/ khams bde lags so// rgan zhugs don go na/ 'khar gsal gyi rtsa ba la 'phyang pa 'o matse yin/ slob dponadas t+tAkhul brgyags kyi zong dukar sha pa Na dab
cig stsal ba lags so// rgan zhugs khyod lta bsod nams byas pa zhig ste/ sngon gyi chung ma yang mthongal/ redapa yang grub bo// slob dpon khyod kyi bka' drin lags so// des bsams
pa 'di las gzhan yang 'byung gis/ re zhig 'di la dri bar bya'o snyam nas/ ngas de la tshig 'jam po brjodapa'i tshul gyis thams cad dris pa dang/ rgan zhugs de drang po'i ring bzhin canAzhagi
pas des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad do// des smras pa/ rgan zhugs de thams cad mkhan po la sbos shig dang/ khyod kyi mkhan po med dga' bar 'gyur ro// de de ltar bslas pas ji ltar gyur pa mkhas
pa la bsad pa dang/ des kyang dge slong rnams la bsnyad/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skyes bu gti/
mug 'di sbyor ba nyams kyi/ bsam pa nam nyams so// 'di phas pham pa byung ste/ de lta bas na gnang gis rapatuphyung ma thag tU pas pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi rgyas par ngashod cig dang/
cas pa 'di mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong/
dga' ba can zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de/ rtag tu dgon pa nags mtha'aganas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa zhig pas/ de'i ming bsam gtan pa dga' ba can zhes bya bar chags so// de
gang gi tshaskyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan byed pa'i tshobadud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis gtsos so// de dus gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung chas de 'dug pa dang/ bdud kyi sa kyi lha mo zhig gis
de'i skyil mo krung gi stang du 'dug pa dang/ bud med na rig pa'i dug in pas/ des de dang lhan cig lag par spyad do// log par spyadam thag tu zlog rdus zug pa khazhan du gnod
nas[？ ]sams bskyadab/ bdag gis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bstan pas/ 'dag song la 'babs so snyam mo// yang bsams paM/ bdag gis bca'
pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs pas re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ gal te skal ba yod pa zhig tu gyur na ni gnas so// bon mang nani
dga' dgur spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ lag pa g.yas pas ni chos gos rnams khyer/ lag pa g.yon bas ni lag skyes bkab nas/ ma zung gnag cing mcham dang bcas bzhin
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor ga slong brgya stong du ma'i gung la gdanabashams pa la bzhugs te chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshadang ldan pa
dga' ba can rgyang rang bo khe nanas gzagis so// gzigs nas kyang dgongs pa/ gal te dga' ba can la ma smras na/ gang khrag dron por skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod/
do snyam du dgos nas/ tshadang ldan pa dga' bcan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' ba can 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da ste ngom thung gnag/ des gsol ba/ btsun pa
bdag sdonan dga' ba can lags kyis/ danam dga' ba can la gros so// dga' ba can kyis de skad:/ khyod kyis zhig byas/ btsun pa bdag gis bslab pa ma phul bar ma changos
bar spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bstan te/ de nabacab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs lags so// dga' ba nyan khyed ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa la slob par spro 'am/ bcom ldan
0 'das spro lags so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong dga' ba can gyis spyad par bya ba ma yin pa spyad kyang sams gcig gis kyang ga
bcubs pas/ 'di pas pham par ma gyur gyis/ ga slong dga' ba can dang/ gzhan yang rung/ 'di lta bu gang yin pa la rjesrid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin cig/ sbyin pa mang
'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams nas/ 'gaN+Dibardungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsko nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'jug pa dang/ dge slong dga' ba can gyis
rgan mas dzilta ba bzhin du 'dug pa byas la/ rgan pa'i mthare tsog tsog pur 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
bdag dge slong dga' ba can zhes bgyi bas/ bslab pa ma phul ba'i mi tshangs bar spyod pa 'a khri ge ba'i chos bstan te/ dAni bcag pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcibs nas/ bdag dge slong
dag ba can dag 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na dag 'don thugs brtsi la sun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs bskyel ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong dga' ba can la ji
srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong dga' ba can thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te/ mthong ba'i nyi 'a khor du
bzhag la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dunabatsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dga' ba can 'dis bslab pa ma phul
bar ma tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bstan te/ de na'adis bcab pa'i sams gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas/ dge slong dga' ba can 'dudage 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
bslab pa gsol na/ gAl ta dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing brjod na dag 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dag 'dun gyis dge slong dga' ba can lnga ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/
bslab pa stsal to// 'di ni gsol ba'o/ las ni 'di ltar bya sta/ dge 'dunabatsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dga' pad 'das bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa
'khri bog pa'i chos bstan te/ de na 'dis btab pa'i sams gcig gis kyang ma btabs nas/ dge slong dga' ba can 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol te/ 4
pa'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na/ dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa su la bar/ tshadang ldan pa gang dag bzod
pa de dag nicang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag ma bzodapa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po/ 1 las brjod pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o// dge 'dun
gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dag 'dun gyis dge slong dag 'a ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cung ma gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ngas
bslab pa phyi pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos bcu'i bar bya ste/ bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong gi gus par sna ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/
mngon du ldang ba dang/ thal mo sbyor ba dang/ 'dud pa las bdag gir ma bya/ stanagacig la 'dug par ma bya/ gal te 'dug nayang stanaches dma' ba long zhig/ 'chag sa gcig tu
bcag par ma bya/ gal te 'chag na yang gom pa bsre'o// phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag gi khyim drag lu'agro bar mi bya/
gal te 'gro na dge sbyong mdun du btang bar bya/ stong g.yogs gcig par nyal bar mi bye/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/ gnas sbyin par mi bya/ dag sbyong gi
ched du gzhag par mi bya/ gsol ba las mi bya/ gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin/ gsol ba dang bzhi gi bya'o// las byed par bsko bar ma bya/ dge slong ma ston pa mi bya/ sngon bskas pa
zhagi na yang des dge slong ma la gdams par ma bya dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ spyod pa nyams pa dang/ 'tshob nyams pas gleng bar ma bya/ des gdams
ngag dgag bar ma bya/ gso sbyong ma ani/ dgag dbye ma yani/ gsol ba'i las ma yane/ gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin/ gsol ba dang bzhi ma yin/ nang par
sngar langs desgo dbye bar bya/ mar ma'i snodabasal bar bya/ gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya/ phyag bdar bya/ ba lang gi lci ba sa pa bzang pos byug par bya/ bshang gci khang phyag 'dar
nga bya sa dang/ lo ma dag dang/ tshugrang mo 'am/ dronamo dus dang mthun par gzhag par bya/ de nas wa'i kha phyag par bya/ dus shes par bya ste/ stanabasham par bya/ bdug pa'i snod/
dang bdug pa ltabar gzhag par bya/ gal te ston pa'i yon tan sgrog par nus na/ bdag nyid kyis bya/ cis ma nus nas ba po la gsol bar bya'o// zas kyi skos sa la brtag par bya zhing/
zas bsos winanas khang sbyang dusong ste/ 'gats+tshibardung bar bya/ tshaba'i dus su dge slong rnams la bas yab kyis g.yab par bya/ phanas bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kyi ni rdzog/ bsAn
par ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi ni gong du spyod lam zhi bas dge slong ga 'dushes zhabar bzhag ste zas bza' bar bya/ bras kyi bya ba byas nas gnas mal phug tu tshul bar rgyu/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi der bar
bya sa shes par byas nas/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang san mo'i mchod rtanadag phyag bdar bya zhing/ ba lang gi lci ba sarapa bzang pos phyul/ par bya/ 'du ba'i dus su gnas mal ]
bsham par bya zhing/ bdug pa dang bdug pa'i snod gzhag par bya/ ston pa'i yon tan bsgrags bar bya/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dag 'dun gyi chos gcig lags te/
gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang/ gtsug lag khang gi lha rnams kyi don du tshigs su bcad pa gsus shig ces ma brjod par bya/ ci sta ma nus na ga slong la bcol bar bya'o// dge slong rnams
gnas khang sgo bar mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang bsko bar bya'o/ da pa yang mi ster nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rAd pa sbyin
par bya'o// de dag ba'i phyogs la brtson par ma byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par bya'o// de'i spyad pa ni'adi yin/ srod lam dum
zhugs kyi bar du'o// dal lam du zhugs pa na 'di yin te/ zag pa zad pa'o// des 'bad/ bar la/ bsgroms pas 'khor ba'i 'i khor lo g.yo ba dang ma g.yo ba chalnga pa 'di nyid rtogs
nas 'dus byas kyi nam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa/ ltung ba/ 'gyes pa/ rnam par 'jig par bsgoms nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
sum du byas te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ gsor dang ba bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa/ tsan dan dang stabu 'dra ba/ ma rige pa'o
sgo nga'i sgrubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnying pa la chags pa dang bkur sta la rgyabakyis
phyogs ba/ dbang bo dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ brjedapa dang/ gus par sba bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to// dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang de bzhin du 'dug cing
Ta las kyang byed nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rgan rims bzhine 'dug par bya zhing/ ji ltar bkag pa yang rang bzhin du gnas pa'i deg slong rnams kyis bya'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa pa lan da'i bu rab tu byung tshun chad de rtag tunanas/ tshangs pa mtshungs
par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i drung song sta dris pa/ gnas brtanabade 'am/ des smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa dag bdag na sta ma bde'o// gnas brtan khyod cin/ tshadang ldan pa dag bdag glo lu/
zhing 'o/ gnas brtan san cung zad mdzod cig tshadang ldan pa dag bdag gis sngonaring bu du ba bstan to/ gnas brtan pa cis mA stan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs
dpa [”]dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na gnangagis dge slong nad pas reng bu'i du ba brdub par bya'o//
0bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pas reng bu'i du ba brngub par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams de bzhin du rdzob pa dang ma legs nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
kham phor bu ga phug la/ kham bar kha sbyar nas rdubs shogi/ 'on kyang ma legs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbu gu can gyis rdubs shig/ da rnams kyis smyug ma'i
spu bus brngubs pa dang/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smug ma'i spyi bus brngub par mo bya'i/ 'on kyang lcags kyi snyan gze'abya// sa
cang thung ba byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang thung ngur mi bya'o/ zhacang ring por byedi nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'on kyang sor bcu gnyis
kyi tshad du bya'o/ de dag rnonapor byedanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnon por ma byagro rtsub por byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por mo'o
dbab bab tu'ajog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul ba/ bab bab tugazhug par mi bya'o/ 'on kyang snod du bcug ste gzhag par bya'o// de rnams kyis snod du bcug ste sa la
'jog pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' sul pa/ sbyod sa la gzhig par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang zung nga 'am/ gos kyi gdang la gdags par bya'o// de btsa' khyir nas/ bcom
bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshadang ldan pa pa yin da'i bu gang nas rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu
nanas/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams de'i drung du song ste/ gnas brtanabade 'am zhes dris pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag na sta ma bde'o// gnas brtan khyod phyi na/ tshadang/
ldan pa dag bdag cham pa bdo'o// gnas brtan snyan cung zad mdzod cig/ tshad ldan pa dag ston bdag gis snar grugs pa'i las byas so// gnas brtan da ji sta mi byed/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dag srong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis sbar blugs pa'i
las bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis snang grugs pa'i las bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams de bzhin du snar klugs pa dang bo nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lo pa/
de bzhinadu glugs par ma bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis lo ma'i phur mas glegs pa dang nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ le ma'i phur mas glegs
bar ma bye'o// dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi grwas glugs pa dang/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos gos kyi gros glugs bar mi
bya'i 'on kyang snar klugs pa'i spyad kyis blugs par bya'o// dge slong rnams snaralugs ba'i khyad mtshugag pa byed nas/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra blugs pa'i spyod/
mtshuganyis pa bya'o// dge slong rnams mtshurnon po byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mchu rnon por mi bya'o// dge slong rnams lag pa ma bkrus par glags nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa dag bkrus dbyin len byas nas grugs par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshol bya ka
lanata ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa mi len pa'i bu ga nas rab tu byung ba de tshun chadartag tun nas/ tshangs pa mtshungs bar spyod pa rnams de'i dra song snya/ gnas
brta nabade 'am zhes dras po dang/ des smras pa/ bdag nas ma bde'o// gnas brtan khyod can/ tshadang ldan pa dag b.rang ngo// gnas brtan sman nyung zadomadzodacig/ tshadang ldan
ba dag bdag gis sngon phul ba'i btung bor bcas so// gnas brtand tsasta ma bathang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnangags phul ba'i btung bor bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab mchod
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar dkar ram 'bru mar gyis bskus tagazhag bar bya'o// dgos pa byung ba'i tshong bkrus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ bkru bar mkhya'i/ 'on kyang mar gzhug par bya sta/ de nyid de bkru ba yin no/// sdom ni/ bsags pa dang ni khrus tshu deng// snar glugs spyad dang btung
phor dang// khyogs dang chab khungs dag dang// chu dang bkru ba'i sa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong nad pa zhig smanapa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzas sman ston cig ces byas pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bsags pa'i khrus kyis khrus mdzod cig
dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/
com ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gal te snyan pas bstanan bsags pa'i khrus kyis khrus bya ste/ khrus bya ba 'di la 'gyod par ma bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bsags pa'i khrus kyis khrus bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis bsags pa'i khrus dzilta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ de rnams yang snyan pa'i/
drung du song sta/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bsags ba'i khrus dzilta bu yin pa ston cig/ ngas snus pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis kyang
shes te/ bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba gso ba'i dpyad lus/ bsags pa'i khrus zhes bya ba btonan/ dpalta bu yin pa ni ma shes so// 'on kyang khyed nyid kyi ston pa thams
cad makhyen pa yin pas de nyid kyis mkhyen gyis/ song la de nyid la zhus shig/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas la gsol pa dang/ com ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ba/ rlung 'byin pa'i rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu gang dag mnab de dag bskol nas khrus bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de dag bskol te khrus byas ba dang
da nams rtsub por gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snum bsku bar bya'o/ da nams
