kyis bsus pa dang/ hacang snyam chos gnas mal dag ma rung bar gyur ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khrus rtsas bkru bar bya'o// de rnams de bzhin du
rtsub por gyur nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu'i bum pa tha ma'i nang du 'bru mar thigs pa gsum mam gnyis grugs par bya'o/ gsangs rgyas
ma'i tshol bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshadang ldan b pa yin pa'i dug gnyen dag 'ong pa dang/ des 'ongs pa de dag la chos bstan nas/ de rnams khyim
ka dusong sta chung ma dag la smras pa/ 'phags ba pa 'an da'i bus chos snyan cing snyan ba dag bshad// bdag cag gis de mnyananas 'ongs so// de dag gis smras pa/ khyed ni sangs rgyas
byung ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no// ci'i phyir/ de dag gis sbas pa/ khyed kyis 'phags pa pa na da'i bu la chos snyanacing snyanab dag mnyan pas/ khyed kyang ci'i phyir ma nyan/
bdag cag nang dman ba sta/ dogo/ 'on kyang gal te 'phags pa 'di gshegs te bshad na bdag cag gis kyang mnyan to// gal tad lta na 'phags pa la bya'o// de dag gis smras
ba lags so// de rnams kyis de'i drung du song nas/ 'phags ba bud med dag chos nyan par 'tshal lo zhes byas ba dang/ sa smras pa/ shes ldan dag nyanal rag mod/ ci kho bos
bkag gam/ da rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa bud mad kyi mchid nas bdag cag ngo tshosta/ gal te 'phags pa 'dir gshegs nas bshad na bdag cag kyang nyanado zhes mchi'o//
des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag nabs song sta bshad mi nus so// 'phags pa phyogs 'tshol te mchas des gshegs shig/ bzhanibazangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na nga
ltar 'gro/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis gzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa pa lan da'i bu lhan cig gnas pa dang nyaganas dag gis bskor te/ khyogs su zhugs nas chos
rgyun du chas pa drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de'i lhan cig gnas pa rang nyid gnas dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dug 'gro ba 'di su zhig/ da rnams kyis smras pa// mkhan po'o//
ci bcom ldan 'das kyis khyogs gnangs/ gnang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa na bzang sku/ shAkya skyed de ba 'di rnams rkang gsi 'gro bar mi nus pos/ rnam pa thams
cad du bdag cag la brtse bar mdzad do// da dug song ba dang/ drug pa rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nyengaga' bo bdag cagartsisku 'khed khyogs bya'o// legs tade bzhin bya'o zhes de
rnams kyis rngam dang dril bu la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa'i khyogs byas so// de nas de rnams zhugs nas srang gi nang du 'jagi rten la bu bzhin du rlom zhing chas pa dang/ bram lnga dang
khyim bdag rnams kyis snyas pa/ 'ashes ldan dag 'di ci zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhen pa gnang ngo// 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnod dam/
@#// de dag kyang ma smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcos ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong
'a ma na ba gnon pas 'gro bar mi bya'o// dge slong ma na ba bzhon bas 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang bzhonabs 'gro ba ni gnyis te/ rgas 'khogs pa nyam chung ba dang/ nad
pa sbyor ma bzodapa'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyanayod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag dad
pa can zhig 'dug pa do bram ze ma dad pa zhig dang lhan g rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ dad pa can gyis dal luba'i tshal bstan par brtsams so// da phan tshun 'khyam 'khyamapas
sha ri drung na ngan skyugs ngashagi mthong nas/ des snas pa/ grogs po dag sbyongashAkya'i bu rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/ ma tog dang 'bras bu reshangag drung du bshang ba dang gci ba byed do//
sa sbas pa/ grogs po bdag nyid chen ba de dag nide ltar ma byed kyi/ gdonami za bar khyim pa 'ga' zhig gis byas so// de dag de skad du smra ba na/ rgan zhugs shig mgo gos kyis
dkris zhes shing drung dubashang ba bya bar brtsams pa dang/ de bram ze ma dadab des mthong nas smras pa/ grogs [u0f7c] khyod mar khyim pas byas so zhes ma zer ram/ dag sbyong mgo gos
kyis dkris tang+gashing drung na bshang ba byed pa 'o la skyes zhes byas pa dang/ deskyangs nas cang ma smra bar 'dug go/ des skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad do// dge slong rnams kyis/ bco
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung thadabyung ba ni/ dge slong rnams shing drung dubashang ba byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na
dge slong gis ngashing drung du bshang ba dang gci ba sa bya'o// byedan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis shing drung dubashang ba dang gtso ba mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
dge slong dag lam du zhugs tadongab dang/ jicom na'abrog cig tuphyin to// de na dge slong kha cag ni bo shang ba bro'i// kha cig ni gcib bro na/ de rnams shing 'di dag 'dab chags
pa'o snyam nas bshang ba yang ma byas/ gci ba yang ma byas pas/ de rnams na bar gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ dgon pa'i shing 'dab chags pa gang yin pa der ni bshad pa dang gcib bya sa/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgon par
bshang ba dang gci ba dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ grong mtha' ba'i dge slong rnams ma byed do/ jim na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa dang bshad pa dang gcib byedatsang/ nyim la/
bshang ba dang gcib byed pas rlabar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bahom ldan 'dus kyis bka' sul
ga ba de lta bas nuganang gis shang tsher ma can gang dag yin pa de dag gi drung du bshang ba dang gcib bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gang gi tshal dgas la phug ga ra ba bshang bas ma
rung bar byas pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa// dge slong gis rtswa sngon po yod nga ra brashang ba dang gcib ma bya'o// dge slong rnams rtswa sngon po med pas phyogs su
bshang ba dang gcib byas pas/ de mi gtsang bas gang bar gyur pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthongs 'phya bar byed/ snyod par byad de/ ga sbyong bkya'i bu 'di rnams
rgyu kyi chos la bzang/ ji ltar gcig tu'adug nas khra ba de kho na bzhin du bshang ba dang gci ba byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gras/ bshang ba'i sa bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis khyang dang nub kyi ngos su bshang ba'i khang pa bya bar brtsams pa dang de dag/
gis ji lta bu bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chang khungs nirnam pa gnyis su bya ste/ khang bu lta bu dang ba gam lta bu 'o// de la khang bu lta ba ni/
gru bzhi'i byas la dbus su gdungs bres nas/ khu bu gdod cing la gzhug par bya'o// ba dam lta bu yang gdung phyir phyung la bya ste/ de'i 'og tu'ang tshor sa can paskyadad// chapo
khu/ra chab khungasa'i khung bu'i steng du chab khung sa'i rkang rten gzhag par bya/ ril ba spyi blugs gzhag pa'i gnas bya zhingo/ sgo bsol bar btod la/ sgo 'apar dang sgo gtan dag
kyang gzhug par bya'o// gal te gcig nang du zhugs par gyur na/ cig shos kyis sgra dbyung bar bya zhing/ gal tastongan nang du 'jug par bya'o// nang na gnas pas kyang sgra dbyung bar
bya'o/ drim zhim par gyur na kha skyong gis nyani gcig bzhin sbyang bar bya zhing/ sa dang la ma dag kyang gzhag par bya ste/ de lta bas nachab khungs 'khor dang bcas pa rjes su gnang
do/bam po bcu pa/ 4//sdom ni gciba' sa dang stod spyad dang// ston pa la na dga' nyid dang/ bza' ba lta dang 'o ma dang// 'o dang
zas dang gnang ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na nyanayod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi mgonomad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
chab khungs 'khor dang bcas pa bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag de nyid du gci khar byed pa na/ dge slong gzhan dag bshang ba khro bas mi bde zhing/ de dag phag sa
gapas na bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gci ba'i gnas legs shig tu bya'o// dge slong dag phyogs gang du ji lta bu r bya ba mngazhes nas/
bcom ldan das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nyid dang nye bar ba gam lta bu r+ya ste/ wa bcug la sgo gdod cing/ sgo 'phar dang sgo gtan gzhug par bya ste chab khung ji lta bar thams cad sdu ma
bzhin du bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun daga' ra ba na bzhugs so// so ga'i dus kyi tshabram bu zhig
skom pas nyam thag ste/ chu'adod nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ de dag slopa zhig gi gan du song nas/ des snas pa/ dge slong bdag skom mchab sul du gsol/ sa ril ba
blangs nas song sku/ des smras pa/ bram ze 'thung zhig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa gtsang sbra na tha dad pa lags ni/ kye ma'o khyed kyis chab snod bzhagal/ da nas dag sbyong ngam bram
ze dag bludanaci nos/ khyod bsod nams la ma sbyor ram/ skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun
gyi chusnod gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag 'dun gyi chusnod gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ khyim bdag cig gis bcom ldan 'adas kyis dge 'dun gyi chustod gnag
bar banang ngo zhes thos nas/ das rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad gtsug lag khang gi nang du sbyangs te/ de las kun dgar ba pa dang/ khyim pa gzhan dag gis kyang gang dang gang
'dod pa khyer nas dong sta/ dge slong rnams kyis ma bkag bas stod spyad de dag zad nas/ dge slong dag gas/ khyim bdag de la smras pa/ bzhinababrangs snod spyad de dag zad kyis gzhan/
dag byicig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis mang rob tul na/ 'i slad du rang bor ma thogs pa kho nar byas par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa btod pa dang/ sa smras pa/
'apags pa dag yal bar bor ba gang lags pa de nam legs pa zhig bgyis taM/ de dag bdag gis khyim pa rnams la ni ma stsal tonas zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom
ldanu'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ de bzhin yal bar bor bar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang snod spyad 'grub pa bsgo bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis bye
brag mdapar bskos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snod spyad 'grub pa chos lnga dang ldan nis bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/
lnga gang zhan/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang/ gtatshug gis 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang/ snod spyad brubs pa dang ma brubs pa mi shes pa'o//
snod spyad 'brub pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhin/ 'dun pas ma 'gro ba dang//
zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang gtomug gsum 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang/ snodapyad brubs pa dwang ma brubs pa shes pa'o// bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya sta/ gnas mal
ma: bsham pa byas la/ 'gaN+Di brdungs nas zhes bya ba nas/ spro bar bya cu zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// ming 'di zhes bya ba byed dge 'dunagyi snod spyad 'brub par spro 'al/ gral
tapo na des sngo'o nas brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya sta/ dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dag slob mAng 'dri
zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spron/ gal te dag 'dunagyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di
zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko bar bgyi sgo/ dge slong mang 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dag 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub bo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las kyang 'di ltar
bya ste/ dge 'dun btsunapa rnams gson du gsol/ dge slongaming 'dizhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyikha
'di dag 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brug bar bsko na/ tshadang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko bar brjod pa de dag ni cung ma
gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dag 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong mang 'od zhes bgyi ba 'dra/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad
'brub par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang ma gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ du sa dge slong rnams la ni snod spyadar pa dag sbyin 'di/ khyim pa rnams la naM
sar pa dag sbyin par bud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams la sar pa dag sbyin par bya zhing/ khyim pa rnams la nirnying pa dag sbyin par bya'o// de khyim
pa rnams la byin pa na phyir yin par ma byed cing/ dge slong rnams las ni phyir lan nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyim pa rnams la byin pa ni blang bar bya'i dge slong
nams la ni ma yin no// phyi rol tu bzhag pas da dag 'khyams par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ snod spyad kyi mdzod cig byas la/ der rdza mkhan gyis lus
pa'i snod spyad rnams gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis snod spyad kyi mdzod cig byas la/ der rdza mkhan gyis byas ba'i snod spyada rnams gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
ji tsam na byang phyogs nas 'gron pa zhig 'ongs nas/ des dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te/ des bsams pa/ bdag gis dge/
'dusal yo byad b.rAn pos ci'i phyir bson bkur bya/ ma la bdag nyid kyi snod spyad kyis bstan bkur bya'o snyam nas/ sa zangs kyi snod spyadazhu ba nya bar gzhag go/ de nas kho khyad mang bos
bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dag 'dun dang thabs cig zla ba gsum du ston mo gsol nas mjug gcod kyi ston mo byas nas chos so// de 'gro ba'i tshabras kyi snod spyad de dag thams cadra ba/
'dun la phul nas/ dge slong dag gis mdzod de nyid du rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad dang lhan cig bzhag pa dang/ thas kyi snod sbyang kyis bsdos te/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod/
spyada rnams chag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brangs kyi snod spyod rnams gud du gzhag cing/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams kyang gud du gzhag par bya'o//
ji tsam na bram ze zhig skom pas nyen nas/ 'dze ta'i tshal du song ste/ de dge slong zhig gi gan du phye nas sa pa/ kye dge slong bdag skom na/ bdag la chab stsal du kha sol/ des
la bum pa dang srad bu dag byinab dang/ des smras pa// 'phags pa 'dis ci bgyi/ chab stsal du gsol/ des smras pa/ bram ze chu bcus zin pa med do// 'phags pa
09 khyed na sams can thams cad la phan par zhugs pa lags pas/ kye ma'o khyedakyis chab nyobar bzhag kyad cu ma rung/ des snas pa/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dag
slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dunagyis chun par gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag gis khyams dang/ gnas khang dang/
gtsug lag khang gi nang dang/ sgo khang dang/ bang rim dag tubab bab dzubazhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ khyams dang/ gnas khang dang/ gtsug lag khang gi
nang dang/ so khang dang/ bang rim dag tubab bab tugazhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang chu'i khad pa bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis chu'i khang pa bya'o zhes bka' su ang dang/ dge slong dag gis
phyogs gang du dzilta bu bya ba ma ngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ gtsug lag khang gi nang bag lho dang nub kyi ngos su chu'i khang pa bya'o// mun g nag par gyur nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung dgag dod pa byago/ rdzab chags par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// so phag ga gcal dgram par bya
zhang stor khung gdod par bya'o/ sgo gdod par bya zhing/ sgo glegs dang yang mig kyang gzhug par bya'o// chus la 'jog par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
shing gi khri la gzhag par bya'o// gang dag chad nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so phag gi sta gas bu byas la de'i steng du rten ma bya zhing bum
pa gzhag par bya'o// bum pa'i nang gi chu ral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dus dus su bum pa bkru bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dus dus su bum pa
bkra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag cis bkru ba ni shes nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing la pu shel tsi'i khrud shing dam/ lo ma sbams
pa 'am/ ras ma'i thum bo bcings nas rung bar bya lta bkru bar bya'o// 'on kyang chuphul ba nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bum pa dag la phyad ni bkru bar bya
zhing/ phyad du chuglugs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chublugs par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis sus tshuklugs pa mnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
sh+tsa bka' sul pa/ gnas pa dag gis chu blugs par bya ste/ de lta bas na chu'i khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa gnang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas
thon shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas skya dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u tam 'khor lnga brgya dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das:
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ skye dgu yi bdag mo chen mo go'u tu mi 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya
ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das sbrid pa byung nas bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ denas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u ta mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi bcom
ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho zhing/ thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i sgra thos nas/ dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis kyang/ de kho
naskad du bcom ldan 'das yultarang du 'tsho zhing/ thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig ces smras so// dge slong ma lnga ba pa dag gi sgra sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis thos
sa/ bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tshozhing/ thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig ces sgra 'apyani cing dbyangs sgrogs par byed do// sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sgra nam mkha' la
gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang/ rgyal chenabazhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas/ skad cig dang/ thang cig de dang/ yud tsam de dang/ skad cig dang/ thang cig dang/ ludatsam de la tshangs ba'i 'jig rten gyi bar sgra grag 'a
gyur nas/ tshangs ris kyis lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das unaring du 'tsho zhing/ thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig ces sgra 'a nacing dbyas
sgrog sa bar byed do// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chenamo ge'atamal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// go'u tani khyod kyis sems can mang po'i bar chad byas te/
go'u ta ma khyod kyi sgra dge slong ma lnga brgya bdag gis thos nas de bzhin sgra sgrogs par byed cing/ dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi sgra/ sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' la gnas
ba'i gnod sbyin dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dung/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
rnams kyis bres nas/ skad cig da dang/ thacig de dang/ yud tsam de dang/ skad cig dang/ thang cig dang/ yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar sgras khyab par gyur cing//
tshos ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang de kho na bzhin sgra phyung mod kyi/ go'u tami de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nad ltar phyag mi bya ste/ de ltar
phyag byas pa ni legs par phyag byas ba ma yin no// btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag dziltar bgyi/ phyag ji ltar bgyis na
legs par phyag bgyis par 'gyur/ go'u tam de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la na 'di ltar phyag bya ste/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
kyi dge 'dunadang bcas tamathun/ kun tudag/ ma rtsod/ rtsa ba gcig/ 'don pa gcig cing myudang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bu r gyural/ ston pa'i bstan pa gsal ba mthong bar
gyur cig ces/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag bya sta/ de ltar phyag byas na legs par phyag byas par yang 'gyur 'o// de'i tshe
dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skye dgu'i bdag chen go'u tams// ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// bdag gi bcom ldan 'das ring du bzhugs// thub chen bskal
bar bzhugs gyur cig/ de yis stonal de skad gsol// sru la 'di skad bka' stsal to// go'u tam ji ltar phyag byas pa// de bzhin gshegs la phyag byas man// shos rab ldan b ltar de//
de bzhin gshegs la phyag bgyis na// dziltar legs par phyag bgyis 'gyur// zhus pa bdag la bstan du gsol// brtson 'grus brtsams pa bdag nyid brtson// rtag tupha rol gnon brtan
ba'i nyan thos mthun pa lta byed pa// de nasas rgyas phyag 'tshal yin// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u tams bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das na dag 'dun mthun pa'i bsngags pa rjod/
par mdzad de/ shi phyi'i ja srid bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shade dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pa de'i tshe/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam dug
ga nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag bsams bzhin du yongs
su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshul go/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyang ma gsung bar bzhugs nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ge'utamis/ bcom ldan 'das la
lanaganyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bdag bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das lan gnyis lan gsum ducang mi
gsung par bzhugs nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mas yang/ bcom ldan 'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bdag bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las
sh+tsa 'da' bar 'tshol go/ daskadaces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skye dgu bdag mo chen mo go'u ta ma' 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// go'u tapa mya ngan las 'da'
ba'i phyir sa 'am bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o// go'u tamo mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyire sna 'am/ bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o// go'u
tam khyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir snu na/ go'u ta ma 'dus byas thams cad na de lta bu'i chos canayane na ngas sgra ci dgos/ dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das/
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag kyang bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir sa 'am/ bcom ldan 'dus mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o// go'u tam dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
phyir sna su/ bdubar gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o// go'o moskye ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir sna na/ 'dus byas thams cad na de lta bu'i chos nyan yan pas ngas snaci
dgos/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chenamo go'u tami bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal tasong bo/ tshadang ldan pa dga' po dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ sgra gcan zin dang/ modang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der songs phyinanas/ tshadang ldan pa
kun dag 'a bo'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'chol te/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skadecas stsas so// btsun pa bdag cag bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshal la
go'u tam dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyi'i sna 'amA/ btsun pa kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o go'u ta ma dgu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phying sma
'am btsun pa kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/ go'u tam dag khyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyi'i sman/ sring mo dag 'dus byas rnams ni da lta bu'i chos can yin pas/
ngad kyis snaci dgos/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ge'u dum dang 'khor dge slong ma lnga brgya dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi rkang ba gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
dbyar khang du song ngo/ gar 'khor gsum bo dag gi rnam pa la bzhugs nas/ nyin zhag bdun du bag da thos nas/ sams can mang pos khyad par chen po thob pa de lta bu'i chos bstan
to/ de nas phyogs bar skabs yangs pa zhib tu dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gdul skyil mo krung phyed bcas nas 'dug go/ dge slong ma de dag kyang de bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag
mo chen mo go'u ta mi ti de 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs// gang la sems mnyam par gzhag narang gi stan las ma snang bar gyur cing/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkharal
mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi bo 'chag pa dang/ bgrang ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dag ston par byed cing/ ma'i khams la yang snyoms par zhugs so//
ba ma'i khams la goms par zhugs nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo kha'u ma'i lus las 'od ga zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dmar po dang/
dkar bo dang/ btsod ka dang/ shul gyi kha dog lta bu dag ston par byed cing/ cho 'phrul zung dag kyang ston par byed de/ lus kyi smadunas ma 'bar la/ lus kyi stong nas chu
grung mo'arkyen 'byung ba dwang/ lus kyi stod nas ma 'bar la/ las kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung bar byed do// shar phyogs su dzilta ba de bzhin du/ lha dang/ nub dang/ byang
gi phyogs su yang de bzhin byed de/ 'di ltar phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul rnam pa bzhi pa ston par byed cing/ bsam gtan dang bo la snyoms par zhugs go/ dge slong ma lnga
brgya po de dag kyang bsam gtan dang po la goms par zhugs so// bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la/ gnyis ba las gsum pa la/ gsum po
las bsam gtan bzhi pa la// bzhi pa las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchedal/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchedal/ rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched las ci yang mad pa skye mched la/ yong med pa skye mched las 'du shes med 'du shes med man sku mched la snyoms par 'jug cing/ 'du shes med 'du shes
ga mad man skye mched las la sa nas/ ang ci yang med pa'i skye mchang la sogs par zhugs so// tsiyung med pa'i spyi mched las rnam shes mtha' yas
skya mchod la/ rnam shes mtha' gus skye mched lasanamamakha' mtha' yas samatshad la/ nam mkha' mtha' yas rgya mchod las bsam gtan bzhi pa la// bzhi pa las
gsum ngal/ gsum pa las gnyis pa la/ gnyis pa las bsam gtan dad pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bsam gtanadang po de nyid la bananas yongs su mya ngan las 'das
so dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag kyang de bzhin du lugs dang mthunab dang/ lugs las bzlog par snyoms par zhugs nas/ bsam gtan dang po nyid la brten pa yongs su
mya ngan las 'das so// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u tam mya ngan las 'das ma thag tus chen po g.yos par gyur cing/ skar mda' ltung ba dang/ phyogs dmar po dang/ bar snang la lha'i
la mo'i sgra dag byung ngo/ gnas dge slong gang rab kyi bang rim dang/ gzhan yang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang dang dbanapa'i gnas malaM
dag nabasam gtan byed pa de dag gis/ sa chen po g.yos bar rig nas/ sa chen bo 'di ci'i phyir g.yos zhes bsam pa la zhugs na/ jitsam na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u
tam 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/ de'i lus la mchod pa
lhag par bya ba la brtson par byas 'dong ngo snyam nas/ dadag shing dri zhim po dag khyer nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u tAmI'i di byar khang du dong ngo// bcom ldan 'adas kyanyan thos
chen po kun shes ko'u dar+ya dang/ 'od srungs chen pa dang/ rlangs pa dang/ mang chen dang do ma 'gags pa dang/ shAri bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa dang/ gzhanayang
ga slong gi dag 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu skya dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'i tama'i dbyar khang du gshegs so// de bzhin du yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsunamo'a'ikhor
dang gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ grong mi dang/ yul gyi mi rnams kyi'akhor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyini'akhor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang/
ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang/ bla mkhyen drang srongabyin dang/ ji ba dang/ gzhanayang ul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs drug kyang/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u
ma'i dbyar khang du song ngo// de nas rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis rin po chadang/ gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyogs lnga brgya dang/ sridang/ bdug spos dang/ ma tog dang/
'phreng ba dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan drung/ rol mo'i sbre rnam ba sna tshogs dag phul lo// de nas tshadang ldan pa dga' ba dung/ ma 'gags
ba dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ sgra gcan zan sa skya dgu'i bdag mo chen mogo'u tama'i khyogs bag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g.yas pas bzung ngo// dge slong lhag ma
rnams kyis kyang/ dge slongam lhag ma rnams kyi khyogs bteg go/ de nas mchod pa chen po byas takhyer nas/ sa phyogs bar skabs dben par khyogs rnams bzhag go/ de nas
bcom ldanu'as kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ge'u tam dang/ dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi lus las bla gos pad nas/ ga slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skye dgu'i
bdag mo chen mo ga'u tam ring/ dge slong ma lnga brgya bo 'di dag la brgya nyi shu lan ang/ lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar med cing/ bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu la ltos/ des
skyo khul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo 'khor dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ grong mi dang/ ul ma dang bcas pas dri sna tshogs kyi shing gi phung bo sbyangs nas/ skye
dgu'i bdag mo chenamo ga'u tam la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya bo dge bsregs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos dag bshad nas gtsug lag khang du
gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang dge slong gi dag 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di
ltar ljade ba byung ba la sos zhes zer ba la/ nyes dmages 'di lta bu dang/ gzhan dag kyang yod pas/ dalta bas na dge slongags sbridapa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par mi bya'o//
da nA'agal tshabs canadu 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ tha chos thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa skye/
dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lta brlabo dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des 'di dag skyes nasagung lo brgya nyi shu lags kyang/ lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar ma
mas shing/ bu mo dgung lo bcu drug len lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta la sogs pa/ dge slong
sa lnga brgya po dag nyid kyi las tshogs redapa/ rkyenayongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du 'bar gnas ba/ gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags// skye
dgu'i bdag mo chonamo la sogs pa/ dge slongam lnga brgya po dag nyid kyis las byas shingabasags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas
shing bsags pa dag nI/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par sAnA bar su 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ ma' khamasal ma 'gyur/ rlung gi
khams ma 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang ma dag ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mched dag la rnam bar sman par 'gyur//
bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su ang / las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// lus can rnams la 'bras bur kani// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'dus ba'i dus

na bskal pa bzang bo 'di nyid la skye dag rnams kyi tshol te khri thub pa na/ ston pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung sta zhes bya ba nas/ dgrong khyer wA ra NAsi no drang srong smra ba ri dag sa/
kyi gnas na brtan cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// gang ga tshayang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od sus kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad ba mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shing//
zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshorgyal bo ki zhes bya bas/ de'i sku la sku'i mchod pa byas nas/
lam bo'i bzhi mdor rani po tshosna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rtenakhor yug tudapag tshad gcig yodal/ gnam 'phang du dpag tshad phyad yod pa byas so// rgyal po kr-iko'i btsun mo
ma ba las de gas pa bud mad lnga brgya po de dag rgyas bsde gnas skabs na lus la gnyer ma dang sku dkar byung nas/ rgyal bos sangs pa dang/ de dag phan tshun bar brtsams pa/ grogs
mo dag lha bdag cag ci'i phyir sus/ de dag las kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la dpyadadu tsayod/ bdag cag da lus gnyer ma dang skra dkar can du gyur pas/ de'i phyir bdag cag/
spungs mod/ gzhan dag gis smras ba/ de ni da lta yin te/ bdag cag lha la ci zhig bya/ bud mad gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa gzhan dag yod pa de dgo dang lhan cig dga' dgur
sbyod grang/ de'i phyir btsem ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi mchod rten gyi drung du dong nas mchodapa byas la/ des na bdag cag phyin+tad 'khor bar lus gnyer ma dang skra dkar can du gyur cig/
ces smon lam gdab par bya'o// de dag gis sbas pa/ lags kyis de bzhin bya gos de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rtenal dri dang/ 'phreng
ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs drizhim zhangam riso pa'i chun po dang/ 'phrangab yid du
'das bdag cag skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu len yang/ lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar mchis par ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// dge slong dag ji snyam
dusams rgyal po kr-iko'i btsunamo dam ba la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ gya dgu'i bdag mo chenamo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya bo 'di dag nyid yin te/
'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas shing/ smon lam btab gang yin pa las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar skyes nas/ lo brgya
nying shu len yang lus la gnyer ma dang sgra dkar mdang/ bu mo lo bcu drug len pa'i gzugs lta bu r gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tuganag pa rnams kyi zhes bya
kha nas/ de ltar btsal bar bya sta/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bsub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// om ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong
rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la ya rangs dmangon par bstod do/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge spyong gis spradapa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par ma bye'o/
bar byed do// de rna bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod bar byed kyang/ bu pho yang ma da/ bu mo yang med la/ rgas ba'i gnas skabs su nor zad cing/ longs spyod zad/
bar gyur nas/ des chung ma la smras pa bzang mo kho banargasangashing bkrenal bu pho mAd mad/ bumo yang med pas/ rgyal byed kyi tshul du rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o// des smras pa/
rje'i sras de bzhin rab tu'abyung bar mdzod cig/ de la byed kyi tshal du song sta rab tu byung ngo// dzitsam dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma blta ba'i phyir 'ongs ba dang/ desbrid pa khyudan/ dgo
slong gangags kyang gos zhes ma byas so/ de nas de'i sngonagyi chung mas lag pa g.yon pas sa khyangs te/ sus mtshams bcad pa byas nus yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig ces smras so//
ga slong dag gis de la bdag par brtsams pa dang/ des deb lig nas bzung sku drangs nas sus pa/ rje'i sras khyod dgA bo rnams kyi nang du rab tubyung sta/ rgyal byed kyi chol
'di gnod sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lta bas ma stongs te/ bdag 'ba' zhig gis khyedal sos zhes bgyis pa des na/ di rnams kyis khyed kyi mdangs ma khyer te/ 'dir bzhugs
bas 'tshal gyis/ khyim nyid du bzhud kyis gshags shes des de'i lag pa nas bzung sta song ba dang/ de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ rgan zhugs ma 'gro bar 'dug
ga/ du 'gro ba nyid du byed cing ma 'dug nas/ dge slong dag gis de'i lag pa gcig nas bzung sku drangs ba dang/ des smras pa/ 'o na'o zhes zer ba'i
skabs de dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyi lag pa gang na zhes pa re bya ste/ gal te khyed kyis bzung
ba gang yin ba'o zhes zer na/ rgan zhugs 'gro 'dod par des kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du gtang bar bya'o gal sngon gyi chung mas bzung ba gang yin pa'o zhes zer na'agro bar mi/
'dod pas de gtang bar mi bya'o/ 'on kyang dge slong rgan zhugs na'atshobar 'dodapa'i bsam pa can yan bas/ de lta bas na rgan zhugs sbrid pa byung ba lnga sos zhes brjod par bya'o
dge slong dag gis de la smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyi lag pa gang na/ des sas pa/ tshodang ldan pa dag khyed kyis bzung ba gang yin pa// de dag gis de btung nas rang gi khyim du
song sbyo/ de nyid de'i rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag dad pa can zhig 'dug pa de bram ze ma dad pa zhig dang lhan cagirgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba
[/]dang/ khyim bdag de sbrid pa byung na/ dge slong gang gis kyang sos zhes ma byas kyi/ bram ze de nyid kyis sos zhes byas nas/ des smras pa// grogs po khyod ni dgra bo rnams la dad
de rgyal byed kyi chol 'di nAganod sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lnga brgyas ma stongs te/ khyod la kho bo 'ba' zhig gis sos zhes byas pa des na/ de dag gis khyod kyi mdangs ma phyogasakyis
tshur shog 'dong zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ dge slong dag khyim pa rnams na 'tsho ba'i bsam/
pa can yan pas/ de lta bas na khyim pa sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes brjodabar bya'o// gzhan yang dge slong dag rgan pa sbrid pa byung ba la ni langs nas phyag bya zhing// gzhon pa sbrid pa byung
pa la nachenapas nad med cig ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer wA ra NA sa ni drang srong snya ba ri dgas kyi nag sa na bzhugs so// gang ga tshobcom
ldan 'das kyis drag slong lnga chen pa nams nges pa la zhugs pa dang ldan pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la btsun ba de'itsho/ de dag gis bca' bar bya ba gang yin pa dang/ bza'
bar bya ba gang yin pa rishes pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag bca' ba nilnga ste/ rtsa
ba'i bca' ba dang/ sdong bu'i po ca' ba dang/ lo ma'i bca' ba dang/ ma tog kha bca' ba dang: 'bras bu'i de 'a bko/ bza' ba na lnga ste/ phyi
na dang/ 'bras chan dang/ ban dron nang/ sha dang/ lcam khu'o// dedag gis tshod ma gang dag dang bza' bar bya ba mi shesas/ co na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'am
dang/ zho dang/ marasar dang/ mAr dang/ skadang/ sha dang/ sha skams dang/ gzhan yang rung ba gang yin pa dang ste/ tha na chus kyang bdun bar byas te bza' bar bya'o// dge
slong dag dran pa thams cad nanyem skyedapa byed pa ano// sdom la[]sgo 'phar gyi ni lag zus dang/ skar khung dag ga dribab// ma dpyis dang ni ya dbyase dang
skad/ gtanadabyug gu skam kha 'o// sangs rgyas ces ldan 'dus mnyan yod nargyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// ga slong rnams
gnas khang dag rtsag cing sgo gdod pa mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyo gdod par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis sgo btod cing/ sgo 'phar 'jug par ma byed bas
bsam gtan dang/ 'donab la zhugs pa dag snang so/ de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas nyabar 'ongs ti/ de dag gtam rjod pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma gyur nas/
com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ge slong dag sgo 'phar gzhug par bya'o// dge slong ngag gas sgo 'bar bzhugatsang/ lag zungs yang mgi ma btogs ngas dbye dka' bar gyur
sa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ lag zungs yang mig gdags par bya'o// da phyi ba na sgra 'byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko ba'i dum bu
gzhug bar bya'o// skar khung ma btod pas mun gnag bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung gdod par bya'o// hacang yang dman par btod nas chos
rkun pa dang g.yon can dag gas bgrod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ dma' bar gdod pa la bya'o// ha cang mtho bar btod pa dang/ nyes dmigs de
nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil du gdod par bya'o/ dge slong dag gis nang rub la bya yangs bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
ba phyi rub la nang yangs pa rgya mtsho zhes ba lta bu gdod par bya'o// khyab dang yug renudag 'jug sa/ bcos ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang khya'o// dge slong dag
gso dra ba byas shing sgo glegs ma bcug pas/ sbrul dang/ sdig pa dang/ srin bu rdzum bu ko dang/ tAl tadag 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
sgo glogs gzhug par bya'o// dge slong dag gis sgo glegs bcug pa dang 'og ma chags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ma dbyis gzhug ra
khya'o dug slong dag gis ma dbyas bcug na snying 'dag tu rung nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ ma dbyis gzhug par bya'o// dge slong dag gis la dpyis bcug na/
rlung gis phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brod gta nagazhug par bya'o// dge slong dag gas phrad gtanabacug pa dang/ gcad dka' ba da dadabye dka' bar gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' su la ba/ dbyu gu skam kha bca' bar bya ste/ sa gcad pa dang dbye bar bya'o/// sdom la gsor dang lcags kyi thu lum dang// phor pa shing/
la phyags dang// rtog gu khri dang rgyab rten dang// sta re dang gsor bu'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo 'phar la lag zungs kyi yang mgo gdags par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis sgo 'phar yang mig gis bgos
sgo 'bar gas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo 'phar la brko bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo 'phar la brko bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong
dag sa yang mgi btags te drangs na mi brtan zhing gi byung nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' sul bu/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ gsor bcang bar bya zhing/ des phug la
lang mge gdags par bya'o sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun daga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa
ba lon pa'i bu gang gi tshorab tubyung ba nas/ zhes bya ba nas tshodang ldan pa dag bdag nas ma bda' zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// gnas brtan khyod tsa na/ tshadang ldan pa dag khag
rlung nad nA'o// gnas brtan sman nyung zad mdzod cage/ tshodang ldan pa dag sngon nub dag gis lcags kyi thu lum bsrol tedas chab bsros nas/ lus phul bar bgyis so// gnas
brtan ci'i slad du ma srol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
de lta bas nas su gnang ste/ rlung nad can gyis lcags kyi thu lus bcang bar bya ste/ des tshubasros la lus rdul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi thu lus bcang bar bya'o
zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gas de bsregs pa dbyung ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ lcags thag gis gdags par bya'o// dge slong dag gis
lcags thag kyang ma bcug pas de lung tshabar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der gzhug par mi bya'i/ des gsher ba'i nang du
bcug la/ lcags kyi thu lum bsreg par bya'o/ de dag lcags kyi bu lum cu u tu kas rung bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de rung bar ma bya'i/ bsregs kha
nyid de'i rung ba yin no// dge slong dag dang bor yongs su spyadaba'i chugro bar byed cing/ phyis rung ba'i chu sro bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ snga rung ba'i tshubasro bar
bya nang/ phyis yongs su spyad pa'i chub gro bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'akhob na 'od ma'i tshol bya ka lan ta ka la gnas na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa
tshu lan da'i bu gang ga tshorab tubyung ba nas zhes bya ba nas/ tshadang ldan pa dag bdag na lta mi bde'i zhes bya ba'i bor snga ma bzhin no/ gnas baNan khyod cin/ tshadang ldan pa dag 'di dang 'di
na'o/ gnas brtan/ na cung zadamadzod cig/ tshadang ldan pa dag sngonani bdag gis smanaphor bcangs so// gnas brtan ci sta ma bcung/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de
! dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ sman por bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag cig gas dag 'dun gyi bgro khang byas na/ der sol ba dag bdal 'dzug
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsdu bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sol ba dag bsdu bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag cig bsdu bar bya ba mi shes
nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi thol phyags byas la des bsdu bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi thal phyags bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge
slong dgon b pa dag la de'i 'byor pa med pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldanu'adaso la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag ga sa ngashang gi thal
phyogs byed du gzhug go/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis shing gi rdul phyags byed du gzhug go zhes bka' sul ba dang/ dge slong dag gis thal phyags ji lta bu bya ba gangashes nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mgo sbyom par byas la de nas lci ba dang 'jim pas khaskus tades sol ba bsdu bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas spyin gyi kun daga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhigo na nas sman pa'i gnodu songs smras pa/ ! bzhinababangs kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na/snyan
[r]@#// ston cig des snas pa/ 'bab ma 'di dang 'di ga dzod cig dang/ khyod sos par 'gyur ro// de la sman sbyar ba'i rtog gu dgos nas/ de khyim bdag cig gi
nAn du song sta rtog gu brnyas pa dang/ des de la rtog gu byin no// des sman sbyar te slar khyim bdag de nyid la byon pa dang/ des snas pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi lags kyis bzhud cig des snas ba/
khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// des smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig/ skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' su la ba/ dolta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ rtog gu bcu bar bya'o// ri dgas 'dzinagyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'angs kyis dge slong rnams la rtog gu ji ltar 'chang du gnang ba thos nas/
zla sa lcags rtog lnga brgyaphul na/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'adasakyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bris par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
zla rgarims dzilta ba bzhin bris par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ gzhon pa'i mthar ma khyed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis
bka' stsal ba/ ma thob pa gang yin pa de dag la kham pa'i rtog gu sbyin par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig sa la nyal bas/ 'kha zas ma zhu bar gyur nas/ sa khyim bdag cig ga gan du song ste khri ba ras nas/ de'i stod du nyal bas sos
slar de la byin pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags kyis bzhud gi/ skabs de dge slong dag gas/ nyon ldan 'as la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka' sul ba/ de lta bas nas su gnang ste/ dge slong gis khri bar bar bya'o// rigs sngags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la khri bog rican dziltar
gnang ba thos nas/ des khri bog ri can lnga brgya yul na/ dge slong rnams kyis driltang bya ba mad+d+hizhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rganArims ji lta ba bzhin bram pa
bya'o sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mdabras spyin gyi kun dga' grab na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig la rgyab rten dgos par gyur nas/
sa khyim bdag cig la bsnyas to/ u dgos byas nas slar byin pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags kyis bzhudatsoge/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo//
des sa ba/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na chog la bzhud cig skabs de dge slong dag gis/ com ldan 'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ delta bas nas su
gnang// dge slong gis rgyab rten bcang bar bya'o// ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rgya ba rten ji ltar gnang ba thos nas/
sa rgyab rten lnga brgyaphul na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba la ngo shes nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgan rams bzhun bram par bya'o/ sas rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das mnyan yodonargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig btso blag gi las byed pa de la sta re dgos par gyur nas/ sa khyim bdag cig
la bsnyas te/ des dgos pa byas nas su la byin pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags kyis bzhud gi/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// des smras pa/
'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud go/ skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'a ga grol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong gis sta re bcang bar bya'o
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// dag slo nga shig gi khri'i la ga chag nas/ des khyim
bdag cig las gathong bu bsAs ti/ sa dgos pa byas nas slar byon pa dang/ des smras ba/ 'bags pa khyodatod kyi lags kyis bzhud cig/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis
[j]ma gnang go des smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig skabs de dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// de lta bas nus su gnang ste/ dge slong dag gis gzong bu bcang bar bya'o// sdom la snya'u dang skas ni gsum drag dang// sgru'u dang nad pa phan gdags dang
shang dang sdodangs dag gi/ thang ma skas gsum gnang ba'o/[， ]/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyu la byed kyi tshal mgonamod bras sbyin gyi kunudaga'
ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig gi khri'i rkang pa chag ste/ du la sta'u dgos nas/ des khyim bdagacig la snya'u brtas nas/ dus dgos byas nas slar byon pa dang/ des
smras pa/ 'bags pa khyod nyid kyi lags kyis bzhud cig/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag bskyom ldan 'dus kyis ma gnang ngo// des smras pa// 'phags pa gal dad lta na'og la
bzhud cig/ skabs de dge slong dag giso/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta u0f7abas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis stsa'u
bcang bar bya'o// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga' ra ba na ra degs 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzongs nabazhugs so/ com ldan 'das kyis dgo
glong dag gis bge ba'i grogs bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/ dge slong dag mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang rtsig pa'i grogs byed do// jitsam na ri dgas 'dzin
ka rgyu ma'i khang bzangs mthon por brtsigs pas/ de la 'dzeg dgos par gyur na/ dge slong dag gis ci las 'dzug par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skas/
las 'phrog par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis skas las 'dzeg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag skas du yod la shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/
wA skas ni rnam pa ba sum sbyo/ shing ga deng/ thag pa'i dang/ smyug ma'i// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sar skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/
bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung po dge slong dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i luso gsar gyi mgo 'dra zhing/ skyes bu chen po' mtshan sum cu can/ srid kyang bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung
ba zhig yod pa de'i chung ma mdzes ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa// blta na sdug pa/ skyes pa'i yid du 'ong ba zhig yod pa de la/ delhag par chags pa dang/ napa dang/
'chums pa dang/ mdud pa bor ba dang/ brgyal ba dang/ lhag par chags pa dang/ lhago par chags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/
[:/ ]snga dro sham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong kun dga' bo dang/ sar skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ ser skya'i gnas
nA bsod snyoms mdzad pa na/ dgal bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs tabyonanas/ bcos ldan 'das de'i sgor bzhugs te/ 'od gzur gsar gyi kha dog lta bu btang nas/ de dag gis
khyim dwagasar bzhun ma lta bu r snang bar gyur to// des bsams pa/ nges par bcom ldan 'dus gshegs to/ des na bdag gi khyim gsar bzhun ma lta bu r snang bar gyur to snyam nas/
dus ma zhig pa tang sta kyi ma khyod song la/ sgo nam su yo da ltos shige/ de phyir byung ba na/ jitsam na bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de rings pa rings par nang du song ste/ des smras pa/
rdzobe bcom ldan 'das gshegs te// chab sgo nabazhugs so// dgus ba dang bcas pas 'gro bar brtsams ba dang/ mdzes mas bsams pa/ gal te 'di bcom ldan 'adas kyi
spyanasngar song na/ 'dinges pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/ des gos kyimatha' ma nas bzung sta/ rtsisras ma gshegs pa bzhugs shagi/ ngas sdus pa/
klong zhig bcom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas slar 'ongasho/ des de la mtshanam btab nas smras pa/ rje'i sras gal takhyod 'di bskams dgashegaso na/ bag karasha la
tsholnga brgya dbang po// des smras pa/ legs te de bzhin byas thong zhige/ des de dam bcas nas btang ste/ song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal/
bcom ldan 'das las lhung bzed bsaaslasong ngo// danas babra ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung ba byed bkab ste byung ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das bzhes pa nyid dum mdzod
par gshegs shang/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang ma lan cig ba'i badzamadzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams ni bosnyan par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin pas/ sas
pa: bcom ldan 'das la bzhes shes sna ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dbul bar brtsams pa dang/ des smras pa/ dga' ba gang kho na las blangs pa de nyid la phul cig da
spobs pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed khyer nas chas te/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs tabazhugs pa dang/ dga' bos lhung bgrod pal lo// don
bcom ldan 'dus kyis zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zo zhagi/ bcom ldan 'dus 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dal
lhung bzed kyi lhag ma stsal nas des zos so// thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saMl pa/ dga' bo khyod ci ste rab tum 'byung/ 'di ltar bcom ldanu'adas kyis gdung bas de dang de
ba0bdag tuyab yum dang/ mkhan bo dang/ slob dbon dang/ gzhanaya nga bu ma'i gnas lta bu dag gi chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' yang ma bcag pas/ sa smas ba/ bcom ldan 'adas ba dag rab
cu'abyung// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun gal ba sang la dga' bo'i skye dang kha spu bregs gi/ btsunab bka' bzhin 'tshal
zhes tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ 'dragamakhanaganyar ta breg bar brtsams pa dang/ ga' bos 'dreg mkhanol kA yu 'dreg mkhan da ring bo ma thogs par
stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur tu/ gal takhyed kyis nga'i skra dang kha spu bregs nas ngas khyod kyi lag pa khrig ma man chadagacad donas bsdigs bas/ de skrag sta 'dreg spyad/
bal ta'adug pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'adas la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshadang ldan pa dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs 'byin nas bka' stsal pa//
dga' bo khyod ba tum 'byung dmA/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'adas bdag rab tu'abyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi de kho nas chusod nas 'gor chu blugs shing/ 'breg mkhan gyis
skra dang kha spu bregs pa dang/ des bsams pa ra zhig bcom ldan 'das la gus bar bya ba'i phyir rab tubyung la/ nam sros nas 'gro'o snyam nas/ de nam sros nas song ba dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis g.yangs zhig sprul lo// dga' bos bsams pa/ mdzes ma dang thag ring ba nyid du gyur cing/ bdag gzhanakho nar 'chib 'gyur gyis nam nas tagro'o
snyam nas/ dngashani bzang mo la rnam par rtog cing sdug bsngal bas mtshanamo 'dus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la/ dga' bo la khyod khangaskyong byos shig ces sgo 'gi/ dus song nas tshodang ldan pa dga' bo bcom ldan 'adas kyis khyod khang skyong byos shig ces bka' sul to
zhes de la bsgro'o// des smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo khang skyong zhes bya ba de lags/ ra ji lta bu dag bgyi/ des smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa dga' bo gtsug lag khang gi las bya ste/ dgi
slong rnams bsod snyoms la dong nas dang por jagatsug lag khang phyag bdar bya zhing/ da nas ba lang gi lci ba sar pas rkyang nul bye/ gtsug lag khang bsrung bar bya/ dge slong rnams kyis snyas pa
ts+tshA gangayani pa de brjod par bya/ dri dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug spos la sogs pa ci yod pa de dag kyang dge 'dun la bris par bya/ nub mo sgo gcad par bya zhing/ nang par dbye bar bya/ bshang
ba'i gnas dang gciba'i gnas dag kyang sbyang bar bya zhing/ gzhanayang gtsug lag khang dang 'brel ba'i bya ba gang yin pa de dag bya'o// des smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan
00'das kyis jiskad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'chal go/ dzitsam na dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ sar skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la zhugs/
pa dang/ dga' bos bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang phyags la 'grocosnyam nas/ des phyag bdar byas pa dang/ bcom ldan das kyis gang gi tshokhyams gcig phyags pa de'i tshoganyis ba
phyag dar gyis gang bar gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// des bsams pa// phyag dar bor la 'gro'o snyam nas/ gzugs ma bzhag ste/ phyag dar dbo bar brtsams pa dang/ dupar ma gyur
sa des bsams pa/ gnas kha rnams kyi sgo bcad la 'gro'osnyam nas/ des gnas khang rnams kyi sgo gcad par bshums pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gang gi tshogs
khang gcig gi sgo bcad pa de'i tshe/ gzhan bye bar gyur pa da lta khur byin gyis brlabs pas/ daskyo nas smras ba/ bdagargyal bo gyur nas 'di bas ches lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang byas
'gro'o// yang bsams pa/ gsub lam du 'gro'o snyam nas/ dogasob lam du song ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas lam de nyid du gshigs
so/ dus bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/ de dang ha cang ma'ing ba na shing yalab stug po thur du 'phyang ba zhig yod par de myur ba myur ba nyid du song sta/ de'i 'og tu
gab nas 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shang de'i gal ba rnams ltar rgyun du 'phags bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// sa bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal ba/ dga' bo khyod gar 'gro tshur shog 'dong/ daspobs pa med bar gyurade ngo tshaba'i yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin song ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
'di shin tub brang mo la lhag par chags pas/ 'di dang bral bar bya'o snyam du mkhyenanas/ dad dang phral bar bya ba'i phyir/ ser skya'i gnas su ritsam bzhed pa bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod
gal ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ khad kyis mnyan yod du gshegs pa dang/ rigs 'dzin gyi ma sa gas/ bcos ldan 'as kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i dus gsar gya'adog 'dra
zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu canA/ bcom ldan 'das bas so pa bzhes thung ba de/ com ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'dir 'ongs so zhes thos nas/ debadag gas nas mthong
snyam mo// bam po bcu gcig ba// de nas tshodang ldan pa dga' bo dus gzhan zhig na snga drosham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ mnyan yod
dubasod snyoms la zhugs nas/ dakhad kyis ra degs 'dzin gyi ma sa ga'i khyim du song ngo// des de'i gzugs bzang zhing kha dog ni durgyas pa mthong nas bsams pa/ 'din sa pa ra bcom
0 ldan 'das kyi mched dga' bo yane nesnyam nas/ de dad pa skyes ta/ de'i rkang pa la gzhugs nas phyag byas so// des de'i sked pa la rig pa dang/ bud med kyi rig pa ni dug yin bas/ de 'ad/
chags bdo bas de'i khub gtor nas sa ga' 'gor lhung ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nibasal ba ma mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis ka'i
'bru mar du byan gyis brlabs so// des bsams pa 'din turus ka'i 'bru mar ga las 'byung/ nges par 'phags pa dga' bos ma gtsang ba ngashoral/ bcom ldan 'das bsal ba ma
mnga' kha'i chos can des/ 'di tu rus ka 'bru mar du byin gyis brlabs so snyam du 'gi nas/ ya rengs pas yi rangs ngashing/ kye ma'osangasargyus/kyi ma'o chos/ kyika'o dag 'dun/
kyi nu'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyidi/ 'di ltar dAna'i phags pa dga'ol sogs pa 'dod chags shasu chab dag kyang tshangs par spyad pa spyod donas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// da
nas tsho dang ldan pa dga' bo bdag la dag 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam snyam nas 'gyod pa skyes te/ des skabs de dge slongo mas la brjod ba dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ dge slong dag dge slong dga' bo 'dod chags lhag par che ba 'di la ltung ba med do// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste//
'a dodachabs lhag par tsha bar gyur pa de lta bu gang dag yin pa de dag gis 'dzag snod bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
'dod chags lhag par che bas sgra'u bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams pa'i bogs bsgrib bcung ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
ra dang/ ra dogs dang/ bya ba dang gsum gyi bags pa'i sgru'u bcang bar bya'o// de dag gas dbazhan bzhag pas dri la zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
bkru bar bya/ mnye bar bya/ bskam par bya'o// de dag gis ji srid bkrus nas gnas bar byed pa de'i bar du/ de dag bud mad mthong nas kha ba gtor bas ngasham thabs dgra dbyer
gyur sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis byas la gcig bsam par bya zhing/ gcig gdags par bya'o// kha cig khu ba lhag par mang du byung bas de gsher bar gyur
ny+nyo nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa// der phra glugs bar bya'o// dge slong dag gas so phag gi bur ma dam/glugs pas/ sdug bsngal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'dasaM
kyis bka' stsal pa/ bya ma 'am sa'i phru glugs bar bya'o// dge slong dag de btags bzhin du zas bza' bar byed cing/ mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar byed nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ daphyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag la khrus byas nas zas bza' ba dang/ mchod rten la phyag dag bya'o// de nas dus gzhan zhag na/ tshadang ldan pa dga' bo
phyogs gzhanazhig na rdo leb la 'dug pa dang/ des nani tubazang mo dran nas/ des da rdo leb de la ra lus bri bar brtsams pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ang dang 'os te/
des de mthong nas smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa dga' bo khyod kyi byed/ des smras pa/ btsun ba 'od srungs chen po bdag shin tu bzang mo 'dri'o/ des smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong bya ba ni ba/tis te/ bsam gtan dang gdonaba'o zhes gsungs na/ khyod ra ga chung ma 'dra zhing 'dug gam/ de ca da la skya bo 'dug go/ skabs de tshadang ldan
ba 'od srus chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmags gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong drag ra mo 'dri ba las
gyur pa mkhyenanas/ dAg slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag skyes bu gtimug dga' bos/ gshin tu bzang mo la chags pasams kyis ri mo bris so//
de lta bas na dge slongagis ri mo bri bar ma bya'o// dge slong mo 'dri bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ri mo bri bar mi bya'o zhes bka'
gastsal pa dang/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten yang dris phyug pa dang/ dris gtor bar ma byed do// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'adas rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri bar mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris ba/ kun dga' go ci'i phyi'i dge slong dag de bde gshegs
pa'i debu skra dngasan mo' mchod tanal dris phyug pa dang/ dris gtor bar ma byed/ das sgrubs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang/ rtsom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ si khyug pa dang/ sa gtor ba dag khya'i/ sems can gyi gzugs ni bri bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ rgyas bu blun po dga' bo 'di
ni da dung yang shin tu bzang mo la chags pa dang ldan zhing sogs 'brel gyis/ 'di la thabs bshum pa zhig bya'o snyam du mkhyenanas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga'
bo khyod kyis ri spos kyi ngad lta nga mthong ngam/ btsunapa ma mthong lags so// gal te de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma nas zu bzhag/ des bcom ldan 'adas kyi chos
gos kyi mtha' nas bzung go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal bo 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/ stong gi nam mkha' las ra sos kyi ngad ldang la
[z]gshegs nas/ de der tshodang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs cig de dang de dag tugangashegs pa na/ shing sa ha ka ra zhig gi drung du byon pa dang/ de na se'un ma zhig ci dga' zhing 'dug pa des/
bcom ldan 'das mthong nas ma gnang bar rtog par byed do// dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ dga' bo khyod kyis spre'u zhar ma 'di mtho dram/
bcom ldan 'adas mthong lags so// dga' bo khyod jisnyam du gams/ smra mo 'didang/ shin tu bzang mo gnyis gang gzugs bzang/ gang mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa yin/ des
gsol pe/ btsun pa spra mo 'dis shAkya'abu mo shin tu bzang mo' rgya ba cho yang nye bar ma mchi/ stong gi char ang/ brgya stong gi char yang/ grangs dang/ bgrang ba dang/ chadang/
rtsis dang/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang nye bar ma mchista/ btsun pa shAkya'i bu mo shin tubazamonalha'i bu mo dag dang 'gran ba lags so// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka'
stsal pa/ ga' po gal te de lta nade bzhanigshegs pa'i chos gos kyi thum nas zung zhig/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos kyi tha ma nas bzung ngo// danas bcom ldan 'das
ngang pa'i rgyal bo 'dab ma bskyang ba bzhin nam mkha' dkyil du 'phags ta/ stong ga nis mkha' las gshegs nas/ khad kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du byon to// des
com ldan 'das dga' ba'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du bzhugs nas/ tshodang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// dga' bo khyod song la sum cu rtsa gsum pa lha
sha rnams la ltosangag/ denas lha rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ skyid pa dang/ bsam pa'i gnas skyed mos tshal dang/ dga' ba'i tshal dang/ shing rta snatshogs dang/ rtsub
'go 'gyur dang/ 'dres pa dang/ gongs 'dudung/ chos babras la sogs pa bltas na/ de dag gcig bas gcig bzang zhing snga ba mchog tugyur pa mthong nas/ grongakhur blta nasdug
khyin to// de dar song sku bltas nas/ ba wang dang/ gling bu dang/ ba wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ cong dang/ sgra snyan la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag cing/ gnas dang gnas

dag na lha'abu rnams lha'i bu mo dag dang lhan cige rtse zhing 'khod pa mthong ngo// de 'byo'o ba de dag la lta zhing thog thag tu 'gro bar brtsams pa dang/ dzim na phyogs gzhan zhig na lha'i bu ma dacing/

N+NaM lha'i bu mos gang ba'i gzhal med khang zhuge mthong nas/ sa lha'i bu mo rnams la dras pa/ gang gis na gzhal med khang gzhan dag na na lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo dag gis gang zhing rtsa ba dang dga' ba
nyams su myong la/ khyed la nilha'i bu dag ma ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ dadag gis smras ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyigacung dga' bo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga chos
0bar spyad pa spyod pa de dus byas nas 'dar 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyi'i gzhal med khang 'di 'dzicing/ bdag cag kyang de la sdod cing 'khod do// des thos nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga'
nas/ rangs pa rangs ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang/ com ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mthong ma/ des gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldano'adas kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyodakyis der phyi dag mthobazlos shig/ des mig mthong ba rgyas bar gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ ga' bo khyod
kyis lha'i bu mo dag mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// dga' bo rigyes dus mas shan tu bzang mo dang/ lha'i bu mo de dag gang gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa/
lan/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu mo dag la shAkya'i bu mo shanig tub brang mos brgya char yang bar ma mchi/ stong gi char yang/ brgya stong gi char yang/ grangs dang/ bsrung ba dang/
chadang/ rtsis dang/ deb dang gyur yang nyabar ma mchi'o// dga' bo da lta bas natshangs par spyod pa la gnas na/ na lon 'di lta bu dang gzhan dag kyang gdAde/ khyod kyis de la mngon bar
dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig dang/ lha'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i la sems kyis rjes su mi ras nas cang mi smra ba 'dug go/ de nas/
bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas mnyan yod du gshegs so// de nas tshadang ldan b dga' lha'i 'jig rtenal mngon
'a par dga' bas tsha ba spyad pa spyod do// des bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sams thugs kyis mkhyenanas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong
rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dag khyed cag gang gis kyang dga' bo dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par ma bya/ 'chag sa gcig tub cag par mi bya/ chos gos kyi gdang bu gcig la
chos gos gzhag bar la khya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi gcig tulhung bzed gzhag bar bya/ tshugazhug pa'i khri gcig la tshugazhag bar ma bya/ klog par mi bya/ gdon par ma bya'o zhes sgo zhig/
btsun ba bka' bzhin 'tshal zhus tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas/ dge slong rnams la tshadang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
stsal tu/ tshodang ldan pa dag khyed kyis dga' bo dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya zhes bya ba nas/ gdonar ma bya zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhani// btsun pa kun dga' bo da
bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal ba de bzhina'atshal lo zhes/ de dag de dang lhan cig stanag cig la 'dug par mi byed/ 'chag sa gcig tu'achag par mi byed/ chos ]
[” ]gos kyig dang gcig la chos gos 'ag par ma byed/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi gcig la lhung bzed 'dzug bar ma byed/ tshugazhag pa'i khri gcig la tshu'agro bar byed/ de dang lhan cig klog pa
dnga'adon par ma byedado// de dge slong rnams kyis de ltar songs pa na/ shinatuganong bar byed/ ngo tshabar byed ! khrel bar byed/ smod par byed do// tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ tshodang ldan pa
kun dga' ba dge slong mang pe rnams dang lhan cig rim gro'i gnas su chos gos kyi las byed ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bsams pa/ dge slong 'di dag na bdag pas grungan/ tshodang ldan pa kun

dga' bo 'di ni bdag gi phu nu bo yinan/ tsi'adas kyang bdag sprang ngam snyam du dge nas des lhan cig 'dug pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo myur ba myur ba khon langs so// des smras pa/ tshadang ldan

ba kun dga' bo tshangs pa mtshungs par spyodrub 'di dag gis re zhig bdag phrang ba rigs na/ khyod bdag gi phu nu bo lags na/ bdag ci'i slad du sbyang/ des smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa dga' bo don bdenan//
'on kyang khyonalam gzhan duzhugs ba yin la/ kho bo cag kyang las gzhan du zhugs pa yin pas/ spang dgos ches mod/ des smras pa// tshadang ldan pa kun dgatsA bo khyadashul gang du zhugs ba dang/

bdag gang duzhugs pa gsungs ngashage/ des smras pa/ khyod na lha'i 'jib rtanal mngon par dgarabs tshangs par spyad pa spyod la/ kho bo cag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pas tshangs bar spyod pa spyod/
daskad smras pa dang/ ngani zhusbyo bar gyur to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis desams thugs kyis mkhyen/ tshadang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ga'/
khro khyed sa dmyal ba rnams mthongo sa/ com ldan 'das ma mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'i chos gos kyi khra ma nas zung gi/ des bcom ldan 'das
kyi chos gos kyi tha ma nas bzung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa dga' bo khridad/ dmyal ba'i gnas su gshegs so/ 2nas bcom ldan 'dras lhag pa'i phyogs khag tu
bzhugs nas/ tshodang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo sor la dmyal ba rnams ltos shig/ ngas bltas na chubo rab med dang/ lam ral gri lta bu'i nags dang/ rolugs
dang ma ma chur dang/ lhag ba'i sa gnas de dag gcig pas kyang gcig sdug bsngal gyi khyad par shan dum bzudapa mthong nas/ dmyal ba'i gnas su song na des don dbyung ba dang/ gcadra
pa dang/ gzhom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi khyad par gyis sems cano rnams sdug bsngal zhing/ kha cig ni skam pas mgi dang so ga phyung// lo cag ni sog las galo kha cig na
staras rkang pa dag bcad/ cagi ni mdung thung dang/ mda' ba chodang/ mtshon rtsa gcig ba dag gse phug/ kha cig na lcags kyi tsebs bsdus/ kha cig ni lcags kyi zas bo tshar
rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar la/ ma lce gcig tugyur cing bskol ba'i nang du bcug pa mthod do// sa sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mthong nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig
song ba dang/ ritsam na dun lcags kyi zas bo mkhol bzhagi mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ma dga' nas/ dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams la sa pa/ shas ldan dag gang gis nalcags kyi
zas po tshagazhan dag tunasams can dag bcug la/ 'digacig po khol zhing 'dug pa 'dra la rgyu ci yod/ de dag gas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba de lha'i 'jig

rten la mngon par dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'adasakyi spyan snga na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de shi nas 'di'i 'ong ste/ de'i phyir 'di bi sdogasangashing/ kho bo cag kyang de la sdod cing 'khod do// des thos
nas 'jigs skrag mi dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed nas bsoms pa/ da nyid bcug par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ myur du 'bros so snyam dudage nas/ ringes pa ringes par bros nas/ bodanyams shing ngo
'dzul nag bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'aul pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis dmyal ba rnams mthong ngam/ de srong zhing/ lce ldibs bzhin tshig snying
skad du da pa ba bags kyis gcom chung ngur gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis der ji lta bu dag mthong ba smos shagi/
des ji lta bu dag mthong ba rgyas bar gsol pa dang/ com ldan 'das gyis bka' stsalakha/ dga' lha'i 'og rtanal smon bas tshag par spyad pa spyod pa la ni
nyes dgis 'di lta bu dang/ gzhan dag kyang yodade/ de lta bas na khyed kyis mya ngan las 'das pa la mnabar dga' bar bya'i/ lha'i 'jig rten la mngonapar dga' bar mi bya'o/ dngotsha
bar gyur ba'i sems kyis cad ma skye bar 'ag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dmyal ba'aganas nas mi snang bar gyur cing/ grong khyer tsam bar drang srong 'ga' dga'i rje de drang du gshegs so/
de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshadang ldan pa dga' ba'akhor drag slong lnga brgya dang/ phyi dronang du gang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gi slong gi dag 'dun phyogs gcig tu 'dug par mkhyenanas/ tshodad ldan ba dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ dga' bo khyod la chos bstanabar bya ste/
'di lta ste/ mngal du 'jug ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge kha/ thama' dag ba/ don bzung ba/ tshig 'bru bzang bo/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs ba
0 yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba changs par spyod pa rab tubastanagyi sa/ de legs par rab tunyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshadang ldan pa dga'
bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo ma'i mel du 'jug pa dang/ 'jug par 'gyur ba ji ltar zhen/ dga' bo

'di lta ste/ pha ma chags par gyur cing phradapa dang/ ma yang rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang/ dri za yang nye bar gnas par gyur cing 'jug pa'adod na// dga' bo drakhri zhes bya ba de/
srid pa bar ma pa'i sems canagyi tshig bla dgas an/ de yang kha dog bzang bo dang/ kha dog ngan ba dang rnam pa gnyis te/ sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi srid pa bar ma kha dog na/
dper na sdong bo tshig pa lta bu 'o/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su song ba rnams kyi sradab bar ma ni kha dog du ba lta ba'o// yi dgas rnams kyi kha dog tshulta bu 'o/ ma rnams dang lha rnams kyi srid ba
bar ma ni kha dog gsar lta bko/ gzugs na spyod ba'i lha rnams kyi ni dkar bogo/ gzugs med pa na spyod palha rnams ni gzugs med ba'i phyir/ srid pa bar ma mad do// srid ba bar ma'i
sams can kha cig lag pa gnyis dang shar pa gnyis pa yin/ kha cig ni rkang bzhib/ kha cig ni rkangamangs/ kha cig nirkang med yin no// srading bar ma pa'i gags canani sngon gyi las
las skyes ba'i 'gro ci 'drab debadrab r 'gyur te// srid pa bar ma ba'isogs nyan thams cad kyang/ nam mkha' la 'gro brdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa lta ba dbalha'i mgo can sa/
ka 'gyuralo ma zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur ba zhes bya ba la/ dga' ba zla mtshanazhes bya ba ni dus dang tshes 1/ dga' bo dal bud med kha cig nig gsom mam/ zhag lnga 'am/ zhag bdun du zla
mtshan can du 'gyu'o// kha cig ni rgyu dang rkyenagyi dbang bsamun ng du zla mtshanacan du 'gyur te/ zla mtshanadang zla mtshan du mtshams 'byor bar yang 'gyur ro// de la bud med sdug bsngal ba/ byur
ngan pa/ nye bar gdungs pa/ bza'o ba dang btung ba ma bsod pa zos pa gang dag mno pa de dag ni bla mtshan ring bo ma thogasashing/ myur du yongs su zad ba dang gtugs bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo
dpar nas phyogs rtsub par rgyas btab namyur du yongs su zad pa dang gtugs par 'gyur ba dbazhin du/ bud med sdug bsngal ba/ byur ngan ba/ dbar gdus pa/ bza' ba dang btung ba mi bsod
thos ba gang dag yinab de dag gi zla mtshan yong rang ba ma thogasangashing/ myur du yongs su zadapa dang gtugs bar 'gyulo// dal bud tshad bde ba dang ldan kha/ bde ba mang ba/ nyebar ma gdungs ba/
bza' ba dang btung ba bsod pa thos pa gang dag yin ba de dag gi zla mtshan ring du thogs shing/ myur du yongs su zad pa dang gtugs par ma 'gyur te/ de dag gi zla mtshanadang blo mtshan du mtshams/
[z ]'byor par yang 'gyura'o// dga' bo dper nas phyogs 'jam bor chus gtor na myur du longs su zad pa dang gtugs par ma 'gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdamad bde ba dang ldan pa/ de ba mang ba/ nye
bar ma gdungs pa/ bza' ba dang btung ba bsod pa zos pa gang dag yin pa de dag ga klu mtshan yang ring du thogs shing/ yongs su zad ba dang btugs par ma 'gyur te/ de dag gi bla mtshan dang
zla mtshan dumatshams 'byor par yang 'gyur// dga' bogal te pha las khu ba byung la/ ma las ma byung na yang de'i tshor zhig mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyuralo/ gal tem las byung la/ pa las
ma byung na yang de'i char zhago mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal tam las kyang ma byung 3 ba las kyang ma byung na yang de'i tshor zhig mngal du 'jug par ma 'gyur go/ ma dag bar gyur la/ ba ma
dag par gyur pa dang/ ba ga par gyur la/ ma ma dag par gyur pa dang/ de'i tshoma'i mngal rlung gis bgags par gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pas bgags pa 'am/ bad kan gyis bgags pa 'am/
khrag gis 'gags pa 'am/ tshilakyisabagags ba ma/ mtshams sa gangab 'am/ sman gyis bsgyur ca ma/ dbunas 'drabs/ grog ma'i skadab 'drab 'am/ rngamo'akhelta bu 'am/
sgo shang 'ba' pa kha 'bus pa lta bu 'am/ sgogashol mda' lta bu 'am/ sgo shing rta lta bu ma/ sbalho bu 'am/ lam lta bu 'am/ nad dug ma lta bu skyes ba 'am/ 'og zab pa 'am/
stong zab pa 'am/ mal stod du ma rung ba 'am/ khrag zag pa 'am/ thung ba 'am/ bya rog gi mtshulta bu dang/ g.yon ya sa pa 'am/ galas yangs ba 'am/
sha stang yas pa 'am/ 'og yas pa 'am/ mtho ba 'am/ ma' ba 'am/ khas bub pa ma/ mtshan ma tsam yod pa ma/ yo ba 'am/ skyon dang bcas pa ma/ bas bas bsgyur ba
srog chags te sa ra kas khros par gyur yang/ de'i char zhagi mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur// pha ram dag dbang chab r grags la/ driza dbangachung bar grags na yang dbang zhig mngal du 'jug
par ma 'gyur ro// dri bro dbang tshabar grags la/ dang ma dag dbang chung bar grags na yang de'i tshore zhig ma la du'ajug par mi 'gyur 'o/ gal te thams cad dbang chung bar grags la/
ba ma dag gis kyang bu redupar 'gyur ba las ma byas shing ma bsags par gyur/ dri bras kyang pha mar 'gyur ba las ma byas shi ma bsags par gyur/ dri zas soms gnyis po/
sems sam/ mo'i sams las sams gang yang rung ba zhig nye bar gzhag par ma gyur na yang de'i tshor zhig mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te thams cad dbang chab r grags la/
ba ma dag gis kyang bu'adapar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags par ma gyur/ bris kyang pa mar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags par ma gyur/ dra sras sems gnyis pe/ po'i
00sams sam/ mo'i sems las sams gang yang rung ba zhig nye bar ma gzhug na yang de'i tshar zhig mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo dziltar na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur
na dga' bo 'di na pha dang ma chags bar gyur de 'dus pa dang/ ma lang rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur/ driwe yang nye bar gnas shadi 'jug par 'dod par gyur/ pha dang ma las
kyang khu ba byung/ pha dang ma dag par yang gyur/ de'i tshoma' mal rlung gas bgags par ma gyur/ mkhris pas ma bgags/ bad kan gyis ma bgags/ khrag gas ma bgags/
tshil gyis ma bgags/ mtshams shas gang ba ma yane/ sman gyis ma bsgyur/ dbud nas 'dra ba ma yin/ grog ma'i rked pa 'dra ba ma yin/ rnga mo'i kha lta bu ma yin/ sgoshinge 'ba'
takha 'bus pa lta bu ma yine/ sgo gshol mdams pa lta bu ma yani/ sgo shAng ra lta bu ma yin/ sba lta bu ma yin/ le ma lta bu ma yin/ nang du gra ma lta bu sgus pa ma yin/ 'og zab pa
ma yine/ sgrung zab pa ma yin/ mngal snod du ma rung ba ma yin/ khrag zug pa ma yin/ thung ba ma yani/ bya rog ga mtshulta bu ma yine/ g.yonayangs pa ma yani/ g.yas mas pa
ma yin/ stongs yas pa ma yin/ 'og mas pa ma yin/ mtho ba ma yane/ dma' bas yani/ khas bub pa mayani/ mtshan ma tsam yod pa ma yin/ yo ba ma yin/ skyon dang
bcas pa ma yin/ bska bas ma bsgyur/ srog chags be sa ra kus zos par ma gyur/ pha dang ma dag dbang tshabar grags na/ dri zo yang dbang cha bar grags/
sha ga dang ma dag dbang chung bar grags na/ dri zo yang dbang chung bar grogs/ thams cad dbang chab r grags par gyural/ pha dang ma dag gis kyang bu re bar 'gyur ba las byas shing/
bsags par gyur/ drwa thos kyang pha mar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags par gyur/ drizas sems gnyis po/ po'isams sam/ mo'isams las sams gang yang rung kha
zhig nye bar gzhig na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur// dga' bo de la hrib ma'i ma lo du 'jug par 'dod pa na/ sams phyin log dang ldan pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal can gyi skya ba so so
tha dad bar sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis yang dag pa ma yin ba'i 'du shes bcu po/ 'di lta ste/ dro ba' 'du shes dang/ nyi ma'i 'du shes dang/ rlung gi 'dushis dang/
zlachar gyi 'du shes dang kyichar gyi 'du shes dang/ grang ba'i 'du shes dang/ mul ngan gyi 'dushes dang/ rlung dmar gyi 'du shes dang/ char drag ga de dushes dang/ skye bo la
bo tshaku co'adon pa'i 'du shes de dang de dag thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bo de'i 'du shes de dag skye ba thobacade ldan nas/ tshad dag pa ma yazhi ba' 'du shes gzhan bcun du skye ba na skye bar
[s ]'gyur te/ 'on bdag khyim du 'jug go snyam pa dang/ khang bkra sa la 'jog go snyam pa dang/ khang pa rtsag mar 'jug go snyam pa dang/ khrag 'dzag go snyam pa dang/ rtswa spyil du 'jug
go snyam pa dang/ la ma'i u0f7c sbyal po'ajug go snyam pa dang/ rtswa skyug pa 'am/ nags thaces po'am/ rtsa ge pa'i gsab bam/ rtsag pa'i drung du 'gro'o snyam ba ste/ dga' bo 'du shes
'di rnams las 'du shes gang yang rung bshig la brten nas ma'amal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// de der skyes nas lus nur nur bor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur go/ dga' bo de la na nu bo'i
lus napa ma'i mo gtsang ba mni pa yang ma lta la/ nur nur po lus pa mA'ame gtsang ba las gzhanub yang ma yagato/ dga' bo 'on kyang pha ma'i mi gtsang ba de nyid la brten nas/ rgyu
