'da' bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig desdums byed po'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o// de dag gis ma mkhas pa bskos te/ de song nas tshadang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan
bon tshur spyonabazod pa mdzod cig ces zer ro zhes byas pa dang/ de khengs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang zhig rang gi blo gros kyis sdums byed pa'i mkhas
ba bsko bar bya'o// thams cad la khyad par med pa bzod pa gsol bas/ de dag dag ba'i chos ma 'phel zhing gsar bu gzhan dag kyang bstan pa las gyed par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'adas
kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lda dang ldan pa la bzod pa gsol bar bya ste/ dad pa can dang/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ gus pa dang/ bka' blo bde ba dang/ dag ba'i bshes
gtan can no// dge slong dag gang zhig chos ldanurd ldan pa de la bzod pa gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ gang zhig de dag las gang
'a yang rung ba shig dang ldan pa de la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o// dge slong thul gzhug par mi 'os pa thul 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ khrul gzhug bar 'os pa sprul mi 'jug na/
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bzod pa gsol bar 'os pa la bzod pa mi gsol na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bzod pa gsol bar mi 'os pa lo bgrod pa gsol na zug la tshobs
pa can du 'gyur ro// dol chos gong ma lnga las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan pa la bzod pa gsol te/ gal tasams ngad ldang bar 'gyur ba lta na bzodapa gsol bar bya'o// sams ngad mi
ldang ba lta nubazod pa gsol bar mi bya'o// gang zhig chos ldacar dad ldan pa de la ni bzod pa gsol bar ma bya nyid de/ bzod pa gsol bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ gang zhig
bzod pa mi byed pa de gal te dge tshul yarten/ mu chags dang/ dril ba dang) stodagayogs dang/ snyadugatshogs bcas pa byin tabaskrad par bya'o// 'on te bsunabar rdzogs pa
'am bstanabar rdzogs par 'dod pa zhig yin na/ yo byad lta byan tabaskrad par bya'i/ sgran mor mi bya/// sdom ni khang bzangs stags bu de bzhin du/ lan/
kan dra ba klu nga dang// phyags ma dang ni yang thog dang// yang thog lan kan gdags pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus mnyan yod nargyul bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'adas kyis gnas mal rnams kyi nang na shing drung ni rung ba rnyed kyang bla ba ste/ de la gnas nadage slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos
'dul ba la rab tubyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa ga slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro// lhag pa rnyed na gnas khang ma/ sngakhang ma/ khang pa rtsig pa ma 'am zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams
gnas khang dag byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khang bzas byago/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis khang bzangs bya'o zhes bka' stsalan/ ga slong dag gis ji ltar bur bya
bamangashes nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhi so phag rim pa bdun nam brgyad btsugs te stogs bu pus mo tsam du phyin pa dang ka nagazhag go/ de'i stang du ka ba'i
'phrang ba gzugs so// ka ba rnams kyi sta du ka zhu'o// ka zhu'i steng du gdung ngo// gdung gi snying du spang leb bo// de rnams kyi steng du so phag gas g.yog go/ denas so bag ga phyi mas
g.yogs to/ khang bzangs ni de ltar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khang bzangs de ltar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong rnams kyis khang bcas byas palan kan ma byas nas/
[7 ]@#// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lan kan bya'o// lan kan byas pa dang de lhung nas/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' su lu pa/ 'byor bar bya zhing de
sha lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o// dge slong rnams khad ba zangs su zanaza ba na bye 'u dung phug ron dag gis gtsos nas com ldanu'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyas
gcad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas gcad par bya'o zhes bka' sul na/ dge slong dag gis ji lta bu bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgya ni lnga ste/sha
na las byas pa dang/ rtswa mun dzolas byas pa dang/ rtswa bal ba dzalas byas pa dang/ rtsa ku ngasha las byas pa dang/ srid bu las byas pa'o// dge slong dag gis phyogs gang du bye ba mngashes
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grwa bzhi nas thung thogs la de dag la legs par gdags par bya'o// de rnams kyis ngashing gi zung btags pa dang/ nyams gas shing char gyi
chus kyang rul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags las byas pa gdags par bya'o// bya rog dang/ byi'udang/ bag ron dag phyinachad mi 'ong nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs gcig tubya rog gi khung gdod par bya zhing/ de yang zan za ba'i dus su chod la/ dge slong dag zan thos zinanas la da dbye bar bya'o// dge slong zhig zan tha
[s]ba na de'i mdun na khyi zhig bdag la gdonam za bar sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas re bzhin sdod pa las/ dge slong des de la ma byin pa dang/ de yi chad de dus las 'dus so// skabs dedge slong rnams
kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dud 'gro'i phyir zas kyi chang bu gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis du'agro'i phyir zas kyi chang bu
gzhug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ ga slong dgon pa pa zhig 'dug pa des/ wa rnams la byas kyi chang bu byin te bya rog dag brgyud pa dang/ de dag khros nas bya rog gi skad du rkun pa'i sde
dpan la dge slong 'di la gsar mad du yod do zhes smras so// rkun po'i sde dponade bya rog gi skad la mkhas pa zhig bas/ des dge slong de brtag par brtsams pa dang/ des snas pa//
kyi skyes bu nga ste brdug/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod la gser yod pa byin cig/ des smras pa/ kye skyes bu nga la gsar gyi 'byor pa ga la yod/ dmagis mdapar sa rngog cig/
des smras pa/ khyod la gsar yod kyis byin cig/ gal tami ster na khyodangs gsad do// des smyos pa/ kye skyes bu khyod ni cig gis bslus na khyod la u zer ba smos ngashag/ rkun po'i
sde dpon gyis smras pa/ bya rog dag ther ro// des smras pa/ kye skyes bu de dag nang la khros pa yin no/ ci'i phyir/ des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang/ rkun po'i sde dpon gyis
skyas pa/ 'phags ba gal takhyod kyis bdag la de skadangung po ma skyas par gyur na/ bdag gis khyodabasad par gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/
'a bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ dge slong dag nyes dmagis 'di dag bsngos tabazhag pa las gyur gyi/ delta bas na sems can thams cad kyi phyir//
[】 ]spyi laci bde ba'i khras kyi chang bu gzhag par bya'o// dbyar khangabazangs chus gang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyabs bya'o khacom ldan 'das kyis skyabs bya'o zhes bka'
sul na/ dge slong dag skyabs ji lta bu bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ka ba'i bar rnams su sang lob kyis gcad par bya'o// thamasacad d bcad pas mun
gnag par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad dugacad par mi bya'o/ 'on kyang snang ba'is gzhag par bya'o// shing dag ma danas/ bcomo ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ re lde 'am sog gis gcad par bya'o// de dag gis bcad pa dang chus rul zhing sran dag kyang zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ zla ba bzhir
bzhag nas phyis dbyung bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyi'i bdag mgon
0 mad zas sbyin gyi kun slu spyod pa ni nang bar sngar langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir nye bar song nas/ rgyal byed kyi chol rang gis 'phyag go/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin brel kha 'ga' zhig byung nas de ma 'ongs pa dang/ rgyal byed kyi tshal ma phyags par lus taphyag dar gyis gang ba de/ bcom ldan 'das 'chag pas gzigs so//
gzigs nas kyad kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri sbes kyi ngad ldang las phyags ma khyer ta'ongs kyang bla nasnyam du 'dzag rten pa'i thugs bskyad de/ chos nyid kyis gang ga tshosangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams 'jig rtenupa'i thugs skyod par mdzad pa de tsho/ srog chags grog sbyar rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs sams kyis shes so/ gangag tsho'ajig rten las
'das pasams skyed par mdzadapa de'i tshon/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi lugs sems kyis mi shesan/ dud 'gro' rgya gnas su song ba'i srog chags
rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigats+tsaM nupa'i thugs bskyed snyam du bsams na/ rgyal byed kyi chol phyag bzhi par mthong ngo//
danas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes nas/ shing bal lta reg na 'jam pa'i phyags ma lnga brgya blangs// bcom ldan 'das kyi nasngar 'dug go/
de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis bsod nams 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la/ bsod nams kyi stogs nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ nyid kyis phyags ma bsnams te/ rgyal/
'byed kyi chol 'phyug par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das mthong nas nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ 'od srungs dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ nam gru la sogs pa yang
'phyug pa la zhugs so// danas nyan thos chen po dag dang thubs cigargyalakhyed kyi tshal phyags nas/ rim gro'i khong par gshegs te// dge slong ga dag 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la
bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' sul pa/ dge slong dag phyag dar 'phyag pa la pan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems
aM rab tudang bar 'gyur/ gzhan gyi sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur/ lha rnams yade dga' bar 'gyur/ mtshos par 'gyur ba dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho
sa lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang phyogs dor phyin pa dang/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dang thabs cig nyid kyis rgyal byed kyi chol
ji ltar phyugs la thos nas/ do 'disnyam du sams te/ gang du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dang thabs cig nyid kyis phyag dar mdzad ba de'i stod du bdag ji ltar 'gro snyam mo// de nas
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo tshashes pa sA la ngo tshanas de nyid du 'dug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas rnams namakhyen bzhin du dpar mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dge slong rnams la sa pa/ dge slong dag 'o masu zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ mgon med zas sbyin lags ni/ gdu bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dang thabs cig nyi
kyis phyag dar mdzad pa de'i stang du sug pa don du/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yar tshanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin sngar mchibar mi 'tshalal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka'
stsal pa/ khyim bdag sangs rgyas kyi bka'u kha ton bya zhing 'jug par bya ste/ 'di ltaras sa rgyas bcom ldan 'ongs rnams ni chos la gus pa yan la/ chos ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi yang
bla ma yin no// de nas mgon med zas spyin tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyas 'don cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nye bar song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos dang ldan pa'i ga
gyiso yang drag par stonupar mdzod/ yang dag par lenadu 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
dang ldan pa'agatamagyas yabadag par bastan/ yang dag par lenadubacug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas song ngo// dge slong
rnams the tshom skyesanas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus chos la gus pa skyes
'a ri zhe sa dang bcas par gyur pas/ de ltar chos kyi bstags ba rjod pa gang lags pa ningomatsho ra lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhinagashegs
pa de ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba/ nasdang dang bral ba/ gtinug dang bral ba/ skyo ba dang rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'tshib dang/ mya na dang/ sa stags dang/ sdug bsngal
dang/ 'dem bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol zhung thams cad mkhyen// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa/ yu shes kyi shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas chos las
gus pa skyes shing zhes dang bcas par gyur pas/ de ltar chos kyi bsngags brjod par mdzod pa gang yin pa 'di la ngo mtshar cizhag che/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang
dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas/ kya pa dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'tshib drang/ chu ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug
pa dag las yongs su ma grol bas/ chos kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang ba gang yin pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dngobashad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer wA
[4 ]rA NAsan rgyal bo tshangs byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ rgyal srid 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ la legs pa/ skye bo dang mang bos ga nga ba/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsodapa
dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ 'khrug long rab tuzhi ba/ chom rkun med pa/ sA lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba lang dang/ ma dpunasum tshogs pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang mthun pas
chos bzhin byed du 'jug go/ rgyal po de yang dad pa can dag ba'i bsam pa bzungab/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dodapa/ skye dgu la no
byams pa/ thamasacad rab tu sbyin pa/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba zhig ste/ gtong ba chen po la 'jug go/ dedus gzhan zhig na btsunamo dam pa dpalhan cig rtsi bar byed/ ga' !
bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ btsun mo sems can zhugs par gyur te/ du la legs par gsungs pa/
tan 'dod pa skyes so// des rgyal po la smras nas/ rgyal pos mtshanamakhan rnams bas dras pa dang/ de dag gis sas pa/ lha sams can 'di'i mthu lags so// des rgyal pos legs
bar gsungs pa'i don du gsar srang 'bum bskur te/ grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ ul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du bskor kyalegs par gsungs pa ma rnyed do// ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang
@#// nas/ btsunamo de la khye'u gzugs babung ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ mag gsar gyi kha gcan/ mgo gdugs lta bu / dpung pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i
dbyes chab/ snyanim 'dab chags pa/ sna mthob/ yan lag dang nying lag thamasacod dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa dang/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tudi btsas pa'i btsas stonargya cher byas nas/
khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blonapa rnams kyis snus pa/ lha gang gi slad du khye'u 'di ma btsas pa nyid nas/ legs par gsus pa tshol ba de'i slad du/ khye'u'i
mde legs gsungs chol zhes gdags so zhes/ de'i mi legs gsungs tshil zhes bya par btags so// khye'u legs gsusaNol ma ma brgyad pe/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ nu ma/
klu snyan pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ drim 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ tshun grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ marasar dang/ zhunam dang/ mar

t+tA kyi snyapakha dang/ lo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo gzhan dngagazhanadag gis bskyed bsrings nas/ dzadeg pa da bzhin duskya drag par gyur to// de gang ga tsho chen por gyur pa de'i tshayang legs
par gsungs pa btsal nam rnyed do// de pha 'das nas rgyal srid la khazhag pa dang/ blon rnams smras pa/ gtso bo dag nga la legs par gsungs pa dgos kyis/ legs par gsus
ba tshol zhig/ denas blon po de rnams kyis gsar srang 'bum bskur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag gi gro dang/ grong rdal dang/ ul 'khor dang/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor dgatubaskor kyang
legs par gsus pa ma red do// denas de rnams kyis rgyalo pal byas pa dang/ de nas rgyal po legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir ra bas yongs su gdungs par gyur to// lha'i dbang po
bar byin gyi shes pa mthong ba na 'gatu'ajug pa yin bas/ des rgyal po 'jigs par gsungs pa'i phyi'i sdug bsngal bar mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis rgyal po bgam
pa bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnod sbyin gyi gzugs su lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mig mi sdug par bsgyur nas rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas/ de'i tshotshigs su bcad de smras pa/
legs par spyad pa'i chos spyad bya// nyes spyadad ni spyad mi bya// chos spyod 'jig rten 'di dang ni// pha rol tuyang bde bar gnas// de nas rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa de thos ma thag tudaga' ba
dang rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/ gnod sbyin la smras pa/ gsang ba pa tshigs su bcad pa de yang smos shig smos shage mnyan par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin des/ rgyal po la sbas pa/ lha
bdag gis smras pa gang yin pa de mdzadan/ gdod bdag kyang bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de bgyid do// rgyal pos smras ba/ ci/ gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/ nyin zhag bdun du song lded
ga shing dag ma dod du bus nas/ gal tader bdag nyid 'dod na/ de'i 'og tu bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa stsago/ de thos ma thag tu rgyal ba yade dga' nas/
gnod sbyin de la smras ba/ de bzhin bya// de nas rgyal bo des yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ zhag bdunanargyal po legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir/ ma dong du bdag nyade 'dor
nag dag ya mtshan lta bar 'dod pa de dag kyang gcig ces byas so// de nas srog chags pa stong phrag du ma yang 'dus/ nam mkha'i ngos la yang lha brgya stong phrag dum yang 'dusage//
byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa nyid shes nas/ ya mtshan gyi ngo bo blta ba'i phyir der 'khod do// des gnod sbyin de nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin mdzod cig/ denas rgyal po des gnon nu rgyu ba rgyal srid la bzhag ste/ blon po dang/ grong rdal ba dang/ ul mi rnams la yang
bzod pa gsol/ skya bo'i tshogs kyang dbugs phyung nas ma dong gi drung du nye bar song sta/ tshigs su bcad pa lcas bA/ me dong 'jigs pa chubyed nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang du ba 'dir//
chos phyir srog la 'dzom mad des ba'i yid kyis lob tumachong bar bya// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ma dong 'di yang bar 'khrigs pa yi/ mtshon tsan dan lde gus bcin pa lta bu r
bsal ba bzang gyur cig/ de skad ces smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dong de mchos pa dang/ dumachodas ma thag tuma'i do dmatshor gyur to// de nas lha'i 'dab brgya/
byin gyis/ rgyal po'i ya mtshan lha dang mi dadapar byed pa'i cho'aphrul de mthong nas/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi gzugs kyis 'dug ste/ de'i tshatshigs
su bcad pa sbas pa/ legs par spyadapachos spyadabya// nyes spyadad sil+lang mi bya// chos skyong 'jig rten 'di dang ni// pha rol tuyang bde bar gnas// denas byang chub sems dpas
tshigs su bcad pa de bzung nas/ gser gyi glebs mi dag la bris 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag gi grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ ul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bskur
ro bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag jisnyam du sams/ de'i tshade'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de nang yin te/ de'i tshoyang ngs chos kyi phyir srog
yongs su btangand lta lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag de lta bas na'adi ltar bslab par bya ste/ chos la gus par bya bla mar bya/ mnyes par bya/ mchod par bya ste/ chos
la gus par byas/ bla mar byas/ mnyes par byas/ mchod par byas shing nye bar brten taganas par bya'o zhes/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan du
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong de dag yi rangs// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mdon bar bstod do//

sha/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kunudaga' ra ba nabazhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar 'phyug pa la phan yon lnga yod do zhes bka' sul ba dang/
dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtand bsam gtan dang 'don pa bor te/ rgyal byed kyi chol 'phyug pa la zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bkal sul la/ sa dag shos las gos gsus
kyi dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag ni ma yin no/ 'on kyang legs par gsungs ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung ba'i dge slong gi las ni gnyis te/ 'di lte lta/ bsam gtan dang 'donaba'o
bcom ldan 'das kyis ngas dge skos las dgongs te gsungs so zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ des rgyal byed kyi tshal ri phug par ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mi tsam spyad

ts+tso dgos pa de dag dag sgos kyis phyag par bya zhinge/ gzhan tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi lagatsA brdungs te/ dag 'dunathams cad kyis phyag bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhil
'gadi brdungs te/ dge 'dun thams cad kyis phyag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slob kha cig lag na phyags ma thogs tagatam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing las byed pa dang/ rgyal byed
kyi tshal na gnas ba'i mi ma yin pa dang/ dge slong gzhanadog kyang 'phya nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par nges pa'i gtam chos dang mthun pa bya ba 'am/ 'phags pa'i
mi sna bas phyag dar bya'o// dge slong dag rgyal byed kyi tshal phyags nas/ lus la rdul gyis gso bzhin 'dug pa dang/ ma dad pa dag gis mthong ste 'phya sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba byags te phyag dar bo nas/ gangadag khrus byed par 'dod pa de dag gis ni khrus bya'o// gang dag khrus byed par ma 'dod pa de dag gis ni lus chus phyis nas/ lagang dang rkang pa bkrus pa 'jug
par bya'o// nga nyid kyinyin par gnas mal la blta bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge 'dun thams cad de bzhin lta nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams
cud kyis blta bar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang gnas 'cha' ba rnams kyis blta bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byas pa'i stang du sangs rgyas kyis bka' kha ton bya zhang 'gro bar bya'o
zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag chag chag btab nas phyag dar byed cing dkyil 'khor byed de/ des na phyogs der 'gror mi rung ngosnyam nas/ dge slong dag mi 'gro ba dang//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa gdon zhing 'gro bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dri gtsang khang gi grib ma dang/ sku gzugs dang/ mchod
rten gyi srog shing gi grib ma dag byung ba dang/ de dag la yang dag blo dadams 'dang ma 'goms pa dang/ rtsom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
'a grabi ma nam brtan pa yin pas/ dol la gtsug lag ga tshigs su bcad pa gdon cung gom par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par bya'o/ gu ra'i rgyal bos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
u0f7c la/ ga ra khyi'u bran bu zhes bya ba dang skyong ba zhes ba gnyis skyes su bskur ta/ de gnyis las branabu nibaza' ba dang btung ba'i tshig la mkhas/ skyong ba ni gnas mal gyi chog la
[– ]mkhas so mtha' 'khob na gnas pa rnams na phal cher brkam chagasacan gyi rang bzhin can yin pas/ gang gi tshesung du 'gro ba de'i tshayulam las nya dang/ sha dung/ snum bur
dag phrogs ngashing thogs shing za nas/ da rnams kyis de dag la rgyab pa dang/ de gnyis kyis/ rgyal po la sbas pa/ lha de bdag cag srung du mchis nas/ der bdag cag gis
b+hU na las cung zud cig sug cha bgyis na/ do rnams kyis bdag cag khatsogs te/ tham yang ma gtsamadu bgyis so// rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dril bsgrags nas/ sus kyang bran bu dang
sbyong ba dag brtag par mi bya'i/ 'okyang bdag nyid kyis rdzas bsrung bar bya zhes bsgo nas/ gang gi tshe de gnyis spang du 'gro ba de'i tsho/ skye bo' tshogs kyis de gnyis mthong nas/ bdag

[z/]nyid kyi rdzas sbyad bar byed do/ jitsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po las byed pa las las de mal du'aphres pa dang/ bran bu dang skyong ba dag de'i rkang pa ma mnyed cing drung 'khod pas rgyal po bsgral
nas bran bus skyong ba la smras pa/ skyong ba lha mnal log gam/ des snas pa/ mnal log go/ rgyal pos thos nas bsams pa// gdon mi za bar 'di gnyis gsang gtamacung zad
cig byed 'dod par gyur to snyam nas/ des gnyid log pa ltar brdzus ta'adug pa dang/ bran bus skyong ba la smras pa// skyob pa 'jig rten pha rol yod dam med cig gu/ des sas pa/
khran bu 'jig rten pha rol yod re kan/ skyong bas snyas pa/ branabu 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yod dam/ sa smras pa/ 'jig rtenan dgra bcom pa yodare skan/ rgyal pos de nyams
cad thos nas/ des bsamasab ni nyi 'di lta bu'i sdig pa'i lta ba kun tu spyod de/ 'a nagacig ni rtag par lta gcig ni chad par lta'osnyam mo/ kun tuyang yul ko sa la'irgyal po
gsal rgyal gyi go la'i khye'u gnyis las gcig na rtog par lta/ cig shos ni chad par lta'o zhes sgra grags par gyur to// de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon mu zas sbyin gyis khyu mchog gi tshig
rlabs po che 'di lta bu mgo gcig bzung nas smras pa/ su gangazhig nga'i khyim du mar gyur nas dus byed pa de thams cad lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho rasi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes//
'khor gyi nang du sang ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags so// rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/ gang gi tshekhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dar 'ongs pa de'i tshe/

de la khye'u 'di gnyis thabs shig bshags pasbyin no snyam mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med bris sbyin rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang/ khye'u zhig gis de'i stanabating ste dus ranapa
ts+tso dnga'ong snyam nas/ phyir byung ste byis pa rnams dang lhan cig dbar brtsams so// rgyal pas de song bar shes nas bsams pa/ 'di gnyis thabs bshams nas/ sbyin pa'i sa
da 'di yin no snyam du rig nas des sgo ba la gsang sta/ khyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin gyi khye'u phyir byung ba gang yin pa de nang du ma gtang nage ces bsgo ba dang/ zlo bas de nang du ma btang
ngo[… ]mi bdag mgon mdakhras sbyin 'gro bar brtsams nas snyanalas las dwaban tshunakhye'u bltas pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa// khyim bdag lto/ lho stana'atshol pa'i khye'agro/ des smras
lheb khyim bdag ngas bran bu dang skyong ba gnyis sbyin gyis/ khyer la song zhig/ des rgyal po'i de khas blangs nas/ des bsams pa/ ci'i phyi'i lhas bran bu dang sbyong ba gnyis bdag la
sbyin snyam mo// yang bsams ba/ 'di gnyis sdig pa'i lta ba can yin pas/ lhas bdag brtag par bshad dosAmanas/ das de gnyis khyim du khridi de/ mdzod pa bas ti
0 snus pa/ kyi rgyas bu 'di dag ci'adod pa de thams cad khyed kyis byin ga/ srang du song sku skye bo' tshogs la sbas pa/ bran bu dang skyongab phyilen pa de khyed kyis byin la/ rinayang bas/
tanog cig dang/ sa nyis gyur du sbyin no// de dag gis mdzod pa'i laganas gang cung zad co bslangs pa de thamaso cad thob pa dang/ do dag mgu nas sbas pa/ kyirgyas bu kho 'acag gis gang
bslangs pa de thams cad khyod kyis kho bo cag la byanin/ khyed la su zhig gis bsgo/ des smras pa/ bdag la khyim bdag gis de skad du khasgogo/ de dag gis bsams pa/ khyim bdag ni bdag
gi pha ma dang 'drubar gnas tag bslangs pa de thob bo snyam mo// dus gzhan zhig na de dag srabed so ba dang/ dadug la skye bo'i tshogs kyis sgra phyung nas sbyin/ khacig nibran bu nged las
khyer cig ces zer/ gzhan dag kyang byed las khyer cig ces zer ba dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed sngonanged mthongan snod du glingan/ da sgra phyung nas skor ba 'di la khyu gang zhige
yani de dag gis sbas pa/ sngonani khyed 'phrog cing za/ nikhyim bdag gis rinanyis gyur dubyin no// de dag gis bsams pa/ khyim bdag ni bdag cag la shin tuphan pa sgrub pa
lhur len no snyam nas/ de dag khyim bdag gi drung du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag la las dbog tugasol/ shes ldan dag sdod cig dang las kyang yod do// ji tsam na dus
[91 ]gzhan zhig khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bran bu dang skyong pa dag khridi nas rgyal byed kyi la 'phyag tu song ngo// de der son pa dang bya ba cung zad le phyung nas/ des smras
pa bran bu dang skyong ba nga la bya ba zhige khyung gas/ khyed kyis rgyal byed kyi tshe la phyogs la shog cig/ de dag gis phyag par brtsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis dzaltar phyag darami
lce zad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ de dag jo bo la snying nye bas skyo bzhin du ma btang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
ba bran bu dang skyong ba dag la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhog cig/ des dog la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag go/ phyag dar bor ba dang ! de khon bzhin du khyad ma shes nas/ dadag srid nam srog
bar gyur pa de srid du las byedatsa 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis bran bu dang skyong ba dag drung du snyol cig/ ge
slong rnams la yang sa dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba la spyoms pa dang/ sdig pa bshags dag nas par bya'o zhes gsungs mod kyi/ 'onakyang bran bu dang skyong ba dag lta ba dang bral bar bya dgos
bas khyed las gang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang thob ba des/ gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa des gnos shig ces byos shig/ btsun pa daltar 'tshal lo zhes/ tshong
[. ]ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bran bu dang skyong ba la sbas pa/ khyed kho bo kho na'i drung du nyol cig/ dge slong rnams la yang smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa dag
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/ ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dag ba mi spyoms pa dang/ sdig pa bshags 'ganas par bya'o zhes gsungs mod kyi/ 'on kyang branabu dang skyong ba dag lta ba
khral khar bya dgos bas/ khyed las gang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang thob ba des/ gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa des gnos shigaces de skad bka' stsal to//
btsun pa kun daga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skadabaka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes sa nas/ mtshan mo thun dang pa la rdzu 'phrul bstan par brtsams te/ khag na 'bar bar byed/
kha cig glog 'gyu bar byed pa dang/ branabu dang skyong bas smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di zhag lags/ des smras pa/ 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba yin
no do dag gis sbas pa/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten nudagra bcom pa mchis pa lta nag/ 'di dag mngon sum kho nar ma snang ngam
dag las gang gi lta ba 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa mod do snyam pa de dang bral zhing/ 'jig rtenan dgra bcom pa yod do snyam pa yang dag pa'i lta ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'adas
kyis gung thun la/ kyam bang byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dag 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du 'jig rtenaba'akhrugs bskyed par mdzad do// gang gi tshesas rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams 'jig rten pa'i thugs skyong bar mdzadab zhes bya ba nas/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs semasakyisangazhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de rnams kyis mthus snang brgyachen po byung ba dang/ bran bu dang skyong ba dag gis sAs pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di zhag lags/ a/
smras pa/ 'di dag na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags pa mnano// 'jig rten pha rol mchis pa lta zhige/ 'di dag mngon sum kho nar mi sna
a 'di la the tshom brar ci yodazhus byas pa dang/ de dag las gang ga lta ba 'jig rtenapa rol mod do snyam pa de dang bral zhing/ 'jig rten pha rol yod do snyam pa yang dag ba lta ba skyes so//
de dag dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag lanyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/
da thos nas bran bu dang skyong ba dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo ri'u mtho ba yongashes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// de dag bden pa
mthongonas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs tagasol pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bganapar rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
thob na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshas bar spyod ba spyad par 'tshal la// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la bran bu dang sbyong ba khyed tshur/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/
dge slong tshur zhes bya bas kun tubaka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis skul ma thagatu/ de dag skra bregs pa dang/ snam sbyar gyonapa dang/ lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang/
skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun pa len pa lta bu dang/ dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lenapa'i spyod lam lta bu r gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gos pas tshu ga bka' stsal pa//
mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar bgos gyur cing// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi gnas te// sas rgyas dgongs pas lus kyi tshalugs bsgyur// skabam po bcu drug pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la gdams ngag gnang ba dang/ de gnyis kyis 'bad khamal bsgrams pas/ nyonamos pa thamasacad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
dgra bcom pa mas gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sams bong ba dang gsar dumanyam la/ nam mkha' dang lag mtha'i dumanyamakha/ so'u dang tsan dan dumatshus/
ba ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba/ gi pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang/ bkur sta la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/

dbang po dang phyogs dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ rjodapa dang gus par sna ba bya bar gyur to// gang gi tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis branabu dang skyong ba dag rab tu byung ba de'i tsho rgyal po
gsal rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bran bu dang skyong ba dag rab tuphyung ba gang yin pa de nim legs pa zhig mdzad de/ de dag ni sdig pa'i lta ba kun tu+od pa'o zhes ma dad par gyur to// bcom
ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ nyan thos chenapo'i ri rab dang 'dra ba dag la rgyal po gsal rgyal ma dad par gyur gyis/ de'i phyir de dag gi yon tan brjod par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/ bcom ldan
'das de snyam du dgongs pa dang/ de nas khyim bdag mgonamad zas sbyin bcom ldan 'adas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs
[% ]gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ com ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas spyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par
0 len du 'jug par mdzod/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tudaga' bar mdzad de/ ma grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
len du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tudaga' bar mdzadanas/ cangam gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag
pa gcig tugazar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ga dge 'dun dang thabs cig
sang bdag gi sdum par ba dugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bsaganang ngo// denas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan
'das cang mi gsung bas gnang ba rag nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga' sta rjes su ya rang nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'chol te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' sul pa/ kun dga' bo bran dang skyong ba dag gi drung du songal/ song nas 'di skad ces/
sa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i/ khyed gnyis kyis chu brims shig ces gyis shig/ btsun pa de ltar 'chal 'anyiso/ tshad ldan pa kun dga' bo//
bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas/ tshadang ldan pa bran bu dang skyong ba ga la ba der songs phyinanas/ tshe dang ldan pa bran bu dang skyong ba la 'di skad ces smras so//
tshadang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/ sang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gdugs chod sbyar ba'i tshe/ khyed gnyis kyis chubrims shig ces de skad bka' stsal to//
de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhina'atshal lo zhes smras nas bsams pa/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong khaganas brtan
gnas brtan dag bzhag ste/ bdag cag la sang khyed gnyis kyis chu brims ngashig ces bka' stsal/ gdonam zos par bdag cag kho na'i yon tan rjod pa mdzad bar bzhed de/ legs
kyis ston pa'i dgongs pa rdzogs par bya'o snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de nyid kyi mnaM na mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ nang
par sngar las tagadan bshams tshur bzhaganas/ bcom ldan 'angs la phonya bsado btsunapa gdugs tshod dus su bshams lags/ bcom ldan 'adus pa de'i dus la bab par
mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes dus gdas bar gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor nas/ dge slong
ga dag 'dun gyis mdun dubar/ khyim bdag mgon med zas spyin gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs so// gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//
de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thog tu bo nyabatang ste/ lha bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ga dag 'dun sdums par gdugs tshod la spyan
pas na/ de'i slad du gshegs shing rjes su yi rang ba mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas pa dang/ de btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon pos bskor nas/ khyim bdag mgon med
sbyin gyi khyim du gdugs tshod sbyar ba la rjes su yi rang bar bya ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ rgan rims bzhin phyag byas nas 'dugako/ de nas tshodang ldan pa branabus rganapa'i mtha' lags su 'dug nas

ji ltar gzhan pa'i mthar phyin nas 'bo ba de ltar chu'i rgyun byin gyis brlabs so// tshodang ldan pa skyong bas kyang ji ltar dran pa'i mthar phyin nas 'bo ba de ltar chu'i rgyun byin gyis brlabs pa dang/
rgyal kho gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/ ston pa'i snganasngal la 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig yin snyam nas/ chu'i rgyun gyi rjes bzhin gzhon pa'i mthar song ba dang/ ji

tsam na tshodang ldan pa skyong ba mthong// donas yang phyir chu'i rgyun gyi rjes bzhin rganapa'i mthar song ba dang/ rtsom na tshadang ldan b bran bu mthong nas de shin tuya mtshan skyes nas ro stod bstod/
lag kha ga yas pa brkyang ste/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos kyi ma'o dge 'dun/ ma'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyid/ da ltar 'di na bun bu dang
skyong ba la sogs pa sdig pa'i lta ba can dag kyang yon tana'adi lta bu dag thob bar gyur tozhes ched du brjodapa ched du rjod par byed do// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sangs rgyas la
sogs pa dge slong gi dag 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang ga lag dar te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun ngurmim par byed/ kun tuphyobs par byed do// rnam grangs
bar rang ga lag dar te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byas/ kun tubastabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol to/ phyag bcabs lhung bzed
gru bar 'ag nas/ stanas dma' ba zhig blangs// chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasdusa'adug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal dang/ khyimaM bdag
l+lA mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang mthunapa' gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par len du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdon
las bzhes gshegs so// dge slong rnams the chom skyes// the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bran bu dang skyong ba dag
gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na yul mtha' 'khob tuskyes shing/ gcig na kha par lta ba/ gcig ni chad par lta bar gyur/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na bcom ldan 'adus kyi bstan pa
la rab tubyung nas/ nyon mos pa thams cad spangs tadagra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bran bu dang skyong ba dag gis sngon gyi
rabs gzhan dag tulas byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smani// ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dge slong dag ston byung ba bskal pa

bzang bo 'di da la/ skye dgu'i tshalenya khri grub pa na ston pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba nas/ drang srong sa ba ri dwags kyi nags na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de'i bstan pa la 'di gnyis rab tubyung bar gyur/
ta dana' gnyis mthar 'akhob dudong nas gdams ngag med par yid la bya ba bskyod do// den 'daganyis kyis ma gas par rtogs so snyam ba'i 'du shes thob go/ de nas 'di gnyis 'chiba'i
sa kyi tsho 'jig rten las 'das pa la log par lta ba thob bo// de gnyis log par lta ba nyams nas sas ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bsus rizhig bdag
cag la yang nyon mongs pa spangs ba'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na/ gzhan la lta yod par 'gyur re skan zhes sbas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
nga'// rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la rab tubyung nas/ mtha' 'khob tu gdams ngag med par yade la byed pa bskyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni branabu dang skyong ba 'di/
dag nyid yin no// de na'adi dag gis mtha' 'khobaltasong stagadams ngag med par yid la byed pa bskyodranas/ lta ba log pa thob pa gang yanapa las de'i rnam par sInapas ngan song rnams
kyi nang du skyes nas/ lamang por mtha' 'khob rnams su skyes shang log par lta ba can du gyur to/ dalta'i bar du yang mtha'akheb tu skyes nas leg par lta btsan dugyur ba yanin/ gang yang
'di dag gsi denabaklags pa dang/ kha ton byas pa dang/ phung po la mkhas pa dang/ khams la mkhas pa dang/ skye mched la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas
pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas bar byas ba des na/ dra'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te// dgra bcom pa nyid mngonasum du byas so//
ga slong dag gdams ngag mad par bsam gtan byed pa la nyes dmigs 'di dag dang gzhan yang yodod/ de lta bas na dge slong gas gdams ngag med par bsam gtan mi bya'o// dge slong
gdams ngag mad par bsam gtan byed na 'gal tshabs canadu 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag las gcig
tudakarab rnams kyi yang gcig tudakar/ 'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcipi sna zhuganag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs nas/ las gcig tudaka'
ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ ga slong dag gis de ltar bslab par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des dgon par spyil po byed du
bcug ste/ de na drag slong zhig 'dug pa de so gatshabs rlu nas skya bo bsang bsang po gyur cing lus sha bri ngan pa/ nyam chung ba/ shig shig por gyur nas/ da khyayib dag gi drong du song sta/ khyim
bdag shes par gyis shig/ gzhan zhig tu'agro'o zhes byas pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa cung zad cig brel bar ma gyur grang/ sa smyos pa/ khyim bdag brel ba na cung zad kyang
mad mod kyi/ 'on kyang so ga'i dus la bab pas spyil bu de na tshasu skyo'o// des smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhugs shig dang/ sa'i khang pa bgyid du su la la// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das
kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das nathugs rjecan yin pas gnangebar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as
kyis bka' stsalal/ de lta bas na gnang gis sa'i khang pa byed du gzhug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i khang ba byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ khyim bdag des sa'i
khang pa byas so// de dbyar gyi dus su rlanapar gyur pa dang/ dge slong de khyim bdag ga drung du song nas sas pa/ khyim bdag shes par gyis shig/ gzhan zhig
pa tu'agrogo/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa cung zad brel bar ma gyur grang/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag khrel ba nacung khrod kyang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang sa khang ba tshanacana'adi'i 'du mi yod do//
des smras pa/ 'phags pa gal tade ltan yang thog bgyid du stsalagyis bzhugs shig/ des smasal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rjecan yin pas
gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas naganang gis yang thog byed du gzhug go/
bcom ldan 'das kyis yang thog byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ khyim bdag des yang thog byas so// de jib par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lan
kanagadags par bya'o// de 'gul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rte nam gzhug cing lugs gzer dag gis g.yo bar bya'o/// sdom ni/ lanatshwa dang ni sbya/
burwa kha sbyar sman gyi bor bu dang// b.ratang dang nag ding ba dang// rkang pa'i rte nadang rdzob 'o/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka/
0 gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa pa lin dbadasa'i bugapa nas bzung starab tubyung ba tshun chad de rtag tuna'o// de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams sos dris pa/ gnas
ba na bde 'am/ des snas pa/ tshadang ldan pa dag na sta mibade'o// gnas brtan khyod kyis sngon cingag bsngal/ bzhin bzangs lan tshwa'o// gnas brtanagal te de ltan da ci sta mi bsrol/
bzhinab zas bcom ldan 'adas kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis
khan tshwa bsral bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshwa bsrol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slongadag gis bab bab lubazhag stachud zos pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal ba/
bab bab tugazhag par mkhya'i/ 'on kyang sbyarabur gzhag par bya'o// de dag gis smyug ma'i sbya bu bzhag pa dang de zhunas/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ rwa'i spyi bur gzhag pa
bya'o sngage slong dag gis rwa gsam pa'i nang du bcug ste/ dpami zhim par gyur nas! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rwa gsum pa'i nangugazhug par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang ba lang gi
lca bo dang tshos la bkras de dgazhug par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis lan tshwa ra'i nang dugazhug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa
pa lananga' bas lanatshwa ra'i nang du bcug nas bzhag ste kha gab ma bkab pas rdul zhugs so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha bab dgab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kha gab dgab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dag slobadag gso ji lta bu s dgab pa mi shes nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ rwa de kho na lta bu gnyis pa zhig byas la rwakha sbyar du gzhag par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ka

gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa ba lin na'i bu ga nga nas bzung ste rab tubyung ba tshunacha dade rtag tu na'o// de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ste dris pa/ gnas brtan bde 'am
des skyes pa/ tshadang ldan pa dag bdag naste sa bde'o// de dag gso sas pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis sngon ci zhig bcas/ bzhin bzangs sman gyi bor ba'o// gnas ba/ na gal tade lta nad ste
ma btsa/ bzhan bzas bcom ldan 'as kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas
! na gnang gis sman por bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i
mnyan yod nakhyim bdag cig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed// dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtsa bar byed/ dga'
ngar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu zhig btsas te/ de bskyed bsrings nas chenapor gyur to// de dus gzhan zhig nalags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tuphyung ba dang/ sa
khri 'ba' zhig thob kyi/ mal stan ni med do// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de rgyal byed kyi rgol du song ba dang/ bu de khri stong pa la nyal tamal stan mdapar mthong nas/ des smras
pa bu dge slong 'di rnams la mal stanAyod khyod la sta mad/ des smras pa/ pha dgo slong 'di dag ni rab tubyung nas yun ring du lenapas 'di dag gso mal stan thob kyi/ bdag ni de
gzod rab tu dbas nabadagags ma thob bo// des snas pa/ bgel da lta na ngas khyod la par tang zhig bskur gyis/ de 'dir thengs shig des smras pa// pha bcom ldan
'as kyis ma gnang ngo// bu bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can yanibs gnang bar 'gyur ro/ skabs de dge slong rnoms kyis/ bcom ldan 'dus la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gzhung gis dge slong gso par tang gding bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis par dang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang//
@#/// nges par tang de gding ba med par spyad bas dri ma can du gyur to// re zhig cig na khyim bdag de yang gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang/ par tu dri ma can de mthong nas/
des de ngo ma shes tas+yAs pa/ bu khyod shes nyan bsod nams chen por gyur nas/ phacamangon/ par tang gzhan 'dirnyed mod/ pa gzhanared re skan/ bu ci'i phyir 'di 'di ltar dris
can du gyur/ pha bdag gis gding ba mdapar spyad pas so// bu khyod kyis chen po la 'os pa'i gis 'di lta bu yang ma rung bar byas sam/ kye ma khyod kyis gding ba bting nas sdud kyang bla na//
skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom na'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zag gi khra bo la yang gdang pa mdapar s+yadapar mi bya ste/ ngan 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mnyan pa sbyin
par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ chos skya ba seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa 'phyas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang rtenabaca' bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis rkang rten bca' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal po dang/ dge slong dag gis ji lta bu bca' ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sang ge'i khri brtan po gang yin pa la ni so
pag ga them skas bya'o// 'on tayang dang yang du skyod na ni shangeg khri'u gzugs so// bskyod dka' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa ba bzhi la lcags kyi yang mig
gdags par bya zhing de dag nas bzung sta/ tsadagar bskyod par bya'o// bsod nams 'dod pa dog slong dag dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis rkang rten la dri'i lag ris dang
sridag gis byugs pa dang/ chos smra ba 'gyod de/ dal rkang pa 'jog par ma byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i steng du lo ma'i khris sam/ pabs gzhag par bya
zhing bzhag nas rkang pa gzhag par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byedakyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun ga' ra ba na bzhugs
so// bcom ldan 'das kyis sang ga'i khri la rkang rtenagazugs par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams la rkang rtenam bdog nas/ de dag rkang pa 'phyang bzhani chos ston par byed
bas ngal bar gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ com ldan 'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de dag gis rdo gzhag par bya// sdom
ni/ phyi ba sa nga ras mchil ma'i snod// lus phyi ba dang gzhong ris dang// khacal da nga ma shul dag dang ni// btso blag mkhan dngashadelib bo/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
dpo'i khab na 'od ma'i chol khya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa pa lan da'i bu gang nas bzung ste rab tubyung ba tshun chad de rtag tuna'o// de'i drung du
tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ste dris pa/ gnas brtan bde 'am/ des smras pa/ tshongang ldan pa dag bdag nas mu bda'o// gnas brtan khyod kyise sdonaci zhig bcangs/ bzhin
bzangs gdong phyi ba'o// gnas brtanag la te de lta nad si sta ma bcung/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis gding phyis bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adras rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa
na bzhugs so// so ga'i dus la bab pa dang/ tshe dang ldanupa pa lan da'i bu tshabs myas skya bo bsang bsang por gyur cing lus sha ba nang/ nyi ma chung ba/ shig shig por gyur to// de'i
drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ba dang/ de dag gis de lus kyi gnas skabs mthong nas snus pa/ gnas brtan sa skya bo bsang bsang po lus sha bra ngan pa/ nyam chung ba
shig shig bor gyur/ des smos pa/ bzhinabazangs tshobs bdag ba lus kyi gnas skabs 'di lta bu gyur to// gnas brtan khyod kyis sdunaso ga'i dus su ci zhig bcangs/ bzhin
bzangs sang ras so// gnas brtanagal te de lta nad cis mi btsung/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas ma gnang bas sang ras bcang bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig cham ludabado sto nab des sa la mchil ma bor bas mal gyi g.yas g.yos gnyis mi mdzes par byas so// dzitsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa nang par sngar las
taganas khang du zhugs nas phyag byas tund dras nas byung ngo// de phyag 'tshal ba na dpral ba la mchil ma'i thal ba reg pa de/ dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa
gang du khyod kyi dpral ba la mchil ma 'direg/ des snas pa/ mkhanapo cham lung nan/ a sa la mchil ma bor bar ma gyur grang/ rezhig blta'o zhes dganas khang du zhugs pa dang/
tsam namal gyi glo g.yas g.yon du mchil ma bar ba mthong ngo// des dge slong de dag la bsnyad pa dang/ de dag 'phya bar byed/ snyod par byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ da ji lta bu zhig tu
gyur dge slong dag mchil mas dag 'dun gyi gnas khangam rung bar byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul
pa/ dge slong gis gnas ma bcas par mchil ma dor bar yang ma bya/ mun bar phyag byed bas mgos gtug par yang ma bya'i/ tshig tsam gyis phyag bya zhing/ gang

sha cung zad bya ba yodan yang der tshig tsam gyis dra bar bya'o// gzhan la ngo gdal chas pa dang kha chu bdo ba des mchil ma stod 'bar gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag gsi kham phor du mchil ma bor ba dang//
de 'dul chos mang du ma rung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mchil ma rtsod rtenam dang bcas pa bram/ gang na zangs pa tshogazhag par bya'o// dge slong dag zangs
po che ci 'dra ba yang rung nyi bar 'jog par byed pas/ de yang 'dril te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ glangapo che'i tang pa lta bu dngar gzhag
par bya'o/ gzhan dag cig mchil ma 'dor ba na zer ma yar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asul pa/ gcal dgram par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis gcal ci zhig gis dgram pa
rgyu mi zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so phag ga bur ma 'am bye ma'o// ra sbrang ma dag 'du nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ bskradapar bya'o//
dri zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa// dus a su bshal bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis bshal nas ma bskams pa dang/ srog chags dag khyung nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bshal nas bsam par bya'o/ dge slong gzhan dag cig lud pa bdon// de dag sridaduskams pa de'i bar du nyam nga bar gyur nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa tshabs po tshigang dag yin pa de dag gis ni mchil ma stod gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya'o// dge slob khang bzas dag tu klog pa dang/ kha tonabyed
pa dang/ bag pa de dag mchil ma bro ba dang/ de dag samAs yas shing bab bab tumachil ma 'dor bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ brjod phyal bar gnas ma bcas/
par mchil ma dorab mi bya'i 'on kyang gtsug lag khang gi grwa bzhir ka ba drung du dge 'dun gyi mchil ma'i stod bzhi gzhag par bya zhing/ de dag tuklog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa 'am/
'chag pas dran pa 'khar gzhag sta mchil ma dor bar bya'o/ ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi rmal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
tshodwangaldan pa gang gi ka napo tshorabs lnga brgyar sems can dmyal ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ sems can dmyal ba dag gi nang du skyes shing/ de nas phyis 'di'i skyes pa de//
da byis pa'i gnas skabs nas khyim pa khyim la lhag par chags pa/ rtsa ba dga' khas dga' ba dang/ chab la brtsonapas dmyal ba la dmigs pa'i sngonapa ma skyes so// de dus gzhan
zhig nalegs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ chos mngon pa'i phyogs de dang de dag tu/
sha dmyal ba dang/ yi degs dang/ dud 'gro dang/ lha dang/ mi dag bshad pa dang/ dadamyal ba'i gtam thos nas sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba mngon du gyur te/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad
nas khrag byung sta/ chos gos dag kyang khra bor gyur/ dri yang ma zhim par gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bkra
stsal pa/ de lta bas naganang gras dge slong rnams kyis lus po bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lus phyi pa bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de dag gis chos gos kyi/
phyi rol tu bgos pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang dub go bar bya'o// de dag gis de kho nas lus dud pas ral rnabyunganus/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de kho nas drudapar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bska ba'i chus sbangs nas/ dal bus bags kyis bags kyis bkru bar bya'o// las phyi ba'i gos kyi rnag dang khrag
kyang dus dus su bkru bar bya zhing/ de a patshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas rgyal po'i khab na'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so//
[. ]tshe dang ldan pa pa lan da'i bu gang nas bzung sta rab tubyung tshunachad de rtag tunu'o// de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshus par spyod pa rnams song sta dris pa/ gnas brtan bde 'am/ bzhin bsrungs
bdag na sta mi bdego/ de dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis ci zhig bcas/ bzhinabazangs lcags kyi gzho rangs so// gnas brtanagal ted ltand ci ste mi bcang/ bzhin
babrangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang go/ skabs de dge slonga rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'aa lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lapa/ dalta bas na gnang gis
dge slong gis lcags kyi gzhong ras bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge
slong dgu mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba na/ de dag gi rkang pa la 'dam ljab gos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcal gom par bya'o// de dag gcal ci las dgram
pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ so phag ge gcal dgram bar bya zhing/ de nas so phag gi phye mas btab ste rdo thal gyis byug par bya'o// mchod rten gyi
'khor sa chen por gyur tam 'byo nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rta'akhor 'dom gang dgram par bya'o// 'on kyang ma 'byor nasaM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka' stsal pa/ gal tam 'byor na sang leb dgum par bya'o// dayang ma 'byor nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bkalasal pa/ bar bar du so phag
gzhag par bya'o// dge slong sgo khang la bstenapa rnams kyi khyams su 'dam rdzab chags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasal pa/ der ang rim pa de bzhin du bya'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adus mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des dgon par spyil po byed du
bcug ste/ de na ga slong zhig gnas so// dgun stod kyi dus la bab pa dang/ de lhags pas nyan nas skya bo bsang bsadabor gyuracing/ lus sha khri nganab/ dpa/ skyabar gyur
nas dakhyim bdag de'i drung du song sta/ khyim bdag shes par gyis shig/ gnanazhig tu 'gro'ozhes byas pa dang/ des sas la/ 'phags pa cung zad brel bar ma gyur grang
des snas pa/ brel ba ni cung zad kyang mad mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhags pas skyo// des sas pa/ 'phags pa bzhugs shag rong/ khyod la nor ba ma shel don to/ des smras pa/
khyimakhadag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rjecan yin pas gnang bar 'gyuraro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
[Sep]la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bkalastsal pa/ dalta bas nuganang gis/ dge slong gse norabu mngashel nye bar gzhag par bya zhing/ des sa phyungal ma'i bya ba bya'o//
khyim bdag des dge slong de la nor bu mo shel phyin nas/ dngos ma 'byin cing ma'i bya ba byed do// dzitsam na rkun po lnga brgya ri brags shig tulas byedapar 'dong ba phyogs der phyin pa dang/
dadag gis dge slong de la smras pa/ 'phags pa lhags pas sbrubs na 'di nam yodadam/ sa sbas pa/ bzhan babras las pa mad do// 'phags pa khyod mo'i bya ba ji ltar byed// bzhin
bzangs bdag ni nor bu mngoshel gyis ma phyung nas ma'i bya ba byedado// 'phags pa nor bu de ga ra/ bzhin bzas phyogs 'du che'o// de dag gis de mthong nas ra khrags su song ste/
dar las byas nas khyung su snas pa/ shes ldan dag tshur 'phags pa de'i nor bu dbrog gas 'dong/ de dag de'i drung du donganas sus pa/ nor bu me shel dag re/ bzhin bzas phyogs
'anyidana'adug go/ de dag gis dekhyer song ngo// yang dge slongade lhags pas nyenanas/ khyim bdag de'i drung du songs sas bai/ khyimi bag shes par gyis shig gzhan zhig tu
'gro'o// des snas pa/ 'phags pa cung zad brel bar ma gyur grang/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag brel ba ni cung zad kyang mang mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhags pas skyo'o// des snas
[e) ]/ba 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la nor bu me shel ma byinanam/ khyim bdag byin no// de ga re/ rkun po dag gis brogs so// chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu de/
'a lta bu yang khyod kyis rkun po la bskur ba lta/ kyam khyod kyis phyogs dbenapa zhig tu gzhag mod/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as
sgyu kyis bka' stsal pa/ rinapo tshodolta bu dag ma byin par len pa rnams la bstan par ma bya'i 'onakyang m khyungal gtad par bya'o ma shel ji ltar tshushel yang de dang 'dra'o/
lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams bco blag mkhanal chos gos dag 'khrur
mjug go/ tsam dus gzhan zhig namanyan yod du dus stonabyung sta/ mnyanayod kyi khram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis gos chon sna tshogs can dag btso blag mkhan la 'khrur bcug go/ dga'
yang nyi ma nub kar chos gos ngur smig cig khyer te btsobag mkhan gyi drung du song nas/ bzhin bzangs chos gos 'di khrus shig sa byas so// des sas pa/ 'phags ba deng 'jig rten pa'i
gos mang zhig 'tshol tamachis kyis/ bzhud cigs pa bkru bar bgyi'o// de khros nas bsngags par brtsams pa dang/ des snas pa/ 'phags pa bsdigs su ma mchis/ gal te
ma bzod na zhog la bzhud cig dang bkru yod/ des bzhag ste song ba dang/ de'itug rang gis btso blag mkhanasems g.yos par gyur nas/ des chos gos de bul tog gi nang du sbangs nas
gos tshonas tshogs can rnams kyi nang dubazhag pa dang/ der zhag lonanas gos tshon sna tshogs can rnams kyis thams cad khra bor byas so// btso blag mkhan lag pa 'grum pa la gtad de sems
khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang/ skya b.ratshogs ma dad par gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis dgongs la/ bas
ze dang khyim bdag dag ma dad par gyur pa thag tubab par mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong te dgas chos gos ngur smrig btso blag mkhanal 'khrur bcug pa/
'jig rten pa'i gis chon sna tshogs rgyuna rnams kyis khra bor byas so// de lta bas nadage slong gis gos ngur snag dag btso blag mkhanal 'khrur ma gzhug go/ dge slongagos dung gi dag
btso blag mkhan la 'khrur 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos ngur smrig dag btso blag mkhan la 'khrur ma gzhug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
drug sdo rnams kyis gos dkar po dag 'khruragazhug par brtsams so// btso blag mkhan gyis de dag bag med par shing leb la brdabs shing brdabs nas bkris pa dang/ de na ges kha
cig na ral/ khacag mtha' zegs so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
ba dge slong dag de lta bas na ge slong gas thams cad kyi thams cad du btso blag mkhan la gos 'khyur ma gzhug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mas cad kyi thams cad du btso blag mkhan la gos 'khrur mi gzhug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
ga sdo rnams btso blag mkhan 'khrurasar dong nas/ mgo chos gos kyis dkris pa btso blag mkhan bzhin du snga ma su su zhing bdag nyid gos dag 'khru bar byed pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
dag gis mkhrong nas ma dad par gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis// bcom ldan dus la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gas
khatso blag mkhan gyi 'khru sar song ste/ btso blag mkhan bzhin du sdom pa susu zhing bdag nyid gos dag bkru bar ma byo'o// dge slong btsorlag mkhan gyi 'khru sar song ste/ btso blag mkhan
bzhin du sngam pa susu zhing bdag nyid kyis gos dag 'khru bar byedan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyanayod du na rgyal bu rgyal khyed kyi tshal
mgonamad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba por bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis btso blag mkhan gyi 'khru sar song// btso blag ma kho na bzhin du sdom pa su su zhing bdag nyid
kyis gos dag bkru bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde rnams shing leb la 'khru bar byed de/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
'angaleb la gos dag bkru bar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang gzhong 'dang tshu'am tsam gyi nang du dal bus bzlog cing bzlog cing bdag nyidakyiso bkru bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhong khung du/
dal bus bzlog cing bzlogaci bkra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan dag cig gis lag pa gnyis kyis bkru bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal ba/
gang dag lag pa gnyis kyis 'khru bar ma zhes pa de dag gis rkang pa la gnyis kyashed ba kru ba bya'o/ gzhan dag cig gis lag pa gnyis kyis kyang ma nus/ rkang pa gnyis kyis kyang ma nus nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dadag gis zhal gyis la gzhana'akhrur chug cig/ sdom ni/ phyi ba dang ni sbrul gyi/ dzophru 'gyod pa nyid dang ni// tshon gyi
gzhongakhyang rtsig pa dang// chon rtsa rnam pa bzhi yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel mgonamo khros sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/
bzhugs so// dge slong rnams khrus byas nas las gsher bzhin du chos gos dag gyonab dang/ de dag khra bo dang dri ma zhim bar gyur to/ skabs de dge slong rnams
ba kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis lus phyab btang bar bya'o// khacom ldan 'das kyis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o
sgo zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan dag cig la de la bdag nas/ brkyem ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ gang dag la ma bdog pa de dag gis re zhig tsog tsog pur 'dug la
khrus sa kyis lus phyis te chos gos dag bgo bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyi lhas lardul chags par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis de dag brdabs so// dadag brdabs pa dang/ ral
zhing gzus kyi srad bu dag kyang chad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ lham brdab par mi bya'o// ga slong dag gis chus bkrus pa dang/ dengag ma lung nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chus bkru bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang ras ma chus sbangs la phyi bar bya sta/ de lta bas na gnang gis lcam phyi ba bcang bar bya'o/ las rgyas
bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa nadrang srong gar ga'i nge bu'i 'gram na bzhugs so// ulatsam pa na tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo dad pa can dag ba'i bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i bu ma dad
tsatsapa ma dul ba byed pa zhig go/ des dachos mnyan pa yang dag par len du bcug ste/ bu song la 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du phyin nas chos nyan cig dang/ khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro
nas byas pa dang/ de des yabadag par lin du bcug pas/ rang bzhin gyi tshalags kyis chos nyan par zhugs pa rnams kyi nang du song ngo// degazho nu zhig gis mthe nas de sngas te/
tshadang ldan pa dgarkyab ras pa rgyab ranges pa zhes sbas pa dang/ shes nas dge slong gang dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag sngas nas/ de dag gis de sku nas rngama'i srad bus btags
tagatsug lag khag steng nas 'phangs so// donas mas mkhreng ste snyan pa/ bu khyod kyis 'phags pa rnams las chos zes sam/ des sprus pa/ ma de 'dra ba'i 'phags par
nas yang m gyur cig/ bu de dag gas khyed la ci zhig byas/ des ji ltar gyur pa bsad pa dang/ des sdus pa/ bu di bas dang de dag 'phags pa yin no// gzhan dag cig ga sa khyod
mgong du zin nu bsad par gyur to zhes byas pa dang/ dacang ma thor bar 'dug go/ de la no'u ldangs rnams kyis bzhad gad du mgrin snad mgrin snad ces smras pa dang/ de de dag gis ku re sbas pas
lus skya bo bsang bso por gyur cing/ sha bri ngan pa/ skab/ skom por rid par gyur to// de la mas sbas pa/ bu khyod sku lus skya bo bsang bsang pa/ sha bri ngan pa//
rka ba/ skam por gyur/ sa sas pa/ ma bdag la klu gnonanu'adi dag mgranasnyadamagrin da nyes co 'apibar byed/ deci bya gtol med do// khyod rang ga
lugs kyis song bas/ des na gnas skabs 'di lta bu r gyur gyi/ gal te khyedasngal pa'i gzugs kyis song bar gyuran/ A kis btags par mi 'gyur ro// dal pa'i go khrugs kyis
songal chos nyon cig dang/ khyod la thams cad legs par 'gyur ro// 'on tarang ga gzugs kyi nyan na/ khyod gnas na 'dug ste nyenacigany+tsas byas pa dang/ de ma dad pa'i phyire khas ma
blas te// ma'i cangam zer bar 'dug go/ des bsams pa/ 'phags pa dag kru gzhon nu ma'i rnyes 'dogs pa ni gangasu yang rung/ chos nyan par 'dod pa de dag gi yang bar chad
'gyurabs/ 'di kho nab dag gas bya ba yin no snyam ste/ de kha dog 'gas pas nam sros pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
b+h+yA khos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ de'i tshe tsam pa'i klo'i bu mo'i kha dog gi mthus/ drang srong gar ga'i mi de 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to//
phyogs gcig tu'adug nas/ sa pa'i klu'i bu mos/ com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi bu la dad pa zhig mchis pa de bdag gis chos nyan pa yang dag pa/
len du su'anas/ de chos nyan du mchis pa dang/ 'phags pa rnams kyis rnga ma'i ri ska nas btags tabor bas de'i mgrin pa snad de/ de la ne'u ldangs rnams kyis mgrin snyad mgrin/
smad kyis gtsos lugs so// de de ltar gtses pa na lus skya bo bsang bas nga bor gyur cing/ shabri na ba/ rkakha/ skam par gyur na/ kye ma bcom ldanu'adas kyis thugs brtse bar
dgos// gang gis na 'bags ba rnams kyi gzhon nu ldama'anyis 'dogs par ma 'gyur bar/ 'phags pa rnams dran par bgyidapa cung zad cig bca ragasolaM : bcom ldan 'adas kyis
tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo la cang ma gsung bas gnang ba dang/ de nas tsa ba'i klo'i bu mo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams labaka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdatsam pa'ikA'i bu mo nga ga la ba der 'os te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'adug pa dang/ de'i tshatsam pasIka'i lu
mo'i kha dog gi mthus/ drang srong gar ga'i ji po'agram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// phyogs gcig tu'adub nas/ rtsom pa'i klo'i bu mos nga la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa bdag ga bu ma drad ba zhig mchis ba de/ bdag gas chos nyanapa yang dag bag lenadustsal nas/ de'abags pa rnams kyi drung du chos nyan du mchis pa dang/
'a de dag gas de drama'i ris brtags tab bas dmagrin pa snad nas/ de'ane'u ldas rnams kyis mgrin snadamagrin snad ces blo ba snas lags so// de la de skad ces bgyis pa na/ lus
skya bo bsang bsong bor gyur cing/ lus sha bri ngan pa/ skab/ skam por gyuran/ kyi ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis na/ 'phags pa rnams klu gzhonanurtsama'i ris 'dogs
bar ma 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa rnams dran par bgyidapa cung zad cig btur gsol zhes zer ro// dge slong dag de lta bas nagangal da ltar lha rnams kyang/ kye ma shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams
ni dag pa'i chos rnams las yongasasu nyams par gyur to zhes 'phya bar 'gyur ba 'di ni mdzes pa ma yino/ rung ba ma yin gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis klu gzhon nu duma'i ras gdags
par mkhyi'o// 'onakyang kla gzhon nu mthong nas gol gyi sgra phyung ste/ bzhin bzas mthong ba'i la na tsha 'dug cig ces brjodapar bya'o/ gal temathong ba'i lam nas 'dug na de lta na/
legs/ ji ste 'dug nadabyug gu skom khas dal gyis blangs te/ bum pa 'am rdza mar bcug la/ di la bu ga btod de kha bcad nas dbyung bar bya'o// gal tangabyug gu skam kha medan/
[ro ]shu ba 'am/ bya cang gis snyanas btags dbyung bar bya'o// ji shur bu las/ lcag bod dam/ rgya cang mad nagadang thag gisnyi'am/ gros thag gi rnyi la sa mas dkris nas
des gdags par bya zhing/ donas bum par bcug ste dbyung bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis de dbazhinadu phyung nas nags kyi nang du bor ba dang/ de khros pa'i mas nags bsregs ta yang
danyid dutshig ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ nags kyi nang du dor bar mi bya// ga slong dag gis snang ba'i gnas su bor ba dang/ skad cig kyang ma thogs par srog
chags 'ol bas khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i mod kho nal ldog par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang snang ba'i gnas su bzhag nas/ phyisrid gnas su ma zhugs pa de
srid du bsdadapar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na'od ma'ichol bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// rgyal po'i khab nakhyim bdag cig 'dug pa rdo' las
la mkhas pa zhig ste/ rdo phru dag byas shing byas shing 'tshong ngo// sa gzhan zhig na de la red pa mang du grub nas/ ngas bsams pa// gang gis na bsod nams su yang 'gyural//
rnyed pa yang mang du 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs de gang zhig yinasnyam pa dang/ da dad pa canazhig pas de 'di snyam du/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dunakhyim du spyan drangs la/
rdo phu dag nas bshos gsol na bdag gi bsod nams su yang 'gyur la/ rnyed pa yang mang du 'gyur ro snyam du bsams so// de bcom ldan 'adas ga la ba der song ste/
sha zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhinin// de nas khyim bdag des sas rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang ga log dar 'baza' ba dang bca'ab gcong zhing bsod pas kun tshim par byed/ kun tu stobs par byed do/ rnam grangs du mar rang ga lag dar te bza' ba
dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byas/ kun yubastabs nas/ bcom ldanu'adas gdugs tshod gsol phyag bcabs lhung bzed bar rig nas/ stan chos dma' ba
zhig blangs te chos mnyanapa'i phyir/ bcom ldan das kyisan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa de la rjes su yi 'ong ba 'dis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do// mchod
Sh+Tha sbyin nang na sbyin sreg mchog/ bsdobs sbyar nang na sbyong byed mchog/ ma yi nanganargyal po mchog/ chubo'anang nargyu mtsho mchog/ skar ma'i nang na zla ba mchog/ gsal ba'i nangan/
mo mchog/ stong dang 'og dang thad kar yang// skye bo'i 'gro ba ji snyid pa// lha dang bcas pa'ijig rten// mchod bya dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab
[z/]tudaga' bar mdzadunas gdanalas bzhes te bzhud do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// des yang sas rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag 'dunakhyim du bshes la spyan drangs nas/ sa
rganarabs bzhinardo phru sar pa brams nas spyadasbyang pa de dag nyid kyang brim par brtsams pa dang/ dge slong rnams 'gyod de len par mi byedanas/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/
khyim bas lo ngas su dag go zhes byas nas blang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodanargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis chon gyi las bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis tshon gsher ba bskol ba dang/ dazho can yin pa'i phyir bcos pa dang mi
sdug par gyur cing// de dag kyang ma rung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bskams nas bskol ba bya'o// dge slong dag gis nyi ma la bskams te/ de non chung bar gyur
nas bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o// dge slong dag grib ma la skoms te/ rlams khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grub
la bsam par mi bya'o/ 'on kyang nyi ma phyed yod pa la bsam par bya'o// dge slong dag gis tshon dang chos gos dag lhan cago chur bcug ste bcos pa dang/ dedag ma rung bar gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon legs shig tubaskol bar bya'o// dge slong dag lan gcig kho na bskol te 'dorab r byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das
'a kyis bka' stsal kha/ lan gsum gyi bar bskol nas dor bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis lan gsum gyi bar du bskol nas/ gcig kho na bzhag pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka'
stsal pa/ snod so sor gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag gis dang po ni gang yin/ gnyis pa ni gang yin/ gsum pa ni gang yin ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
'di ni dadabodo 'di ni gnyis pago/ 'din gsum pa'o zhes yag bri bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis chomanyid dachos gos dag bcug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul ba/
tshon 'di du chos gos dag gzhug par ma bya'i/ 'on kyang gzhong khung du chon blugs la bsug pa bya'o// dge slong dag gis ha cang gsher ba la bsags pas de 'khus nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ hacang gsher ba la bsug bar mi bya'o// dge slong dgags tacangaskam po la bsugs pas chos gos dag khra bor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka'
stsal ba/ hacang skam po la bsug par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang ran tsam la khasug par bya'o/ dge slong rnams chos gos dag sa la skams par byed de/ de dag rdul gyis dri ma can du gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalcastsal pa/ sa la khaskam par ma byo'o// dge slong dag gis rtswa bting nas bskams te/ tshon phyogs gcig tusong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar sul
ba/ gzar thag la bags la der bskam pa bya'o// ge slong dag gis de bzhin du gzar thag la bkal bas bar du tshor ma chags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ grwa/
nas tha gus btags la/ rgyang shing bres nas gzungs ba bsta bsam par bya'o// dge slong dag gis bsugs nas ma bzlog sta/ tshon phyogs gcig tu'adis nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bkolastsal pa/ yang dang yang du bzlog par bya'o// snam sbyar gzhan dag cig tshad tshosta/ gzar thag la ma shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasal pa/ rtswa bting nas
bskam par bya zhing yang dang yang du bzlog par bya'o// dge slong dag chos gos radi pa dag la nitshanasar pa lcags/ chos gos sarapa dag la nAtshonarang pa sdugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshorasarapa yang sar pa kho na dag la klugs par bya zhing rnying pa yang dI pa dag la klugs par bya'o// dge slong rnams chos gos sar pa dag ni grib ma la skams/ rnying pa
dag nyim la skams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saM lapa/ sar pa dag nitaM ma la bsam par bya zhing/ rnyirti pa dag ni grib ma la bskam par bya// dge slong dag dang por mtshon
gsum pa/ de'ag tu ni gnyis pa/ de'i 'og jun dang po ldugs pas/ dang po lhag pa gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skul la/ dbor
'a dang bo dang gnyis pa grugs par bya zhing/ phyis ba sum ba glugs par bya'o/ dge slong dag gis chu'i nang dum pasugs pas/ chos gos dag khra bor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ chu'i nang du bsug par bya'o// dge slong dag ga sa de nyid kyi nyin bar chu'i nang du bsugs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul ba/ phyi da nyin bsug bar bya'o/
dge slong gzhan dag cig tshon gyi las byed ba na rlung dang char pa byung nas/ dge slong rnams phyogs gang du bskam zhus chos gos dag phan tshun sbra par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
sul pa/ rlung dang char pa byung na khang pazas su tshon gyi las bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rlung dang char pa byung na/bad bzongs su tshon gyi las bya'o zhes bka' stsa la pa dang/ ga slong dag
sgrags khang bzas u tshon gyi las byas pas/ khong bzas tshon gyis sbags/ nye bar sbags ngashanga'adug pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas sas pa/ 'phags pa khrag 'di
zla/ ga las bo/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ 'di de brag ma yin gyi/ kho bo cag gis phyogs 'di'i chon gyi las byas so// de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis khrag yin no snyamadu
[7 ]bsams so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der ba lang ga lci ba 'am 'jim pas byug pa bya'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi mkhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs
rgyus la sogs bdago slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba na de'i blo skyes pa/ bag gis rgyal khyed kyi tshal sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun phul na/ der rtsig pa dag
rimo ma bris pas song la/ bcom ldan 'das la gnang bar gsol tabri'i sam nas/ dbcom ldan 'das ga la ba der songs phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgonamad zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das bdag gso 'dir rtsig pa dag ri mo ma bris te/ 'islod du gal te bcom ldan 'adas kyis gnang nadartsig pa tsami bri bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag
gnang gis bras shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsig pa ri mo bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis tshon sna dus ri mor bri ba ma shes nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgonamed khrus spyin la gnang ste/ rtsig pa ri mor bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa da/ tshon sna du mig gis khri bar
bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ma shes pa de khyed kyis dris pa legs so legs so// tshon sna bzhi po sdon pa thams
cad dang/ ser po thams cad dang/ dmar po thams cad dang/ dkar po thams cad kyis bri bar bya'o/ bam po btsubadunapa// sdom ni mkhar
lan pa ya spyad dag dang/ khug can gyi khri'u dang ni// phyag dang skra rnams bzod pa dang // 'phrangab khab dang tsherama'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal
byed kyil mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de'i khyim du bsod snyoms pa zhig dus dus su 'ong zhing/ des de skyabs su 'gro ba dang
bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag go/ dus gzhan zhig na de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi bsngags pa brjodapa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis rdzas las
byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yang rung ba zhig bgyi'o// bsod snyoms pas sbas pa/ khyim bdag legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ 'phags pa ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag dge
'dunagyi gtsug lag khang gyis shig/ 'phags pa bdag la kar sha pa Nadag ni mchis na/ 'on kyang chos kyi grogs bgyid pa ma mchis go/ khyim bdag kar sha pa Na dag byin cig dang/
khyod kyi chos kyi grogs nga yin no// 'phags pa legs kyis kar sha pa Na 'de ri zhes des de la karangasha pa Na dag phyin no// bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa/ 'diphyogs bzhi'i tshos
ba mtshus par sbyod pa rnams kyi nor yin pas/ 'di las ji ltar spyad par bya/ bzhag la re zhig gzhan bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des kar sha pa Na mdzod du bcug ste bzhag go/
jitsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag des bsams pa/ 'bags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang byed kyis/ razhig song la de ni dag byed blta'o snyam mo// de song ba dang ji tsam na ci yang mi
snang nas/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang cung zad kyang m bgyis sam/ bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ ra zhig gtsug lag khangag mkhar lan pa'i lag spyad kyang med
nani bya/ 'phags pa kye ma kar sha pa Na dgagar mchis/ khyim bdag mdzod na'adug go/ 'phags pa nyid las mkhar lanapa'i lag chab gyi de dustsol cig/ khyim bdag sa
ji ltar phyogs bzhiba'i nor gyis mkha lanapa lag cha byed du bzhug 'apags pa gtsug lag khang 'di yang phyogs bzhi'i dgaslong dag kho na'i slad du bgyid na 'di la ci zhig 'gal/
khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ 'phags pa de bzhin mdzod cig/ des gnas skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
