'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nor de nyid las mkhar lan pa'i log spyad bya sta/ 'di la 'gyod par bya'o// bsod snyoms pa de gtsug lag khang byed
cing bsod snyoms la yang rgyu ba dang/ khyim bdag gis snus ba/ 'phags pa bdag gis gtsug lag khang mdzad cing bsod snyoms la ya rgyu 'am/ 'anyide las mkhar lan pa'i bsod
snyoms su mdzod cig dang/ bdag gis kar sha pa tsagazhan dag kyang dbul lo// khyim bdag mkhar lanapa'i nor las ji ltar bsod snyoms su bya/ 'phags pa 'di bdag nyid kyi sams
kyis bag yangs su bgyis pas mdzod cig/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig mchis/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// 'phags pa de bzhin mdzod cig/ des gnas skabs
de dge slong rnams la bsnyadapa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'angs lagasol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mkhar lan byed pas mkhar lan gyi nor kho nas
bsod snyoms yongs su spyad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis mkhar lanapa'i nor kho na las bsod snyoms longs su spyad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de ha cang nganapa za nas/
00bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ha cang ngan pa bkra' bar mi bya'o// de ha cang bsod pa bza' bar brtsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bracang bsod
pa bza' bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang gtsug lag khang gzhanagyi 'atsam du yongs su spyad par bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsho la mgon/
yodazas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhige 'khru bag nab de yang dang yang du chub khungasar 'gro bas 'o// skabs de dge slonganams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la kha/ wa'i bu ga canabyago/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri'i bu ga nan bya'o nas bka' su la pa dang/ dge slong dag gis khyadapar med par khri'u
dag la mtshon gyis phug ste bu ga btod ba dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsalapa/ sras btags pa dang 'breng bus btags pa gang yin pa de la ni thug nas bu ga gdod par bya'o//
thagus btags pa ga nga yanipa de la ni bu ga btod la bcing bar bya'o// de bsha ba byed pa na ba sa nanas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der lo ma'i khres
gzhag par bya'o/ khashang ba sa la ltung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tugyo mo gzhag par bya'o// hacad mathon por 'ag par byed sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bkangs pa/ !cang mthon por gzhag par mi bya'o// de dri zhim par gyur te/ dge slong dag gis de phyung nas bor tagazhanabazhag pa dang/ da yang dri ma zhig
ka bar gyur ted ya bor ba dang/ gzhan ma 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ thams cad dor ba ma bya'i/ gnyis btsas la/ gcig bkrus dbaskam par bya zhing/ cig
sgyu shos kyang de bzhin du bya'o// 'on ta gnyis su ma rnyed bar gyur na/ de'i stag log sgrol ba gzhag cid dar bshang ba bya sto/ dalta bu gzhan yang gazhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'dras kyis tsho
mo de bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de bkrus kyang dri mi zhame bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ til mar gyis bsku bar bya'o/ 'on kyang dri mi zhum par gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ us mar gyis bsku bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa la blta bar bya'ozhes bka' stsal nas/ de'i drung du nad pa la blta ba'i ga slong rganapo la
wA 'ong gzhon nu dag kyang 'ong ngo// dana gzhon nu gang dag yin pa de dag ni dal phyag 'tshal bar byed/ rganapo gang dag yin pa dedag la ni srid pa de phyag 'tshal bar byedapas/ daskyo bar gyur nas/
! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'bagos pa 'khyag ma bya/ 'bags pas phyag mi bya/ 'bags pas phyag khangag gir ma bya/ 'bags pa las phyag bgag rim bya'o//
[z]do'abags pa la phyag byed dam/ 'bags bas phyag byedadam/ 'bags pas phyag bdag gir byed dam/ 'bags pas las phyag bdag gar byed na 'gal tshabs canangu'agyur ro/
sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bags pa la phyag mi bya/ 'bags bas phyag ma bya/'bags pas phyag bdag gir ma khyu/
lags pa las phyag bgu ba'i mi bya zhes gsugatshul 'bags pa duzhig mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor 'bags pa ni gnyis te/ zas kyis 'bags pa dang/ mi gtso bas 'bags ba'o// de
'bras kyis 'bags pa naso shing dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba la sogs pa khru bas bral ba'o// mgatsang bas 'bags pa nubashang ba dang/ gcig
dang de dag bkru ba mtshaba'i gonas kyi byi dor bya ba byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa zheb 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas la bram ze pad+mat+tha sAng pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nam bdag shing rta lo
'tshal ba 'am/ kha lo sgyur ba 'am/ lcag bzlo ba 'am/ skadacher sna bgazigs pa da/ bdag phyag 'chol bar go'u tam khyod kyis gzung du gsol/ nam srang na mchis sam//
lhama'aphudadam/ shul las khyo lam/ sug pa ba rab gzigs pa de'/ bag phyag 'tshal bar go'utam khyod kyis gzung du gsol/ nam
rgya 'khor gyi nang na mchis sam/ stan las 'phagras sam/ gtsug tor dang/ gdugs phog pa dacho/ bdag phyag 'tshal ba'i go'u tAm khyed kyis gzung dugasol zhes gsol ba gang
lags pa/ btsun pa tilogs 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la de lta bu dag phyag 'tshal bar chud dam/ lcabar 'khor phyag byas pa ma yagyi/ nyabar 'khor de ni gu pa sla ba'i tshig
tsam du zad kyi/ lus 'dud pa dang tshig tu'abyin pa gang yod pa ni chod pa yanen// nya bar 'kher 'on kyang 'apags pa'i chos 'dul ba la phyag gnyis te/ yan lag lnga dang/ byani ba la
'khyud pa'o// gleng gzhi nimanyan yod na'o// dge slong dag chos gos gang dag gyon nas skra dang kha spu dag 'dreg par byed pa de dag nyid gyonanas gzan bza' bar byed/ de dag
hade dang ston pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang/ ma dad pa rnams 'phyu bar byedacing/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/ chos gos gang dag rgyunas skra dang kha sA
'dreg pa de dag nyid khyon nas gzan bza' bar byed cing/ de dag nyid dang ston pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed dozhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong mas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dag gyonanas skra dang kha spu breg par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang sku bzed kyi gos bcang bar bya zhing// de bges nas skra breg par
bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis sku bsred kyi ges bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ gzhan dag cig la 'bur pa da nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ gang dag la

'byor ba mad pa de dag gis rngul gzan gyis lus dkris la skra breg par bya'o// dge slong dag gis skra dang kha spu bregs nas de bzhin du song ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong
rnams ni spu gri'i las byas nas khrus mi byed pas gtsang sbra med pa'o zhes 'phya bar byed do// skabs de bcom ldan 'adas la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ spu gri'i las byas nas khrus bya'o// dge slong gzhan dag cig ni rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung bar gyur/ gzhan dag cig ni sna nas khrus kyi sbyor ba mi bzod par gyur/
gzhan dag cig la ni chu'i rnyed pa mad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis yan lag lnga tsam bkra bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yonan

rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa nyanadag ngag slong dag la me tog gi 'phreng ba 'bul ba dang/ de dag gis ma blangs nas/
khram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis sbrus pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adus zhes bya ba nas/ ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas/'jig
na ba rol tudag b.lam rgyags dang bral tamatshi'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de bcom ldan 'dras la/ dge slong dag gas gsol ba dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas nam tog ga 'phrang ba len par rjes su gnang ngo// de dag gas blangs te/ de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang/ deg 'phya zhing 'phags pa
bdag cag gis ri ba'i rin gyis nyos pa yin/ si khyed kyis blangs tador ram zhes zer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag gas dbu sku
dang san mo'i michod na dag la btags pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ rtsi'aphags pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang san mo'i mchod rten ma mthong sam mam/
bdag cag gas khyed la byin pa lags kyi/ bdag cag gas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'amachod rten dag la ni dang po nyid du phul lo// dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas gnas
kha ngag sgor bzhag pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gyis mthong nas/ drigatsang kha yin no snyam ste phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas
khang gi sgor gzhag par mi bya'i/ nang du gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag gis sgo'i drang thad du bzhag pas/ nyes dmigs danyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal ba[}]
dra nim bo thams cad mag la phan pas/ phyogs dben par bzhag cing bstam par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas dben par bzhag cing bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang
dge slong dag gis ji ltar gzhag pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas legs su khab bam tsher ma btab la 'phyang du gzhug par bya/// sdom ni/
stanabazas da ni rgyab rten dang// sakhasku lhung bzedabu gu dang// 'brumar stongan gsum dag dang// gtur thag dang ni khron pa 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyanayod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamod khras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge
'dun la ni 'byor nastan bzang po gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo// dge 'dun la ni 'byor na rgyab rten gnang gi/ gang zag la ni ma gnang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yodanargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad ba can dag gis dge slong+ka rnams la dril ba dang/
gdge slong rnams kyis ma blangs nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa gang gi tshesas rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenadus byung ba zhes bya ba nas/
ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su kha ba/ de lta bas na gnang gas dri blang bar bya'os byuba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ de rnams kyis blas nas/ de dag nyid kyi ma dud du bor ba dang/ de
sgra dag gis 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis ri ba'iron gyis nyos pa yinan/ khyod kyis blangs te dor ba 'am nas 'phya bar byed do// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag
gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkral la pa/ dor bar mi bya'o// de dag gis dbu skra dang sanAmo'i mchodartenal phul ba dang/ de dag gis sdus pa/ 'bags
pa dag na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshags pa'i dbu skra dang sa mo'i mchod nam mthong ngam/ bdag cag gis khyed la phul gyi/ dbazhune gshags pa'i deb sku dang sen mo'i
mchod rtenal ni bdag cag gse dang po nyid du phul lags so// dge slong dag gis blangs nas gnas khang ga sgor bzhag pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gso mthong nas
khri gtsang khang yin no snyam ste/ zhabs la btugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasul pa/ gnas khang gi sgor ma ga zhag gi/ 'on kyang n du gzhag par bya'o/ dge slong
bdag gis sgo'i drang thad du bzhag nas/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo'i drang thad du gzhag par ma bya'i/ 'on kyang drinyim pothams cad ni
mgo la phanabs/ sdus kyi thad kar dra'i lag ras bya zhing/ panas dus dus su bstan par bya'o// gzhan dad pa can dag gis dge slong dag khyim du nadrangs tumachod ston gsol nas
da rnams de dag gi rkang pa la dri'o lag si skadapa dang/ dge slong dag gis ma blangs nas/ de dag gis sbas pa/ 'phags pa gang dag bram ze la mngon par dad pa de dag gis/ de dag la
dang bor dri dang 'brang ba dag phul nas/ de dag gis blangs tamago dang lus la dbar sbyor bar bgyid na/ bdag cag ni khyed la mngon par dad de/ zhabs dag la 'bul ba 'gal ba zhig/
mchis bzhes su gsol/ skabs de bcoldan 'dasal/ dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ rkangapa dag la 'bul ba bdag gir bya'o// dge slong
ngag gis blangs te de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang/ dadag gis smras pa/ a ma 'phags pa khyed cag gtsug lag khang du gshegs pa ci bder mdzad cig/ ji ltar bdag cag dad pa skyes pa
de ltar ma dod pa 'ang skyes so// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sulapa/ de dganyidakyi mdun du dor bar mi
khya'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slongadag lhung/
kyi bzed bab chol du 'jog par byed pas/ de dag ma rung bar gyuranas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed
ts+tshabab chol du gzhug par ma byo'i/ 'on kyang lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu ga byas la der gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag rtsig pa rno bar byedanas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsig pa

bskobar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang gang gi tshogatsug lag khang rtsig pa de kho na'i tshalhung bzed kyi bu ga bya ste/ de bzhin du 'khor gyi khang pa la'ang bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung ba'+rad gzhag pa'i
bu gar lhung bze gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ ga slong dgon pa pa dag lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu ga mid nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dadag gis lcag a kha/
srad bu'i skon bu byas te/ de la ba glang gi lta ba 'am/ 'jim pas bsdus la der gzhig par bya'o// jul khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de la de dang 'dra ba'i kha gab
bya'o// dge slong dag gas de sa la bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la mi gzhagag/ 'on kyang gdang thag gam/ shangag yal ga la spyad dugazhug par bya'o//
00/de dag gang gi ljongs zhing 'gro ba de 'tshong khyer zhing dang nas/ ma dad pa dag 'phags pa 'dir khyimabya 'am snga'u khyer zhes 'phya bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalastsal ba/
gar 'gro dgur skon bu khyir tu 'gro bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang gang du 'gro ba der gzhan zhig gzhag par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshal mgon med khras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig ldes rgyu'adi ri brags shig tuphyin te/ des khyim zhig tuganas b.rAs nas/ rkang pa bkrus te 'bru mar
bslang bar brtsams pa dang/ jitson na bud med cig gis til mar khyer ta'ongs nas/ dge slong des lag pa brkyang ba dang/ des snas pa/ 'phags pa slong bar mdzad la stod mi
mnga' pa de gal gda'/ sa ma'o khyod kyis 'bru mar gyi snod bcang bar mdzod cig/ des snas pa/ sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// de cangam zer bar 'dug nas/
skabs de bcom ldan 'adus la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis 'bru mar gyi snod bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis 'bru mar gyi snod bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa nyadag dge tshul gnyis 'bru mar gyi brag khyer te/ 'bru ma gyi bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ lung
[p]/ med cig gis 'bru mar khyer ta'os pa dang/ jitsam na dag tshul gnyis ngashig 'bru mar gyi 'brag thogs pa mthong nas/ sa brang brdungs tasnas pa/'phags
pa khyed 'di su zhig gis 'gas par byed/ dadag gis sbas pa/ kran pa mo khyod kyis re zhig ci byin pa de lugs shig/ lhag ma lta bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis 'gengs
so de cang ma zer bar gyur nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'dus la// dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi snod ha
cang chen po bcang bar mi bya'o// com ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi stod ha cang chen po bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ de dag gis hacang chung ba bcas pas des
[G ]dgos ba sa chog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'a stsal pa/ hacang chung ngu yang ma bca pagi/ 'on kyang 'bru mar gyi snod ni gsum ste/ chen po dang/ 'bring dang/ chung 'ogo/ de la
T+Tha chen po ni phul gang ba'o/ chung ngu ni phul phyed pa'o/ de dag gi bar ni 'bring ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong rgan po dang gsar bu zhig dang gnyis lam du zhugs tadong ba dang/ de dag gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing 'gro ba/ ji tsam na gnod sbyin m da
bzhig gis thos nas/ des bsams pa/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di gnyis gtam babrang pa ma yin pa zer zhing 'dong bas/ 'di dag ga mdangs 'phrogs par bya'o snyam bsams te/
de de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo// yang basams pa/ gang 'das pa de ni'adas su khrod/ gal tad gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer na nges par mdangs 'phrog par bya'o sAm mo// ded
ltarasams shing de dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba las/ gnod sbyind pa canagazhanazhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ des de la grogs po gar 'gro zhes dris pa dang/ des ji ltar gyur pa de la sus
so des snas pa/ grogs po dge slong 'dag ni dka' thub dang ldan pas gor ma chag pa chos kyi gam zer zhing 'dong ngo// khyod la dge slong dag gis spyi zhig byas 'dug cig dang/
bdag cag phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba'agatam dag bya nge 'dong ngo// des sAs pa/ grogs po bdag gis 'di gnyis nges par ma gtangags tshur shog 'dong ngo// des de dus/
kyis 'tshubar shes nas/ de dang lhan cig tu de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin du 'bras pa deng/ dge slong de gnyis gtam baphrang po ma yin pas khe na zer zhing dong ba las/ jitsam nalam gnyisasu
gyurAnas/ dge slong de gnyis las kyang gcig nirgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro'o// gcig ni dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzangs su 'gro'o// deganyis las gsar bu gang yin pa des rgan po la
phyag byas te/ des snas pa/ tshadang ldan pa bdag ni ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzangs su mchi yis/ khyod bag yod par mdzod la nad mad par gshegs
shig ces smras nas de song ba dang/ gnod sbyin m ded pa de skra gyen du bslang sta mdangs 'phrogase sa byas pa dang/ gnod sbyin dad pa can des snas pa/ grogs po gakhru lums ma khyedatsag/
'diganyis kyis chos bshad de/ gang nad med par gyur cig ces sas pa/ nad med pa de ni ring pa'i mchog yinal/ gang bag yod par byos shig ces zer ba/ bag yod pa ni chos
thams ca kyi rtsa ba yin no// bcom ldan 'adas kyis kyang/ bag yod 'chimad gnas yin te// bag med pa ni 'chiba'i gnas// bag yod 'chibar ma 'gyur te// bag med rtag tu 'chi
bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so/ zhes des de slar bzlog go gnod sbyin dad pa can de 'di snyam du/ 'di kho na bdag gis bya ba yin no snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
lta phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin des 'di
skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dadapa/ mi ma lags pa gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tuganas shing mchis lags so// btsunapa mngon par dad
0 pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni cung zad cig mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa// mi ma lags pa gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tuganas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tuganas pa ni chos mang du lags la/ btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag ni gtam bzang po ma lags pa mtshizhing shul du zhugs te
chin kyi ma bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya bar dgongs te/ gang gis nu 'phags pa dag gtam bzang po ma lags pa mchizhingashul du zhugs tamachibar mi 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa rnams
dran par bgyid pa cung zad cig bcur gsol/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis gnod sbyin de la su ma gsung bas gnang nas/ da nas gnod sbyin de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar
rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la na go bos phyag 'tshol tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de song ste ring po ma lon par
mkhyen nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas
gnod sbyin zhig las dge slong dag gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing lam du zhugs 'dong ba la/ gnod sbyin m dad pa dag skabs tshol zhing glags lta zhes thos so// dge slong dag
legs par gsungs ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung ba rnams 'di lta ste/ gtum bzang po ma yin pa zer ba de na mdzes pa ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma yin no//
rgyu// de lta bas na ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya sta/ lam du 'jugs pa'idge slong gas chos kyi gtam dang/ 'bags pa'i mi smra ba dang/
rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis lam duzhugs nas 'gro bar bya'o// ngal bso ba'i gnas kyi phyogs su gtsug lag ga tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o// cha chub na de gang gi yin pa dang/ de'i lha
la tshigs su bcad pa gdon bar bya'o// gang du gnas 'cha' ba de rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o// lam du zhugs pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang
dag par blangs ta'adug par ma byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du'agyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
ts+tshA dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong dag gis chos gos zin pa chos gos mthar phyin patshon sar pacan dag phrag pa la bkal te lam du zhugs pa dang/ de dag rdul dang/ rdul gyis ma rung bar
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtur bu byas la der gzhugs ste bkur bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gos dag gtur bur bcug stabakur bar bya'o zhes
gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gis chos gos kyi gtur bu ji lta bu bya ba mngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ras gong rgyur ni khru gsum/ nyung du na khru phyud dang ngo/
ba de gnyis su bltab la drub par bya'o// dge slong dgags mtha' mar kha btod pas glang po che'i sna ltar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar kha mi gdod kyi/ 'on
kyang dbus su gdodapar bya'o/ de dag gis kha thug ma btags pas dbazhin rdul zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srad bus drab lta bu byas la/ de nas srid
bu gzhan gyis brgyu bar bya'o// de dag gis chos gos gang dag bgo ba de dag ni 'og lubazhag gzhan stangaduphyung ba dang/ de dag gtur bu yang dang yang du 'khyer ba na 'chol bar gyur nas/
sheb com ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ gang dag bgo ba de dag ni stengadu bzhag la/ lham dag ni gzugazhag bar bya'o// sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal ma gon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag 'a ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshom rgod dag gis 'gronapa bcom nas phan tshunakhus 'debs sha bros pa dang/ so so'u grong na gnas pa dag khyim
nas lhags 1/ mi rgod dag gotags rab tug tags nas/ mgon med cing skom pas gdungs te/ gcig nas gcig tutshubacol ba'i phyir dacing khron pa zhig tuphyin pa dang/ rkun
dbol sdu dbon gyis smras kha/ shes ldan dad 'dape chu snod dang thug pa dag ltos shig/ bltas na thag pa yang med/ chu snod kyang med do// sde dponakyis skyas pa//
pha shesaltan dag gal te 'gronab 'ga' zhig 'ongan de las thag ba dang chu stod b.rAs/ shing la 'tshogs te ltas shig/ de dag gis shing la 'dzegs te blta bar brtsams na/ ji tsam na
ga ring ba zhig nas dge slong dag cig 'ong ba mthong ste/ de dag gis snas pa/ sde dbodakya'i khu mang zhig 'ong ngo// des snas ba/ gnyis ldan de dag ni mkhas pa yin pas gdonam za bar
de dag la gdang thag dang tshurtsod yod do// de dag gis smras pa/ sde dponagal te de dag la yod na de lta nalegs/ ji ste med na de dag ga lto dral 'khrag ba ltung bar bya'o// de dag gas de ltar
gros byas te bsdad pa dang/ dge slong dag kyang lhags so/ mi rgod dag gis dris pa// 'phags pa bdag skom na khyed la gang zag dang chu snod yod dam/ de dag gas sdus pa/ banani
bzas mdo mi rgod ga 'khrugs par gyur ta mtshonatshal nom pa dang/ de nangage 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zhig gis/ ci'aphyir 'di dag 'khrugs shing mtshon cha nom zhes bsam
ba la zhugs pa dang/ dge slong dag gsad par 'dod par mthonas/ des smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa dag khyed ci'i phyir 'khrugs par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// des smyug
pa tshadang ldan pa dag thabs yodakyis tha mal par 'dug la sku'athung zhig/ de dag tha mal par 'dug pa dang/ dge slong dag gis lhas mA dang/ lcag podadang/ rgya cang dag 'thud de//
lhung bzed khron par dpyang la btang nas/ de nas tshubacus tags so// brtags nas ma rgod thams cad ngoms par byas pa dang/ da dag gis sas pa/ 'phags pa dag gal takhyod kyis
bdag cag la tshum skul bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis khyed thams cad bsad par gyur to// a ma khyed kadang thag 'cha nga mdzod cig/ de dgagis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa dag de bzhinakhya'o//
mi rgod dag gis phyag byas tang ngo// dge slong dag gis kyang dzinaM ma ngos pa tshu'athus nas ril ba dang bya ma bum dag bkang ste dong nas de rim gyis mnyanayodadu lhags so// dge slong dag gis
'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun tusodabs kun spyad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci bde bar spyad dam zhes dris pa dang/ de dag gso ji ltar gyur pa smras so// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/
dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnong gis dge slong dag gis gdung thag bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis
gdang thag bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis shani tu'ang bo dag 'chang nas/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin turing po yang bcang bar mi bya'o// de
dag gis shani tuthung ngu dag bcangs nas/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tuthung ngu ang bcang bar mi bya'o// 'on kyang gdang thag gsum bcang
bar bya ste/ ring po dang/ 'bridi dang/ thung 'o// ring bo na khru brgya lnga bcu'o/ zung nga ni khru brgya'o// de dag ga bar ni 'bring ngo// com ldan 'das kyis gdung thag gsum bcang bar bya'o
zhes gsungs pa dang/ ga slong rnams 'chang bar gyur te/ yul gzhan zhig na chu mod pa der yang dge slong dag gang thag khyer tadong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdan
thag ni yul rnams dang sbyar nango bcang par bya'o// sdoman sa gyi gdaradang sanagri dang// snang tshar dang ni sdus shing dang/ bad tsha'i rigs la 'jim pa ni// driyis yongs su bskos
ba'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgya la byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig gi sgra ring po ring bor gyur te/ da 'dreg
T+Tha mkhan gyi gan du song nas/ bzhinebazungs bdag gi skra bregs shagi/ des bsams la/ nAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni nan chasu rngan pa med par las byed du 'jugs bas/ gal te 'di'i
skra bregs nas kha dang gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur bas/ dus ring du brgyus tabazhag pa dang/ 'dirang ga blos ldog go snyam nas/ des dus btab pa/ 'phags ba gag
[o/]la sang gnas snga dros/ phyi dron/ gdugs kyi gung zhig la spyon cig/ de des bslas pas yang dang yang du 'gro'o// de la dge slong mdza' bshes shig yod pa des/ des yang
dang mang du 'gro ba mthong nas gas pa/ tshadang ldan pa khyod ce'i phyir 'dir yang dang yang du 'gro/ ci'adi gnyen gyi khyim mam/ rigs kyi khyim yin/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de ni[–]
gnyan gyi khyim dang/ rigs kyi khyim gungam man chod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gi rang ba ring par gyur nas/ bdag gis 'dreg mkhan de la 'di skad du/ bdag gi sku ring po rang pa khrigs
ngashag dang/ khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang/ de dus btab ste ma bregs so// des snus ba/ tshodang ldan pa bzo bo la bdenapar smra ba dkon no zhes khyod kyis ma
thos bas/ kho bo ni sku 'dreg kyang mkhas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// des skabs de dge slong dag la bsnyadapa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gang zhig shes pa des phyogs dben pas sku brog par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dbar bar skra breg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong de dge slong de'i drung du song nas/ tshadang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis
bya@#/// skra bregs shig/ des snas pa/ tshadang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba na lags na/ de ni mdzub mos breg pa'i bya 'as/ 'di lta snga grwa dang/ gdal dang/
sanagri dang/ snang tshar dag kyang dgos so// des skabs de dge slong dag la sbas nas/ dge slong dag gis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'od s kyis bka'
bal ba/ de lta bas na gnang gis dgag 'dunagyi phyir spu gri'i lag chab cang bar bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sar skya'i gnas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//

rgyu gang ga tshob com ldan 'das kyis ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya'i rigs las re re rab tuphyung ba na/ de dag rab tu gzhon pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas/ de dag sngas shing med par bab bab nyal nas gnyid
lag ge/ de dag de bzhin du gnyid log pas khams ma snyoms tango chung bar gyuranas/ de dag snyan pa'i drung dusong ste smras pa/ bzhin bzang bdag cag drod chung bar gyur na sman ston cig/ nges smras
pa 'phags pa bzhud cig dang/ khyed cag ci 'dra bar nyal zhange 'dug pa ltar 'dong ngo// de song ba dang/ ma nu pas shing med par khas bub nyal la mthong chus/ des snyas pa/ 'phags
pa khyed cag khas bub tunyal bas/ de'i phyir khyed khams ma snyoms la drod chung bar gyur gyis/ sngas shang chug la nyol cig/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// des stsal pa/
[/]'phags pa khyed kyi stonapa ni thugs rje can yin bas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gas gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ da lta
bas 'ganang gis sngas shang btsugs te nyal bar bya'o// de dag gis sngas shing btsugs tal na/ 'on kyang sos bar ma gyur nas/ de dag gis yang smanabal snas pa dang/ des skyas ba/
'phags ba sngas nas tshangs can bcug ste nyal bar bya'o// bzhin bzas bcom ldan 'adas kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje canayanabs gnang bar 'gyur//
skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas bar gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la ba/ de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gis sngas nang tshangs can bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan
'dus kyis sdus nang tshangs can bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gis phyi'adra ba zhig bcang bar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras den
srid du khu bzha/ zheng du khru dor byas la drub sta/ danas shing bal gyis bkang la sngas su gzhug par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal
bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa lan da'i bu rab tubyung tshun chad ces bya ba nas/ gnas brtanakhyod kyis ci bcas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// nges
smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa des bsgos pa'i 'o jis ba dag bcad s so// gnas brtan da ci'i phyi'i ma bcang/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang/
ngo/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ dge slong nad pas dris bsgos pa'i 'jis pa bcang bar bya ste/
dul 'gyed bar ma bya'o// 'dul pa bran tshogs kyi gzhi las sgo gsum pa rdzogs so// kabasdus pa'i sdom ni/ gnas brta nar ba lhan pa dang// nad pa dang
narigs ngan pag/ ri mo lhung bzed mad pa dang// gnas bca' ba dang shing bskyed pa'o// sdom ni gnas ba/ nA re mo gzhan dang// gso sbyong mtshams ni sbyar ba dang
waM btung ba nas gnyis ldan pa dang// gtsug lag khang ni dus kun pa'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgo sku mad zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong ga rmakha tonu gdon par bya'o zhes bka' su la pa dang/ dge slong dag gis grong gis kha ton gdon par bya ba
mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kha ton gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis dag 'dun gyi gnas brta na gyis kha ton gdon
00bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi kha ton 'donapar zhugs so// ra zhig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhige naganas ban
zhig 'ag ba de kha ton 'don ma nus pa dang/ de la dge slong dag gis skas pa/ gnas brtan gso sbyong kyi bar gnas na/ tsam sams bar 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ tshodang
ldan pa dag bdag gis ma nus na ji ltar bya/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dag 'dun
kyi gnas brtan gyis mi nus na/ gnas brtanaganyis pas kha ton gdon par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan gnyis pas kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bkar sul
pa dang/ re zhig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig naganas brtanaganyis ngas kyang ma nus nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldanu'adus la gsol pa dang/
btsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal toganas brtanaganyis pas kyang ma nus na/ gnas brtan gsum pas kha tonaMgadon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas
brtan gsum pas kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ re zhig cig nagatsug lag khang gzhan zhig na gnas brtanagasum pas kyang ma nus nas/ skabs de dge slong
rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal taganas brtan gsum pas kyang ma nus na/ dgo/
slong rnams kyis res su bklags takha ton gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis res su bklags takha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' sul nas/ dge slong rnams
res su bklags takha tonagadonaparab mas pa dang/ ris su bklags der kha ton 'don pa de dag las kha cig ni nus pa la res bab/ kha cig ni ma nus pa la ris bab sa/ da
la nus pa gang yin pa des mi'i sa bab pa na/ zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdonapa 'don par byed/ ma nus pa gang yin pa de ni ras bab pa na mnge shos na ji ltar bya zhes zer ba'i
skabs dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kyang nus ba gang yin pa de la bcol bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'angs
kye kyis mi nus pa la 'os bab pa gang yin pa des kyang gzhan la bcol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ lozhig cig na gtsug phog khang gzhamazhig nam nus pa la res bab pa des gang la
bcol ba de ma btub nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ nus pa gzhan gang yin pa de kho na la
rtag tukhacol bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyedacing dge 'dunagyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon par bya'o// de mdanaganas brtanaganyis pas so// de yang
mdu naras su bklags takha tonAgadon par bya ba 'am/ gzhan nus pa gang yin pa de la bcol bar bya'o zhes bka' sul pa dang/ gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig naso sor thar pa'i mde bstan
ba'i thonapa ni 'ga' yang med kyi/ dge 'dunagyi gnas bdagyes pas pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi bton te/ lhag ma ma thenanas/ dge slong de dag gis gso sbyong bzhag go/ skabs
de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adus kyis bka' stsal pa/ gso sbyong gzhag par ma bya'o// 'on kyang gang gis gang thon pa des da gdon par bya
sta gal tadage 'dunagyi gnas brtanakyis pas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos ban thon na/ des de dag gdon par bya zhing/ gzhan gyis dge 'dunalhag ma'i chos btsugasum/ gzhan gyis ma
ngas pa'i chos gnyis/ gzhan gyis spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu/ gzhan gyis ltung byed kyi tshes dgu bcu/ gzhan gyis so sor bshags bar bya ba'i tshes bzhi/ gzhan gyis bslab
pa mang bo'i chos rnams / gzhan gyis rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdunate/ da ltar gso sbyong gi mtshamaMs sbyaran/ gso sbyong gi bar chad du 'gyur bar nga mi la'o/
gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsunas dus su rung ba'i btung ba zhes kyang bka'/
ka stsal/ dus ma lags par rung ba zhes kyang bka' sul na/ btsun pa dus su rung ba ni gang lags/ dus ma lags par rung ba ni gang lags/ 'bar 'khor ma btsags ba ni dus su
rung ba// btsags tatshudang bsres pa ni dus ma yin par rung ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// drug sde rnams sdig pa 'dod pa/ ser snas ma rig bar gtsug lag
zhi khang la yos su spyod par byed de/ kha cig la ni dus thams cad pas/ kha cig la ni gnas ris su gcod pas/ khacig la ni dus re zhig pas/ kha cig la nirting gnon pas lo ngos su
mi gyid par byed do// ji ltar sa thams cad pas yinazhen/ 'di ni bdag gi dgun gyi gtsug lag khang ngo// 'dini dpyid kyi'o// 'di ni dbyar gyi'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na dus thams cad
pas gnono// ji ltar na gnas ris su gcod pas yanezhin/ 'di ni bdagagi sang gi gtsug lag khang ngo// 'di ni gnangs kyi// 'di ni gzhes kyi zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na gnas las
su gcod pas yin no// ji ltar nas re zhig pas yin na/ 'dapin snga dro gnas so// 'dir ni phyi dro zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na dus re zhig pas yin no// jiltar na ting gnon pas
mnan/ 'di ni bdag ga slob dpon gyi gtsug lag khang ngo// 'di ni mkhan po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang/ nye gnas dang gtam 'dres pa dang/ bas par sa bgi'o zhes bya ba ste/ de
na ting gnon bas yin// yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag lhags pa dang 'phongs par gyur nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ dolta khas na dge slong gso gtsug lag khang dag la dus thams cad pa dang/ gnas ras su gcodapa dang/ dus re zhig pa dang/ rnyingaganonapas yos
su spyad par mi bya ste/ spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro////sdom ni/ rab dang ni shange thags dang// lam dang 'bas dang skar rgyal dang// chos gos bcags shing phyis
pa dang// tshig dang nam zo ko/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang ga tshokhyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten dag rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du dga' dkur 'gro zhing 'ong nas/ khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang lam po chor gyur gyis/ de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis ra bas bskor ro sAm du
bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sta phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug gA/ phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa gtsug lag khang 'diTishul po char gyur te/ de'i slad du
gal tabcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis 'dar bas bskor bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis skor cig/ des
ra bas bskor ba dang/ gang gi tshadabyar gyis dus la bab pa de'i tshorgyal byed kyi tshal chus sbyang bzhin gang ste 'dug go/ jitsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la phyag 'chol du song ba dang/ des rgyal khyed kyi tshal chus sbyang bzhin du gang ba mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal byedakyi la ra bas bskor gyis stor khang
ma btod pas/ des na 'di chus sbyang bazhin dug pasu 'dug go/ de'i phyi rogal tabcom ldan 'adas kyis gnang na stor khung gdod dosnyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'adas la 'di skad
sa gsol to// btsunapa bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor gyi stor khang ma btod pas/ des na 'di chobakyis sbyang bzhani bltam ste mchis so// de'i slad du gal te bcom
tsa 0 ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gi sa stong lung gdod bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas naganang gis thod cig/ des stor khung btod do//
ba grung dag 'ongs shing 'ongs nas rtsa go ba la lus kyis sogs shing rwas brud pa dang/ jitsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong nas des bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal
byed tshal ra bas bskor gyi shang thags ma bres bas/ des na ba glang dag 'ongs shing 'ongs nas 'al lus kyis sogs shing rwas brad do// de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
na bdag gis 'di gang zags kyis bskor bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig pu'adug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to/ khatsun pa bdag gis rgyal byed kyi
tshal ra bas bskor gyi sha thags ma bris pas/ ba glang dag mchis shing mchis nas de la lus kyis snyogs shinge'us khrud de/ de' slod du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na'ang thags
bri bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' sul pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas nuganang gso shang thags bris shig/ des shing thags khres pa dang/ ma byin par le ba dag gis
nga'ang thags dral te brkus so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'chagasung song ba dang/ bshang thags bar par nas dral zhingashang//
de yang brkus par mthong ngo// des bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed kyi la ra bas bskor nasangashang thags bris ra/ 'du bar bar nas bral te shing yang banus kyis/ de'i phyir gal te
bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis 'obs kyis bskor ro snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcos ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunab bdag gis
rgyal khyed kyi tshal ra bas bskor cingangashang thags bres na/ de stobs kyis ma bskorabs bar bar nas bral nas shing bunas na/ de'i slod du gal tebcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis
pa'i 'obs kyis bskor bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag de lta bas naganang gis 'obs kyis skor cig/ des 'obs kyis bskor ro// gleng gzhi ni

mnyan yodana'o// mnyanayodanadage slong ma skar rgyal zhes bya ba zhig 'gu pa de sgra ring po ring por gyur nas/ da'adreg mkhan gyi drung du song ste/ bu skra bregs shig khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro
zhes byas pa dang/ des bsams pa// ji ltar ngo shAkya'i bu'i dge slong gnang ba de ltar 'di ltar yang dran pa med par las byed du 'jug sku/ gal te 'di'i skra bregs na gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang
'ong bar 'gyur bas/ dus ring du bshol dbazhag dang/ 'dirang ga blos ldeg par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des 'phags ma bzhud la sang gnangs snga dro'am/ nyi ma'i gung ngam/ slad dro
skyonacig ces dus btab go/ de des bslas pas yang dang yang du'agro ba dang/ de'i smos 'an dge slong ma zhig yong ba des de yang dang yang du 'gro ba mthong nas/ des snyas pa/ 'phags ma
khyod kyi'i phyir 'dir yang dang yang du 'gro/ tsa'adra khyod kyi nye du'i khyim mam/ rigs kyi khyis yani/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma 'di ni bdag gnyidu'i khyis yang ma yini/ rigs kyi khyi/
yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gi sku ring po ring po gyur nas/ bdag gis 'dreg mkhana'onal bu bag gi sku rang po rade po khrigs shag dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro
zhes byas na/ des ma bregs tedus btab bo// des smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis bzo bo la bdenapar smra ba dkon par ma thos sam/ kho mo ni sku 'dreg mkhas na/ 'on
kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo
'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ma gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben par s breg bar bya'o// bcom ldan
'a 'das kyis dge slong ma gzhag mkhas pa des phyogs dbenapar spu breg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong ma de dge slong ma de'i drung du song sku/ 'phags ma bcom ldan 'das kyis
b+hU gnang gis/ tshur spyonaskra bregs shig/ des smras pa/ 'phegs ma gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba lags na/ nga cisoramos brag gas/ 'di la sdu grwa dang/ gdar dang/
san gri dang/ snang tshar dag dgos so// des skabs de dge slongs rnams la bsnyadapa dang/ dge slong ma rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams la'o/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dag slob ma rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gra'i spyod dag bcang bar bya'o
bam po bco brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodanargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun daga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang ga bcom ldan
'das kyis dga' bo rab tuphyung ba de'i tshe/ de la bzang mos chos gos bcags shing rab tubasags pa dag mnyan yod du bskur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos chos gos bcags
[j]shinge rab tubacags pa sarapa ba sos phyis pa dag bgos/ lhung bzed 'tshorab thogs nas dge slong rnams kyi mdun na 'gying bag tu rlon nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das/
la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag chos gos bcags pa dang rab lubatags pa dag gyon pa las gyur pasnyam dumkhyen nas/
dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar skyes bu gti mug dga' bo chos gos bcags shing rab tubacags pa sar pa ba sos phyis pa dag bgos/ lhung bzed 'chor ba thogs
nas dge slong rnams kyi mdun du 'gying bag tu rlonab 'di ni mdzes pa ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma yin no// de lta bas na dge slongags chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag bcang bar mi bya
ste 'chang na 'gal tshabs canangu'agyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos bcags shing rab tubatags pa dag bcang bar ma bya'o zhes bka' su la pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la chos gos bcags shing rab tubatags pa dag 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams kyis ma blas nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshogs/
rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshon/ mu stags can rnams sbyin gnas lags/ de bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenadubyunganadaltare khyedasbyin gnas lags na/ gal te khyed
mi bzhes na/ ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'dinas 'jig rten pha rol du dge ba'i lam brgyags mchis ba mtshi'am/zhes zer ba'i skabs de dag spyod rnams kyis/ bcom
'a ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis blang bar bya zhing/ blangs nas 'tsher ba yal bar byas pa yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// de
dag gas lag pas mnyes nayal bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ zil pa la bzhag su yal bar bya'o// zil ba la bzhag ste yal bar byas n/ 'on kyang
thams cad kyi thams cad du yal bar ma gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ chu'i nang du bsug par bya'o// dge slong dag gis chu nang du bsags na/ 'on kyang yal bar
ma gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ da ltar byas kyang ma yal na yongs su longs spyad par bya ste// 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de bzhin du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa
kun dag gis dag 'dun la chos gos bcags pa dang rab tsubacags pa bag phul na/ de la yang rim pa 'dra la nyid kyis yongs su las sdud par bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi khram ze dang khyim bdag rnams rtog khang du 'dus shing 'khod nas/
bar skabs kyi gtam 'ad lta bu dag gleng ste/ dag sbyong ga 'u dum bcom ldan 'adas kyang bgo bsha' byed pa rang bzhin can ma yinal/ de na thos rnams kyang bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang
bzhin can ma yin pas/ nyis na mu stags can dag lung gi/ dag sbyong mgo reg de dag ni ma yin no zhes zera'o// de na bram ze gcig gis smras pa/ kho bos dag slobago'u ta ma bgo bshul
byed pa'i rang bzhinecan yinan// 'on tabago bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin du nam yin/ dkar zlos rnams bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhani canayin nam/ 'on te ma yin pa sang khyed kyi
mngon sum du gyur par bya// de dag gis spus pa/ legs te de bzhin du gyis shig dang blta'o// des ras yug cig khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ des ras yug de rgyan pa mtha'
logs su bzhag nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ 'phags pa bdag gis ras khug 'di dge 'dunul phul gyis ci bder mdzodacig ces byas pa dang/ de la dge 'dun gyi
gnas brtan gyis sbas pa/ bram ze chen po nad med par gyur cig/ sbyin pa 'dis khyod kyi sems kyi rgyanadang/ sems kyi yo byad dang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang/ don gyi mchog thob pa dang/
lha dang mi'i gos dag thob par gyur cig ces byas pa dang/ des bcos ma mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
dkun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams las yug 'o ni bram zes glags btsal ba'i phyir phul gyis/ de lta bas na khyed kyis mnyam par bgos la/ la las ni chagar
pa thob cig/ la las mi sgrog gzungs su/ la las ni lhan par/ la las ni chos gos kyi sgro gur gyisangashig ces sgo 'ge/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes/ tshodapa ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam nas/ dge slong rnams la tshad ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ras yug 'a na bram zes grags btsal ba'i phyir phul gyis/ dalta bas na khyed kyis mnyam
bar bgos la/ la las ni tshagar theb cig/ la las ni sgrog gzus su/ la las ni lhan par/ la las ni chos gos kyi sgro gur gyis shigaces de skad bka' lul to// ga slong mas/
tsha kyis sbas pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes/ de rnams kyis de mnyam par gsas nas de bzhin du bgos so// dzitsam na khram
pa de nang bar sngar las nas mnyan yod kyi sgo na 'dug go/ dge slong dag kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug par blta mas
ba dang/ bram ze des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis dag 'dun la ras phul ba gang lags pa de khyed kyis cir bgyis/ de nadge slong gcig cig gis smras pa/ bram ze chen po de dag
'dun gyis mnyam par gsas nas bgos te/ kho bo'i skal ba gang yin pa de ni chagar btab pa 'di yin no// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bo'i nisgrog gzungs su btags pa 'di yin no//
gzhan zhig gis smas pa/ kho bo' ni lhan par btab ba 'dakon no// gzhan zhig gis snas pa/ kho bo'i ni chos gos kyi sgro gurebyas pa 'di yin no// bram ze des bsams pa/ bram ze
rnamasangashAkya'abu'i dge slong rnams bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can ma yaranozhes zer ba nagyi nazhig brtol te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas/
'di dag kho na'i nang du rab tu'abyung ngo snyam nas/ de dad pa skyes dbcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab phul byungazhing bsnyanupar rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na/ bag bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyanasngar chos bar spyad pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze legs so legs so// khyod kyis sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste/ rab tu'abyung ba ni mchog go/ phan yon
lnga mthong ba mkhas pas rab tu'abyung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'khyung
ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so// bdag gang dag gi bran dang/ mngagagazhug pa dang/ bsgo ba bzhin byed pa dang/ rang dbang med pa dang/ dga' dgur byed
'a ba de dag ga yang mchod par bya ba dang/ bsngags par bya bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bya bar mthong ba'amakhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so// grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa
b+hU mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ nas phya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so// bdag grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa mya ngan las 'das ba
thob pa las nyams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas bas rab tu'abyung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so// sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi

ts+tso ]nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs dumar bsngags// zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar chos par bya ba'i legs
T+Thi so de lta bas na legs kyis rab tu byung zhig/ dbcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur zhes bya sa/ rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas gdams ngag gnang ba dang/ des 'bad
brtsal bsgrims bas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba tshalnga pa 'di nyid rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ 'gyes pa dang/ 'jig/
pa'i tshes nyid kyis 'dzoms par rtogs te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum la 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sams
bo ba dang gsar du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/ sta'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo pa'i sbubs dral ba/ mngon par shes pa dang so so ang/
dag par rig pa theb pa/ srid ba dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sta la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang bo dang 'dab ngadu bcas ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ rjed pa dang/ gus pa la skya bar
bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba// dge slong dag tshod zin ba la phan yon 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod do// dge slong dag de lta bas na zas
kyi med pa zhig byung na/ 'u su'i lam tsam du yang mnyam par byas bgo bar bya'o// gos kyi rnyed pa zhig byung na mar la snying bo tsam du yang mnyam par byas te bgo bar bya'o/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na bram ze gtsang sbra 'dod pa zhig rab tu'abyung bar 'dod pa des
pasams pa/ gang zhig gi gtsang sbras bdag gi sems rangs pa de'i bstanapa la bdag rab tu'abyung ngo snyam nas/ des mu stegs can gyi gnas de dag khyul na/ de dag gi gtsang sbrus
da'i sogs la langs so// des bsams pa/ bdag gis mu stags can thams cad bgams nas/ gang gas kyang bde ba bde soms ma rangs kyis/ dmigs/
bu'i dge sbyong dag lus bas/ song ste de dag// bgam par bya'o snyam nas/ de la byed tshal du song ba dang/ phyitsam na tsho dang ldan pa shari'i bu ril ba thogs te phyi rol tuchab khungs nas
pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ dge sbyong golu ha ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'di yin pas/ ri zhige 'di kho nagatsang sbra ji ltar byed blta'o snyam mo// de de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ba dang/
dgra bcom pa rnams nam bsams par yo shas mthong ba ma 'gu pas/ tshadang ldan pa/ shAri'i bu sems pa la zhugs te/ bram ze 'dici'i phyir bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang snyam na/ dzitsal na
gtsang sbra 'dod par mthong ngo// yang bsam pa la zhugs te/ ci 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig yod dam 'on te mang snyam na/ yod pa mthong ngo// su la rag las snyam na/ bdag konal yin
par mthong ngo// des bsams nas/ lham phung chos gos dag bzhag ste/ de nas phyogs gcig zhus phung bu bdun bzhag/ gzhan zhig tu bdun/ gzhan zhig tuyangs phung bu gnyis
bzhag go/ de nas sa bung bu gsum zhig khyer nas/ sunas bram ze des mthong ba daltar bshang ba bya bar brtsams so// de nas bshangs 'di nas sa phung gcigags rkub phyis/ gnyis

kyis khrus byas so// de nas dal gyis las nas phyogs der 'ongs te phyinanas/ lag pa g.yon pas sa phung bu bdun gyis khrus byas so/ danus gnyis kas bu bu bdun gyis khrus byas so// de nas sa phung lu gcig
gis dpung pa ma bkrus go//lag pa dag bkrusanas gnyis pas lab bkrus so// de nas dal gyis langs te spyod lam zhi bas chos gos bgos nas rkang pa dag bkrus pa dang/ bram ze des mthong nas mngon par

dad bar gyur to/ des bsams pa/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sa'i phung bu gcige ni mchog yin gyi/ mu stegs can rnams kyi bskyayang de lta ma yin no snyam du dge nas/ tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bu'i
rkang pa la gtugs nas/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shAri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyanabar rdzogs ba ga
slong gi dngos po 'thob na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs bar snang ba spyod do// shAri'i bus snyas pa/ bram bre legs so// khyod kyis sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste/ rab tu
'byung ba ni mchog go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga ma'ong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu'abyung ba kho nar mos bar bya ba'i rigs te zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sas rgyas
kyinyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skya sa bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam gras du mar bsngags so/ zhes bya bar mthongs mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i
rigs so zhes gsungs zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de lta bas na legs kyis rab tu byung zhig/ des de rab tu byung bsnyen bar rdzogs bar byas tagadams
ngag byin pa dang/ des 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor la g.yo ba dang mgayo ba malnga pa 'di nyidi 'go nas zhes bya ba nas/ gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i khar snga
mkhazhaneno// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzadapa sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunab tshodang ldan b shAra'i bus gtsang
sbrus bram ze 'di dad par bgyis nas/ 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/ grub pa dang bde ba bla na mdapa shani tumathar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'jus 'di rkun po las bzlog sta/ brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de nyon
n+nA cig dge slong dag sngon byungab ra brags shig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te// de de dang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do/ de
bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgar spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma somasacanazhugs par gyur to// de zla ba brgyadadam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba//
blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas stonazhag bdun gsumanyi shu gcig t+targya cher byas nas/ rigs dang mthun pa'i mang btags so/ de bskyed bsrings te tshe na mor gyur pa dang/

re zhig cig na ra brags der rkun pa lnga brgya zhig 'dzoms 'dod cing lhags so// de dag ga sde dpon gang yin pa de skom pas gdungs nas bram ze de la khyim du zhugs ba dang/ ritsam na bu mo de mthong ngo//
mthong nas kyang sbas pa/ bu mo chubyon cig/ des snas pa/ re zhig cung zhag gnyis shig/ de cang ma nges bar 'dug go/ des myur ba myur bar mar me bus pa dang/ rkun po'i snga dbon bu mo
de la mgo gtad de rtog go/ bu mo de mar ma bus nas tshul lta ba dang/ rkun po'i sde dpon gyis snas pa/ bu mo rtsel lta/ des snas ba chu la'o// des smras pa/ de la bltaci yod//
des smras pa/ 'dir sbyar ma 'am skra song du 'ong bas so// des smras pa/ bumo khe ba na khyod la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pas/ kho bol nguge blud par bya ba yaren/ khyod
ko de skad smra ba lta zhig/ dus tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog g.yon can gyis// bya ba gang de rkun po rnams // byed dam 'on tamano ang rung// bdag gis chos ni ga srung
bya dengashin tudaga' nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod bdag ga sring mor bya ma zhig bya smos shig/ des smras pa/ khyod gzhan gyi nor la mngon par chags pa bskyodapas/ mdes gnad du snyan nam
dus byas par gyur na/ bdag mang po dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing cho nges 'debs nadaga' bar ma 'gyur bas/ rkun po byed pa'i mi ngo po gang yin

'a pa de lta bu ni bdag la ma dgos so// de lta bas na gal te khyod kyis brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag bar len nus na/ de lta na bdag gus khyod kyi sring mo bya// dus mi 'dod bzhin du tshig yang du
'ong ba snyanapa'i tshul gyis smras pa dang/ des de sring mo bya bar shin tudaga' zhing 'dod par gyur te/ des smras pa/ sring mo legs te de bzhin du bya'o// des de chom rkun las bzlog ste/ brtul

zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag go/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshodi'i dus kyi rkun po'i sde dpon de na bram ze 'di de yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i bu mo de nidage slong shA ri'i bu 'di
nyid yin te/ de'i tshayang 'dis de rgu na po las bzlog ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bzhag go/ da lta yang 'di gtsang sbrus dang por byas nas/khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/ grub pa dang bde ba bla

na med pa nga shin tumathar thug pa'i rgya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no// dge slong dag de ltar na gtsang sbra ba phan tsho 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod do// de lta bas na ji ltaro shA ri'i bus byas pa ltar/
dge slong dag gis rnam pa des gtsang sbrabya'o/ sdom ni chag gzus dngajul ba/zan dang// dge slong ma ni zla ba dang// gnas bca' ba ni dreg ldan dang// khri la gsum 'dug
bya ba'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong dag gis dus su bgos
ba'i chos gos rnams ma bsrang bar spyad pas/ de dag gi mtha' ma'i skud pa rnams zegs so// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gso gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyiso bkaN+Dal pa/ chos gos zegs pa rnams kyi mthar chag gdab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos zegs pa rnamasakyi mthar chag gdab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/
dge slong dag gis chag btab nas spyad par brtsams na/ 'on kyang skud pa rnams zegs brar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ bar bar du gzungs gdab par bya'o/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar nipags pa dang 'dra bar bsrung
khar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dgo slong gzhan dag cag la gis spyadabar 'os pa gzhan med nas/ de dag gas rtag par snamasgyur ba gsas/ da dam da
! de dag gis rtag par sum sbyar bgos bas/ de so ga tsha ba sa su mchan khung/
bka' stsal pa/ mchan khung gi phyogs su rngul gzan gzhug bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mchan khung gi phyogs su snam sbyar gyi rngul gzanagazhug par bya'o
zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag giso rngul gzan ji lta bu bya ba mngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos rgyur khru phyed dang do/ zheng du mtho gang gang yin pa de
phyogs der gzhug par bya'o// dge slong dag gis drubs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// drub bar mi bya'o// de dri ma can du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka'
[% ]la ba/ dus dus su bkru zhing kha bsgyur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis ngos gcig tubacug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul ba/ ngos gnyis kar gzhug par bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis kha bsgyur bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gas bur skyag tu bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngur smig tubatso bar mi bya'i/ btsag
N+Ne gas kha bsgyur bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal brgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun daga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na bram
za zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// dotsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/
dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig nade'i chung ma la sems canazhugs par gyur to// dazla ba dgu 'das ba dang bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsus ston rgya cher byas nas
de'i mi zla ba zhes bya bar btags te/ de bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to// dzitsam na dus gzhan zhig naskya dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go tam las rab tubyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
pa dang/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chamo go'u ta mil 'khor lnga brgyas bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ gas gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u tam la chos dang ldan ba'agatam gyis yang dag
par stonapar mdzod/ yang dag ru len du 'jug par mdzad/ mang dag par gzungs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab dga' bar mdzadango// rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i
gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par bskul/ ang dag par gzengs bstong/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzadudo cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas skye dgu'i bdag
mo chen mo go'u sum stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dag
slong rnams la dge slong gi 'dul ba bstan lags na/ kyi ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bstan
'a dug la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ go'u dum de bzhinagashegs pa chos tshig re nas gsung pa de ni gnas ma yin zhingago skabs med do// 'on kyang gal tapag slong ma 'ga'
go ngas lan cig bshad pa 'dzinupar sngon/ da lta nas bstan bar bya'o/ de nas de'i tshodge slong a klu ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa 'jug par gyur to// de nas dge slong ma khru ba stanAlasalangs
ta bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis lan cig bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis gzung
bar 'tshal nabastan du gsol/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bstan pa dang/ des lan cig gsungs pa bzung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
ba dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma rnams kyi nang na thos ba 'dzin pa'i mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slongam zla ba 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'adas kyis dgongs pa/ thams cad dudge slong
ma zla ba 'am/ zlab lta bu 'byung par ma 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis kyang dago slong ma'i 'dul ba bzung nas bcang bar bya zhing/ dge slong ma rnams la yang bstan par bya/ kha
[n]ton byed pa dang 'dri bar byed pa dag la yang spyin par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal tadge slong ma zla bas/ ngalas dge slong ma'i 'dul ba
khan cig bshad pa blangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad du dug slong ma zla ba lam/ zla kha lta bu mi 'byung bas/ ga slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma'i 'dul ba gzung bar bya bcang bar bya zhing/
dag slo ma rnams la yang bstan par bya/ kha ton byed pa dang 'dri bar byed pa ga la yang sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims la brtenacing/ tshul khrims la gnas nas/ ni
gnas dang lhag mthong ga chos gnyis bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong ma zla bas 'dul ba'i rjes su mthun par tshul khrims la brten cing/ tshul khrims la gnas nag
bsam gtanadang 'don pa'i sbyor bas 'bad brtsa la bsgrims pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mgayo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang/
ltung ba dang/ 'gyes pa dang/ 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 'joms par rtogs te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bton

pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sams gsar dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil mnyam pa//'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa rig ba ma rig pa'i sgo pa'i sbubs dral kha/ mngon par shes
drub dang go so yang dag bar rig ba rnams thob pa/ sridi ba dang/ rgyab dang/ bkur sta la rgyab kyis bltas ba/ dbang bo dang khyadabang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
'a mchodabar bya ba dang/ brjod par bya ba dang/ gus pa sna bar bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsalas/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos dge slong
rnams kyi nang na/ shes rab che ba dang/ spobs pa chab dang/ thos ba 'dzin pa'i mchog na 'di lta sta/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no// dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas/
tha tshom thums cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ma zla bas lasaci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par snyan pas shes rab che zhing
spobs pa cha ba dang/ bcos ldan 'das kyis kyang thos pa 'dzin pa'imchogatubastanal/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tubyung nas kyang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra
btog pa nyid mngon sum dubagyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkakA' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slongam zla ba nyid kyis las byas shang bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas//
lus can rnams la 'bras bur smane// ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig naskya dgu rnams kyi tshalo brgyad khri thub pa na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdabar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi stonapa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba ston pa 'jig Na na duphyung// de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang rgyal po'i
khab gnyen ldan du gshegs te/ gnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so// dunas de'i tshorgyal po'i khabaganyen ldan n khyim bdag cag 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blas
ta da de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur sbyong bar byed// de la bar byed/ dga' bar khyed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung
ma sems canazhugs par gyur to// de zla ba dgu 'das nas bu mo zhagi btsas te/ da' btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gas dang mthun pa'i mong btags te/ de bskyed bsrings nas chen/
mor gyur pa dang/ khyim bdag de dad pa can zhig bas/ dgag dbye'i tshong khridenas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang song ste/ de dge slong ma rnams la so sor khab dang gri la sogs pa'i yo byad kyis
ga slong ma'i dge 'dunal dgag bya byed do// gu o des mdzes par mthong nas dang ba skyus te/ pha la sbas pa/ ab bdag gis kyang ji zhig rgyag gis dge slong ma'i dag 'dunal
dgag dbye bgyi/khyim bdag des smras pa/ bumo lags tade bzhin dgag dbye gyis shig des khab dang/ gri dang/ gser dang/ dbyig la sogs pa yo
ba byad kyi khyad par dag gas/ ga slongama'i dge 'dunal dgag dbye byas te/ rab tu dang ba drag pos rgan pa'i mtha' nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis sems bskyed/
da sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'as/ shes rab chazhing spobs pa che ba dang thos pa 'dzinabar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag jisnyam du sums/ khyim
bdag ga bu mo gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis g.yang drug bar rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dge slong ma'i dge 'dunal khab dang/ gri dang/ gsar dang/
dbyag la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis dgag dbye byas nas/ bdag gis sems bskyed cing sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btang ba'i dge ba'i rtse ba 'di// bdag shes rab
nang spobs pa tsha ba dang thos pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa de las kyi rnam par smin pas/ doltar shes rab chazhing sobs pa che ba dang thos pa 'dzin bar gyur to// yang
bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsung rab las rab tubyung bar gyur te/ des de na tshogag tutshangs bar spyod ba spyang kyang yon tanagyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to// mkhan po gang
las rab tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tubastan to// da na 'dis 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yen gnas bla na med pa 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar tshagacig gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyis//
bdag dge ba'i rtse ba 'das gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshal brlathub pa na/ de bzhin gsheg/
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ zhes lung bstanapa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tubyung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dag
bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tubastan pa de bzhin du/ bdag
kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po' ga tsho bo sa thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de'i smon lam de'i dbang gis de ltar de bzhin/
gshegs pas thos pa 'dzin pa mchog tubastan pa yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tuganag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tuganag/ gcig tudakar ba rnams
kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar zhes bya ba nas b.ru la bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gas deltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhano//

bya sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// de'i tshodge slong gzhon nu zhig slobazhag pa lhan cig ltos rgyu zhing mnyan yod
du phyin nas/ dge slong de ni ro dgags 'dzin ma'i khang bzangs su song/ gzhon nu de yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ ris dge slong zhig la gnas bcas nas/ dadi'i thod na cung zad cig
'dug na sa smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa gtsug lag khang mag mo nag tulhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste mchis la de blangs nas slar machi'o/ des smras pa/ bu song la myur du shog
cig des skyes pa/ slob dpon bdag pa ci zhig bgyid de badrag myur dumachis par bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la phyag byas te song nas/ rim gyis gtsug lag khang der phyin to// dzitsam medage 'dun
dag gis gtsug lag khang der gnas med par nub gcig kyang m gnos par khrims su bya ba bcas so// des khrims bzhin du dge slong zhig gnas bcas nas/ de nub mo nyal la// nam nas
nas bsams pa/ bag song la slob dpon de blta'o snyam nas de'i gnas khang du song ste/ sgo la brdabs taslob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// khams bde 'am zhes byas pa dang// bu bdag na ste mi
bde'o// de 'di snyam du bdag slob dponan ba bor ta'agro ba gang yanab na bag gi tshul yin te// bcom ldan 'dasakyis kyang de'i phyir gcig gis gcig bstang zhing na ba'i nad g.yog bya kha'i phyir
yanas bca' bar gnang bas/ de'i phyir da'inang g.yog byas sos nas 'gro bar bsams so// des de'i nad g.yog byas nas sos par gyur pa dang/ dus snyas pa/ slob dbonamakhyen par mar
cig mchi'o// des snas ba/ bu cung zad mi bde ba lta med grang/ slob dpon mi bde ba ni cung zad kyang ma mchis na/ 'on kyang kho ga 'di'i gnas su mchis pa ma lags kyi/ bdag gis chos
gos dang lhung bzed bzhag pa de lenadu mchis pa las/ dge 'dun gyis gnas med par nub gcig kyang ma gnas par khrims su bya ba bcas so// de'i slad du bdag gis khrims bzhin du gnas bcas
pa dang khyod 'bar gyur nas/ bdag gis bsams pa/ bdag slob dpon bor nas 'gro ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi tshul ma 'gas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i phyir gcig gis gcig bskang/
nang nab nad g.yog bya ba'i phyir gnas bca' bar gnang bas/ de'i phyir nad g.yog byas la sos na'agro'o snyam pa las/ da ni khyod sos par gyur pas/ mkhyen par mdzod cig mchi'o/ tsha dang
ldan pa legs so legs so// khyod ji ltar zhugs pa de ltar lhacig gnas pa dang nyaganas dag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la bsgrub par bya'o// lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyis
nubya/ mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la de ltar sgrub na/ de ltar sut+pal chunas 'byung ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phal ba 'gyulo// skye bu dam pa khyod bag yod par
byas la song zhige/ des de la phyag byas nas rim gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang/ de'i slob dpon gyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa 'ongs ba legasan/ phyi ste ring zhig thogs nas
'ongs/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras so// des snas pa/ tshodapaldan pa lags so legs so// khyod ji ltar zhugs pa doltar gnas pa dang nyi gnas dag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon dag sgrub par
bya'o de ltar bsgrubs na/ ji ltaraut+pal tshunas 'byung ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ga slong de 'gyod pa skyes te/ 'di'i gnas de nyidakyis chog gam 'on te gzhan
zhig sbyin dgos snyam nas/ des skabs de dge slong dag la sbas te/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ dge slong dag des
ra zhig pa'i gnas bcas par rbad de/ de lta bas na de'i gnas de kho nas chog gi gzhan nam yanano// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slongs spong ba pa zhig la dge slong gzhon nu zhig gis gnas bcas pa dang/ de 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ngag
rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag mkhyenazhing rjes sum bstanang bas ni/ shanapa byed kyang bla'o zhes gsus te/ 'dit+tanyaganas kyang de bzhin du slob ma yinal//
bdag kyang spong ba ba zhig pas/ 'di gang zhig smin par byed pa 'ga' zhig la gtad do snyam bsams nas/ de dge slong zhig gi thad du song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'di bslab par gyis/
shag/ des snyas pa/ gal te khyodabag ga g.yog byedan dam bcas te bslab par bya'o// des snas ba/ bslab tugasol bgyi'o// des de bslab par brtsams so// dus gzhan zhig
na de na bar gyur nas/ gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon des de'i nad g.yog byas so// jitsam dus gzhanizhig naganas bcas pa'i slob dpon de na bar gyur to// sa de slar ma bltas shing/
dbazhin lan gsum gyi bar du yang ma bltas nas/ des de la smras ba/ tshodang ldan pa khyod gzhan zhag ga drang duso la gnas chos shagi/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag khyod kho na'i drung
namachis te/ bdag la 'phongs pacung zad kyang ma mchis so// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod la 'phongs pa med pa nibangan na/ 'onakyang kho'i 'phongs de khyod na bar gyur pa na/ sa khyod
kyi nad g.yog byas na/ nga lanagasum gyi bar dun bar gyur pa na/ silta khyod kyis nga slar ma bltas/ song la gang zhig khyod 'dra ba'i ma gus pa la gnas star ba de la gnas chos red 'dug cig/
da spobs pa mad de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
gnas bas slob dpon la ma grolta'o/dzitsam dus gzhanazhig na klog pa'i slob dpon nabar gyur nas/ des sla ma bltas kyi/ gangag tshogos bar gyur pa de'i tshodrung du song ste/ des smras pa/
slob dpon bdag la lung bog cig/ des smras pa/ tsho dang ldan pa kho bo nab na khyod kyis res 'ga' yang slar ma bltas kyis/ khyod song la gang zhig khyod lta bu ma gus pa la klob tu'ajug pa
de las lhags shig/ de spobs pa mad de byang ma zer bar 'dug nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klog
pa'i slob dponal rim gro bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis klog pa'i slob dbon la rim gro bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ jitsam dus gnamazhig na klog pa'i slob dbonadang/ gnas kyi slob dpon
gnyis ka na bar gyur nas/ das gang gi rim gro bya ba mi shes nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal
tanus na gnyis ka'i byago/ ji snye ma nus na gnas kyi slob dpon la bya ste/ 'di ltar klog pa med par ni 'dug turung gi/ gnas pa med pa ni ma yin no/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs

mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab dbazhugs so// rab tu'abyung bar 'dod pa zhig dge slong zhig gi drung du song ba dang/ des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
bar byas te ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo/ lhan cig gnas pa de la zang zing ga bsdu ba ni byas na/ chos kyi ma byas pas de gzhanazhig la gnas 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po
bzhi po sbyanib dang/ snyanapar sla ba dang/ don dpyod pa dang/ don mthun po zhes gsungs bas/ pha de la chos dang zang zing dag gis kyang sdud pas/ de slob dpon de la rtag tul zhing sams la
'dzin to// tsam dus gzhanazhig na de'i mkhanabo tsa'adod par ljongs brgyus nas slar mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ dmathong nas de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gsar ba gang dag yin pa de dag
nistan las ldang bar byed/ gang dag rgan pa de dag gis ni'ongs pa legs so zhes bya bab kun tuspyod pas kun tu spyad do// de'i lhan cig gnas pa de stan las kyang m langs ba dang/ de la dge slong dag
gis smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po 'os na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khacig ni ldang bar byed/ kha cig gis ni mngon du ldang bcas/ cig gis ni legs bar 'ongs so nas kun sbyor

bas zhu spyad na/khyod de mthong bzhin dusnyalas kyang ma las pa de nigs pa ma yin no// des smras pa/ bdag 'dis rab tu phyung nas ci zang zing gis bsdu ba byas sal/khonod 'os bsdu ba byas gang zhig gnas ldang bar
byus de dag gis smras pa/ tshadang ldanub de skad ma zer cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zag gcigo gang zag gang zhig la brtenanas/ debazhudagashegs/
bas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te// ma dag bar dad bas khyim nas khyim med par rab tukhyung ba'i gang zag desan/ gang zag de la ji srid 'tsho'akhor du
T+Tha yang 'di lta ste/ chos gos pa/ bsodogos dang/ nad kyi gsos sman dang/ mal stanadang/ yokhyad dag gis lan klanabar bla ba ma yinan zhus ma gsungs sam/ tshodang ldan pa khyod/
skad zer ba de ni legs pa ma yin no// de spobs ba mod de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/
lhan cig gnas pa dang/ nye gnas kyi deb slong rnams kyis mthong ma thag tu stan las ldang bar bya ste/ mkhan po mthong sa thag zhuganas bcas pa yang med par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhan
bo mthong ma thag tu gnas bcas pa mad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang/ gzhan sdug cig gi mkhan po 'dug ma bod pa dag cig 'ongs nged dag dus cung zad 'dug nas 'gro bar byed do// de la kha
tsaN+NaM cig la ni mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams gshe/ khacig la dga' bar gyur cing/ de rnams gang dag la gshe ba de dag la ni sngon gnas bcas pa la yang mi stong zhing/ bdag nyid kyang sprad
0pa ram byed/ gang dag la dga' ba de dag ni sdud bar byed pa nas/ sngon gyi slob dbon rnams 'khrugs par gyur cing song ba de dag yang sdud par ma byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la/ ga
slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'jug ma yod pa gang dag yin pa de dag la yang thams cad byo zhing/ sngon gyi slob dbon rnams la yeng thams cad bya chod
kyi 'on kyang gnyis ka'i soms kyang mgu ba lhur blang bar bya zhinge gnyis ka la ya 'dri bar bya'o// gal te thams cad kyi thams cad du mkhan bo dag 'dug na de nyid la drib rabya'o// sas
rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med khrus spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig gis gnon nu gcig la gnas byin te/ de zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong
ga tsho de'i thad du song nas snyas pa/ slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// zhu'o// gso sbyong byin gyis rlob bo// des sbas pa/ bzhanab zangs kho bo ltar khyod kyi slob dpon du 'gyur/ des snyas pa/
bdag na khyod nyid la gnas bcos tamachis pas so// des smras pa/ bzhinabazas gang zhig khyod lta bu ma gus shing zhes mdapa la gnas skor ba de la gnas tA'adug la/ de nyid la zhus shika/
de spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'angs la/ dge slong dag gas gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dmigs gang tung zad byung ba ni
ge slong dag dus gsum du mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la ltar ma gro ba las gyur to// de lta bas nalhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyis dus gsum du mkhan po dang/
slob dpon rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o snyam du dgos nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na lhagacig gnas pa dang tre gnas rnamasakyil/ dus gsum dus khan bo
dang slob dpon dag blta blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig
gis ga slong gzhon nu gcig cig la gnas byinus/ sa de bu bzhin bskyangs so// de dus gzhan zhig na lces rgyu bar chas t+tas pa/ slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// mkhyonapar mdzod cig/ ljos
rgyuramachi'o/ des smras pa/ du mi bde ba cung zad mdangs/ des smras pa/ slob dponam bde ba ni cung khrad kyang ma mchis na/ 'on kyang bdag ljongs rlubar spo ste slar yang mchi'o// des smras pa//
bud lta na songal lam khar 'gyod par gyur na slar ldog par gyis shig des smras l/ slob dpon legs kyis slar ldog par bgyi'o/ zhes de chas pa dang/ ji tsam nade las kar 'gyodapa skyes te/ des
