bsams pa/ bdag la slob dbon des o byang thams cad sbyar ba las bdag so ngob ma legs kyis slar ldog par bya'o snyam bsams nas/ deslar log pa dang/ slob dpon gyis mtho ngo nas/ des smras pa/
0 bu ci sa slar log cung zad brjodapa ltamed// des smras pa/ slob dponab papa ltaci yang mams na/ 'on kyang bdag gas bsams pa/ bdag la slob dpon gyis yo byad thams cad sbyar na/
don ci zhig la 'gro snyam nas/ bdag slar log pa lags so// des smras pa/ bu gal te slar go nalegs so// khyod kyi slob dponaning nyid yin nozhes smras nas bsams pa// ci'adi'i
gnas bcas ba de kho nas chog gam/ 'on tagadod sbyin bar bya snyam ste/ das skabs de dge slong dag la sbas nas/ dge slong dag gis/ maldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal taslob dbonagyis ma btangal luganas kyis btang naganas bcas ba ma zhig pa zhes brjod do// slob dpon gyis btang la gnas kyis ma btanganaganas
bcas pa ma zhig bsabarjod do// slob dbon gyis kyang ma btang la dgas kyis kyang ma btang na gnas bcas pa ma zhig pa zhes brjod do// slob dpon gyis kyang btangal zhugs kyis kyang btang gnas
cas pa ga ba zhes brjodabar bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan ras mnyanao nargyal bu rgyal byed kyitshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yong nag
slong tshogs la ston pa zhig 'dug ba do gzhon nu mang po dag klog pu'ajug go/ de dus gzhan zhig nadabar gyurapa nga/ ngangag gas de slar ma bltas shing/ de bzhin du lan gsum nab gyur kyang de
dag gso slar m bltas so// de dus gzhan zhige na sos par gyur pa dang/ nye gnas dag de'i drung du'os te/ de nag cig gis smras pa/ slob dpon bdag la lub dbog
khasol/ gzhan zhig gse smras ba/ bdag la g.yar ston dbog tu gsol/ gzhan zhig gi so lcas ba/ zhu bar 'tshal// des smras pa/ tshe daldan b dag bdag la gsum kyi bar du
na bar gyur kyang/ khye gang gis kyang slar m bltas pas/ gang zhig khyed lta bu ma gus pa la gdams ngag kha ton dag 'bogs par byed pa po'i khrod du dengasangahU~Mgo/ skyabs de bcom ldan 'das la/
ga slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// klog pa'i slob dpon la 'am gro bya'o// de dag thams cad kyis byas pa dang/ de rnams kyi dge ba'i phyogs nyams par
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa res su bcad d bya'o// de dag gis res kyis bya bar brtsams ba dang/ rgan po rab tuphyung ba zhig de la gnas 'dug pa de la dadrag gis smras pa/
rgan zhugs pa khyodal res bab go/ des snyas pa/ tshadang ldan b dag ci slob dponal res kyis g.yog bya 'am/ kho bo kho nas g.yog byas/ khyed cag sems las chung ngur gyis shig/ dedug/
gis smras pa/ rganazhugs gal te de lta nalegs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyag nad la rim gro byed pa de ni nga la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes gsus pas/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gyis shig/
0 ngas de'i Tim gro byedapar brtsams nas/ des sos par gyur te// de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas smras pa/ slob dpon bdag la gdams dag dbo zug sol/ des sa pa/ khyod kyi 'is la
ma bab pas re zhig sdod cig/ yang snas pa/ slob dpon kha tond zhu bdag gnong zhig/ khyod kyi ris la ma bab pas re zhig sdod cig/ des snas pa/ slob dpon rim gro byed pa ni badragal
ras khab na/ klog pa dang 'donab ni 'di dag la rig bab pa ci'i slad du/ bdag mi yis mkhyen bar mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ bu thams cad byas ma 'gro bar sdod cig/ de cang mi zer
bar 'dug nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la ba/ gang zhig rtag tugayog byed pa de mi dga' bar ma gyur par gzhan
dag la lung dang/ kha tonadang/ zhu ba dag sbyin par bya'o// mkhas pa dang mi mkhas ba kha cig klog pa namakhas pa dag la ni lung byin pas/ mi mkhas pa dag la gnod bar gyur nas/
bcom ldan das kyis bka' sul pa/ da rnams la yang lung dang/ kha ton dang/ srib dag skabs su spyin par bya'o// bar sdom ni nadapa spong ba mkhan po dang//
zla ba phyed cing 'ong ba dang// tshogs dag klog tu'ajug byed pa// khor sdom dag tuyang dag bstan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalamagon med
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams rigs kyi khyim du song ba dang/ de dag gis khri byung ste 'phags pa ci bder bzhugs shig/ de rnams kyi ye
par 'khod nas khri de chag par gyur te/ de dag gis rta gad kyis btab pa dang/ dge slong gzhan dag kyang de 'ongs te/ dadag gis danamasu mthong nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyed
'di lta bu'i 'phyar pa byas nas dgod dam zhes smras ba dang/ de dag gis smras pa// ci chang 'thus sam sgog skya 'os/ des smras pa/ ci de dag kyang byed dam/ gzhan su zhig byas/ khri
rtsam khacag gam/ cingashang zad dam/ shing mkhan dag ngasha 'am/ de dag la rangs bzhinacang ma zer bar 'dug nas/ skabs di pacom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/
mo: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na bu gcig la drug 'dug par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la drug 'gu bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ lnga 'dug ste nyes
dmags da nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sulapa/ lnga yang 'dug par ma khya'o// bzhi 'dug sgyu nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldanu3dus kyis bka' sul ba/
bzhi la 'dug par ma bya'i/ 'on kyang khri la ni gsum 'dug par bya'o// khri'u la gnyis so// khri'u chung la ni gcig go///sdom ni: nad pa ya ni nad g.yog dang// nga
la 'dzig par ma bya dang// bkrabs pakhasan rdzogs mi bya dang// lag pa gsud bar ma bya ba'o gsas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas kyis nad pa'i rim gro bya'o zhes gsungs pa
gang lags pa de/ yo byad ji lta ba dag gis bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor rang bzhin gyis ba nam tho ba dang bcas pa dag la gtogs par gzhan dag gis
bya'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshadang ldan b nya dga'i dge tshul bsnyan par rdzogs
bar 'dod nas/ des bsnyanapar rdzogs par bya ba'i ched du las byed pa'i dge slong dang/ gsang ste ston pa dang/ dge slong gang dag dkyil 'khor du 'ong ba la gsol ba btab ste/ donas dag
tshul dang stan khyer te/ kyil 'khor du sdur song nag/ dkyil 'khor phyag dar byas ta/ stan bshams na dge slong dag ma 'os te/ rtsodags phan tshun du bltas na/ des mo tog gi
shing zhig mthong ste/ des smras pa/ dag tshul la zhig ma tog dag lhags la/ dag skyong nags la bramis shig/ des 'dzags pa dang/ ma stas tong nas lag pa chag ste/ de
nyid de'i ba snyan par gas ba dge slong bdas bo'i bar chadadu gyur nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang/ rtsom ldan 'das kyis bkag
su la pa/ bar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i klu bo dbang bskur bar 'os pa dbang ma bskur bar 'dug cade/ mtshams la bab pa bsrung bar bya ba dang bskyang bar bya ba yin pa de bzhin du/ dgu
slong gi dge tshul bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa yang bsrung zhing bskyed ba'i bya ba yin no/ de lta bas na dge slong bas bstan par rdzogs bka'adod pa'i dge tshul gang la 'dzeg tum gzhug go/ 'dzo
tu'ajugan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro///khan po bcu dag pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasumanyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed zas sbyagyi
kun dga' rab n bzhugs go/ yul ko sa la'i rgya la po gsal rgyal la nang ma gtugs pa chen bo zhes bya ba zhig yod do// de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bas skyes nas/ des bsams pa/ rgyal po dag

nAdza ltar byas kyang mgu dka' bas/ song la rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ dargyal byed kyi tshal dus nga ngo// drug sde rnams kyi kun tu sbyor ba ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sko
mi stongs ba yin pas/ tshodang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na 'dug go/ des de sngon ngong zhes pas/ des de la 'os pa lags so zhes bya ba kun tu spyang nas/ chen po khyod zla ba lta bu r gnas ring
0mo zhig lon te/ ga las 'ongs shes byas pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa yang dang ya nga mthong bas ni bstas par 'gyur gyis/ yun ring zhig len mthong ba ni legs pa yin no// chen po
dgos ba ci zhig la 'os/ 'phags pa rgyal po ni gu dka' bas/ lha'i thugs mnyes par bya ma nus te rab tu 'khyung ngo// chen bo khyod gyi sems bskyed pa ni bzang sta lags/ rab tu'abyung
banamchog yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon rnam pa lngamathongob zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyus rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam
ba rnams kyis rab tuphyung ba rnam grangs dumar bsngags pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhani no/ legs kyis rab byung zhig ces/ des de rab tu byung bsnyan par rdzogs bar byas/ rgyal
bos blon po dag la bka' stsal pa/ shes ldan dag chen po ma sbyang na ma na grang/ de dag gis smras ba/ lha de bro 'tshal ba ni ma mchis mod kyi/ lhas ci zhagi bka' stsalan/ rgyal byed
gyi chol dumachis nas rab tubyung lags so// sus btubyung/ 'phags pa nye dgas so// rgyal bos de thos nas khros te/ des de la bon btang nas/ 'phags pa bdag gis
smyos pa khyod kyis rab tu 'byung ngam/ khyod kyis chen po rab tu phyungan/ da bdag dang/ 'bags skyes po dang/ 'thong ldan m dang/ dbyar byed ma dag kyang rab tuphyung la/ rang rgyal
srid kyis shage/ des kyang de la lan sladeb/ lto skyi chur shog/ khyod dung/ 'bags skyes bo dang/ 'phrang ldan ma dang/ dbyar byedaa rab tu byung la/ panying
rgyal srid byed po// 'di ltar ngas khyod kyi rten bo 'am/ gzhan yang rung bslus te phyung ngam ci/ red na gang zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas/ ded la gsol ba 'debs pa de rab tu 'byin no//
rgyal pos thos ma dad bar gyur nas/ de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni) dge slong dag
rgyal bos bkrabs pa rab tu'abyin pa las gyur gyis/ de'i phyi'i dge slong gis rgyal bos bkrabs pa rab tum 'byung bar dgongs sa/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skyes khu

gti mug te ngags blon po rab tu phyung bas rgyal po ma dad par gyur to// de lta bas na dge slong dag gis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu byung bar ma bya'o// gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod
ba zhig nye bar 'ongs na/ des de la rgyal pos bkrabs pa ma yaninam zhes dri bar bya ste/ ma dris par rab tu 'byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal pos bkrabs pa/
rab tu byung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ khacig yul rang po dag nas kyang 'ong/ rgyus ming shes pa yang 'ong/ gnang ba dag kyang 'ong nas/ dge slong dag the tshom du gyur te/ de dag
kyang rab tu phyung nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal la/ gang yul ring bo dang/ rgyus mngashes pa dang/ ma gnang ba dag 'ong ba de dag rab tu byung bar bya ste/ 'dika 'gyo dpar
bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo skra dang kha spu bregs nas
rib ma len par snga dro chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de yi rgyas srung du song ba dang/ saMm nu bram ze zhig khram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la/
bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ste/ de yang gtum pa gzu lums nyanartsub mo zhig yin bas/ des bram ze'i khye'uzhage la smas pa/ bram ze'i khye'u du khyod dag sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor
ltag ngabyug snyan nus sam/ des smras ba/ mkhan po te bor rnga thog go zhesaM/ de de'i drung du song nas de'i mgo ltag dbyug gis bab bo// tshodang ldan pa dga' bo lig snya bram ze de la bltas
pa dang/ de jo khros nas/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u yang skyob cig/ des de la naganyis ku stag dbyug gas brgyab pa dang/ tshodang ldanub dga' bas bsams ba/ bdag gis bltas

ta rung 'gro'o snyam nas de song ngo// rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin nas zas kyi bya ba byas te lhung bzed bkrus nas/ ga slong dag la h+phas pa/ tshodang ldan pa dag srang chage mo zhes bya bar ma 'dong
gnas/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ des smras pa/ don bram ze gtum po gakhru lums can rtsub mo zhig/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam zhig la khras khri'i
'a gas nga tshig klog tu'ajug ste/ sa bdag la rtag nga phyug gnyis bsnunano// de dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis canyes/ des smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa dag gcig tus/ gnyis pa ma
ny+nyA nyis so// ji lta ni dus/ ji ltar na sa gcugs med par des kho ba la stag dbyug gas bstan nas/ kho bos log ste bltas pa dang/ ngos lan gnyis bstan pas/ kho bos de la log sku bltas pa
kha/nga da ba de ni nyis so// snga ma ni mi nyes so/ tshodang ldan pa 'dags thos nas/ des snus la/ 'phags pa ci zhig gsung/ des snas po/ chen bo ma lags so/ ta gas
sa pa/ 'phags pa de bdag gis thos kyis mang gsungs shig/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ kyi dgas mgo lan gsum lcogs nas mjal lo zhes byas te/ mi dga' bar bya'o snyam
nas de mgo bzlas dbregs nas til mar gyis bskus te bkrus nas snga drosha thabs bgis/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs de mnyan yong na bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de rim gyis srung
du phyin nas/ bram ze de gzhan du ye pas pas des rim mthong ngo// tshodang ldan pa nye dga' de'i mdun du'achag bar brtsams pa dang/ bram ze des mthong nas/ des bram ze likhye'u zhig la
smras ba/ bram ze'i khye'u song la dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor phyug dbyug gus snyan cig/ tshodang ldan pa nye dga' de thos nas/ des snas ba/ bkranapa lo nig tung cagos/ danyid
tshu doskad smras ba dang/ bram ze de khros te des bdag nyid song nas nyidaga' la lcog dbyug gas bsnun nas/ na dgas bram ze de'i dbung pa nas bzung ste/ bkren panye ngaga' la yang
rdeg gam/ tshur rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes/ des deb de bung ba nas bzung ste drangs pa dang/ sdos bram ze'i khye'u de dag la bos nas/ de dag gis kyang de dbub pa ya gcig
nas bzung so drangs so/ 'ga' tshon po chen po'i stobs can des/ bram ze'i khye'ulnga ba po da dag dang bram ze de dras nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor songs 'dug go/ 'di ni chos
ti ani gu ga tshodrug snga mas khros nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug pa de'i tsho/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khang bkru sa g.yo bar gyur to rgyal bos lha sa de mthong nas/ mi zhig
la bsob/ kyi skyes bu skor 'phags pa drug sde 'ga' zhig byon pa ma gyur grang song la ltos/ des khyung ste bltas na/ tshadang ldan pa nye dga' bram ze'i khye'ulnga brgya tsam dang sgo na 'ganas/
des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dga' chab sgo namachis so// rgyal bos smras pa/ de nang du spyan dros shig de nang du'ongos tes pa/ lha'ags pa dga' bo rab tu
byung bar ma gyur na ci lig tu 'gyur/ 'phags pa stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bor 'gyurago/ 'o na khyod de'i 'gyur/ 'phags pa g.yog tu
ka 'gyur ro/ lha khyod kyis dge slong rnams ni gzhon nu'i thabs su gnang/ dge slong ma rnams ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi thabs su gnang ste/ de ltar bdag cag la 'o byams na/ bram khri gcig
cig gis lha khyad du bkum ste/ slob dpon dga' bo la ltag dbyug gnyis bstan/ bdag la yang ltag byug gis bsgrub go rgyal bo khros te des blon po rnams la bka' stsal pa/
song la bram ze de'i lag ba chod cig/ des de khrid de srung du song na/ bram ze de la ma gnyis kyis thos nas/ de dag mdza' bo dang/ phu nu dang/ gnyen dag dang 'dus shing snying mi rje ltar
sna bab pa'i tshig dal gyis sna ning/ kyi hud bu zhes cho nges 'debs bzhin srung du song nas/ de dag dang skye bo'i tshogs des/ blon bo de la snus pa/ kyi dge ba lha la nyes pa byas pa lag
glu pa gcad pa'i rigs na/ brom ze 'di 'og pas 'tshob yig bas/ lag pa g.yon pa gcad pa'i rigs so// des de'i lag pa g.yon pa bcad pa dang/ ji tsam dus gzhanazhig na bram ze
de de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa g.yogs nas/ g.yas pas klog par byed do// re zhig cig nanye dgas mthong nas/ shin tu khros nyargyal po'i thad du song nas smras pa/ rgyal bo rnams
kyi bde ba ni'adi lta ste/ bka'i 'bras bu btsun pa 'dir khrid na/ de yang lhal mad do// des snas pa/ 'bags pa ci zhig byas/ 'dags smas pa/ lha bram ze de 'u lag pa ma bcad/
do rgya la bos blon pe rnams bos te lcas pa/ khyed kyis bram ze de'i lag pa ma bcang dam/ des smras pa/ lha bkum lags so// de lta na'on 'phags pa ni dga' 'di skad zer ro//
tshe dang ldan pa nyidags sas pa/ lha bram ze de de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pas sbyar sgyur bgyid cing bram ze'i khye'u rnams klog tu'ajug go/ blon pos smras pa/ lha de'i pha ma dag gamachid nas/
bram ze 'ad log pas 'tshob zhig pas lag pa g.yon ba chod cig ces mchi// de'i slad du bdag gis de'i sug pa g.yon pa bkum mo// rgyal pos sa sa pa/ gal tade'i pha ma dag gis
lag pa g.yon pa gcod du bcug na/ das g.yas ba gcod du gzhug gis song la chod cig/ sa de'i drung du song nas lag pa g.yas pa bcad pa dang/ de lag pa gnyis ka 'phyang zhing
'dug go/ de sdug bsngal zhing 'dug pa dang/ 1 dga' bos smras pa/ brag sbe ci sta kho bo cag la ltag nga tsug gis ma rig par lag pa spyas te 'dug/ desna bab nas dregs pa dang nga
rgyal bcag ste cang ma khrir b.ra'adug pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dge slonganAkya'i bu rnams ni snying rjechad pa ste/ chad pas bcod nas kyang zhes gcod par byed do zhes 'phya bar byed//
[r]nyu@#// smod par byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ com ldan 'das la gsol ba dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang/
ba cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag lagab 'gacod du 'jug pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pa dang rkang ba dag gcad par mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka'
sal pa/ ga slong dag skyes bu ga tilug nya dgas dag sbyong gi las ma yin pa khyus te/ dge slong dag nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams las de lta bu byed du 'jug pa de ni mdzes pa ma yin 'tsham
pa ma yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcad par mi bya'o// gcod par byed ces pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas/ bya tshom
thams cad gcod pa las rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze de tsho dang ldan pa dga' sa nibasrungs/ nye dgas niyongs su btang ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' skul la/ ga slong dag da lta 'ba' zha'i tum zad kyi/ jiltar 'das pa'i dus nas nga dga' bos nibasrus/ nyidags na btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba skyed mos tshul/
shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chuphunasum tshogs pa zhigan/ drang srong 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ tshu za zhing 'thung ba/ g.yang gzhi dang shing
0shun gyonab zhig gnas te/ deshang bal ba'i drung na 'dug cing rang gi don sems par byed do// de'i stong nas lngatshuzhig gas bal ba'i 'bras bu zhig 'thas pa des drang srong de'i mgo snyad
nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod mod 'gyur ba gang yin pa// de ni kho bo ma byed kyis// khyodazhing 'gyur ba gang yin ga/ da khyodatid byed cing 'dug// drang srong de'i smon 'phrin sngon
pa zhig 'dug pa de ra dgas 'chor du song ba las bsti gnas der byin to// drang srong de nibya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shang sil ba'i drung de nas gzhan zhig tusongago/ rngon ba de de mi snang nas por
lha zhingashing bal ba de'i drung na 'dug go 'a'u des napa de'i mgorab l ba'i 'bras bu gcig 'phangs pa dang/ na pa der nur zhig pas/ de'i klad pa snyad nas/ bil ba'i
'bras bus bstan pas bskyodapa'i sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bas khyen du blta bar brtsams pa dang/ jitsamanalce'u thos nas/ dwakhros pas gzhun drung du bkasu/ dug mda' gcig
de'agand du bsnon pa dang/ sa la lho nas dus las 'das so// dge slong dag ji snyam dusums/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang sro ngag pa yin pa de ni dge slong dga' bo 'di nyidi yin no// de'i tshe
dedus kyi spre'u gang yin pa de ni bragazi 'di nyid yin no/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sngon ba gang yin pa de nas dga' 'di nyid yinate/ de'i tshomanga'adi dga' bos ni bsrungs la/ na rogs ni/
yongs su btang ngo// daltar yang dga' bos nibasrungs la/ dgasan go sa su btang ngo/// sdom ni/ rigs ngan dang na 'char karabs/ sna
sbyar dang nabarUs ba dang// mtshams bzang dang bzang sbyin dang// bdag gir 'du shes lhung bzed blangs/ ma bam pa dang zla bsrungs kyi// rang gi bcos ba'i ras bskus pa'o sha
sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni/ pas ma ba gnyis lus dziskad 'byung ba de bzhin rgyas par sbyar bar bya ste/ khyad par cung zad kyang mad do// sdom ni bag
dang bur mngashing dang ni// tul chos gos gnag dga' bo// sa tshil gyis ni byugs pa'i stod// aringabu'i phor pa sbom dga' molo sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// de'i tshomu ge'i dus la bab nas/ ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phag dag cig brkus te chol
ny+nyo sdug po'i nang du dong ste/ der de dug gis bsad do// bsad nas sha bzang po nams zos te/ mgo dang/ rus thogs dang/ sug pa rnams bor ro// drug pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ning
bar sngar langs nas khang pa'i stong du 'dzegs te// phyogs bzhir lta zhing/ de dag gis gangan dud pa 'khrul ba dang bya rgod lding ba dag mthong ba de thams cad 'dus ta 'dong bas/ nang
tshams par sngar las nas khang pa'i stong du 'dzugs daphyogs bzhir blta bar brtsams pa dang/ jitsam na tshal stug po'i nang na dud pa dang bya rgod ldang ba mthong nas smras pa/ dga' bo medaga'
tshal gyi nang na dud pa 'thul zhing bya rgod lding bas/ gal te cung zad rnyed kyang srid pas 'dong/ de dag myur ba myur bar dong ba dang/ phag gi mgo bo dang/ rjes thogs dang/ sug pa
bar ba dag mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo dga' phyag dar lta bu zhig red kyis btsos te bza' bar bya'o// de dag gis bsdus nas 'tshad pa na/ pag bdag rnams tsho la/
zhing der lhags pa dang/ tsam na drug sde rnams phag na 'chad pa mthong ste/ de dag gis sas pa/ 'phags pa dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang thogs la/ bya ba 'dit+ta bu
yang byedadam/ de dag gis sbas pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo cag srog gcodadu rung nA/ bdag go gis ra degs bzang bo dag bsad nas/ sha khazang po dag bza' mi nus sam/
ci'i phyir kho bo cag mgo dang/ sa pa dang/ sug pa dag bsdus nas 'chod/ ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gas brkus te bros nas bor ba 'di dag/ kho bo cag gis phyag dor bar pa
lta bu blos bar zad do// de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags po gal tade lta na'on kyang 'di ltar khyed rab tu byung ba yin pas/ 'di na 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de/
tshab/ @#/ com ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar mi
bya glangs na 'gal tshabs can du'agyur ro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ ma
shi bar lenapa rnams kyis pu ram gyi shing dag brkus te bros nas/ dartsal dang thor techu nga ba dag bor ba dang/ drug sde rnams na tshun 'phyan zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang/ de dag gis mtho
nas lcas pa/ dga' ba nyi dga' phyag dar lta bu 'di redakyis blang bar bya'o// de dag gis blang bar brtsams na/ bu ram shing srung ba ga tshol zhing der lhags pa dang/ jicom na drug sde rnams
gshengag rtsa kha dang thor po'i chung ba dag lenapa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang thogs la/ 'di lta bu'i sdig pa las kyang khyed dam/ de dag gis
snas pa/ bzhinabazangs ga la bdag cag ma byin par len du rung na/ bdag cag gas bdams shing bdams nas bu ram shing bzang po 'am/ gzhan nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa rin
po 'brog par mi nus sam tsa/ ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis brkus tazos nas/ dgazod kho bo cag gas rtsa ba dang rtsa mo re chung ba dag bsdus par zad do// de dag gis smras pa/ 'bags
ba gal te de lta na/ 'on kyang 'di ltar khyed rab tubyung ba yin pas/ 'di ni'i[︽]ma pa ma yin no// de dag cung ma zer bar 'dug nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar mi bya'o// dge slong de lta bu'i phyag dar lenan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// ma byin par len pa rnams kyis shing ta la'i 'bras bu dag btus
nas nags stug poranang du khyer nas/ bdams shing bdams te thos nas snyigs ma dag ber ba dang/ sdug snga rnams phan tshun 'khyam kha las phyogs der phyin nas de dag ga sa de mthong nas/
de dag gis smos pa/ ga' bo nye dga' phyag dar lta bu 'di skyed kyis bsdu bar bya'o/ de rnams kyis de bsngo bar brtsams pa na/ shing ta la'i srungs ma tshol zhing der son pa dang/ ji tsam
nadrug sde rnams shang pala'i mgo thogs pa snyigs ma dag sdudapa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'phagaso pa drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang thogs la/ 'di lta bu'i sdig pa 'alas kyang byed
ma de dag gis smyos pa/ bzhin bzangs gal takho cog ma byin par lenadu ranganawA/ bdams shing bdams to)shing ta la'i 'bras bu bzang po dag dang/ gzhan yang nor bu dang mu
gtig la sogs pa ni bo tshadag 'phrog par ma nus sam ci/ ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag brkus pa las// kho chag gas nyal nyil bsdus par zad do//
nges sbas la/ gal ted ston yang 'di zhes khyed rab tu byung ba man pas/ 'dini'atsham pa ma yin no// ded cang ma zir bar 'dug nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ ga slong dag gis
gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar mi bya'o// dge slong gas de lta bu'i phyag dar blas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuro/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshomanyan yod na sbos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug ba dol/ la ba
bzang bo zhig bdog nas/ bdel shani da chags so/ dadus gzhan zhig nan bar gyur ba dang/ la ba de la ji lta bar dbyig dbag la na mya ngan mi byed do// de rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/
'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i sman dag byas kyang phan bar ma gyur to/ des gang gi tshilus kyi gnas skabs shes pa de'i tshan du mas bsog sa smras pa/ gang gi tsho kho
bshu bar gyuran pa'i tshokhyed cag gso ma bsreg par 'on kyang l ba 'dis dkris nas bor cig dedag gis de dbugs phyung ste smras kha/ dzisnyadad kyis btab pa thams cad 'chi'agaci/ sos
0 par 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig/ de tsho zad pa zhig pas rim gro dang gsos byas kyang ma ban te/ sha nas la ba la lhag por chags bas/ dag lnga bcan rnams kyi nang du skyes so// de
nye du rnams kyis gos sngon bo dang/ sor bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan nas/ la bde nyid kyis dkris tadu khrodadu byer ba dang/ de dge slong dag gis mthong nas de dag
gis ngag slong dur khrod pa gnag dga' bo zhes bya pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa smos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig shi ba de nye pudag gis la bas dkris nas dur khrod du bor gyis/ song la phyag dar
khrod long zhig/ de myur ba myur bar dur khrod dusong nas la ba blangs pa dang/ mi ma yin pa des snas pa/ 'phags ba gnag dga' bo/ bdag ga u0f7ala ba ma bsnyams pagi/ dur khrod pa phal
char snying stobs can anipaso/ ngos de la smras pa/ bkren pa khyod la ba 'di la lhag bar chags bas/ yi dgas lnga ba can rnams kyi nad du skyes na/ dgung cad myal bar skye 'dod dam thor
zhig ces byas nas/ 'on kyang des ma btang ngo// de lhag par chags pas des de la rdog pas bsnunanas bshus te/ des de khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo// de yang cho ngas 'debs
shing de'i phyi bzhin du 'bras te/ 'phags pa gnag dga' bo la ba 'a stsol cig ces byas na/ des khyad du bsad de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang/ rgyal byed kyi tshal na sangs rgyas la mngon par
dad pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dag 'dug pas/ dbang chung dur grags pa de nang du'ag ma nus nas/ rgyalakhyekyi tshal gyi sgo na cho ngas 'debs shing 'dug
go sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyonabazhin du dpar mdzad pa yin pas/ de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rgyas pa/ kun dga' bo su'i phyi rgyal byed tshal gyi sgo na ma
wA yin pa du/ des gsol pa/ btsunapa gnag dga' bos de la ba blas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ ma ma yanib 'dags pa de lta bu s ngu sku/ gal tal ba ma
ban khrag dron du skyugs nas 'thib 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yong ngo snyam du dgongs nas/ tshongang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sengol dge slong gnag
ga' ba lam ma yin pa 'di la lab byinacig/ gal te 'di la la ba ma byare na gdon mi za bar 'dikhrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyurago/ gang tsho byin pa de'i tsho angamadun dusongazhig

zlacas smra bar bya/ gang gi tshadur khrod duson pa de'i tshayang nyol cig ces brjod par bya zhing/ gang gatsho nyal ba de'i tshade'i steng du dgab par bya'o zhes gyis shig/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhog
tshadang ldan pa kun daga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyam nas/ rmadang ldan pa gnag dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshadang ldan pa gnag dga' bo la 'di skad ces sas so//
tshadang ldan pa gnag dga' kho shes bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhalas mi ma yin pa 'di la la ba byin cig/ gal ta'adil la ba ma bya ni da gnamawa bar khrag dronod skyugs
nas 'chibar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshabyin pa de'i tshaa mdun du song zhig ces brjod par bya'o// gang ga tshodur khrod du phyin pa de'i tshos nyol cig ces brjodab bya zhing/ gang gi tshanyal ba de'i
tshade'i stang du dgab par bya zhes de skad bka'asul to// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo// tshodang ldan pa kun dag 'a bo
song ba dang/ gnag dga' bos a ma yin pa de la smras pa/ gal takhyod la kha 'dod namadun du song zhig dang sbyin no// de mdun du song ba dang/ yang smras pa/ gal te khyod la ba 'dodon
tol cig ces byas pa dang/ du nyal nas de'i stang du bkab bo// mi ma yin pas kyang de la rdog pas bstan pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pa yin pas des mnags so// skabs de dag
slong rnams la bsnyadapa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gya tshom du ro'i gos blang ba 'am spyane par mi
bya'i len des rkang ba'i mthar nas mgo bo'amathar song ste blang bar bya'o// gang zhig sbyin pa des kyang mgo bo'i mtha' nas rkang ba'i mthar song ste sbyin par bya'o/ dge slong dag lo'i gos la nyes/
dmigs lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ kha dog ngan ba dang/ dri zhim dang/ rtsis pa dang/ shig mang ba dang/ gnod na ma srun pa mang bko/ 'on kyang phyag dar

pa khrodapas dzasrid du rnam phyung ba de srid duro'i gos blang bar ma bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam byung bar sha kha'igos blang bar mi bya'o zhes gsus pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis phyi khrid de deng ba dang/ ma
@# dad pa dag gis mthong nas 'bags la khyad ci phyi khridi nas dgon par 'dong/ ci srog gcod par byed dam zhes kha zer bar byed pa dang/ de dag gis lan gzhan du glan// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ gyi khrid de 'gro bar mi bya'o// de dag gis mtshon gyis rlu phyung ste blangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

mtshon gyis chu byung ste blang bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gang gi tshe srin bu phra'u dang grog mas bros kyang rung/ de'i tshablang bar bya'o// dedug gsi blangs te de bzhin du gyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
sul la/ de bzhin du bgo bar mabya'i/ 'on kyang zhag bdunanam/ brgyad du dben par bzhag la/ gang gi tshe rlung dang nyi mas gdungs par gyur pa de'i tsho bkrus nas btsos la bgo bar bya'o/
de dag gis gos de bgos tagatsug lag khang du 'jug cing mchod rten dag la phyag 'tshal bar byed nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/
0 bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa dge slong dur khrod pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong dur khrod pas ro'i gos pagos te gtsug lag khang du 'gro khar mi bya/ mchod
don la phyag 'tshal bar mi bya/ dpo phyag byed na yang 'dem gang khor yug las nye bar 'gro bar ma khya/ gnas khang la longs spyad par ma bya/ gnas mal la yang 'dug par mkhya/ dge 'dun gyi nad
du 'dug par ma bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag khong zhing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'agro bar ma khyi/ gal te'agronayang sgor bsdad par bya'o/
gal te 'phags pa nang du gshegs shes zer na/ bdag ni dur khrod pa'o zhes smra bar bya'o/ ji ste 'phags pa khag takhyod lta bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs te 'gu pa ga khyim
gyi nang du byon na/ bdag gis redab dag legs par redas lags sam zhes zer nang du 'gro bar bya zhing stan la ni 'dug par mi bya'o// gal te 'phags pa gdan la bzhugs shig ces
khrar na/ bdag ni dur khrod ba'o zhes bdopa bya'o// ji ste 'phags pa gal te khyod lta bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan mang dag par blangs te 'dug pa dag stan dang mi la yongs su longs spyod na/ bdag
sa red pa dag legs par rnyed ma lags sam zhes zer na/ der 'dug par bya ste/ 'dil 'gyodabar mi bya'o// dge slong du khrodapas kun tusbyang pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag
par blangs te ma 'jugan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams gri dang khab dag bab chol du 'jog pas de dag btsas khros nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ bob chol dugazhag par ma bya'i/ 'on kyang snod du gzhag par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stodadu gzhag par bya'ozhes bka' stsal pa
na dang ga slong dag gis snod ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la spratshil gyis byugs nas/ der khab dang gra dag gzhug par bya'o/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyalakhyed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyanayodanadage slongam sbom dga' mo zhes bya ba de la mching phor zhig yod do/
pa[% ]ji tsaman dge slong ma gzhan zhig skom pas nyam thag su tshu'athung 'dod nas// de de'i drung du song nas lcas pa/ 'phagasal skom ste chu btung gis mching bar bag yor cig/ des smras pa/ 'di
na 'dug gis long la song zhig/ des rmongs te song ba dang/ lag nas lhung ste chag nas de dang mi bar 'dug go/ dus gzhan na sbom dga' chos de drananas/ de de'i drung du song ste smras
pa 'phags ma mching borasnoms pa de stsol ga des smras pa/ 'phags ma 'tshal na 'on kyang lag nas lhung ste chag gas/ gzhanazhig nyos te dbul go/ sa smras pa/ denying byin/
cig ces des de ring zhig tug tshos tre btang ngo// skabs de dge slong ma dag gas/ dge slong rnams la bsnyad do// dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni ching bor nas chu'athung ba las gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dge slong mas mching phor du chub tung bar ma bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas/ dge
klong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong ma dag mching phor nas chu 'thung ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong mas mching par nas chu btung bar ma bya
zhing gzhan yang btung ba dang bza' bar mi bya'o/ dge slong ma mching phor nas chu 'am gzhan du yang rung/ 'thung ngamo za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sdom ni ri mo'i
mkhar lanam dang ni// khrus dang 'gags dang lhung bzed kyis// lhag rol ma yin lhung bzed gzhir// rkang pa mi gzhug yul dgago/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod
nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgomad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gong gi tsho khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dunalargyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i
de'i blo skyes pa/ 'di'i tshom bris pas mi sdug ste/ da'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na' di ri mo bri 'o snyam du rig nas/ da bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba der song snya phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tra/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcos ldan 'adas la/ khyim bdag mgon
med zas sbyin gyis 'di skadaces gsol to/ khatsunab bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di ri mo ma briso bas mi sdug ste/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'di rimo bri
na bar bgyigo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 2stsal la/ khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gses/ mi bris ngashig/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis ri mo bris shig ces bka' stsal nas/ sa tshon
rtsi dag kyang bsogs/ rimo mkhanan+nams kyang bos nas la/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gas/ de'i phyir rtsi 'di dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ri mo bris shig/ de dag
gis smus la/ khyim bdag ri mo bra ni phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba gsus ga/ des snas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis ma shes kyis sdod cig dang/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu// da
dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag legs tade bzhin du mdzod cig dang sdod do/ gad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tagasol pa/ bcomoldan
'das tshon rtsi dag kyang bsogs/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyang bas na de dag dag pa nas/ la bdag phyogs bgang du ci zhig bri ba smos shig ces mtshin/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis
thugs brtsa ba nye bar bzung ste/ phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba pa ka 'a stsal du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gal te de lta na songal/ re zhig phyi sgor ba nod/
sbyin lag na dbyug thogs 'drarebacuganas/ sgo khang du du cho'aphrul chen po dang 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa/ khyams su na rgyas pa'i rabs kyi 'phreng ba/ dri gtsang khang gi sgor na gnod
spyani lag na 'phreng ba thogs pa dag/ rim gro khang bar ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag chos rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byedapa/ bkad sar na gnod sbyin lag na zas
thogs pa dag/ mdzod kyi sgor ni gnod sbyin lag na lcags kyu thegs pa dag/ chu'i khang ba ni klu lag na bum pa thogs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag/ khrus khang ma bsro khang
dun lha'i mdo las 'byung ba 'am gzhan dmyal ba'i rabs/ nad pa'i sman khang du nad bzhin gshegs pa nad pa'i nad g.yog mdzadab/ chab khang sar na dur khrod shin tu'ajigs su du ba
gnas khang gi sgo ni rus bkangs dang mgo'i thod pa bri'o// btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ com ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam nas/ thams cad
de kho na bzhin du drar bcug go/ gang ga tshakhyim bdag mgon med bus sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal ri mo bris pa de'i tsho/ dge slong shes bzhin mad bar
gnas pa kha cig gas der ma bus pas/ dubs ri mo ma rung par gyur nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis ]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldanu'adus kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag ngas ma khang ba gnang gas/ dge slong gang zhig la ma dgos pa des/ ma'i khang par ma bud par bya'i/ khang bzas su nam yin no// khang bzangs su ma 'budan 'gal tshabs can
du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis ma'i khang par ma bud bar bya'i/ khang bzangs su nam yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhanand ba dag cig 'khod pa de dag mas 'apos
par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa gang dag mas 'bos pa de dag gso gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol lam/ rdzing drung du ma lus la mag ma du ba med pa nang du
gzhug par bya'o// dge slong rnams khong bzangs su khrus byed pas rimo byedi nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khang bzangs su khrus mi bya'i/ 'od kyang rdzong gi gru gcig ston
ba'i spyan sngar ma bab pa ma/ khrus kyis khang pa byas nas der khrus bya'o// 'dam du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der so phag gi gcal dgram par bya'o//
kha10 chu 'khyil nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu'i hor khung gdod par bya'o// bcom ldanu'adas kyis chu'i sbyor khu nga gdod pa bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ chu'i storakhung ga kha 'gags
bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dus dus su bsal bar bya zhing/ chu'i se khung gi kha nyid du khrus bya'o/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gnyanayodon bram tho zhig gi bu na bor gyur nas/ de sman pa'i drung du song ste sus pa/ bkra shis par
gyur cig bkra shas bar gyur cig/ sman pos smras pa/ thobu tsa bzhed gsungs shig/ des smras pa/ ka dag ba cung zad kyang ma 'dod mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo'i bu nad 'di dang 'dis
thobs kyis snyan ston cig/ sman pa de dad pa can zhig bas/ nges snas ba/ bram ze 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du bzhud la/ lhung bzed kyi chuslos tade khrus shig dang sos par 'gyur ro//
des bram zwa bkrungashaso pa gyur cig ces sAs nas chas te/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo/ drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung bzhag gas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo ma
stongs ba yin te/ tshadang ldan pa nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag pa desaM/ bram ze de mthong nas smras pa/ bram ze chen ba 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so// khyod zla
ba lta bu r gnas pa yin na/ ralo zhig ste ga las 'ongs/ 'phags pa phyag 'tshal lo/ ring mo zhig sta mthong ba na legs te/ yang dang yang du mthong bas/
'a dbarAs par 'gyur ro// dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ 'bags pa bdag gi bu blo tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te/ dral sman pas 'phags pa rnams kyi thad nas lhung bzed kyi tshubaslangs
wA taras bkrus dang/ sos par 'gyur ro zhes khastunanas/ bdag lhung bzed kyi chu bslang ba'i slad du 'dir mchis kyis stsol cig des smras pa/ khyod ko lhung bzed kyi tshu'i phyir 'dir 'ongs
lta 'phags pa dalta lags dgos pa ni dmachis so// gal te de lta na sdod cig dang/ kho bos lhung bzed kyi tshu blang ngo zhes byas nas de nang du song ngo// des gabran khros nas lhung bzed
bkras tedar sa ba dang/ sha'i kham tshad dang/ nya gra ma dang/ 'bras chan gyi brul ma dang/ phya dang/ tshod shol dang/ lur ba cung zad cig blugs so// denas phyir khyu nas
smras pa/ bram ze lhung bzed kyi zhu 'ad re khyer cig/ bram zes mthong nas snyas pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi bu gum bla'i/ tshu'adi lta bu ma gtsang bas khrus bgyis pa ni mi rung ngo/ tshod
ldan pa nye dgas sbrus paM/ khyod dad pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pas byed kyi bu sos zin du zad do// bram ze de 'phya ba la zhugs nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas lagasol/
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba na/ dge slong dag lhung bzed nas lhag rol 'dor ba las gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dge slong gis lhung bzed nas
lhag rolo der b.lami bya'osnyam du dgongs te/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ga slong dag de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lhung bzad nas lhag rol dor bar mkhya'o// 'dodon 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang ngas dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pas lhung
bzed lan gsum bkrus te/ lhung bzed kyi tshul gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags nas sbyin par bya// dge slong lhung bzed kyi tshusbyin par byed pas kun tu spyod pa'i
ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs tam 'jug na 'gal tshabs cad du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong dag lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste gzan za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnamasani/
gtsang sbra med pa ste/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhago sta gzan za'o nas 'phya ba'i skabs ni/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ba/ dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba na thog tu bab bo// de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhagaste gzan bza' bar
la mi bya'o// dge slong lhung bzed kyi gan la rkang pa bzhag ste gzan za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus yangs pa canan sbe 'a rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsigs
ba na bzhugs so// dog slong dag lham ma phud par gzan za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams ni gtsang sbra mdapa ste/ lham ma phud par gzan tha'o
zhes 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag khram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu
bab bo// de lta bas na dge slong gis lham ma phud par gzan bza' bar mi bya'o// dge slong lham ma phud par bzan khra ma'agal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
lham ma budapar gzan bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag gis lham phud de gatran bzung bar brtsams pa dang/ de dag nad bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ ga slo rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni ma phudapa gzanabaza' bar bya ste/ 'dil 'gyod par mi bya'o/
wa /sngogani lhung bzed med dang grags pa dang// dbyar gnas pa dang gnas med dang// le lnga rnyed pa gcig pa dang// glo dang rgyab dang rked pa mgo[– ]/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod nargyal bya rgyal khyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// nadaga' bos gcig cig rab tuphyung ba de la snga nas lhung bzed nyabaram bzhag go/ dzitsam na
ge slong rnams zas kyi dus la bab ste/ rang rang gi lhung bzed dag bkrus nas lhung bzed kyi gzhi la bzhag ste/ mchod rten la phyag 'tshol du dong ba dang/ des bsams pa/ lhung bzed 'di dag
mang bo zhig 'dug pas/ gdonam khri bar gang gis ji ltar blangs pa des bros shAri zos nas 'di nyid du 'jog go/ de lta bas na rezhig bdag gis kyang blangs la slar gzhug go snyam nas/ das
gnas brtan kun shes ko'u da lhung bzed blang bar brtsams pa dang/ gzhan zhig gis dal gas pa/ tshodang ldan pa lhung bzed 'di ni gnas brtan kun shes ko'upana' yin gyis 'di ma len
cig des de bzhag nas/ tshodang ldan pa ltarta thul dang/ bzang po dang/ rlas pa dang/ mdetshon dang/ gang po dang/ dris med pa dang/ ba glang bdag dang/ lag bzangs dung/ dag
slong gzhan dag cig ga lhung bzed dag blang bar brtsams pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis smras ba/ tshodang ldan pa khyod la lhung bzed mdan/ lhung bzed med pa khyod sug rab tuphyung/ des smras pa/
mkhan po nyi dgas so// dge slong rnams 'phya bar byed de/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma yin pa gzhan su zhig lhung bzed med pa rab tu'abyin ces zer ba'iskabs de//

ge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong gis lhung bzed med pa rab tu byung bar ma bya ste/las kyi na ga la chog su can du gyur//rab tu 'byin bcu
a yo byad gagis mi khri la bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa zhebar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa'i zhag dge slong dag gis lhung bzed med pa zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par
bgyid na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'ag/ nye bar 'khor bsnyen pa ra rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ pasAn par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni 'gal tshabs ca na du 'gyur ro/ dzAtsun pa dge
slong dag gis lhung bzed chung du 'am/ lhung bzed chen po 'am/ lhung ba zed skya bos bsun par rdzogs par bgyid na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'apa/ habar 'khor bsnyan par sgrogs pa zhes
bya ste bsnyan par sgrogs par khyedapa rnams ni gal che bas can du'agyur ro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsho mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra banabazhugs ]
so/ de'i tshochom rkun par grags pa zhig rkun po byed pa tshor nas/ des bzung ba dang brkus pa bor nas bros so// de lam gyi ngal bas dub nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi lam kha shing zhig gi ngan
lag kha 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa nye dga'i snga dror sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang tshes gos thogs te/ mnyan yodadubasod snyoms kyi
phyire chas pa des de mthong nas smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa khyed su'i/ des snas pa/ 'phags pa bdag na mgon med pa zhig sto/ bdag la le nga ma mchis so// des smyos pa/ bzhi/
bzadas gal te de lta na ci ste rab tu ma 'byung/ des smras pa/ 'phags po khyod rab tubyung ba lags pas re zhig drang bor smra bar bgyi sta/ bdag ni chom rkun par grags pa lags na su
zhig bdag rab tu 'byin/ pu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni thugs rjes rab tu ba ya re ngas su zhig rab tum 'byin/ sems don cig dang ngas rab tu byung ngo// 'phags pa 'gas bu rab tu
'byung ngo// sad rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas snas pa/ bzhan bzangs ri dgas kyis ridags mi sos kyis/ mnyan yod rgya chen por rang gi spyod yul pha yul du bsod snyoms
la rgyus la 'tsho bar gyis shig 'dasnga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te// mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ bram ze
dang khyim bdag rnams kyis ngo shes nas de na kha cig na re/ shes ldan dag 'di na chom rkun par grags pa de yin na rab tubyung ngo zhes zer/ gzhan dag na re dag spyod shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi chos ni
bzung ste/ chom rkun par grags pa yaparab tu'abyin par byed do// 'di dag nan mo bsod snyoms pa'i tshe byad kyis khyim bdag tuglags bcad nas/ nub mo rgul ngo
ba ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba na ga slong dag chom rkun bar/
wA grags pa rab tu'abyin pa las gyur te/ de'i phyir dge slong gis chom rkun par grags pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram
ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya bani thog tu bab bo// de lta bas na dge slong gis chom rkun par grags pa rab tungabyung bar ma bya'o// bcom ldan ' dus kyis dge slong gis chom rkun par gragasab

rgyu rab tu byung bar ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis chom rkun pa yin pa mngon pa med pa dag kyang rab tum phyung bas/ de dag ga rab tu 'khyung ba dang bsnyanapar rdzogs pa dge slong/
gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnamasakyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chom rkun pa yin par mngon par rab tu
dbyung bar mi bya'i/ mngon pamed pa ni rab tungabyung bar bya'o// de lta bas nagang yang rung ba zhagag drung du rab tu'akhyung bar 'dod pa zhig nye bar 'ongs na/ des de la chom rkun par grags pa ma
yani nam zhes dra bar bya'o/ ma dris par rab tu 'byinAn 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/// bam po nyi shu ba// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das natan
yod na rgyal bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshoganasangashig na dge slong mang po zhig gcig cag la gnas bcas te 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na de
dag gi gnas kyi slob dpon de dus las 'dus pa dang/ de dag gis su zhage la bdag cag gas 'phral gyi bya ba zhu ba bya ba dang/ gang la gnas bcas ta'adug par bya ba mi shes nas/ skabs de dag
slong rnams la bsnyad do// dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' su la pa/ dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang//
gnas khang sang ba dang/ mal stan steng ba dang/ ya gro ba sang bas btsal bar bya sta[. ]jis re na de lta na legs/ drisnya ma red na dge slong de dag gis gnas der gso sbyong gnyis pa'i
bar du 'dug par ma bya ste/ 'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tuganas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar gnas par khas blang bar 'dod pa las/
de dag gi gnas kyi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas/ de dag gis kyang ji ltarab sgrub pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gas kyang dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang/ gnas khang spang ba dang/ mal stan spang ba dang/
mi khro ba spang bas btsal bar bya ste/ gal rten de lta na legs/ ji ste ma red na dge slong de dag gis gnas der dbyar snga mar gnas par dam bca' bar mi bya ste/ gnas bar dam 'cha'
na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ dge slong gzhan dag sgrig gnas shapo tuganas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar snga mar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de dag gi slob dpon de yang dus
las 'das nas/ de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa ma shes pa'i skabs ri/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ rtsom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
ga slong de dag gis kyang dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang/ gnas khang spang ba dang/ mal stan spang ba dang/ rim gro ba sprang bas bcol bar bya sta/ gal de rnyed na de lta na/
legs/ ji lha ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis der gnas par mi bya'i/ gnan du song la dbyar nye bar sbyor ba gnyis par dbyar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o/ der gnas na 'gal tshabs
nyanadu 'gyur ro// dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tshuganas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar gnas pa ra khas blang bar 'dod pa las/ de dag gi gnas kyi slob dpon de yang dus las
tsha00'das nas/ de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa ma shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de
dag gis kyang/ dge slong zhig las su khaskob spang ba dang/ gnas khang spang ba dang/ mal stan snga ba dang/ rim gro pa snang bas btsal bar bya ste/ gal te rnyed na legs/ ji ste ma rnyed na dag
slong de dag gis der dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bca' bar mi bya ste/ gnas bar dam 'cha' na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tuganasakyi slob dpon gcig
cig dang dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ dadag gi slob dpon yang dus las 'das nas/ de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub par mi shes pa'i skabs de/ ga slong rnams kyis//
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis zla ba gnyis kyi bar du gcig la gcig dri zhing so sor brtags pas gnas bar bya'o// zla ba
gnyis 'das nas dge slong zhig las su bsko kha sbyang ba dang/ gnas khang spang ba dwang/ mal cha spang ba dang/ rim gro pa spang ba btsal bar bya sta/ gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/ ji
ste ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis gnas der gso sbyong gnyis pa'i bar du 'dug par mi bya ste/ 'ag ma'agal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tudge slong gcig
cig gas rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs bar byas pa las/ de dag gi mkhan po de dus las 'das pa dang/ de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub bam shes zhes bya ba thams cad
slob dponal ji lta bar snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o ga sargyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyar gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs go/ ri ra nag
na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/ yo byad thams cad kyis bkang nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la khul la// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag de
rgyal po'i pho brang du bzung pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis thos so// de dag gis thos nas gtsug lag khang por te bros pa dang/ dkonamchog gsum gyi dkor ma byin par len pa rnams kyis btus so//
tsam na khyim bdag de slar btang ste/ ba slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de ji ltar slar btang ba thos nas/ de dag khyim bdag de'i drung du song ba dang/ khyim bdag des ji ltar dge slong
dag gtsug lag khang bor te bros nas/ dkon mchog gi dkor ma byin par lenapa rnams kyis brkus pa snga nas khros pas/ des de dag bskyos pa/ 'phags pa khyed ci'i phyi'i bros/ de dag
lce gas gas pa/ kho bo cag gis khyodargyal po'i pho brang du ji ltar bzung ba thos tu shes nas/ panas bangag nyag skrag ste bros so// 'phags pa dag gal tabadag rgyal po'i pho brang du bzung yang
khyed ko ci'i slad du 'bros/ bdag gi du dag ni ma bzung na ca de dag kyang khyed kyi yo byad sbyor bar ma gyur na/ de dag spros pa med bar ca pa'i khrir bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis//
bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin 'bros par ma bya'i/ 'on kyang gragatsug lag khang ga bdag po'i nying dag la/ nga gtsug lag khang gi bdag po/
rgyal po'i khar tubazung na/ ci khyed kyis bdag cag ga ba sod snyoms kyi yo byadasbyar nus sam zhes dri bar bya ste/ gal tade dag sbyor na de lta na lags/ jis mi sbyor na 'ango lnga'i bar du bsod/
snyoms bya zhing 'dug par bya'o// le lnga 'dus nas gal tagatsug lag khang gi bdag bo slar btang na de lta na legs/ sta ma btangan gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byas nas/ gtsug lag
khang de'i 'a khor gyi gtsug lag khang dag yongs su skyong bar byed pa rnams dang/ rnyed ba thun mong dang/ gso sbyong tha dad ba dag gis la gzhan lta'i bar du 'dug par bya'o// las ni 'di ltar bya
sta na'akhor gyi gtsug lag khang dag tuganas mal bshams te/ 'gats+tshabardungs nas/ sa pa'i tshig gsi dge slong rnams la yang dag khar bsgo nas/ dag 'dun thams cad 'dus shing
'khod pa dang/ dge slong cig gis gsol ba byas nas las byas te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang chag mo zhig gi bdag po rgyal pos
bzung ste/ gal tedage 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dag 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang de gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang/
'a re ba thun mong dang/ gso sbyong tha dad bar bgyi'o// 'din gsol ba'o// lam ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang chog mo zhig gi bdag po
rgyal bos bzung ste/ de'i slod du dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang de gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang/ rnyed pa thun mong dang/ gso sbyor tha dad par mdzadan/ tshodang ldan pa gang dag gtsug lag khang
de gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang/ dad pa thun mong dang/ gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad par bzo ba de dag ni cang ma gsung nag/ gang dag ma bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod
tsho cing gnang nas/ zhe 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang chage mo zhig red pa thunamong dang/ gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ ga la te
rnam pa des lo bcu'i bar du gnas pa rnams la gtsug lag khang gi bdag po 'ongs na de lta na legs/ ji ste ma 'ongs rnata'akhor gyi gtsug lag khang dag tuganasaul dang/ snod dang/ yo byad
ngag bzhag nas/ nang sgo bcad de 'gro bar bya'o// gang gi tshogatsug lag khang gi bdag po sur btang ba de'i tshonye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang dag nas rdzas ji ltar bzhag pa rnams phyir blangs de
nyid du sbyin par bya'o// gal te nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang na gnas pa dge slong rnams kyis byi nad stan legs/ sto ma byanan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ saargyas
bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun daga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong
nas 'phyo bar byed de/ 'phags pa re zhig bdag cag ni byis pa khyim na gnas pa lags pas pha ma dang/ bu dang bu mo dang/ bran mo dang/ bran po dang/ las byedapa dang/ zhoshas
'tsho ba dang/ rgyal pa dang/ lha dang/ gshen ngag dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze rnams kyi don du lus kyis khur 'khur 'tshal na/ khyed ko su'i don du bu snoms/ de dag cad
ma zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
'phya ba ni thog tu bab go/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o/ dge slong lus kyis khur khyer na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag
slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde rnams kyis rgyab dang/ skad pa dang/ glo dang/ mgos khur bkur bar brtsams te/ nyes dmigs
de nyid du gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgyab kyis ma yani/ skad pas ma yin/ glos ma yin/ mgos khur bkur bar mi bya sta
khur na'agal tshabs can du 'gyur// sdom ni gnas dang yo khyad drug dang na// nas de las phrogs pa dang// yid gcugs len pa lnga dang// btsobag sgo khang
'chag sa'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal khyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshabram ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dod
ba zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang/ ji tsam nadage slong lag nalhung bzed thogs ba rab tumang po 'khar gsal thogs nas bsod snyoms la chas ba de dag des mthong nas/ sa
bsams pa/ re zhig de dag gang du 'gro dritsesnyam nas des de dag la so pa/ 'phags pa gang du bzhud/ de dag gis snus ba/ bram ze bsod snyoms la 'gro'o// des smras pa//
'phags pa dge slong thams cad bsod snyoms la rgya 'am/ de dag gis snyas pa/ bram ze dge slong shes nyenan gang dag yin pa de dag la ni bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bsod snyoms
gtsugalag khang du khyer 'ongs nas 'bul la/ bshes nyemadapa gang dag yin pa de dag bsod snyoms la 'gro'o// des bsams pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi nang du btubyung
ba dang khyad par ci yod kyis/ bdag gis 'dir yang de bzhin du bsod snyoms la 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo// des yang bsams pa/ re zhig dge slong ba gzhan zhig la ang ci 'di dag bsod snyoms
kho na la gnas tarab 'byung ngam/ 'on gnas gzhanayang yod dri bar bya'o snyam nas/ de dge slong zhig gi drung du song ba dang/ des de la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod ba/
kun tu spyad nas smras pa/ bram ze khyod ga nga nas ci'i phyir 'di'i 'os/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod blta ba kho na'i phyir 'ongs te// re zhig khyed ci la gnas nas rab tubyung ba
dri'o das smras pa/ bram ze legs so legs so// khyod kyi rtog pa ni bzang ste/ 'dug cig dang gtam bya'o// bram ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dodo ba des rkang pa la phyag byas nas/ de'i
mdun du 'dug pa dang/ des smras pa/ bram ze bzhi ba 'di dag na bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsus pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bsnyen bar rdzogs pa dge slong ga gnas su bcas
ba yin no// bram ze bzhi gang non/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gos rnams kyi nang na phyag dar khrod mi rung ba red kyang bla ba ste/ de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i
chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung bstanapar rdzogs ba dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro// zas rnams kyi nang na bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal rnams kyi nang na shing drung dang/ sman rnams kyi
nang na bkus te bor ba ni rung ba red kyang bya ba sta/ dal gnas nadage slong legs par gsungs ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung bsnyanapar rdzogs pa dge slong
gi dngos bor gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ khram grwa bcom ldan 'dus kyis bdag cag la gnas su bcas pa ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag la gnas nas bdag cag legs par
gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung bsnyenabar rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro// bram zes smras pa/ 'phags pa su zhigaganas 'di dag gis 'tsho bar nus bdag rab tu
'byung ngo snyam ste/ 'dir mchis na rab tu 'byung ba 'di la nga dga' ba zhig pas/ phyag 'tshal le mchi'o zhes smos te song ngo// de nyid de'i rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyan par rdzogs pa
ge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung
zad byung ba ni ga slong dag rab dum byung ba kho na la gnas bzhits+tshedapa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rab tum byung ba 'am/ bsnyan par ma rdzogs pa la gnas bzhi
brjod par mi khyi'i/ gang ga tshorab tu byung bsnyan par rdzogs pa de'i tshoganas bzhi brjodabar bya'o/ rab tu ma byung bsnyadapar ma rdzogs pa la gnas bzhi rjod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyanayod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed//
dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de ru bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no// rags dang mthunaba'i ming btags te/ de bskyodabasu
sa chen por gyur to// de dus gzhan zhig na pas smyos ba dang/ des bsams pa/ pa mgu dka' bar gyur gyis/ rgyal byed kyi chol du song la rab tu'abyung ngo snyam nas/ ngoskyal/
byed kyi tshal du song ngo// drug sde rnams kyi kun rtaspyod pa ni drug sdugang yang rung ba zhig gsi/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo ma stongs pa yin te/ tshodang ldan ba da dga' sgo na 'dug pa des de
mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'ongs pa legs so// khyod bla ba lta bu r gnas pa yin na ring mo zhig len ga las 'ongs/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ring mo zhig 'an tamathong
ba ni legs kyi/ ang dang yang mthong ba na brtas par 'gyur ro/ 'onakyang 'bugs pa rab tu byung bar 'tshal gyis rab tuphyungazhag/ bzhin bzangs khyedakyi sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste/
ba tu'akhyung ba ni mchog go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar bya ba mos bar bya ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas rnams dang/
0@#// sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de lta bas na legs kyis rab tubyu zhig
da lta mod kyi 'di la yo byad drug dgos nakhyod la yo byad drug yod dam/ 'phags pa lo byang drug po de dag ji lta bu zhig lags/ bzhin bzangs lhung bzed dang/ chutshags dang/ chos gos/
gsum dang/ gdung ba'o// 'phagasar ma mchis so// bzhin babras kho bo la yang yod de re zhig song zhig dang/ kho bos yo byad drug btsal go/ de la sngas nas gnyen dag gi drung du
song ba dang/ de dag gis khye'ade riltar rab tu'abyung ba smos pas de dag gis de chung ma blangs so// tshodang ldan pa rtse dgas yo byad drug red nas/ de dus gzhan zhig na yo khyed drug bzhag
sta man yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ des khye'u de srang du mthong nas/ des smras pa/ bzhan ba zangs kho bos yo byad drug pa de dag med de/ tshur rab tu dbyung gis
'dong/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis kyang yo byad drug red do// bzhin bzangs ci 'dro ba dag cig/ 'phags pa mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/
yang// bzhin bzangs de dzitha tshig/ 'phags pa bdag nyid rnams kyi chu ma blangs na/ ci darab tu'abyung ngam/ nyid de'i rab tu 'byung zhig bstan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi des/
ba bkachad du gyur nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas naganang gis yo
byadadrug b.rAs nas rab tu byung bar bya zhing bsnyanapar rdzogs par bya'o/ legs par gsungs ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed dka'
bas yo byadadrug pa dag rim gyis btsal nas brnyas pa slar byin cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong rab tumang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang rkun po dag gis
bcom nas/ de dag gis phrogs pa de khyer te/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas btsong bar brtsams so// dge slong bcom pa de dag kyang de nyid du 'ongs nas/ dog slong de dag gis rang gi lhung
bzed dang chos gos dag ngo shes te/ de dag gis ku cho'i sgra bton nas/ shes ldan dag 'di dag gis bdag gi lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di phyogs kyis/ dun po rnams zung zhig zung zhig
cas byas pa dang/ de dag ku cho'i sgra thos nas skrag ste bros so// dge slong rnams kyis rang rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas 'dug ste/ ca'adi bdag cag la rung ba yin nam/
'on te rung ba ma yin mi shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ de ni gang gis phrogs pa de kho
na'i yin pas de dag bsngags bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ni gang gis thogs pa de kho na'i yin nozhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan dag cig
ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang rkun po rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis de rnams gzhol bar brtsams te/ de dag gis de rnams kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos ji snyed la lag bas ga pa de ru lta
ba mad por bor nas/ de rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos kyis 'phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcomi ldan das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ ji srid rkun po ga gas khrogs pa khyer nas sbyor pa'i rgyunam bcad pa de srid dul ba med par mi bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis risrid du kun bo dag gis phrogs pa khyer nas sbyor
rgyunam bcad pa de srid du lta ba med par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ rkun po de dag gis phrogs pa de khyer nas mnyan yod du zhugs te srung du btsong ba brtsams go/ dge slong de las
kyis brogs pa de ngo shes te/ ngo shes nas rkun po do nams rgyal bo'i pho brang du khrid de/ de dag der gsad pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ gcad pa dang/ dbug pa la sogs pa/ sdug
bsngal gyi khyad par dag gis nye bar gzerazhing shani tusdug bsngal bar byas pa'i skabs de/ rag slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
la la/ rgyal po'i pho brang du skrun par ma bya'i/ 'onakyang sngar chos bshad nas bslang bar bya'o/ gal tem star na rinakhyed kyis blang bar bya'o// gal te de ltar yang ma stor na/ rin tshang/
bar byin nas blang bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed dang chos gos byas pa mthar phyin pa na rnyed par dka' 'o// klu gzhi ni mnyan yod// dge slong dag gis lci ba
skam po dang shing tshon rtse'i shal ma la sogs po bzhin du bor nas ma lta bar dong ba dang/ de dag dge slong la gas kyang 'gyod bsam grus pas de byed du chud bros pa'i skabs de/ gi slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yid gcugs pa lngas len pa/ mdza'u ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ bla ma dang/ dran par bya ba dang/
thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas len pa ni legs par blangs pa yin te/ 'dil 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis btso brag gi las
bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag gis sgo khangadang 'chags dag tuchos gos dag bcos bas de dag rdul gyis kyang gro/ ji char gyis kyang gsher ba'i skabs de/ ga slong
rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang du btso blag gi las bya'o// dge slong dag gse gtsug lag khang du btso blag
gi las bya bar brtsams pa dang/ tshon sa la ba ba khrag lta bu r snang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas snyas ba/ 'phags pa phyogs la dpe la lug bsung
dam ci/ de dag grwas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gas phyogs 'di'i btso blag gi las byas pas 'di tshon chu bo'o// de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags la gal te tshon du bon/ dpar
wA mi sdug par snang gis sa byi dor bgyid stsol cig/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal ba/ zhal zhal phyug bar
yaM khya'ongo de dag gis thams cad du tshugs pa dang/ sdothal dag ma rung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdothalatsamanab kru bar byagro/ gzhan du nu zhal nal gyis
jug bar bya// kasdom na shing rnams brgyad par gnang ba dang// nam ka gos dag dang// kha tshar ring po tshigs bcad du// bsdus nas sdem du yang dag
bstan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khabo 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// gang ga tshabcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin
lus 'phags ri la bden pa la bzhag pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos der dus ston btsugs pas/ der yul ma ga d+ha na gnas paN+Dis kho'i tshogs thams ca da 'du'o//
0 lus 'phags radzicanashang mdapa zhig pas/ ul ma ga d+har gnas pa'i kho'i tshogs tshabs gdungs pasAsu ba/ 'phags pa kye ma khyed kyis 'dir nga'ang bskyod 'dod/ de dag gis
smras pa shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// 'phags pa 'di la su zhig 'gal/ de dag kyang mi sna bar 'dug pa'i skabs du/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis shang bskyod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis shing bskyed par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
dge slong dag gis shing bcud du dong bas/ de dag de bzhin du bsams so// yul ma ga d+hi na gnas pa'i skya bo'i tshogs phyi dal lhags pa dang/ de bzhin du tshabs gas nas
smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed kyis shing de dag ma bskyed dam/ shes ldan drag bskyod na 'onakyabazhal ma byas bas ma rung ngo// 'phags pa gal takhyedakyang pha ma dag gis bskyod nas
zhal dbyas par ma gyur na/ khyed kyang ma rung bar 'gyur ro// kye ma khyed kyis zhal ta byas 'dad/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shang bskyadanas yal bar dor bar mi bya'o/ 'on kyang zhal bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis shing bskyang nas yal bar bor bar mi bya'i/ 'on
kyang zhalatabya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar zhal tabya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dus dus su
chus bcu bar bya'o// dge slong dag de kho na lhur len pas/ dag kha'i phyogs yongs su nyams par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dalhur blang bar mi bya'o//
la lar nAlig pa/ la lar ni rkang pa bkru bar bya'o// la lar ni so shing bza' bar bya'o// la lar ni lhung bzang bkru bar bya'o/la lar ni khrus bya'o// de go dgun stod kyi dus su
kha bas tshig nas/ bcom ldan s kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshas su gzhug par bya'o// dge slong dag gso tshas su bcug pa dang/ de dag nags mo sher bas tshig nas/ bcom
ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra bas bskor bar bya'o// rlungam shor bas tsha bas gdungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung gdod par bya'o// dbyar sbyang
bzhin du chus gang ste 'dug nas/ bcos ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gyi dus su rtsig pa bshig la tshu'abo bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis jisridi shing de dag
chen poraMm gyur par de dag bor tadong ba dang/ de dag de bzhin du bsgoms nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ sa ga slongashing skyod par byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong shing skyod par byed pas/ gal teme tog gi shing bskyed par gyur na/ ji
srid du ma rtog ma chags pa de srid du'agro ba ma bya'o/ 'on te 'bras bu'i ngo shang bskyadabar gyun/ srid du 'bras bu mi chags pa de srid du 'gro bar mi bya'o khacom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong ngashing skyid par byed pas/ ji srid du ma tog dang 'bras bu ma chags pa de srid du 'gro bar ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong rnams la bya ba las ba dgu cig byung// dadag
gis ji ltar bsgrub pa ni nga shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ de dag gis kun dga' rab pa 'aa/ dge slong smos 'di ni la bcol nas 'gro bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyodabar
mi bya'o/ glugazhi rgyal po byed lab na'o/ rgyal bos 'dzin gyis rgyal ba gzugs can snying bal la kha rin po che zhig skyes su bskur ba dang/ dergyal po gzugs can snya
bos tshadang ldan pa pa lan da'i bu la byin no// rtsod ldan b pa'ani da'i bus de gyon nas dgon pa'aganas su song ste 'dug pa dang/ rkun po rnams kyis rgyal po sa 'dzin gyis/ rgyal po
gzugs can snying po la la ba rin po tshe zhig bskur ba de/ des 'phags pa ba lan da'i bu la byin pa dang/ des de gyon nas dgon ba'i gnas chagamo zhig na 'dug go zhes dzilta ba bzhin du
thos nas/ dedag phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams ba/ 'ashes ldan dag de skad ces grag na 'di la jiltar bsgrub pa bya/ kha cig gis smras pa// 'dilasu zhig/
bsgrub tuyod/ tshur dong la dbrog mod/ dedag dong ste sgo la dal gyis brdzus pa dang/ tshe dang ldan bab lanida'i bus smras pa/ 'disu zhig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag
zla ge nan pogo ci 'dod/ 'bags pa la la kha rani bo che'o// bzhin babrangs dag gal te de lta na skar khung nas lug ba skyong zhig/ de nas gcig cig gis lag pa brkyang ba dang/
tshadang ldan pa pa lan da' khus la ba rin po tshe ma 'a chad cig/ ma 'tshig cage/ 'dren pa na zadapar ma gyur cigaces de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ skar khung nas de'i phyogs gcig
byung ba dang/ rkun pa rnams kyis drasa'ang drangs nas phung por byas tadras nazad du ma btub nas/ de dag gi mtshon gyis gcad par brtsams na yang ma mchod/ mas bsreg par
brtsams cha yang 'tshig tum btub nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa pa lin da'i bu bdag cag la ci zhig mtho btsam thong zhig/ des smras pa/ skyes bu gtig dag khyed
kyi mtho ma bsaMms na des ji ltar mthobatsam/ khyed kyi stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa nges draanas dzilta ma gtang/ de dag gas stsas pa//
shes ldan dag 'phags pa pa lanipa'i bu zla'aphrul chen po mthu chen pos ma btang bar chad 'dzin pa 'ongs na rang gas/ bros ta'adong ngo zhes de dag bros so// skabs de dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'adus la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ nyes dgas gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag de lta bu'i rin pa tshadag gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas nag
ba las gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dge slong gis de lta bu'i rin po tshadag dgon pa'i gnas su bkur bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong
lani nga'i lus la ba rin po tshod 'dra ba gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas su 'dug pa gang yAn pa ni la legs pa zhig byas so/ de lta bas na dge slong gis la ba napa tsho de lta bu gyonanas dgon pa'i gnas
su 'dug pa ma bya'o// 'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang dge slong dgon pa'i gnas na gnas pa gang zhig la/ la ba rini ba tshod lta bu bdog pa des khyim du gzhag par bya'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis la ba rin pa chade 'dra ba khyim du gzhag bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug pa gzhanazhig la chenakho la 'os pa'i la ba grub pa des/
dakhyim du bzhag pa dang/ srog chags dag gis tshugs pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
na ma ra kas btab ste bzhag par bya'o/ gal te de ma rnyed na shing kun nam/ bsha ka'i lo ma ma/ a rita'i lo mas rim pa rim par btab nas gzhag par
bya'o rim pa mi gdab tu 'byor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal ta'abyob sod na stong du btab nas gzhag par bya nu dus dus su bskam par bya'o/
gleng gzhi gnyan yod 'o// gang ga tshokhyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshol phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe/ de dus dus su ston pa'i zhabs dang/
ge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la phyag 'tshal du 'ong ngo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dgun ka dge slong rnams lhags pas sbrubs nas bkums taganas khang dag na nyal nang 'dug go/
rgyu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ston parinabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba des/ dag sbyong de dag dge ba'i phyogs btang ste de banan du 'dug pa mthong nas/ sa sus ba/
'phags pa gcig tubartsonapa'i bstan pa la sta dge ba'i phyogs btang ste bzhugs/ de dag gas snas pa/ khyim bdag lhags pas sbubs so// de cang ma bar rkang pa la phyag byas te
b+hU song ngo// des khyim du phyin nas gos lnga brgya dge 'dun la bskur ba dang/ dge slong rnams kyis ya tshe rab cad nas btsag dang tshon gzhan gyis ci dgar dgurakha bsgyur te gyon no//
00 nakhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pas/ ga slong rnams kyi gnas khad du bltas na gos de dag mi snang nas/ des snyas pa/ 'phags pa
gos de dag ma gda' na/ khyod kyis gang du bzhag/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsad pa dang/ des snas/ 'phags pa khyed kyis chanapo la 'os pa'i gos de lta bu chud gsanano//
kyan khyed kyis kha tshar rade po nyung dang dkar poragazhag dad/ dadag spobs pa mad nas chud mi zer bar 'dug ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyis gos sarapa kha tshapa ring po 'di po dag bcang bar bya'o// 'dul ba phran tshogs kyi gzhi las
sgo bzhi pa rdzogs so// bsdus pa'i sdom na/ lus dang gleng ba sangs rgyas dang// sbyang ba dag dang nga 'dus dang// mtshams las phyi rol dge slong rnams // dus
ston rgyu bar btus pa 'o// sdom ni ro nibasreg par bya ba dang// shAri'i bu yamachodarten dang// der ni dus ston bya ba dang// dung dang nya phyis tshong ba'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargya la durgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamed thas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas ba des rigs mnyam
pa las chung ma blus te/ de de dang lhan cig ces bya ba nas/ bu pho zhig btsas tade btsas ba'i btsas stonazhag bdun gsum nyishu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas
sa dang mthun pa'i ming btags te/ bsrings bskyod nas tsha por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dzatsam dus gzhan zhig na/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
tubyung ba dang/ de'i khams ma mnyam nas na bar gyur// de na ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro khyus nam na tudus las 'das so// de dge slong dag
gso lhung bzed dang bas chos gos dang bcas par lam dang lub zhig tu bor ro// jitsam na lam de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag 'gro ba de dag gis de mthong ste/ dran khacig gis snas pa/shes
ldan dgo shAkya'i bu pa zhig dus las 'das so// gzhan dag gis snas pa/ tshur shog blta bar bya'o// de de dag gis mthong nas ngo shes te/ de dag gis snus pa/ shes ldan dag
'di ni khyim bdag mag mo'i bu yin te// dag sbyong shAkya'i khu ba mgonamad pa rnams kyi nang du rab tubyung bas/ gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to// 'di dag gi nang du rab tu byung bar ma gyur
na nya dungag gas 'di yi gro byas par 'gyur ba zhig/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dog slong dag de
lta bas naganang gas/ dge slong nga shi ba'i rim gro bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong shi ba'i rim gro bya'o zhes gsus pa dang/ dge slong dag ji ltar rim gro bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsreg par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsreg par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'dir srin pu'arags brgyad khri yod do zhes gang gsungs pa de dag rilta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nye bar 'khor de skyid ma thag
tud dag kyang skyo la/ shi ba'i tshe de dag kyang 'tshimod kyi/ 'on kyang nu'i sgo rnams su btsugs te bsreg par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsreg par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ shing ma
'byor nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chu klung dag tu dor bar byako/ chu klung med nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa brkos tagazhug par bya'o// dbyar kha sa yang 'khrus la shing yang srog chags kun ng gyur na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thabs kho'i
phyogs su mgo byang phyogs su bstan te sngas su rtswa'i bam po bzhag la glo g.yas pas bsAl te/ rtswa lham le ma'i tshogs kyis g.yogs la yon bsngo zhing rgyud chags gsum gyi chos mnyan pa
byinanas 'dang bar bya'o// dge slong dag de bzhin du dong ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams nari bskyal nas khrus ma byed par de bzhin
'dra ste/ gtsang sbra med do zhes 'phya bar byed nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du dong bar mi
bya'i 'on kyang khrus bya'o// de dag thams cad bkru bar brtsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ thams cad khrus ma bya'i/ gang dag reg pa de dag gis gos dang
bcas tapa kru bar bya'o// gzhan dag gis ni rkang lag nyi tshabakru bar bya'o// de dag mchod rten laphyag mi ma[% ]la nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mchod rten dag la phyag
'tshal bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis kyi kun
tu skyod pa ni/ dus dus su sems can dmyal bar ang glu zhing 'dong/ dud 'gror yang 'dong/ yi dgas dag tuyang 'dong/ lha'anang du yang 'ang/ ma dag tu yang rgyu zhing 'dong ngo//
