dganyis dus gzhan zhagi na dmyal bar rgyunang 'dong ba las/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen por son pa dang/ der tshodang ldan pa ri'i bus/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu
chan po la smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ dmyal ba pa'i saMmasan rnams ngal sos par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
bzhin du bgyi'o zhes/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ltar mnyan tanam mkha' la 'phugs nas/ char shing rta'i srog shidatsam gyi rgyun dbab par btsums pa dang/ tshud mnar med pa'i
lce'i 'od kyis par du skams par gyur to/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri bus lcas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gzhes shig dang/ bdag gas ngal sos bar bgyi'o/ des skyas ba/
lags kyis de bzhin dungal sos par mdzod cig ces sa/ tshadongaldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu che na pas bsdad pa dang/ chadang ldan pa shAra'i bus ting nge 'dzin mos pa can zhes bya bal
snyoms par zhugs nas/ des mnar med ba chen po de bsal bar byas te/ mnar med pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad do// de nas de gnyis kyis rdzogs byed chos
bag bar ston pas lus chen por gyur cing/ de'i lce la yang gsholo lnga brgyas rmad pa mthong ba dang/ des smras pa de 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ gal ta'adzan/
kha'i klong du gshegs na/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bdag gi mchi nas ngas chos log par bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs mang po bslus te/ ngalas yang dag par byas shang
kun tu spyad pa des/ lce la gshol lnga brgyas rnad cing/ khyed kyis jilta ji ltar nga'i mchod nal brjod pa byas pa de lta de ltar pal sdul bsngal ches ma ba zad par
gyur gyis/ phyin chadam byed ba thong zhig ces mchi'o zhes gsungs shig/ tshadang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu dag gis rdzogs byed la cang mi sna bso khas blangs so/ tshod
ldan pa shAri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu mnar med pa nas grwa snang bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i khab tu dong ngo// de gnyis rgyal po'i khab tuphyin pa dang/ kun tu rgyu datsug gos su spyi phud can dag
ga phyir byung nas/ de dag kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dag sbyong 'di bajug go/ kha cig gis smras pa/ de bzhin kho nar bags nam legs te/ klan ka btsal
nas 'jug par bya'o// de dag gis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sngar song ba dang/ de dag gis de la snas pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu kun tu 'tshob
dag la dge sbyong yod dam/ des tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ kun tu 'tshol dag sbyong med// shAkya rnams kyi nang na yod// dgra bcom dag la chags ldan med// bus pa so
so'i skya bo'ong med// de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa ri'i don khong du ma chud nas/ u0f8b de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'dis ni bdag cag gi bsngags pa smras kyis/ su yang
[o]]cigang ma snakhar 'gror chug cig ces byas de song ngo// tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu phyi bzhin du'ong ba/ sdon gyi las kyi rnam par sman pa 1bar gnas pas/ dal nas dal
nas 'ong pa de de dag gis mthong nas/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bukun tu'atshob dgra la dag sbyong yod dam/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kun tu 'tsho ba dug la dag sbyong ga la
yod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ 'di la dge sbyong dang pa yod/ 'di la gnyis pa yod/ 'di la gsum ba yod/ 'di la bzhi pa yod kyi/ 'di las phyi rol pa la ni dpe/
sbyong dang bram ze mad de/ pha rol rab tu ba rnams ni dge sbyong dang bram zes stong ngo// de lta bas na 'di'i 'khor gyi nang du sang ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags so zhes gsungs so// gzhan
yang khyed kyi ston pa dmanaramad pa chen por skyes tachos loge par bastanapas/ lus chen por gyur cing lce la gsholo lnga brgyas rnyed do// des nga la than btang ba/ bdag gis tshangs
pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la/ ngas chos log par bstan bas spyi bo'i tshogs mang po bsras 1/ ngolas yang dag par blangs 'di kun tu spyad pa des lce la gshol lnga brgyas rnyed cing/
khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar pa'i mchod rten la brjed par byas pa de lta de ltar nga la sdug bsngal ches mi bzad par gyur tozhes gsungasangashig [”]ces zer ro// de dag rjes nas smras pa/ shes
ldan ga mgo rig ngan pa bdag cag la khazer bar ma zad/ bdag cag gi ston pa la yang ma snyan pa zer na/ riltar bsgrub par bya/ denakha cig gis smras
ba 'di la bsgrub ci yod/ 'di taporagatal du zad mod/ gzhan dag gis sbas pa/ sngar yang bdag cag gas smras pa yin/ de de bzhin du brngog gis tshur/ khyed nar kadakabatsal
nas bag go zhes zer bden bdag cag dang bdag cag gi ston pa la kha byas pas don gyis grub bo zhes/ de dag gso de yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin bcom nas dogo/ tshadang
ldan pa shAri'i khus/ tshadapa ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus spogs snyam bsams nas/ des phyir log ste bltas na/ jitsaman yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom nas gal
'gyel ba mthong ste/ sa snus pa/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di pas/ des smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu las su zad mod/ gzhanatsazhig yin bar 'gyur/ tshod
ldan pa shA ri'ibus smras pa/ tshodang ldanupa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ khyed bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog ma bstan nAmA/ de ji ltar gyur/ des smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa
shA ri'i bu bangag las kyis nonabs smra zhes bya ba ya nga ma nan/ rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ rma dang ldan pa mo'u 'ig la gyi bu byis pa chung ngu
bzhin du bla gos kyi nang du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du khyer ba dang/ drag slong dag gis de lta bu'i mi sdug pa mthong nas sbrangs ta'aganas/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dris pa/ 'di zhig/
dus sbas pa/ tshudwapaldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu kun rgyu dbyug thogs pa rlobudarnyan rnams kyi 'dilta bu r byos mod byas snas te/ des yul gyis sa la bsnyal lo// dge slongags smras pa/
tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis spro 'phrul can gyi mchog tu bstan pa ma mnyin m/ des snas ba/ bstan na tshodang ldan pa dag las rnams kyi mthu la ltos/ gang
gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzas rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bas bskul/ rab tubaskul/ kun tu rab tu bskul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul/
tshang dang mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tubastan pa de/ dalas kyisanon nas rje zhes bya ba yang mi dranan/ rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyi dgos/ don dge slong gang dag 'phags pa'i lam ma skyes
pa de dag ma dga' zhingang shin tu skyo nas gonapa dang/ nags khrod dang bso mtha'i gnas mal dag tuganasaM nas/ gdi la byed pa bskyed par brtsams so// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
kun tu/ kun rgyu dbyug thogs su phudatan rnams kyi 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po brtags te// man lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcomanas/ de 'phags pa kA li'i
khus bu chung ngu bzhin bla gos kyi nang du bcug ste da ma'i tshal du khyer nas srog gi lhag ma cung phrad cig lus/ ring po ma thogs par dus khyed bar 'gyur ro zhes
bya ba'i sgra de gragasanas/ srog chags brgya stong dus 'odoma'i tshal du 'dus pa dang/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i blon po dag gis/ lha 'gas pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po kun spyakhyug thogs
sh+tsa spyi budatsana rnams kyis 'jigs te/ mnalag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom nas/ 'phags pa shAra'i bus des bus pa chung ngu bzhin du bla gos kyi nang du bcug ste 'od ma'i tshol du tshal
mtshon/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig 'dus te/ ring po ma thogs par dus bgyid bar 'gyur ro zhes sbran pa dang/ des bres nas khros tadi rnams la smras pa/ 'gos ldan ngag kun tu
rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams tshol cig ces smras nas/ debatsun lo 'khor dang/ gzhon nu dang/ po brang 'khoragyi ma ga dang lhan cig 'od ma'i tshal dusong ngo// de nas skya bo/
tshogs mang pos skyol ba mthong nas lam phye ba dang/ de mug mchims gang zhung snying rje skad du mi dga' ba'i tshig gis las dris pa/ 'phags pa mo 'gal gyi bu chadape 'dicizhig/
desalcas pa/ rgyal po chen po las su byas mod/ gzhanan cizhig tu 'gyur/ 'bags pa khyodabcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrul canagyi mchog tubastan pa ma ninam/ rgyal po chen po
[I•]nga de bzhin tubastan mod kyi) las kyasekon pas 'o kyang zla zhes bya ba mang ma dranan/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das ni gnyis su ma gsung ba ste/ bcom
ldan 'as kyis 'di skadadudu/ bskal ba brgya phrag rnams suyapo// las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ ces gsus//
pa de nyid bar gnas par gyur to zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal pos gos kyi mtha' mas mtshim phyis ni// sman pa thams cad bkug nas bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gal ta3phags pa mo'u 'gal
gyi bu chen po zhag bdunasos par ma byas na/ khyokyi dbang thang ga cad par bya'o zhes bsgo ste/ blon po dag la yang gtad nas song ngo// kun turlu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyang thos nas/
bros so// sa napa rnams kyis pan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ 'ashes ldan dag rgyal pos na di skad bka' stsalan/ 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ 'bags ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
ni bkras la/ de'i yan lag dang hring lag thams cad 'dam bu bzhin du bcom pas/ de ji ltar gso bar nus/ ya de nyid mkhru chab rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas de nyide la skyabs su 'dong ngo//
kha cig gis smras pa// legasakyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'duganas/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas snus ba/
'bags pa bdag cag la lhas 'di skyed du/ 'phags pa mo'u 'galakhyi bu chen po zhag bdun nam sos na/ khyed kyi dbang thang gcad do zhes bka'any+tsalan/
khyod ni bgres bas ston bzhin du bgyi bar bdag cag gis rtsom sgrig ste/ khyod nyid spro 'phrul chazhang mthu chabs/ ji ltar bdag cag gi dbang thangagacad par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du
gsol// sa snusal/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na depal/ rgyal po ma skyes dog la/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bdag nyidi zhag bdunanargyal bo'i khab tubasod snyoms
la 'jug go zhes gyis shig/ de dag rab tudaga'anas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i thad du song nas/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te snus pa/ lha
'gas pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo bdag nyid dgung bdun na rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la 'jug go/ rgyal po'ob tu dga' nas snas ba/ shes ldan dag gal te da lta legs go/
dzitsaman ga bdun len ba dang/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi ban pa rang nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis mi bde ba do med par byas te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so// dgra bcog
ba rnams kyi ye shes mthong ba ni bsams pas 'jug pas/ tshodang ldan b kA ri'i bus tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rab d nan/ ci'i phyir bdag nyid rgyal po'i khab tu bsod/
snyoms la zhugs shes bsams pa zhugs n/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod bar mthong ngo// da de dang mdza' ba'i bag chags kyis rgyud bsgos pas/ de nyid kyi nyin par nas na
bar gyur te/ des bsams pa// tshadang ldan pa molu'agal gyi bu chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' na/ bdag tu sta 'dug/ bdag chos sder mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam dubasams
ta rgyal po'akhab nas grong na la dar song ste/ de na tshod ldan pa shA ri'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i grong khyer na lad na rim gro pa dag sbyong ga chad skul byed dang/ nad tshabs chen pos ma bde zhing
sdug bsngal ta'adug go/ de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu nad de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang grong khyer shAng thags can du song
nasaM de'i phyi dro yongasasu mya ngan las 'dus so// gang ga tshatshadang ldan pa shA ra'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'atsho/ dge slong phal cher dbang dang ldan pa sha stag brgyadakhri
yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// gang gi tshe tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yongs su mya ngan lasu 'das pa de'i tshayang/ dge slong phal cher dbang dang ldan pa sha stag la bdun khri
bdun stong yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// denas dge sbyong gi chod skulakhyed kyis/ tshong ldan ba shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel la lus kyis mchod pa byas te/ ring bsrel dang/ lhung bzed dang
chos gos dag khyer nas/ rgyal bo khab ga la ba der rgyunange song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba na rgyal bo'i khab tuphyin to// dag sbyong gi chod skul byed lhung bzed
dang chos gos cham du phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus taM/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'aning pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dag sbyong gi chod skul byed kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod
cig bdag gi mkhan po btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de'i ring bsrel dang/ lhung bzed dang/ chos gos kyang 'di lags so// de nas tshadang ldan pa kun dga'
bos dag sbyong gi ched skul byed khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'adug go
phyogs gcig tutradug nas/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunub dge sbyong ga chad skul byed 'debadag ganganab der mchis te
mchis nas/ bdag la 'di skad du btsun pa kun dga' bos mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag gi mkhan pa btsun pa shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de'i ring bsrel dang//
lhung bzed dang/ chos gos kyang 'di lags so zhes mchinas/ btsunang bdag gi lus gdung bar gyupany+tsade/ phyogs kyang bslad/ chos thos pa'i rnams kyang bskyang bar gyur to//
bam po nyi ku rtsa gcig pa// kun dga' po bya dgo slong shA ra'i bus tshul khrims kyi phung po khyer tayongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/ btsun
pa ma lags so// ting nge 'dzinagyi phung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam b.ragrol ba'i bung pe dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pang pa khyer tayongs su mya ngan las 'das/
sam btsunapa ma lags so/ gang yangs nyid kyi mngonapar shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tapa shapa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dranang lcabar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par
spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'bags pa'i 'a mnalag brgyad pa ngag khyer dayo/
su mya ngan las 'das som/ btsun pa ma lags te/ btsun pas padang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshul khrims kyi phung po 'chol tuyongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
bo yong ma lags/ shes rab kyi phung po yang ma lags/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang ma lags/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'tshal tamya ngan las 'das pa
yang ma lags/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyug tabashad pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdunadang/ 'bags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa dag 'tshol tayongs sumya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ mang du thos pa/ chog shes ba/
'dod pa chung ba/ rab tu dben pa// brtson 'grus brtsams pa// dran pa nye bar gnas pa// mnyam par gzhag pa/ shes rab can/ shes rab myur ba/ bshes rab mgyogs pa/
shes rab rno ba/ nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab can/ nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can/ shes rab tshab/ shes rab yangs ba/ shes rab zab pa/ shes rab mnyam pa med pa/
tho/ shes rab rin pa chodang ldan pa/ yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/ yang dag par len du 'jug par bgyid pa// yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyid ba/ yang dag par rab tudaga' bar
Sh+Tha bgyid pa/ gang dag par ston pa dang/ yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang/ ang dag par rab tu dga' ba'i bsngags pa dpa/ 'khor bzhi po la/
[oj]chos ston pa na du ba ba ma mchis ste/ bdag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i chos dang/ chos kyi longs spyod gang dag 'gas pa de dag rjes su dran na/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yongs sumya/
ngan las 'das pa de'i slad du dbyar ngan dang skya sngags 'donano// kun dga' bo khyod mya nganam byed/ blong bar mu byed/ rtsa sngags 'don par ma byed cig gang skyes pa dang/ byung
ba dang/ byas pa dang/ 'dus byas pa dngo/ bsams pa dang/ rtecing 'brel par byung ba de ni 'jig pa'i chosany+tsani// dadang ldan pa la 'jig bar mi 'gyur ba de ga la
gong de/ de ni gnas mdado// kun dga' bo ngas snga nas khyod la 'dod pa dang/ sdug pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad nu'agyes pa dang/ med pa dang/ 'bral
ba dang mi ldan par 'gyur bar ma bstan nas/ kun dga' bo dper na/ ljon shing chan po rtsa ba dang bcas/ sung pa dang bcas/ sdong po dang/ lamA dang/ 'dab ma dang/
ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa'i 'dab ma gang ches mtho ba de dang por lhung ngo// rinapo che'i ri chen po'i rtsa ma gang rgyas mthu ba dag kyang dang por sIl la// de bzhin dusangs
rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag 'dun bzhugs pa'i nang na dge slong shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ dge slong shA ri'i bu phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs der ra thugs
khral chung ngur bzhugs so// 'di lta sta/ dge slong shA ra'i bu gangan ba'i phyogs de ngas stong ba ma yin bar mthong ngo// de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod
mya ngan ma byedu/ blong bar ma byedaM/ sbo sngags 'don par ma byed cig/ gang skyes ba dngo/ byung ba dang/ byas pa dang/ 'dus byas pa dang/ bsams pa dang/ rten cing 'brel
par byung ba de ni 'gro pa'i chos can// de dung ldan la 'jug par ma 'gyur pa de ga la yod de/ de na gnas mdo// kun dga' bo ngas snga nas khyed la 'dod pa dang/ sdug pa dang/
dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad ni 'gyas pa dang/ med pa dang/ 'bral ba dang ma ldan par 'gyur bar ma bstan nam/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na da lta 'am/ pa'adas kyang rang
tshu bdag nyidagling dang/ bdag nyid skyabs dang/ chos gling dang/ chos skyabs dang/ glang gzhan ma yan pa dang/ skyabs gzhan ma yin par gnas par bya'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ kun
dga' bo da ltar ram/ nga 'das kyang rung gang dag bdag nyid gling dang/ bdag nyid skyabs dang/ chos gling dang/ chos skyabs dang/ gling gzhan ma yin pa dang/ skyabs gzhan ma ni
pa la gnas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong bslab pa 'dedapa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// ji ltar dge slong bdag nyid gling dang/ bdag nyid skyabs dang/ chos gling dang/ chos
skyabs dang/ gling gzhan ma yin pa dang/ skyabs gzhan ma yin bar gnas pa yinazhin ! 'a na dge slong nang gi lus la lus rjes su lta zhing/ 'jid 00 pa
ya ma bde ba bsnul nas/ rtan pa dang/ shes bzhin dung/ dran pa dang ldan par gnas shing/ phyi'i lus dang/ phyi nang gi lus dang/ nang ga tshor ba dang/ phya[', ]la pa dang/
phyi dang nang gi tshor ba dag dang/ nang ga soms dang/ phyi'isoms dang/ phyi dang nang ga soms dag dang/ nang gi chos dang/ phyi'i chos dang/ phyi dang nang ga chos dag la chos kyi rjes su
lta zhing 'jig rten la brnab sems dang/ yid mi bde ba brtul nas/ tshunapa dang/ shes bzhan dang/ dran pa dang ldan par gnas pa yin te// kun dga' bo de ltar na/ yig slong bdag nyid
gling dang/ bdag khrid skyabs dang/ chos gling dang/ chos skyabs dang/ gling gzhan ma yin pa dang/ skyabs gzhanam mun par gnas pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan ng kun rtagala'o/
bcos ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su ya rongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'al te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa na snga nas gang//
rgyal po'i khab na gnas pau0f8bskya bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar kun turgyudabyug thogs spyi phud ny+tsan rnams kyis/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chenapa'au lag dang nying lab dag 'das su
bzhin du bcom pas/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu rgyud de dang mdza' ba'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa yang grong na la dar song sta sda dro yongs su mya ngan las 'dus/ tshe dang ldan
ka pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang grong shang gas nyan du song ste yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thos so// bar skabs der dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad
t+tA gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas kun myudabyug thogs spyi
bud snyana rnams kyis/ 'di'i yan lag dang nying lag dag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di nyid kyis/
las byas shIng bsags pa/ tshogs dpa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du bar gnas pa/ gdon mu za bar 'byung bar 'gyurazhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la
y+Yo 'bras bur smin// zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs// da de dang lhan tsag rtse bar
byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// der bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sams canazhugs bar gyur to/
[.]de la zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te// zhag bdun gsum chi'u gcig tud btaM sa pa'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas ming btags te/ bskyud pa srings nas rgyun por
gyur to// pas de'i chung ma blangs nas/ dad dang lhan cig rtsa bar byed/ dga'+ra bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed cing de la yang rab tuchags so// de la de'i bu pa/ tshig yid du
ma 'ong pa ngan pa sbas pa dag gis spros pa dang/ des khyo la babrus nas/ ngos de ci nas kyang tshul shin tu byams pa med pa dang/ de'i phyo dgu la phyi lang byed pa de lta da paspyis so//
des smras pa// khyod gang ga phyir de la shin tuchags pas nga la phyi lang byed dag/ da nga tshanas cang mi zer bar 'dug pa dang/ de'i chung mas bsams pa/ re zhagi kha dug cana'i lang tsho
yal yong rang gi khyo la chags pa cung zad mi gtong zhing/ bdag gi khyo la gshe bar byed do snyam du rig nas/ da glags cho ba zhugs so// ji tsam na dus ba/ nyan zhibag rol mya skar
ma dang sbyar te khrus byas nas/ dridang me tog dag gis lus brgyan te/ nyim ma nub pa kho nar des khyim mi dag la yang ma brtags par khyo dang lhan cig gsung ba stod do// de na ru 'a
ma des khyo de khrid nas cinas kyang phyogs der son pa de ltar byas pa dang/ jitsam na pa dang ma gnyis gsang ba spyod pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ kha dug cana'ang bdag la ni khyod
bud mdu la shan tuchags so zhes g.yo bar byed na/ 'di da dung ya nga zhi ba mad de/ khyis ma dag la yang su rtog pas dus ma nub pa nyid du gsang ba spyodadosnya
du byams nas khros te/ gang zhig 'di gnyis kyi yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin 'dzoms pa de 'gatra mdadam zhes ngag gi las rtsub mo smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
'a bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam dusamAs/ dre'i tshade'i dus na bram ze'i khye'ur gyur ba gang yin pa de na/ ga slong mo'u 'gal gyi ba 'di nyid yin te/ gapa 'dis sems 'khrugs
pha dang ma la ga gi las rtsub mo smras pa de las kyi rnam par smani pas/ tshorabs lnga brgyar 'di'i yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom ste/ daltarasrid pa tha ma/
gnas tha ma/ lus tha ma/ b.reganyid tha ma thob ste/ rdzu 'phrulacan gyi nang mamchog tubastan pa'i bar du yang yan lag dang nyang lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom par gyur to/
dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig suganag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tuganag/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gacig tungakar/ 'dzinam rnams kyi yang
'drenama'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tuganag pa dang 'dres ma rnams spangs nas/ las gcig tudakar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de
ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ ngag snying de las [“]dag ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dpad+ha
yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa kun turlu dbyug thog pas dar mas kyis/ tshedapa 11 a nga
dang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi bu chen po de bdegs pa su gzigs/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis bka' stsal u0f7cpa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'barwa ni ma yan kyi 'das pa'i dus nA yang
ji ltar[u0f7a]bA ri'i bu ni btang la/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ni badregs pa de nyon su// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na khye'u dang bu mo dag cig rtsal de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis
shig mthong nas/ de dag gis snus pa/ bas bre'u spyi phu ga dag pa rje kaM/ yang lcas pa/ re zhig ma reg par dri ba zhig dris la/ gal te sis mag par byas na/
brtag/ ji lta ma yin nu brtsegako de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gcig la dris pa// dus gong du grang/ des bsams pa// drilta bu 'asamasakyis 'di dag bdag la 'dra sus na/
dus gor ma chag papa 'di dag rdeg par 'dod par shes nas/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grang ngam gal te dro yang rung/ gang ga tshon rlungs langs pa// rlung gis btab
na grang ba ste/ rlung ma ba yi grangab med// de de dag gas btang nas/ cig shos la dras pa dang/ das sbas pa/ dgu grang modacis byas pa dang/ de de dag/
gis brdegs so// dge slong dag ji snyam dusams/ btang ba gang yin pa de nishA ri'i bu 'did yani/ brdegs pa gang yin pa de ni mo'u 'gal gyi bu'adi de yin te/ de'i tshoyang shAri'i bu nib
[% ]la mo 'gal gyi bu ni brtsegs so// da ltar yang shA ri'i bu nibatangal/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu na bags so// yang jiltar kA ri'i bu nabatang la/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ni bajigs
ba ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba chu klung bskams pa shol cig na/ khye'u dang bu mo dag cig rtsa ba de dag gis shing shal ma li'i ma tog chu'i rgyun gyis khyer ba nAg dang/ bram ze'i
khye gnyis shig 'ong ba mthong sa zhes bya ba nas/ de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gcig la dris pa/ chus khyer ba 'dici zhig/ des bsams pa// ci'adra ba'i sags kyis 'di dag bdag la
'di snyam na/ gor ma chags par rjeg 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhi ren// ngas kyang tshigs su bcad de lcas ba/ stobs dang ldan pas tshar bcad pa// nges par 'byung ba tshol ba yis//
shal ma las mi bsam ste// skam gyi pad+mayin par bsam// de de dag gis btapanas/ cig shos la dris pa dang/ des lcas pa/ ma mthong// shing shal ma li'i me tog a
[55 54 55 : 5 TINHTEN FT HTẾ Nay ! GNSSEN VI GIÀ ]/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'akhab na ji tsam
dgyes par bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing/ ltogs so// rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang ma gyis nyamed du spyod/ muny+tsan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon ci bas[']a
dag dar ba dbazhugs so// khyim bdag mgon med wis sbyin gyis/ 'phags pa ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de'i ring ma srolAnAtha ga[ry ] gnas nas bas btsa
zhes thos so// khros nas kyang tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na bar de song ste phyin nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i/ nga pa la/chis ta na la go bos phyag 2 la[']ti/ phyogs/ sngags ka kA pa
ge phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ phyis bdag mgon mdabras sbyin gyis/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod cig
'phags pa shAri'i bu ni bdag ga na rang po nas sdug pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ bla a dang/ dran par bgyi ba lags nA/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'dras/ de'i ring bsrel khyedakyi
phyag nama' ba de dag bdag la stsol cig dang/ de'i ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa bgyi'o// des smras pa/ khyim bdag de ni bdag ga yang yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 3 yid du
'ong ba dang/ bla ma dang/ dran par bya ba yin pas/ bdag nyid de'i ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa byed do// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'aduganas/ byami bdug
mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bun bdag ga yun ring po nas sdug pa dang/ yid
tshadu 'ong ba dang/ bla ma dang/ dran par bgyi ba lags te/ de'i ring bsrel 'khags pa kun dga' ba'i sug pa namachis pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la sul du stsol b.ragasol/
a bdag de'i ring ba srol la rang bsrel gyi mchod pa 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo pos bkug nas 'di skataces bka' sal to// kun dga' bo dge
slongashA ra'i bu'i ring bsrel rnams khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byinal/ de mchod pa byed du chug cig/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ni don 'dis nu dad pa canayin no// kun dgarnga bo gnyan
zlayang 'di tsas kyis ni khyod kyis nga'i bstan pa la phan byas pa ma lan lenopa ma yin no// de lta bas na khyod kyis rab tuphyung zhago/ bsnyonapar rdzogs par gyis shig gnas byin cig/ dge slong
ga chad nye bar zhog cig/ de dag la yang dreltar thonapa bzhin 'don du chug cig/ 'dzin du chug cig/ slobs shig dang/ 'di tsam gyis na khyod kyis nga bstan pa la phan btags pa dang lanalan/
pa yin no// da nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' s/ ston pa'i bka4ga khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin l/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ring sa srol dag byin te/ 'di ltar nga la ldan 'dis sngon byang
chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ lan 'ga' yang yab yum da/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang/ gzhan bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag ga tshig ma bcug pas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med
zas spyan gyis/ rmadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel dag khyer nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song sa phyin nas/ de dag khyim spyi mchog gi nang du mthonapo zhig tu zhal nas/ nangam dang
bcas ga 'a bo dang/ rtsedudang/ pu nu dang bcas te/ mar ma dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/ srid/ 'brangapa nga/ byug pa rnams kyis rgyud pa phya pa pabatsums so//
mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skya bo tshogs kyis dziltar 'phagasab shA ri'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i krong na la dar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i ring bsrel ngag/ 'bags pa kun ng gal bos blangs
nas khyim bdag mgon mdo zas sbyin lakhyane to/ des de dag khyim du bzhag nas lhung gi mi dang bas/ mdza' bo dang/ gnyen bshes dang/ panu dang bca[']1/ sapa dang//
[. ]bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/ dri dang/ 'brang ba dang/ byug pa dag gis mchod pa gles so// de bzhin du yulako sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang gros nas/
btsunamo 'bring ldan m dang/ rgyal gis dbyaratshul ma dang/ drang srong byin dang/ rAti pa dag dang/ ringags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang/ gzhan yang dad pa can mang po dag dang lhan cig bdag
thams cad machod pa'i yo byad dag khyer te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du dong nas/ de rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad dag gis mchod par brtsams pa las/ der kha cig gis yon
tan gyi tshogs dgathob bo// jitsam dus gzhan zhig nakhyim bdag mgon mang bas sbyin ra 'ir zhig tubya ba cung zad cig byung nas/ des der sgo bcad nas song ngo// skya bo phal po ngag de bzhin
du 'ongs ba dang/ jitsamun sgo bcad pa mthong nas/ mi bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sgo bcad de song bas/ des bdag cag gi bsod nams kyi bar chad byas so zhes de dag 'phya bar
byed gzhog 'phras byed/ smod par byed do// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin r 'or denas 'ongs pa dang/ de'i nung mas smras pa/ khyim bdag skya bo'i tshogs chanA bo mchod pa'i
yo byad thogos te'ongs pa las sgo bcad ba mthong nas/ des bdag cag gi bsonams kyi bar chad byas so zhes 'phya bar byed/ gzhig 'phyas khyed/ snyod par byed do// de 'di snyam du 'api da
bdag gis bya ba yin no snyam du shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad kyis gsol te// datsunang 'bab sa pa ri Tilngal rab tu dpa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po mchod pa'i yo byad dag thogs
bdag gi sdum par mchis pa las/ bdag bgyi btung grang cig gi slad du rgyab phyogs pa ku ma nas gzhan du mchis pa dang/ de dag khyim bdag mgon med byas sbyin kyis so brgyad du song bas/
bdag cag gis bsod nas kyi bar chad byas so zhes rang du bar bgyid// nad 'du bgyi/ snod par bgyid do// de slad du ga la ded pa com ldan 'das kyis gnan/ bdabad ba sa lA pas/
pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten phyogs lcang yal can zhig tubagyis la/ der skya bo'atshol sa chen po bag yas sumachod pa bgyid du stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim
bdag de lta bas naganang gas byos shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ des ji lta bar bya ba shes nas/ bcom ldan 3das kyis bka' su la
pa ram gyis bang ram bzhi byas la/ de nas dus rten bya'o// de nas bum pa dang/ bro dang/ srab shing dang/ gdugs gcig dang/ gnyis dang/ lagasum dang/ bzhi bya ba nas/
bcu gsum gyi bar du bya zhing/ chang khab dag gzhag par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod rten de lta bu bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ des ci rdathags pa kA'i
ka ba 'ba' zhig la mchod rten rnam pa de lta bu byas/ 'on te 'phags pa thams cad la bya ba mi shes na/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang/ rtsom ldan/
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag re zhag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni rnam pa thams cad rdzogs par bya'o rangasas rgyas kyi ni chur khab ma gzhug par bya'o// dgra bcom/
wAba'i na gdugs bzhi'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i nagasum mo/ phyir 'ong ba'i naganyis so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i nag cig go/ so so'i skya bo dag pa rnams kyi na mchod rten ni byi bor bya'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis 'phags pa rnams kyi mchodA nani rnam pa 'dis so// so so'i skye bo'i rnams kyi ni 'dis so zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ des grangags gnas gang du bya ba mi shes nas/ bco
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ riltar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ shAri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi ba dag 'dug pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchodan
yang bya'o// gzhan yang gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi mchod rten ni rgan rims bzhin byung bar bya'o// so so' skyo bo dge ba rnams kyi ni dag 'dun kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol tubya'o//
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol pa/ gal tabcom ldanu'adas kyis gnang na/ bdag gis 'phags pa kA ra'i bamachod rten gyi dus ston dag bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gnang gis gyis shig/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ji ltar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i
mchod rten gyi dus ston gzugs par gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis 'dzugs par gnang ba thes nas/ ma la bdag gas kyang de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/ nges 'di ltar dril bsgrags
nas 'ashes ldan tan yod na gnas pa'i grong khyer ba rnams dang/ yul gzhan nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus stonal bab
ba'i tsho/ zong thogs nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de la sho kas yang mad/ la gcan yang mad/ gru btsos kyang mad kyis/ dbag yasu 'dir shog cig/ bar skabs der rgyu mtsho chen po
nas tsho ba lnga ba zhagi gru bo che'i nor grub sta nyanayod du phyin pa de dag gis/ jiltar rgyal pos mnyan yod du dril bsgrags pa 'di skad du/ gang zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten
gyi dus ston la bab pa'i/ zong thogs pa'ong ba de la sha gam yang med/ la gcanayang mad/ gru btsas kyang med kyis/ de bag yangs su 'di shog cig ces bsgo ba thos nas/
kuny+tsa// re zhig rgyal bo 'dirang ga bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas kyang/ bsod nams dag gis ngoms mi shes te/ sbyin pa dag sbyin basod nams dag byed na/ bdag
pha cag gis ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi sbyin/ bsod nams dag mi bya snyam nas/ de dag yid rab tudang ba skyes te/ dus ston de'i dus su/ dung dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig la sogs pa
phul ba dang/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bsgrub ba mingashes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lo/ bud dungagang dag yin pa de dag ni shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gakhrag
la dbul bar bya'o// gzhan yang nyung shas shogi ni/ shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten de'i bcos legs bya bar bzhag la/ lhag ma ni ga 'dunatshogs pas bgo bar bya'o// de de bzhin gang shogs/
pa'i mchod rten gyi ma yin gyi/ shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi yin te/ de lta bas na 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/// sdom ni glang dang dran pa nyid dang ni// skabs dbye ba dang skya ma bya/
lung 'bog pa dang gso sbyong dang// dgag bya 'jog par byed pa 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/
bzhugs so// dge slong drug sde dag gas nyes par mthong ba dang/ nyas par thos pa dang/ nyes par dogs pas dge slong dag la klongs so// dge slong dag la nyes pa mthong ba dang/ nyas
bar thos pa dang/ nyes par dogs pas glengs pa na de dag bag tshabazhi na duganas so// de dag bag tshabazhin du gnas pas red pa dang/ skam pa dang/ sa pa dang/ lus las sum rung
bar gyur te// lung ston pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton dang/ rnal 'byor dang/ nang gi tshul bzhin yod la byed pa dag shor nas/ skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan rus kyis dgos pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag/ dge slong la nyes par mthong ba dang/ gu pa rwathos pa dang/ nyes par dogs
bas gleng ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis/ dge slong la nyes pa mthong ba dang/ nyes par spros pa dang/ nyes par dogs pas gang bar mi bya'o// dge slong gis redasu ba
mthong ba dang/ nyes par thos pa dang/ nyes par dogs pas dge slongal gleng bar byed na 'gal tshabs nyenadu 'gyur ro// gleng bar byed pa ji lta bar dranapar byed pa dang/ skabs 'byedapar
byed ba dang/ mi sna bar byed pa dang/ lung 'bog par byed pa dang/ gso sbyong 'jog par byed pa dang/ dgag dbye 'ag par byed pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa/
nas cad snga ma bzhin dubarjod par bya'o/// sdom ni sangs rgya sa mtshan nas smos pa dang// tshodang ldan pa kun ma spyad// 'phral thabs can la ma dad dang// nubul
ba mdor nabasdus pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la paNA sa drang srong skya ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
sha dge slong lnga ba dag la bka' stsal ba/ bag slong dag ngas sngo nam thos pa'i chos rnams la/ 'di nasdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhi yi da la byas pa na/ khi skus so//
shas pa dang/ shig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyas so// dge slong dag drag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o//
rtsa'adi ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba 'phags pa'i lam mo zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na/ mig skyes so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyas so// dge slong
dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bdenapa dmangon par shes pas yos su shes par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yadril byas pa na/ ga skyes so// shes
pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas spang bar/
bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na/ mig skyes so// shes pa dang/ sa pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs po skyes so// dge slong dag ngas sngonam thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal
kun 'byung ba 'a bags pa bden pa de mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na/ mag skyas so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa
skyes so// dge slong dag ngas sngonam thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de bsgom par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pan/ mag
skyes so// zhes pa dang/ grwa ba dang/ blo dang/ gas paskyas so// dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'gas pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas/
yongs su shes so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na/ mig skyas sa// shes pa dang/ rig pa drang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag ngas sngonam thos pa'i chos rnams la/
sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bdon pa de mngon par shes pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na/ mgo skyes so// shesapa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs
pa skyes so// dge slong dag sa sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas mngonam du byas so zhes tshul bzhin yod la byas pa/
na mig skyes so// khashes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyurab 'phags/
0 @#/ pa'i lam de mngon par shes pas bsgoms so zhes tshulakhazhin yade la byas pa na/ mgi skyes so// shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes so//
dge slong dag nga la ji srid du 'phags pa'i bdenapa bzhi po 'di dag la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i mig skyes pa ma gyur/ shes pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ blo
ma yani/ rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du/ nga 'jig rten lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dag sbyong dang bram ze'i skyo dgu dang bcas/ lha dang ma dang bcas pa 'di
[% ]las grol pa dang/ nges par byung ba dang/ pral ba dang/ rab tu grol ba dang/ phyin eg dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyur/ de srid du nga bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas so snyam du shes par ma gyur gyi/ dge slong dag gang nas bzung ste/ bal 'phags bsribaden pa bzhi pa 'di dag la de ltar lan gsum du
bzlas te/ rnam pa btsuganyis pa'i mig skyes/ shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa skyes pa de nas bzung ste/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcasatshas
pa dang bas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas/ lha dang mi dang bcas pa 'di sa grol ba dang/ nges par byung ba dang/ bral ba dang/ rab tugrol ba dang/ na lag dang bral ba'i
sams kyis mang du gnas par gyur/ de nas bzungs pa bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam du shes par gyur to// chos kyi rnam gras 'di bshad/

ba na tshadang ldan pa ko'u dpyadang lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mag rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa ko'u di rgyal bka' la
bag ko'u di ru khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal te/ ko'u dar+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal te// tshodang ldan pa ko'u ji
nus chos kun shes pa de'i phyir/ tshadang ldan pa ko'u di ru mang kun shes ko daru zhes bya bar chags so// tshodang ldan pa ko'u nga dus chos kun shes ba na/ sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin rnams
kyis sgra byung zhing dbyas rjes su bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ spyi bamang po la bdeb dang/ 'jig rten la khrugs brtsi ba dang/ lha dang mi
rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ 'jig rten na dge sbyong ga/ bram ze ma/ lha ma/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa gang gis kyang chos dang mthunapar ma bskor
ba'i chos kyi 'khorale chos dang mthun pa lan gsum du bzlas tarnam pa bcu gnyis ba 'dayul rA NA sa drang srong sna ba ri dgas kyi nags su bskor bas/ lha' i dag nimangonapalaphal
bar 'gyur/ lha ma yar gyi ris dag ni yongs su nyams par 'gyuro// sa bla ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi sgra bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang/ rgyal
chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas/ skad cig dedang/
thang cig de dang/ yud tsam de dngang/ skad cig dang/ thacig dang/ udatsam de la tshangs pa'i 'gi rten gyi bar du sgra grags par gyur/ tshangs ras pa'i lha rnams kyis sgra phyung nang dbyangs rjes
su bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag bsnyom ldan 'das kyis lha dang ma rnams kyi zhes bya banas/ 'di yul wA ra NAs drang srong lha ba ri dgasakyi nags su bskor bas/ lha'i ris dag ni mngon
bar 'phel bar 'gyur/ lha ma yin gyi ris ngag ni yongs su nyams pa 'gyur ro zhesakhyu ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags
su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun pa lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa bskor te/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya'o// gang gi
[% ]tshobcom ldan 'adas kyis dge slong lnga bo dag gi rgyud la chos kyi'akhor lo bskor to/ de dag bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por gyur pa de'its+tsaM/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la shAni
tumtshan nas smos pa dang/ gdung nas smos pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu sbyos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed de bzhin gshigs/
ba la shin tu mtshan nas smos pa dang/ gdung nas smos pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tum spyod cig/ dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu
mtshan nas smos pa dang/ gdung nas smos pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyod pa do ni/ skyes bu gtimug de la yun ring por gnod pa dang/ phan pa la yin pa dang/
sdug bsngal bar 'gyur go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ nyes dmigs ga cung zadabyung ba ni/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang/ gdung/
nas smos pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tusbyodapa las gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dge slong gis de bzhani gshags pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang/ gdung nas smos pa dang/
tshe dang ldan pa zhes pa kun tu spyad par bya'osnyam du gos nas/ dge slong lnga bdag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan
nas smos pa dang/ gdung nas smos pa dang/ tshadang ldan b zhes smos pa kun tu dbang ma bya ste/ kun tu spyongan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang/ gdung nas smos pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun dusbyad pa ma bya sta/ kun tu spyod na 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong gzhon nu gzhon nu dag dge slong rgan pa rgan pa dag la mnge nas smos pa dang/ rus nas smos pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun
spyonganas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la'/ dge slong gzhon nus dge slongs rgan pa la ming nas smos
pa dang/ sa nas smos pa kun tu spyad par ma bya'o// 'on kyang tshodang ldan pa zhes bod pa dang/ btsun pa zhes bod pa gnyis kun tu spyad par bya'o// dge slong gzhon nus dge slong chas/
rgan pa la mang nas smos sam/ anas smos pa kun tu spyod na 'gal tshabs canangu'agyur ro/ gleng gzhi ni nyan yod na'i// mnyan yod na dge slong 'phral thabs can dung
dge slongam gsong mo dzit+ta dziltar skya bo'atshigs mang po mi dad par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed ces bya ba rgyas par rnam par 'byed pa las jiskad 'byung ba bzhin no/
[E ]/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyadakyi ta'akhor shing sa la zung gi tshal na bzhugs so// denas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshad na/
dge slong rnams la bka' stsalal/ dge slong dag nga sa 'dul ba rgyas par bstanan/ mdo bsdus tu yang ma bstan pas/ legs par rab tunyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshadad//
dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon gnang ba yang phud/ bkag pa a med pa gang yin pa de yang gal mi rung ba stan cing/ rung ba dang mi mthunan rung ba ma yin pa yin pa'i phyir spyad par mi bya'o//
gal tarung ba stan cing/ mi rung ba dang ma mthunan rung ba yin pa'i phyir spyad par bya sta/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya// kasdoman sngangs pa dag ni 'gyodapa dang// sbrang ma
rnams kyi skyabs dang ni spyas tshogs dang nagyi lo dang// sra rkyang gding dang mang bo 'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyalakhu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mo da zas
sbyan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig la chos gos kyi sbyang ba byung nas/ dus de rgan pa' mthar logs su 'dug sta dag 'dun la spangs so// dge skos kyis bsams pa/
'di na dge 'dun gyi da pa grub pa yin te/ sngal nas bgo bar bya'o snyam nas/ das de sngal nas dge 'dun la byams pa dang/ dge slong de 'phangs par gyur to// skabs de dag
slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag spang ba dge 'dun la sngangs pa las
gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dge slong gis dge 'dun la sbyang bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong drag dge slong nag
gis sbyang ba dag 'dunal sngas pa dang/ de dag skos kyis stsal tabagos kyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sdang bar ma bya'i/ 'onakyang gang zag la spang bar bya'o// gal te/
ma shes pas spyas na yang dge 'dun gyis bgo khar mi bya'o// dge slong gas srung ba dag 'dunal spas sa// dge 'dun gyis bgos naganyis ka 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
'a bcas ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi spong ba dge 'dunal snang bar mi bya'o// 'on kyang gangabrag la spang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan zhig la chos gos kyi snang ba
byung ste/ ngas dag so mi shes pa zhig 'phrangs pa dang/ des blangs nasatapam pe zer bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnamasakyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ btortsa/
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gzhan gyis brda sprad par bya ste/ gal dbyin na legs/ ngesnyam star namathus phrogs la byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rung bar bya ba'i
N+Ne phyir spangs pa yin pas/ sngangs pa gtan bkur bar ma bya'i/ 'on kyang sangs pa slar sbyin par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni yangs pa canan// dbyar gyi dus su dge slong dag sbrang
dbu mchu rings kyis bros te/ de dag g.ya' stasan mos lus kun phrugs pa dang/ bar bar du khrag gi thigs pa dang zor bu dag byung bar snang ngo// daltar lus mi sdug pa de dag khram ze
dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed ci zhig gis lus kyi gnas skabs 'di lta bu gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyadapa dang/
da dag gras smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed sbrangaskyubs mi 'chang ngam/ bzhinab zas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na ji ltar bcang/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs
nyanayin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnad
gis dge slong gis sbyang skyabs bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'adus kyi sa dge slongags sbrangaskyabs btung la rakhya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong gis ci 'dra ba bcang par ma
shas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o lal/ ras srid du khru ba'i nang du khru do pa do shal brgyangs la stanganas dgab par bya zhing sa khru bcu gnyis pas ngos
khor yug bskor bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis las de ma lus par byas pa dang/ glo nas sbrang bu mchurangs dag 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
ras lhag ma dang bcas pa bcang bar bya zhing des glo nas dkri bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis sbyang skyabs byas nas/ ras de phyogs gcig nas btag
sta 'dzul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo gdod par bya'o// dge slong dag gis sgro thad kar btod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
shu snol mar bya'o/ tshanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nyid du bsil yab gzhag par bya'o// 'og nas sbrang ma mtshumangs dag 'juganas/ bcom ldan 'as
kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas ma gyis dgab par bya zhing rnam pa gang dang gang gis sbrang ma mtshungs khra ba do thams cad rung bar bya'o// glang gzhinamanyan yod na'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis chub tsag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ ga slong dag lag bas chutshags 'dzin bas de dag la bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
zla stsal pa/ shil btugs tabacog par bya'o// dge slong dag gis shing la btags tabatsagasana'on kyang ngal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyu gu/
gsum bcang bar bya'o// ga slong dag gis dbyu gu gsum la btags na 'dug tu ma btub nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag phug la sradabu 'am
gzer bus sbrul la chutshogs gdags par bya// dge slong dag gis chu tshogs btags nas chu blugs pa dang/ phyadas la kho nas/ bcom lda 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci
sa sa la ma 'bo bar dran pa nyabar gzhag sta glugs par bya'o/ dge slong dgags bam bra zhabs mgad par bzhag pas de 'phril nas/ tsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
zhabs nagazhug par bya'od gaslobagazhan dag cig gis chu blang bar brtsams pa dang/ chuyabs su chags pa'i skabs de/ dge slong mas kyis// bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba gcal gzhug par bya'o go slong dag gis ci zhig gzhug ba mngashes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skul
ba bya ma 'am ba glingag lta ba'o// 'on kyang ma chags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ tshags rten snod bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis tshags rten
snod bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis ji lta bu btang ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ tshags rten snod na gnyis te//
zas las byas pa dang sa las byas pa// dge slong dag gis tshogs rten stod lag pas bzung ba dang/ de dag ngal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ zangs
las byas pa gang yin pa de na bug la lcags thag 'dram pas dbyu gu gsum lagadugs par bya'o// sa las byas pa gang yin pa de ni phug la bregs
'a gdags par bya'o/ tshutshags gzhan dag chum phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol ba/ de dag gi grur yang dang yang du bab par bya'o/ dge slong ngag churtog ba na bum
bam gang ba la brtags pas srog chags dag ma rtogasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bum pa legs par bakang la ji srid du chuyi g.yo ba desAdang gzhag par bya zhing/
nas brtag par bya'o// khyim pa bkang ba dang stong du jul zhugs pa/ dge slong dag gis de ma bsal bas/ srog chags dag ma rtogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
sul pa/ rdul bsal nas brtag par bya'o// dge slong dag gis srog chags ma ba mo'i ri chos bstan pas de dag 'gul te/ mig gis ma srod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ shing bu'i rtse mo 'am/ snu'irtsa mo 'am/ phra mo gzhan yang rung bas bstan par bya'o/ dge slong dag gis chu tshogs nying nas chu khron par pho ba dang/ srog chags
dag rdab bsnan pas gnod par gyur nas/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa' pa/ bsal tshogs bsrel bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis bkangs btang na phyir gang bzhani du
'ong ba gang yin pa de lta bu basal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtang stabatangan phyir stong bar 'ong ba ci 'drab de 'dra ba bsral bar bya'o// kazhan dag cig gis
bsal tshogs ma 'byor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis ni chu tshags the gus btags la ci nas kyang so btang na phyir stong par 'ong ba de lta gtang bar
bya'o drag slong dag gis chupho nas tshutshags bshalakhar ma byed/ 'khru bar mi byed/'chi bar mi byed/skams par byed/ltob par mi byedunas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
tshutshags kyi chu pho nas dbashal bar bya/ bkru bar bya/ bcing bar bya/ bskam par bya/ b.lub par khya'o// dge slong dag dag 'dun tshuyang chu tshugs kyis 'tshog
par byed pa dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun phal chas pas skyo bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ gal tadge slong gi dge 'dun la chab r rgyun//
tshutshags mang bo bcang ba A/ anganabum tshugs gco'u can bcang bar bya'o// 'byor ldan 'das kyis dus tshogs gtsa'u h+phun gyis bcigapar bya'ozhes bkalastsal ba dang/
dgo slong dag gsakhum tshogs gci'utan ngalta bu ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa'am zangs las bus pa'i dbyibs lta bu bya zhing/ dal pa'i sIpaye
lta khu'i bu ga dag gdod par bya'o// de dag bsdu ba'i phyir de dag gi stang du ga chen po gcig gdod do// de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir 'og tu gce'agazhug par bya'o/
a de nas stangaras kyis g.yogs la chub tsag b.rang zhing/ ras de yang bashal bar bya/ bkru bar bya/ bskam par bya'o// bam po nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa
klu dge slong dag gas shig dang/ rtsorashag dang/ srog chags gzhan dag g.yang sa nas bor ba dang/ de dag dran pa nyams shing gnod par gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams
khaM kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srog chags thams cad ga yang sa nas dor bar mi bya'o// de dag gis gang bab bab tuper
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gar bab bab tu dor bar sa bya'i/ shig ni ngas ma'i nang du gzhug par bya/ de ma red naka ba'i sar ka 'am rig pa'i bgar
chugacig/ smyu zhig ni na'u gseng sngon po sa phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ gdam ngan bsal ba'i phyogs su// srog chags gzhan yang rang rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya'o/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa nyi bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa chab btsugs pa ma brtags pa 'chol du rung lags sam/ 'bar 'khor mig gis
ma brtags na mi rung ngo// btsun pa chab btsags pa brtags pa 'tshal du rung lags sam/ rtsa bar 'khor migags brtags pa'i phyir rung ngo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod
na'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dag 'dun gyis sa brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rkyal gyis thos nas/
des dag 'dun la sra brkyang phul lo// de bzhin du btsun mo 'phrang ldan ma dang/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang/ drang srong byin dang/ rnying pa dag dang/
bya mkhan dag dang/ gzhan mang po dag gis sa brkyang phul ba dang/ dge slong dag gis sa brkyang gcig cig byin gyis brlabs nas/ lhag ma gzhan de dag nyid la slar bsgyur
bar brtsams pa dang/ de dag gis 'phags pa 'di dag ni bdag cag gis dge 'dun la phul ba lags pas/ bdag cag slar dzaltar 'tshal/ skabs de dge slong dag gis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir gnang gis blang bar bya zhing/ blangs nas kyang bstanapa gding ba'i dge slong mang po bsko
bar bya'o// ji ltar sngar bskos pa de las phyis gcig gding bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams ni gzhag par bya zhing/ da na dbyar gnas pas khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i
redapa yin bas/ dbyar gnas pas khas blangs pa'i dag 'dun tshogs pas ci dgar bgo bar bya sta/ 'di la 'gyod pa mi bya'o//
sdom na nga'adas pa la sbyin mdudang// ga pa gis bsngos pa ngasha ba dang// gang la btad pa go ba dang// babs pa dang ni 'gyod pa 'o/ sas rgyas bton
ldan 'das mnyan yodranargyal ba rgyal byed kyi chol mgonamad zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra kha na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim khangag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung
ma blangs te/ dra de dang lhan cig rtsi bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyodabar byed do// de rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod
par byed pa las rim gyis bu gsum byung ngo// de rnams kyi tha chungs gang yin pa de lags par gsungs pa'i blo sa 'dul ba la rab tuphyung ngo// de dus gzhanazhig/
na lces rgyunIte song ngo// ltos myunangasong ba na de'i pha nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/
'bras ba'i snyan rnams kyis rim gro byos kyang de'i nad de 'a bar ma gyur te/ ga ga tshadal shi la thug pa'i tshor ba byung ste/ ring por mi thogs par
'chiba'i dus byedapar la 'gyur ba de tsho/ des ga'u be dang gnyen dang phu nubo dang/ khyim tshes rnams bsdus nas
bu de gnyis las pa/ bu pa'i khyim macung phra ci yod pa de thams cud khyer te shog cig/ de dag gis kyang de'i tshig mnyan tathams cang khyer tu'ongs pa dang/
des mdza' bo dang/ gnyen dang/ phu nu de dag dang/ khyim tshes kyis de la snas pa/ 'ashes ldan ng gson cig/ bdag gi bu gsum yod pa las/ phu bo gnyis ni
'di dag yani/ tha chus gang yin pa de ningag sbyongashAkya'i bu'i nang du rab tuphyung ngo// de'i phyir bdag gi khyim na nor gang nyung brad ci yodapa de thams cad de rnams mnyam
par bgos shig ces smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing// mthonupo'i thal ni rul bar 'gyur 'duba'i mtha' ni'abrul ba ste// gson
po'i mtha' ni'achib yini// zhes bya bas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur te/ do gas gos ston pa dang/ dmar po dang/ sarapo dang/ dkar po
dag gis brgyan tadur khrodadu khyer nas bsregs so// de'i bu de dag gis de'i shing btang ba dang/ mya nabasapab byas ta'adug go/ de'i bu des bdag gi pha de shi'i
zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du bdag song lam yar mo de dang/ phu bo de dag la chos bshad de mya ngan bsang bar bya'o snyam dubasams nas/ nga
srid 'dod par ljongs na 'dug nas lhung ba zadadang chos gos khyer tomanyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song nas/ rim gyis rgyunang song ba las mnyan yod du phyin to// dros chos gos dang lhung
bzeng rgyal byed kyi tshul du bzhag ste/ lam gyis dub pa ngal bso nas rang gi khyim du song ngo// nang ma rnams kyis domathong nas ngus so// ngu ba de thos nas khyim tshos rnams 'dus
khal la ni skang phyu sta nga/ la la ni mig mchims gang bar gyur to// de so so'i skye ba yin pas/ skya bo'i tshigs chen po skye zhing 'dug pa thos nas/ de yang mig mchims
gang zhing 'dug pa dang/ da khyim tshes kyi bud med cig gis sbas pa/ bu mya ngan ma byed cig/ khyod kyi pa de bsod nams byas pas lha yul du song ngo// khyed la yang phas dza
bo dang/ gnyan dung/ bunubo dang/ khyim tshes rnams bsdus tunorakyi sum cha zhig kyang byin no// des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'angs nas 'dul byin/
sug ces zer ba ni mad pa yin no/ zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni 'di lta bu yin no snyam du rig nas/ nga de'i phyir mya ngan byed pa ni ma yin gyi/ nga'i pha de dka' ba byung sbyong
pas dub pamang par mchi ma byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang pa ma nib la dka' ba byed// stod pa dang/ gso ba dang/ bskyadapa dang/ 'dzam bu gling sna tshogs ston
baAn/ bu'i phrag pa gcig gis pha blangs shang/ cig shos kyis ma blangs pal bcu tshang bar bkur bar byas pa dang/ sa chen po 'di la nor bu dang/ mu tig ngang/
ba chu dang/ man shes dang/ byu ru ngang/ dngul dang/ gas dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ sdug dang/ pad+mang ga dang/ g.yas su 'khyil ba de lta bu'i dbang phyug gi bangag
por bzhag kyang/ 'di saMm gyis bus pha dang ma la phan thogs ba dang lan len pa ma 'gyur gyi/ gang zhig gis pha ma de dag ma dadapa las ngadapa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par
len du 'jug/ gzengs bstodapar byed/ 'phul ba byed/ 'jog par byed/ rab tu 'jog par byed cing/ tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims phun sum tshogasapa dang/
'jus pa gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang/ shes rab 'chal pa shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par lenadu'ajug/ gzengs bstod par byed/ 'dul bar byang/
'ag par byed/ rab tu'ajog par byed na/ de tsam gyis nubus pa na la phan btags pa dang lan bun par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das
nas de la byin cig ces zer ba ni sbyin pa yang ma yin no zhes bkag go/ bud med de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong dag gis// bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas ni khyim pa las dgongs de tagasus pa la gAn gyi/ 'on kyang rab tubyung ba las dgos/
ba yin no// khyim pa dag ni chags pa dang bcas bzhin du 'chibar 'gyur la/ ba tubyung ba ni ma yin no// de lta bas na de'i phyir khyim pa 'di snyam du/ nga 'ongs nas 'di la
sbyin no snyam dusams pa ni byin pa yin gyi/ rab tu byung ba ni ma yin pas blang bar bya zhing/ blangs nas kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du longs spyod du yongs su spyad par bya'o
la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong zhig gis/ dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos so// des de dag bsngos nas dus las 'das pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis
da khyer nas sreg tu song ngo// de'i bar du dge slong des de'i gnas khang nas de'i chos gos de dag blangs te rang gi gnas khang du bzhag go/ de nas dge slong de dag ga sa de'i rim gro byas nas
gtsug lag khang du log pa dang/ dge skos kyis de'i gnas khang du brtags na/ jitsaman lhung bzed dang/ chos gos gsum dang/ chutshags mthong nas/ ngesarganapa'i
mthar khyer ba dang/ de la dge slong de dag gis sbas pa/ tshadang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i chos gos gsum po 'di khyer tu 'ongs sam/ de'achos gos rung bar byas pa gnan yang
mang du yodan/ de dag kyang khyer te shog cig/ dus snyas la/ de'i gnas khang na ni 'dir zad kyi/ gzhan cung zad kyang tshud do// dge slong dag gis sas pa/ tshodang nupa
pa'i smos 'drinadge slong tshage mo zhes bya ba de la dris shig/ des de la dris pa dang/ smras pa/ bdag gis khyer to/ des bdag la bsngos so// skabs de dge slong dag gis/
bcom ldan 'adas la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 3ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ go slong dag rung bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gnang ste/ gang gis de dag khyer ba de la 'di skad
nyes gyis shig/ shi ba ki yo byad kyi dpa de dag dge 'dunal phul la/ rang gi skal bas chog par gyis shig cas kyis shag/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
dge slong gzhan zhig gas/ dge slong zhagi la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang/ gang la bsngos pa de dus las 'das so// de dge slong rnams kyis dung khrod du khyer nas bsrugs te
slar 'ongs nas/ pa'i chos gos de dag rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang/ de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa 'a de dag su'i yin/ des smras pa/ 'di dag ni bdag
bde lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis de la bsngos so// dge slong dag gas de ngeltar bsgrub pa la shes nas/ skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom
ldan 'das largyas par gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rung bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gnang mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang gis bsngos pa de nyid kyi
yin no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'i// dge slong gzhan zhig gas/ dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang/ gang la bsngos pa de babs nas/ dus
bsams pa/ bdag la dge slong des chos gos dag bsdus pas bdag babs mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag bdag dbang gis len du 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong de'i drung du song gyu/
des smras pa/ 'phags ba khyod kyis chos gos dag bdag la bsngos na de dag bdag la stsol cig skabs de dge slong dag la brjod pa dang/ de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub ba minas
nas skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ tus dmags gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong gang
khe dal yid brtan de/ chos gos dag gtams pa de kho na'i mdun du rdo ba las gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dag slopags gal yid brtan te/ chos gos dag gtams pa de kho na'i mdun
du bsngo bar ma bya'o snyam du dgos nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na ngag song gas tshad brtan zhing chos gos gtams pa de nyid kyi mdun du chos
gos bsngo bar ma bya'i/ de'imangonasum dubasngo ba ma byas na des mnyes dmigs der ma 'gyur ro// glang gi na mnyan yo na'o// dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge
slong zhagel chos gos dag bsngos te/ gang la bsngos pa de 'thab krol can zhige lta/ rtag tu dge slong dag dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed pa las/ de gzhan zhag dang 'thab
mo byas nas 'gro bar chas pa dang/ gang gso de la chos gos dag bsngos pa de gtang bar brtsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gro nog ces des de bzung ba dang/ 'dug tu ma
btub bo// des yang dang yang du bzlog pa dang/ de la dug slong zhig gis sbas pa/ tshadang ldan pa 'din 'thab krolacanazhig ste/ rtag tudge slong rnams la ma bde bar byed pa yani
gyis theng zhig/ des smras pa gzhanagyi phyir 'di ma gtong ba ma yigyi panyid kyi chos gos ga 'di la bsngos pas 'di 'dzin to// skabs de dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te yadi brtanapa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa nag yan/ de la yodi brtanatabasngo ba bya sa nas
gzung bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ma bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gal tayadabartan pa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa zhig yin na/ de la
yang chos gos dag bsngo bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong yul ngashin tu skrag rang pen 'dag pa zhig la chos gos bsdos te/ da dus las
'das par gyurapa dang/ dge slong des dge slong de ji ltar dus las 'das par gyur pa rang zhig le nAs thos pa dang/ dge slong de 'khyodab skyes so// skabs de dge slong dag la
smas pa dang/ dge slong dag gas/ bcos ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang grwa tsho zhes pa de'i tshogazhan la bsngo ba bya ste/
'di 'gyod par mi bya'o/ kasdom ni mtshams kyi phyi rol 'jug pa yis// dad pa mi dbul sbyin mi bya/ gcig la gcig na mo bya dang// gso sbyong dang ni
dgag dbye'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong drug sde dag/
ma mas kyi phyi lan gnas kyang/ dad pa 'bul ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gso' pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba kal sa 'a/ rmas
kyi phyi rol na gnas pas drad pa dbul bar bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan
dag cig mtshams kyi phyi rol tusong ngo// de dag chas pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba zhig byung nas/ drug pa rnams kyis de dag las dad pa blangs so// skabs de dge slong dag
gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tusang ba las dad pa blang ba mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dbul bar ma bya/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tusong ba las dad pa byung bar yang ma bya 'o zhes bka' sa'ab pa dang/ drug sde rnams
mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas bzhin du gcig la gcig dadapa sbyin par byed de/ dga' bos ni'i dga' l/ nyo dgas kyang dga' bol/ 'dun pasani 'char khal/ 'char
khas kyang 'dunapa la/ 'gro mgyogs kyis ni rnab sol/ nabasos kyang 'gro mgyogasaladad pa byin pa dang/ skabs de dge slong dag gis/ com ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par ma bya sta/ byin na 'gal tshabs nadu 'gyuraro/
gleng gzhi nimanyan yod na'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi so sor thar pa'i mdogadonapa thon cig ces bka' la pa dang/
drug sde dag mtshamAs kyi phyi rol na gnas ngashang gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang/ yongs su dag pa 'bal la/ skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ mtshams kyi rol naganas pas ba/so sbyong la 'dun pa dang/ yongs su dag pa dbul bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi
phyi rol na gnas pas gso sbyol 'dunapa dang/ yongs su dgapa dbul bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong gzhan dag cig mtshams kyi phyi rol tusong ngo// de dag
chas pa dang/ dge 'dunagaso sbyong bya bar bzhed nas 'dus pa dang/ drug pa rnams kyis de dag las 'dun pa dang/ yongasasu dag pa blangs so// skabs de dge slong dag gas/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tusong ba las 'dun pa dang/ yongs su dag pa blang bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dang/ yongs su dag pa dbul ba mi bya/ ma[é]mas kyi phyi rol song ba las dad pa dang/ sa su dag pa bung ba yang
mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas bzhin du gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par byed de/ dga' bosan nyidagal/ khyodags
kyang dga' bo la/ 'dun pas ni'achar khal/ 'char khas kyang 'dud pa la/ 'gro mgyogs kyis na nab sa la/ nab sos kyang 'gro mgyogs la dad pa byin pa'i skabs de/
dge slong ngag gis/ com ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ga slong dag gis gcig la gcig gso sbyongag dad pa dang/ yongs su dag
ba sbyin par mi bya'o// ga slong gis gcig la gcig gso sbyong gi dad pa dang/ yongs su dag pa sbyin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ klong gni mnyan yod na'o//
cos ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i go slo gas gnas gsum po mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas dgag dbye bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol naganas shing dgag dbye'i dadab dang/ yongs su dag pa 'bul ba rgyas par thams cad gaso sbyong ba'i no/// sdom ni dge slong
bkrang bar bya ba dang// tshul shing dag dang gang 'dod dang// stan gcig khyim na gnas pa dang// dge tshul gis bu mi 'dug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
ta yonganargyal bya rkyal byed kyi tshalagonamod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ mnyan yod na bral ba zhig 'dug pa de bya ba cung zad cig la ra
byungs/ rgyal byed kyi tshal dusong ba dang/ derazhig 'dzin dang slong du zhi gnas 'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes nas/ das dge slong rnams la dris pa/ 'bags pa dag 'di na dge
slong duzhig gnas/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze mngashes so/ khram zes smras ba/ ul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khem gyi pu'i grangs kyang 8shes na/ khyed kyis dge slong
dag mi shes pa lta/ de dag cami smra bar 'dug pa dang/ braA wa da song ngo// skabs de dge slong+ka rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
sul pa/ dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o zhes bka' su la pa dang/ ga slong dag gis gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrangs pa dang//
phyis bang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag gsos sor mos 'dzugs shing bkrangs na/ 'on kyang bde
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sor mos btsugs shing bgrang bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag/ gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mig
sor mos btsugs shing bgrang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgrang ba ma shes so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul shing brom par bya zhing brims nas bgrang bar bya/ bgrangs nas dag 'dun la dge slong 'di skad do zhes brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'angs
kyis langashang bris par bya'o zhes bka' sul pa dang/ dge slong dag gis nyi ma 'am/ zla ba ya/ 'gangal bram pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dbyanyo ba gtod pa' tshul shing bram par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o zhes bkakanusul pa dad/ mnyanayod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de dus
sa su rgyal byed kyi tshal du skyob 'ongs te/ dos dan dge slong dag bsam gtanadang/ 'don pa dang/ yapal byed pa'i rnal 'byor la brtsonapa mthong nas/ de de dag gis spyod lam
dang spyod pa dang/ sgrub pa des mngon par dad de/ des bsams pa/ razhig 'di na dge slong ji snyed cig yod pa dris la/ phyis spyan drangs te bshos gsol lo snyam nas/ des
ga slong rnams la dris pa/ 'phags pa dge slong jisnyadacig bzhugs/ dge slong dag gis sbas pa/ 'disnyid cig go/ das rkang pa ga phyag 'tshal tu song nas/ rang gi khyim du
phyin te nang na snas pa/ sa kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag 'dun bshos gsolakyis/ khyed kyis dge slong 'disnyad cig gi pa shes
sbyor cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ rje'i sras legs de bzhin du bgyi'o/ nas de dag gis dwags dang/ bu ram dang/ sha kha ra sogs pa sta gon bya bar brtsams so// khyim bdag
ka dayang mdza' bo dang/ rigs dudang/ chu rnams sbrunanas/ bshamasazin pa'i dus su de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ rgan pa mtha' nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas/
'i ga sgos la snusal/ 'phags pa khyim bdag tsheg nag/ sang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sdum par gdugs tshod 'a spyan 'dren no zhes de skad gsus shig/
dag skos kyis smras pa dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dur gyis gnang nas/ de rkang pa la phyag 'tshal tasong ngo// dge slong gzhan dag cig kyang ljongs sgrub rgyu zhing mnyan yod duphyin to// de nas
khyim bdag de de nyid kyi nub mo bza'akha dang bcar ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas/ nang pa sngar langs tagan bshams tshur bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la pho nya bas
btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da do'i dus [”]bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gdugs tshod gdas par gsol to// ngag slong rnams snga drosham
0 thabs bgos/ lhung ba srid dang chos gos thogs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du dong ngo // bcoms ldan 'das ma gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs tshod der drangs so// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs ngashangeng/ gdugs tshod 'dren te/ lta gang zhin/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhud pa yin/ lha rnams la chos ston par
bzhed pa yin/ gnas malo la gzigs par bzhed pa yini/ nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ nyamathes rnams 'dul ba la bslab par gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa yin no//
don 'dilani bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing/ der gdugs tshod drangs so// khyim bdag des
dge slong gi dag 'dun gyi tshad bzhin stan bshams can sta gon byas pa las/ phrinus na dag song rab tumang bar mtsho+ung nas/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyed kyis
dag srungajisnyad yodapa bstan pa de snyad kyi dge slongag gdan bshams/ bangashes sta gon byas na dge slong mang du byon to// dge slong rnams kyis skyas pa/ khyim bdag dge slong blo/
khur ba dag lhags kyis rab tudaga' ba bskyed cig/ des sbas pa/ 'phags pa spyan khyed kyis dge slong gzhan dag kyang 'ongs so zhes bgyis pa dang/ bdag gis bshes
kyang mang du sta gon bgyis/ gdanayang mang du bshams pa zhig/ dge slong dag spobs pa mad nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ da na kha cig tha snyam sbyangs tsam
du gyur te/ de dag la dge slong rnams gzhi bzhin du ba ma zin tsam za bar gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsalapa/ dge skos kyis dge slong glo bur ba 'disnyad cig lhags so zhes/ dge slong glo bur ba rnams shes par byas nas khyim bdag la sbran par bya'o// dge slong gzhan dag
cig gzan gyi thadaka kho nar 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang sngonapar bya// dge slong gzhan dag cig sngar bos pa las gud du song nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang sbran par bya'o/ gzhan yang ngas dag 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/
dag 'dun gyi gnas bskrun gyi dge slong gis dge 'dun blta bar bya zhing/ gal te dge slong namang/ zan ni'ungan/ sbyin bdag la bzhin babrangs gzan nitung/ dge slong ni
mang gis snyoms par brims shig ces brjod par bya'o/ 'on te zan ni mang/ dge slong ni nyung na/ des bzhinabazas zanani mang gis 'byor pa bzhinabrims shig ces
brjod par bya'o// dag 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs tam 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/
gleng gzhi nimanyan yod na// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'cha kha snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos bregs ta/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// 4tan
yodadu bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ btsun mo 'phreng ldan ma lag la ba der song ste phyin nas/ btsun mo 'phrang ldan m la chos bstanapar brtsams so// de de la chos ston pa na
ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dog slong gi dge 'dunagyi na ba stsamakhyer nas glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas pa btsunamo 'phreng ldan ms thos nas/ des smras pa/
'phags pa glu dang rol mo'i sgra grag pa 'o na su'i lags/ des sbas pa/ btsun mo []degs 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba smanukhyer nas 'gro sgyu/ sgyu
'o nadA'i yin no// des smras pa/ 'phags pa gal dade lta na btsunamo 'phrang ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis bstabs so zhes/ bdag gi mang gis dge
slong gi dag 'dumal brjodape'i rigs so// des sas pa/ btsun mo 'jigs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zhig nad pa la rim gro byed pa de ni nga la rim gro byed pa yin no
zhes gsungs pas/ khyod kyi mang gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs par bya'o zhes smras nas/ btsun mo 'phreng ldan m la nad mad pa gyur cig/
ces byas te/ stan las langs nas song ngo// de nas gtsug lag khang du song sta/ rganapa'i mthar 'dug nas snyas ba/ btsunamo 'phrang ldan pas dge slong gi dge 'dun lan
ba sman gyis bstabs kyis/ gang zhig sman gang 'dod pa de song la slosangashig/ dag skos kyis bsgo ba dang/ dge slong rnams kyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa'achar kha/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du 'grob las dmigs bcu yod do zhes ma gsus sam/ dang ltar bdag cag gis sman gyi phyi'i bslab po las 'da' khar bya/ de spobs pa mad/
nas cangam zer bar 'dug ste/ dge slonga'aga' yang 'phrang ldan m las snyanam slong ngo// dzitsam tshadang ldan pa 'char kha yang btsunamo 'phrang ldan ma'i dar so ba dang/ des sa ba/
'bags kha khyod kyis bdag gi mi nga gis dge slong gi dge 'dun lanab sman gyis ma bstabs sam/ btsun mo bstabs so// 'phags pa gal te de lta na ci'i slad du dge slong dag mi khyon
btsunamo bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu yod do zhes ma gsungs sag/ dge slong dag 'dir jiltara'ong/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag gis
'dul ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ btsunamo tshong dusal tsho yarig tukar sha pa Na dag gtad na/ dge slong gang zhig 'dodapa da de las de slong grang/ des sa pa/ 'phags pa legs
tade ltar bgyi'o zhes/ des tshong dus pa'i tshong pa'i lag tukar sha pa Na dag gtad nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rgyal po'i pho brang du ma 'ong gis/ dge slong gang zhig gang/
'dod pa de la de byin cig/ chong pas rgyal po'i bkasakar sha pa tshadag blangs tabazhag pa dpe/ dge slong rnams kyis lha mo 'phrengaldan mas sos 'tshong rgyag mo zhig la kar sha pa
khe wicag la khur sam dang/ khur ba dang/ ma dag gtad de/ dge slong gangazhig gang 'dod pa de khyod kyis sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo ba thos nas song la bsrung ngo snyam mo// dan dgo slong kha
cig ni song nas smras pa/ bzhin bzas sha khu dag byos la byinacig/ kha cag gas sbas pa/ khe bdug la khur ba dang shaskam byin cig/ khacog gis sus pa/
kho bo cag la sha khu khrol bu dang tshog pa byin cig/ de de dag gis gtses pa dang/ smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag ni khur mkhan yang ma lags/ sha g.yos mkhare yangs
lags pas/ ngabyig 'disnyoms dbazhudal gang zhig gabazhed pa des dbagyid du stsol cig/ de dag gis snyas pa/ bzhinabazangs bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyig mganang ngo// )
das snus pa/ 'phags pa bdag ni spos 'tshong ste/ tshong dus kyis 'tshob lags na/ de lta na bdag gi 'tshob 'chad bar 'gyur ro// skabs
nga dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag la Adi brtan dkar sha pa Na dag blus nas bya 'dod/
par yongs su spyad par bya sta/ 'di'i 'gyod par mi bya'o// gangagazhi ni mnyan yod na'o// drug sde rnams khyim pa ngag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pa/
bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa canag gis mtho sa 'phya bar khyecing/ 'bags pa khyed rab tu byung ba tshangs par spyod pa yin na/ ji ltar 'dod pari'aphongs sdod spyod pa 'di dag
dpalhan cig stanagacig la 'dugacas byas pa dang/ de dag kyang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa nyun dag 'phya ba ni thog tubab bo/ dalta bas na dge slong gis khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stanagacig
la 'dug pa ma bya ste/ 'dugan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan dus kyis khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
ngag tshul dgu dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pa dge bsnyan dag gis mthong nas sbas pa/ 'phags pa khyod nya bsnyan par rdzogs pa lags na/ ji ltar dge tshul dag dang lhan
cig ston gcig la bzhugs/ dag gis smras pa/ tshad ldan pa dag 'dodag ni khyim pa ma yin// 'di dag dge slong yanan/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ de dag
cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'iskabs de/ ga slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa'[“] pa/ bsnyenapar ma rdzogs pa dang lhan
cig stanagacig la 'dug par mi bya'o// bcomaldan 'das kyis khasnyan par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig sta gcig la 'dug par ma bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rgan pa rgan pa
dag/ gsar bu gsar bu dag dang lhan mug stan gcig la 'dug pas/ gsar bu rnams rgan ba rnams la ma gus par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' sulatshang/ dran pa dang gsar bu lhan cag startagacig 'a 'dug par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bar nu lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par
