bya ste lor ma len pa dang/ lo gsum 'don pa yang lhan cig 'dug par bya zhing/ log ka napa dang/ lo bzhi len pa dang/ de bzhin du lo dgu lon pa dang/ lo bcu
bya@#// gnyis len pa'i bar yang lhan cig 'dug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis b.ran la gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya sta/ laram 'dapa dang/
ga lo gsum len pa yang lhan cig 'dug par bya zhing/ la gcig lon pa dang lo bzhi lon pa nas/ de bzhin dulo dgu lon pa dang lo bcu gnyis thon pa'i bar yang lhan cig 'dug par bya'o
zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bar na gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug pa bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag khyim gyi nang du yang/ bar na lo gsum/
zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par byed pas des stan dag ma 'byor nas/ bcom ldan 'dras kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim gyi nang du ni slob dpon dang mkhanapo dag dang yang lhan rgyag
dug pa bya ste/ 'dil 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom ni dag tshul khri'i g.yogs mi sbyin dang// dge tshul kha drang mi bya dang // mna' dang skugs 'dzugs ma bya dang/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mang zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan
'das kyis chos nyan pa'i stabasham par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge tshul dag kyang khri'u g.yogs mna' la 'dug nas chos nyan par byedade/ de dag gnyid log nas de nyid
ka[c]dubashang gci shar to/ khri'u g.yogs ma can dag ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnamasakyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ba/ dge tshul la khri'i g.yegs ma can sbyin par ma bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ tshadang ldan
bshA ri'i bu dag tshul skul byedaces bya ba de chos nyadadusong ba dang/ de la dge slong dag gis khri rkyang pa zhig byin pa dang/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir
bdag la khri'i rkyang pa sbyin/ de dag gis sbas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul rnams la khri'i g.yogs la snyan bkag go/ des smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa dgaci kho bo yang
nyes dmigs do byedadamo/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcos ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag tshul gang dag dran pa nye bar
'jog pa de dag la khri'u g.yokas mnyanusbyin par bya'i/ gzhan dag la ni ma yin no// gleng gzhi ni mnyanayong na// dge slong zhig la dge tshul zhig yod pa de la desanan
thur byas pa dang/ derkyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nangu zhing 'dug go/ drug sde las gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo ma stongs pa yin pas/ tshadang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na
'dug pa des de mthong nas/ des snas ba/ dag tshul ci'i phyir// des snus pa/ btsun pa legs dga' bdag mkhan pes nan tur byas so//
khu tshur sa khyod kyi lhung bzed dang/ chos gos drang/ dra ba dang/ phor bu dang/ ska rags dang/ khyod gang dang gang gis 'phongs pa de dang des mi 'phongs par bya'o zhes
sa de gnas khang du khrid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis nan tur byas nas yal bar dor bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang slar dgug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/ dge slong des
ba sbyong de la dge slong zhig mngags nas/ des de la smras pa dang/ das sbas pa/ kho bo la mkhan po ci dgos/ nyadags kho bo yo byad thams cad sbyar bas mi 'gro'o//
dge slong de 'phya bar byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ snyod par byedade/ bdag gis rab tu phyung banye drags kha phyung ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyi dag tshul kha drang ba mi bya ste// kha 'dren na dubyanadang nyiba'i nyes pa sbom pa 'gyur/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// drug sde rnams gang dang gang dudagos par mana' 'dor bar byed do/ sangs rgyas la mna' 'dor/ chos dang dag 'dun la mna'i
0'dor/ slob dbon dang mkhan pe la mna' 'dor ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis sbas pa/ slob dpon dag bdag cag lus pa lags kyang/ ston pa
la mna' 'dor bar ma bgyid na/ khyed rab tu byung ba lags na ji ltarastonapa la mna' 'dor/ 'di ni'atsham pa ma lags so zhes byas pa dang/ de dag kyang ma zer bar 'dug
ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can
rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab bo// rab tu byung ba na bdenapa'i bsam pa canaAn te/ dalta bas na dge slong gis mna' 'dor bar mi bya'o// dge slong mna' 'dor na 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ gleng gzhi na mnyan yod na'o// drug sde dag gang dang gang du dgos par lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang/ dra ba dang/ phar bu dang/
ska rags dang/ gzhanaya ngag sbyong gi yo byad gang yang rung ba dag skugs su 'dzugs par byedapa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed cing/ 'phags
ba khyed ci khyim pa dag bzhin du lhung bzed la sogs pa yo byadaskugs su 'dzugs sam/ de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no// de dag gis smras pa/ sgog skya zos sam/ chapa'athus
sasu 'di la mi 'tsham paci zhig yod/ de dag capa ma zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dag klong rnams kyiso/ bcom ldan das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag mas 'phya ba ni thog tu bab bo// de lta bas na dge slong gis skugs 'dzugs par mi bya ste/ dge slong skugs 'dzugs nA'agal tshabs can du
'gyur// gleng gzhin munyan yod nu'o// ga sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nangapar snapalangs nas khang thog tu'ags taphyogs bzhir lta zhing/ dadag gang na du ba
'thul ba 'am/ bya rgod ldeng ba snang ba der myur du gom pa bsring ste 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'dagadranang par sngar khang thog tu'adzags tabalta bar brtsams na/
des bya rgod lding ba mthong nas/ de ranges pa ros par so ba dang/ dzatsam na stag gis nags thabs polis phyogs shig tu gong ma zhig smras pa mthong nas de dga'// de khyer nas
rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang/ stag dri snom zhang phyi bzhina'abrangs nas rgyal byed kyi chol gyi sgo na sgra 'byin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nimakhyen bzhin du
rmad par mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la snus ba/ stag ro nis skad 'byin/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa des god ma sbes
0 pa de btsun pa nyadags 'tshal tamachis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lapa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dag stagag gongam za 'am/ brgyud 'tshal lags
so kun dga' bo ri digs kyi rgyal po sangang ge ni ri dgas bzang po bzang po dag bsad nas/ sha bzangopa dag khresangashing khrag bzang po dag 'thus nas bor te 'gro'i/ stag ni med
ma sbad par byed pas/ dalta bas na dge slong gis stag ga god ma bza' ba ma bya sta/ za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gzhanayang ngas dge 'dun
gyi gnas brtan kyi kun tu spyadapa'i chos bca' bar bya/ dag 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis ngasha 'dris pa'i 'di cinIsha stag gi god ma ma yin nam zhes dribar bya'o//
ma dris par lenan 'gal tshabs canang du 'gyur ro// sdom ni tshul shang rnams ni brams pa na// sdu na gnyis dag nugab pa dang// la ba bsgyur bar bya
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
boratshab mgatsug lag khang zhig yod de/ jitsam dus gzhan zhig na dga' bo dang dga' ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri 'or de phyin to// de dag der phyin pa ra/ dag 'dunal
yang rnyed pa 'bi grub na de dag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin pas/ dge slong gang gis kyang ma bcar ba dang/ udaga' bos dga' bo la sbas pa/
slob dpon lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag khengs pa nga rgyalatanadagacig bas gces tshur spyon/ gab sa bzhugs la 'di dag rnyedapa dzilcapa'agyedapa gzigs so// des smras pa/
legs te de bzhin bya'ozhes de dag gab sta 'dug pa dang/ dag 'dunagyis rnyedapa do bgos so// gang gi tsharing ba de bgos zin pa de'i tshade dag 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshidad ldan ba
ga dag 'dun gyi rid pa grub pa bgo'o// dge slong rnams kyis sbas pa/ khyedag las dgazod 'dir 'ongs kyi/ rnyed pa de 'dris pa'itsho yin/ dadag gis sdus pa/ ci khyed kyang/
mazhig yin nam/ bgos par mi chud kyi bgo sa/ rtsi byed kyis go bar byas nas bgos sam/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dunal dang dge 'dun gyi redapa 'drim na/ dge slong gang yang gang du yang ma 'gro nagi nyes go bar byas nas red pa bram par bya// dge
slong rnams kyis redapa de slar bsdus so// bsdus nas dge 'dun la dge 'dun gyi dab 'gan/ dge slong gang yang gang du yang ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo nas/ dadag gis bgo bar brtsams
ba drang/ dga' bo dang nye dga' de bzhin du gab sta 'dug go/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gsum pa/ gang gi tshadag 'dudagyis rnyed pa de bgos zin pa
de'i tshe/ de dgayang 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshodapa ldan pa dag tshur rnyed pa de bgo'o// dge slong dag gis smras pa/ khyed gang nas da gzod 'di 'ongs kyi/ rnyed pa de dag 'dul
go bar byas nas/ 'as pa'i tshon mA yani/ dadag gis skas pa/ gal te khyed kyis go bar byas kyang bgos par mi chud kyi bganyis te/ ci khyed kyis go bar byas nas 'bagaN+Di
bsdus sam/ skabs de dge slong rnamasakyis/ bcom ldan 'angs gsol pa dang/ btsug ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go bar byas nas 'gaN+Dib drungs te/ dge 'dun la
red ba de bris par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis yang redapa ngoslar basdus so// bsdus nas de bzhin du go bar byas te'agaN+Di brdzus nas/ bgo bar brtsams pa dang/ de dag de kho na
bzhin gab ste 'dug go/ gang ga tsho yod pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshayang 'ongs te/ de kho na bzhin snyas pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis sbas pa/ dge 'dunul yapago bar byas/ 'gaN+Di/
yang brdzus nas/ khyod ga las da gzoda'adi ra 'os/ de dag gis sbas pa/ khyed kyis kha ya byas/ 'gats+tshadi yang bas kyang/ ga khyed kyis tshul 'debrems sam/
bgos par ma chud kyi bgo nyes so zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ go bar byas te 'gaN+Di brdungs nas tshul shing bram par bya'o// dge slong rnamus kyis yang rnyed pa de bsdus so// bsdus nas go bar byas/ 'gaN+Di brdungs/ tshul shing byams pa/
bgo bar brtsams pa dang/ de dag de kho na bzhin du ga ba ste 'dug go/ gang gi tshoredapa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'os nas de kho na bzhin du sbas pa dang/ go slong rnams kyis sbrus pa/
tshodang ldan pa khyed kyis dge 'dun de ltar co dra 'am/ ga 'dun la go bar byas/ 'gatibardungs/ tshul bshadi brams na/ khyed ga las da gzod 'dir phyin/ de dag gis smras pa/
tshadang ldan pa dag rnyed pa lta ba ngashog/ gal tade lta mkho bo cag gis dag 'dun dzaltaro dzus pa sbos shagi/ gal takhyed kyis dge 'dun la go bar byas/ 'gaN+Di bsdus/ tshul
shing brams na/ de sikhyed kyis kho bo cag ga bgo skal bstan nam/ dur khrod red pa med kyang bla 'gro'o zhes zer ba'i skyabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcos ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la go bar byas/ 'galjibasdus/ tshul shing brams nas/ gang zhig ma snang ba de'i bgo skal bstan nas
bgo bar bya'o// bgos zin tu'ong ba gang yan pa la red pa sbyin par la bya ste/ gal te de ltarab gos na legs par bgos pa yin pas/ 'di la 'gyod pa ma bya'o// dge slong
gis ched dubasams tade ltar dag 'dunal co dri bar yang ma bya// dge slong ched du bsams tadag 'dunalaste 'dri bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ gleng gzhi ni
mnyan yod na'o// gang gi mkhyim bdag mgonamad zas sbyin gyus rgyalakhyed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas/ tshonatsa'i khyadapa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
phyin bcas rim bris ba de'i tshe/ mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skya bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar khyim bdag mgon mad bras sbyar gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal tshon rtsa'i khyad par rnag pa sna tshogs
kyis phyi nang bcas parimi bras nas/ mchog tuphunasum tshogs par byas pa thos/ de'itshesrog chags bam+mastong phrag dum rgyal byed kyi tshal bltakha'i phyir nye bar song ngo// yang
de'i tshomanyanayod na bram ze zhig gnas pa de la rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ grong pa rnams bram ze 'di mdzes so zhes mngonapor dad de/ desargyal po'i pho brang nas chen po la 'os pa'i
lab zhig thob bo// des de bgos nas rgyalakhyod kyi chol du ltad mo ltar song ba dang/ dmathong ma thag kho nar dad pa chen po skyes nas/ des la ba de phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
phul la/ chem ldan 'das kyis gos kyi rnyid pa byungan/ tha num mar gyi sAng po'i rgyu tsam duyang mnyam par bgo'o zhes gsus pas/ dag slopa rnams kyis
nga tshal bu rnyol bar byas nas mnyam par bgos so// bram khri des bsams po/ la ba de chen po la 'os pa zhig pasaM/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la kar sha pa tshu dag phul
la sar srung ngo snyam ste/ don par sngar las nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nadge slong mang pa dag cig 'dug go/ des smras pa/ 'bags pa dag
phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze chen po nad mad cig/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyed la la ba phul ba de khyed kyis cir bgyis/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bram ze chen pa rjes su
A leng bar gyis shig/ kho bo cag gis mnyam par bgos so// gcig cig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni bgo skal zhwa la glan no// gzhanizhig gis snus pa/ bdag gis
tshulham yu klung la klanano// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni stod kor lagar no/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis lhung bzang phyi bar byas so// des smras pa/
'phags pa la ba de chen po la 'os pa zhig na kyi ma khyed kyis de kar sha pa Na dag tub+b+hasgyur la/ kar sha pa tshadag bgo 'dod ces zer bo'i skabs de/ dge slonganams kyis/ bcom
ma rnam dag bgo bar bya'o/ gnad la bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ma mAn+tabasaa na/ rgyal po'i kAng po mnyag bsham par bya'o//
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bris zad zer ba bden/ de lta bas na dag 'dun la gos kyi rnyed pa de lta bu grub pa gang yin
pa de karasha pa Nadag tubasgyural karashapa tshadag bgo bar bya'o////sdom ni rung ba ma yin lnga dag gi/ lham ni ngagag pa mdzad pa dang // dom lpags kyi ni lham ngog

rgyal tshab dang// sangs rgyas rgyal sri nyi dang yan lag mchog/ dakhazhinalam sa 'dzinas dang gnas// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pon/
rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ skya bo

slad dag ba 'dimyurab dag la gsungs// khyod kyi bshums mo byung bas bdag 'dar ro// des kyang tshigs su bcadu do snas nga/ gal te 'di yastong du mkha' las ni// dorje'ichar drag
rab t+tabab gyur kyang// thub pa chen po'i sku yi spu nyag gcig/ kun t+tabaskyod par nus pa na/ na ro/ maM raM na chung gis sa stabaskyod pa yi// shar khum zad mtshon rnamus rtag
dang/ sbrul gdug rnams dang ra lugadug pa'i dug/ gnyen nu'i lus la bab kyang smos ma dus/[– ]ka gdab ni sa mchog mdzod 'di dang// phrad nas don ma grub par 'chi'agyur
[cz/ ]ti zhi ba ma 'thob rang gnyisu mthong nas// de yi slad du bdag ni ngu bar byas// 'jig rten dag ni gang rna su dus su ni// sa ba'i dam pamatshungs med 'di yi chos// nyan zhang khron/
nas rab zhi mchog 'gro ba// bde skyid bsod nams can de rims nad bral// rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub san sa dpas bdudo'i 'thob par thos nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ log
pa'i lta bas nyams pa ni phal cher brdzun smra ba dang/ g.yo kun tu spyod pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ drang srong mdakar bas snyas pa/ lha khyod kyi grong khyer du gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs

'dasnyam du/ kye ma drang srong ma dkare ba rkang gis ser skya'agazhi'i grong khyer du 'os kyang ma rung snyam du yun ring po nas smyon paso/ bdag skye ba la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang kho nas sor/
skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs te/ rkang khe nas 'byung gis grong khyer mdzes pa'i bgyid dul cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag drang srong mi
dkar ba rkang gis grong khyer nas 'byungags/ grong khyer dang lam mdzes par byed du chugal/ dril sgrogs pa'ang skar dusar skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang/ yul sna
tshogs dang/ ul sna tshogs nas lhags pa gzhan gyis kyang drang srong gi dkar ba grong khyer nas 'byung ge bsu 'gi skyes kyang sgo zhig/ lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes blonapo rnams kyis sar skya'i
gnya' grong khyapa de dang/ gsag pa dang/ bya mo chod par byas// tsan gyi chus chag chag btab/ prazhim potsapog par bzhag/ dar gyi lda ldi mngapo kri//
rgyal mchod pa ba dan bsgreng/ ma tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ lha rnams kyi skyod mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal ba kupalhag papadaga' galapa grong khyengamadzes pa dang/ lam mtshos par byas
tsha nas dril bsgrags 'dis rgyus shes ldan grong khyer naganas pa rnamanyam dang/ sho brang 'khor pa rnams dang/ yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye be'atshigs rig/ lhas 'diskong
ces drang srong dka ba sang dpagis sepaskya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas 'byungags/ de'i phyir khyed thams tsapakyis de ba su zhig ces bka' su/ jicud nas nangs pa dang/ drang srongam dkar
ba ma'i mchog stong phrag du mas pa kupa chenopas bskul nas/ rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas byung ngo/ legyi sa sang yang g la/ nadag kyang bskyod/ snga 'phrul
yang bsgrags so// de'i tshorna[']par smin pa'i las yosasu zad pas nad kyis thebs// rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ mi tog dang/ 'dab pa dang/ 'bras bu'i nan+nams kyis mi/
grokhyas kyipan po nye bar zhi bar ma gyur to/ don la das de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas pa la phyag 'tshal pas pa/ mkhan po gang nyung bra rab tubyung ba de thams nga nabadud
don du gnyer ba/ bdud tshol ba lags te/ de'i slad du gal takhyod kyis bdud rtsi b.res nas/ bdag la yang bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' mdzad du gsol/ sa smras pa/ bu nga yang
gang cung zad rab tubyung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba dang/ bdud rtsi tshol ba yin na ngas kyang bdud rtsi ma red do// 'on kyang khyod 'akya rnams kyi nang du gzhon nu 'khrus pa de'i
spyan sngar rab tubyungal/ rigs rlom par ma byed/ sa rlom par m byed/ bram ze'i bu rlom pa ma byedapar nga rgyal chog la/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig dang/ sun khyodabadud/
rtsi thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing// mthon po'i mtha' ni snyal pa 'gyur// phrad pasrimathar ni 'bral ba sta//gson pa'i mtha'i ni shi ba yani//
zhes bya bsadus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to// des da res bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas/ grong khyer wA rA NAsar song ste drang srong gi nang na 'dug go/ de nal da dang rus mthun pas
de'i ming drang srongan lad zhes bya bar chags so// gzhon nu rab snangam mA brgyad pa/ pang na'atshob ma me gnyis dang/ nu ma bstan pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ drim 'phyi ba'i
ma mganyis dang/ rtsan grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas/ dem ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ marasar dang/ mar dkor dang/ mar gyi sung kha dang/ gnyan nga
yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bskyed bsunges nas/ mtsho'u na 'dug pa'ipad+mabazhin du skyod drag par gyur to// de gang gi tshachenaper gyur pa de'i tshe/
yi ga dang/ grangs dang/ rtsis dang/ lag rtsis dang/ rgyal po rgyal gis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi dbang phyug la gnas pa'i ma thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil
spyi 'khor rnal du phab ste gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang dag med pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang/ rta la zhon pa dang/ shing
rta'ithabs dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ 'phongadapyad dang/ phyir bsnur ba dang/ mdun du bsnur ba dang/ lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang/ zhags pa gdab pa dang/ mda'
bo tsha'aphan pa dang/ gcad pa dang/ dral ba dang/ 'dzin stangs dang/ gom stabs dang/ thor tshugs dang/ rgyang nas phog pa dang/ sgra grag par phog pa dang/
gnad duphag pa dang/ mi 'chor bar log pa dang/ chobs chen po de dag lamakhas par gyur pa/ gnaso lnga la yang byung bar gyur to// gangag[]byang chub sams dpa' bcom
ldan 'adas gzhon nu'i rol pa la rol pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu rab snang yang gzhon nu'i rtsa ba la rtsi'o// gangag tshabyang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tudabang bskur ba de'i tshe/ gzhon nu
ba snang yang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ro/// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgan po dang/ nadapa dang/ shi ba gzigs nas skyo ste sbrang ma dang/ ri dgas skyes dang/
grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs nas/ nam gyi gupal dkathub kyi nags su gnas te/ gong ma dang gong ma'i rnam pa las grol ba drang srong rnams kyi thod nas/
'dodapa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba nas/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi thad nas gzugs chung ba'i khams kyi
yang madapa'iskya mchodakyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral khar byas te/ lung 'bog pa mad pa'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa rung ngo snyam nas/ lo drug tudaga' ba spyang n khyad par rtogs pa
thob par ma gyur to/ dbugs kyang ci bderab rlabs shing ci bder phyung/ zhal zas rags pa 'bras chan dang khronadren yang gsol/ mar da kar dang til mar gyis kyang sku byugs/
tshugrang poran pos kyang sku khrus mdzad nas/ sde 'gro zhes bya ba'i grong du gshegs nas/ bumo dga' mo dga' stobs las 'o thug sbrang rtsitan la bcu drug tunying khurabyas pa bzhes
tagasol nas/ klu'i rgyal po nag pos bstodatsang/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis las rtswa dag bzhes nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der gshegs tabyon nas/ nyid kyis snum
'khrugs ma 'dzanges par bating lta bzhugs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas srid zug pa zad pa ma thob pa de
srid kyi bar du/ skyil mo krung ma gzhig go snyam du thugs bskyed cing tshig tuyang gasungs te/ des risrid du zag pa zadapa ma brnyes pa de sridadu skyil mo krungam bshig go/ gang gi tshabacos
ldan 'dus kyis bdu 'byung po dkrigs phrag drug cu'i 'khor hun byams pa'i mtshon gyis pam par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i yongashes b.res te/ rmongs pas bskul nas yul wa rA NA sa
gshegs takhanagasum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun pa bskor pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu rab snang nga rgyal po chen por dbang bskur bas dbang
bskur ro/ de nayul 'phags rgyal nargyal po rab snang nas bya ba chos kyi rgyal pa/ rgyal sripa'abyor pa dang/ rgyas po dang/ bde ba dang/ 'kholegs po/ skya bo mang
bo dang mas gang ba/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ 'khrug long rab tuzhi ba/ chom rkun dang nad mdab/ sa lu dang/ bu ram shing dung/ ma haphun
tho sum tshogs pa/ chos dang mthun pas byed du 'jug ste/ de'i mthus rtag tudaga' ston gyis rab tudaga' 'o// grong khyer 'phags rgyal po nadabang po lnga dang/ nya dbang lnga yod do/ ]
0 klung bu lnga brgya las wa nas 'bab pa'i chu lnga brgya rgyal po' pho brang grong khyer mdzes pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'bab bo// rgyal po rab snang la yan lag mchog lnga pa/ glang po tshe 'dam bu'i
ri dang/ glang po chamo bzang ldan dang/ dramo byamatsho'i rkang dang/ rtagos mgrin dang/ 'pharam ba khA zhes bya ba yod de/ de dag las 'das bu'i ris nitani zhag gcig la pag
tshad brgya chod do// bzang ldan kyis ni dpag tshadabargyadacu'o// rgya mtsho'i skang gso ni dpagatshad bdunacu'o// t+tagos mgrin gyis na dpag tshad lnga bcu'o// khras nadapag tshad
gshu'o/ nga de ltar 'byor pa phunasum tshogs pa de khams ma mnyam pas/ nadaganyid med pa zhes bya bas thebs so// rgyal po de rnams la sdang zhing chang la dga' ba zhig ste/ de la
sman pa rnams kyis rdzus tshogs rnams kyi khyad par sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i mar byung na de 'thung ngu mi btub bo// de la btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon bo dang/ pho brang
'khor gyi ma rnams kyis mar blud par byas n/ mar la nga khro bar rtsom zhing gang zhig mar gyi mi 'byin pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la 'dor bar byed do// dganyid mdapas
nam gyi thun dang po la ni btsun mo'akhor dang lhan cig ngagal ba'i rtsad mo nyams su myong bar byed do// gnyis pa la ni grung po rmadang rtadag la ltalo// gsum pa la phangs tsho ba rnams la
da ltamal tshe su byed yol tsho su byed ces 'dra zhing/ degang zhig tshig dang nges lenami glo pa de la yang bzod do// gnyis pa la lanam gyon pa de la yang bzod do//
ka gang zhige gsum pa la lan mi blon pa de'i ni mgo drungs nas bcadunas sa la 'dor bar byed pas/ 'i ming rgyal po rab snang rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub nas ming gtum po rab
la/tum po rab snang zhes bya ba'achags so// des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa// bud med dag nga ni mal tshe byed na/ khyed ci'i phyir mal ma byed/ de dgags
smras pa/ lha bdag cag kyang zhugs chobagyid do// de dag gas mal tshecung zad cig byas nas smras pa/ lha gal te bdag cag gis rtag tuzhugs tshobagyi na/ lha'i thugs srung
[© ]bar bgyi ba'i rjes thog gi steng du 'di na bdagacag gi sug las ma lags so// sa snyas pa gal ta'adi khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na 'di sul las yin/ de dag gis
ts+tshA tsas pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams kyi lags so// des de dag btang nas gzhon nu rnams kyi drung du songs snus pa/ gzhon nug nga ya nga mal tshabyed na/ khyed ci'i phyir mal tshom byed/
dodag gis smras pa// lha bdag cag kyang zhugs tshobagyid do// de dag gis kyang mal tsho cung zad cig byos nas smras pa/ lha gal tabadag cag gis rtag tuzhugs tshobagyi na/
rgyal po cigang dag lags pa zhes byakha nas/ gnas lnga la zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin dbyang bar gyi ba'i rjes thog grwa stod du 'di ni bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so// des
lcas pa/ gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yinan/ 'o nu'adisu'i lus yin/ de dag gis sbas pa/ lha blon po rnams kyi lags so// des de dag btang nas blon po rnamasal snas la/
shes ldan dag nga yang mal tshabyed na/ khyoda'i phyir mol tshom byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha bdag cag kyang zhugs myobagyid do// de dag gis kyang mal tshocung zad cig byos
sa lcas pa/ lha gal tabadag cag gis rtag tuzhugs tshobagyi na/ chos dngamathun par rgyal srid bgyi ba'i ngo ma zlog pa'i stang du 'di ni bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so//
des smos pa/ gal ta'adi khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na'adisu'i las yun/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha khrom gyi ru'i lags so// des de dag btanganas khrom gyi ru'i drung du
song ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga yang mel tshabyingan/ khyed ci'i phyir mel tshami byed/ khromagyi rus smras pa/ lha bdag cag kyang zhugs tshibagyid do// de dag gis kyang mol/
tshosung zad cig byas nas sa pa/ lha bdag cag gis rtag tuzhugs tsho bgyid na// lha la rgol ba rnams dang phyir rgol ba rnams dpalhan cig g.yul sprad pa'i ngos thog ga stong du
'di na bdag cag gis sug las ma lags so// des smras pa/ 'di khyed kyi las ma yanan/ 'o na 'di su'i las yin/ de dag gis snyas pa/
lha grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyi lags so// des de dgacatanganas grongs dang yul mi rnams kyi drung du song sta lcas pa/ shes ldan dag ngayang mal tshabyed na/ khyod ci'i phyir mal
la'i tshomi byed/ de dag gras sas pa/ lhabadag cag kyang zhugs tsha bgyid do// des de dag rtago tshumal tshe byed par bsgos nas/ de dag res su bcad de mel tshe bya bar brtsamasaso//
drinus na pos 'tshong gi khyi'u zhig la res bab ba dang/ de rgyal po de gtum pas bsadadu dogs/ ad ma dega' zhing lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud tsang
'dug pa dang/ desams khongs su chud pa grogs po zhig gis mthong nas smras pa/ grogs po sus lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sa khongs su chud cing 'dug/ des ji
ltar gyur pa bsad pa dang/ de'i khyim drung nas 'dzin pa zhig yod// des dali snyas pa/ grogs po khyod kyi khyim drung na sa 'dzin pa zhig yod na/ ci'i phyir de la mi 'chol/
des smras pa/ grogs po ji ltar kho bo'i srog 'phangs pa ltar/ de'i yang de dang 'dran/ de ci'i phyir kho bo'i rtsol ba byed/ des smras pa/ grogs po de la kar gapa tshadag
[2 ]byinadang/ gdonam za bar malatsho byed// des de la bcol ba dang/ des snas pa/ kar sha pa Nalnga brgya byin cig dungamal tshabya'o// dres sbyin no zhes dam bcas pa dang/
des smras pa/ re zhig nyis brgya lnga bcu 'go byin cig/ lhag ma nigal takho [”]khri gsonapor slar 'akhor na byin cig/ dza sta ma yin na khyod nyid kyi yin gyis ci bder gyis shig/ des
snus pa/ legs te de bzhin bya'ozhes/ des de lakar sha pa myanyis lnga bcu byin pa dang/ des de dag blangs nas srung du song ste/ des der sha dang/ changadang/ khur ba
mngadu nyos so// de nas rgyal pogatum po rab snang gi nang thams cad na gron du bos tazan khyin chang yapartsi 'dod pa pud nas/ smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo la mel
tshe ris khab na/ rgyal po 'di'i spyod pa 'dra ba smos shig/ de dag gis de la jilta bu yin pa thams cad bsnyad pa drang/ des snas pa/ shes ldan dag kho bos cung zad byas pa
dran par gyis shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa da dung khyod kyis zan byin pa dang sbom blud pa yang ma zhu nasIsdu tshadrin ci bya ba smyos shig/ dres sbas pa/ gal tem stas te
kho bo nyal ba la rgyal pos mal tshapa dgo byunganakhyed kyis kho bo slong zhig/ de dag gse sbas pa/ u0f8blegs te de bzhin du bya'o// de lo bas smadadakras nas galatshabyed pan thal
byung gnyid kyis log ge/ tsam nargyal po de kho na pazhun du thun dang pa la btsun mo'a'akhor dag dang lhan cig rtsas/ dga' bar byas/ dga' dgur
spyad de/ thun bar ma la glang po chi dang rta dag la bltas nas/ thun tha ma la mol tshob rnams la brtag pa brtsams pa na/ de dag gis sa 'dzin pa de la/ sa 'dzin pa lhag shug
kyis las ngashage ces bslangab dang/ dmyur ba myur ba kho nar langs nas/ de bzhin dul bas snyadadakris te 'dug go/ rgyu la pes su mal tshe byed pas sgra byung ba dang/ sa 'dzin
bas bsam pa/ gal tetshig dang po kho ra'alan glan taphyis lanam glanudang/ rgyal po 'das gdonam zos par bdag gi mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 'dor ro snyam dug nas
cang ma zerab r 'dug go/ lan gnyis kyi bar ngurgyal pos sumal tshabyed chos sgra byung yang/ dbazhin cangam zur b.ra'adug go/ lan gsum du rgyal pos su mel tshe byed ces sgra
phyungab dang/ des sbas pa/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go/ rgyal pos sas pa/ @#sa 'dzin pa ams/ de sa ngan la 'ag rten gyi sgrung gtam la yang mkhas pa zhig pas/
ngos sapa/ 'jig nyin gyi bsam pa soms lags so// @#//bar sdom ni 'ag pa khrung khrung mun dza dang// nag mo sreg pa bum po dang// lan tshwa phye dang shi ba dang//
ba dang thags lja la sdig pa 'o// sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi bsam pa lta ba zhig ses/ lta srog chags lug pa sgro dang bcas pa dang/ sgrom mchis pa srung la gzhal/
namanyam pa kho nar 'gyur te/ de ngomatshar lags so// sa 'dzin pa cid ltara'agyurar ma/ lha mastar bab par bgyi'o// sa 'dzin pa legs so// des phyi nyin 'ug pa
zhig khyer ta'os nas/ de rgyal po'i mdun du skyo dang bcas dgacal nas/ yang sgro btogs dgacal na de kho na dang mnyam mo// rgyal pos sa pa/ sa 'dzin pa 'di la
rgyu zhig yod/ des sa pa/ lca 'di'i sgro dag gis rlung 'dzin pa'i slad du'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/ des lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags
so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ sa 'dzipa mdom nas rtanus nas mgo la byugs te/ rgyal po'i pho brangunas byung ba dang/ sngos 'tshong gi
khye'u des kar sha pa Nanyis brgya lnga bcu pa de dag kyang de la byin no// tshul 'phags rgyal na gangadangag pa la res bab pa des kar sha pa tshalnga brgyas de glas te gtong bas/ dertag tu
mal tshekhe na byed par gyur to// yang rgyal pos de kho na bzhin dusu mol tshabyedaces sbas pa dang/ des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha bdag zhugs tshobagyid do// rgyal pos
de khon bzhin du sa 'dzin pa phyisams zhes sbas pa dang/ des smras pa/ lha'ajig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'ani
pa 'jig rten gyi bsam pa ji lta bu zhig soms/ lha khrung khrung zhes bya ba'i bya de dag la 'o ma da tshudang bsres te sul na/ dadag 'o ma ni 'chol chab 'di'ador ro// sa 'dzinapa ci
da de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o// sa 'dzin pa legs so// des phyi de nyin khrung khrung zhig khyer te 'ongs nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du 'o ma dang chudang bsres te blad
pa dang/ des 'o ma ni'athus chun bor ro// bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyusazhig yod/ sa
sus pa/ lha 'di'i mtshul sbyaramachis te/ sa na de 'tshal ba'i 'o ma zhor 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ su'adzin pa khyong na mkhas pa zhig go/ lha khyod
kyi bka' drani lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cangami zer bar 'dug go/ yang rgyal pos de bzhin dusu mel tshe byed ces sa pa/ des snga ma'i tshul du
snyas pa/ lha bdag zhugs tshabagyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa cisams/ des smras pa/ lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so// so 'dzi
[His ]'jig rten pa'i bsam pa lta bu zhig sems/ lha rtsa mun[]tho bas brdungs pa dang ma brdungs pa sral gcal na mnyam pa khe na 'gyur lags so// sa 'dzin pa nyid de ltar
'gyur// lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o// sa 'dzan pa legs so// des phyi de nyin tso mun phrakhyer te 'ongs nas/ rgyal po'i mdun du ji ltar bstan pa bzhin byas na/ thams
cad de bzhin du gyurapa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ lha tho bas brdungs pas rlung bsdus pa'i slad du'o// sa 'dzin pa khyed namakhas pa zhig go/ des
lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang ma zer ba 'dug go/ yang rgyal pos de bzhinidusu mal tshobyed ces smras pa dang/ dus snga ma'i tshul du/
smras pa/ lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa soms/ lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so// mi 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa rje
lta bu zhig sems/ lha shing snga mgon nag mo zhes bya ba de'i lus jitsam pa mjug ma yang de tsam mo// sa 'dzin pa mi de de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha smyon sbyar bab par bgyi'o/ sa 'di
la legs so// des phyi de nyin snga mgo nag mo zhig khyer te 'ongs nas rgyal po'i mdun du jilta ba bzhin du bstanan/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin
pa khyod kyis ltar shes/ lha bdag gis so ka'adusu 'jug pa'i[% ]/ mag mas mgo slobs pa mthong lags so// sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa
ba zhig go/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ yang rgyal pos sumal tshabyed ces smras pa dang/ des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa
lha sa 'dzin pa badrag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzinapa'i sems/ lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o// sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig/ lha sreg pa'i gshog pa
bkra ba jisnyadapa ma bkra ba yang de kho na nyidamachis so// sa 'dzin pa de de ltar 'gyuram/ lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o// sa 'dzinapa legs so// des phyi de nyid rgyal po'i mngon sum
du byas na/ de thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzinapa khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ lha sngon bdag gis bgrangs lags so// sa 'dzinapa khyed na mkhas pa
zhig go/ lha'i bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang ma zer ba 'dug go/ rgyal pos yang de bzhin dusu mal tshobyedas rmas pa dang/ des ma'i tshul du sus
ba lhas 'anapa bdag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ saMms/ lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o// sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba zhug/ lha bye ma bum pa gang gnang
duchab bum gang blugasan/ chab de thams cad de'inang du shong ngo// sa 'dzin pa cing de ltara'agyur// lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o// sa 'dzin pa legs so// des phyi nyin mangon
sum du byas na/ de thams cad de bzhin du gyurapa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa khyed kyis jiltarashes/ lha bye ma chu las byung ba'i slad du'o// sa 'dzin pa khyed namakhas pa
zhig go/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal pocang mkhrir bar 'dug go/ yang rgyal pos dbazhinadusu mal tshabyedaces rmas pa dang/ des snga ma'i
tshuladusnyas pa/ lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin ba cisoms/ lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o// sa 'dzan pa lage tshu na pa'i bsam pa lta bu zhig
sems/ lha chab phul gang gi nang dulanatsAphul gang sulon/ chab phul ga kho nar 'gyur ro// sa 'dzin partsed de ltar 'gyuraras/ lha sa nasngarab b par bgyi'o/ sa
'dzinapa legs so// des phyi de nyidamangonasum du byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang/ rgyal pos sas pa/ sa 'dzin pa 'di la su yod/ lha lan tshwachag las byung ba'i
slad du'o// sa 'dzin pa khyod namakhas pa zhig go/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang ma zer bar 'dug go tsa/ yang rgyal pas de bzhin du mol tshosu
[ja]@#// byedas rmas pa dang/ des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/ rgyal pos snyaa pa/ sa 'dzin pa spyi sems/ lha 'jig rten pa'i ba'
'ba'ongo a 'dzin pa 'jig rtenapa'i bsam pa jilta bu zhig/ lha gzhab phul gangag nang du chab phul gang sul na sla b.rayang ma 'gyur gar ba yang ma 'gyur ro// sa 'dzinapa de de ltar
'gyuraya/ lha spyan sngarab b par bgyi'o// sa 'dzin pa legs so// des phyi de nyin mangonasum du byas ra/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang/ rgyal pos lcas pa/ sa 'dzin pa
'di la sgyu ci yod/ lha bag cag sa 'dzin pa rnams ni phyi 'tshal ba lags pas/ bdag gis lan du ma mthong lags so// sa 'dzin pa khyed ni dran pa care zhig go lha khyod kyi bka'
drinalags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang ma zer bar 'dug go/ yang rgyal pos dbazhin du mal rmasu byed ces smras pa dang/ des snga ma'i tshul du snasu nga/ sa 'dzin
ba bdag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa cisams/ lha 'jig rtenapa'i bsam pa'o// sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig/ lha gus pa dang gson po gnyis
srangal gcal mam mnyam ngo pa'agyuraro// sa'adzinapa'i dad ltar 'gyur ram/ lha spyan sngar bab pa bgyi'o// sa 'dzin pa legs so// des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na/
0 thams cad de bzhanangugyur pa dang/ rgyal pos sAs pa/ sa 'dzinapa de la rgya su yod/ lha gum pa ming lags pas mdangs phrogs pa'i spyod du'o// sa 'dzin pa khyedatsamakhas pa
zhig go/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ yang rgyal pos de bzhin dpal mos byedaces smras pa dang/ des snga ma'i
tshul du snus pa/ lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzinapa ci sems/ lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o// sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa lta bu
zhig lho dong brkos nas de de nyid du stsal na/ mnyam payom 'gyur lags so// sa 'dzin pa ci de de ltar 'gyur ras/ lha spyan sngar bab pa bgyi'o// sa 'dzin pa legs so//
sa phyi da nyanamangon sum dubyus na/ thams cad de bzhin dgyur pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ lha mi ma lags pas mdangs phrogs pa'i slod du'o/
sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/ lha khyod kyi bka' drinalags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cangam khri bar 'dug go/ yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mal tshosu byed
ces smras pa dang/ des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa kyisoms/ lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o// sa 'dzin pa
'jig rtenapa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig/ lha tha ga pas nyin mtshananguges btags na gar mchis pa ma 'tshal// skye sa 'dzin pa gar song mi shes pa mus so//
lha sar gyur lags so/ kyis 'dzanipa sar gyur pa lta zhig/ yang rgyal pos de bzhin du yul tshosu byed ces snas pa dang/ des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lhas 'dzin
ba bdag go/ sa 'dzin bcasams/ lho'ajig rtan pa'i bsam pa'o// sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig/ lha rdza mkhan gyis nyin matshar du stod bgyis na de gar
mchis ma 'tshal te// kyas 'dzin pa gangasong ma shes pa yus so// lha sar gyur to// kyis 'dzin pa sar gyur pa lta zhig/ kyis 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig sta/ thams cad
shasan/ nga gnyid med pa 'di la rgyu yod/ lha ma 'jigs pa sul na sna bar bgyi'i// sa 'dzin pa ma 'dzagisapa sbyin gyis bag ma tsha bar smos 'ag/ lha khyod da sdig pa las
skyes so// sa 'dzin pa khyod la mi snyanapa zer sa/ lha de skad ma gsung zhig/ lha la bdag gis ma snyan pa ji skadangubagyis/ lha ma snyanapa mi bgyis te/ lha'i mngon sum du
bgyi'o// sa 'dzinapa legs so// des dong brkos nas ba glangag lci ba skam pas bkang ste/ de'i steng dumal bcas taphye de tar rgyal po la/ lha mal 'di gzims shig ces
ngas pa dang/ rgyal pos de nyal// nyal ma thag tuganyid kyis log par gyur to// gang gi tshesadapa pa'i tsho/ lha khyod kyis gzigs sam zhes smras pa dang/ des bdag
gi mngon sum du byas pa shes nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste ma la dras pa/ um bdag su la skyes pa brdzun ma gsung bar drang por gsus shig/ lha smyu bar bgyi yas/
bdag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig/ yum gsol lo// lha khyod kyi yab btsun mo'i 'khor rgya chen po dang ldan pas de ltos shogo lusong ba na/ bdag zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/
de'i tsho bdag zla mtshan gyi khrus bgyid pa na/ stag pa zhig mthong ba dang/ bdag gi blo skyes pa/ sa 'di pho zhig tugyuran/ bangag 'di dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i longs
sbyong dga' ngagur spyad par bya'o snyam pa dang stes tang po zhig tugyuranas/ da dung bdag lhan cig 'drod pa'i longs spyod dga' dgur spyad pa dang/ pAlas khyongaskyas par
gyur to// des bsam pa/ sa 'dzinapa de ni mkhas pa zhig ste/ nges bdag shes na/ pol bdag gis ma 'jigs pa byin pas degasod du mi rung gi/ gzhan su la yang
ma zer bar bya ba'i phyir bya dga' byin la yul 'byung ngo snyam nas/ des de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya re tu yul phyungapo// sngom ni 'tsho byed dang gser 'ong dang//
go la'i 'dab dpan la de// rab byung cha can zas dang na// 'bru mar snod ni them 'o/// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsams pa/ bdag gi nad
ka 'di ni char gyur pas sman pa dag bsdus la dpyad bya'osnyam phubasams nas/ des yul nuganas pa'i sman pa thamasacad basdus tasnus pa/ shes ldan dag pa'i nad 'dit+ta bu la dpyad
gyis shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha bdag cag gis khyod kyi dpyadabagyidapa sprom thog ste/ 'on kyang rgyal po'i khab ni/ rgyal po gzugs canasnying po'i bu snyan pa'i
'tsha rgyal 'tsho byed kyis bgyi ba mchis te/ gal tan des lha'i dpyad bgyid ngo thog go/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po lag sbrang sta/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed rgyur thong zhig/
mang na nga 'o nar 'ong gis rtswa dang chab sta gon gyis shig ces byas pa dang/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos yi ge bklags nas sngas/ lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems
khos su chud cung 'dug ste/ gal te'amo dbatang na de las dpaci dgos pa de 'gugs pas don gyis bdag kyang de dpyadaparagyurapas ma legs so snyam nas/ de yid mi
bde ba snyan pa'irgyal po 'tsho byed kyis mthong ngo// de nas rkangapa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ lha'i sladadu phyag 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs//
tsawangs snyas pa/ bu khyod kyis 'dilta bu'i bzo bslabs pa des na gnod par gyur to// 'tsho byed kyis snyas pa/ dzeltaraganod par gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang/ lha bka'
lungahU~Ml du gsol/ mchibar bgyi'o// bu rgyal po dogatum po zhig ste/ ci'i phyir yang sems canagasodapar byedapas khyod gsang grang/ lha bdag srung ma nus pa'i sman pa deci
'dra ba zhig ste/ thugs mi chung bar bdag gtadangugasol/ des smras pa/ bu gal tade lta na songal ji ltar nga dang/ btsunamo' 'khor dang/ gnonoru dang/ blon po dang
pho brang 'khor gyi ma dang/ ul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mya nganasku b.ram 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig/ des lhaci'i sladedu de ltar 'gyur
bdag gsand pa'i sems bsrung thog ge zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang ma bri bar 'dug go/ 'tshobyed kyis 'pharam pa'i mi de la dris pa/ kyi skyes bu rgyal po de'i spyod pa ni
ci'odra ba zhig/ nadani dzilta bu zhig gso thebs/ ngas jiltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas 'tshobyed kyis chang gi kha dog dang/ chang gi dri dang/ cha ngag robro ba'o mar sbyar
nas dag mtshan dang/ bkra shis dang/ bde legs dgacas dgrogs po dang/ gnyan dang/ phu nu rnams la sbyar nas/ yul 'phags rgyal du song ngo// don thar gyis
yul kAmamya kub dzar phyin pa dang/ de na gnas pa'i sman pa'i khye'u zhig yod pa des/ jaltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho bya 'ongs te 'phags rgyal du 'gro ba thos
so des a ru ra zhig khyer tu de'i drung du songs phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba dag byas nas/ 'tshobyed kyis smras pa/ kyi chos kyi su nargyal po gtum po rab snang de nad lta bu zhig gis
thebs/ khyed cag gas de dpyad mo byas sam/ des smras pa/ rgyal po gnyid mdapa'amed kyis thebs dadad la ma phanan domamol ni stong/ chapal midaga'azhing gtum ste/
gang zhig de'i mdun du mar gyi mnga'abyin pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 'dor bas/ de dag 'jigs nas 'bros na su zhig de'i dpyad byed par nus 'tshobyed kyis smas pa/ de'i
phyirangs changag kha dog dang/ chapag phradang/ chapag ro bro ba'i mar bskol takhyer tre'os kyis 'drong/ gang gi tshangs khyod la bar byas pa de'i tsho/ khyod kyis ma 'di tsam gyi tshod
cig byin cig/ ngani pomadunas 'gro yis/ khyed kyis re zhig tsam zhig de'i rim gro gyis shig dang/ sos nas ngas khyod la Tan pa rab tum po sbyadazhing sbyin du yang gzhug/
go nges smras pa/ legs kyis bzhud dozhis de de dang lhan cig dong ngo// 'tshobyed rim gyis 'phags rgyal dpanyabar phyin pa dang/ rgyal po pab snapags ji ltar smon pa'i rgyal po 'tsho
byed 'ongs pa thos nas/ des khasamasal/ de nirgyal po'i bu yang yin la sman pa'i rgyal po yang yin pas/ mchod pa dang bkur stis grong khyer du 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas/ das grongakhyer
mdzes pa dang lam mdzes pa byas te/ btsunamo'i 'khor dang/ gzhon nu dung/ blon po dang/ phobrang 'kher gyi mi 'batus pas bsu nas/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tshabyang stong phrag
dunas bskor te grong khyer 'ongs so// denas de lam gyis dub pa ngal bso stacung zhig bsdad nas/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis 'tshobyedal bdagaganyadi yod pa'i nadakyil cher
gyuran/ dpyang gyis shiganyes snas pa dang/ des smras pa/ lha bgyi 'dod kyi 'on kyapa'adil snon 'chol ra/ de dag kyang yul sna tshogs dpaganas sna tshogs ma mchis te/
snyanakhacig bdag gis ngo 'tshalal/ gzhan gyis ma 'chol ba yang machis/ kha cig gzhan gyis 'aNaM la/ bdag gis ma 'tshal ba yang mchis/ kha cig bdag gis kyang
'tshal la/ gzhan gyis kyang 'tshal ba yang r ches/ khacig thag ring po na yang mchis/ kha cig lta ba na yang mchis pas/ khyed kyis glang po tshimo bzang ldan bdag 'dapagyi bder
mdzod cig/ rgyal pos 'tsho byedalegs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces smras nas/ sa glang po che 'dul ba rnams la bsgo ba/ 'tsho byed glang po chomo bzangaldan ci bder spyod
du bshug gse/ khyed cag gas ma dgag cig/ blon po dang chab sgo ba rnams la yang bsgo ba/ 'dinyin par yang rang mtshan mo yang rung grung po rmo mo bzang
ldan la zhon ta'agro nAnge 'ong ba khyed cag gsam dag par ji ltar 'dod par dga' dgur 'gro zhinge 'ong du chug cig/ blon po dang/ chab sgo ba dang/ glang po cha'adul ba rnams kyis
snyas pa/ lhas ji ltar bkalastsal pa bzhuni 'tshal// sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed glangapo chemo bzang ldan la zhon tamig slob par rtsom pa na snga drosang res
gi' phyi droslar 'ong ngo// gupal song zhing res 'ga' phyi dro' ngo// phyi dro song zhing res 'ga' nub mo'i then 'dul zhung 'ong// de de ltar yid ches pa bskyod pa'i rtags kyis 'gro ba dang
'ong bar byed do// rgyal pos stsas pa/ 'tsho byedad dpyang gyis shig/ des smras pa/ lha 'o zhig khrus mdzodatsagi/ des bkrus nas yang smras pa/ 'a byadangs khrus byas na ci
sdod sa smras pa/ lha ro zhig gdugs tshod gsol cig/ de gzan bza'i khar brtsams pa dang/ 'tsho byed kyis sbas pa/ lha bdag gis yul ma ga d+ha'i skyams sharatu
bda' ba zhig 'tshol te mchis kyis/ lha gal te gsol na cung zadacig gsol lo/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed lags kyis 'on cig blta'o// des sman pa'i khye'u de la/
tsam gyi tshor cig byin cig pa'i brda byas pa dang/ des de tsam gyi tshod cig byin nas/ rgyal pos 'khrungs so// 'thus ma thag tuganyid kyis leg pa dang/ 'tshobyed glayape cha mo
bzang ldan l zhon te bros so// rgyal po yang nam phye nasad do// jitsam na de lam gyi sgrag pa byung ba dang/ des pa zhig la khro ku yi skyes bu 'tshobyed nges shig/ des ngal mang blud kyis mgo
drus nas bcad de dor ro// des kun tu btsal bar brtsams na ma stapanas/ des smras pa/ lha mi gda' sta de gdon ma 'tshal bar bros so// rgyal po rje khros nas snas pa/ ka
yi skyes bu 'pha ma ba khu bos shig nas bsgo ba dang/ des dbos so// des kyi khri song lamyur du glang po tsha'adam bu'i ril zhon tu'ango bya ska nas thogs la khrid de shog cig/ de
mgo byus nas bcad do// gal tasgyu ma mkhan des khyod la cung zad cig byin na khyod kyis blangob ma bya'o// lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes 'pharam ba khrus/ rgyal po gtum po rab
snang gi lta mnyamanas myur ba myur bar glongapo tsho'adam bu'i ri la rten tirjes bzhin du song ngo// des de skyu ru ra'i chol duzhugs pa mthong nas smras pa/ 'tsho byepalha gsung gis tshu pangasheg
'dong des smras po/ kyi lA cis tshur re zhig skyu ru ra bo zhige/ des snyas pa/ lhas nga la de sgyu mamakhan yin pas khyod kyis do las cung zad kyang ma lag ces bsgo'o//
'tsho byed kyis sbas pa/ kA ya lA gal te de lta na khyed kyis phyid tho/ ngas kyang phyad bza'a'o// des bsams pa/ phyedabazu'u ste/ phying la sgyu zhi/
ka lta bu zhig byar yod snyam du rig nas/ lcasapa/ 'tsho bya bza' yAsi byani cig/ dos skyu ru ra phyad zos son mo'i bar phyi mas bkang bas mos bcad pa'i phyadabyin no// dos
sgyu de khros pa dang de mdzornyan zhig pas yaraman gnyis kar 'khrus so// des de'i 'or zhig tubazhag nas/ ri 'or ba de dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi
yan lag gi mchog gsumani/ glang po 'dam bu'i ra dang/ glang po chamo bzapaldan dang/ 'pharam ba lA 'diyin na/ 'din sta dpyad 'dis ram gro gyis dang sos par 'gyur spro//
gzhan du na rgyal pos khyed cag nges par phung bar byedado zhes smras nas song ngo// de dag gis de'i rim gro byas pa dang sos par gyupanas song/ rgyal po a pasnyanapa'i khye'u des ji ltar
bstan pa'i dpyad kyis rim gro byas pas dayang sos bar gyur to// 'pharam ba lnga yang rim gyis rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang/ rgyal pos dris pa/ khu 'a byedadag re/ lha bros
lags so// khA gal te bros na ma legs pa zhig byas so// lha dzisto khugs par gyur na de la lhas ci zhig bgyis par 'gyur/ khA ngas de'i mgo drungs nas bcang nas sa la ber bar
'gyur ro// lha snyanapa'i rgyal po gang gse lha dang bdag kyang sos par bgyis pa de lta bu dgum pa de ni rigs pa ma lags so// khA gal te de lta na de la ci zhig bya/ lha rngan pa rgya cher stsal mod/
lags kyis de btAn dubya'o// des de la a ga springs pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khyod ci ste bros/ khyodaN+Dadapa sbyin gyis tshur)zhig rngan pa leng zhig/ 'tshobyed kyis de la spring ba/ lha khyod
kyi bka' drin la bdag gi khyim na noratsam mchis so// 'on kyang gal talhas bdag la thugs dpag mdzad na/ sman pa khye'u gang gis lha'i rim gro bgyis pa de la bya dga' stsal ba'i rigs
so rgyal pos khye'u del dranapa mang dubyin no// 'tshobye la yang brgya stong ba'i ras yug chen gyis gos bskur ba dang/ 'tshobyed kyis bsams pa/ gos 'di ni rgyal po la 'os
pa in su la sbyin snyam na/ des bcom ldan 'das ri chos nyid kyis bdag ga pha yin pas 'di dal dbul lo snyom du bsams nas/ ris de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshong ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di chos gos su gyis la nga la phul cig/ tshodang ldan pa kun daga' bos deblangs nas brlabs na/ des bco
ldan 'das kyi chos gos gsum las pa bas lhag par mathong nas/ des drub par btsums na/ da las bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos gsum dang/ tshong ldan pa kun daga' bo ]
[j ]@#/// stod tshogs dang smad phyogs su bcas pa dang/ sgra gcan than gyi rdul gzan yang langs so/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/
drib 'daskad du/ bdag po rgyal po gang zhig ni// chags najul dang ldan pa yin// rdzul midan nil bral 'gyur// gang gis 'dir chags shis brjod// blo ngan ji ltaramya nganabyed
mkhas pa dzi ltar dga' bar 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa las bral nas/ 'dzin grub dang bde zhes brjod/ cas bris te 'dug pa gang gi tsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenadum byung ba
de 'tsho/ sus kyang gzung bar yang ma nus/ dadag gdon sna bar yang m nus so// gang gi tshesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenadu byung ba de'i tshoyang dri ba de dag gzung bar nus kyi da
de dag gi donaskya ba ni nus so// re zhagi cig na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu bya ba zhig gi phyir dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du song ba na/ ngas drib bris pa de dag mthong ngo// donas
ya mtshanasmyos te/ de bzung na don khong du chud par ma nus te/ des dedag pho brang lcang lo can du khyer nas spang leb la bris tabazhag go/ de'i tshe de'ajog ces bya ba na klu'i rgyal po u
la 'dab kyis bya ba gnas pa de yun ring po nas/ bdag gis nam zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthongazhes de snyam du smon to// de'i mdza' bo gnod sbyani gsar 'od ces bya ba de rgyal
zhag gi phyir gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi lu'i pho brang lcapalacan du song ba dang/ des dri ba de dag spang leb la bris pa mthong nas/ des de dag slas tachub par byas nas dpyad
par brtsams na/ mkho du ma chud nas des rdo 'jog tu khyer ta klu'i rgyal po sa la'i 'dab la byin nas snus la/ grogs po dri ba 'di dag nisas rgyas kyis gsus pa yin na/
'di dag gi donalus kyang ma rtogs kyis/ khyod kyis 'di dag dang gsar 'bum khyer la grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du skor de 'di skad ces/ gags drib 'di dag/
gdon sna nus ba de la ngas gsor 'bum sbyin zhing bkur sti chen pos kyang rim gro bya lo zhes smos shige/ gal ta'agal zhug ga sa skya bar nus na de la gsar 'bum byin cig/ dzis ma nus
grong khyer dang grong rdal ma yin no zhes sgrogs la gzhan du song zhig/ des de bzung nas kun chub par byas te/ bdag nyid bram ze khye'u zhig gi gzugs su sprul nas/ gser bum
khyer de grong khyeradang/ grong rdal dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu bskor nas wArANA sa'i phyidi to/ des lang+kAsa'i lam khri tsho drang/ srung dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdodag
shes ldan wA rA NA si'i grong na gnas pa dang/ ul so so nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag ton cagi/ bdag gis dri ba 'di dag khyer te'os te/ gang zhig 'di dag
ga don smra bar nus pa de la/ pas gsar 'bum 'di spyi'i zhing/ bkur ste chen pos kyang dzam gro bya'o zhes bsgrags pa dang/ kha cig ni mkhas pa snyams/
kha cig ni ya mtshanaskyas nas srog chags bskya stong phrag dum 'dus kyang sus kyang don sna bar ma nus so// des grong khyer dang grong rdal ma yin no zhes bsgragasar brtsams pa dang/
wArA u0f9fsa nuganas pa'o bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis sa pa/ re zhig grong dang grongesdol ma yoni no b+hes ma sgrogs par bdag cag gi skya bosanges par bakur ba'i dge sbyong dang bram
ze dgon pa'i gnas ma 'dug pa gang dag yin pa dang ga 'ongang chug la/ phyis grong khyer dang grong rdal ma yin no zhes sgrogs shig/ des smras pa/ de dag gang zhig yin/ nal da
la sogs pa'o// des legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes smras nas de sdodapa dang/ ma zhig na na la nga 'ongs so// des de'i mdun du 'dug ste snas pa/ drang srong chen po padag gis
phrib 'di dag khyer 'os te/ gra zhag 'di dag gi don snya bar nus pa de la gsar 'bum 'di yang sbyin zhing bkur sta chen pos kyang rim gro bya'o// ni ladas de dag bklags nas snas ba/
bram ze'i khyelegs kyis dban dubya ste snu'o// un jisridicig na/ lo bcu gnyis 'dasanas so// drang srong chen po dus don nges so// drug na'o// de yang rings so gsu/
'o gcig na'o// zla ba drug na'o/ zla ba gsum na'o// zla ba na'o// zla ba phyed na'o// zhag bdun 'das na'o// ma la'i 'dab kyis drang srong chen pe lags kyis de ltar byos
shag pa'i bar du sdod dos smras nas de sdodapa dang/ drang srongan la da'i sa 'dzin dge slongalnga po yin pas/ de de dgagi drung du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u
zhig gis drib 'di dag dang/ gsar 'bum khyer nas bdag gi drung du 'ongs togang zhig srib 'dag gi don snga nus pa de la gsar 'bumo 'di sbyin zhing bkurasti chenapos kyapar mir bya'o nas
zeran/ srib 'di dag nidi mal tshig nyung bas khong du chud par dka' na'adi la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de dag gis sas pa/ nal dasong la/ sasargyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
shig shes ldan dag casangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenang byung ngam/ byung ngo// gang na bzhugs/ drang srong sna ba ridags kyi nags na'o// de dga' ba dang mgu ba ba skyes
sa: myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das ga lab der song ba dang/ na la des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chenapo'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyanapa/ dpe byad bzang
lo brgyad cus mtshos par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gse brgyanapa/ nyim stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can rinapo che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ste/ ji ltar dag ba'i rtsa ba
bsags pa'i sems can gyis thog ma sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar/ lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa 'am/ phyi mdapas/
bu rnyed pa 'am/ dbul pos gter mthong ba 'am/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni de ltapanyams bde bar 'gyur ba yin no// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan
@#/'dus grang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'khaM la te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chu panas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad
'a pa dang/ de thos nas drang srongan la das 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi'u mtho ba yi shes kyi des bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// des/
bden pa mthong nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ btsunapa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu'obyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos bo 'thob na/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ na la da khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la driba'i don smra'o zhes dam
0 bcas pas/ de'i phyir so lare zhig sngar dam bcas pa de tshar phyungs/ phyis rab tubyung zhig/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag gis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob mod kyi/
'on kyang drib de dag gi don bdag gis sa bar ngo tsha thog na/ der mchis ci zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nal da song la so nas 'di skad du re zhig drib de dag
sbos shig ces gyis shig/ gangago tshades 'di skapas/ bdug pa rgyal pa gang zhig ni// chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin/ jul mngan ni rdul bral 'gyur// gang gis 'di ni/
gos zhes brjod// blo ngan dziltar mya ngan byed// mkhas pa ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur// gang gi ldan pa las bral nas/ 'din grub dang bdazhes brjod// ces smras par gyur pa de'o/
tshe khyod kyis 'daskad ces smos shig/ drug pa bdag po rgyal po na// chags na rdul dang ldan pa yani// rdul mang nani rngal bral 'gyur// chags nabyas pa zhis 'di borjod//
blo ngan de ltar mya ngan byed// mkhas pa de ltar dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yi ldan pa las bral nas// 'di na grub dang bde zhes brjod// gal tabardza ma phrad po zhes zer na de la/ legs/
bar gsungs pa shes pa gces pa ste// thos dang ting 'dzin shes pa gces pa yin// ma gang gya chom bag med gyur pas ni// shes de la thos pa donami che// zhes smos shig/
gal to/ sangs rgyas gsung dag sku mod kyi// khyod la mtshanani stong ngo// 'di la bdag gi blo rmongs kyis// the tshom myur dug cad par gyis// zhes
zer na/ de'i mdun du smanamos rtsa chod cig/ gal taci sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig mdubyungam zhes zer na/ byung ngo zhes smos shig/ jis gang nabazhugs zhes zer na/
drang srong smra ba ridags kyi nags ni'ozhes gyis shig/ btsun pa de bzhin du'atshalul zhus rigs kyi bu nAl das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltor mnyan te/ bram ze'i khye'u de gang na ba der
song su phyin pa dang/ bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u zhig dri ba de dag smos shig/ des tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ bdag po rgyal po gang zhig ni//
chags na rdul dang ldan pa yi// rdul mdaman rdul bral 'gyur// gang gas 'di nichags zhes brjod/ blo ngan ji ltar mya nganabyed// mkhas pa ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur// gang zhig
ldan pa las bral nas/ 'di nagrub dang bde zhes brjod// des smras pa/ drug pa bdag po rgyal po na)/ chags najul dang ldan pa yidi// rdul mnanijul bral 'gyur// chags
na byas pa zhes 'di brjod// blo ngor de ltar mya ngan byed// mkhas pa de ltar dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yi ldan palas grol nas// 'di na grub dong ba zhes brjod// bram ze khye'u/
gang smras pa/ drang srong[%]na pa bam phrad do// des snas pa/ legs par gsungs pa shes pa gces pa ste// thos dang ting 'dzin shes pa gces pa yani// mi gang gya tshom bag
med gyur pas ni// ma shes de la thosaMpa dron mi chi// bram ze'i khye'us snas pa/ na lad/ sangs rgyas gsung dag rtsa mod kyi// khyedal mtshan ni mi snang ngo// 'di la bdag gi blo
rdzongs kyis// the tshom myur dugacad par gyis// na la des de'i mdun du sen mos rtsa bcad pa dang/ des snyas pa/ na lo da cisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenadubyung ngam/
des sas pa/ bram zo'i khye'u byung// gangan bzhugs/ yul wA rA NA sa 'di nyid na'o// phyogs gangan/ drang srong sna ba ri dgas kyi nags na'o// bram ze'i khye'us bsams
ba gil te bdag gis 'di la rang gi rigs bsad na ni'as b.ras pa 'gyur/ 'on tabram ze'i khye'u'i cha lugs kho nas song na wa ra NA si na gnas pa'i bram ze rig pa gsum
dang ldan pa 'am/ khacig bram ze'i khye'u rigs mthon po las skyes pa dag dag sbyong go'u tama'adrung du song ngo nas ma dad par 'gyur ro// gal tarang gi cha lugs kyis song nanibag
dang klu mang po khen yod pas la las bdag la gnodapa byas su 'ong bas/ ma la bdag gis bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur bar mngon par sprulal/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
'gro snyam mo// de nas klu'i rgyal po so la'i 'dab kyis bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por mngon par sbrul te/ rin po che sna bdun gyis ni mdun drangs/
khrom gyi ru bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus ni bskor/ bu stong rinapo tshosna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan cing klubs pas ni zla ba kham pa lta bu r bskor/ mu stags can dang/ dag sbyong dang//
bram ze dang/ bkren pa dang/ 'phos pa sna tshogs dang/ mi'i mchog stong ni phyi bzhin 'brang/ rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i gdugs ni snying nas 'dzin cing/ nyi ma 'od gazer stong
ga 'od kyis snang bas zla ba rgyu skar dang gza' dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang gas mdzes pa yang bal gyis gnon pa'i 'od kyang khril gyis mnan nas/ drang srong skya ba ga la ba der song ngo/
yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor bskya phrag ngumu'i mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to// 'khor de dag gis klu'i rgyal po u la'i 'dab rgyang ringape nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dro
mtsharadu gyur ta/ mig bgrad nas rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ kha cig ni 'di skad shes ldan dag rgyal po 'jig las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer ro// gzhan dag na rengashes
ldan dag gangal 'dilta bu'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa yodapa 'dirgyal po ma yin gyi/ sa'i stang gi se'i dbang phyug gang zhig yin zhes zer ro// gzhan dag ni 'di rgyal po ma yinakyi
[o/ ]lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so zhes zepa'o// ngan gabag chags pa'i dbang ngusong ba de dag gis de mtheng nas/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar
nam zhig 'gyur zhes chags pa spyad do// de dag de ltar rnam pa du mar rtog pa na/ klu'i rgyal po ala'i 'dab bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
nubs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po ala'i 'dab la 'diska ces bka'i
sal to// skyes bu blun po khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bslab pa'i mtshams las 'das pas/ klu'i skye gnas snadapar skyes na/ da nga'i 'khor yung ba/
bal 'dod dam ci/ so lasngal pa thongs rang gi chalugs kyis shog kyagi/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag dang klu mang po khor mchis pas/ la las bdag la gnod pa bgyis
sumachi'o// den bcom ldan 'as kyis/ gnod sbyin lag nango rdzol bka' stsal pa/ lag na ro song la klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab la bsrung bar gyis shig/ btsun ba deltar
'tshal lo zhes/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi lta mnyananas/ klu'i rgyal po e la 'dab bsrang ba lhur len cing phyi bzhin 'brong ngo//
bam po nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// dranas klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab ban+d+ho lhan 'dus kyi sbyan snga nas song ste/ rang gi rang bzhin dumangon par bsgyur
samog mnarje 'go na 'jug/ mgo bdun po niwArA rUs na 'dug ste/ mgo la ril ston kyi las kyi rnam pa ste pas grub pa'i shang la zhig byas pas kun no
srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag dums ni gang/ sbrang bu'i tshogs dus ni lding zhing 'bab/ rnag dra khrag drimanam zhing rab tumanom pa 'tshog ge/ panas sams can rnams kyis
mthongan mag sgyur ba de lta bu r lus bsgyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyazhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
tu'angag pa ngo/ 'khor de dag gis klu'any+tsal pa o la'i 'dab kyi lus mthong mi 'dod pa shane tu'ajigs su rungab/ 'dod chags dang ma bral ba/ 'jigs pa dang/ mya ngan
dang skyo bar byed pa/ chazhing gas pa/rtsub pa/ mdangs mdapa/ kha dog gi rnam pa dang/ byibs kyi khyadaparangum dang ldan pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang skrag nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lan sngar mchis pa 'di tu'ags su rung ba 'di gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs 'chang zhing/ pa'i drung du 'ongs pa gang la khyed kyis 'khor ba'i sgro'i khyad par 'dod pas chags pa skyong pa de yin ta ]
de'i da lta'i lus 'din mi 'dod pa'i las kyi nyes pas mngon par grub pa rang bzhin pa yin no// snga ma ni sprul pa yin no// de dag gis las chung ma za ba thes pas/ yid Mm bde ba skyes
pa'i 'bakyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skyes gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasu bdag lung bstanangugasol/ bde bar gshegs
pa bdag lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po ma rnams kyi tshol brkyang khrid par 'gyur te/ mi rnams kyi tshal brgyad khri blab pa na/ ston
byams pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig mdu'abyung bar 'gyurare zhes bya ba'i bar
snga ma bzhin te/ des khyod la lung ston par 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to/
dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ thechos thams cad gcod pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldanu'adas la zhus pa/ btsun paklu'i rgyal pa o la'i 'dab kyis las kyi zhag
@#/ bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas klu'i spu gnas smad par skyes nas/ shing la mgo la skyes pas kun nas srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag dums ni gang/
sbrang ma'i tshogs du ma ni lding zhing 'bab/ rnag dang khrag gi sridi nam zhing rab tumanam pa ni 'dzag pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu 'di nyams su myong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab kyis las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogis red pa// rkyen yongs su bskyarab/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nges
par 'byung pa yin te/ klu'i rgyal po A la'i 'dab kyis las byas shadri bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi
rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yani/ ma'i khams la ma yani/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dag pa dang ma dag btus
pa dag ni bri ba'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mchedadag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa bsgyu phrug rnams su yang// las rnams chud zaram 'gyur te//
tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smani// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i chod khri thub pa na/ ston pa 'od srungs
can zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na mdupa/ lha 'ong ma rnams kyi ston pa
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ da grong khyer wA rAts+tshasi'i drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na gnas shing bzhugs so// de'i bstan pa la 'dirab tu byung nas/
sde snodagasum dang ldan pa spong ba par gyur te/ de dban pa'i phyogs shig na shing e 'i drung du 'chag sa bcas te/ de de 'chag pa dpral bar shang e la'i 'dab mas phog/
pa dang/ de des marags so// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ngal 'chag pa napo'i dpral ba la de'i 'dab mas thog pa dang/ des de la khros pa bcad
nas lag pa gnyis kyis dum bu dum bur byas tabor nas/ 'di skad du srog kyang med/ 'tshob yang med pa 'di la/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis nyes pa ci zhig gzigs na/
gang gi phyir bslab pa'i gzhir bcas zhes kyang smras so// des khros tobaslob pa dral bas lus zhig nas klu rnams kyi nang du skyas te/ mgo la shing sa la skyes pas srin bu'i rigs
brgya phrag dums ni gang/ sbrang ma'i tshogs du me ni lding zhing 'bab/ rnag dang khrag mnam zhing rab tumanas ba ni'adzag go/ dge slong dag ji snyam dusams/ pa'i tshong dus
dkyi dge slong snga snod gsum pa spong ba pa gang yin pa de ni/ klu'i rgyal po o la'i 'dab 'di nyid yin te/ gang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus
'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ rab tu khros te bslab pa dral kha'i las de rnam par smin pas klu rnams kyi nang du skyes dmago la shang ma 'daskyes pas/ kun nas srin
bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni gang/ sbrang bu'i tshogs dus ni ldonge zhange 'bab/ rnag dang khrag dri mam zhing rab tumanam pa ni'adzag go/ dge slong dag deltaran las gcige gnag
pa rnams kyi rnam par sminapa yang gcig tshuganag/ gcig tudakar pa rnams kyi yang gcig tudakar/ 'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu
gnag pa dang 'drinam dag spangs te/ las gcig tudakar ba dag kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/// de nas drang srongan la dadabcom ldan 'das ga la pa
der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ drang srong
0 na la des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bdag gis sngon dam bcas patshor byung lags te/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu'abyung ba dang/
bsnyan par gas pa dge slong ga dngos pa 'thob na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi san snga tshangs par spyadapa sprod par paMl lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur
tshangs par spyadang spyod cig ces/ dge slong tshur zhes bya bas bka' sul pa dang/ dbcom ldan 'dos kyis bka' stsal ma thag tuskra byi/ snam sbyar rgyun/ lag no lhung bzed
dang bya ma bum thogs shing/ skra dang kha spu brel dos nas zhag bdun lon ba lta bu bsnyen par rdzogs nas/ 'gro brgya lon pa'i spyod lam du gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshags
bas tshur shog bka' stsal pas// skyo bregs snam sbyar bgos pa'i lus ldan zhing// sangs rgyas dgongs pas cha lugs bsgyur nasani// mod la dbang po rab zhi kho nar gnas/
gang gi tshabcom ldan 'adus kyis/ tshodang ldan pa na la da dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ba de'i tsho/ de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis ji skad bdamang+gashes
pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgo slong dag 'apa'i'i rus ka t+ya'i bu yin te/ de bas
na'adi ka tul bu zhes bos ngashig/ dge slong dag gis de la ka ta'i bu zhes bod par bdu mas pa dang/ de' mong ka t+ya'i bu ka t+ya'i bu zhes bya par chags so/
denas bcom ldan 'dus kyis/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ katu'i bu 'jig rten 'di ni phal cher yod pa dang med pa gnyis la rten to// ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rten la ni
ba'achar phung po dpanye bar lenapas rnam par b kyisashing/ yodapa dang mdapa gnyis la rten to// ka t+ya'i bu sems kyi rten mngon par zhanapa bag la nyal ngu'agyur ba 'di dag la bdag ces
bya bar khas malin/ len par mi byed/ gnas par ma byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byedad// ka t+ya'i bu skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skya'o// 'gag pa na sdug bsngal 'di 'gago/
ka ta'i bu 'di la khyod yade gnyis dang the tshom mdaparagazhanal gam las pasI shes pa kho na byas na/ ka tulebu 'ditsam gyis na yang dag pa'i lta ba yinato/ 'ditsam gyis na
bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dogs par mdzadudo// daci'i phyir zhin/ ka ba bu 'jig rten kun 'byung ba yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab
kyis lha ba// 'jig rten la yod pa gang yin pa der ma soms so// ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rte na 'gog pa yang dag pa dzilta babazhin duyang dag pa'i shes rab kyis lta ba ni/ 'jig rtel
yong pa gapa nipa de'am sems so// ka t+ya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' gnyis po de dag la ma min par 'jig rten la dbama'i lam gyis chos ston cing/ 'di ltar 'di yod pas
'di 'byung/ 'driskyes pas 'di ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rgyan gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par ngashes pa/ rnam par shes pa'irkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/
ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skya mchapadrug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sredapa/ srad pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len
pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skya ba'i rkyen gyis ga sha dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug
pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltaran sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig kun 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'diltapa'adi med pas 'dimi 'byung/ 'di'agags pas 'di 'gag ste/
'dilta ste/ ma rag pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byeda'agags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas mang dang gakhrugs 'gag/ mngodang
gzugs 'gag pas skye mchedadrug 'gag/ skya mchodadrug 'gag pas reg pa 'gag/ rag pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa
'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skya ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dwang/ mya ngan dang/ skye
sngags 'donapa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid m bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de lta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa ni 'gag par 'gyur ro//
de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bus bden pa mthong ste/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba malnga pa 'di 'deg ste/ 'dus byas kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa dang/
ltung ba dang/ 'gyes pa dang/ 'dzoms par rtogs nas/ nyon mos pa thams capasngas te// dgra bcom pa nyid mngonasum dubyas nas/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum
pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems gsar dang bong ba mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du dra ba/ tsanangand snya'ur mtshungs ba/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo pa'i sbubs
bcom ba/ mngonapar shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa// srid pa dang med pa la chags pa dang/ bkums la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang 'dabang dngabacus pa'i
lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ gus pa smra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ka t+ya'i bu zhes bka' su la zhinge bos pas/ de'i mingaka tu'i bu chen po
zhes bya bar chags so/ jitsom dus gzhan zhig na'aphags rgyal du/ khyogs da khyogs su 'dom pa'i mi ngas shig byung nas/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang/ btsun mo'i
'khor dang/ gzhon nung/ bod pa dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi ma dngabacas te sems khengs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nakha cig gis smras pa/ lha zhib bgyid du stsolacug gzhan
ga gsalcas ba/ bram ze rnams 'tshalam sol cig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ lhanye 'khor na gnas pa'i dge ba'i ngo bor bkur ba'i dag sbyong dang bram ze gang yang rung ba de dag chol du
stsolacig/ rgyal po gtum po ba snang gis chab sgo ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag dge slong ngam bram ze gang su yang rung yams kyi nad zhi bar byedapar 'gyur ba zhig 'di 'ongs na de
la sbron cig/ skabs 'di lta bu la sus rgyas bcom ldan 'as rnams mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma rig pa dang/ rnam par m mkhyen pa cung zad kyang ma mnga' ste/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa/ gcig tudapa' ba/ zlumed pa/ gnyis su mi
gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ gdul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgul ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhizhabs kyi mthil la legs
parags pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms pa/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las shin tu'adas pa/ yan lag drug dang/
ba ldan pa/ b.rol tu phyin pa drug yos su rdzogs pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stonapa/ mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu lamakhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs drang ldan// phyogs bcur grags pas khyab pa/ brgya phrag bcul mnga' sgyur bas khyad par du 'phags pa
rnams ni chos nyid kyis na lan gsumamatsha lan gsum dusasargyas kyi sngan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing/ su ni da/ sun da'o/ su ni'aphongs par 'gyur/ su ma
nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su 'phongs pa dang/ nyam nga bdang/ gnod par gyur/ suni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la 'bab/ su ni ngan song nas drangs/
tamatho ris dang thar pa la gzhag/ su'i dag ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag nibaskyed par bya/ sa'i bskyod pa dag na yongs su smin par bya/ su'i snyan pa ni rnam par grol bar bya/ su ni/
'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su na'iphags pa nor dang bral ba las/ 'phags pa'i nor kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gzhag/ su ni sangs rgyas 'byung ]
bas brgyanapa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya zhes yi shes gzigs pa 'khrug go/ snyas pa/ rgya mtshortsusrin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur srid kyi//
gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sas rgyas dus las yol ba med// ji ltar ma na bu gcig stag pa la// lha bar byed7nga de'i srog srung ba ltar// bzhir gdul ba'i skya khe
rnams par// drab zhin gshegs pa gzigs shing de'i rgyud srung// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyudal gnas pa yi// thugs rje'i ba drus srid pa bgrodadaka' bar// 'khyams pa
gdul bar bya ba'i sras dag ni// ba gsharu be'u stor bozhin skyo mang tshol// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang//
gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa gang gi gdul bar bya ba ya snyam na/ dge slong ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i yin par gzigs so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ ka ta'i bu 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po gtum po rab snang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ gzhono
na dang/ blon pa dang/ 'phags rgyal de gnas pa'i skyo kho'i tshogs dang bcas pa la soms shig/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes/ tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos/
bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan// de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs khagos lhung bzed thog/ wA lAsir bsod snyoms la zhug so//wA rA NA si'i/
bsod snyoms sbyad nas/ zas kyi bya ba byas te zas phyis ledapa sbyangs pas/ gnas mal driltar dpa cham duphab sa/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang
'phags rgyal gangan ba der rgyu zhing song ngo// de'i tshoyul kan cu kub na tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po'i sngon khyim pa'i mdza' bo bram ze zhig gnas pa de'i bu mo gzugs
khyadapar can dang ldan ng sa tshorabs snga ma'i ming dang mkhrunapar ska tanazhes ba gas so// dzitsam na lce phyogs nas gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs te/ des de'i sgra
bzang bar mthong nas/ bram ze de'i drung du song ste des snas pa/ kyi bram ze chen po bu mo 'di'i sgra rnams bdag la byin cig dang/ kar sha pa Nastong sbyin no zhes smras pa dang/
des slob dpon bdag cag ni bram ze nitabakacag skya btsong mi rung// ji ltar skya btsong zhes smras pa dang/ gar mkhanagyi slob dpon dang ma zor ba sopango// bram
ze de yang phyi de nyin dus las 'das so// de'i chung mas ji ltar 'phags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug ste/ 'phags rgyal du'ong bar
'dod do zhes thos so// khyo dang bral bas sdug bsngal ba dang/ yade ma bde ba skyes pa de/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po 'ong ba thes nas/ lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de
sams khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ bu mo skra canams ma de ltar 'dug pa mtheng ngo// mthong nas kyang smras pa/ maci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su
chud cing 'dug/ ngas snus pa/ bu mo 'phags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po khyod kyi pha'achung pa grogs 'di nas miring ba zhig ma'adug ste/ 'phags rgyal du 'ong 'dod na/ khyod kyi pho
'dus las 'das/ bdag cag gi khyim gyi gnas skabs ni 'di lta bu r gyur pas/ ring zhig na'ongs pa de la nyi mo 'ga'i bsong snyoms kyang spyinam nus pas so// des smras pa/
ma gal te de lta na gar mkhan gyi slob dpon de bdag gi skra kar sha pa Nastong gis nyo bas de nyid nga tshongs la/ 'phags pa ka ta'i bu chen po la bsod snyoms phul cig bdag gi
ska ni yang skye bar 'gyur gyis mya nganam mdzad cig/ des pa'i tshig dad pa las byung ba de thes nas/ bu mo legs kyis daltar bya'o zhes sas te/ gar mkhan gyi slob dpon gang na
ba rasong ste phyinanas sbas pa/ slob dpon khyod kyis nga'i bu mo'i sku kar sha pa N+ya stong gis 'jalan de snyoms la/ kar sha pa Nastongastsol cig/ des sa pa/ sring mo
bya@#// de'i tshon kho bo la de dag dgos kyi da ni de dag ma dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang kar sha pa nga lnga brgyar 'tshongan blang ngo// des snas pa/ slob dponastsolal 'di
dag bzhes shige/ sa blangs so// jitsam na tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chenapo yul kan na kub tshar phyinanas/ dodabonapa bla gab med pa zhig tshu'adug go/ de nas bram ze mo de bas
par gom pa khasang sta/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa ka t+yA'i bu chabo/ sa
bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshodagasol ba ci gnang/ des snas pa/ na ze mo pa'i 'khor skye bo phal po che'o// des smas pa/ 'phags ba nukhor risnyed cig mchis/
bram ze mo 'i 'khor lnga brgya yod do// 'phags pa legs kyis dbazhin pakyi yis gnang bar mtsho cig gtsang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos bram phra mo de la rgyang ma zer bas khas
blas so// de nas bram ze mo de dang ldan pa ka khya'i bu chadabos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas/ rkang pa phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo// de nas bram ze mo
des de nyid kyi nub mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag bshams te/ dang par sngar langs nas stan bti tshur bzhag nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chenapo la s+yAdren
0 gyis 'phags pa gdugs tshod bams lakas te/ 'phags pa de dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes dus gdas par byas so// de nas tshodang ldan pa ka ta'i bu chenapo
snga dro tshos gos dang sham thabs bgos lhung bzed thogs nas/ dgeslong mang pos bskor nang dge slong gi dag 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te bram ze mo de'i bkangs gsar ba de song ngo//
phyinanas ge slong gi dag 'dun kyi gu la stonabashams panyid la 'dug go/ de nas bram bra mo des ka t+ya'i bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dunadag bde bar bzhugs pa ga nas/
gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang galag nas dar te/ yang dag par tshim par byed/ mang dag par stobs par byed do// rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i
bza' ba dang bca 'a ba dag rang ga lag nas dar te/ yang dag par tshim par byas/ yang dag bar bstabs nas/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po bshos gsol nas lhung bzed rgyu/
