phyag btabs par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kat+yA'i bu chen po'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i stan ches dma' ba zhig bti nas 'dug go/ des tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po bram ze mo
de la chos 'chad par 'dod nas/ bram ze mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze bu mo skra can ga re/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa spyod lam nyams lags so// dgra bcom pa
na/ rnams rim bsams pa ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas/ des bu mo skya can gyi gyod pa bsams nas sbas pa/ bram ze mo dge ba'i bsam pa can gyi bu mo de/
ba bos shig des bos pa dang/ khang pa nas byung ste dad pa drag pos tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chenapo'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bram ze mo des smras
sbyo pa 'phags ba ska can ma 'disdig pa sbas pas khyod kyi sras mo lags te/ de'i slad du phriltar bgyis kyang bdag cag gis khyod kho na la zhu 'chol na 'di bdag cag gis su la stsal bar
bgyi gsus shag/ des snyas pa/ bram ze mos ma ma yin pa zhig dris te/ dar rab tu byungab lamAnaMm pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang bu mo 'dis gsang ba'i rgyun lnga brgya dang/ phyi rol
gyi rgyan lnga brgya dang/ grong gi mchog lnga med par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ 'phags pa bodag cag bram ze ni dbul ba lags n/ bdag cag gis de dag galas red/ des snas
pa bram ze mo de skad ma zer cig/ bu mo 'dis zhing bzang po la dad pa drag pos bya ba byas pas bsod nams kyi dbang chab r grags pa yin te/ nges par 'di thams cad 'byor pa'i
ts+tsA 'gyur gyi/ smra sngags ma 'don cig ces byas pa dang/ de cang mi zer bar 'dug ga/ tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos bram ze mo do dang bu mo de la chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang
dag pa ston/ yang dag par len du 'ag/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed cing/ rnam pa du mar chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/
yang dag par lenang bcug/ yang dag par gazes bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ stan las langs tasong nas rim gyis 'phags rgyal duphyin to// degrong
khyer puzhugs pa'i tshomod layams kyi nad phying zhi bar gyurapa dang/ chab sgo bas rgyal pol sbarapa/ lha sngonam byung ba'i rtags dang/ tshalugs 'chang ba'i dag sbyong zhig g.yog
lnga brgyada'are mchis te/ dmachis pa'i mod la Ams kyi nad phyed na bar gyur to// rgyal pos smras pa/ kyi skyes bu lags kyis de la bkur sti gyis shig/ bram ze rnams kyis
snas pa/ lha bdag cag gas nyani mtshudang zhi ba'i las la brtson par bgyis pas na/ bdag cag gi mthus ams kyi nang phyang zhi bar gyur to/ dgung rang pa ma thogs par thams cad
yong ye zhi bar bgyi'o// dge slong dag gis norgyal po gtum po rab snang la nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas/ cang ma zir bar dongasho[° ]/rgyal pos blon po rnams la sbas pa/ 'ashes
ldan dag chab sgo ba ni lha sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs 'chang ba'i dag sbyong 'go 'khor lnga ba dang 'dir mchis te/ de mchis pa'i mod nyid la yams kyi nad phyid ni bgyur tozhes zer
bram ze rnams ni lha bdag cag gis gdugs mcho nang zhi ba'i las la brtson par bgyis pas na/ bdag cag gi mthus yams kyind phyad ni bgyur to zhes zer//
gang gi mkhrus yin pam shes na/ dang la dag sbyong dang bram ze de dag glang po che'i bris kyi mi gtsang ba'i phyogs shig tu'abras chanang pa dang du bas dag gi zas byin la zos nas phyir
byung ba dang/ gnyis ka la gzan 'drab zhig dris shig/ lha de ltar 'a la le zhes smras nas/ blonapo rnams kyis ltar khasgo ba bzhin du/ glang po che'i bris kyi mi gtsang ba'i
phyogs shig tu stan bting nas/ dge slong dang bram bre dag la gzan byin te/ zos zin nas phyir byung ba dang/ bram ze rnams la bsgo ba/ kyi bram ze chenupo dag lhas khyed cag ci 'dra
ba'i kha zas kyis tshim pa byas zhes dris pa dang/ de dag khros smras pa/ byed stangs dang/ rgyal po tha chadachos ma yin pa la gzhol ba zhig ste/ des bram ze rnams la 'bras chan
mgatsangab dang/ sran tshong yan lag gnyis pa dang/ rtsab mo byon te chim par byas yod cas byas pa dang/ decang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de dag deng nas dge slong rnams la dris pa/
ts+tshA 'bakas ba khyed lhas kyi 'dra ba'i kha zas kyis tshim par byas/ de dag gis smras pa// bzhin babrangs sbyin pa pos ni byin/ len pa po rnams kyis ni zos te/ 'byung ba po
[d)] rnams tshim par byas shing nyin zhag gargyugs blangs so// sgo bas rgyal po la smras pa/ maze rnams ni 'di skad mchi'o// dge slong rnams ni 'di skad mchi'o// rgyal pos blon po
rnams la bsgo ba/ 'ashes ldan dag dang la da ni gnyis ka glang po che'i bris gtsama'i phyogs shig tu kha zas bsod pa dag byaru la de bzhin dris shig/ de dag gis glang po che'i bris
gtsang ma'i phyogs shig tustan bshams takhabras bsodwapas tshim par byas nas/ de bzhin du skyo bas dris pa dang/ bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ byed stangs dang/ rgyal po rgyal
rigs glib nas dbang bskur ba ge ste/ zas kyi 'dod pa byin nas tshi par byas so// des bram ze dag rgyal po'i pho brang 'di skyo bsham pa'i kha na las pas/ res 'ga' ringan par gyur
res 'ga' na bzang por gyu gyis/ dam 'phya zhig ces smras pa dang/ de dag kyang m zer ba 'dug go/ de dag dang nas dge slong dag la dris pa dang/ de dag gis snga ma bzhin du smras M
so sgo bas rgyal po la de bzhin du smras so// glang po che'i khris ri lta ba bzhin du chu'i bris dang/ phyag ba khrod dang/ sa phyogs gtsang mar ngan pa dang bsod pa dag sbyar bar bya'o/
rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsams pa/ dge slong dag sbyar gnas dam pa yin gyi/ bram ze dag na ma yin no snyam du ragi nas/ dad pa rgyas nas tshodang ldan pa ka tu'i ba chen po
gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug pa dang/ rgyal po gtum po ba snapal/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos chos dung ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par lenangu'ajug/ yang dag par M
gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byedatsang/ rname grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par len du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs
lta bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cangam smra bar 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po ga lapo rab snang stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas tshongang ldan
ba ka t+yA'i bu chen po gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshodang ldan pa ka 'a chan pol 'di skad ces/ 'phags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po dge slong gi dag 'dun dang thabs
cig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum pa gdugs tshodagasol bar ci gnang zhes smras pa drang/ dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos rgyal po gtum po rab snang la cang mi skya bas gnang ngo/ de
nas rgyal po gtum po rab snong gis/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos tsang ma sku bas gnang bar rig nas/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i sko nga pa la mig bos phyag 'tshal te/
stan las langs nas song ngo// de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gas panyad kyi nub mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'ipaza' ba dang bca' ba dag bshams te/ nang par sngar langs nas gdan/
bting tshur bzhag ste/ tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la spyan 'drenapas 'phags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po gdugs tshodabashams lags te/ nga de'i dus la bab par dgos/
su gsol zhes dus tshod gangs par byas so// tshodang ldadapako t+yA'i bu chen pa snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs[”]bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ drag slong gseb[..]
tshogs kyis bskor zhing/ dge slong gi dag 'dun gyis mdunangub te/ rgyal po rab snang ga bkadas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ ngag slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan
bshams pa nyid la 'jug pa dang/ de yang 'dug sta rol mo'i sgra phyung nas/ bro gar mkhan rnams kyis bro gar rnam pa du ma dag bya bar brtsams pa dang/ rmodang ldan pa ka ta'i
bu chen po dang/ dge slong dag dbang po bsdams ta'akhod do// glu gar dang rol mo' sgra de dag zhi nas/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis/ 'phags pa ci gar
bzang lags sam/ glu snyan lags sam zhes sbas pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos sa pa/ rgyal po chen po gang gis thos pa ma mtho ba dag la'o/ des
snus pa/ 'phags pa dbang po nang du bsdus pa rnams kyis ma gzigs su ni gsol na yit+ta ma gsan/ sa snusapa/ lha khyod la mi gsad pa la
thug pa 'ga' yodadam/ 'phags pa mchis nader 'tshal/ lha skyos bu dI'i lag tu snod til mar gyis khong bkural phyi bzhin gshed mi mthong ste/ de la 'di skad ces/ mi
khyo tshur shog/ stong 'bru mar gyis kha da chad dugang ba bya sog gis btung dung ba 'di khyer la/ ljongs bzang po thams cad skor la 'di khyer ta shog cig/ dzas til mar thigs pa gcig
sal ba na/ mi ral gri gdengs pa 'dis khyod kyi mgo dras nas bcad de sa la 'don du gzhug go zhes bsgo la/ de'i mdun du rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs phyung sta/ bro gar rnam pa sna tshogs
byed du chug cig dang/ de nas khyod yidi chos par 'gyuralozhes smras so// rgyal po gtumo po rab snapas Tiska bstad pa thams cad ris kyis byas naso/ mi de la kye skyes bu ci gar
bzang ma/ glu snyanapa blas sam/ rol mo'i sgra snyananam zhes dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ lha gang gas thos pa 'am mthong ba dag la'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ kA ya skyes
bu dbang po nang du bsdus pa dag gis ma mthong nguchuge na/ jiltar ma thos/ des lha bdag 'disAm du gal tabadag gis 'bru mar gyi snoda'adilas 'brumar thegs pa gcig sa la
chabon yang/ gangashed ma ma ral gri gdengs pa 'dis bdag gi mgo drus nas bcad nas sa la 'borarosnyam ste bdag 'chibs 'jigs skrag nas/ 'bru mar gyi snod la sos rtse gcig tu/
gtang de lta bas nyam thag ste/ 'dir mchis na ji ltar mthong ngam thos zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal po spobs pa mong nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos
smras pa/ lha khyod kyis mthong ma/ 'phags pa mthong lags so/ lha lo zhig mi 'de gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir bdag nyiyA g.yeng ba dang/ bag yodapal kun tu srung bar
bgyid na/ bdag cag dge slong rol mo'i sgra la lta ba dang nyun pa spong ba byas tabaslab pa gzung ba dag/ tshorabs du ma'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyugar dang/ klu dang/ rol mo'i sgra la lta ba
dang nyanapa lta smos kyang ci ges/ pani gnas medango// rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'bru mar gyi snod mthong bas yis chos der lhag par dod nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ gzhon nu nga
blon pa dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi ma dang bcas pas/ ka ta'i bu la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa la/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi
khag nas dar to/ yang dag par tshim par byed/ yang dag par stobs par byedatsang/ rnam grangs du ma gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas dar to/
yang dag pa rim par byas/ yang dag par bstabs nas/ tshong pa ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos gdugs tshod gsol nas lhung bzed rgyu/ phyag bcapas/
par rig nas/ stan gyis dma' ba zhig blangs te// tshadang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i re ngan du 'dug go/ 'dug nus tshadang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
pa dzilta bdag gis bgyis pa de ltar 'khor lnga brlupo bsod pal zhal zas kyis tshim par bgyis pa gzhan 'ga'amachis sam/ des snas pa/ lhas bag dum bas khyad zhugs pa khyod
'a: kyis bdag 'khor lnga brgya dang bsod pa'i kha zas 'di lta bu s tshim par byas pa gang yin pa 'di la ngo mtshari ge che/ bdag 'dir 'ong ba'i tshori 'or na gnas pa'i bu mo zhig gis bdag nyid
kyi sgra btsongs nas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang kha zas bsod pa 'di lta bu s tshim pa byas pa ni 'di bas ches khyad zhugs par nge mtshar che'o// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis
bsams pa/ bumo gang zhig gis sgrakar sha pa Nalnga brgyar ldem pa de lta bu'i bud med ni lha dag ga nang nayang ga la yod/ mdor na de btsal bar bya'o snyam na/ tshadang ldan pa ka ta'i bu
chen po bstan par dka' ba yin pas/ des de la bu mo de ri 'ir gang na 'dug ces dri bar ma nus te/ des zho shas 'tshob rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag ka t+ya'i bu chen po na
0la ma gang nas 'os pa de nasadang la ra 'o gang namo zhig gis ska btsongs nas/ 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu cha po 'khor lnga brgya dang ba)shos gsol ba tsho la/ btsal nas da nga'i ngor
du slongal ngashag/ lta de ltar 'a la le zhes/ zhos 'tshob rnams kyis rgyal po gtug po bab snang gi lta mnyanate/ rim gyis tshel ba nyakanan kub dzar phyin te/ de dag gis der
dbatsal te// btsal nas 'dam gyis dub pa ngal bcu ste/ bram ze mo de'i khyim gang na ba der song sta phyin pa dang/ sgo khang du 'khod nas sbas pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig bkra
shis par gyur cig/ bram ze mo des snas pa/ shes ldan dag 'dod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bu mo sa tunama'o// bram ze mos sbas pa/ su'i don du slong/ de dag gis
smras pa/ bram ze mo rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi'o// dis sbas pa/ shes ldan dag legs mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di la gnyeng mang dudagos so// de dag gis snus pa/
srimo tsam zhig dgos/ des smras pa/ gsang ba'i rgyunelnga brgya dang/ phyi rol gyi rgyanalnga brgya dang/ grong khyer mchog lnga'o/ rgyal po tum po rab snangal/ b+hAlta bu tshe
lhag par gtod pa'i 'di snyed cig rtse gas lags so zhes don de ljongab dang/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis phyir sprodra ba/ shas ldan dag bumo gcod jitsam gyis khugs pa ]
nos shig dang thams cad spyamaro// de dag gis blangs nas rgyal pos nyi ma dang/ tshes grangs dang/ ung tsam dang sbyar te/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos/
blungs so// gang gi nyin bar 'phagasargyal du phyin pa de nyidadu de nyid kyi nyin la yul 'phagasargyal dum ngas thams cad kyi thams cad du rtse ba zhizhing zhib gyur nas/ de'i ming zhi ba zhi
a zhes bya bar chags so// 'dul ba phran tshogs kyi gzhi// skyobs pa'ishu rtsa drug pa/// sdom ni skye dong 'tshabyed ka t+ya'i bu//
zhing dang tshong dpon g.yul dang ni// mdudan 'don dang sgrol ma dang// pa wapalen dang skra bregs dang// rus pa kong rus btogs pasmani// pad tshoms su yang dag bsdus//
de'atsho'aphags rgyal na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ dad dang lhan cig rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do//
des dus cung zad tsag rtsos/ dga' bar byas/ dga' dgur spyad nas/ zing khyer tayulagazhan du song// de'i chung ma zhim po dang bzang po zos shing gyon pas nyonams pas shin
tugawar to/ de nyin gcig bzhin du khang thog dusong nas thams cad du skyes pa la blta'o// dzitsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang glangapo tsho la zhon te de'i khyim dang nyab zhage tu
song ba dang/ des de la me tog gi 'phrang ba 'phas pa de rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi phrag pa la phog go/ des rgyan du blta bar brtsams pa dang/ jitsam na na tshod gzhon nu kha dog dang/
byibs kyi khyad par gyis/ bdag nyid shanitumadzes par rlom pa 'di pas sgribs pa'i skye pas zur phyugs su mig zur gyis lta ba de mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de la sems bsam pa
'chums par gyur to// des snas pa/ gral tade lta na phyir byung zhag/ des smas pa/ lha mchir g.yar tshas/ 'anyidedusmyon cig/ de yang de la chags pas ldog ma nus te/
nga gungapa tshelas babs nas de'i khyami duzhugs te// dadang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad pas sems canazhugs par gyur te// bud mang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i sa
lnga yod de/ lngagang zhin/ skyes po chags pa ngashesashango ma chags pa shes pa dang/ dusungashis shing bla mtshan dang ldan pa shes pa dang/ mngal duzhugs pa shes pa dang/
gangalasamangal du zhugs pa shes pa dang/ khye'ur)shis shangebu morashes pa yan no// des rgyal po la lha bdag nisoms can dang ldanupar gyur tozhes ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ rgyal
pos de la mu tig gi se mo do nag byin pas pa/ gal te khyod las bu khye'u zhig byungan/ de la mu tig gi sa mo do 'di byin la pa'i drung du thong zhige/ 'on taMbu mo na khyed 'di kyi yin/
zhes smras te song ngo// de la mngal gyi mtshanam byung bar gyurapa na/ tshong dpon des ya ga sbrang sta/ bdag kyang bde bar 'ong gas ma gusnga ba ma byedapar
bag rton cig ces byas pa dang/ sa thos nas skrag ste/ des rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag gi khyim spab de nye ba zhuge tumachis na/ bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi//
rgyal pos de la deb/ khyod mi dga' ba ma byedapa bag rton cig dang/ ngas ji ltarade thug ches ring bar 'gro ba de ltar bya'o zhes sbrang nas de nang ma khrib 'dug go/ rgyal pos de
lan 'di lta bu zhig nga la gos kyis/ del red par ma 'os shig ces spring ba dang/ da de dag chol du lam ring po zhig tusong ngo// de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang
ning mdzes pa blta na sdug ba zhagi zas pa dang/ des mar dang sbrang rtsis kha bkungs sgrom gyi nang du shing bal bting nas de'i thog tubazhag ste/ sbyong sa gros dkar bos g.yogs nas
pa'i sgrig tumu tig gi so mo de bzhag sta khang nas sgrom de lar+ya skyags rgya btab ste/ bran mo la bran mo khyod sgrom 'di khyer te song la rgyul po'i khab kyi sgor dkyil 'khor gyis la mar ma
khus tezheg cig/ khazhag nas nam sus blangs kyibar duphyogs gcig tukhyadacig ces bsgo ba dang/ das de bzhin du byas so// tsam zhig na ba glang lam de nas 'gro ba dag gis
sgrom de bskor 'khod do// re zhig cig nargyal po gtum po thob snang btsunamo zhi ba dang lhan cig khang bgrangs kyi stong du song ste 'dug pa des de bskor ta'adug pa'i ba glang de dag mthong ste/
des zho shas 'tshob rnams la bka' stsal pa/ shes ldan dag ba glang gis bskor zhing 'dug pa de nyid ltos shig/ dadag gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha sgrom chu skyugs la
btab pa zhig mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed ra shig ga/ btsun mo na bas lha sgrom de'inangan rdzas ci mchis pa de bdag la stsol cig ces gsol pa dang/ rgyal
bas sapa/ lags kyis de bzhin du bya'o// jisaMman sgrom de rgyal po'i grong du blangs nas/ rgyal pos kha phye ste bltas na re zhig na mu tig gi se mo do dang bu zhig mthong sta/ des
tshu tig gi sa mo dongo shes nas/ de 'dzin bdag gi bu yin no snyam pa'i sems skyes nas/ dus da lta ba la 'di ni khyod kyi bu mo'o zhes gtad do// des smras pa/ lha khye'u 'di'i
mang ji skad du gdags/ des snas pa/ khye'u 'di ba glang dag gis bskyas pas/ de'i phyir 'di'i mnge ba glang skyong du gdags so zhes/ de'i ming ba glang skyong zhes bya babatags
so de nas btsun mo zhi bas de bskyod pas na/ de'i ming yang ni ba ba glango skyong zhes bya bar chags so/ @#/ de'i tshe yul rdo 'jog na rgyal po pa'i snying po nazhes bya ba
rgyal sridi byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa zhes bya ba nas/ chos dang mthun pas rgyal srad byedadu 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de'i yul
dus bzhin du char 'bab pas shing rnams kyi ma tog dnga'abras bu yang rtag tuchags/ sa la' yang legs taslong mo bas kyang zas rungabla'o// jim du dus gzhan zhig nargyal
t+ti snying po canakhang bzangs kyi thog tusong sta blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing 'dug pa des/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gzhan gang gi yul na yang
'di ltar char dus bzhin du 'bab cing/ shipalas me tog dang 'bras bu rtag tu chags pa dang/ sa la lo legs slong mo bas kyang bras rtagatured glu ba yod dam/ de dag gis
smras pa/ lha mchis te/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang ga yul 'phags rgyal zhes bgyi ba na char dus bzhin du 'bab cung/ shing las me tog dang 'bras bu yang rtag tuchags
sa la legs pas slong mo bas kyang rtag tu zas red bya'o zhes gda' 'o// des snas pa/ shes ldan dag gal tade lta na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang/ de'i
tshul 'khor gzhom par byas 'dong ngo// de dag gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas/ rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dpal 'phagasu
ca rgyal du ngong ste/ rim gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snangag yul du phyin to// des de dag gzhom par brtsams pa// yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po gtum po ba
snangal/ lha rgyal papa'i snying pot+tAn ba zhes bgyi ba dpung gi tshogs chenapo bsdus nas/ lha'i yul 'dzemasu mchan sazhesanapa thos pa dang/ dos kyang dpung gi tshogs/
mnalag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang/ stapa'i tshogs dang/ shing dpa'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/ rgyal po pada'i snying po rgyun dang g.yul 'gyed/
ba'i phyi'i lcags so// den rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po can gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi glang po che'i tshogs thams cad kyang phyogs/ rta'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/
dpung chung ga tshogs kyang phrogs te/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom gtogs/ byin bsgral/ pham par byas dragayul bzlog pan par tshunakun tu byer ba las/ blon
po dang skya bo' tshogs gzhan rnams ni 'phags rgyal du zhugs nas rang ba'i khar sdus ta'adug go ga/ rgyal po ni rgya gcig por ra 'or nag tuphyin pa dang/ ri 'or de nang
pa snams byed ces bya ba zhig zhing rtsod pa des demathong nas lcas pa/ kyi khrom gyi dpa' bo rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po can gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom btags/ byin
[e]// bsgral/ pham par byas tagayul bzlog ces grag na/ dbadenanas/ kyaskyes bu bden no// yul na gnas kyang yul gzhan nas 'os pa'i rgyal
bo pad+ma'i snyinge ba can gyis bcom btags/ byin bsgral/ pham par byas tagayul bzlog pa/ rgyal po de'i blon po dang dmag dpod tsA 'dra ba zhagi/ gal tang de'i blon par gyur na/
sgyur zhing myur bar rgyal po pada'i snyape po canamagul nas btags pa'aphags rgyal du khrid pa zhige/ dngoskadang gtam zer zhunge 'dug pa na/ de'i chung mar klong ma zhes bya ba gzan khyer
los nasaM/ des sa brkos tal ma btang nas lag pa bkrus tagazan bza' bar byas pa na/ rgyal po la bltas tawom gyi dpa' bo khyodangal bos skyo zhape bkras skom pas nyon
mongs kyis/ bdag cag dbang thang chung nga'i bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'drab yang ma bsngo/ dgasol gyis tshur gshegs zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsam
pa gal tem zos na lcogs pa'amib 'gyur ro snyam du ragonas/ rta las babs te lag pa dang rkang pa bkrus nas/ las stan phog sta btang nas 'dug go/ 'dagu nas
des 'tsho ba'i bsam pas bza' bar brtsams so// de nas pher bu kha chagagacigonas chang blud pa dang/ rgyal pos bsams pa/ phor pa 'di kha chag mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang
tsa dum chag pa'i phyogs de nas chang btung ngo snyam mo// rgyal po rnams ni )shes rab dang ldan pa tshul phun sum tshogs pa an pas/ des yang bsams pa/ gal takha ma chag pa'i
phyogs nas bdag gis chang 'thungs na/ 'dis ma chag pa nas 'khrungs so zhes 'di khu 'phrig khra bar 'gyur zhing/ 'das bdag spangs par 'gyur bas/ 'duse gang nas 'thus
pa de nyid nas 'thungs na bdag la'ani dudaga' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des ngos de nyid nas 'thungs pa dang/ snams byed kyis bsams pa// khrom gyi dpa' bo 'di ringag
med pa zhig ste/ bdag gas ngos gang nas 'khrungs pa'i ngos de 'di nas 'dis kyang 'thus pas/ 'di dang 'jig rten gyi lugs yun ring dus 'khor bar mdza' bo bya'o snyam nas/
des chung ma la snyas pa/ bzang me khrom gyi dpa' bo 'di'i snying gi grogs pa yin gyis/ 'di khyim du khrid de song la/ dril phyi dang khrus byas dgazan byin la rta yang ma da chas
na cig/ des de khyim du khridi nas la phyi dang khrus byas tagazan byinanas rta yang rtsa dang chas byamano// rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po can la ri brags pa skya bas nga zhes pa dag gso bsngos nas/
dadag ri brags kyi lung pa nas blugs targyal po ba'i snying po can gyi yul gzhon par brtsams pa dang/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po pad+ma'i sang pa canal/ lha ra bregs pa skya
bsang dag gis yul gnom par bgyis kyis/ jiltar bgyi ba dgongs su gsol zhes ya lig sbrang ste/ yi ge'i nang na yang tshigs su bcad pa/ gzhan kyi yul/
ka nag zhes pa'i phyir// jit+ta nan tan mdzad pa ltar// rang gi yul 'khor bsrung ba yang/ de bzhin lhas kyang mang du gsol// zhes dris so// rgyal po pa'i snying po can gyis yi ge
bkugs nas bsaMpas pa/ gal tebag de bzhin du song nas 'jigarten dag rgyal po pad+ma'i snying pacanapham ste/ de'i phyiro[”]ga go zhes sems pa 'gyur bas/ yong 'jal dul byas
ta'agro'o snyam nas/ des rgyal po gtum po rab snapal smra ba/ grogs po sdug pa gang thal zin pa de thal du zad/ paphyarebyung zhig dang khyod la cung zad kyang ma byed kyi/ gzhan du phan
tshun mgul nas 'jus te 'gro bar zad do// blon po dag gis sbreng ba de thos nas bsems pa/ gal te 'di ni rgyal po med do zhes sloTen grugs rnyed par 'gyur gyis/ sa g.yo zhig bya'o
snyam ste de dag gis de la yag deb/ grogs po sdug pa gal ta ltar yin yang kho bo cag rgyal po dbya chog bzhin du phyogs pa dang bcas pa yin pas/ bangag na phying ma 'byung ngo//

khyod kyi mdza' bo'i bu gzhon nu be glang skyong 'di 'ong gosi/ dadang brang ljongal bzhud cig ces sa nga ba dang/ rgyal po po'i snying po can gyis rgyal bu gzhon nub glang skyong dang brang sprad nas//
[xl]khaphags rgyal bskor ba btang ste rdo 'jog tusong ngo// blon po rnams kyis snas pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po par T sI pe cunagyis bag phab sta yul rdo 'jog song gis/
ngani lha tshol du 'dong ngo zhes de dag ga pho nya pa kun tu btang ngo// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gas/rgyal po pad+ma snying po can gyis 'phagasargyal bskor ba btang nas/ yul rdo
'jog tu song ngo zhes thos pa dang/ des zhing pa rnams byed de la smras pa/ snams byed bag ni'ajags pa dang bral bas de'i phyir bdag 'phags rgyal du'agros/ gal te khyed
'phags rgyal du 'ong na bdag ga khyim du shog cig des smras pa/ khrom gyi dpa' bo khyod kyi ming yung kho bos mngeshes na ji ltar khyim du'ong/ des snas pa/ snams byed ngalekhyim mi
shes kyang bla/ 'on kyang khyod 'phags rgyal du 'ongs pa dang/ ltamangs kyi khyim gang yin zhes dras shig ces smras de song nas/ rim gyis yul 'phags rgyal du phyin pa dang/
des chab sgo ba la bsgo ba/ kA ya skyes bu 'ga' zhig mangs kyi khyim gang yin zhes 'dri dang/ de nga'i drung du khrid de shog cig ces skyas nas khyim du zhugs so// ji tsam dus
gzhananag na/ yul 'phags rgyal du dus ston la bab nas/ yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag kyang der dong ba dang/ zhing pa'i chung ma ri khring nas rje'i sras yul
[r+I,]@#// 'phagasut+pal na dus ston la ba ste skye bo'i tshogs der dong na bdag cag kyang bzhud la/ der dus ston kyang nyams su myong bar bya zhing rta mas de yang gzigs so//
'das smras pa/ bzang mo khrom gyi dpa' bos gang skyes pa ngo thams cad bden dur 'am/ de ni gnas gsum gyis blta bar bya ste/ bcom pa dang/ bres pa dang/ rgyal sridi
las nyams pa zhige na'o// des sas pa/ 'a sris gal te de lta nad lta thong/ bzhud la dus ston kyang nyams su myong bar bgyis nas byon no// des sas pa/ bzang mo legs
kyis de bzhin du byas 'dong ngoms do gnyis donas/ rim gyis yul 'phags rgyal du phyin pa dang/ rnams byed kyis sgo bal/ kya skyes bu cha mangs zhes bya ba'i khyim gang yin/
zhes dris pa dang/ des de chung ma dang bcas te rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi drung du khrid pa dang/ rgyal pos par ng po nas zhes byas te/ 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun tu
ba panas/ snyams bye khyod 'os sam/ lha bdag mchis so// rgyal po de spyi rgyu ra zhig yin pa las/ desacod pan bcinges pas/ des rgyal po ngo ma shes so/ rgyal
bos seng ge'i khri las babs pa dang/ des ngo shes nas des chung ma dang bcas tang pa la phyag byas so// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang rim gro cho byas nas/ btsun
[mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid de dril phyi dang khrus byas/ gzan byin nas nyal khang yang byin te/ btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la bsgo ba/ 'di dag pa'i pha ma yate de/ de'i phyir khyed kyis
'di gnyis la bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ mal tshadang/ stan dang/ bran pho dang/ bran modang/ las byed pa'i ma dang/ rim gro dang/ yo byad dag gis rim gro
gyisazhage/ de rgyal pos bkur sti dang mchod pa byas so snyam nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ gzhen dang/ blon po dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyices rim gro bya bar
brtsams so// zhung pa snams byed cung zad cig 'dug nas sbas pa/ lha mkhyenapar mdzod cig/ bdag mchis slar lha' zhal blta pa ma dka' ba lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/
snams byedu'adi nyid du 'dug cig dang lhan cig rgyal srid gzung ngo// des smras pa// lha zhing pa bdag lta bu sargyal srid gzung ba'i rje ci zhig thego/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ snamasu byed de'i
mikhyed na re/ gal tebadag rgyal po de'i blon po 'am dmag dpon du gyuran/ bdag gis myur zhing myur bar rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po can mgul nas btags te 'phags rgyal du khrid pa zhig
cas zer/ ngani mi nus so zhes zeran de dzilta bu zhig ces byas pa dang/ de cang mi zilo bar 'dug go/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang la blon pa lnga brlayod de/ des do dag la gtor/
cug go/ de dag gis de gsos pa dang/ de'i ming gsos pa gsos pa zhes bya bar chags so// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal pos de la dris pa/ gsos pa khyod
ji zhing 'jug/ lha pa 'dra zhing mchis/ bdag la blon po de rnams b.rAnam bzhin bgyi mod/ rgyal pos snas pa/ gsos pa gal tade lta na de rnams dgos pa byung ba'i gros
byedapa'i nang du khyod kyang zhugs shig dang/ su yang khyod la ma gus par ma byed do// des spus pa/ lha nang pa bdag lta bu s gros dag gnang du'ags pa'i sngotsazhig thog/ rgyal
pos gsos pa de bzhin du gyis shig dang/ blon po de thams cad gus pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba dang/ decang mi smra bar 'dug go/ jitsam dus gzhan zhig na
rgyal po gtum po rab snang blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing 'dug pa dang/ des gsos pa sbyar gzhug par 'dod pa'i blo sngon du btang ste/ blon po rnams shes ldan dag don 'di ji
ltar bya zhes smras pa dang/ da na kha cig gis snas pa lha de 'di de 'di lta bu r bgyi'o// rgyal bos smras pa/ don 'dri ni de ltar mi bya'o// gzhan dag cig gis skyas pa/
lha don 'di'i 'di dang 'di lta bu r brgya'i// rgyal pos smras pa/ dona'adin de ltar ma bya'o/ rgyal bos gsos pa la don 'di ji ltar bya zhes rgyas ba dang/ sa lha don po ni/
ltar gyi sta/ de ltaramadzadan legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bos de bzhin du byas so// blon po rnams kyis snus pa/ rgyal po yang 'di'i gros bzhin mdzad pas
del ma gus pa mi bya'o zhes/ de dag gis de la gus pa bya bar brtsams so// yang rgyal pos gsos pa lo dris pa/ khyod dzalta zhing 'dug/ des smras pa/
lhaci 'dra zhing mchis/ re zhig dang par bdag la khyim ma mchis so// rgyal pos blon po rnams la khosgo ba/ shes ldan dag gsos pa lo ma byin cig/ de dag gis
sus pa/ lha blon pa chog mo zhes bgyi ba dus las 'das pa de'i khyim zhig mchis te/ 'i mchis brang yang de na mchis so// rgyal pos khyim de chu pam dnganor du bcasu par
gsos pa la byin cig ces bsgo ba dang/ do dag gis khyim de chung ma dang bcas tagasos pa la byin no// yang rgyal pos gsos pasdus pa/ gsos pa khyod dzalta zhing
'dug/ des smras pa/ lhamachis brang ga'akher rnams ma 'a zhingeba'o zhes b.ras par bgyid lugs so/ rgyal pos snyas pa/ gsos pa gol tade lta na gung gi tshokhyod khrus byed
bar 'dod pa 'i tshe/ ngas khyed la 'gugs pa gnya dang/ khyod kyis de la khrusazin to'ong ngo zhes byos shig/ gsos pas smras pa/ jaltar bdag gis lha'i bka' bcag/
rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa ngas khyed la gnang na'adu la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ gang gi tshakhyodagazan bza' bar 'dod pa de'i tshangs 'gugs paganyis/
ka pa gtang gis/ dal yang khyod kyis gzan zos te'ong nge zhes gyis shig dang/ de nas nga nyade khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs te/ 'ongs nas khyod dang lhan cig stod gcig rtagazan bza' 'o//
des smras pa/ lha bdag ni 'bangs lags/ khyod na jo bo lags pas/ bdag khyod dang lhan cig gcig tu'atshalam 'tshal to/ de na tsha lags so// rgyal bos gsos pa
ngas khyedal gnangan/ 'di la 'gal ba zhig yod/ khyed khre nag dang de lta na de dag khyod la gus pa byedapa 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba dang/ des khas blangs nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/
denas rgyal pos da khrus byed pa'i dus su gsos pa dgos pa cung zad cig yod kyis myur du shig cagi cus pho nyabatang ba dang/ dus de'i drung du songs smras pa/ gsos pa dgos pa
cung zad cig yod kyis ranges par shog cig ces lhas bka' stsal to// des smras pa/ kyi nang khrus byas ta'ong gses song zhig ces byas pa dang/ mi de slar song ngo// de'i chung
mo'i 'khor dag cig gtam gleng bar brtsams pa/ phunu mo'i bu cag gi khyo zhing pa 'di 'di ltar tshod med de/ lha'i bka' khyadar gsod pa la ltos/ de na kha cig na re/ nu
tsalha/ mo gang dag ragis ngan pa las byung ba de dag ni gyi nas kyang dregs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// gzhan dag na re/ phu nu mo ringes par ltos shig dang/ mthon po'i mtha' ltung bsan
gdan sa khri bar rgyal pos 'dibarlag par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// des khrus byas nas gzan bza' bar brtsams pa na/ rgyal pos de la gsos pa bya ba cung zad cig yod pa ma rlabs
kyis ris par shegacig ces pho 'ganyis pa btang ba dang/ des der song ste de bzhin du bsgo na/ des sas pa/ kyam khyedasong zhig/ gzan zos ta'ong ngo// tsam na rgyal
ba nyi 'os nas smras pa gsos pa cigazan za ba 'am/ des snus pa/ lha 'tshal ma 'tshal go/ rgyal pos snyas pa/ gsos pa nga la mgronam bya 'am/ des na
ba lhamagron bgyo yis bshos gsol cig/ chung ma dag gis bsems pa/ lha 'dadang lhan cig bzhad gad mdzade do snyam nas/ dag ngo mtshar dugyur ta/ mig
tshugs su rtog par brtsams so// rgyal pos nang pa dang lag pa bkrus yude dung lhan cig tagazan babra' bar brtsams pa dang/ chung ma rnams kyis mthong nas sngangs te/ banu
tshun du smras pa/ phu nu mo bdag cag gis 'di la 'di zhing pa'o zhes brnyas pa byas na/ lho 'di dang lhan cig bshes gsol ba la ltos/ de kha cig gis smras pa/ phun
mo 'di la ji ltarab sgrub par bya/ gzhanadag gso skas pa/ 'dil ci nag bsgrub tu yod/ gang dang lhan cig rgyal po bshes gsol ba del
bdag cag gis bkur sti ma byas n/ dzis rgyal pos mkhyenan bdag cag la gdonami za bar gnod pa byed par 'gyur bas gang thul ba de thal du zad/ paninam yang del ma gus pa
bya'o zhes byas pa dang/ gzhanadag gis sbas pa dang/ lags kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhis/ de dag 'tsho zhing mi dga' bzhin du de'i ngag mi gcog go/ yang rgyal bos bsos
ba la ji lta zhing 'dug ces rmas pa dang/ des smras pa/ lha ci 'dra zhing mchis/ khyod kyi nang pa de bdag la shani tukhyad du 'gums lags mod/ rgyal pos snasapa/ gsos
pa de lta bu bya bar mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad khyed khyon la rag las kyis khyod nyid shes so// des smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na khyod kyis bdag la bka'o gyong mi rmob
gnang/ rgyal pos sas pa/ lags kyis de bzharegyis shage sas dus gzhan zhig na gsos pa srang gnang nas song ba dang/ dan pha ma dang bral ba'i byis pa gnyis
ngashagi ci dgar rgyu zhi gnas pa gang yang rung ba nyin par zas bsgrubs nas dgong gas rtsa nge 'dug go/ tsam ma bran mo zhig chu'i bum pa khyer nas lam de nas 'gro ba dang/ par/
khye'u gcig gis grogs po ltos ngashig/ rilus bum pa 'di brjol lo zhes smras pa dang/ des snas pa/ gal takhyod kyis ra lu skam pos bu ga phyung na/ de na ngo mtshar ma
cha'i= sa ri lu gsher ba 'dis glan pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o// des legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes snyas nas/ des de la rilu skam pos brdol ba dang/ sa
gsher ba kun no// de nas gsos pas de dag mthonganas shin tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ des bsams pa/ dganyis kyis bstang na del sha glan par nus so snyam du rage nas/ kA
ma byis pa khyed gnyis su'i yin zhes dris pa dang/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha bdag cag pha ma dang bral nas/ gang yang rung ba nas nyin par rgyu zas tshol ba zhig lags so/
des smras pa/ gal te de ltan cu pa'i gan du ma 'dug gam/ lhas mchis par du bgyi ra/ 'on kyang gsol ba zhig mchis te: badrag cag gis khyed kyis las spyi zhig bgyi
b.ral/ des smras pa/ cung zad kyang byar med kyis dan gong nyadi goms par byed du bcug cing gzhug go/ 'on kyang khyed kyis nga'i d+d+hin gtsug bya ste/ gang nyagi nga dang lhan
cag 'thab mo byed pa de'i kha khyed gnyis kyis ma gtsang ba'i nang du bsgras pa'i ri lus khongs shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ lha legs kyis de bzhani du bgyi'i// jits+tsa dus
gzhanagi na/ ci zhig gi phyod de dang lhan tsane tu'athab mo byed par brtsams na/ dganyis kyis de'i khar ma gtsang ba'i nang du bzlas pa'i lus bkang ba dang/
de skyes nas lagrong dus te/ kha btsums nas spobs pa mdapang gyur to// yang rgyal pos gsos pa la/ gsos pa khyed ji lta zhange 'dug ces smras pa dang/ des
sa ba/ lhaci 'du ning mtshes/ khyod kyi nang ma des zhing pa'i sa yin no zhes bdag la b.ras bar byas mod/ rgyal pos bsal/ gsos pa gal tade lta na gang gi tsho btsun
mo'akhor gyi nang du song ba de 'a khyodasheg la/ rgyal bo ga la bzhugs zhes si 'ag/ gal tabatsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs so zhes wen/ de btsunamo'i khar skye
nang du bzhung gnas na/ rgya la po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i don dag nyams por 'gyur ro zhes ltos shig/ gal te yang der nga'i mel lam lnga dag mthong na khyed dar 'dag cig dang/ ngas khyod
kyi rkang pa bkru bar bya'o/des smras pa/ lha khyodan lags/ bdag ni 'bangs lags pas daji ltar rung ste de ni cham lags so// rgyal pos snyas pa/ gsos pa nga de ltar 'dod
zinu'adil 'gal ba su zhig yod/ de lta na dadag khyod la ni gro byed par 'gyur zhes byas pa dang/ des khas blus nas thams cad ram gyis byas so// rgyal po mal stan gang yin
0/pa'i stang du re zhig ngal bso'o zhes byas nas nyal ba dang/ de nyid du gnyid kyis lag go/ rgyal po phyir byung nas 'di su zhag nyes rmas pa dang/ de dag gi sa sbas pa/ gsos pa
lags go/ rgyal bas lcas pa/ 'di dus kyang rkang pa ma bkrus sam/ chukhyer ta)shog tsag rkang pa bkra'o zhes rgyal bos de'arkang pa bkrus pa dang/ de dag dogs shing/
ma dga' bzhin de las gro bya bar btsums/ rgyal ba gtum po rab snang bud med la brkam chags canazhago bas/da dus gzhanazhige na blon po'i nye'u
ldas dag dang lhan cig khang khazangs kyi stong du song nas/ de dag dang gtam babrang pa ma yin pa zer zhing 'dug ste/ shes ldan dag grongadang/ grong rdapA dang/ yula'ago
gang na bud mdub zang/ de na kha cig gis sAs pa/ lha kanan kub dza na bud med bzang lags so// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha kam po dzaTika pa'i bud med bzung lags so/
gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha sprul gdug po dag bzangalags so/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ grong khyer gzhan na gnas pa'i bud med dag lta zhog/ 'phags rgyal 'anyid
nagakhrugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gang zhig mthong na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pas bkur ba'i lha mo gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ na tshodadang/ dbyibs dang ldan pa
yang/ nyi ma'i 'id zer gyi snang bas lha'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyi snang ba zil gyis non pa de lta gzhage gnas lags so//
rgyal pos de gzugs dang na tshod kyi yon tan brjod pa thos nas/ lhag par gzhan gyi budamadakyi gan du 'gro 'dod par gyur te/ rgyalugs ma mngonapar byas nas dated kyin o
karasha pa Na lta ba khyer tade'i khyim du song ba dang/ des de la byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'akun tuspyod pa kun tu sbyang nas/ mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo la bgatad de/ mo song la
gis kyi bu 'di dri'i phyi dang khrus gyis shagi/ 'o de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bu mo des gzugs kyis chos bzangamo ltar mnyan te/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang la dri ba phyi bya bar
brtsams so// dra de la dril phyi byed pa na ma go zhan zhig kyang kar sha pa Na lnga brgya khyer der 'ongs nas/ dus bzang mo dga' dgur spyod kyis 'dong zhes skyas sa/ gzugs kyis
'tshob bzangamo de la kun tu spyod pa ni gal tagacig nang du'angos la/ ang gcig 'ongs na snga ma bsad de phyi ma dang lhan cig dga' dga' spyod do// bu mo des rgyal po gtum po/
rab snang de 'gakhrugs dang mchod mdzes pa de mthong nas/ 'dilta bu'i rgyal rigs kyi bu yang sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa 'dis gsodadosnyam nas ngus so// des ngus pa da
mchima'i thigs pa rgyal po gtum po rab snang ga lus la phog par gyur to// de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis rgyun bltas na bu mo deng nas/ des snas pa/ bu mo ci'i
'i ngu/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu chen po ma lags so/ rgyal po dgas par gyur nas/ yang dris pa/ bu mo su'o phyir ngu ba bag ma tshabar sbos shagacus dris pa dang/ des
rgyas bar brjodra do// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis skas pa/ bu mo gang gas nang 'bros pa'i thabs lta 'ga' yod dam/ des sa pa ! 'di'i khyim kun nas gsha8
ma' ma la gri thogs pas bskor bas mod mod kyi/ 'onakyang phyogs gcig yod na de ma gtsang bas da lta zhagi snas kyang rung/ rgyal bis sas pa/ bao gtong yang rung
ma gtsang ya nga'ang smos la srog byan cig des smras pa/ phyogs 'din chab khungs zhig yod de/ lcags kyi phur pas btab cing 'dug gis/ gal te'abyin nus na phyi
la bros shig rgyal pos snas pa/ bumo tshur phyogs de gang yin pa ston cig dang/ ngas de byung nus so zhes sbas pa dang/ dos phyogs de de la bstan to// smad
'tshong ma de'i khyim dang 'dab chags na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig ga ma yod de/ re zhig na bram ze de gcin gtsor byungan/ de'i chung ma yang chu khyer nas phyi bzhin du 'ongs ti/ bras
ze des skar ma bltas pa dang ma bzung bar mthong nas/ des bram ze mo la sbas pa/ bram ze mo skam ma mi bzang bas lha na mo bgrad pa dog pa )ma nga/
par gyuto// des smras pa/ bram ze de skad ma zer cig/ de ni rgyal po khro bar 'gyur ro// des smos pa/ bram ze mo bdag cag ni rgyal po'i skyabs na bde bar gnas pa yin pas/
des na mi dga' sa de skad mod/ thams cad rgyal pos thos so// denas rgyal pos lcags kyi phur pa de bsgul bar brtsams na/ ma nus na stobs dang ldan pa des bsgrims
bskul nas phyin pa dang/ bshang ba 'bab pa de dang lhan cig byung ste song ngo// bram ze des bram ze mo de la snas pa/ bram ze mo lha de'i mi bzad pa dgag pa nyam nga bar gyur pa gang
gnapa ded pa lha bral te/ rgyal po gson pa bdag cag dbang thang tshan/ rgyal po ni de ltar sngags bzhin du btsun mo zhi ba'i thad du song ngo// des lha de spyi zhig ces snyas pa dang/
sa ji ltar bur gyur pa smras so// btsun mo ni ba mag mchims gang bzhin du snag ma' rnyol pas bzhararo// smyug ma'i tshal pas bzhar nasas gar gyis dril phyi byas so//
sa gar gyis dral phyi byas nas spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus bkrus [u0f38 ]mthun pa'i gos dag bskon no// dephyi nyin par don bya ba sar 'dug nas blon//
pa rnams la snus pa/ shes ldan dug ltas mkhanapa dag bas shig/ de dag gis ltas mkhan dag bos pa dang/ de dag la rgyal pos sa pa/ shes ldan dag mdang nga'i/
ldan dag phyogs tshag mo nagi na bras lnga ltas mkhan zhig gnas pa de bas shig/ de dag gsi de'u thog turgyal po'i ma dag btang ngo// de dag der song nas bram ze de la lha 'bod do zhes
bsgo ba dang/ des shes ldan dag lhas ltar bka' stsal pa bzhade 'tshal gyis song zhig/ gos 'tshal lamachi'o zhes sbas so// de dag slar song ba dang/ bram ze mo des snus pa/
bram ze bdag gis sngar khyod la rgyal po gtum po khro bar 'gyur ba ma sna zhig ces byas na/ khyod la ngeg nyan du ma btub pas da ni da byung ngo// des bram ze mo la thams cudra'ags/
par 'gyur gyis bag ma tsha zhig byas snas nas/ des de dbugs phyung ste rgyal po'i drung du song ngo// rgyal pos rgyang ring po nas mthong nas byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod/
nas mkhan pa byon pa legs te phyogs 'dir bzhugs shagatsos byas pa dang/ de yid dga' ba skyes nas rgyal po largyal ba dang tshosrel ba byas nas/ jiltar bsgo ba'i
gnas su 'dug go/ rgyal pos yud tsam zhig bsdad nas smras pa/ mkhanapo khyed ltas mkhyen tam/ des snas pa/ lha sazhes par ngo thog ge/ mkhan
go bdag mdang ji lta bu zhig tu'adas par gyur/ lham bzad pa dog pa nyam nga bar gyur pa las khyod bsod nams kyi mthu can zhig ste/ 'a slad du mi mdza' ba rnams kyi nang nas
rgyu bskyal tAthar par gyur to zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po mgu nas gnas ldan dag mkhen pas driskad du smras pa de bzhane tra/ gzhan du ma yin no zhes smras nas/ mkhan po khyodal pas
pa ci zhig dbul ba gsungs shig ces smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ re zhig nang ma dang mchid gros 'tshal te slad kyis gsol bar 'tshal// rgyal pos smras pa/ mkhan po
legs kyis de bzhin gyis shag/ dus ringes par gros bslang nas song ste rang gi khyim duphyin pa dang/ nang grwa rnams la bos pastsas pa/ ngal lhas dam pa sbyin par chad na/
khyedaca'adod pa smyos shig/ bram ze mos sa pa/ bram ze re zhig khyod nyid la dris/ khyod ci 'dod/ des smras pa/ bso ze mo nga ni grong mchog lnga'o// ngas snyas pa/ bram/
zo gal te de lta na bdag ni ba glang brgya'o// bus smras pa/ yab bdag na cang shes kyi shing rta'o// bu mos smras pa/ bdag ni nor bu'i rna chagadub 'khor ro// de'i bran mo skyid/
mas smras pa/ sku khyed la de lta bu 'dodan bdag ni rdo leb bzang po'o// bram gros bsams pa/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyas kyis klu las dam pa gsol gyis/
phal pa gzhan ltar na ma bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshigs su bcad pa sumasAshang rgyal po' dring du song ste smras pa/ lha bdag cag ni 'tshal ba de gsan du gsol/ bdag
na grong khyer lnga zhig 'tshal// bram ze mo yung ba gleng brgyu// bun cing shes shing rtas// bu mo nor bu'i rnacha 'tshol// bdag gi bran mo skyid ma ste// de yang rdo leb bzang po
'tshal// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang de la de bzhin du slar chigs su bcad de smras pa// khyod la grong mchog lnga sbyin te// chung ma lagadab glang brgya// bu la mAyashing/
rta brgyan/ bu mo la yang rna chadag branaso skyod ma slong ba yi// rdo leb bzang pa'adapa yang// de re ba 'bras yod par// jaltar 'dod pa bskang bar bya// denas rgyal
pos de la jiltar 'dod pa'i dam pa byin nas snas pa/ mkhan po rub ste rgyal srid bgyis/ bdag lagros ston tsag/ des lha bdag cag tu bram ze lags pas/ da ni bdag
gi cham lags so zhes smras pa dang/ des de nan gyasi mdun na 'don du bcug go/ re zhig cig nargyal po gtum po rab snangal ri khrod pa skya bseng ba zhes bya ba dag log
ba dang/ des gsos pa la bka' stsal pa/ song la skya bsong dag rnal du phob cig/ des kyang dpung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi re glang po che'i tshogs
'a/ dpa'i tshogs dang/ shing rtapa'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskor nas song ngo// des de dag rnal du phab ste/ de nas der gte'u yang bzung/ dpya nar ma dang/
bu skyes kyang 'bul du bcug nas song ngo// rgyal pos ji ltar gsos pas skya bseng dag rnal dung banas gti'u yang bzung/ dpya nar ma dang/ bla skyes kyang 'bul du bshug 1
'os pa shes so// sa thos nas kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bkur song ngo// jim zhag nagato'u pa de'i nangan ri brags kyi bu mo shu ba dang g.yan pas tha nad pa ni/
mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang gsos pa la dris pa/ gsos pa 'di dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa'i mi lta 'ga' yodadas/ des smras pa/ lho dga' dgur spyod pa 'ba' zhig tu
ma zad/ gang la 'di stsal ba de'i rgyab tu 'di'atshalan/ rta skad 'byon par bgyid pa de gnas mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa de ca de bzhin du 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/
lha spyan star bab par bgyi'o// gsos pas bu mo de snyan pa rnams la gtad nas/ shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyis 'didapyad gyis shagi/ de dag gis lo dpyad
byas pa dang/ nad kyang sos par gyur to// denas rim gyis yo byad kyi khyad kyi par rnams kyis bskyod pas gzugs bzwang mor gyur pa dang/ gsos pas de bu mor bzung ste/
de'i mang skya bsong gi bu mo sgrol ma zhes bya bar btags so// gsos pas bu mo ngas lha 'dar gdugs tshod la spyan drangags/ khyod rgyan thams cad kyis klubs la lha la bdag nyid
ston cig ces bsgo ba dang/ decang mi sna bar 'dugago/ gsos pas rgyal po skyas pa/ lhas bdag gi sdum pa yongs su sangs pa lta zhig da mi gzigs sam/ des sus ba
gsos pa khyodakyis ma bos par ji ltar bya/ lha gal te de lta na spyana'adren no// lags te phan btags so// gsos pas rgyal po 'al 'os 6 paza' ba dang btung ba dag sbyar takhyim
dang bya byed byas pa dang/ rgyal bo de'i khyad du 'ongs so// des kyang rgyal po la 'os pa'i dril phyi dag gis phyis nas/ po sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i rgyus ni bkrus/ byug pa
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni byugs/ gos rnam pa sna tshogs ni bskon to/ rgyal po la 'os pa'i bshos gsol nas/ gsos pa dang lhan cagi tugatam dag gling zhing 'dug pa na/
des kyang yol bas bskor ba'i nang nas po longa'aphangs nas/ des yol ba bzlog ste/ yab cig pho long slar sol cig ces smras pa dang/ de tshod gzhonazhing mdzes pargyal
bos mthong ngo// mthos thub/ tuchags pa gyur te smas pa/ gsos pa de su'i bu mo yani/ lta bdag gi bu tsholags so// gsos pa ci 'ga'/
zhig la byinanas/ lha ma stsal to// gsos pa gal tade ltan ci'i phyir nga la mi sbyini/ lha dbul bar 'tshal lo// de rgyal po gtum po rab snang gas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos
chu khur bas so// sar pas rUd+de pa thams cad zil gyis gnonapa 'di ni chos nyid yin pas rgyal po yang de la gcig tulta zhape sams chags pa las gzhan btang ste de khon skyur
khen cing 'dug go/ gsos pas bsams pa/ sngon dam bcas pa bya ba'i dus de ni 'di yin no snyam nas/ bu mo 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis rgyal po 'di'i rgyab tu
non nas lta skad zer du gzhug par nus sam/ das cung zad cig bgad nas smyos pa/ yabatsag ri zhig gal tatsho theg gam ma thog blta bar bgyi'o//
lag po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// bud med rnams ni ma bslabs paromakhas pa yin pas/ da gos dri canabagos nas khri'u drab can gyi stong nyal zhing 'dug pa dang/
rgyal bas smras pa/ lha mo 'di ci tha tshig/ des snas pa/ lha lha rnams 'khrugs par gyur to// des smras pa/ khyod kyis lha rnams lasu byas/ lha gang gi tsholhas bdag
ga pa mi khrodapa skya bseng 'bebs su btang ba de/ bdag gis da bar bgyi ba'i slad du lha rnams la gsol ba btab sta/ gal tabadag ga pha donayang dag par grub nas su
'khoranagang gso bdag blangs pa de'argyab tubadag nyon la rta skad zer dusul tozhes bgyis pa las/ bdag ni lha la phul la/ lha'akhatsunamo'i 'khor ni rgya chabs cis kyang bdag gi
don 'dam bgyis par 'gyurabs so// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la zhinapa rnams kyis ni mi bya ba ci yang med pa yin pas/ des sa pa/ lha mo khyod kyi don de nga'achadangu gsol ba byas
ba ni bas thams cad bsgrub kyis bde bar 'dug cig/ de yang byang ma zer bar 'dug go/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gsi a'i/ lha mo khyod ci'i phyi mi sna bar 'dug/ lha mo khyod/
kyi gsol ba gzhan yang cung zad mad grang/ des smras pa/ lha nyung zad kyang ma mchis mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i dus su bram ze mdun na'adon gyis lha'i shis pa brjod pa la spro par/
ba la nga lenapa'i mis kyang pa wang dag blang bar bgyi'o// des smras pa/ lha mo de yung sla ste/ bram ze mdun na 'don pa ni yod na'on kyang pa wa nga lenapa zhig btsal bar bya'o// des
las kha/ lha legs kyis pa lA nga len pa btsal du gsol/ 'tsholul sa 'dzinanas sa 'dzin pa zhig 'ong thogs nas 'phags rgyal du 'os so// des smad 'tshong
[97} ]/ ma la ltar 'dodabaka'adodachags kyis bral gyis gnon pa des zung thams cad bacos te/ dad dang lhan cig bros pa de ltar lhags pa chags so// de'i
glu ma gang dag yod ba de dag thams cad kyis bor nas bros pa dang/ des de la snas pa/ sros bdag nizhing pa ma lags/ tshong pa ma lags/ grong ma brong thogs nas gzhan
du'agro ba gangam lags kyi/ gzhan du na khyed lta bu dag las rnyed pa gang lags pa des 'tshob lags pas karangasha pa Nangag stsolatug/ yang na skyes bu gzhan gyi skabs phye zhig/ des
snas pa/ pa zang mo kho ba la kar sha pa tshadag mdamod/ dzis kar sha pa Na dag bdog na khyod las lhag pa gzhan su zhig yodapa sbyin ches yod/ 'on kyang khyod bdag la sdug pas
'dir 'dug ga gas a skrad cig/ nyis bdag gis sas pa gang yanepa de byed na de lta na/ gdod bdag khyod la sdug par shes so// nges smras pa/ bzang mo mgo bos bkur ro//
des kha shang byas nas de'i steng du shug ga tshig gu bzhag sba smras pa/ tshis khyod bdag la byamasan rgyu shug gi tshig gu 'di sos zung zhigi/ des gzung bar brtsams pa dang/
blo a rdog pa gcig bstan nas phul to/ bkren pa ci'adi lta bu dag kyang byed dam/ btsog pa khyod dang lhan cig ma 'dug gas song zhig nyes snus nas/ des de khyim nas
tsha00 khaskad do/ de yang pa la nga la mkhas ba zhig ste/ pa wang len pas 'tshob chol bar gyur to// rgyal pos gsos pa la snas pa/ khyod kyi bu mos 'di lta 'di ltar lta/
rnams la gsol ba byas te/ bram ze mdun na 'don nang la yongan pa wang nas blang bar bya/ dras snyas pa/ lha sa 'dzinapa pa khrang yin pas 'tsho bang brgyad pa zhig mchis kyis/
de'i 'og dar gyis bkab la nang dudagug par bgyi'o// rgyal pos lcas pa/ gsos pa legs kyis dbazhin du gyis la khug cig/ rgyal pa drang mang du 'don khra pa bdun rtseg/
gistong du 'dzegs nas/ des mdun na 'don la jilca gyur pa thams te bsnyad pa dang/ decang ma zerab r 'dug go/ gsos pas kyang sa 'dzin pa'i mig dor gyis bkab nas/
kha pa bdunatsug ga stong dubazhag go/ skya bsang gi bu mi sgrol ma yang ngo mtshar dang/ bkra shas dang/ bdalags dag byas te/ gos dkar po bgos nas rgya la po'i rgyab
zhon pa dang/ bram ze mdunan jon gyis nangashis par brjod pa brjodabar brtsams/ sa 'dzin pa'i gson yang byas/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang yang rta'i skad 'byin par
zhugs pa dang/ sa 'dzin ba des bsams pa/ khang pa 'di ni bdun rtsa ga yin pas chus 'dingag la thar/ gdon mi za bar 'dir bdag lta bu bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa 'galazhig
bud med kyis nyo bris so snyam nas/ des glu tshig tu blangs pa/ rgya shug tshig gus gyur pa ltar/ rgya shug tshigagus gyur pa ltar// don 'di ring/
phal cher 'dra ba lani// don du'ang phal cher 'dra ba yani// zhesawang zhang de pa wa nga ma yin par yang nas yang du rgyun ma 'chad par klu len cing glu tshig de snya'o/ sangs pa la dris/
ba kyi skyes bu klu de'i don ci yani/ des ji ltagyur pa rnams brjodapa dang/ des bsams pa// 'dis bdag shes kyis yul dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas/ rgyal pos de la
kar sha pa Na lta brgya byin nas yul phyung ngo// dus gzhan zhig ga namadun na 'don gyis rgyal po la lha khyod kyis ma rigs pa zhig bgyis te/ rgyal po dag ni bud med kyi dbang
du 'gyur ba ma lags so zhes smras pa dang/ de snyad mad par tsang ma zer bar 'dug go/ des phyi de nyid gsos pa la snyas pa/ dang bram ze des 'di skad ces smras na/ de rang gi
chung chos mgo dbyar gzhug na khyod[”]se nus sam/ des lha re zhig bltas tabagyi'o zhes smras nas/ gsos pas khyim du song ste chungam la snus pa/ bzang mo bram ze mdun
na 'don gyis lha la 'di dang 'di skadatses sbas pa las/ de kho la sman/ khyed kyis canaso bras the de rang gachungams mgo dbyar gzhug pa de lta bu'i sbyor ba bya bar nus sam/ des smras
pa rje'i sras 'di la su bgyir mchis/ de lta zhig bgyis lags su zad kyis gzigs shag/ des snas pa/ bzang mo gal te de lta na legs so// g.yon tan gyi chung ma sung gzhon
an 'gyur bas/ des bram ze de'i chung ma dang lhan cig mdza' mor bya bar brtsams so// gang gi tshadi gnyis phan tshun yid phebs par gyur pa de'[% ]/ des bram ze mo la stsas pa/
grogs mo bdag gi khyim thab ni rab tubyams te/ de bdag gis gang snyas pa de byed do// des snas pa/ grogs mo kho mo la thub re skan/ ji ltar khyim thab bdag gdabang du
'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis ga la 'gyur/ gsos pa'i chung mas smras pa/ grogs mi ste khyod kyi khyim thab khyed kyi dbang du 'gyur na lha yis de'amago phye zhig/ de des ngang
rgyal bskyed pas grogs mo mgo dbyis ltos shig ces smras nas/ dgos dri ma can gyon nas khri'i dra ba can gyi stang na nyal te 'dug go/ mdun na 'don gyis dris pa/ bram ze mo/
'di i tha tshig/ des stsas pa/ bram khri lha rnams 'khrugs par gyur to// des snyas pa/ bram ze mo khyed kyi khyas nam bdag gam/ ci khyod kyis lha rnamasal khas brus pa gang
yan pa de thams cad gyis shig dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de cang mi zer ba 'dug pa dngo/ mdun na 'don gyis sbas pa/ bram ze mo khyod kyis lha rnams la su zhig khas khrus/des smras/
bram bre gang ga[%]khyod bram ze'i tshul duganas pa nalhas bos pa de'i tshabadag gis lha rnams la 'di skadaces/ bdag gi khyim thab bde bar slar 'ongs na
bdag gis de'i mgo phyi nas/ de'i sgra rnams khyed la dbul lo zhes gsol ba byas pa las/ de'i rjes la khyod kyang longs spyodaskyes par gyur/ bdag gis kyang brjed do/ danalha de
rnams 'khrugs par gyur pas/ mdor na bdag 'gum du zad do// des smras pa/ bram za ma khyod kyis gang lha rnams la gsol ba byas pa de yang nga'i ched yin pas/ longs shage
dang lha la gsol ra thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// des gsos pa'i chung ma de la bdag gi khyim thab ni 'di skad du/ lha la gsol tathams cad bya'o zhes zer ro zhus sprang ba dang/ das
kyang gson pa la rje'i sras mdun na 'don bya chungam des bdag la 'di skad du/ bdag gis khyim thab khas len du bcug ste/ lha la gsol nas thams cad bya'o nyis khrir ro zhes spring ba
mchis so// gsos pas kyang rgyal po la snas pa/ lhadon de grub lags te/ mdun na 'don de khyod la zhur mchis/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ gson
ba re pa'achad ma pas bag ma tsha zhig/ pazhig na mdunan 'don de rgyal po la gsol du 'os te/ lha bdag lho rnams kyis don cung zad cig bgyid// zla ba drug na lha'i zhal lta zhing/
mchibar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos lcas pa/ legasakyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ da khyim du song nas mgo phyi'o// da mge phyi nas kyang khyim gyi nang nyid na 'dug go/ de'i chung mas
gsos pa'i chung ma lagrogs mo kho mo'i khyim thab de ni mgo phyi zin no zhes pa'i ba dang/ des kyang gsos pa la bsnyad de// gsos pas kyang rgyal bo gtum po rab snapal smras pa dang/
du rab tudaga' sta mdun na 'don de khug cig ces bsgo/ gsos pas kyang khye'u gnyis shig glu tshig bslabs pa/ gang na bud med gzugs ldan la// rigs dang ldan zhing rigs
sgrol ma// da na med na skad zer// mdun na 'donamago phyi la ltos// zhes bslabs so// jitsamAn mdun na 'dun ti'u zhig khyon nas rgyal po'i dung du 'ongs pa dang/ khye'u de
gnyis kyis glu tshig bya bar brtsams pa/ gang na bud med gzugs ldan l// gis dang ldan zhing rags srol so/ den rtamed rta skad zer// zhes byas nas/ gzhan zhig gis
de'i zhu phud nas/ mdun na 'don mgo phyi la ltos// zhes byas pa dang/ de na gad mo chen po byung ste/ mdun na 'don yide la dro tshabar gyur nas/ kha rog par mgo smadang skya bab nas
gsos pas dgos pa dag byung ba na de dag la gagyi bar brtsams nas/ gang na 'di lta bu r bud mad kyi dbang du gyur pa de na/ rgyal po'i don ga la khyod kyis
byas pa dang/ rgyal po mdun na 'don la snus pa/ mkhan po khyed kyis gsos pa de gtsa bar nus sam/ des smras pa// lha re zhige rdzo thog gam ma thig/
thaltas te bgyi'o// de'i tshabo sgyu mamakhas pa zhig yodapas/ des de la sbas nas/ tshabo gsos pa 'dis rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i mdun du bdag mtho btsam na/ de la khyod kyis gtso
bar nus na bdag gi ngesha glan papo'agyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ sa zhapapo ri zhig nus sam ma nus bltas tabagyi'i zhes smras nas/ des mag 'phrul gyis 'grod pa sprul/ phyag dar gyi phung
po las khyim du sprul/ rus pa'i rus gong las ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs bzang 'ong blta na sdug pa mtshes pa zhuge sprul lo// rgyal po'akun tu spyod pa nagal ta'agron po 'ongs na/ de la
bdag nyid kyis shogam gcod pa 'am/ yang na gsos pa gtong ngo// gsos pas 'gron po u0f38de dag las she gam kaM dpar brtsams nas/ dos gron po rnams la dris pa/ shes
ldan dug ded dpon gyi khyim gang yano/ de dag gis khyim 'di lags so zhes bstan to// de der zhugs pa dang/ ra nyage na ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/
dbang po 'phrog pa/ sams g.yo bar byed pa zhig mthengang// mthong ma thag tuchags par gyur nas/ des smras pa/ bzang mo khyed dang lhan cig dga' dgur sbyang n 'gron pa sha gos
0/ gcad par bya'o// des smras pa/ 'a sras de ltar na bgyin/ 'on kyang mchanamo dga' dgur spyad do// de'i mig 'phrul gyis mtshan mor sprul pa dang/ gsos pas de dang lhan cig
dga' ngagur spyad nas jitsam na mgul ba nas 'khyud de nyid kyis log go/ mig 'phrul mkhan gyis mtheg 3 pa su= bsdus pa dang/ gsos po phyag dar khrod na keng rus kyi mgul nas 'khyud
da nyal zhing 'dug go/ mdunan 'don gyis rgyal po la lha gsos pa'i gnas skabs de gzigs shig ces sas sa dang/ rgyal bos blta ba'i phyir srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bsdus te so sa
rgyal pos des gol gyi sgras bsung nas/ gsos pa ci bud med gang dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad pa de'i yang bro 'am zhes smras pa dang/ darab tu skyongs nas langs tabasams po/ 'di
ltar rgyal po 'dis bdagacodrasen gson taa tu ngu/ bdag rang 'chi bar bya'o snyam mo// yang bsams pa/ bdag rang gis rang 'chibar bya banadakas/ song 'phags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po'i

gan du rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/ da tshadang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshadang ldan pa ka ta'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung/
bar 'tshal gyis rab tu byung dugasol/ des de rab tu phyung ste bsnyan par rdzogs par byas nas/ gcig las 'phros pa'i lung klog khubacugagaM/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang de mid pa ngang
mi dga' bar gyur nas/ dus de rab tu byung ba las phab ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin bzhag go// sdoman ba glangaskyong dang sngonapa nyid dang ni// byed
mad rnams dang bad sa'i skyol po dang// nor lhas byani ba dang ni rab snang dang// rgyal po rdo 'jog tun song ba dang// rmi lam rmis par gyur pa tha ma yani// rgyal po gtum po rab snang
zla mal chen por 'dug pa narnam par rtog pa 'di skyes te/ ci bdag 'das na gzhonanu ba grung skyong gis rgyal srid byab nus sam 'on mi nus snyam mo// yang bsams pa/ re zhig 'dri bgam
par bya'o snyam nas/ des dbos smras pa/ bu pa'i zhage btsun mo' 'khor du bya ba cung brad gi yod de/ ngo zhag bdun gyi bar du btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gas/ de'i bar du
khyod kyis rgyal po gyis shagi cas bsonas/ nga rgyal po byed cing rgyal po gtum po rab snang nubatsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug go/ gzhon nu bgrang skyong yang rgol ba dang phyirI rgol ba rnams
kyi thasnyad la legs par sbyong ste/ rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis byi ba byed pa dang/ bud med gang dag bzung ba de dang de dag la so sor kya ma khyod bud mod 'di dod dam zhes smod la/ bud mang
la yang khyod skyes pa 'di'i dod dam zhes rnyed cing/ gal te de dag phan tshun mngon par 'dod pa gyur na/ da nas blon po rnams la shes ldan dag 'di dag phan tshun mngon par 'dod nang ci'i
phyir ma 'dod 'dodig la nga'i chogs 'ogs na 'tshob sus kyang cung zad kyang ma smra bar 'di dag ci dgar spyod cing 'gu tu chug cig ces bsgo'o// dpya 'bul ba rnams la da nan tan du blta'o/
zhag bdunulenatorgyal po phyir byung nas gsos pa la sa pa/ gsos pa nyi gzhon nu ba grung skyong nga 'das nas rgyal sring byed nus sam/ des smras pa/ lha rje ni thog nazed kyang byi ba bgyed pa rnams
ni dar bar 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa bya ba byed pa dang bya ba mi byed pa zhes bya ba de lta bu yin/ de lta bu yin pa brjod pa dang/ rgyal pos bsams pa/
ci gzhonan 'di gzhan gyi bud med rnams la phrag dog med pa zhig gam/ 'on te rang gi chung ma la yang da bzhad pa pa po 3gi ba ga par bya'o snyam nas/ sa 'dzin pa zhig las lan pa
khyod song la/ gzhon nu ba grung skyobagi chung ma dang lhan cig draga' dgur spyod ces bsgo ba dang/ des rna ba gnyis bkab nas skus pa/ lha sdig pas brlag lags so// rgyal nges
smras pa/ sa 'dzanipa rgyal po don ni do lta bu r gnas pa yid gyis song zhogi/ gal taraMm pa bzhir ba byas na rgyal po'i rimanyams par 'gyur// des smras pa/ lha mod la da ltar gyi
ba'i rtsom sgrig pas/ bags kyis bgyi'o/ des snas ba/ de bzhin du ni byed la rag na/ sa 'dzin pa thab khri lta bu zhig byed/ lha de'i snum pa dang nye ba zhig tu zong bkram nga
bgyis/ zo nga stsol cig dang/ da nas 'dris par bgyis nas bka' phrind stsal pa bsgrub par bgyi'i// rgyal po de la zong byani pa dang/ des smras
dag bsags tatshong zong bkras pa dang/ ba glang skyong ga sgyug mo'i bran mo zhig yod pa de grong khyer nas sros kyi dur sa nyer 'ongs so// sa 'dzin pas bu mo de la bu mo spros kyi yum 'di su yin

zla zhes si ba dang/ des smras pa/ gzhonan ba glang skyong ba sgrug mo'ilo/ dam de ci zhige/ mang 'dazhis bya'o// bu mo nga'i ma nga yang mang de skad kyis bya khas pa na nga' ma dang 'dra'o zhes smras
nas/ des de la spos kyi phur ma rin bskyangs nas mang du byani no@kha glang skyong ga sgrug mos bu mo de la dris pa/ bumo sngon chadanaMrin 'di tsam gyis rdzas nyung ngu khugasal/ dani na
tu mang du khugs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ des kyang lta gyur pa thams cad brjod do// des smras pa/ legs te de ni pa'i budang 'dra'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum dubyas pa dang/
dade la dga' bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhig nas 'dzan pos smras pa/ bu mo ma la 'angaskad du u'i zhal ltar mcha'i zhus gyis shig/ des de la byas pa dang/ des smras pa/ legs
[¥ ]kyis tshur shog cig ces gyis zhig/ des de la smras pa dang/ des skyes bu dri'i rdzas dag khyor te 'os nas/ des de 'a brang sprad dngus pa dang/ des smras pa 'i phyir du/
[b]/sa sa pa/ yum ci dra ba bdag gi ma'i rubyibs kyang 'drubs/ de'i slad du bdag mtshim byung ngo// des bu nga nying khyod kyi ma de yane/ khyod nga'i bu yan gyi sa ngu zhig ces
snus sa/ de de la lhag par dga' bar gyur to// jitsam zhig na phyogs shig tub grung skyong ga chung ma song ba las/ des de bos nas bu mo tshur mang po'i zhabs la phyag gyis shis
cas byas pa dang/ de'ongs so// ma cigo bu mo 'di'i ming lags/ bu mang 'dezhis bya'o// ma cig bdag gi mna' ma yang mang 'du dang 'dra/ byakhes kyang 'didang 'dra bas
'di bdag gi mna' ma lags so// des bu legasA so zhes pas so// gang ga tshade dag phan tshun gcugs par gyur pa de'i/ des g.yo thabs su na ba ltar bcos na 'dag go/
bu mo dwayang rdzas nyor 'os pa dang/ sa 'tshadapa' khye'u des snyas pa/ bu mo nga'i thag nan/ ma cig pa ltar ma 'ong ngas/ des khyed na ba pami shes so// des snas pa
del gyis go/ des de la byas pa dang/ duyang blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te dras pa/ bu khyod ji ltar na/ des smras pa/ cig bdag gi bran yong ba zhig lags so/ a
smras pa/ bu sman pa la dris to dpyad dag gyis shagi/ des sbas pa/ ma cig 'di ni dpyad kyis 'tshob ma lags te/ bdag nad 'di khe nas srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba 'ag
a @#/ gang lags pa de mchis so// des sbas pa/ bu+isoms/ thabs gang gsand 'dri zhib 'gyur/ ma cig zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs shige
mchis na/ 'on kyang mi 'byor// bu sum 'byor smyos shig dang/ thams cad 'byor par bya'o// des snyapa/ ma cig ba glangaskyong gi btsunamo dang lhan cig dga' dgur sang na
de lta nabro 'di sos par 'gyur lags so zhes smras pa dge/ du rab tukhres nas smras pa/ bkren pa khyod da sho'i zad/ khyod rgyal po'i btsun mo dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod dam zhes
des de la smyos talas song ngo// sa 'dzin pa de g.yon can zhig pas des nor thams cad dkar chag la bras nas/ dkar chag de la nga shi na rdzas thams cad la ba glang skyong ga smug
mor yin no zhes de skad du yang bris so// dkar chag de la bskur ba dang/ des bklags nas khro ba zhi bar gyur tebasams pa/ de bdag gis da gzod kho na skyes ta'ongasan yog
jabyams par gyur gyis/ de'i phyir bud med rnams kyi rang bzhani ni de lta bu yin pas/ dngasha na ma rung bsarwa lo bsgrub bo snyam nas/ sa bu mo de bos da nas sa 'dzin pa'i bsngags
pa rim gyis skyong nas smras pa/ bumo khyod kyi skud pa de na na de ltar ma 'gro lam/ des smras pa/ ma cig sman po ma chas sam/ ci sa dpyad ma bgyis/ des sbyas pa/ bu mo
de'i nad ni ya nga ba zhig ste/ nga nad de kho nas dus byedabar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod na/ 'on kyang de na ri gal te mna' ma dang lhan cig dga' dgur sbyang n/ de ltar bdag
'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// de khros nas smras pa/ ma cig bkrenupa de da dus byas su zad/ rgyal po'i btsunamo dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par 'chol las/ des
ba bumo khyod kyi gyos po gang las skyes ba khyod shes sam/ ma cig ma 'tshal to// bu mo de na sdog pa las skyes te rgyal po gyur nas dpung gi dmag mang ba yan no// khyed kyi
khyod a tshong dpon zhig gi bu yate/ de yang rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyed kyang 'di dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod cig dang/ khyod las bu gang byung ba de yang rgyal par 'gyur re zhes de dus
bslas pa dang/ khas blangs nas des sa 'dzin pa'i khye'u de la sprangab/ bu bu mo 'dis khas na blangs na/ khyed la gnod par byed srid kyis/ dus shes par gyis la shog cig
byas byas so// sa 'dzin pas rgyal po la lha dond na grub na 'on kyang zhag ba glang skyong ma gtang du gsol zhes smreng ngo// rgyal pos bsams pa/ bdag 'das nasa gzhon nu ba klong
skyong rgyal por 'gyur zhing/ de 'das nas kyang de'i bur 'gyur ba yin na/ gal tab glang skyong gi chung ma las sa 'dzipa'i bu skyes par gyur na de rgyal par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir gang gis
nas 'di pa de'i dbang po sa bon du ma 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sman sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/ des de'i dbang pa sa bon du mi 'gyur ba'i la du dug cig bskur nas/

sa 'dzin pa khyod gang gi tsho gzhon nub glang sbyong gi chung ma dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa de'atsho/ khyod kyis la du 'di dag tho zhig ces slang ngo// ba glang skyong la yang bu gros su bya bo rgyu nga
tshu zad cig yod kyis/ re zhig khyim du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo ba dang/ de 'dug go/ sa 'dzin pas kyang dbang po sa bon du mi 'gyur ba'i la du zos nas/ ba glang skyong gi chung ma la dga'
dgur sbyang nas 'dod pa'i dga' bas dub par gyur te// de'i mgul nas 'khyud bzhin du gnyid log par gyur to// rgyal pes bsams pa/ des de la dga' dgur spyad pa song
glang giso/ gzhon nu gtang bar bya'o snyam nas/ des gzhoman ba glang skyong la snyas pa/ bu mna' ma ma dga' bar 'gyur gyis ring po ma 'dug par srong zhig/ de khyim du song ba dang/
ra zhig na chung ma gzhan gyi skyes bu zhig dang lhan cig tu 'dug cing sa 'dzin pa de'i lage pa 'phyang ba mthong nas/ de'i lag pa bskum nas 'di dag 'ga' zhig gis mthong bar 'gyur du 'ong
ngosnyam nas gos kyis g.yogs so// sa 'dzin pa mtshan rangs pa01lanas/ nam nus panyim shar ba dang sad nas/ des bdag mthong ngam ma mthong snyam nas brgyugs

[2/ ]yong nge/ kha pa/nga skyong la rgyal pos bu mdang sum pa'i lha lam khyod kyi chu ma skyes pa gzhan zhig drang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa mthong ngo nas skus pa dang/ lha khyod kyis ning 'a ma ngu
gzigs/ bdag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong ngo// ji lta bu zhig tu/ sa ji ltar gyur pa'i gtam rgyas par brjododo/ rgya ngos smras po/ bu khyod la phrag dog mdangam/
lha ma mchis so// bu de ci'i phyir/ lha bag rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran/ bdag sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan zhig na ded dponazhayig gi chung mar gyur pa las/ dadadapon zing 'tsha 'a
nas yul gzhanang chas pa dang/ de la bdapa ga gis rje'i sras bdag kyang mchi'anyis sbas so// des de na khyod kyi rim gro su byadatsas sa tA/ des bdag mi bkra bar bgyis pa dang/
dus so/ del nongashas 'tshob rnams kyis mag pa/ ded dpon gyi chung ma ci'i phyir du/ des de dag la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang/ de dag gis ded dpon khrid cig dang bdag cag
gis rim gro bya'o zhes lcasanas/ des bdag khridi do// jitsaman lam kar ma rgod lnga brgya tsam byung nas/ de dag gis 'gron po de rnams kyang bcom/ dadadapon ya nga bsad nas/
bdag ni mi rgod lnga brgya po rnams kyis dga' dgur spyad do// de rnams kyis 'gron pa gzhan zhag pa'i bud med gzhan zhig rnyed pa dang/ de bdag gis 'di ni bdag gi chu mar 'gyur ro snyam nas
khron brnying bar bor ba dang/ de nyid du ma par gyur to// lta bdag mnyid lnga brgyas dga' dgur spyad na ngoms par ma gyur pa de lta bu bdag gis tshul bzhin
bud med rnams phrag dog skyedalags sam/ lha 'on kyang 'jig rten gang zhig khyadamed rnams yid brtanAbar 'jog pa de ni blun pa lags kyis/ bud med rnams kyis skyes pa dag yodi
[@? ]brtan bar gzhag par bgyi ba 'di ni rigs lags so/des smras pa/ bud de bzhin te/ budamod rnams kyis skyes pa dag yid bortan par gzhag b.rakhya'o/ 'phags rgyal na
rtson pa zhig gnas pa de'achum gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig byas/ de dal shin tuchags te/ des bsams pa// gal te chung ma bzhag ste dgon pa'i gnas su
song na ni/ 'di skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur/ phyisnye ma song na ni bdag sngonapa sta/ gzhan gyi srog gcodacingagazhanagyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin
gyis bdag ni zhing pa ma yin/ tshong pa ma yini/ gzhan gyis 'tshob yang ma yapas/ gdon ma za bar ltogs te 'chibar 'gyur bas/ ma la bdag gis chung ma khrid la 'gro'o snyam
nas des chung ma khridi de gon pa'i gnas su song nas/ phyogs gcig cig tulo ma'i spyil bu byas ta'adug go/ des der ri dgas mchog gdams shing bsad de sha bzang po btsongs nas
'tsho bar byed do// jitsam dus gzhan zhig nargyal po gtum po rab snang ri dgasasher du song ba las/ de rgyus kha khyer nas phyogs der phyin pa dang/ sngon pa des de ngo shes par gyur
cing/ ltar rtas kha khyer ba yang shes nas/ des de la khyenapa lags so zhes bya ba'i sgrig kun tu spyad pa dang Da de rta las babs dngashing drung zhig tu 'dug go/ rngon pas bsams pa/
bdag gas rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la zhag lon pa'i sha dbul ba gang yin pa nib dag ga chas yin pas/ ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon pa gzhan zhig khyer ta'ong ngo/
snyam nas/ des mapa'i lcags khagros mda' gzhu lag nakhyer tar dgas shor du song ngo// rgyal ba gtum pa rab snang gis de'i chung ma gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa de mthong nas/
nyon mongs pa drag po'i mthus 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bskyod pas na pa de'i chung ma dwang lhan cig tu ma thag tu log par spyad do// rngon pa des ri digs bsad nas slar log
pa dang/ re zhig na chupas de la log par spyadapa mthong// khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta sku/ bud mad kyi phyir khen pa 'di tha chad yin bas/ de khros nas bsams pa//
dus ngan pa'i rgyal po rgyal po'i tshos las 'das pa 'di gsad do snyam pa las/ yang bsams pa/ bud mod tsam gyi phyir ci 'di gsad ya/ de de snyam sems pan/ malta
tasang ga zhig dang gdong thug duphrad nas/ des de bsad do// des rgyal po gtum po rab snang la byams pa sems bskyed pas ! gab nas rgyal
pa chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// rgyal pos bsams pa/ bu med 'di bdag gis longs spyadal/ 'di'i khyayang dus las 'das na/ bdag gas 'di bor
ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no sum bsams nas/ sa de spro bsres nas de de dang lhan cig gtamA zor zhing 'dug go/ tsim na blon po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ khrom gyi
rudag yan man du tshol nang phyogs der phyin pa dang/ de dag gis skyes pa/ lta bu mada'adisu'i lags/ sa snas ba/ dad na rgyal bo yin pas/ngas su
zhig bud med mi 'bul/ dengal 'di btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du'og tagi/ de dag gis de btsunamo'i 'khyer gyi nang du bzhag go rgyal po yang dpang dang bzhonapa'i tshogs dang ji
ltar 'dod bzhin du song nas/ 'phags rgyal du phyin par gyur ban/ de'i btsun mo'i 'khor dge rgya cher 'phel bar gyur to// bcomaldan 'das kyis jiltar sems/
'dimyur du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ni gcig kyang ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa 5/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che ba dag mthong nas
bsams pa/ ra zhig rngon pa nyon mo sa des chung ma gcig cig 'brog dgon pa khrod du bzhag na de yung bsrungs bar ma nus na/ bdag gis btsunamo' 'khor shin turgya cha ba
sus ba lta smos kyang ca dgos snyam nas/ des 'phagargyal du dril bsgrags taM/ 'di skad dungashes ldan ngag 'bugs rgyab na gnas ba drang/ grong khyer pa dang/ tshul
sna tshogs nas 'os pa'i skyakho'i tshogs dag nyon cig/ ngas btsunamo'i 'khor rnams ngeltar 'dod par longs skudadugatang gis/ gang gis btsun mo'i 'khor dag yongs su
las spyad pa des ni legs par longs spyad pa ma nozhes bsgrags so// btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang bos nas/ khyed kyang gzhan gyi skyes pa dang lhan cig tudaga' dkur sbyong
du da la/ gang zhig rnga brdzus pa tshos ma 'os pa de'i mgo drung nas bcad de sa la dor bar bya'o zhes kyang bsgo'o// bud med thams can skyes pa 'dod pa yin na/ rgyal po'i
btsun mo'i 'khor rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos pas/ dudag 'phags rgyal na kun tu'am: nga gangags skyes pa gang mthong ba de de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par brtsams so//
ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang/ skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma ni/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang lhag par byams sa de dag rgyal po'i ngom chod de ma song// rgyal pos zhi ba la lcas pa ]
[z]kya/// zhi ba khyed kyang song la gzhan gyi skyes pa dag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod tsake/ des sbas pa/ lha bdag nalta btang nas skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig
dga' dgu la spyod lags so// skya bsang ga bu mo sgrol ma la khyod song zhig ces smras pa dang/ da na tshod kyis gzhan la ma brtan pa'i rang bzhin can zhag yunabs skyes pa gzhan
'dod de/ sa khas blas nas da srun mar song ngo// de kun tu'aphyan pa na sus 'tshong gi khyi'u sdu gu zhig mthong nas/ des de la smras pa/ dga' kur spyad kyis tshur
das sa pa/ bzhag mar ma zung zhig dang/ ju'adu 'god partsis la phyis dga' gur spyad par bgyi'o zhes byas pa dang/ dres maram bzung nas 'dug go/ spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di
'dis ni 'di khugs so// 'di ni chag mo zhig la byis pa yin no zhes des rtsis byedatsang dal ma sams bar 'dug gi bar du dri tsam na nam nangs par gyur te/ rgyal po'i pe pang du
drab rdzus pa dang/ skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas mar me sa la bzhag ste song ngo// des smras pa// dga'u dgur sbyad kyis stod cig/ ngas sbas pa/ ji ltar dga' dgur spyad/ lha
ka'i skyid du bud med gang zhige rnga brdungs dam 'ongs pa de 'a mgo bo dung sa bcad de sa la do bar bya'o zhes khrims su bcas te bzhag la// da gzod dra de yang bsdus khri ni bag
la mgo gnyis yod das 'gro'i/ zhes de dag la dgur la spyad pa nyid dusong ngo// rgyal pos dris pa/ sgrol ma khyod kyis dga' dgur spyad ma/ des snus pa/ lha
bdag dga' dgur la spyad do// ci'i phyir zhes byas pa dang/ des dzaltar gyur pa bad nas/ rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug ga/ ya du po des da ban du lo bsgrags pa dang/
kun tu rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis btsunamo 'o 'a ra ltar 'dod pa bzhirangu skyes bu longs spyod du btang ngo zhes sgra grags so// ko'u sham ba'i rgyal po shar pa'i byas/
ngoltar rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis btsunamo' 'khor dziltar 'dapa bzhin du skyes bu des da du btang ngo zhes thos so// sa nas kyang sbyor ba 'chang la snas pa/ sbyor kha 'chang
rgyal ba gtul ba ba snang gis btsunamo'a'akhor pa ltar 'dod bzhin du skyes bu yis slong du btang ngo zhes grag gis/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang ga btsume'i 'khor rnams dang lhan
nyag dga' dgur spyod du 'grogro/ des sbas pa/ lha rgyal po gtum po rab snang ni khyod kyi yun ring po nas gsod pa phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba lags pas/ gal te lha der bzhung ngo
mjalan gnod pa bgyid pa'i gnas gang legs pa dmachis go/ des smras pa/ sbyor ba 'chang mi rnams kyi nang na ma gzu lums snyan ngag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod 'dir ]
'dug cig ngan 'gro'i// des smras pa/ gal talha de ltar than) lha pag mi mnga' pa lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang theg mdzad pa'i rigs so//
rgyal po shar pa'i bu yang shan tu bud mdal brkam chags can zhig pas/ des da'i tshag khyad du bsad nas/ 'phags rgyal du song ba dang/ skya bsang ga bu mo des de
gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdugapa mdzes pa mthong ngo// des domathonganas smras pa/ rgyal rigs tshur spyon skya bsang gi bu mo sgrol ma dang ngaga' dgur spyadapar bgyi'o//
des sa ba/ legs kyiso la rgya'i shag/ des smras pa/ khyedamal gyis shig/ deganyis ka yang drags shing nga rgyal gyis khengs pas rgyal bo shar ba'i bus kyang
mal ma byas/ skya bsengag bu mo sgrol mas kyang ma byas par/ de gnyis khyad mal byas shagi ngam byed do zhes sla ba'i bur nganam nangs par gyur te/ rgyal po'i pho brang puN+Da bas
pa dang/ skya bsang ga bu mo sgrol ma songang// rgyal po rakarapa'i bus smras pa/ sdod cig dga' dgur spyad par bya'o// skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas skyas pa/ pholtar
ga' dgur spyod// lhas 'di skad du bud med gang zhig rnga brdungs tam 'ongs pa de'i mgo de drung nas bcad de sa la dor ro zhes khrims su bcas pa bzhag la/ da gzod nga
de yang bas ni bdag la mgo gnyis yod dam 'gro zhes de dga' dgur ma spyad par rgyal pa shar pa'i bu'i lag nas sor gdub rgya phyung su song ngo// rgyal pos dris pa/ sgrol
na khyod kyis dga' dgur spyad dus/ des snyas pa 1 lha dga' dgar ma phyed do// ci'i phyir khyod kyis dga' dgur ma sbyad/ des ji ltar gyur pa khaN+Ding nas/ sor gdub
rgyu bstan tu'adi nA ba dag gis de'i sor gdub rgya'atshal tamachis lags so// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i rgya bklags nas/ gsos pa la lcas pa/ gsos pa
rgyal po shar pa 'bu dmag mang po thur 'di'i 'os pa sus kyang ma tshor te// de yang nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor 'dod na khyod kyis ji ltar yal bar dor/ des smras pa/ lha ma tshor
bar de 'di nas chod/ ji lta da dung 'di mchinam bzed par bgyi'o// de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis yang de bzhin duphril bsgrags pa dang/ rgyal po shar pa'i
bu des de bzhin du thos nas/ sbyor ba 'chang la snyas pa/ sbyor ba 'chang rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis yang btsun mo' 'khor ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skyes bu longs spyod
dubatang ngo zhig grag gis/ de'i phyire rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad kyis tshur shog 'dong/ sbyor ba 'chung gsas
bang lha de'i tshon khyod ma tshor bar bzhudapas/ 'i slad du pad bar 'do'i 'khor gyi/ da ni rgyal po gtum po rab snang sta gon du chas shing
mchis pas ma gshegasanalags go// des sa la/ sbyor ba 'chang ma rnams kyi nang nas ga'u lums can dag lta yod de/ 'gro'ozhes pa song ba dang/ sbyor
ba 'changayang rgyal pa'i bkas song ngo// rgyal bo shar pa'i bu ram gyis 'phagasargyal du phyin te/ khyim gang duzhugs pa de gsos bas 'gan ral gri thogs pa'i mi dag
gso kun nas bskol nas de rnams la bsgo ba/ bshes ldan dag gal te budand cig phyi rol tu byung na na thing zhig/ jis skyas pa zhig na la gtung nag/ sbyor/
kha 'changags tshor nas/ sa bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal po ma bzadang dog pa nyam nga bar gyur pa yal bar dor ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma a rtse no snyam nas//
desargyal ba de bud med phal pa'i lugs dang rgyan gyis rgyan te/ de nas bum pa bkur nas lcag chos gzhus te spyi nang lha da dung tshanas shing sku gsol na/ khyod
chukhyer te 'ong ma zhes byas nas phyir phyung go/ rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bu mo mngag gzhug yin no snyam nasol bar btang ba dang/ des bum pa rdzing bu'i
'gram du bor nas bro sa te song ngo// gsos pas khyim de bltas pa dang/ re zhig na bros par gyur nas/ des sbyor ba 'chang bzung ste rgyal po gtum po rab snang la phul
nas lhan 'das rgyal po ngashar pa 'a bu btangalags so// sbyor ba 'chang gis snas pa/ u0f8blha bdag gis de 'bras dang gos dag bdag gi bgyis te/ bdag gis
du btang ba gang lags pa de na bdag gis rigs ba zhige bgyis kyi/ 'dis ni khyed kyi zas dang gos bdag gir bgyis ka/ da btang ba na yal bar bor ba gang lags pa dri
narigs pa ma lags so zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bo gsos pa la khros nas snas pa// gsos ba rgyal po shar pa 'i btsunamo'i 'i khora'adodapa al bar gtang ba'i
rigs sam/ shi phyir gal sngar zhige rgyal bo shar pa'i bu 'di de 'ongs na de lta na legs/ ji sa 'os 'chad pas cha gcad do zhes byas pa dang/ dkrug
nas de gzung ba'i thabs sams gang 'dug ge/ re zhigen lho phyogs nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon nage 'ongs pa dang/ gsos pas kyi skyes bu 'di dang 'di lta bu'i pa
'phrul 'khor byed nus sam zhes dris pa dang/ des snas la/ lha bdag gas mnyes par ngo thug go/ gsos pas glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i re zhig bya ba dben pa zhig tuphyag na[Y]
'phags rgyal du glang po che'i gtsob 'dam bu'i ra bris so zhes sgra btung ba dang/ de'i tshosgrade yang phyogs dang phyogs mtshAms dgatsugrags par gyur to//
rgyuda' tshade'akhrul 'khor gyi sgyurtsal gyi mkhanapasol 'delta bu'i 'i khrul 'khor zhig gyis shig ces smras pa dang/ des kyang glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam pa'i re ci 'dra brwa'akhrul 'khor
'a zhig byas nas/ 'khrul 'khor dor ma lnga brgya yang bcug/ glang po che'i rtsa ba dang chu mang du bcug ste/ dranas ma da rnams la bsgo ba/ ci nas kyang khyed cag
rgyugs 'gyur ko'u sham ba'akhyo'akhor mgo lam dubab pa de ltar 'khrul 'khor 'di drongs shig/ dzistargyal po shar pa'i bu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba dang byung nan/
khyed kyis de'i lag tum sbyin// 'on togatsage pu 'osan ni zung la/ bkrunganas myur du 'di'i khrod du shog cig ces byas pa dang/ de dag gis ji ltar 'khrul 'khor de ko'u
