ba'icu'akhor ba ltar rung ba de ltar lags bar drangs te 'dug pa dang/ phyugs rje dang/ ba glang rje dang/ rtsathun drung/ shing thun dang/ lam gyis
'tsho ba dang/ lam gol bas tshob de mi rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad nas bskor tabalta bar brtsamasaso/ dam kha cig na roshes ldan ga 'dane glang po che'i gtso
bo dod gzhi nas thar ro// gzhan dag na re 'di glang po che'i ma yin gyi/ 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po gtum pa ba snang ga nga ba 'a gtso bo 'dam bu'i zhes
bya ba khros pa de 'di'i 'os pa yin no zhes zer ro// de nas kha cig gis rgyal po shar pa'i gan du song nas gcam bug sol pa/ lha 'phags rgyal na gnas
pa'i rgyal ba gtul ba rab snang gi glang po che ni gtso bo 'dam bu'i ra bris par gyur pa gang lags pa dran lha'i bsod nams kyi mthus 'dir mchis te/ srog chags
ba stong du ma bltar mchis si zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po shar pa'i bus thos nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ dga' ba'i rnga brdungs/ dung zung la
pa sdams pa ni byas nas/ sbyor ba 'chang la bsgo pa/ song la da dung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon lagrong khyer du yang dril sgrogs ta/ 'di skad du
grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang ul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skya bo tshogs rnams 'a// rgyal po glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ra 'dzin du gshegs kyis// mtshon

rnam pa sna tshogs dang zhag pa thogs teshigatsagaces sgo 'gi sbyor ba 'chang gis dpung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon tagrong khyer du yang dril bsgrags nas 'di skad du/ 'anyis ldan grong khyer na gnas pa
nams dang/ pho brang 'khong na gnas pa rnams dang/ yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs drug nyon cage/ lhas draglang po che'i gsob 'dam bu'i ri 'dzinedugashegs kyis/khyed
chag mtshon snatshogs dang zhugs pa dag thogs tashog cig ces bka' stsal tonas byas so// nasargyal po shar pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang/ mi'i mchog stong phrag du ma dang lhan cigung

tshogatsab 'dam bu'i ri 'dzin du 'ongs pa dang/ 'khrul 'khor phul ba rnams kyis ji ltar glang po che'akhegatso bo 'dum bu'i roltar bcos pa de 'phros par rtsom pa de ltar 'khrul 'khor de phul ba dang/ blon
pa rnams kyis smras pa lha khyodatod glang po che'i tshig la mkhas pa lags pas/ glang po che'adi'abros su bgyid kyis/ khyod nyid kyis thabs mdzad du gsol/ rgyal pos sbyor ba chang la bsgog
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa khyedatsage/ nyid thabs kyis 'di'i drung du 'gro'o// des dpungag tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bskyed nas/ rgyal po bdag nyid pa wang snyan pa lan cing 'bar 'gro/
ra brtsams pa dang/ 'khrul 'khor phul bams kyis ji ltar 'khrul 'khor rgyal po shar pa'i bu'i drung du song nas 'dug pa de ltar phul te spyi lnga brgya pa de dag 'khrul 'khor nas byunas
!/ bzung ngo// bzung nas 'khrul 'khor du bcug ste/ 'khrul 'khor de ji ltar rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs par gyur pa de ltar phul/ rgyal pa shar pa'i bu khrid do// rgyal po shar pa'i bu khride des [}]
[4]/ blon po rnams kyis kun tu sbyan pa dang/ srogachags bsgyu sto dam dang dpung gatshogs yan lag bzhi pas bsnyag par brtsams so// gang gi tshes tshigs 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe/ sbyor ba 'chang
gis snas pa/ shis ldan dag rgyal po khrid bani/ thabs gzhan zhig bsam gyis slar log nyag nyes byas pa dang/ de dag thams ted log go rgyal po shar
ba' bu yang 'phags rgyal du khrid nas/ gsos pas rgyal po gtum po rab snang la phul te/ lha rgyal po shar pa'i bu 'di lags so zhus byas pa dang/ rgyal pos dgarwa ba'i
dran pajus/ dung zung kha bsdams pa na bus te/ grongadrang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ srang na gnas pa'i srog chags snyirje na na ba du ma tshogs pa dang/ gsol
'bab/ ngas rgyal po shar pa'i bu yongs su btang gas sod cige/ blon po rnams kyis smos pa// lha rgyal po 'di ni glang po che'i tshig la mkhas pa zhig ste/ gal ta'ade
bkum na glang po che'i tshig nub par 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du re zhig lhus 'di la snga glang pa'atshog bslab tu gsol/ slad kyis jiltar bkalnga rtsal pa bzhin bgyi'o// rgyal pos
smras pa/ gsos pa gal dod ldan khyod kyis 'di las glang po che'i cho ga slobs shig/ ngas 'degs su glang po che'i tshig bsrubs te nga' slob dpon du gyur na/ de jir slob dpe gsad
kun kha bya/ gso bas sman pa/ lha bdag la yang nyes dmigs de nyid du 'gyur bas de ni cham lags so// rgyal bas lcas la/ gsos pa gal tade lta
na su zhig 'di la slob tu bcug la/ dolas ngas bslab par bya/ gsos pas smras pa/ lha khyod kyi sras mo nor lhas byin 'dra de mi ma mchisapa/ brtson
'grus dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa grigs pa lags pas/ 'di slob tu stsal te 'dis lha la bslab par bgyi'o// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gas/ nor
lcas byan la snas pa/ bu mo ma de mtshon nganapa bco brgyad dang ldan n/ 'on kyang de glang po che'i rmig la mkhas pa zhig pas/ khyod kyis de las bar du yol bas bcad de/
glang po che'i tshog slobs la/ phyis nga la slobs shig/ khyed kyis mi de la blta bar yang ma bya ste/ de mthong na bkra ma shis pas khyed kyis de mthong na khyed 'chi'i zhus byas
pa dang/ des yol bas bcad de de las glang po che'i tshog bslab par brtsams so// sbyor ba 'chang gis bsams pa// gal te lha btsal tagason na nad thur pa'i thubs shig bsam
mo ngo 'on te ni sku dus las 'das nani gnan zhog rgyal bar dbang bskur 'o snyam nas/ 'gro'i tshogasar 'phreng can zhes bya ba sgyubasham pa la sbyor ba'achang ba pas kyang lhag ba
zhig yod pa de la/ des smras pa/ sring mo 'phags rgyal du song la son nas/ rgyal po kun tu tshol te/ gal te gsonan de thar pa'i thabs shig bsam par bya'o// 'on
sha ste dus las 'das na gzhani nag rgyal por dbang bskur ro zhes byas ba dang/ des de la cang mi sna bas khas blangs te kun r rgyu'ache lugs su bsgyur nas 'phags rgyal song ngo/
de rgyal po'i sgor 'duganas rgyal po la mi dag ladwasipa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po shar pa'i bu gson nam 'on tesha/ rgyal po'i mi dag gis smos pa/ re zhig rab tu byung ba
khyod la dris/ des khyod la gnod pa go byas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ga des kho mo'i khyi dang bun 'tshob dang phral/ badrag gi nor rdzas thams ca nithogs so// de dag gis stsas
pa rab tu byung ba de ni dus las 'das/ de rgyal po'i sras mo nor lhas byin pa la glang po che'i cho ga slob bo// de bzhin du dus rgyal po' sgo bzhir rgyal po'i mi dag la dris pa 'o/
da dag gas kyang de bzhin du lan btab bo// de g.yo thabs de dang des nang du chud pa dang des rgyal po shar pa'ibu mthong nas/ phyogs bzhire bltas te dal bus lha gson nam
zhes smras pa dang/ de yang bag tshanang yang mi dga' ba bzhin du phyogs bzhir bltas nas sring mo gson no zhes smras so// des de mngon sum du byas nas thabs gzhan zhig gis nor lhas bya/
pa samathong nas smras pa/ bumo khyod su las glang bo che'i chobag slob/ des sa pa/ bgres mo tshamtshanangan pa bco brgyad dang ldan
nage yod de/ la bar yol bas bcad nas slob bo// des smras pa/ 'a na mamtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa 'ga' yang ga la yod/ gang zhig khyod slob pa de ni rgyal po shar
ba yin/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mtshan thams cad legs par rdzogs pa yinen/ khyod la su zhig gis de skad du bslas/
dris khyed yid ma ches na yol ba phye la ltos shig ces byas pa dang/ sa de gzugs dang na tshod thos nas dad de yol ba phye ba dang mthong ngo// mthong
ma thag turlung gi stobs kyi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du 'dod pas g.ya sa nas snas pa/ bgres mo khyed skad gsung ba gang lags pa de namangan/
'on kyang gsol ba zhig mchis te/ bdag 'dudang lhan cig mjal bar khyod kyis spyod dam/ des smras pa/ bum bdag gis khyod kyi de kho na
bzhin du bsgrub par bya ste/ gar bskor kyang skyes bu 'di lta bu dang phrad pa yang dka'an/ gang khyod nga la 'di lta bu 'chol ba lta smos kyang ci dgos//
